text2: Kodo kai primila profeto ke si profeto lela o mishtimos kai avel ka profeto , kon godi primila chache manushes ke si chacho manush lela o mishtimos kai avel ka chacho manush . "

text: And whosoever shall give to drink unto one of these little ones a cup of cold water only in the name of a disciple , verily I say unto you , he shall in no wise lose his reward .
text2: Ai te dela vare kon ek daxtai shudro pai kai iek anda kadala tsinorhe ke si murho disipluria . Me phenava tuke chachimos , chi xasarel pesko mishtimos . "

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had made an end of commanding his twelve disciples , he departed thence to teach and to preach in their cities .
text2: Kana O Jesus getosardia te phenel so te keren leske desh u dui disipluria , gelotar kotsar te sicharel ai te del duma pa Del ande lenge foruria .

text: Now when John had heard in the prison the works of Christ , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Kana o Iovano o baptisto ande temnitsa ashundia so kerelas O Kristo , tradia divano pe peske disipluria .

text: And said unto him , Art thou he that should come , or do we look for another ?
text2: Te phushen lestar , " Tu san kodo kai trobulas te avel , vai trobul te azhukeras avres ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Go and shew John again those things which ye do hear and see :
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , ' Zhan ai phenen le Iovanoske , so ashunen ai so dikhen ;

text: The blind receive their sight , and the lame walk , the lepers are cleansed , and the deaf hear , the dead are raised up , and the poor have the gospel preached to them .
text2: Le korhe dikhen , le bange phiren , le lepri vuzhon , le kashuke ashunen , le mule zhuvindin , ai e lashi viasta phendila le chorenge .

text: And blessed is he , whosoever shall not be offended in me .
text2: Raduime kodo kai haliarel kon sim ai chaches pachalpe ande mande ! "

text: And as they departed , Jesus began to say unto the multitudes concerning John , What went ye out into the wilderness to see ? A reed shaken with the wind ?
text2: Ai sar zhanastar , O Jesus dias duma le narodosa pa Iovano , " So gelian te dikhen ande pusta ? E treshtia kai mishkilas katar e barval ?

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A man clothed in soft raiment ? behold , they that wear soft clothing are in kings ' houses .
text2: So gelian te dikhen ? Iek manush huriardo andel shukar tsalia ? Kodola kai phiraven shukar tsalia beshen andel khera amperatonge !

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A prophet ? yea , I say unto you , and more than a prophet .
text2: So gelian te dikhen ? Ek profeto ? E , me phenav tumenge , " Ke wo si mai but sar profeto .

text: For this is he , of whom it is written , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Ke kodo si kai si ramome pa leste : ' Tradava murho podaitori mai anglal tutar te getol o drom angla tute . "

text: Verily I say unto you , Among them that are born of women there hath not risen a greater than John the Baptist : notwithstanding he that is least in the kingdom of heaven is greater than he .
text2: Phenav tumenge o chachimos ! " Mashkar manush kai arakhadile zhuvliatar chi vazdinesailo khonik mai baro sar o Iovano o baptisto . Numa kodo kai si mai xantsi ande amperetsia le rhaioski si mai baro lestar .

text: And from the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven suffereth violence , and the violent take it by force .
text2: De katar o dies kai o Iovano o baptisto delas duma pa Del ai zhi akana e amperetsia le rhaioski chinuil ke pe zor kerdiol ai manush pe zor len e amperatsi .

text: For all the prophets and the law prophesied until John .
text2: Ke sa le profeturia ai o zakono le Mosesoske dine profesi zhi ka o Iovano ;

text: And if ye will receive it , this is Elias , which was for to come .
text2: Ai te mangena te primin , wo si o Elijah , kai sas te avel .

text: He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Kodo kai si les khan te ashunel . Mek te ashunel !

text: But whereunto shall I liken this generation ? It is like unto children sitting in the markets , and calling unto their fellows ,
text2: " Pe soste sai phenav ke miazol kadia vitsa . Miazol sar glate , kai beshen ando bazari , ai phenen le kolavrenge .

text: And saying , We have piped unto you , and ye have not danced ; we have mourned unto you , and ye have not lamented .
text2: ' Jilabadiam tumenge abiaveske jilia , ai tume chi kheldian ! ' Jilabadiam tristo jili , ai tume chi nekezhisardian ! '

text: For John came neither eating nor drinking , and they say , He hath a devil .
text2: O Iovano avilo , chi xalia ai chi pelia , ai won phende leske , ' dzilolo , bengailo ! ' O Shav le Manushesko avilo , xalas ai pelas , ai won phende ,

text: The Son of man came eating and drinking , and they say , Behold a man gluttonous , and a winebibber , a friend of publicans and sinners . But wisdom is justified of her children .
text2: O Shav le Manushesko xal but ai macharno lo , vortako lo manushensa kai chiden e taksa ai bezexalensa ! ' Numa lesko chachimos sikadiola pala e buchi kai kerdias . "

text: Then began he to upbraid the cities wherein most of his mighty works were done , because they repented not :
text2: Antunchi O Jesus doshardias le foruria kai kerdias mirakluria ande lende , ke chi keisaile .

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works , which were done in you , had been done in Tyre and Sidon , they would have repented long ago in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: " Nasul tuke Chorazin ! Nasul tuke Bethsaida ! Ke te avino le mirakluria kerde ande Tire ai Sidon , kai sas kerde tumende , dumult kamas te phiraven tsalia goneske , ai te thon wushar pe peste , te sikaven ke keisaile ! "

text: But I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the day of judgment , than for you .
text2: Numa me phenav tumenge , " Po dies la krisako mai vushoro avela lenge e Tire ai Sidon sar tumenge ! "

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted unto heaven , shalt be brought down to hell : for if the mighty works , which have been done in thee , had been done in Sodom , it would have remained until this day .
text2: " Ai tu , Capernaum ! Avesa vazdini zhi ka rhaio ? Nichi , ta tele si te zhas ta ando iado ! Ke te avino le mirakluria kerde ando Sodom , kai sas kerde tute , sas te avel o Sodom zhi adies ! "

text: But I say unto you , That it shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom in the day of judgment , than for thee .
text2: Numa me phenav tuke , " Ke mai vushoro avela le themeske Sodom po dies la krisako de sar tuke ! "

text: At that time Jesus answered and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , because thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes .
text2: Ande kodia vriama O Jesus phendia , " Naisiv tuke , murho Dat gazda le rhaiosko ai la phuviako ! Ke meklian te haliaren kodola kai si sar glate ai na kodola kai gindinpe gojaver ai le studento .

text: Even so , Father : for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: Anda kodia , murho Dat , naisiv tuke ke chi voia sas te kerdiol kadia .

text: All things are delivered unto me of my Father : and no man knoweth the Son , but the Father ; neither knoweth any man the Father , save the Son , and he to whomsoever the Son will reveal him .
text2: " Swako fielo thodias ando murho vas murho Dat . Ai khonik chi zhanel le Shaves ferdi O Dat , ai khonik chi zhanel le Dades ferdi O Shav , ai kon godi halol O Shav te mekel te zhanen le Dades .

text: Come unto me , all ye that labour and are heavy laden , and I will give you rest .
text2: " Aven mande , sa tume kai san chinuime ai kai si baro pharipe pe tumende , ai dav tume hodina .

text: Take my yoke upon you , and learn of me ; for I am meek and lowly in heart : and ye shall find rest unto your souls .
text2: Le murhe ioke pe tute ai sicho mandar ke domolo sim ai kovlo ando ilo , ai si te arakhen hodina tumare duxoske .

text: For my yoke is easy , and my burden is light .
text2: Ke murhi ioke nai trutno ai murho pharipe vushoro .

text: At that time Jesus went on the sabbath day through the corn ; and his disciples were an hungred , and began to pluck the ears of corn , and to eat .
text2: Ande kodia vriama po Sabat O Jesus nakhlia pa ek niva kai bariolas jiv , leske disipluria bokhaile , line anda jiv ai xale .

text: But when the Pharisees saw it , they said unto him , Behold , thy disciples do that which is not lawful to do upon the sabbath day .
text2: Kana le Farizeanuria dikhle kodia , phende leske , " Dikh , che disipluria keren so nai slobodo te keren po Sabat ! "

text: But he said unto them , Have ye not read what David did , when he was an hungred , and they that were with him ;
text2: Wo phendia lenge , ' Chi jindian so kerdia o David kana bokhailo ?

text: How he entered into the house of God , and did eat the shewbread , which was not lawful for him to eat , neither for them which were with him , but only for the priests ?
text2: Wo ai le manush , kai sas lesa . Sar gelo ando kher le Devlesko , ai xalias andal desh u dui halome manrhe kai nas leske slobodo , te xal , vai kodolenge kai sas lesa , numa le rashange .

text: Or have ye not read in the law , how that on the sabbath days the priests in the temple profane the sabbath , and are blameless ?
text2: Vai chi jindian andel zakonuria ke le rasha kai keren buchi ande tamplo po Sabat phagen o zakono , ai nai doshale ? "

text: But I say unto you , That in this place is one greater than the temple .
text2: Phenav tumenge , " Si iek katse mai baro sar e tamplo .

text: But if ye had known what this meaneth , I will have mercy , and not sacrifice , ye would not have condemned the guiltless .
text2: Numa te haliardianas so si o divano , ' Mila me mangav te den , ai na sakrifis . ' Antunchi chi doshardianas kodolen kai nai doshale .

text: For the Son of man is Lord even of the sabbath day .
text2: Ke O Shav le Manushesko si gazda chi po Sabat . "

text: And when he was departed thence , he went into their synagogue :
text2: Antunchi gelotar kotsar ai gelo ande lenge synagogue .

text: And , behold , there was a man which had his hand withered . And they asked him , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath days ? that they might accuse him .
text2: Kotse sas iek manush kai sas les vas bango phushle katar O Jesus , " Slobodo te sastiarelpe po Sabat ? "

text: And he said unto them , What man shall there be among you , that shall have one sheep , and if it fall into a pit on the sabbath day , will he not lay hold on it , and lift it out ?
text2: Kashte te sai dosharen les . Wo phendia lenge , " Savo anda tumende te si les iek bakro , ai te perela ande hunia po Sabat , chi zhal te ankalavel les avri ?

text: How much then is a man better than a sheep ? Wherefore it is lawful to do well on the sabbath days .
text2: Sode mai but mol manush sar bakro ? Anda kodia slobodo te kerelpe mishtimos po Sabat .

text: Then saith he to the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it forth ; and it was restored whole , like as the other .
text2: Antunchi phendias le manusheske , " Lunzhar cho vas . " Wo lunzhardia pesko vas ai sasto sas sar o kolaver .

text: Then the Pharisees went out , and held a council against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: Le Farizeanuria geletar ai dinepe duma sar te mudaren les .

text: But when Jesus knew it , he withdrew himself from thence : and great multitudes followed him , and he healed them all ;
text2: O Jesus zhanglias , ai gelotar kotsar , but manush linepe pala leste , ai sastiardia le sa .

text: And charged them that they should not make him known :
text2: Ai phendias lenge te na mothon kon si wo ai so kerdias .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying ,
text2: Te kerdiolpe sar phendiasas o profeto Isaiah .

text: Behold my servant , whom I have chosen ; my beloved , in whom my soul is well pleased : I will put my spirit upon him , and he shall shew judgment to the Gentiles .
text2: " Eta , murhi sluga . kai halosardem , kado kai si mange drago , ande kado murho duxo raduilpe . Thava murho duxo pe leste , ai phenela ai sikavela chachi kris ka sa le manush .

text: He shall not strive , nor cry ; neither shall any man hear his voice in the streets .
text2: Chi xalpe ai chi tsipila , chi ashundiola lesko glaso pel vulitsa .

text: A bruised reed shall he not break , and smoking flax shall he not quench , till he send forth judgment unto victory .
text2: Ci phagela e treshtia kai si bangi , ai chi mudarela e fishtila le lamposki kai si makar thuv , zhi kai chi nirila o chachimos le Devlesko .

text: And in his name shall the Gentiles trust .
text2: Ai ande lesko anav sa le manush wuzdinape . "

text: Then was brought unto him one possessed with a devil , blind , and dumb : and he healed him , insomuch that the blind and dumb both spake and saw .
text2: Antunchi andine ka Jesus iek manush kai sas korho ai muto ke sas beng ande leste . O Jesus sastiardia kodole manushes , ta dias duma ai vi dikhlias .

text: And all the people were amazed , and said , Is not this the son of David ?
text2: Sa o narodo chudisaile , ai phenenas , " Sai avela kado o Shav le Davidosko ? "

text: But when the Pharisees heard it , they said , This fellow doth not cast out devils , but by Beelzebub the prince of the devils .
text2: Numa kana le Farizeanuria ashunde so kerdias phende , " Kado manush gonil le bengen ke o baro le bengengo , o Beelzebub del les e putiera . "

text: And Jesus knew their thoughts , and said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and every city or house divided against itself shall not stand :
text2: O Jesus zhanelas lenge ginduria , ai phendias lenge , " Swako amperetsia kai si xulade pe peste si te xaiil , swako foro vai familia kai si xulade pe peste chi ashena .

text: And if Satan cast out Satan , he is divided against himself ; how shall then his kingdom stand ?
text2: Teala o beng gonil le bengen , won si xulade pe peste . Sar rhivdila ai ashela leski amperetisa ?

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your children cast them out ? therefore they shall be your judges .
text2: Te goniva me le bengen katar e putiera kai o Beelzebub del tumare shave . Katar len won e putiera te gonin le bengen ? Anda kodia won si te shinen tumari kris !

text: But if I cast out devils by the Spirit of God , then the kingdom of God is come unto you .
text2: Numa te goniva me le bengen katar O Swunto Duxo e putiera le Devleski , antunchi e amperetsia le Devleski avili pe tumende .

text: Or else how can one enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he first bind the strong man ? and then he will spoil his house .
text2: Vai sar sai del vari kon ando kher zurale manushesko ai te lel so si lesko , bi te phandel le zurale manushes ai antunchi te lel so si lesko .

text: He that is not with me is against me ; and he that gathereth not with me scattereth abroad .
text2: Kodo kai nai pe murhi rig chi zhutil ma , numa kerel nasul karing mande ; ai kodo kai chi chidel mansa xulavel . "

text: Wherefore I say unto you , All manner of sin and blasphemy shall be forgiven unto men : but the blasphemy against the Holy Ghost shall not be forgiven unto men .
text2: Anda kodia phenav tumenge : " Vari savo bezex vai kai den duma nasul le manush sai iertilpe ; numa kon dela duma nasul pe Swunto Duxo shoxar chi avela iertime .

text: And whosoever speaketh a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but whosoever speaketh against the Holy Ghost , it shall not be forgiven him , neither in this world , neither in the world to come .
text2: Ai kon godi dela duma nasul karing O Shav le Manushesko sai iertilape ; numa kon godi dela duma nasul karing O Swunto Duxo chi avela iertime . Chi ande kadia lumia vai e lumia kai si te avel . "

text: Either make the tree good , and his fruit good ; or else make the tree corrupt , and his fruit corrupt : for the tree is known by his fruit .
text2: Halon te keren e pruing lashi ai e fruta lashi ; vai halon te keren e pruing chorhi ai e fruta chorhi ke e pruing prinzhardiol katar peski fruta .

text: O generation of vipers , how can ye , being evil , speak good things ? for out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaketh .
text2: Tume vitsa sapenge , sar sai den duma lashimos , kana san nasul ? Ke so ilo si pherdo , kodia del duma o mui .

text: A good man out of the good treasure of the heart bringeth forth good things : and an evil man out of the evil treasure bringeth forth evil things .
text2: Lasho manushesko divano sikavel o barvalimos kai si ande leste , ai manush kai si les nasul ilo pherdo nasulimos lo , ai lesko divano sikavel kodia .

text: But I say unto you , That every idle word that men shall speak , they shall give account thereof in the day of judgment .
text2: Phenav tumenge , " Le manush trobuna te den atweto po dies kai shindiolpe e kris anda swako vorba kai phende intaino .

text: For by thy words thou shalt be justified , and by thy words thou shalt be condemned .
text2: Ke pala chire vorbi avesa jindo chacho , vai pala chire vorbi avesa jindo doshalo . "

text: Then certain of the scribes and of the Pharisees answered , saying , Master , we would see a sign from thee .
text2: Antunchi uni andal Gramnoturia ai Farizeanuria dine les atweto ai phende leske , " Gazda , mangas te dikhas semno tutar . "

text: But he answered and said unto them , An evil and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given to it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas :
text2: O Jesus phendias lenge , ferdi ek vitsa kai si nasul ai kai nai chachimasa le Devlesa mangen semno , numa chi iek chi avela dino , ferdi so kerdiliape ka profeto o Jonah .

text: For as Jonas was three days and three nights in the whale ' s belly ; so shall the Son of man be three days and three nights in the heart of the earth .
text2: Ke sar o Jonah sas ando ji le bare mashesko trin jes ai trin racha , kadia o Shav le manushesko si te avel ando mashkar la phuviako trin jes ai trin racha .

text: The men of Nineveh shall rise in judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : because they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: Le manush andai Ninevah si te wushten kadala vitsasa kai kris te dosharen len . Ke kana o Jonah dias duma pa Del lenge , won keisaile , ai akana iek mai baro katar o Jonah si katse !

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for she came from the uttermost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: E amperetsasa andai Sheba si te wushtel kadala vitsasa kai kris te dosharel len . Woi avili dural te ashunel ka Soloman ke de sa gojaver sas ai akana si iek mai baro katar o Solomon katse !

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest , and findeth none .
text2: Kana o bi vuzho duxo zhaltar anda o manush zhal ando pusta te rodel than te hodinil ai chi arakhel .

text: Then he saith , I will return into my house from whence I came out ; and when he is come , he findeth it empty , swept , and garnished .
text2: Antunchi mothol , " Amboldav palpale katar avilem " Antunchi amboldel palpale ai arakhel le manushesko ilo vuzho numa nango .

text: Then goeth he , and taketh with himself seven other spirits more wicked than himself , and they enter in and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first . Even so shall it be also unto this wicked generation .
text2: Antunchi o bi vuzho duxo arakhel efta aver duxuria mai nasul lestar , ai sa zhan te traiin ande kudo manush . Antunchi mai nasul leske de sar mai anglal . Sa kadia si te avel kadala nasul vitsaka .

text: While he yet talked to the people , behold , his mother and his brethren stood without , desiring to speak with him .
text2: Sar O Jesus delas duma le narodosa leske dei ai leske phral avri sas , ai mangenas te den duma lesa .

text: Then one said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to speak with thee .
text2: Vari kon phendia leske , Chi dei ai che phral avri , ai mangen te den duma tusa . "

text: But he answered and said unto him that told him , Who is my mother ? and who are my brethren ?
text2: O Jesus phendias leske , " Kon si murhi dei ? Ai kon si murhe phral ? "

text: And he stretched forth his hand toward his disciples , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Anzhardias pesko vas karing peske disipluria ai phendias , ' Eta ! Murhi dei ai murhe phral !

text: For whosoever shall do the will of my Father which is in heaven , the same is my brother , and sister , and mother .
text2: Ke kon godi kerel e voia murho Dadeske kai si ando rhaio , si murho phral , murhi phei , ai murhi dei . "

text: The same day went Jesus out of the house , and sat by the sea side .
text2: Sa kodo dies O Jesus anklisto avri anda kher , ai gelo te beshel pasha maria .

text: And great multitudes were gathered together unto him , so that he went into a ship , and sat ; and the whole multitude stood on the shore .
text2: Kadia de but narodo chidinisailo kruglom lestar te anklisto ando chuno ai beshlo tele . Ai o narodo beshelas po berego .

text: And he spake many things unto them in parables , saying , Behold , a sower went forth to sow ;
text2: Phenelas lenge paramichi pa but dieli , ai phendias lenge , " Iek manush gelo te shudel sumuntsi pe phuv .

text: And when he sowed , some seeds fell by the way side , and the fowls came and devoured them up :
text2: Ai sar shudelas le sumuntsi pe phuv , uni pele pasha drom , ai le chiriklia avile ai xale le .

text: Some fell upon stony places , where they had not much earth : and forthwith they sprung up , because they had no deepness of earth :
text2: Uni pele po than kai sas bax , kai nas but phuv . Le sumuntsi barile sigo ka nas but phuv .

text: And when the sun was up , they were scorched ; and because they had no root , they withered away .
text2: Numa kana anklisto o kham , phabardia le , ke nas vuni shuchile .

text: And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns sprung up , and choked them :
text2: Aver pele mashkar le kanrhe , kodola kanrhe barile ai tasade le .

text: But other fell into good ground , and brought forth fruit , some an hundredfold , some sixtyfold , some thirtyfold .
text2: Numa aver pele pe lashi phuv , ai dine fruta : uni dine iek shel , aver shovardesh ai aver trenda . "

text: Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: " Kudo kai si les khan te ashunel , mek te ashunel ! "

text: And the disciples came , and said unto him , Why speakest thou unto them in parables ?
text2: Antunchi le disipluria avile ai phende leske , " Sostar des duma lensa andel paramichi ? "

text: He answered and said unto them , Because it is given unto you to know the mysteries of the kingdom of heaven , but to them it is not given .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Ke tumenge sas shinado te zhanen so si garado pa e amperetsia le Devleski , num lenge nas dino .

text: For whosoever hath , to him shall be given , and he shall have more abundance : but whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken away even that he hath .
text2: Kaste godi si leste si te avel dino mai but , ai avela les but opral : numa kaste godi nai vi so si les , si te avel lino lestar .

text: Therefore speak I to them in parables : because they seeing see not ; and hearing they hear not , neither do they understand .
text2: Sa anda kodia dav duma lensa andel paramichi , dikhen numa chi dichol lenge , ashunen numa chi ashundiol lenge , ai chi haliaren .

text: And in them is fulfilled the prophecy of Esaias , which saith , By hearing ye shall hear , and shall not understand ; and seeing ye shall see , and shall not perceive :
text2: Ai lenge pherdili e profesi katar o Isaiah . Wo phendia , ' Ashunena mishto , numa tume chi haliaren ; dikhena mishto , numa chi dichola tumenge .

text: For this people ' s heart is waxed gross , and their ears are dull of hearing , and their eyes they have closed ; lest at any time they should see with their eyes , and hear with their ears , and should understand with their heart , and should be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Ke o ilo kodole manushengo zurailo , ai le khanensa dabai ashunen , phandade penge iakha . Daratar ke kam te dikhen le iakhensa , ai ashunen le khanensa , ai haliaren peske ilesa , ai ambolden palpale ka Del , te sastiarav le . "

text: But blessed are your eyes , for they see : and your ears , for they hear .
text2: Numa raduime tumare iakha ke dikhen , ai tumare khan ke ashunen .

text: For verily I say unto you , That many prophets and righteous men have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: Chaches phenav tumenge , but profeturia ai chache manush roden te dikhen so tume dikhen , ai chi dikhle , ai te ashunen so tume ashunen , numa chi ashunde .

text: Hear ye therefore the parable of the sower .
text2: " Ashunen e paramichi pa manush kai shudel le sumuntsi .

text: When any one heareth the word of the kingdom , and understandeth it not , then cometh the wicked one , and catcheth away that which was sown in his heart . This is he which received seed by the way side .
text2: Kana vari kon ashunel e vorba pa e amperetsia le Devleski , ai chi haliarel , o bi vuzho avel ai ankalavel so sas thodino ando ilo le manushesko . Kadia si e sumuntsa kai peli pasha drom .

text: But he that received the seed into stony places , the same is he that heareth the word , and anon with joy receiveth it ;
text2: E sumuntsa kai sas shudini pe phuv kai sas bax , si sar ek manush kai ashunel e vorba ai andak data lel e vorba ai veselimelo ;

text: Yet hath he not root in himself , but dureth for a while : for when tribulation or persecution ariseth because of the word , by and by he is offended .
text2: Numa chi gelo divano dur ande lesko ilo ai nas katar te ankerdiol , rhivdil xantsi vriama , ke kana avel zumaimos pe leste vai dosharen les manush vai maren mui lestar ke ashundias e vorba ai pachaias , antunchi leske dragostia xantsol duriol ai mekelpe .

text: He also that received seed among the thorns is he that heareth the word ; and the care of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , choke the word , and he becometh unfruitful .
text2: E sumuntsa kai sas shudini mashkar le kanrhe si sar ek manush kai ashundia e vorba le Devleski , numa ande lesko ilo si le ginduria , o pharipe , o nekazo le traiosko ande kadia lumia , ai o dziliarimos barvalimasko , kadala tasaven e vorba le Devleski , ai nashti del fruta .

text: But he that received seed into the good ground is he that heareth the word , and understandeth it ; which also beareth fruit , and bringeth forth , some an hundredfold , some sixty , some thirty .
text2: E sumuntsa kai sas shudini pe lashi phuv si sar ek manush kai ashunel e vorba le Devleski ai haliarel la . Arakhadiol fruta ande leste ai kotsar avel mai but katar uni iek shel , katar uni shovardesh , ai katar uni trenda .

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is likened unto a man which sowed good seed in his field :
text2: O Jesus phendias lenge aver paramichi , " E amperetsia le rhaioski si sar iek manush kai thodias lashe sumuntsi ande peski niva .

text: But while men slept , his enemy came and sowed tares among the wheat , and went his way .
text2: Numa zhi kai le manush sovenas , lengo duzhmano avilo ai thodias rherto ( chorhi sumuntsa ) mashkar o jiv ai gelotar .

text: But when the blade was sprung up , and brought forth fruit , then appeared the tares also .
text2: Kana o jiv barilo ai dia fruta , vi o rherto dichilo .

text: So the servants of the householder came and said unto him , Sir , didst not thou sow good seed in thy field ? from whence then hath it tares ?
text2: Le slugi le gazdaske avile leste ai phende , ' Raia , chi thodian tu lashi sumuntsa ande chi niva ? Katar avilo o rherto ? "

text: He said unto them , An enemy hath done this . The servants said unto him , Wilt thou then that we go and gather them up ?
text2: Wo phendias lenge , ' O duzhmano kerdia kodia , ' le slugi phushle les , ' Mangas te tsirdas le avri ? '

text: But he said , Nay ; lest while ye gather up the tares , ye root up also the wheat with them .
text2: ' Te na ' phendia lenge , ' Ke kana tsirdena o rherto avri kam ankalaven vi o jiv .

text: Let both grow together until the harvest : and in the time of harvest I will say to the reapers , Gather ye together first the tares , and bind them in bundles to burn them : but gather the wheat into my barn .
text2: Meken te barion vi le dui andek than , zhi kai vriama kai trobul te chidas o jiv , antunchi phenava kodolenge kai chiden o jiv , pervo chiden o rherto , phanden le andek than te phabaren le , numa o jiv chiden ande murho bano .

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is like to a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and sowed in his field :
text2: O Jesus phendias lenge aver paramichi , ' E amperetsia le rhaioski si sar sumuntsa garchitsaki . Kai manush thodias ande peski niva .

text: Which indeed is the least of all seeds : but when it is grown , it is the greatest among herbs , and becometh a tree , so that the birds of the air come and lodge in the branches thereof .
text2: Makar ke si e mai tsinorhi andal sumuntsi , kana bariol si mai bari andal patria , ai kerdiol krenga , ta le chiriklia anda cheri aven ta beshen ande krenga .

text: Another parable spake he unto them ; The kingdom of heaven is like unto leaven , which a woman took , and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: Mai phendias lenge aver paramicha , " E amperetsia le rhaioski si sar e drozhda . Kai zhuvli lias ai thodias ande trin musuri arho , ta puchilo sa o arho . "

text: All these things spake Jesus unto the multitude in parables ; and without a parable spake he not unto them :
text2: O Jesus dias le narodos kado sicharimos andel paramichi ; ai chi phendias lenge khanchi bi te mothol lenge paramichi .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying , I will open my mouth in parables ; I will utter things which have been kept secret from the foundation of the world .
text2: Kadia pherdilo so phendias o profeto , " Phutrav murho mui te dav duma andel paramichi , si te mothav so sas garado de sar kerdili e lumia . "

text: Then Jesus sent the multitude away , and went into the house : and his disciples came unto him , saying , Declare unto us the parable of the tares of the field .
text2: Antunchi meklia le narodos ai gelo ando kher . Leske disipluria avile leste ai phende , ' Sikav ame te haliaras e paramichi pa rherto ande niva . '

text: He answered and said unto them , He that soweth the good seed is the Son of man ;
text2: Dias atweto ai phendias lenge , " Kodo kai shudel e lashi sumuntsa si O Shav le manushesko ;

text: The field is the world ; the good seed are the children of the kingdom ; but the tares are the children of the wicked one ;
text2: E niva si e lumia ; ai e lashi sumuntsa si le shave la amperetsiake , o rherto si le shave le bi vuzheske ;

text: The enemy that sowed them is the devil ; the harvest is the end of the world ; and the reapers are the angels .
text2: ai o duzhmano kai thodia o rherto si o beng : o jiv chidelape kana getolape e vriama , le manush kai chiden o jiv si le angeluria .

text: As therefore the tares are gathered and burned in the fire ; so shall it be in the end of this world .
text2: Sar o rherto si chidino ai phabarde ande iag ; kadia avela kana getolape e vriama .

text: The Son of man shall send forth his angels , and they shall gather out of his kingdom all things that offend , and them which do iniquity ;
text2: O Shav le Manushesko tradela peske angelon , te ankalaven avri anda leski amperetsia so godi kerel le manushen te keren bezex , ai kodolen kai keren nasulimos .

text: And shall cast them into a furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Shudena le ando bov kai si dino iag , kotse rovena ai chidena dandendar .

text: Then shall the righteous shine forth as the sun in the kingdom of their Father . Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Antunchi le chache manush strefiana sar o kham ande amperetsia peske Dadeske . Kodo kai si les khan , mek te ashunel ! "

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto treasure hid in a field ; the which when a man hath found , he hideth , and for joy thereof goeth and selleth all that he hath , and buyeth that field .
text2: " E amperetsia le rhaioski si sar iek manjin garado ando kimpo . Kai o manush arakhlias , garadias les pale , raduisailo , gelo ai bichindias so godi sas les , ai chindias o kimpo . "

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a merchant man , seeking goodly pearls :
text2: " Magdata e amperetsia le rhaioski si sar iek manush kai chinel ai bichinel , kai rodel shukar perli . Kana arakhlias iek perla kai mol but gelo ai bichindias so godi sas les , ai chindia la . "

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a net , that was cast into the sea , and gathered of every kind :
text2: " Magdata e amperetsia le rhaioski si sar iek sita kai si shudini ande maria , ai astarel but fieluria masho .

text: Which , when it was full , they drew to shore , and sat down , and gathered the good into vessels , but cast the bad away .
text2: Kana sas pherdi le masharia tsirde la zhi po berego , beshlo tele , ai chide le lashe mashe andel kozhnitsi ai le chorhe shuden .

text: So shall it be at the end of the world : the angels shall come forth , and sever the wicked from among the just ,
text2: Kadia si te avel kana getolape e vriama , le angeluria si te aven ai te hulaven le nasul katar le chache .

text: And shall cast them into the furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Ai shuden le ando bov kai si dino iag , kotse rovena ai chiden dandendar . "

text: Jesus saith unto them , Have ye understood all these things ? They say unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: " Haliardian swako fielo ? " O Jesus phushlia lendar , won phende leske , " Haliardiam . "

text: Then said he unto them , Therefore every scribe which is instructed unto the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which bringeth forth out of his treasure things new and old .
text2: Phendias lenge , anda kodia swako Gramnoto kai zhanela ai sikavela o zakono kai sas sikado pai e amperetsia le rhaioski si sar iek gazda kheresko kai ankalavel anda pesko kher , nevo manjin ai vi phurano . "

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these parables , he departed thence .
text2: Kana O Jesus getosardia sa le paramichi , gelotar kotsar .

text: And when he was come into his own country , he taught them in their synagogue , insomuch that they were astonished , and said , Whence hath this man this wisdom , and these mighty works ?
text2: Areslo ando foro kai barilo , ai sicharelas le narodos ande lengi synagogue , chudisaile , ai phenenas , " Katar lias kado manush ka savo haliarimos ai putiera te kerel mirakluria ? "

text: Is not this the carpenter ' s son ? is not his mother called Mary ? and his brethren , James , and Joses , and Simon , and Judas ?
text2: Nai kado O Shav le stoliaresko ? Nai lesko dako anav Maria ? Nai leske phral o Jakov , o Josef , o Simon , ai o Judas ?

text: And his sisters , are they not all with us ? Whence then hath this man all these things ?
text2: Ai leske pheia nai sa mashkar amende ? Katar lias kado manush sa so si les ? "

text: And they were offended in him . But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , save in his own country , and in his own house .
text2: Xoliale pe leste . Numa O Jesus phendias lenge , " Ferdi ande lesko foro ai ande lesko kher chi preznain le profeturia .

text: And he did not many mighty works there because of their unbelief .
text2: O Jesus chi kerdia but mirakluria kotse ke nas le pachamos .

text: At that time Herod the tetrarch heard of the fame of Jesus ,
text2: Pe kodia vriama o Herod o tetrarch , ashundias e viasta pa O Jesus .

text: And said unto his servants , This is John the Baptist ; he is risen from the dead ; and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: Ai phenel peske slugenge , " Kado si o Iovano o baptisto , zhuvindisailo pai martia , anda kodia si les e putiera te kerel mirakluria . "

text: For Herod had laid hold on John , and bound him , and put him in prison for Herodias ' sake , his brother Philip ' s wife .
text2: O Herod astardias le Iovanos , phanglia les lantsonsa ai thodia les ande temnitsa , palai Herodias , e rhomni leske phraleski o Philip .

text: For John said unto him , It is not lawful for thee to have her .
text2: Ke o Iovano phenelas leske , " Nai tuke slobodo te les la ! "

text: And when he would have put him to death , he feared the multitude , because they counted him as a prophet .
text2: Wo mangelas te mudarel le Iovanos , numa daralas katar o narodo , ke sa o narodo jinenas les profeto .

text: But when Herod ' s birthday was kept , the daughter of Herodias danced before them , and pleased Herod .
text2: Po dies kai arakhadilo , dine pachiv le Herodos , e shei la Herodiaki kheldias lenge , ai de sa zurales plachalias le Herodos .

text: Whereupon he promised with an oath to give her whatsoever she would ask .
text2: Anda kudia solaxadias , te del la so godi mangel .

text: And she , being before instructed of her mother , said , Give me here John Baptist ' s head in a charger .
text2: Pala laka dako sikaimos phendias , An mange pek charo o shero le Iovanosko o baptisto . '

text: And the king was sorry : nevertheless for the oath ' s sake , and them which sat with him at meat , he commanded it to be given her .
text2: O amperato nekezhisailo , numa ke solaxadias angla o narodo phendias te den la so mangel .

text: And he sent , and beheaded John in the prison .
text2: Tradia te shinen o shero le Iovanosko ande temnitsa .

text: And his head was brought in a charger , and given to the damsel : and she brought it to her mother .
text2: Andine lesko shero pek charo , dine les kai shei , ai woi angerdia les ka peski dei .

text: And his disciples came , and took up the body , and buried it , and went and told Jesus .
text2: Leske disipluria avile , line lesko stato , groposarde les ; ai gele ka Jesus ta phende leske so kerdiliape .

text: When Jesus heard of it , he departed thence by ship into a desert place apart : and when the people had heard thereof , they followed him on foot out of the cities .
text2: Kana O Jesus ashundias so kerdiliape , gelotar pek chuno korkorho kai nas khonik , o narodo andal foruria ashunde kodia , ai linepe pala leste telal .

text: And Jesus went forth , and saw a great multitude , and was moved with compassion toward them , and he healed their sick .
text2: Kana O Jesus avilo palpale , dikhlias baro narodo , pelias leske mila anda lende , ai sastiardias lenge naswalen .

text: And when it was evening , his disciples came to him , saying , This is a desert place , and the time is now past ; send the multitude away , that they may go into the villages , and buy themselves victuals .
text2: Kana e riat perelas le disipluria avile leste ai phende , " Vuzhe pozno ai nai khanchi katse . Trade le narodos te zhantar , te zhan andel foruria te chinen peske te xan . "

text: But Jesus said unto them , They need not depart ; give ye them to eat .
text2: Numa O Jesus phendias lenge , ' Chi trobul te zhantar , den le tume te xan ! "

text: And they say unto him , We have here but five loaves , and two fishes .
text2: Won phende leske , " Ferdi panzh manrhe ai dui mashe si ame . "

text: He said , Bring them hither to me .
text2: " Anen le mande , " phendias O Jesus .

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the grass , and took the five loaves , and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed , and brake , and gave the loaves to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: O Jesus phendias le narodoske te beshen tele pe char ; lias le panzh manrhe ai le dui mashe , vazdia le iakha karing o rhaio , ai naisisardias ai phaglias le manrhe , dias le kal disipluria , ai le disipluria dine le ka narodo .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the fragments that remained twelve baskets full .
text2: Savorhe xale ai chailile . Kana le disipluria chide le kotora kai ashshile desh u dui kozhnitsi pherde sas .

text: And they that had eaten were about five thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Kodola kai xale sas panzh mi mursh , ai vi zhuvlia ai glate sas .

text: And straightway Jesus constrained his disciples to get into a ship , and to go before him unto the other side , while he sent the multitudes away .
text2: Strazo O Jesus kerdias te anklen le disipluria ando pamphuri te zhan mai anglal lestar pe kaver rig le paieske , zhi pon wo tradias le narodos te zhantar .

text: And when he had sent the multitudes away , he went up into a mountain apart to pray : and when the evening was come , he was there alone .
text2: Kana tradias le narodos te zhantar , gelo opre ande plai korkorho te rhujilpe . Kana peli e riat , kote sas korkorho .

text: But the ship was now in the midst of the sea , tossed with waves : for the wind was contrary .
text2: O pamphuri sas mashkaral e maria , ai buntuime sas katar le talazuria ke e barval phurdelas zurales .

text: And in the fourth watch of the night Jesus went unto them , walking on the sea .
text2: Mashkar le trin ai le shov chasuria diminiatsako O Jesus avilo karing lende , phirelas po pai .

text: And when the disciples saw him walking on the sea , they were troubled , saying , It is a spirit ; and they cried out for fear .
text2: Kana le disipluria dikhle les ke phirel po pai , daraile . Ai tsipinas , " Choxano si ! "

text: But straightway Jesus spake unto them , saying , Be of good cheer ; it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Numa strazo O Jesus phendias lenge , " Aven veselo , ke me sim , Na daran ! "

text: And Peter answered him and said , Lord , if it be thou , bid me come unto thee on the water .
text2: O Petri dias mui , " Gazda , te san tu , akhar ma te avav tute po pai . "

text: And he said , Come . And when Peter was come down out of the ship , he walked on the water , to go to Jesus .
text2: " Aidi , " phendias . Antunchi o Petri anklisto anda pamphuri ai phirdias po pai karing O Jesus .

text: But when he saw the wind boisterous , he was afraid ; and beginning to sink , he cried , saying , Lord , save me .
text2: Numa kana thodias sama ke e barval phurdel zurales , darailo , antunchi tasolas ai tsipisardias , " Gazda , skepisar ma ! "

text: And immediately Jesus stretched forth his hand , and caught him , and said unto him , O thou of little faith , wherefore didst thou doubt ?
text2: Strazo O Jesus anzardias pesko vas , astardia les ai phendia leske , " Tu kai si tu xantsi pachamos ! Sostar chi pachaian ? "

text: And when they were come into the ship , the wind ceased .
text2: Kana ankliste ando pamphuri , e barval aterdili .

text: Then they that were in the ship came and worshipped him , saying , Of a truth thou art the Son of God .
text2: Ai kodola kai sas ando pamphuri luvudisarde ai preznaisarde les phenenas , " Chaches tu san O Shav le Devlesko ! "

text: And when they were gone over , they came into the land of Gennesaret .
text2: Kana aresle inchal ando them sas kai bushol Gennesaret .

text: And when the men of that place had knowledge of him , they sent out into all that country round about , and brought unto him all that were diseased ;
text2: Kana le manush kotsar prinzharde les , trade divano ande sa o them ai le manush andine sa penge naswalen leste .

text: And besought him that they might only touch the hem of his garment : and as many as touched were made perfectly whole .
text2: Rhugisaile leste te mekel le naswalen , ferdi te azban e tivala leske raxamaki , ai kon godi azbadias leski raxami sastile .

text: Then came to Jesus scribes and Pharisees , which were of Jerusalem , saying ,
text2: Antunchi uni Gramnoturia ai Farizeanuria avile andai Jerusalem ka Jesus ai phushle les ,

text: Why do thy disciples transgress the tradition of the elders ? for they wash not their hands when they eat bread .
text2: " Sostar che disipluria chi keren o zakono le phurengo ? Won chi xalaven penge vas kana xan ! "

text: But he answered and said unto them , Why do ye also transgress the commandment of God by your tradition ?
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Ai tume sostar phagen o zakono le Devlesko , te keren tumaro zakono ?

text: For God commanded , saying , Honour thy father and mother : and , He that curseth father or mother , let him die the death .
text2: Ke O Del phendia , Preznaisar che dades ai cha da , ai kodo kai prokletsila peske dades vai peska da trobul mudardo . "

text: But ye say , Whosoever shall say to his father or his mother , It is a gift , by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me ;
text2: Numa tume phenen kon godi phenela peske dadeske vai peska dake , so sai demas tume te zhutiv tume dem ka Del .

text: And honour not his father or his mother , he shall be free . Thus have ye made the commandment of God of none effect by your tradition .
text2: Kado manush nai leske musai te preznail peske dades ai peska da . Kadia tume phagen o zakono le Devlesko te keren tumaro zakono .

text: Ye hypocrites , well did Esaias prophesy of you , saying ,
text2: Tume manush kai ankerdion so chi san ! O Isaiah , mishto dias profesi pa tumende kana phendia ,

text: This people draweth nigh unto me with their mouth , and honoureth me with their lips ; but their heart is far from me .
text2: " Kado narodo preznain ma peska mosa , numa lengo ilo dur mandar .

text: But in vain they do worship me , teaching for doctrines the commandments of men .
text2: Intaino preznain ma , ke won sicharen manushenge zakonuria sar te avilino le Devleske . "

text: And he called the multitude , and said unto them , Hear , and understand :
text2: Pala kodia akhardias le narodos peste ai phendia lenge , ' Ashunen ai haliaren !

text: Not that which goeth into the mouth defileth a man ; but that which cometh out of the mouth , this defileth a man .
text2: Nai so thol o manush ando mui kai maril les , numa so anklel anda lesko mui , si so kai maril les . '

text: Then came his disciples , and said unto him , Knowest thou that the Pharisees were offended , after they heard this saying ?
text2: Antunchi le disipluria avile leste ai phende leske , " Zhanes ke le Farizeanuria xoliale kana ashunde so phendian ? "

text: But he answered and said , Every plant , which my heavenly Father hath not planted , shall be rooted up .
text2: O Jesus phendia , " Che godi patria kai chi thodias te bariol murho Dat kai si ando rhaio , avela ankaladi avri .

text: Let them alone : they be blind leaders of the blind . And if the blind lead the blind , both shall fall into the ditch .
text2: Mek le ! Ke won si sar korhe kai phiraven avre korhen ; kana iek korho ingerel avre korhes , vi le dui si te peren ande hunia . "

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Declare unto us this parable .
text2: O Petri phendias , " Sikav ame te haliaras kadala paramichi . "

text: And Jesus said , Are ye also yet without understanding ?
text2: O Jesus phendias , " Chi tu sa chi haliares ? "

text: Do not ye yet understand , that whatsoever entereth in at the mouth goeth into the belly , and is cast out into the draught ?
text2: Chi haliares ? Ke so godi thos ando mui , zhan ando ji , ai porme anklel avri .

text: But those things which proceed out of the mouth come forth from the heart ; and they defile the man .
text2: Numa so anklel anda mui avel anda ilo ; ai kodia si kai kerel andal manush marime angla Del .

text: For out of the heart proceed evil thoughts , murders , adulteries , fornications , thefts , false witness , blasphemies :
text2: Ke anda ilo anklen le nasul ginduria , mudarimos , adulteri , kurvisia , chorimos , xoxaimos , pupuiimos , ai te des duma nasul pa Del .

text: These are the things which defile a man : but to eat with unwashen hands defileth not a man .
text2: Kodia kerel andal manush marime angla Del . Numa kai xan bi te xalaven peske vas . Nai marime angla Del .

text: Then Jesus went thence , and departed into the coasts of Tyre and Sidon .
text2: O Jesus gelotar kotsar ai gelo karing o Tire ai Sidon .

text: And , behold , a woman of Canaan came out of the same coasts , and cried unto him , saying , Have mercy on me , O Lord , thou Son of David ; my daughter is grievously vexed with a devil .
text2: Ek zhuvli kai avili anda Canaan delas mui , " Al tuke mila anda mande ! Gazda , Shav le Davidosko . Murhi shei chinuil zurales ke beng ande late . "

text: But he answered her not a word . And his disciples came and besought him , saying , Send her away ; for she crieth after us .
text2: O Jesus chi phendia lake khanchi chi iek vorba . Leske disipluria avile leste ai phende leske , " Phen lake te zhaltar ke tsipil ai lelpe pala amende ! "

text: But he answered and said , I am not sent but unto the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: O Jesus phendia , " Tradino sim ferdi kal bakriorhe le xasarde anda kher Israel . "

text: Then came she and worshipped him , saying , Lord , help me .
text2: Numa e zhuvli avili ai thodiape ande changende angla leste , ai phendias , " Gazda , zhutisar ma ! "

text: But he answered and said , It is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it to dogs .
text2: Wo phendias , " Nai vorta te les o manrho le glatengo ai te shudes les kal zhukel . "

text: And she said , Truth , Lord : yet the dogs eat of the crumbs which fall from their masters ' table .
text2: Woi phendias leske , " Chaches , Gazda , numa le zhukel xan le prusuka kai peren katar lenge gazdaski skafidi . "

text: Then Jesus answered and said unto her , O woman , great is thy faith : be it unto thee even as thou wilt . And her daughter was made whole from that very hour .
text2: Antunchi O Jesus phendia lake , " Zhuvlio , cho pachamos baro te kerdiolpe tuke so manges . " Ai strazo lake shei sastili .

text: And Jesus departed from thence , and came nigh unto the sea of Galilee ; and went up into a mountain , and sat down there .
text2: O Jesus gelo pasha e maria , Galilee . Gelo pe iek plaiin ai kote beshlo tele .

text: And great multitudes came unto him , having with them those that were lame , blind , dumb , maimed , and many others , and cast them down at Jesus ' feet ; and he healed them :
text2: But narodo avelas leste , andine pesa le bangen , korhen , kashuken , le muto , le dukhade , ai but aver . Thode le ka leske punrhe , ai sastiardia le .

text: Insomuch that the multitude wondered , when they saw the dumb to speak , the maimed to be whole , the lame to walk , and the blind to see : and they glorified the God of Israel .
text2: Ta o narodo chudisailo kana dikhle ke le kashuke ashunen , le muto dine duma , le naswale sastile , le bange phirenas , le korhe dikhenas , won preznaisarde ai luvudisarde O Del le Israelosko .

text: Then Jesus called his disciples unto him , and said , I have compassion on the multitude , because they continue with me now three days , and have nothing to eat : and I will not send them away fasting , lest they faint in the way .
text2: O Jesus akhardia peske disiplon peste ai phendias , " Mila mange anda narodo , ke de trin dies mansa le , ai na le so xan . Chi mangav te zhantar bokhale , ke kam zalin po drom . "

text: And his disciples say unto him , Whence should we have so much bread in the wilderness , as to fill so great a multitude ?
text2: Le disipluria phende leske , " Kai te las dosta manrho ande kadia pusta te pravaras ka savo baro narodo ? "

text: And Jesus saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven , and a few little fishes .
text2: O Jesus phushlias le , " Sode manrhe si tume ? " Won phende , " Efta manrhe ai xantsi tsinorhe mashe . "

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the ground .
text2: Wo phendia le narodoske te beshen tele pe phuv .

text: And he took the seven loaves and the fishes , and gave thanks , and brake them , and gave to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Lia le efta manrhe ai le mashe , kana dias naisimos , phaglias le , ai dias le kal disipluria , le disipluria dine le ka narodo .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets full .
text2: Savorhe xale ai chailile . Le disipluria chide le kotora kai ashshile efta kozhnitsi pherde sas .

text: And they that did eat were four thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Kodola kai xale sas shtar mi mursh , ai vi zhuvlia ai glate sas .

text: And he sent away the multitude , and took ship , and came into the coasts of Magdala ,
text2: Kana O Jesus tradia le narodos te zhantar , anklisto andek pamphuri , ai gelo ando o foro Magadan .

text: The Pharisees also with the Sadducees came , and tempting desired him that he would shew them a sign from heaven .
text2: Le Farizeanuria ai le Saduseanuria avile ka Jesus te zumaven les , ai mangle lestar te sikavel lenge ek semno kai avel anda rhaio .

text: He answered and said unto them , When it is evening , ye say , It will be fair weather : for the sky is red .
text2: O Jesus phendias lenge , " Kana perel e riat tume phenen , ' Si te avel shukar vriama ke o cheri lolo . '

text: And in the morning , It will be foul weather to day : for the sky is red and lowring . O ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky ; but can ye not discern the signs of the times ?
text2: Ai e diminiatsi , adies si te avel chorho dies , ke o cheri lolo ai tuniariko . ' Tume manush kai ankerdion so chi san ! Zhanen mishto te prinzharen le semnuria ando cheri ; numa chi haliaren le semnuria la vriamake !

text: A wicked and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given unto it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas . And he left them , and departed .
text2: Vitsa nasul kai nai chachimasa le Devlesa , roden iek semno , ai semno chi avela dino len , ferdi o semno le profetosko o Jonas . " Antunchi meklia le ai gelotar .

text: And when his disciples were come to the other side , they had forgotten to take bread .
text2: Le disipluria aresle pe kaver rig le paieske , numa busterde te len manrho pesa .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Take heed and beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Antunchi O Jesus phendia lenge , " Arakhen tume katar e drozhda kai avel katar le Farizeanuria ai le Saduseanuria . "

text: And they reasoned among themselves , saying , It is because we have taken no bread .
text2: Le disipluria denaspe duma mashkar pende , ai phenenas , " Ke chi liam amensa manrho , " phenel kadia .

text: Which when Jesus perceived , he said unto them , O ye of little faith , why reason ye among yourselves , because ye have brought no bread ?
text2: O Jesus zhanglias ai phendias , " Tume kai si tume xantsi pachamos . Sostar phenen mashkar tumende , chi andian manrho ?

text: Do ye not yet understand , neither remember the five loaves of the five thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: Sa chi haliaren , chi seren le panzh manrhe ai le panzh mi zhene , ai sode kozhnitsi ashshile ?

text: Neither the seven loaves of the four thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: Vai le efta manrhe ai le shtar mi zhene , ai sode kozhnitsi ashshile ?

text: How is it that ye do not understand that I spake it not to you concerning bread , that ye should beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees ?
text2: Sar chi haliaren ke chi dav tumensa duma pa manrho ? Numa te arakhen tume katar e drozhda kai avel katar le Farizeanuria ai le Saduseanuria ! "

text: Then understood they how that he bade them not beware of the leaven of bread , but of the doctrine of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Antunchi haliarde ke chi phendia lenge te arakhenpe katar e drozhda le manrheske , numa te arakhenpe katar o sicharimos kai sikaven le Farizeanuria ai le Saduseanuria .

text: When Jesus came into the coasts of Caesarea Philippi , he asked his disciples , saying , Whom do men say that I the Son of man am ?
text2: Kana O Jesus areslo karing o foro Caesarea Philippi , phushlias katar peske disipluria , " Kon mothon le manush ke si O Shav le manushesko ? "

text: And they said , Some say that thou art John the Baptist : some , Elias ; and others , Jeremias , or one of the prophets .
text2: Phende leske , " Uni phenen ke san o Iovano o baptisto , uni o Elijah , ai aver phenen ke san o Jeremiah , vai iek andal profeturia . "

text: He saith unto them , But whom say ye that I am ?
text2: Phushlias len , " Ai tume , kon mothon ke sim . "

text: And Simon Peter answered and said , Thou art the Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: O Simon Petri phendia , " Tu san O Kristo , O Shav le Devlesko O Del o zhuvindo . "

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Blessed art thou , Simon Barjona : for flesh and blood hath not revealed it unto thee , but my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Antunchi O Jesus phendias leske , " Raduime san , Simon Barjona ! Chi avilo tuke kado haliarimos katar o stato ai o rat manushestar , numa katar murho Dat kai si ando rhaio .

text: And I say also unto thee , That thou art Peter , and upon this rock I will build my church ; and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it .
text2: Ai me phenav tuke : ke tu san o Petri , ai pe kado bax vazdav murhi khangeri , ai le vurotsi le iadoske chi avela le putiera pe late .

text: And I will give unto thee the keys of the kingdom of heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: Dava tu le cheie ka e amperetsia le rhaioski : so phandesa pe phuv avela phanglo ando rhaio , ai so phutresa pe phuv avela phuterdo ando rhaio . "

text: Then charged he his disciples that they should tell no man that he was Jesus the Christ .
text2: Antunchi O Jesus dias trad peske disiplon te na phenen kanikaske ke wo si O Kristo .

text: From that time forth began Jesus to shew unto his disciples , how that he must go unto Jerusalem , and suffer many things of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be killed , and be raised again the third day .
text2: De katar kodia vriama O Jesus sikavelas peske disiplon , " Ke musai te zhal ande Jerusalem ai but fialuria avela chinuime katar le phure kai poronchin , ai le bare rasha , ai le Gramnoturia . Te mudaren les , ai o trito dies te zhuvindil . "

text: Then Peter took him , and began to rebuke him , saying , Be it far from thee , Lord : this shall not be unto thee .
text2: Antunchi o Petri lia les rigate ai phendias leske , " Te na del O Del ! Gazda , te na kerdiolpe tuke kodia . "

text: But he turned , and said unto Peter , Get thee behind me , Satan : thou art an offence unto me : for thou savourest not the things that be of God , but those that be of men .
text2: O Jesus amboldinisailo katar o Petri ai phendias , " Le tu angla mande , Satano ! ( o beng ) . Ande murho drom san , Petri . Ke che ginduria si manusheske , na le Devleske . "

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
text2: Porme O Jesus phendia peske disiplonge , " Te si vari kon kai mangel te avel pala mande , musai te bustrel pa peste , te lel pesko trushul , ai te avel pala mande .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : and whosoever will lose his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: Ke o manush kai mangela te garavel pesko traio xasarela les ; numa kodo kai dela pesko traio pala mande arakhela traio .

text: For what is a man profited , if he shall gain the whole world , and lose his own soul ? or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
text2: So lela o manush te nirila sa e lumia ai te xasarela pesko traio duxosko ? So sai del o manush te chinel palpale pesko traio duxosko .

text: For the Son of man shall come in the glory of his Father with his angels ; and then he shall reward every man according to his works .
text2: Ke O Shav le Manushesko si te avel ando barimos peske Dadesko ai peske angelonsa , antunchi dela swakones so si lesko pala so kerdias ai sar traiisardias .

text: Verily I say unto you , There be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the Son of man coming in his kingdom .
text2: Chachimasa phenav tumenge , uni anda kadala kai si katse chi merena zhi pon chi dikhena sar O Shav le Manushesko avel ande peske amperetsia . "

text: And after six days Jesus taketh Peter , James , and John his brother , and bringeth them up into an high mountain apart ,
text2: Shov dies pala kodia O Jesus lias pesa o Petri , o Iakov ai lesko phral o Iovano , ningerdias le pek bari plaiing ai ferdi won sas kotse .

text: And was transfigured before them : and his face did shine as the sun , and his raiment was white as the light .
text2: Kotse parhudilo angla lende , lesko mui strefialsa sar o kham , ai leske tsalia parnile sar e vediara .

text: And , behold , there appeared unto them Moses and Elias talking with him .
text2: Strazo avisaile angla lende , o Moses ai o Elijah denas duma le Kristosa .

text: Then answered Peter , and said unto Jesus , Lord , it is good for us to be here : if thou wilt , let us make here three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: Antunchi o Petri dias duma ai phendias , " Jesus , Gazda , mishto ke sam katse ! Te mangesa , anzaras trin tseri , iek tuke , iek le Mosesoske , ai iek le Elijahaske . "

text: While he yet spake , behold , a bright cloud overshadowed them : and behold a voice out of the cloud , which said , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased ; hear ye him .
text2: Sar delas duma , iek nuvero kai strefialas avilo ai vuaradia le , ai anda nuvero iek glaso phendias : " Kado si murho Shav kai si mange de sa drago , kai plachal ma de sa zurales ; ashunen leste ! "

text: And when the disciples heard it , they fell on their face , and were sore afraid .
text2: Kana le disipluria ashunde kodo glaso , daraile zurales ai pele tele mosa pe phuv .

text: And Jesus came and touched them , and said , Arise , and be not afraid .
text2: Numa O Jesus avilo , thodia o vas pe lende , ai phendias , " Wushten , na daran ! "

text: And when they had lifted up their eyes , they saw no man , save Jesus only .
text2: Kana vazde penge iakha , chi mai dikhle kanikas , ferdi O Jesus sas .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , Jesus charged them , saying , Tell the vision to no man , until the Son of man be risen again from the dead .
text2: Sar avenas tele pai plaiing O Jesus dias le trad , " Na phenen kanikaske so dikhlian zhi kai O Shav le Manushesko zhuvindila andai martia . "

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Why then say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Leske disipluria phushle les , " Sostar le Gramnoturia phenen ke o Elijah trobul te avel mai anglal ? "

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Elias truly shall first come , and restore all things .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Chaches trobul te avel o Elijah te anel palpale swako fielo sar kai sas .

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is come already , and they knew him not , but have done unto him whatsoever they listed . Likewise shall also the Son of man suffer of them .
text2: Numa phenav tumenge , o Elijah vunzhe avilo , numa le manush chi prinzharde les , ai kerde lesa so godi mangle . Sa kadia O Shav le Manushesko si te avel chinuime lendar . "

text: Then the disciples understood that he spake unto them of John the Baptist .
text2: Antunchi le disipluria haliarde ke delas lensa duma pa o Iovano o baptisto .

text: And when they were come to the multitude , there came to him a certain man , kneeling down to him , and saying ,
text2: Kana aresle karing o narodo , iek manush avilo ka Jesus , thodiape ande changende angla leste ,

text: Lord , have mercy on my son : for he is lunatick , and sore vexed : for ofttimes he falleth into the fire , and oft into the water .
text2: ai phendias , " Gazda , al tuke mila anda murho shav ! Ke beng ande leste , ai chinuil zurales , butivar perel ande iag , ai butivar perel ando pai .

text: And I brought him to thy disciples , and they could not cure him .
text2: Ningerdem les ka che disipluria , numa nashti sastiarde les . "

text: Then Jesus answered and said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him hither to me .
text2: O Jesus dias atweto ai phendias , " Tume kai nai tume pachamos , ai rimome vitsa , zhi kana trobula te avav tumensa ? Zhi kana trobul te rhivdiv tumen ? Anen le shavorhes mande ! "

text: And Jesus rebuked the devil ; and he departed out of him : and the child was cured from that very hour .
text2: O Jesus gonisardias le benges , ai o beng anklisto avri anda shavorho , ai strazo sasto sas .

text: Then came the disciples to Jesus apart , and said , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Porme le disipluria avile ka Jesus , line les rigate ai phushle , " Sostar nashti gonisardiam les ame ? "

text: And Jesus said unto them , Because of your unbelief : for verily I say unto you , If ye have faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye shall say unto this mountain , Remove hence to yonder place ; and it shall remove ; and nothing shall be impossible unto you .
text2: O Jesus phendias lenge , ke de sa xantsi pachamos si tume , o chachimos phenav tumenge , te avel tume pachamos kambor e sumuntsa la garchitsaki , phendianas kakala plaiake , " Le tu katkar ai tho tu kote ! " Ai si te mishkilpe , ai nai khanchi kai nashti kerena .

text: Howbeit this kind goeth not out but by prayer and fasting .
text2: Numa kodolestar anklel avri ferdi kana rhugis tu ai zhonis .

text: And while they abode in Galilee , Jesus said unto them , The Son of man shall be betrayed into the hands of men :
text2: Andek dies kai le disipluria sas andek than ande Galilee . O Jesus phendia lenge , ke O Shav le manushesko si te avel dino andel vas le manushengo :

text: And they shall kill him , and the third day he shall be raised again . And they were exceeding sorry .
text2: Ai si te mudaren les ; numa o trito dies zhuvindila . " Won nekezhisaile zurales .

text: And when they were come to Capernaum , they that received tribute money came to Peter , and said , Doth not your master pay tribute ?
text2: Kana O Jesus ai leske disipluria aresle ando Capernaum , le manush kai chiden e taksa , avile ka Petri ai phushle les , " Tumaro gazda chi pochinel e taksa ? "

text: He saith , Yes . And when he was come into the house , Jesus prevented him , saying , What thinkest thou , Simon ? of whom do the kings of the earth take custom or tribute ? of their own children , or of strangers ?
text2: " Pochinel , " phendia o Petri , ai kana o Petri avilo ando kher , O Jesus dias duma mai anglal , ai phendias , " So gindis tu , Simon ? Le amparaturia la phuviake , kastar len e taksa le themeski , katar penge shave , vai katar le streia ? "

text: Peter saith unto him , Of strangers . Jesus saith unto him , Then are the children free .
text2: Kana o Petri phendias , " Katar le streia , " O Jesus phendias leske , " Antunchi le shave chi trobul te pochinen .

text: Notwithstanding , lest we should offend them , go thou to the sea , and cast an hook , and take up the fish that first cometh up ; and when thou hast opened his mouth , thou shalt find a piece of money : that take , and give unto them for me and thee .
text2: Numa te na rimosaras lenge gindo ai te peren ando bezex , zha ka maria , ai shude vunjitsa ando pai , le o pervo masho kai astaresa , phuter lesko mui , ai kotse arakhesa love , inger lende ai pochin e taksa pa mande ai pa tute . "

text: At the same time came the disciples unto Jesus , saying , Who is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven ?
text2: Ande kodia vriama le disipluria avile ka Jesus , ai phushle les , " Kon si o mai baro ande amperetsia le rhaioski ? "

text: And Jesus called a little child unto him , and set him in the midst of them ,
text2: O Jesus akhardias peste iek tsinorhi glata , ai thodia les angla lende ,

text: And said , Verily I say unto you , Except ye be converted , and become as little children , ye shall not enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: ai phendia , " Chachimos phenav tumenge , te na keiin tume ai te kerdion sar tsinorhe glate , nashtin chi te nakhen ande amperetsia le rhaioski . "

text: Whosoever therefore shall humble himself as this little child , the same is greatest in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Kon godi mekelape kovlo sar kacha tsinorhi glata si o mai baro ande amperetsia le rhaioski .

text: And whoso shall receive one such little child in my name receiveth me .
text2: Ai kon godi primila iek tsinorhi glata sar kadia ando murho anav primil man . "

text: But whoso shall offend one of these little ones which believe in me , it were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and that he were drowned in the depth of the sea .
text2: Numa kon godi kerela iek anda kadala tsinorhe kai pachanpe ande mande te peren ando bezex , mai bini te avel ek baro bax phanglo ka leski kox ai te avel shudino ande bari maria .

text: Woe unto the world because of offences ! for it must needs be that offences come ; but woe to that man by whom the offence cometh !
text2: Nasul la lumiake pala o zumaimos kai ingerel le manushen te peren ando bezex . O zumaimos musai te avel , numa nasul kodoleske kastar avela o zumaimos .

text: Wherefore if thy hand or thy foot offend thee , cut them off , and cast them from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life halt or maimed , rather than having two hands or two feet to be cast into everlasting fire .
text2: Te si cho vas vai cho punrho kai kerel tu te peres ando bezex , shin les ai shude les dur tutar ! Mai bini te zhas ando chacho traio ieka vastesa vai ieke punrhesa de sar te aven tu dui vas ai dui punrhe ai te aves shudino ande iag kai chi getolpe .

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out , and cast it from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life with one eye , rather than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire .
text2: Ai te si chi iakh ke kerel tu te peres ando bezex . Le la avri ai shude la dur tutar ! Ke mai bini te zhas ando chacho traio ieka iakhasa de sar te aven tut dui iakha ai te aves shudino ande iag le iadoski . "

text: Take heed that ye despise not one of these little ones ; for I say unto you , That in heaven their angels do always behold the face of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: " Arakhen tume te na vurhitsin iek anda kadala tsinorhe . " Ke phenav tumenge , ke lenge angeluria ando rhaio , dikhen sa data iek pe fatsa murhe Dadeski kai si ando rhaio .

text: For the Son of man is come to save that which was lost .
text2: Ke O Shav le manushesko avilo te skepil kodia kai sas xasardo .

text: How think ye ? if a man have an hundred sheep , and one of them be gone astray , doth he not leave the ninety and nine , and goeth into the mountains , and seeketh that which is gone astray ?
text2: So gindis ? Te si iek manush kai si les ek shel bakre , ai iek anda lende xasavol , chi mekel le iniarvardesh tai inia pe plai ai te zhal te rodel o iek kai xasailo ?

text: And if so be that he find it , verily I say unto you , he rejoiceth more of that sheep , than of the ninety and nine which went not astray .
text2: Ai te arakhela les , phenav tumenge o chachimos , " Mai raduime anda kodo iek de sar andal kaver iniarvardesh tai inia kai nas xasarde .

text: Even so it is not the will of your Father which is in heaven , that one of these little ones should perish .
text2: Ai sa kadia nai e voia tumaro Dadeski kai si ando rhaio , te xasavol ai te xaiil chi iek anda kadala tsinorhe .

text: Moreover if thy brother shall trespass against thee , go and tell him his fault between thee and him alone : if he shall hear thee , thou hast gained thy brother .
text2: " Te kerdia cho phral bezex karing tute , zha leste korkorho ai sikav leske leski dosh . Te ashunela tute nirisardian che phrales palpale .

text: But if he will not hear thee , then take with thee one or two more , that in the mouth of two or three witnesses every word may be established .
text2: Numa te na ashunela tute , le tusa iek vai dui manush kashte te avel dui vai trin marturia ka divano .

text: And if he shall neglect to hear them , tell it unto the church : but if he neglect to hear the church , let him be unto thee as an heathen man and a publican .
text2: Te na ashunela lende , phen la khangeriake ; te na ashunela ka khangeri , jin les sar iek manush kai chi pachalpe ando Del , ai sar iek manush kai chidel e taksa . "

text: Verily I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever ye shall loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: O chachimos phenav tumenge , " So godi phandena pe phuv vunzhe phanglo ando rhaio ; ai so godi tume phutrena pe phuv vunzhe phuterdo ando rhaio . "

text: Again I say unto you , That if two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask , it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Magdata phenav tumenge , " Te avela dui anda tumende kai san vorta ai chache iekavresa ai pe iek gindo pe phuv , vari so kai mangena si e avel , kerdo lenge katar murho Dat ando rhaio . "

text: For where two or three are gathered together in my name , there am I in the midst of them .
text2: Ke kai dui vai trin chidenape ande murho anav , " Me sim , mashkar lende . "

text: Then came Peter to him , and said , Lord , how oft shall my brother sin against me , and I forgive him ? till seven times ?
text2: Antunchi o Petri avilo ka Jesus ai phushlia les , " Gazda , sodivar trobul te iertiv murhe phraleske te kerela bezexa karing mande ? Zhi ka e eftato data ? "

text: Jesus saith unto him , I say not unto thee , Until seven times : but , Until seventy times seven .
text2: O Jesus phendias leske , " Me phenav tuke na zhi ka e eftato data , numa zhi kal eftavardesh data efta .

text: Therefore is the kingdom of heaven likened unto a certain king , which would take account of his servants .
text2: " E amperetsia le rhaioski si sar iek amperto kai manglias te dikhel sode kamenas leske , leske slugi .

text: And when he had begun to reckon , one was brought unto him , which owed him ten thousand talents .
text2: De anda gor andine leske iekes kai kamelas leske desh mi .

text: But forasmuch as he had not to pay , his lord commanded him to be sold , and his wife , and children , and all that he had , and payment to be made .
text2: Ke nashti pochinelas , lesko gazda dias ordina te bichinen les , leska rhomnia , leske shaven , ai sa so godi sas les , kashte te pochindiol so kamelas .

text: The servant therefore fell down , and worshipped him , saying , Lord , have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: E sluga thodiape ande changende ai rhugisailo leste , ' Na xoliavol , rhevdisar , azhuker ma , ai pochinava tuke sa . '

text: Then the lord of that servant was moved with compassion , and loosed him , and forgave him the debt .
text2: Leske gazdaske pelias mila , ai meklias les te zhal ivia . Iertisardias les so godi kamelas leske .

text: But the same servant went out , and found one of his fellowservants , which owed him an hundred pence : and he laid hands on him , and took him by the throat , saying , Pay me that thou owest .
text2: " Numa e mizmo sluga sar zhalas avri , arakhlias iek andal kaver slugi , kai kamelas leske iek shel teliara . Lias les korhatar ai phendias , " Pochin mange so godi kames mange . "

text: And his fellowservant fell down at his feet , and besought him , saying , Have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: Kodia sluga thodiape ande changende ai rhugisailo leste , " Na xoliavol , rhevdisar , azhuker ma , ai pochinava tuke sa . "

text: And he would not : but went and cast him into prison , till he should pay the debt .
text2: Numa wo chi manglias , gelo ai thodias les ande temnitsa zhi pon pochinela so kamel .

text: So when his fellowservants saw what was done , they were very sorry , and came and told unto their lord all that was done .
text2: Kana le kaver slugi dikhle so kerdiliape , de sa nasul sas lenge , gele ai phende le gazdaske so godi kerdiliape .

text: Then his lord , after that he had called him , said unto him , O thou wicked servant , I forgave thee all that debt , because thou desiredst me :
text2: Antunchi lesko gazda akhardias les , ai phendias leske , " Tu bi lasho , bi ilesko , nasul sluga ! Me iertisardem tuke so godi kamesas mange ke rhugisailian mande .

text: Shouldest not thou also have had compassion on thy fellowservant , even as I had pity on thee ?
text2: Chi trobulas te avel tuke mila andai kaver sluga , sar sas mange mila anda tute ? "

text: And his lord was wroth , and delivered him to the tormentors , till he should pay all that was due unto him .
text2: Ande xoli lesko gazda thodias les ande temnitsa zhi pon pochinal so godi kamelas .

text: So likewise shall my heavenly Father do also unto you , if ye from your hearts forgive not every one his brother their trespasses .
text2: " Sakadia si te kerel tumensa murho Dat kai si ando rhaio , te na iertina tumare phralen sa ilesa . "

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these sayings , he departed from Galilee , and came into the coasts of Judaea beyond Jordan ;
text2: Kana O Jesus getosardias so phenelas , gelotar andai Galilee karing e Judea inchal e Jordan .

text: And great multitudes followed him ; and he healed them there .
text2: Bare naroduria gele pala leste , ai sastiardia le kotse .

text: The Pharisees also came unto him , tempting him , and saying unto him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife for every cause ?
text2: Le Farizeanuria avile leste te zumaven les , ai phushle les , " Dar vorta ai slobodo ando zakono te mekel o manush peska rhomnia anda vari soste godi ? "

text: And he answered and said unto them , Have ye not read , that he which made them at the beginning made them male and female ,
text2: Dias atweto ai phendias , " Chi jindian ke kodo kai kerdias le de anda gor kerdias le mursh ai zhuvlia ?

text: And said , For this cause shall a man leave father and mother , and shall cleave to his wife : and they twain shall be one flesh ?
text2: Ai phendias , " Anda kodia o mursh si te mekel peske dades ai peska da , ai avela astardo ka peski rhomni , ai le dui avena iek stato . "

text: Wherefore they are no more twain , but one flesh . What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Pala kodia na mai dui numa iek stato . So Del thodias andek than o manush te na hulavel . "

text: They say unto him , Why did Moses then command to give a writing of divorcement , and to put her away ?
text2: Won phende leske , " Apo , Sostar o Moses meklias ke sai mekel o manush peska rhomnia te dela la lil anda vas ? "
