text: He saith unto them , Moses because of the hardness of your hearts suffered you to put away your wives : but from the beginning it was not so .
text2: Wo phendias lenge , " Ke zuradian tumaro ilo o Moses meklias ke sai meken tumare rhomnian . Numa de anda gor nas kadia .

text: And I say unto you , Whosoever shall put away his wife , except it be for fornication , and shall marry another , committeth adultery : and whoso marrieth her which is put away doth commit adultery .
text2: Me mothav tuke kon godi mekela peska rhomnia te na avela ke kurvisaile , ai te lela avria kerdias kurvia , ai kodo kai lela la kerel kurvia .

text: His disciples say unto him , If the case of the man be so with his wife , it is not good to marry .
text2: Le disipluria phende leske , " Te avela kadia mashkar o mursh ai leski rhomni mai feder te na meritinpe .

text: But he said unto them , All men cannot receive this saying , save they to whom it is given .
text2: Wo phendias lenge , " Nashtin sa le manush te primin kado sikaimos . Numa kodola kaste si dino .

text: For there are some eunuchs , which were so born from their mother ' s womb : and there are some eunuchs , which were made eunuchs of men : and there be eunuchs , which have made themselves eunuchs for the kingdom of heaven ' s sake . He that is able to receive it , let him receive it .
text2: Uni si Eunuchs ke biandile kadia , uni si Eunuchs ke le manush kerde le kadia , ai uni si Eunuchs ke won mangen pala e amperestia le rhaioski . Kodo kai sai primil , mek te primil . "

text: Then were there brought unto him little children , that he should put his hands on them , and pray : and the disciples rebuked them .
text2: Antunchi andine tsinorhe glaten te thol peske vas pe lende ai te rhugil lenge , numa le disipluria dine le trad .

text: But Jesus said , Suffer little children , and forbid them not , to come unto me : for of such is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: O Jesus phendias , " Mek te aven le glate mande , ai na ashaven le , ke e amperetsia le rhaioski kodolenge si kai si sar lende . "

text: And he laid his hands on them , and departed thence .
text2: Thodia peske vas pe lende ai gelotar kotsar .

text: And , behold , one came and said unto him , Good Master , what good thing shall I do , that I may have eternal life ?
text2: Iek manush avilo ka Jesus ai phushlia les , " Lasho Gazda , che lashimos trobul te kerav te avel ma traio kai chi mai getolpe ? "

text: And he said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God : but if thou wilt enter into life , keep the commandments .
text2: Wo phendias leske , " Sostar mothos mange lasho ? Ke nai khonik lasho . O Del ferdi si lasho . Te mangesa te nakhes ando traio kai chi getolpe anker le zakonuria . "

text: He saith unto him , Which ? Jesus said , Thou shalt do no murder , Thou shalt not commit adultery , Thou shalt not steal , Thou shalt not bear false witness ,
text2: " Savo ? " phushlias lestar . O Jesus phendias leske , " Na mudar , na ker kurvia , na chor , na xoxav .

text: Honour thy father and thy mother : and , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Preznaisar che dades ai cha da , ai te avel tuke drago le manush sar kai san tu tuke . "

text: The young man saith unto him , All these things have I kept from my youth up : what lack I yet ?
text2: O terno manush phendias , " Sa kadala zakonuria ankerdem de sar sim tsinorho : So mai trobul te kerav ? "

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou wilt be perfect , go and sell that thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come and follow me .
text2: O Jesus phendias leske , " Te mangesa te aves vorta , zha bichin so si tu , de kal chorhe , ai avela tu manjin ando rhaio : antunchi aidi pala mande . "

text: But when the young man heard that saying , he went away sorrowful : for he had great possessions .
text2: Kana o terno manush ashundias kodia tristosailo ai gelotar , ke but barvalimos sas les .

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , Verily I say unto you , That a rich man shall hardly enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Porme O Jesus phendia peske disiplonge , " Phenav tumenge o chachimos , trutno ek barvale manusheske te zhal ande amperetsia le rhaioski .

text: And again I say unto you , It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Ai mai phenav tumenge , mai vushoro te nakhel iek gemula andai iakh la suviaki , de sar iek barvalo manush te zhal ande amperetsia le Devleski . "

text: When his disciples heard it , they were exceedingly amazed , saying , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Kana le disipluria ashunde kadia , chudisaile ai phende , " Apo , kon sai avela skepime ? "

text: But Jesus beheld them , and said unto them , With men this is impossible ; but with God all things are possible .
text2: O Jesus dikhlias pe lende . Ai phendias lenge , " Le manush anda pende nashtin , numa le Devlesa vari so sai kerdiol . "

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Behold , we have forsaken all , and followed thee ; what shall we have therefore ?
text2: Antunchi o Petri phendias leske , " Ame mekliam swako fielo ai liam ame pala tute . So avela amen . "

text: And Jesus said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That ye which have followed me , in the regeneration when the Son of man shall sit in the throne of his glory , ye also shall sit upon twelve thrones , judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Phenav tumenge o chachimos , ande nevi lumia kana O Shav le Manushesko beshela pe pesko skamin o amperatitsko ando barimos le rhaiosko , tume kai lian tume pala mande , si te beshen pe desh u dui amperatitske skamina , te shinen kris pe le desh u dui vitsi andai Israel .

text: And every one that hath forsaken houses , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my name ' s sake , shall receive an hundredfold , and shall inherit everlasting life .
text2: Ai kon godi mekela khera , phralen , pheian , dades , vai da , rhomni , glaten , vai phuvia pala mande , lena iek shelvar mai but ai avela le o traio kai chi getolpe .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last shall be first .
text2: But anda le perve avena le palune , ai but kai sas le palune avena le perve . "

text: For the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which went out early in the morning to hire labourers into his vineyard .
text2: E amperetsia le rhaioski si sar iek gazda kai gelo diminiatsi te lel manush te keren buchi ande leski rez .

text: And when he had agreed with the labourers for a penny a day , he sent them into his vineyard .
text2: Ashilo le bucharensa pe iek pena po dies ai tradia le ande peski rez .

text: And he went out about the third hour , and saw others standing idle in the marketplace ,
text2: Karing le inia , gelotar ai ando bazari dikhlias avren kai chi kerenas khanchi .

text: And said unto them ; Go ye also into the vineyard , and whatsoever is right I will give you . And they went their way .
text2: Lenge phendia , " Zhan vi tume ande murhi rez , ai dava tumen so si vorta . "

text: Again he went out about the sixth and ninth hour , and did likewise .
text2: Karing le desh u dui miazutsi , ai magdata karing le trin pala miazutsi kerdias sa kadia .

text: And about the eleventh hour he went out , and found others standing idle , and saith unto them , Why stand ye here all the day idle ?
text2: Karing le pansh pala miazutsi gelo ai arakhlias avren kai chi kerenas khanchi , ai phendias lenge , " Sostar beshen katse sorho dies ai chi keren khanchi ? "

text: They say unto him , Because no man hath hired us . He saith unto them , Go ye also into the vineyard ; and whatsoever is right , that shall ye receive .
text2: Won phende leske , " Ke chi lias amen khonik te keras buchi . " Lenge phendias , " Zhan vi tume ande murhi rez , ai so godi avela vorta , kodia len . "

text: So when even was come , the lord of the vineyard saith unto his steward , Call the labourers , and give them their hire , beginning from the last unto the first .
text2: " Kana peli e riat , o gazda la rezako phendia peske slugake , " Akhar le bucharen ai de le lenge pochin , pervo kodolen kai lem mai palal ai ando gor kodolen kai lem pervo .

text: And when they came that were hired about the eleventh hour , they received every man a penny .
text2: Ai kodola kai sas line karing le pansh pala miazutsi avile ai swako lias po iek pena .

text: But when the first came , they supposed that they should have received more ; and they likewise received every man a penny .
text2: Kana le perve avile , gindinas ke won len mai but , numa swako lias po iek pena .

text: And when they had received it , they murmured against the goodman of the house ,
text2: Kana line peske pochin pupuiinaspe pa gazda .

text: Saying , These last have wrought but one hour , and thou hast made them equal unto us , which have borne the burden and heat of the day .
text2: Phenenas , " Kadala kai avile ande vurma kerde buchi numa iek chaso , ai thodian le amensa , kai chinuisardiam sorho jes ando tachimos ! "

text: But he answered one of them , and said , Friend , I do thee no wrong : didst not thou agree with me for a penny ?
text2: Numa wo dias atweto ai phendias ieskeske , " Vortakona , chi kerav tusa nasul , chi ashilian mansa pe iek pena ?

text: Take that thine is , and go thy way : I will give unto this last , even as unto thee .
text2: Le so si chiro ai zha ci drom . Me mangav te dav kodoles kai avilo ande vurma sode dem tute .

text: Is it not lawful for me to do what I will with mine own ? Is thine eye evil , because I am good ?
text2: Dar nashti kerav murhe lovensa so mangav . Vai inatsia si tut ke lasho sim , ai dav mai but de so trobul .

text: So the last shall be first , and the first last : for many be called , but few chosen .
text2: Kadia kerdiola , le palune avena le perve , ai le perve avena le palune : but si akharde , numa xantsi si halome . "

text: And Jesus going up to Jerusalem took the twelve disciples apart in the way , and said unto them ,
text2: Sar zhalas O Jesus ando Jerusalem , lia le desh u dui disiplon rigate pa drom , ai phendias lenge ,

text: Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be betrayed unto the chief priests and unto the scribes , and they shall condemn him to death ,
text2: Ame zhas ande Jerusalem ai O Shav le Manushesko avela dino ando vas kal bare rasha ai le Gramnoturia , won kerena leski kris te mudaren les .

text: And shall deliver him to the Gentiles to mock , and to scourge , and to crucify him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Dena les kal manush kai Nai Zhiduvuria te maren mui lestar , te maren les le bichosa , te karfon les po trushul ; ai o trito dies si te zhuvindil . "

text: Then came to him the mother of Zebedee ' s children with her sons , worshipping him , and desiring a certain thing of him .
text2: Antunchi le Zebedeske shave ai lenge dei avile ka Jesus , thodias pe anda changende angla leste , te mangel vari so lestar .

text: And he said unto her , What wilt thou ? She saith unto him , Grant that these my two sons may sit , the one on thy right hand , and the other on the left , in thy kingdom .
text2: Phushlias la , " So manges ? " Woi phendias , " Mek murhe do shaven te beshen iek ka cho chacho vas ai iek ka cho stingo vas ande chiri amperetsia . "

text: But Jesus answered and said , Ye know not what ye ask . Are ye able to drink of the cup that I shall drink of , and to be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ? They say unto him , We are able .
text2: Numa O Jesus phendias lake , " Chi zhanes so manges . " Amboldiaspe ka Iakov ai ka Iovano ai phushlias le , " Sai phen andai kuchi kai me si te piiav ? " Won phende , " Sai . "

text: And he saith unto them , Ye shall drink indeed of my cup , and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with : but to sit on my right hand , and on my left , is not mine to give , but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared of my Father .
text2: Wo phendias lenge , " Si te phen anda murhi kuchi , numa te beshen ka murho chacho chas ai ka murho stingo , nai mandar te dav . Kodo than avela dino ka kodola kaske getosardias le murho Dat .

text: And when the ten heard it , they were moved with indignation against the two brethren .
text2: Kana le kolaver desh disipluria ashunde kodia , xoliale pel dui phral .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Ye know that the princes of the Gentiles exercise dominion over them , and they that are great exercise authority upon them .
text2: O Jesus akhardias le peste ai phendias , " Tume zhanen ke le bare le manushenge kai Nai Zhiduvuria gazdin len , ai keren lensa so mangen .

text: But it shall not be so among you : but whosoever will be great among you , let him be your minister ;
text2: Nai kadia mashkar tumende , numa savo godi mangel te avel baro mashkar tumende , avela tumaro podaitori .

text: And whosoever will be chief among you , let him be your servant :
text2: Ai savo godi mangel te avel o mai baro mashkar tumende , avela tumari sluga ;

text: Even as the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Sakadia o Shav le Manushesko chi avilo te podain les , numa avilo te podail ai te del pesko traio te pochinel anda but te skepil le . "

text: And as they departed from Jericho , a great multitude followed him .
text2: Kana zhanas avri anda Jericho , but narodo liape pala Jesus .

text: And , behold , two blind men sitting by the way side , when they heard that Jesus passed by , cried out , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Dui korhe beshenas pe rig le dromeske kana ashunde ke O Jesus nakhelas , tsipisarde , " Gazda , tu Shav le Davidosko ! Al tuke mila anda amende ! "

text: And the multitude rebuked them , because they should hold their peace : but they cried the more , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: O narodo ashavelas le . Numa won tsipinas mai zurales , " Gazda , Shav le Davidosko ! Al tuke mila anda amende ! "

text: And Jesus stood still , and called them , and said , What will ye that I shall do unto you ?
text2: O Jesus terdilo , akhardias le , ai phushlias len , " So mangen te kerav tumenge ? "

text: They say unto him , Lord , that our eyes may be opened .
text2: Phende leske , " Gazda , phuter amare iakha te dikhas ! "

text: So Jesus had compassion on them , and touched their eyes : and immediately their eyes received sight , and they followed him .
text2: Mila sas leske anda lende . O Jesus azbadias lenge iakha ; strazo dikhle , ai linepe pala leste .

text: And when they drew nigh unto Jerusalem , and were come to Bethphage , unto the mount of Olives , then sent Jesus two disciples ,
text2: Kana pashile karing o Jerusalem , areslo ando Bethphage pe plai le maslinengi . O Jesus tradias duien andal disipluria .

text: Saying unto them , Go into the village over against you , and straightway ye shall find an ass tied , and a colt with her : loose them , and bring them unto me .
text2: ai phendia lenge , " Zhan ando gav mai angle , ai arakhena kotse ek magari phangli ai lako magaristsi lasa ; phutren le , ai anen le mande .

text: And if any man say ought unto you , ye shall say , The Lord hath need of them ; and straightway he will send them .
text2: Te phenela tumenge vari kon , vari so , phenen leske , " Trobun le gazdas , " ai strazo si te tradel le . "

text: All this was done , that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying ,
text2: Kadia kerdiliape te pherdiol so phendiasas o profeto .

text: Tell ye the daughter of Sion , Behold , thy King cometh unto thee , meek , and sitting upon an ass , and a colt the foal of an ass .
text2: Kana phendias , " Phenen la sheiake le Zionoski , " Eta , cho amperato avel tute ! Domolo ai anklisto pe ek magari , ai pe ek tsinorho le magaresko . "

text: And the disciples went , and did as Jesus commanded them ,
text2: Le disipluria gele , ai kerde so O Jesus phendias lenge .

text: And brought the ass , and the colt , and put on them their clothes , and they set him thereon .
text2: Andine le magares ai le tsinorho magares , thode penge raxamia pe lende , ai O Jesus beshlo pel raxamia .

text: And a very great multitude spread their garments in the way ; others cut down branches from the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: But anda narodo shudenas penge raxamia po drom angla leste , kaver shinde patria pai krenga ai thode le po drom angla leste .

text: And the multitudes that went before , and that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna to the Son of David : Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord ; Hosanna in the highest .
text2: O narodi kai zhanas anglal angla leste , ai kodola kai avenas palal pala leste , tsipinas , " Hosana ka O Shav le Davidosko ! Raduime kodo kai avel ando anav le Devleske ! Hosana zhi ando rhaio . "

text: And when he was come into Jerusalem , all the city was moved , saying , Who is this ?
text2: Kana O Jesus avilo ande Jerusalem sa o foro sas buntuime , ai phushenas , " Kon si kado ? "

text: And the multitude said , This is Jesus the prophet of Nazareth of Galilee .
text2: O narodo phenenas , " Kado si O Jesus o profeto anda Nazareth ande Galilee . "

text: And Jesus went into the temple of God , and cast out all them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ,
text2: O Jesus avilo ande tamplo le Devleski ai gonisardia sa kodolen kai bichinenas ai chinenas ande tamplo . Dia muial le skafidia kodolenge kai parhuvenas le love ai le skamina kodolenge kai bichinenas le golumburia ,

text: And said unto them , It is written , My house shall be called the house of prayer ; but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: ai phendia lenge , " Ramome murho kher avela akhardo ' Kher rhugimasko , ' numatume keren anda leske shtala chorengi ! "

text: And the blind and the lame came to him in the temple ; and he healed them .
text2: Le korhe ai le bange avile leste ande tamplo ai sastiardia le .

text: And when the chief priests and scribes saw the wonderful things that he did , and the children crying in the temple , and saying , Hosanna to the Son of David ; they were sore displeased ,
text2: Numa kana le bare rasha ai le Gramnoturia dikhle sa le mirakluria ai sa so kerdias , ai ke le shavorhe ande tamplo denas mui , ai phenenas , " Hosana ka O Shav le Davidosko , " xoliale .

text: And said unto him , Hearest thou what these say ? And Jesus saith unto them , Yea ; have ye never read , Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings thou hast perfected praise ?
text2: Ai phende leske , " Ashunes so phenen ? " O Jesus phendias , " E , Shoxar chi jindian , anda mui shavorhenge ai tsinorhe glatengo andian chacho luvudimos . "

text: And he left them , and went out of the city into Bethany ; and he lodged there .
text2: Meklia le , ai gelotar anda foro , gelo ande Bethani , ai kotse riatchardias .

text: Now in the morning as he returned into the city , he hungered .
text2: De diminiatsi , sar avelas palpale ando foro bokhailo .

text: And when he saw a fig tree in the way , he came to it , and found nothing thereon , but leaves only , and said unto it , Let no fruit grow on thee henceforward for ever . And presently the fig tree withered away .
text2: Kana dikhlias ek pruing figengi pasha drom gelo late , ai arakhlias patria ferdi , antunchi phendia la pruingake , shoxar te na mai bariol fruta tutar , ai strazo shuchili e pruing .

text: And when the disciples saw it , they marvelled , saying , How soon is the fig tree withered away !
text2: Kana le disipluria dikhle kodia , chudisaile , ai phushle , " Sarta shuchili e pruing andak data ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Verily I say unto you , If ye have faith , and doubt not , ye shall not only do this which is done to the fig tree , but also if ye shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; it shall be done .
text2: O Jesus phendias lenge , " O chachimos phenav tumenge , te avela tume pachamos , ai te na avela tume gindo ke chi kerdiol , tume chi kerena ferdi so sas kerdo kakala pruingake , numa vi te mothona kakala plaiake ,

text: And all things , whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer , believing , ye shall receive .
text2: " Le tu katkar ai av shudini ande maria si te kerdiol . Ai so godi mangena ando rhugimos ai te pachana tume si te len . "

text: And when he was come into the temple , the chief priests and the elders of the people came unto him as he was teaching , and said , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority ?
text2: Ai kana avilo ande tamplo , le bare rasha ai le phure kai poronchinas avile leste sar sikavelas , ai phende , " Kon phendias tuke ke sai keres so tu keres , ai kon dias tu kudia putiera ? "

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I also will ask you one thing , which if ye tell me , I in like wise will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Vi me akana phushav tumendar ek divano , ai te phenena mange , antunchi me phenav tumennge katar che putiera kerav so kerav .

text: The baptism of John , whence was it ? from heaven , or of men ? And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say unto us , Why did ye not then believe him ?
text2: O bolimos le Iovanosko katar sas , anda rhaio vai manushendar ? " Dinepe duma mashkar pende , ai pheneas , " Te phenasa anda o rhaio si te phushel ame , Sostar chi pachaian les ? "

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; we fear the people ; for all hold John as a prophet .
text2: Numa te phenasa manushendar . Dar katar le manush ke savorhe ankeren le Iovanos profeto .

text: And they answered Jesus , and said , We cannot tell . And he said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Antunchi phende le Kristoske , " Chi zhanas . " Ai Wo phendia lenge , " Chi me , chi phenav tumenge katar che putiera kerav so kerav . "

text: But what think ye ? A certain man had two sons ; and he came to the first , and said , Son , go work to day in my vineyard .
text2: " So gindin tume ? Sas iek manush kai sas les dui shave . Gelo ka pervo , ai phendias , " Shava , zha , ker buchi adies ande murhe rez . "

text: He answered and said , I will not : but afterward he repented , and went .
text2: Wo phendias , " Chi zhav " numa mai palal keisailo ai gelo .

text: And he came to the second , and said likewise . And he answered and said , I go , sir : and went not .
text2: Avilo ka duito ai phendias leske sakadia . Wo phendias , " Zhav , Raia , " numa chi gelo .

text: Whether of them twain did the will of his father ? They say unto him , The first . Jesus saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That the publicans and the harlots go into the kingdom of God before you .
text2: Savo andal dui kerdia e voia peske dadeske ? " Won phende leske , " O pervo " . O Jesus phendias lenge , " Chaches mothav tumenge , le manush kai chiden e taksa ai le kurvi arasena ande amperetsia le Devleski mai anglal tumendar .

text: For John came unto you in the way of righteousness , and ye believed him not : but the publicans and the harlots believed him : and ye , when ye had seen it , repented not afterward , that ye might believe him .
text2: Ke o Iovano avilo tumende te sikavel tumenge o drom o chacho , ai chi pachaian les , numa le manush kai chiden e taksa ai le kurvi pachaie les . Vi kana dikhlian kodia chi keisailian ai te pachan les . "

text: Hear another parable : There was a certain householder , which planted a vineyard , and hedged it round about , and digged a winepress in it , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country :
text2: " Ashunen ka aver paramichi , sas iek gazda kheresko thodias iek zido kruglom latar , ai lashardias iek than te strangon o struguro , vazdias iek wucho than te len sama kotsar . Ai dias e rez po wunjilepe manushende , ai gelotar andek dur them .

text: And when the time of the fruit drew near , he sent his servants to the husbandmen , that they might receive the fruits of it .
text2: Kana pashili e vriama te chidelpe o struguro , tradias peske slugen kal manush kai bariarenas pe leski rez , te len o struguro kai avelas leske .

text: And the husbandmen took his servants , and beat one , and killed another , and stoned another .
text2: Numa kudula kai bariarenas pe rez line leske slugen ai marde iekes , iekes mudarde , ai ande iek shude baxensa . Magdata tradia avre slugen , kadia data tradias mai but ai kerde lenge sakadia .

text: But last of all he sent unto them his son , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: Ta ando gor tradias lende peske shaves , ai phendias , " Si te preznain murhe shaves . "

text: But when the husbandmen saw the son , they said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and let us seize on his inheritance .
text2: Numa kana dikhle le shaves le manush kai bariaren pe rez phende iek avreske . Aven , mudaras les , ai lias ame so si lesko .

text: And they caught him , and cast him out of the vineyard , and slew him .
text2: Line les , shude les avri andai rez ai mudarde les . "

text: When the lord therefore of the vineyard cometh , what will he do unto those husbandmen ?
text2: " Kana o gazda le rezako avela , so kerela kodole manushenge ? "

text: They say unto him , He will miserably destroy those wicked men , and will let out his vineyard unto other husbandmen , which shall render him the fruits in their seasons .
text2: Won phende leske , " Si te mudarel kodole nasul manushen , ai dela e rez ka kaver te bariaren pe late , kai dena les e fruta kai si leski kana avela e vriama . "

text: Jesus saith unto them , Did ye never read in the scriptures , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner : this is the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: O Jesus phendias lenge , " Shoxar chi jindian ando ramomos ? O bax kai le manush kai vazden o kher shude kerdilo o bax kai si sa e zor le khereski , O Del kerdias kadia , ai che mundro ande amare iakha ! "

text: Therefore say I unto you , The kingdom of God shall be taken from you , and given to a nation bringing forth the fruits thereof .
text2: Anda kodia phenav tumenge , " E amperetsia le Devleski avela lini tumendar , ai avela dini kai iek them kai avela laki fruta lendar .

text: And whosoever shall fall on this stone shall be broken : but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Ai kon godi perela pe kado bax avela phago , numa pe kaste perela o bax licharela les sar e pulberia .

text: And when the chief priests and Pharisees had heard his parables , they perceived that he spake of them .
text2: Kana le rasha le bare ai le Farizeanuria ashunde kadia paramicha haliarde ke pa lende delas duma .

text: But when they sought to lay hands on him , they feared the multitude , because they took him for a prophet .
text2: Mangenas te thon o vas pe leste . Numa daraile katar o narodo ke won ankerenas les profeto .

text: And Jesus answered and spake unto them again by parables , and said ,
text2: O Jesus dia duma pale andel paramichi ai phenel ,

text: The kingdom of heaven is like unto a certain king , which made a marriage for his son ,
text2: " E amperetsia le rhaioski si sar iek amperato kai kerdias abiav peske shaveske .

text: And sent forth his servants to call them that were bidden to the wedding : and they would not come .
text2: Tradias peske slugen te akharen kodolen kai sas akharde ka abiav , numa won chi mangle te aven .

text: Again , he sent forth other servants , saying , Tell them which are bidden , Behold , I have prepared my dinner : my oxen and my fatlings are killed , and all things are ready : come unto the marriage .
text2: " Magdata tradias avre slugen , te mothon kodolenge kai sas akharde , " Eta , getosardem o xabe , murhe guruv ai le vitseluria sa mudarde , swako fielo gata . Aven ka abiav ! " "

text: But they made light of it , and went their ways , one to his farm , another to his merchandise :
text2: Numa chi thode sama , ai gele peske drom , iek ka peski farma , aver ande peski buchi .

text: And the remnant took his servants , and entreated them spitefully , and slew them .
text2: Ai le kolaver thode o vas pe leske slugi , marde mui lendar , darade le ai mudarde le .

text: But when the king heard thereof , he was wroth : and he sent forth his armies , and destroyed those murderers , and burned up their city .
text2: " Kana o amperato ashundias , xolialo , tradias peske ketani ; ai kerdias xaiimaske anda kodola kai mudarde , ai dias iag lengo foro .

text: Then saith he to his servants , The wedding is ready , but they which were bidden were not worthy .
text2: Antunchi phendias peske slugenge , o abiav gata numa kodola kai sas akharde , chi molas te aven akharde . "

text: Go ye therefore into the highways , and as many as ye shall find , bid to the marriage .
text2: Anda kodia zhan pel bare vulitsi , ai sode arakhena kotse , akharen le ka o abiav .

text: So those servants went out into the highways , and gathered together all as many as they found , both bad and good : and the wedding was furnished with guests .
text2: " Kodola slugi gele pel vulitsi ai chide andek than sa kai arakhle , vi nasul ai vi lashe ; ai o kher le abiavesko sas pherdo .

text: And when the king came in to see the guests , he saw there a man which had not on a wedding garment :
text2: Kana o amperato avilo te dikhel le gosten , dikhlia kotse iek manush kai sas xuriarado andel tsalia abiaveske .

text: And he saith unto him , Friend , how camest thou in hither not having a wedding garment ? And he was speechless .
text2: Ai phendias leske , " Vortako , Sar avilian andre katse bi tsalengo abiaveske ? " Les nas so mothol .

text: Then said the king to the servants , Bind him hand and foot , and take him away , and cast him into outer darkness ; there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Antunchi o amperato phendias le slugenge , " Phanden leske vas ai leske punrhe , ai shuden les avri ando tuniariko . Kotse kai rovena ai chiden dandendar . "

text: For many are called , but few are chosen .
text2: " Ke but si akharde , numa xantsi si halome . "

text: Then went the Pharisees , and took counsel how they might entangle him in his talk .
text2: Antunchi le Farizeanuria gele ai dinepe duma sar te astaren les ande lesko divano .

text: And they sent out unto him their disciples with the Herodians , saying , Master , we know that thou art true , and teachest the way of God in truth , neither carest thou for any man : for thou regardest not the person of men .
text2: Trade leste peske disiplon ai une Herodians , won phende , " Gazda , zhanas ke chachimasa san ai sikaves o chachimos pa Del bi te daras vari kastar , ke chi thos partia kanikaske .

text: Tell us therefore , What thinkest thou ? Is it lawful to give tribute unto Caesar , or not ?
text2: Phen amenge antunchi , " So gindis ? Si amenge slobodo vai nai , te pochinas taksa ka Caesar ? "

text: But Jesus perceived their wickedness , and said , Why tempt ye me , ye hypocrites ?
text2: Numa O Jesus haliardias lenge nasul ginduria , ai phendias , " Sostar tume zumaven ma ? Tume kai ankerdion so chi san ?

text: Shew me the tribute money . And they brought unto him a penny .
text2: Sikaven mange le love so sa pochinen e taksa . " Andine leske iek pena ,

text: And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ?
text2: ai phendias lenge , " Kaski fatsa ai ramomos si kado ? "

text: They say unto him , Caesar ' s . Then saith he unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which are Caesar ' s ; and unto God the things that are God ' s .
text2: Won phende leske , " O Caesar " Antunchi O Jesus phendias lenge , " Den ka Caesar so si lesko , ai den ka Del so si le Devlesko . "

text: When they had heard these words , they marvelled , and left him , and went their way .
text2: Kana ashunde , chudisaile . Mekle les ai geletar .

text: The same day came to him the Sadducees , which say that there is no resurrection , and asked him ,
text2: Sa kodo dies uni Saduseanuria kai mothon ke nai traio pala e martia avile leste ai phushle les ,

text: Saying , Master , Moses said , If a man die , having no children , his brother shall marry his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: " Gazda , o Moses phendias , ' Te merela iek manush ai nas les glate , lesko phral trobul te lel leska rhomni , te vazdel familia peske phralesle . '

text: Now there were with us seven brethren : and the first , when he had married a wife , deceased , and , having no issue , left his wife unto his brother :
text2: Sas mashkar amende efta phral . O pervo ansurisailo ai mulo , ai ke nas les glate , meklia peska rhomnia peske phraleske .

text: Likewise the second also , and the third , unto the seventh .
text2: Sa kadia o duito , ai o trito zhi ka o eftato .

text: And last of all the woman died also .
text2: Kana avela te zhuvindin le mule te zhan ando rhaio , saveski andal efta phral avela e rhomni ke savorhenge sas ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Ye do err , not knowing the scriptures , nor the power of God .
text2: O Jesus phendias lenge , " Shubin tume zurales ! Ke tume chi haliaren E Vorba le Devleski , ai chi e putiera le Devleski .

text: For in the resurrection they neither marry , nor are given in marriage , but are as the angels of God in heaven .
text2: Ke kana avela te zhuvindin le mule te zhan ando rhaio , le mursh chi lena rhomni ai le zhuvlia chi lena rhom , numa avena sar le angeluria le Devleske kai si ando rhaio .

text: But as touching the resurrection of the dead , have ye not read that which was spoken unto you by God , saying ,
text2: Numa anda kodia kai zhuvindin le mule te zhan ando rhaio , chi jindian tume so sas phendo tumenge katar O Del , kana phendias .

text: I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ? God is not the God of the dead , but of the living .
text2: " Me sim O Del le Abramosko , O Del le Isakosko ai O Del le Jacovosko , " O Del nai O Del le mulengo , numa le zhuvindengo . "

text: And when the multitude heard this , they were astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Kana le naroduria ashunde kado divano , chudisaile katar lesko sikaimos .

text: But when the Pharisees had heard that he had put the Sadducees to silence , they were gathered together .
text2: Numa kana le Farizeanuria ashunde ke phandadias o mui le Saduseanongo , chidinisaile andek than ,

text: Then one of them , which was a lawyer , asked him a question , tempting him , and saying ,
text2: ai iek anda lende , ablakato , phushlias les ek divano te zumavel les .

text: Master , which is the great commandment in the law ?
text2: " Gazda , Savo si o mai baro andal zakonuria ? "

text: Jesus said unto him , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind .
text2: O Jesus phendias leske , " Te avel tuke drago O Del sa che ilesa , sa che duxosa , ai sa cho gojasa . " Kado si o pervo ai o mai baro andal zakonuria .

text: And the second is like unto it , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Ai o duito si saikfielo : " Te avel tuke drago le manush sode san tu tuke . "

text: On these two commandments hang all the law and the prophets .
text2: Ande kadala dui zakonuria ankerdiol sa e kris ai so phende le profeturia . "

text: While the Pharisees were gathered together , Jesus asked them ,
text2: Kana sas chidine andek than le Farizeanuria , O Jesus phushlia le divano ,

text: Saying , What think ye of Christ ? whose son is he ? They say unto him , The Son of David .
text2: " So gindin tume pa Kristo ? Kasko shav si wo ? " Won phende leske , " O Shav le Davidosko . "

text: He saith unto them , How then doth David in spirit call him Lord , saying ,
text2: O Jesus phendias lenge , " Sar , antunchi o David kana sas O Swunto Duxo pe leste akhardias les , ' Gazda ? ' " phendias ,

text: The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool ?
text2: " O gazda phendia murhe gazdaske : ' Besh ka murho chacho vas , zhi pon thav che duzhmanon tela che punrhe . ' "

text: If David then call him Lord , how is he his son ?
text2: Teala o David akharel les , " Gazda , " Sar si lesko shav ?

text: And no man was able to answer him a word , neither durst any man from that day forth ask him any more questions .
text2: Chi iek nashti phendias leske iek vorba , ai pala kodia chi mai tromaile te phushen les kaver divanuria .

text: Then spake Jesus to the multitude , and to his disciples ,
text2: Antunchi O Jesus phendia le narodoske ai peske disiplonge ,

text: Saying , The scribes and the Pharisees sit in Moses ' seat :
text2: " Le Gramnoturia ai le Farizeanuria thodepe ando than le Mosesosko .

text: All therefore whatsoever they bid you observe , that observe and do ; but do not ye after their works : for they say , and do not .
text2: Keren so mothon ai sikaven tumen : numa na keren sar lende , ke won sikaven tumen numa chi keren so sikaven .

text: For they bind heavy burdens and grievous to be borne , and lay them on men ' s shoulders ; but they themselves will not move them with one of their fingers .
text2: Thon pharipe pel dume le manushenge , numa won chi mangen te vazden ek nai .

text: But all their works they do for to be seen of men : they make broad their phylacteries , and enlarge the borders of their garments ,
text2: Ai won so godi keren keren kashte te dikhen le manush pe lende . Phiraven E Vorba le Devleski pe pengo shero ai pengo vas , ai lunzharen le chukuria ka penge tsalia !

text: And love the uppermost rooms at feasts , and the chief seats in the synagogues ,
text2: Ai drago lenge te beshen ka shero la skafidiako kal pachiva , ai le mai lashe skamina ande synagogue .

text: And greetings in the markets , and to be called of men , Rabbi , Rabbi .
text2: Ai drago lenge te den le dies lasho pel vulitsi , ai te mothon lenge le manush , " Rabbi "

text: But be not ye called Rabbi : for one is your Master , even Christ ; and all ye are brethren .
text2: " Na roden te akharen tume " Rabbi " ke iek si tumaro gazda , " O Kristo " ai tume san sa phral .

text: And call no man your father upon the earth : for one is your Father , which is in heaven .
text2: Na phenen kanikaske pe phuv " Murho Dat " . Ke iek ferdi si tumaro Dat kodo kai si ando rhaio .

text: Neither be ye called masters : for one is your Master , even Christ .
text2: Na roden te akharen tume " Baro " , ke iek si tumaro " Baro " , " O Kristo " .

text: But he that is greatest among you shall be your servant .
text2: " O mai baro mashkar tumende trobul te avel tumari sluga .

text: And whosoever shall exalt himself shall be abased ; and he that shall humble himself shall be exalted .
text2: Kon godi bariarelape si te avel teliardo , ai kon godi mekelape tele si te avel vazdino .

text: But woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye shut up the kingdom of heaven against men : for ye neither go in yourselves , neither suffer ye them that are entering to go in .
text2: " Nasul tumenge , Gramnoturia ai Farizeanuria ! Tume manush kai ankerdion so chi san ! Ke tume phandaven le manushenge , e amperetsia le rhaioski , tume chi zhan andre , ai chi meken te zhan andre kodola kai mangen te zhan andre !

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayer : therefore ye shall receive the greater damnation .
text2: Nasul tumenge , Gramnoturia ai Farizeanuria Tume manush kai ankerdion so chi san ! Ke tume xan le phivliange khera , ai rhugin tume lungo rhugimos , te miazol ke lashe san ! Anda kodia si te pherel mai phari kris pe tumende !

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye compass sea and land to make one proselyte , and when he is made , ye make him twofold more the child of hell than yourselves .
text2: Nasul tumenge , Gramnoturia ai Farizeanuria ! Tume manush kai ankerdion so chi san ! Tume phiren pe swako rig la phuviake ai pe maria te nirin ai te parhuven iekes manushes ; antunchi , keren anda leste duvar mai but shav iadosko sar tume !

text: Woe unto you , ye blind guides , which say , Whosoever shall swear by the temple , it is nothing ; but whosoever shall swear by the gold of the temple , he is a debtor !
text2: " Nasul tumenge , tume korhe kai ningeren le korhen ! Tume phenen , " Kon godi solaxala pe tamplo , kodia nai khanchi ; numa kon godi solaxala po sumnakai kai si ande tamplo , kodo phanglo lo ka peske solax ! "

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gold , or the temple that sanctifieth the gold ?
text2: Tume prosti ai korhe manush ! So si mai baro , o sumnakai vai e tamplo kai swuntsol o sumnakai ?

text: And , Whosoever shall swear by the altar , it is nothing ; but whosoever sweareth by the gift that is upon it , he is guilty .
text2: Ai kon godi solaxala po altari , kodia nai khanchi , numa kon godi solaxala pe soste si shinado po altari , phanglo lo ka peske solax .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gift , or the altar that sanctifieth the gift ?
text2: Tume prosti ai korhe manush ! So si mai baro , so si shinado po altari vai o altari kai swuntsol so si shinado po altari ?

text: Whoso therefore shall swear by the altar , sweareth by it , and by all things thereon .
text2: Kon godi solaxal po altari , solaxal po altari ai pe soste godi si po altari .

text: And whoso shall swear by the temple , sweareth by it , and by him that dwelleth therein .
text2: Ai kodo kai solaxal pe tamplo , solaxal vi pe tamplo ai po Del kai si ande tamplo .

text: And he that shall swear by heaven , sweareth by the throne of God , and by him that sitteth thereon .
text2: Ai kodo kai solaxal po rhaio , solaxal vi po skamin le Devlesko ai po Del kai beshel pe leste .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye pay tithe of mint and anise and cummin , and have omitted the weightier matters of the law , judgment , mercy , and faith : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: " Nasul tumenge , Gramnoturia ai Farizeanuria ! Tume manush kai ankerdion so chi san ! Ke tume den desh anda iek shel e partia kai trobun te den andai mai tsinorhi diela , Mint , Dill , ai Cummin , numa chi keren so si mai baro ando zakono . So si vorta , Mila ; ai Pachamos .

text: Ye blind guides , which strain at a gnat , and swallow a camel .
text2: Tume korhe kai sikaven kavren ! Tume arakhen tume kaste te na nakhaven tsintsari , numa e gemula nakhavel !

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye make clean the outside of the cup and of the platter , but within they are full of extortion and excess .
text2: " Nasul tumenge , tume Gramnoturia ai Farizeanuria ! Tume manush kai ankerdion so chi san ! Ke tume vuzharen avrial e kuchi ai o tiari , numa andral san pherde chorimos , atsaimos ai keren so si tumenge mishto .

text: Thou blind Pharisee , cleanse first that which is within the cup and platter , that the outside of them may be clean also .
text2: Tume korhe Farizeanuria ! Vuzharen andral mai anglal e kuchi ai o tiari , kashte te avel vuzho vi avrial !

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are like unto whited sepulchres , which indeed appear beautiful outward , but are within full of dead men ' s bones , and of all uncleanness .
text2: " Nasul tumenge , Gramnoturia ai Farizeanuria ! Tume manush kai ankerdion so chi san ! Tume san sar greposhevuria vusharade , ai kerde te miazon shukar avrial , numa andral pherde mule manushenge kokala ai so godi nai vuzho .

text: Even so ye also outwardly appear righteous unto men , but within ye are full of hypocrisy and iniquity .
text2: Sakadia vi tume avrial miazon vorta le manushenge , numa andral bezexale san ai chi san so keren te miazon .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! because ye build the tombs of the prophets , and garnish the sepulchres of the righteous ,
text2: " Nasul tumenge , Gramnoturia ai Farizeanuria ! Tume manush kai ankerdion so chi san ! Ke tume thon le murmunturia le profetonge , ai shukaren le greposhevuria manushenge kai sas chache ;

text: And say , If we had been in the days of our fathers , we would not have been partakers with them in the blood of the prophets .
text2: ai phenen , " Te traiisardiamas andel diesa amare dadenge ai paponge , nas te mudaras le profeton sar kerde won .

text: Wherefore ye be witnesses unto yourselves , that ye are the children of them which killed the prophets .
text2: Ke mothon kadia san marturis tumenge ke san shave kodolenge kai mudarde le profeton !

text: Fill ye up then the measure of your fathers .
text2: Tume geton so tumare dada thodepe de anda gor te keren !

text: Ye serpents , ye generation of vipers , how can ye escape the damnation of hell ?
text2: Tume sap , tume vitsa sapenge ! Sar skepina e kris kai tradela tume ando iado ?

text: Wherefore , behold , I send unto you prophets , and wise men , and scribes : and some of them ye shall kill and crucify ; and some of them shall ye scourge in your synagogues , and persecute them from city to city :
text2: " Anda kodia tradav tumenge profeturia ai manush kai haliaren ai le manush kai sikaven ; uni anda lende mudaren ai thona po trushul , avren si te maren bichonsa ande tumare synagoguria , ai chinuina le foro forestar .

text: That upon you may come all the righteous blood shed upon the earth , from the blood of righteous Abel unto the blood of Zacharias son of Barachias , whom ye slew between the temple and the altar .
text2: Kadia si te perel e dosh pe tumende pala sa o rat shordo ande lumia chache manushengo , de katar o rat le Abelosko o chacho , zhi ka rat le Zachariahosko , o shav le Barachiasesko , kai tume mudardian mashkar e tamplo ai o altari .

text: Verily I say unto you , All these things shall come upon this generation .
text2: O chachimos me mothav tumenge , sa e dosh si te perel pe kadia vitsa ! "

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , thou that killest the prophets , and stonest them which are sent unto thee , how often would I have gathered thy children together , even as a hen gathereth her chickens under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: " Jerusalem ! Jerusalem ! Kai mudaren le profeton ai kai shuden baxensa ande kodola kai si tumenge tradine ! Sodivar manglem te chidav che shaven , sar ek kaini kai chidel peske puion tela peske paka numa chi manglian .

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate .
text2: Eta so ashshilo tume tumari tamplo pusto .

text: For I say unto you , Ye shall not see me henceforth , till ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Me mothav tumenge , chi mai dikhena ma zhi pon chi mothona , Raduime kodo kai avel ando anav le Devlesko . "

text: And Jesus went out , and departed from the temple : and his disciples came to him for to shew him the buildings of the temple .
text2: O Jesus anklisto avri andai tamplo ai zhalastar , kana leske disipluria avile leste te sikaven leske sa e tamplo ai so godi sas ek partia andai tamplo .

text: And Jesus said unto them , See ye not all these things ? verily I say unto you , There shall not be left here one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Numa O Jesus phendias lenge , " O chachimos phenav tumenge , sa so dikhen avela pherado , chi ashela iek bax po kaver . "

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives , the disciples came unto him privately , saying , Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign of thy coming , and of the end of the world ?
text2: Sar beshelas tele pe plai le masilinenge , le disipluria avile leste korkorho , mothonas , " Phen amenge , kana kerdiolape kodia ? So avela o semno ke aves , ai ke getolpe e vriama ? "

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Take heed that no man deceive you .
text2: O Jesus phenel lenge , " Len tume sama , te na atsavel tume khonik .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Ke but avena ande murho anav , ai phenena , " Me sim o Kristo ! " ai atsavena buten .

text: And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars : see that ye be not troubled : for all these things must come to pass , but the end is not yet .
text2: Ai ashunena ke marenpe ai vieste kai marenpe , na daran : Ke kodia musai te kerdiol , numa nai inker o gor .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be famines , and pestilences , and earthquakes , in divers places .
text2: Iek them marelape aver themesa ; iek amperetsia marelape avria amperetsiasa . Ande but thana chi avela le dosta te xan , avela but naswalimos , ai ande but thana izdrala e phuv .

text: All these are the beginning of sorrows .
text2: Kadala avela le sumnuria ta anda gor le chinosko ai o nekazo kai si te avel .

text: Then shall they deliver you up to be afflicted , and shall kill you : and ye shall be hated of all nations for my name ' s sake .
text2: " Antunchi avela e vriama kai dena tume manush ando vas te aven chinuime , te mudaren tume , ai swako them si te vurhitsil tume ke phiraven murho anav .

text: And then shall many be offended , and shall betray one another , and shall hate one another .
text2: Ande kodia vriama si te durion katar o pachamos , si te purhin iek avres , si te vurhitsin iek avres .

text: And many false prophets shall rise , and shall deceive many .
text2: Avena but kai nai chache numa kerdion profeturia ai atsavena buten .

text: And because iniquity shall abound , the love of many shall wax cold .
text2: O nasulimos si te butiol , anda kodia bute manushenge dragostia si te shudrol .

text: But he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Numa kodo kai rhivdila ai ankerela zhando gor , avela skepime .

text: And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations ; and then shall the end come .
text2: " Ai kadia viasta e lashi pai amperetsia avela phendi ande sa e lumia te avel marturo sa le themenge , antunchi o gor avela . "

text: When ye therefore shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , stand in the holy place , ( whoso readeth , let him understand : )
text2: " Kana dikhena kodia kai si griatsa le Devleske ke si ando swunto than sar sas phendo katar o profeto Daniel . ( Kodo kai jinel , mek te haliarel )

text: Then let them which be in Judaea flee into the mountains :
text2: Antunchi kodola kai si ande Judea trobula te nashen andel plaia .

text: Let him which is on the housetop not come down to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Kodo kai avela opral pa kher te na zhal te lel vari so anda pesko kher .

text: Neither let him which is in the field return back to take his clothes .
text2: Kodo kai si ande niva te na zhal palpale te lel peske tsalia .

text: And woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: Nasul la zhuvliake kai si phari glatasa , ai kodola kai si le glate pe chuchi ande kodola dies ! "

text: But pray ye that your flight be not in the winter , neither on the sabbath day :
text2: Rhugin tume te na avela ivend kana trobula te nashen , vai Sabat ;

text: For then shall be great tribulation , such as was not since the beginning of the world to this time , no , nor ever shall be .
text2: Ke antunchi si te avel ka savo chino ai nekazo , sar e lumia shoxar chi dikhlias , zhi akana ai shoxar chi mai dikhela .

text: And except those days should be shortened , there should no flesh be saved : but for the elect ' s sake those days shall be shortened .
text2: Ai te na avino kodola dies skurtiarde ; sa le manush kamas te xaiin . Numa pala e sama le manushenge kai si halome katar O Del , kodola diesa si te aven skurtiarde .

text: Then if any man shall say unto you , Lo , here is Christ , or there ; believe it not .
text2: " Antunchi te avela vari kon te mothol tuke " O Kristo avilo ! " " Katka lo " vai " Kote lo " Na Pacha .

text: For there shall arise false Christs , and false prophets , and shall shew great signs and wonders ; insomuch that , if it were possible , they shall deceive the very elect .
text2: Ke si te vazdenpe xoxamne kristuria ai xoxamne profeturia ; kai kerena kasave semnuria ai mirakluria , ta te sai kamas te atsaven vi kodolen kai si halome katar O Del .

text: Behold , I have told you before .
text2: " Ashunen ! Phendem tumenge mai anglal .

text: Wherefore if they shall say unto you , Behold , he is in the desert ; go not forth : behold , he is in the secret chambers ; believe it not .
text2: Te mothona , " Dikhen , avilo . Ande pusta lo ! Na zha ta rode ; vai kote garado lo ! Na paa . "

text: For as the lightning cometh out of the east , and shineth even unto the west ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Ke sar o rhunjito kai strefial anda Easto zhi ando Westo kadia si te avel kana O Shav le manushesko avela .

text: For wheresoever the carcase is , there will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Kai godi avela mulo stato kote chidenpe chiriklia kai xan mas . "

text: Immediately after the tribulation of those days shall the sun be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light , and the stars shall fall from heaven , and the powers of the heavens shall be shaken :
text2: " Numa strazo pala o chino ai o nekazo kodole diesengo o kham si te avel tuniariko , o shunuto chi dela vediara , le chererhaia perena anda cheri , ai e putiera kai si ando cheri avena drenchinime .

text: And then shall appear the sign of the Son of man in heaven : and then shall all the tribes of the earth mourn , and they shall see the Son of man coming in the clouds of heaven with power and great glory .
text2: Antunchi dichola o semno ando cheri ke O Shav le Manushesko avel . Antunchi sa le vitsi pe phuv si te nekezhin , ai si te dikhen sar O Shav le Manushesko avel pel nuveria rhaioske ande putiera ai ando barimos .

text: And he shall send his angels with a great sound of a trumpet , and they shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from one end of heaven to the other .
text2: E tutaraza bashela zurales , ai tradela peske angelon ai si te chiden leske halome andal shtar barvalia , ai de anda iek gor la lumiako ai le cheresko zhando kaver gor .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When his branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is nigh :
text2: Sichon katar e paramicha pai pruing le figenge . Kana si terne le krenzhitsi ai anklen patria . Zhanes ke o milai pashe .

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall see all these things , know that it is near , even at the doors .
text2: Sakadia , tume kana dikhena sa kadala dieli zhanen ke pashe lo , ka wudar lo .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass , till all these things be fulfilled .
text2: Chachimasa phenav tumenge , kadia vitsa chi nakhela , zhi pon chi kerdion kadala dieli .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away , but my words shall not pass away .
text2: O rhaio ai e lumia nakhena , numa murhi vorba shoxar chi nakhela .

text: But of that day and hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels of heaven , but my Father only .
text2: " Khonik chi zhanel kana avela kodo dies vai kodo chaso , chi le angeluria ando rhaio , chi O Shav ; ferdi O Dat zhanel .

text: But as the days of Noe were , so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: " Sar sas ando dies kana sas o Noah . Sakadia si te avel kana avela O Shav le Manushesko .

text: For as in the days that were before the flood they were eating and drinking , marrying and giving in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark ,
text2: Sar kai sas ande kodola dies mai anglal sar te avel o pai te tasavel e lumia , le manush xanas , penas , lenas boria , denas sheia , zhi po dies kai o Noah gelo ando paraxodo ( Ark ) .

text: And knew not until the flood came , and took them all away ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Ai chi zhangle zhi pon chi avilo o pai ai lias le sa . Sakadia avela kana avela O Shav le Manushesko .

text: Then shall two be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: " Antunchi dui zhene si te aven ande niva ; iek si te avel lino , ai iek ashela .

text: Two women shall be grinding at the mill ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Dui zhuvlia licharena jiv ; iek avela lini , ai iek ashela .

text: Watch therefore : for ye know not what hour your Lord doth come .
text2: Anda kodia arakh tu , ke chi zhanes o dies kai cho Gazda avela .

text: But know this , that if the goodman of the house had known in what watch the thief would come , he would have watched , and would not have suffered his house to be broken up .
text2: Haliaren , te zhanglino o gazda le kheresko ka che chaso la rachako avel o chor , kamas te arkhelpe ai nas te mekel te den andre ande lesko kher .

text: Therefore be ye also ready : for in such an hour as ye think not the Son of man cometh .
text2: Anda kodia , vi tu , trobul te aves gata ke O Shav le Manushesko si te avel andek chaso kai tu chi gindis . "

text: Who then is a faithful and wise servant , whom his lord hath made ruler over his household , to give them meat in due season ?
text2: Kon si o chacho ai gojaver sluga , kai o gazda thodias te lel sama ande lesko kher te pravarel le lengo xabe pe vriama kai trobul ?

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Raduime kodia sluga , kai lesko gazda arakhela les ke kerel peski buchi kana avela palpale .

text: Verily I say unto you , That he shall make him ruler over all his goods .
text2: O chachimos phenach tuke , si te thol les baro pe so godi si les .

text: But and if that evil servant shall say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ;
text2: Numa te avela nasul kodia sluga ai te phenel peske , " Chi avel palpale sigo murho gazda . "

text: And shall begin to smite his fellowservants , and to eat and drink with the drunken ;
text2: Antunchi marel le kavre slugen ai tholpe te xal ai te pel macharnensa .

text: The lord of that servant shall come in a day when he looketh not for him , and in an hour that he is not aware of ,
text2: O gazda kodola slugako si te avel andek dies kai wo chi azhukerel les , ai andek chaso kai wo chi zhanel .

text: And shall cut him asunder , and appoint him his portion with the hypocrites : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Si te shinel les kotora , ai thol les kodolensa kai ankerdion so nai . Kotse le manush si te roven ai te chiden dandendar . "

text: Then shall the kingdom of heaven be likened unto ten virgins , which took their lamps , and went forth to meet the bridegroom .
text2: " Antunchi e amperetsia le rhaioski si sar desh sheia baria kai line peske lampi ( chediara ) ai gele po drom kai o ternaxar avelas .

text: And five of them were wise , and five were foolish .
text2: Pansh anda lende sas prosti ai pansh gojaver .

text: They that were foolish took their lamps , and took no oil with them :
text2: Le prosti kana line penge lampi , chi line vuloi pensa .

text: But the wise took oil in their vessels with their lamps .
text2: Numa le gojaver line mai but vuloi pensa de sar so sas andel lampi .

text: While the bridegroom tarried , they all slumbered and slept .
text2: Ke chi avilo o ternaxar pe vriama lindraile ai lias le e lindre .

text: And at midnight there was a cry made , Behold , the bridegroom cometh ; go ye out to meet him .
text2: Numa ando mashkar la rachako ek glaso dias mui , Dikhen ! O ternaxar , Aven leste !

text: Then all those virgins arose , and trimmed their lamps .
text2: Antunchi le sheia baria wushtile , ai lasharde peske lampi .

text: And the foolish said unto the wise , Give us of your oil ; for our lamps are gone out .
text2: Le prosti phende kodolenge kai sas gojaver . " Den ame anda tumaro vuloi ke amare lampi meren . "

text: But the wise answered , saying , Not so ; lest there be not enough for us and you : but go ye rather to them that sell , and buy for yourselves .
text2: Le gojaver phende , " Nashtis , ke kam chi avel dosta tumenge ai vi amenge , zhan ka kodola kai bichinen vuloi ai chinen tumenge .

text: And while they went to buy , the bridegroom came ; and they that were ready went in with him to the marriage : and the door was shut .
text2: Numa zhi pon won gele te chinen vuloi , o ternaxar avilo ; le sheia baria kai sas gata gele lesa andre ka o abiav ai o wudar sas phandado .

text: Afterward came also the other virgins , saying , Lord , Lord , open to us .
text2: Mai palal le kolaver sheia baria avile , ai phende , " Gazda , Gazda ! Phuter amenge ! "

text: But he answered and said , Verily I say unto you , I know you not .
text2: Numa wo phendias , " Chachimasa phenav tumenge , me chi zhanav tumen . "

text: Watch therefore , for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh .
text2: Anda kodia arakhen tume , ke chi zhanen o dies vai o chaso kana O Shav le Manushesko avela . "

text: For the kingdom of heaven is as a man travelling into a far country , who called his own servants , and delivered unto them his goods .
text2: " Ke kadia si sar ek manush kai si te zhaltar dur , ai akhardias peske slugen , ai dias ande lengo vas so sas lesko .

text: And unto one he gave five talents , to another two , and to another one ; to every man according to his several ability ; and straightway took his journey .
text2: Kai iek dias panzh gone sumnakai , ka aver dias dui , ai ka aver dias iek , swakones dias sode wo sai dashtil te lel sama , ai gelo pe pesko drom .

text: Then he that had received the five talents went and traded with the same , and made them other five talents .
text2: Kodo kai lias panzh gone sumnakai , strazo gelo , kerdias buchi lensa , ai dobisardias panzh gone sumnakai mai but .

text: And likewise he that had received two , he also gained other two .
text2: Sakadia kodo kai lias dui , gelo ai dobisardias dui mai but .

text: But he that had received one went and digged in the earth , and hid his lord ' s money .
text2: Numa kodo kai lias iek gono sumnakai , gelo , hunadias gropa ande phuv , ai garadias pesko gazdasko sumnakai .

text: After a long time the lord of those servants cometh , and reckoneth with them .
text2: But vriama pala kodia o gazda kodole slugenge avilo palpale , ai manglias te sikaven leske so kerde .

text: And so he that had received five talents came and brought other five talents , saying , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me five talents : behold , I have gained beside them five talents more .
text2: Kodo kai lias panzh gone sumnakai , avilo ai andias panzh mai but , ai phendias , " Gazda , tu dian ma panzh gone sumnakai . Dikh ! Me dobisardem panzh mai but . "

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , thou good and faithful servant : thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: Lesko gazda phendias leske , " Mishto kerdian , lasho ai chacho sluga chachimasa sanas , xantsi dielasa si te thav tut baro pe but dieli , aidi ai hulav ande che gazdasko raduimos ! "

text: He also that had received two talents came and said , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me two talents : behold , I have gained two other talents beside them .
text2: Kodo kai lias dui gone sumnakai avilo , ai phendias , " Gazda , Tu dian ma dui . Dikh ! Me dobisardem dui mai but ! "

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , good and faithful servant ; thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: Lesko gazda phendias leske , " Mishto kerdian , lasho ai chacho sluga chachimasa sanas , xantsi dielasa si te thav tut baro pe but dieli , aidi ai hulav ande che gazdasko raduimos !

text: Then he which had received the one talent came and said , Lord , I knew thee that thou art an hard man , reaping where thou hast not sown , and gathering where thou hast not strawed :
text2: Kodo kai sas les iek gono sumnakai avilo ai phendias , " Gazda , Zhanglem ke zuralo ai trutno manush san , ke les katar chi thodian ai chides katar chi thodian sumuntsa .

text: And I was afraid , and went and hid thy talent in the earth : lo , there thou hast that is thine .
text2: Ai darailem , gelem ai garadem cho sumnakai ande phuv , Dikh ! Si tu so si chiro . "

text: His lord answered and said unto him , Thou wicked and slothful servant , thou knewest that I reap where I sowed not , and gather where I have not strawed :
text2: Lesko gazda phendias leske , " Tu nasul kandino sluga , tu zhanglian ke lav katar chi thodem ai chidav katar chi thodem sumuntsa . "

text: Thou oughtest therefore to have put my money to the exchangers , and then at my coming I should have received mine own with usury .
text2: Antunchi tu trobulas te thos murho sumnakai ando banko , ai kana avilemas , sas te lav murho sumnakai palpale , ai vi mai but .

text: Take therefore the talent from him , and give it unto him which hath ten talents .
text2: Anda kodia le o sumnakai lestar , ai de les ka kodo kai si les le desh gone sumnakai .

text: For unto every one that hath shall be given , and he shall have abundance : but from him that hath not shall be taken away even that which he hath .
text2: Ke swakones te kai si mai but avela dino ai si te avel les but mai but opral : numa katar kodo kai nai les , vi so si les avela lino lestar .

text: And cast ye the unprofitable servant into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: E sluga kai nai kanchesko shuden avri ando tuniariko ai ande kodo than kai rovena ai chiden dandendar . "

text: When the Son of man shall come in his glory , and all the holy angels with him , then shall he sit upon the throne of his glory :
text2: " Kana avela O Shav le Manushesko ande pesko barimos , ai sa le angeluria lesa , antunchi beshela pe pesko skamin o amperatitsko .

text: And before him shall be gathered all nations : and he shall separate them one from another , as a shepherd divideth his sheep from the goats :
text2: Angla leste avena chidine sa le thema , ai hulavela le manushen iek katar o kaver sar o pastuxo , hulavel le bakren katar le buzhne .

text: And he shall set the sheep on his right hand , but the goats on the left .
text2: Ai thola le bakren pe peski chachi rig , ai le buzhnen pe peski stingo rig .

text: Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand , Come , ye blessed of my Father , inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world :
text2: Antunchi o amperato si te mothol kodolenge ka lesko vas o chacho , " Aven tume kai san raduime katar murho Dat , len so sas tumenge shinado e amperetsia kai sas getome tumenge de sar sas e lumia kerdi .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me drink : I was a stranger , and ye took me in :
text2: Ke bokhalo simas , ai dian ma te xav , trushalo simas , ai dian ma te piiva : streino simas , ai andian ma ande cho kher .

text: Naked , and ye clothed me : I was sick , and ye visited me : I was in prison , and ye came unto me .
text2: Nas ma tsalia , ai tu dian ma tsalia , naswalo simas , ai lian sama mandar , phandado simas , ai tu avilian te dikhes ma . "

text: Then shall the righteous answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , and fed thee ? or thirsty , and gave thee drink ?
text2: Antunchi le chache phenena leske , " Gazda , Kana dikhliam tu bokhalo , ai diam tu te xas ? Vai trushalo , ai diam tu te pes ?

text: When saw we thee a stranger , and took thee in ? or naked , and clothed thee ?
text2: Kana dikhliam tu streino , ai andiam tut andre ? Vai ke trobunas tut tsalia , ai diam tut ?

text: Or when saw we thee sick , or in prison , and came unto thee ?
text2: Kana dikhliam tut naswalo , vai phandado , ai aviliam te dikhas tu ? "

text: And the King shall answer and say unto them , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren , ye have done it unto me .
text2: Ai o amperato phenela , " O chachimos phenav tumenge , so godi kerdian kodoleske kai si mai prosto anda murho phral , kerdian mange . "

text: Then shall he say also unto them on the left hand , Depart from me , ye cursed , into everlasting fire , prepared for the devil and his angels :
text2: Antunchi phenel kodolenge ka lesko stingo vas , " Zhantar mandar , tume armandine , ande iag kai chi getolpe , kai si getome le bengeske ai leske angelonge .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me no meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me no drink :
text2: Bokhalo simas , ai chi dian ma te xav , trushalo simas , ai tu chi dian ma te piiav .

text: I was a stranger , and ye took me not in : naked , and ye clothed me not : sick , and in prison , and ye visited me not .
text2: Streino simas , ai chi akhardian ma andre , nas ma tsalia , ai chi dian ma , naswalo , phandado , ai tu chi avilian te dikhes ma . "

text: Then shall they also answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , or athirst , or a stranger , or naked , or sick , or in prison , and did not minister unto thee ?
text2: Antunchi won phenen , " Gazda , kana dikhliam tut bokhalo , vai trushalo , vai streino , vai bi tsalengo , vai naswalo , vai phandado , ai chi zhutisardem tu ? "

text: Then shall he answer them , saying , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye did it not to one of the least of these , ye did it not to me .
text2: Antunchi phendia lenge , " O chachimos phenav tumenge , sar chi kerdian le mai prostonenge , chi kerdian chi mange .

text: And these shall go away into everlasting punishment : but the righteous into life eternal .
text2: Antunchi zhana ande iag kai chi getolpe , numa le chache ando traio kai chi getolpe .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had finished all these sayings , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Kana O Jesus getosardias sa so sas te phenel , phendias peske disiplonge .

text: Ye know that after two days is the feast of the passover , and the Son of man is betrayed to be crucified .
text2: " Tume zhanen ke pa dui dies o dies o baro le Zhidovongo , ai O Shav le Manushesko avela dino ando vas te thon les po trushul . "

text: Then assembled together the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders of the people , unto the palace of the high priest , who was called Caiaphas ,
text2: Antunchi le rasha le bare , ai le Gramnoturia , ai le phure kai poronchinas po them , chidinisaile ande bar ka o Caiaphas , o rashai o baro .

text: And consulted that they might take Jesus by subtilty , and kill him .
text2: Ai denas pe duma sar sai atsaven le Jesusos te thon o vas pe leste , ai te mudaren les .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar among the people .
text2: Numa phende , " Nashti avel po dies o baro ke kam buntuilpe o them . "

text: Now when Jesus was in Bethany , in the house of Simon the leper ,
text2: Kana O Jesus sas ando Bethani , ando kher ka Simon o lepra .

text: There came unto him a woman having an alabaster box of very precious ointment , and poured it on his head , as he sat at meat .
text2: Iek zhuvli avili leste ai andias o mai kuchi duxi , sar beshelas ka e skafidi , shordias les pe lesko shero .

text: But when his disciples saw it , they had indignation , saying , To what purpose is this waste ?
text2: Kana dikhle le disipluria , nas lenge mishto , ai phushenas , " Sostar kerdias kasavi zida ?

text: For this ointment might have been sold for much , and given to the poor .
text2: Kado duxi sai avilino bichindo pe but love , ai le love dine kal chorhe . "

text: When Jesus understood it , he said unto them , Why trouble ye the woman ? for she hath wrought a good work upon me .
text2: O Jesus haliardias , ai phendias lenge , " Sostar dosharen kadala zhuvlia ? Ke so woi kerdias mange si de sa shukar diela .

text: For ye have the poor always with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Le chorhe sagda avena tumensa , numa me chi avava tumensa sagda .

text: For in that she hath poured this ointment on my body , she did it for my burial .
text2: Kana shordias kado duxi pe murho stato , woi kerdias kodia te getol ma pe murho gropomos .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached in the whole world , there shall also this , that this woman hath done , be told for a memorial of her .
text2: O chachimos phenav tumenge , kai godi kadia viasta lashi avela phendi ande sa e lumia , so woi kerdias mange si te avel phendo te denpe goji late . "

text: Then one of the twelve , called Judas Iscariot , went unto the chief priests ,
text2: Antunchi iek andal desh u dui kai bushelas Judas Iscariot , gelo kal le bare rasha ,

text: And said unto them , What will ye give me , and I will deliver him unto you ? And they covenanted with him for thirty pieces of silver .
text2: ai phushlias le , " Sode den ma , te dava les ande tumaro vas ? Ashshile lesa pe trenda kotora rup .

text: And from that time he sought opportunity to betray him .
text2: De katar kodia vriama rodias sar te del les ando vas .

text: Now the first day of the feast of unleavened bread the disciples came to Jesus , saying unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare for thee to eat the passover ?
text2: Po pervo andal jesa le bare kai xanas manrho kai nai puchardo , le disipluria avile ka Jesus , ai phushle , " Kai manges te getosaras tuke te xas o dies o baro le Zhidovongo ? "

text: And he said , Go into the city to such a man , and say unto him , The Master saith , My time is at hand ; I will keep the passover at thy house with my disciples .
text2: Wo phendias , " Zhan ando foro ka kutari , ai phenen leske , ' O gazda phenel , murhi vriama pashe , kerav O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo ka chiro kher murhe disiplonsa . ' "

text: And the disciples did as Jesus had appointed them ; and they made ready the passover .
text2: Le disipluria kerde so Jesus phendias lenge , ai getosarde O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo .

text: Now when the even was come , he sat down with the twelve .
text2: Kana peli e riat beshlo kai skafidi le desh u do disiplonsa .

text: And as they did eat , he said , Verily I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Ai sar hanas , wo phendias , " O chachimos phenav tumenge , iek anda tumende si te purhin ma . "

text: And they were exceeding sorrowful , and began every one of them to say unto him , Lord , is it I ?
text2: Nekezhisaile zurales , ai iek pala avreste phushenas , " Gazda , dar me sim ? "

text: And he answered and said , He that dippeth his hand with me in the dish , the same shall betray me .
text2: Wo phendias , " Kodo kai xal mansa anda tiari , si te purhil man . "

text: The Son of man goeth as it is written of him : but woe unto that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! it had been good for that man if he had not been born .
text2: O Shav le Manushesko avela kerdo lesa sar sas ramome pa leste . Numa nasul avela kodoleske kai purhila le Shaves le Manushesko ! Mai mishto avilino leske te na arakhadilo sas .

text: Then Judas , which betrayed him , answered and said , Master , is it I ? He said unto him , Thou hast said .
text2: O Judas kai purhisardia les , phushlias , " Me sim , gazda ? " O Jesus phendias leske , " Tu phendian . "

text: And as they were eating , Jesus took bread , and blessed it , and brake it , and gave it to the disciples , and said , Take , eat ; this is my body .
text2: Sar xanas , O Jesus lias manrho , ai swuntsosardias les , phaglias les , ai dias les kal disipluria , ai phendias , " Len , xan , kado si murho stato .

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and gave it to them , saying , Drink ye all of it ;
text2: Lias e kuchi , dias naisimos , ai dias lende , ai phendias , " Pen , sa tume .

text: For this is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many for the remission of sins .
text2: Ke kado si murho rat . O nevo kontrakto , shordo te pochinel anda o bezex butengo . "

text: But I say unto you , I will not drink henceforth of this fruit of the vine , until that day when I drink it new with you in my Father ' s kingdom .
text2: Phenav tumenge , Chi mai piiava andai fruta le struguroski , de akana ai zhi po dies kai piiava andai e nevi fruta tumensa ande murhi Dadeski amperetsia .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Kana jilabavde iek jili , gele pe plai le masilinengi .

text: Then saith Jesus unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep of the flock shall be scattered abroad .
text2: O Jesus phendias lenge , " Ariat sa si te meken ma palal so kerdiolape mange , ke ramome , ' Dava dab le pastuxos ai le bakre , si te rhispinpe . '

text: But after I am risen again , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Kana zhuvindiva andai martia , si te zhav mai anglal tumendar ande Galilee . "

text: Peter answered and said unto him , Though all men shall be offended because of thee , yet will I never be offended .
text2: O Petri phendias , " Vi te mekena tu sa , pala so kerdiolape tusa , me shoxar chi mekava tut ! "

text: Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this night , before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: O Jesus phendias leske , " O chachimos phenav tuke , kadia riat mai anglal sar o kurkorsho te bashel , tu si te mothos trivar ke chi zhanes ma . "

text: Peter said unto him , Though I should die with thee , yet will I not deny thee . Likewise also said all the disciples .
text2: O Petri dias mui , " Vi te trobula te merav tusa , me shoxar chi phenava ke chi zhanav tut , " ai sa le disipluria phende sakadia .

text: Then cometh Jesus with them unto a place called Gethsemane , and saith unto the disciples , Sit ye here , while I go and pray yonder .
text2: Antunchi gelo peske disiplonsa ka o than kai bushol Gethsemande , ai phendias lenge , " Beshen katka zhi pon zhav me mai inchal te rhugiv ma . "

text: And he took with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee , and began to be sorrowful and very heavy .
text2: Lias pesa o Petri ai le dui shave le Zebedoske , ai kote avilo pe leste pharipe nekazo ai chinuilas .

text: Then saith he unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful , even unto death : tarry ye here , and watch with me .
text2: Antunchi phendias lenge , " Haliarav ande murho duxo de sa pharo nekazo , zhi kai martia , beshen katka , beshen wushtiarde mansa . "

text: And he went a little further , and fell on his face , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if it be possible , let this cup pass from me : nevertheless not as I will , but as thou wilt .
text2: Gelo tsirha mai angle , shudiaspe tele mosa pe phuv , ai rhugisailo , " Murho Dat , te sai mek te nakhel kadia kuchi mandar ; numa na murhi voia , chiri voia te avel kerdi . "

text: And he cometh unto the disciples , and findeth them asleep , and saith unto Peter , What , could ye not watch with me one hour ?
text2: Antunchi avilo palpale ka peske disipluria , ai arakhlias le ke soven , phendias le Petresko , " So nashtisardian tume te len sama mansa iek chaso ?

text: Watch and pray , that ye enter not into temptation : the spirit indeed is willing , but the flesh is weak .
