text2: Numa len sama tumendar : kai dena tume manush ando vas te aven chinuime , ai marena tume andel synagogue : ai tume avena line angla le bare le foroske ai le amperetoske pala murho anav . Phenen lenge pa mande .

text: And the gospel must first be published among all nations .
text2: Ai kadia le viasta lashi pai amperetsia avela phendi ande sa e lumia .

text: But when they shall lead you , and deliver you up , take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak , neither do ye premeditate : but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour , that speak ye : for it is not ye that speak , but the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ai akana astaren tume , ai lena tume kal le bare la krisako . Na daran mai anglal pa so te phenen , kana avela e vriama dava tume le vorbi . Ke tume chi den duma numa O Swunto Duxo .

text: Now the brother shall betray the brother to death , and the father the son ; and children shall rise up against their parents , and shall cause them to be put to death .
text2: Akana o phral si te purhila lesko phral te avela mudardo , ai o dat purhila peske shaven ; ai le shave purhina penge daden ai deian te avena mudarde .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Savorhe vurhitsina tu pala murho anav : numa kodo kai rhivdila ai ankerela zhando gor avela skepime .

text: But when ye shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , standing where it ought not , ( let him that readeth understand , ) then let them that be in Judaea flee to the mountains :
text2: Kana dikhena kodia kai si griatsa le Devleske ke si ando swunto than sar sas phendo katar o profeto Daniel ( kodo kai jinel mek te haliarel ) . Antunchi kodola kai si ande Judea trobula te nashen andel plaia .

text: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house , neither enter therein , to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Ai kodo kai avela opral pa kher te na zhal te lel vari so anda pesko kher .

text: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment .
text2: Ai kodo kai si ande niva te na zhal palpale te lel peske tsalia .

text: But woe to them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: Nasul la zhuvliake kai si phari glatasa , ai kodola kai si le glate pe chuchi ande kodola dies .

text: And pray ye that your flight be not in the winter .
text2: Rhugin tume te na avel ivend kana trobul te nashen .

text: For in those days shall be affliction , such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time , neither shall be .
text2: Ke ande kodia vriama si te avel ka savo chino ai nekazo , de sar e lumia shoxar chi dikhlias zhi akana ai shoxar chi mai dikhela .

text: And except that the Lord had shortened those days , no flesh should be saved : but for the elect ' s sake , whom he hath chosen , he hath shortened the days .
text2: Ai te na avino kodola dies skurtiarde , sa le manush kamas te xaiin : numa pala e sama le manushenge kai si alome katar O Del kodola diesa si te aven skurtiarde .

text: And then if any man shall say to you , Lo , here is Christ ; or , lo , he is there ; believe him not :
text2: Antunchi te avela vari kon te mothol tuke , " O Kristo avilo ! " " Katka lo " vai " Kote lo " Na pacha .

text: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise , and shall shew signs and wonders , to seduce , if it were possible , even the elect .
text2: Ke si te vazdenpe xoxamne profeturia , kai kerena kasave semnuria ai mirakluria , ta te sai atsaven vi kodolen kai si alome katar O Del .

text: But take ye heed : behold , I have foretold you all things .
text2: Ashunen ! So phendem tumenge mai anglal .

text: But in those days , after that tribulation , the sun shall be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light ,
text2: " Strazo pala o chino ai o nekazo kodole diesengo o kham si te avel tuniariko , o shunuto chi dela vediara ,

text: And the stars of heaven shall fall , and the powers that are in heaven shall be shaken .
text2: le chererhaia perena anda cheri , ai e putiera kai si ando cheri avena drenchinime .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in the clouds with great power and glory .
text2: Antunchi dikhena O Shav le Manushesko avela pel nuveria ande putiera ai ando barimos .

text: And then shall he send his angels , and shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven .
text2: Ai tradela peske angelon , ai si te chiden leske alome andal shtar barvalia , ai de anda iek gor la lumiako ai le cheresko zhando kaver gor . "

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When her branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is near :
text2: Akana sichon ek paramichi pai pruing le figenge . Kana si terne le krenzhitsi , ai anklen patria , zhanes ke o milai pashe .

text: So ye in like manner , when ye shall see these things come to pass , know that it is nigh , even at the doors .
text2: Sakadia tume kana dikhena sa kadale dieli zhanen ke pashelo , ke wudarlo .

text: Verily I say unto you , that this generation shall not pass , till all these things be done .
text2: Chachimasa phenav tumenge , kadia vitsa chi nakhela , zhi pon chi kerdion kadala dieli .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: O rhaio ai e lumia nakhena , numa murhi vorba shoxar chi nakhela .

text: But of that day and that hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels which are in heaven , neither the Son , but the Father .
text2: Khonik chi zhanel kana avela kodo dies vai kodo chaso , chi le angeluria ando rhaio , chi O Shav , ferdi O Dat zhanel .

text: Take ye heed , watch and pray : for ye know not when the time is .
text2: " Arakhen tume , le sama ai rhugin tume , ke chi zhanen kana kerdiola .

text: For the Son of man is as a man taking a far journey , who left his house , and gave authority to his servants , and to every man his work , and commanded the porter to watch .
text2: Ke O Shav le Manushesko si sar ek manush kai phiravelas dur ando aver them , ai phendia lesko sluga te lel sama le kheresko , swako sluga sas les buchi te kerel . Wo dia trad kal wudartari te lel sama .

text: Watch ye therefore : for ye know not when the master of the house cometh , at even , or at midnight , or at the cockcrowing , or in the morning :
text2: Le sama tume : ke chi zhanen kana o gazda le kheresko avela palpale , kana perel o kham , vai e riat , vai kana wushtel o kham , vai diminiatsi .

text: Lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping .
text2: Wo sai avela strazo kana tume chi azhukeren les ai arakhel tume soven .

text: And what I say unto you I say unto all , Watch .
text2: Ai so phenav tumenge , phenav savorhenge : Le sama ! "

text: After two days was the feast of the passover , and of unleavened bread : and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft , and put him to death .
text2: Zhanen pa dui dies si O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo , ai le manrhe bi drozhdenge : ai le bare rasha , ai le Gramnoturia , denaspe duma sar te atsaven O Jesus ai te thon o vas pe leste , ai te mudaren les .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar of the people .
text2: Numa phende , " Nashti avel po dies o baro ka kam buntuilpe o them . "

text: And being in Bethany in the house of Simon the leper , as he sat at meat , there came a woman having an alabaster box of ointment of spikenard very precious ; and she brake the box , and poured it on his head .
text2: O Jesus sas ando foro Bethani ando kher ka Simon o lepra , iek zhuvli avili leste , ai andias e mai kuchi duxi , sar beshelas ka e skafidi , pharhadia e botela , ai shordias kodola duxuria pe lesko shero .

text: And there were some that had indignation within themselves , and said , Why was this waste of the ointment made ?
text2: Uni xoliale mashkar pende , ai phende , " Sostar kerdias kasavi zida ?

text: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence , and have been given to the poor . And they murmured against her .
text2: " Sai avilino bichindo mai but sar trin shela teliara , ai le love dine kal chorhe ! " Ai denas duma nasul pa late .

text: And Jesus said , Let her alone ; why trouble ye her ? she hath wrought a good work on me .
text2: O Jesus phendia , " Mek la trankilo ; Sostar dosharen kadala zhuvlia ? Ke so woi kerdias mange si de sa shukar diela .

text: For ye have the poor with you always , and whensoever ye will ye may do them good : but me ye have not always .
text2: Ke le chorhe sagda avena tumensa , ai vari kana kai mangen sai zhutin le : numa me chi avava tumensa sagda .

text: She hath done what she could : she is come aforehand to anoint my body to the burying .
text2: Kana shordias kado duxi pe murho stato , woi kerdias kodia te getol ma pe murho gropomos .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached throughout the whole world , this also that she hath done shall be spoken of for a memorial of her .
text2: Chachimos me phenav tumenge , kai godi kadia viasta lashi avela phendi ande sa e lumia , so woi kerdias mange si te avel phendo te denpe goji late . "

text: And Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve , went unto the chief priests , to betray him unto them .
text2: Antunchi iek andal desh u dui disipluria kai besholas Judas Iscariot , gelo kal le bare rasha , te purhila les lenge .

text: And when they heard it , they were glad , and promised to give him money . And he sought how he might conveniently betray him .
text2: Ai kana ashunde kadala vorbi , raduisaile , ai shinade te den les love . De katar kodia vriama o Judas rodias sar te del les ando vas .

text: And the first day of unleavened bread , when they killed the passover , his disciples said unto him , Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover ?
text2: Po pervo andal diesa le bare kai xanas manrho kai nai puchardo , le disipluria avile ka Jesus , ai phushle les , " Kai manges te getosaras tuke te xas O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo ? "

text: And he sendeth forth two of his disciples , and saith unto them , Go ye into the city , and there shall meet you a man bearing a pitcher of water : follow him .
text2: O Jesus tradia dui andal peske disiplonge , ai phendia lenge , " Zhan ando foro , kotse arakhena ieke manushes kai si les iek vaza paiesko ; len tume pala leste .

text: And wheresoever he shall go in , say ye to the goodman of the house , The Master saith , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: Kana wo zhal ando kher , phenen leske , " O gazda phenel , ' Kai e soba te kerav O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo ka chiro kher murhe disiplonsa ? ' "

text: And he will shew you a large upper room furnished and prepared : there make ready for us .
text2: Wo sikavela tumenge iek bari soba opre kai si swako fielo andre kotse , lasharen O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo .

text: And his disciples went forth , and came into the city , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Ai peske disipluria geletar , ai aresle ando foro , ai arakhle sa sar wo phendiasas lenge : ai won lasharde O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo .

text: And in the evening he cometh with the twelve .
text2: Kana pele e riat O Jesus beshlo kai skafidi le desh u dui disiponsa .

text: And as they sat and did eat , Jesus said , Verily I say unto you , One of you which eateth with me shall betray me .
text2: Ai sar xanas , O Jesus phendia , " Chachimasa , phenav tumenge , iek anda tumende si te purhin ma . "

text: And they began to be sorrowful , and to say unto him one by one , Is it I ? and another said , Is it I ?
text2: Nekezhisaile zurales , ai iek pala avreste phushenas , " Sim me ? " ai aver phendia , " Sim me ? " ai aver phendia , " Sim me ? "

text: And he answered and said unto them , It is one of the twelve , that dippeth with me in the dish .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Si iek andal desh u dui , kodo kai xal mansa anda tiari .

text: The Son of man indeed goeth , as it is written of him : but woe to that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! good were it for that man if he had never been born .
text2: O Shav le Manushesko avela kerdo lesa sar sas o ramome pa leste , numa nasul avela kodoleske ka purhila le Shaves le Manushesko ! Mai mishto avilino leske te na arakhadilo sas ! "

text: And as they did eat , Jesus took bread , and blessed , and brake it , and gave to them , and said , Take , eat : this is my body .
text2: Sar xanas , O Jesus lia manrho , ai dias naisimos , phaglia les , ai dia lende te xan , ai phendia lenge , " Len , xan , kado si murho stato . "

text: And he took the cup , and when he had given thanks , he gave it to them : and they all drank of it .
text2: Porme lias e kuchi , ai kana dia naisimos , ai dia lende ; ai savorhe pile .

text: And he said unto them , This is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many .
text2: Phendia lenge , " Kado si murho rat , o nevo kontrakto , shordo te pochinel anda bezex , ( rat kai chacharel e vortechia le Devleske ) .

text: Verily I say unto you , I will drink no more of the fruit of the vine , until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God .
text2: Chachimos phenav tumenge , chi mai piiava andai fruta le struguroski , de akana ai zhi po dies piiava andai e nevi fruta tumensa ande murhi Dadeski amperetsia .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Ai kana jilabade ek jeli , geletar pe plai le maslinenge .

text: And Jesus saith unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep shall be scattered .
text2: Ai O Jesus phendia lenge , " Ariat sa si te meken ma pala so kerdiolape mange , ke ramome ; " Dava dab le pastuxos , ai le bakre si te rhispinpe . "

text: But after that I am risen , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Kana zhuvindiva andai martia , si te zhav mai anglal tumendar ande Galilee . "

text: But Peter said unto him , Although all shall be offended , yet will not I .
text2: Numa o Petri phendia leske , " Vi te meken tu sa pala so kerdiolape , me shoxar chi mekava tut ! "

text: And Jesus saith unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this day , even in this night , before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Ai O Jesus phendia leske , " Chachimasa phenav tuke , ke kadia dies , e riat mai anglal sar o kurkorsho te bashel duvar , tu si te mothos trivar ke chi zhanes ma .

text: But he spake the more vehemently , If I should die with thee , I will not deny thee in any wise . Likewise also said they all .
text2: Numa o Petri dias mui , " Vi te trobula te merav tusa , me shoxar chi phenava ke chi zhanav tut . " Ai sa le disipluria phende sakadia .

text: And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane : and he saith to his disciples , Sit ye here , while I shall pray .
text2: Ai aresle ka o than kai bushol Gethsemane : ai phendia peske disiplonge , " Beshen katse zhi pon rhugiv ma . "

text: And he taketh with him Peter and James and John , and began to be sore amazed , and to be very heavy ;
text2: Porme lia pesa o Petri , o Iakov ai o Iovano , ai kote avilo pe leste pharipe nekazo ai chinuilas .

text: And saith unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful unto death : tarry ye here , and watch .
text2: Ai O Jesus phendia lenge , " Haliarav ande murho duxo de sa pharo nekazo , zhi kai martia , beshen katka , ai len sama . "

text: And he went forward a little , and fell on the ground , and prayed that , if it were possible , the hour might pass from him .
text2: Ai O Jesus tsirha mai angle , ai shudiaspe tele mosa pe phuv , ai rhugisailo . " Te dashtilpe , o chaso sai nakhel mandar . "

text: And he said , Abba , Father , all things are possible unto thee ; take away this cup from me : nevertheless not what I will , but what thou wilt .
text2: Ai phendia , " Abba Murho Dat , te sai mek te nakhel kadia kuchi mandar , numa na murhi , chiri voia te avel kerdi . "

text: And he cometh , and findeth them sleeping , and saith unto Peter , Simon , sleepest thou ? couldest not thou watch one hour ?
text2: Ai avilo , ai arakhlia le sovenas , ai phendia ka Petri , " O Simon , soves ? So nashtisardian te le sama mansa iek chaso ? "

text: Watch ye and pray , lest ye enter into temptation . The spirit truly is ready , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Le sama ai rhugis tu , te na peres ando zumaimos . O duxo mangel , numa o stato kovlo . "

text: And again he went away , and prayed , and spake the same words .
text2: Gelotar e duito data ai rhugisailo , phenelas sa kodola vorbi .

text: And when he returned , he found them asleep again , ( for their eyes were heavy , ) neither wist they what to answer him .
text2: Ai kana areslo palpale , arakhlias le sovenas , ke nashti ankerenas peske iakha phuterde . Ai chi zhanen so te phenen leske .

text: And he cometh the third time , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : it is enough , the hour is come ; behold , the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Ai wo avilo o trito data , ai phendia lenge , " Akana soven ai hodinin : si dosta , o chaso avilo , ashun , O Shav le Manushesko avela dino ando vas le bezexale manushengo .

text: Rise up , let us go ; lo , he that betrayeth me is at hand .
text2: Wushten , aventar , Dikhen , avel kodo kai dias ma ando vas . "

text: And immediately , while he yet spake , cometh Judas , one of the twelve , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and the scribes and the elders .
text2: Ai strazo , sar O Jesus delas duma , o Judas , iek andal desh u dui avilo , ai lesa avilo baro narodo sabiensa ai khashtensa . Tradine sas katar le bare rasha , le Gramnoturia , ai katar le phure ka pronchinas .

text: And he that betrayed him had given them a token , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he ; take him , and lead him away safely .
text2: Kodo kai dias les ando vas dias len ek semno , phendia , " Kodolen kai chumidava si o manush , astaren les ai len les . "

text: And as soon as he was come , he goeth straightway to him , and saith , Master , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Andak data gelo ka Jesus ai phendia leske , " Gazda , Gazda , " ai chumidia les .

text: And they laid their hands on him , and took him .
text2: Ai thode vas po Jesus ai phangle les .

text: And one of them that stood by drew a sword , and smote a servant of the high priest , and cut off his ear .
text2: Ai iek anda kodola kai sas le Kristosa , anzilo ai lias peski sabia , ai shindias tele o khan kodoleske kai sas sluga ka rashai o baro .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Are ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and with staves to take me ?
text2: Ai O Jesus phendia le narodosko , " Dar chor sim te avilian pala mande sabiensa ai khashtensa te astaren ma ?

text: I was daily with you in the temple teaching , and ye took me not : but the scriptures must be fulfilled .
text2: Swako dies simas tumensa ande tamplo te sicharav , ai chi thodian vas pe mande , numa sa kado kerdiilo kashte o ramomos le profetongo te pherdiol . "

text: And they all forsook him , and fled .
text2: Antunchi sa le disipluria mekle les , ai rhispisaile .

text: And there followed him a certain young man , having a linen cloth cast about his naked body ; and the young men laid hold on him :
text2: Ek terno manush lia pe pala leste , sas ferdi iek kotor poxtan pe leste . Won thode vas pe terno manush ,

text: And he left the linen cloth , and fled from them naked .
text2: ai meklia o kotor poxtan , ai rhispisailo sa nango .

text: And they led Jesus away to the high priest : and with him were assembled all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes .
text2: Ai ningerde O Jesus ka o baro rashai : kai sa le bare rasha , ai le phure kai poronchinas , ai le Gramnoturia chidinisaile .

text: And Peter followed him afar off , even into the palace of the high priest : and he sat with the servants , and warmed himself at the fire .
text2: O Petri liape pala leste de dural , zhi ka e bar la bare rashake ; ai beshlo tele le slugensa , ai tacholas pashai iag .

text: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death ; and found none .
text2: Le bare le rasha ai sa e Sanhedren ( e kris e bare ) rodenas te thon beda xoxamni po Jesus te shinen kris pe leste te mudaren les , ai chi arakhle .

text: For many bare false witness against him , but their witness agreed not together .
text2: Ke but manush avile angle te xoxavan pa leste , numa lenge vorbi nai iek fielo .

text: And there arose certain , and bare false witness against him , saying ,
text2: Uni wushtile opre te xoxaven pa leste , phende ,

text: We heard him say , I will destroy this temple that is made with hands , and within three days I will build another made without hands .
text2: " Ashundiam kado manush phenel , ' Man si e putiera te xaiin o tampla le Devleski kai le manush kerde le vastensa , ai ande trin dies vazdav aver le vastensa . " '

text: But neither so did their witness agree together .
text2: Swako manush phendia vari so aver fielo pa leste .

text: And the high priest stood up in the midst , and asked Jesus , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Ai o baro rashai wushtilo opre angla lende , ai phushlia katar O Jesus , phenelas , " Nai tu so te phenes pa kadia . " So phenen kadala manush pa tute ? "

text: But he held his peace , and answered nothing . Again the high priest asked him , and said unto him , Art thou the Christ , the Son of the Blessed ?
text2: Numa O Jesus chi phendia khanchi , mai iek data o baro rashai phushlia les , " Tu san O Kristo , O Shav le Swunto Devlesko ? "

text: And Jesus said , I am : and ye shall see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Ai O Jesus phendia leske , " Me sim : ai mai angle si te dikhen O Shav le Manushesko ka o vas o chacho putierako , ai sar avel pel nuveria le rhaioski . "

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , and saith , What need we any further witnesses ?
text2: Antunchi o baro rashai shindia peske tsalia , ai phendia , " So mai trobul ame marturia ?

text: Ye have heard the blasphemy : what think ye ? And they all condemned him to be guilty of death .
text2: Vi tume ashundian leske nasul vorbi : So haliaren tume ? Phende , ' Doshalolo ai trobul mudardo . ' " Ai uni chungarde pe leste , ai te wusharen lesko mui , ai dine les dab dukhamensa , ai phenen leske , " Kon mardia tu ? " Le ketani marde les le vastensa .

text: And as Peter was beneath in the palace , there cometh one of the maids of the high priest :
text2: O Petri beshelas avri ande bar , iek sluga andal le bare rashaske avili ,

text: And when she saw Peter warming himself , she looked upon him , and said , And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: ai kana woi dikhlia o Petri tachol pasha iag , dikhelas pe leste , ai phendia , " Ai vi tu sanas lesa , O Jesus andai Nazareth . "

text: But he denied , saying , I know not , neither understand I what thou sayest . And he went out into the porch ; and the cock crew .
text2: Wo phendias , " Nai chaches " angla savorhende , " Chi zhanav pa soste des duma . " Ai gelo karing e wurota , ai o kurkorsho bashlo .

text: And a maid saw him again , and began to say to them that stood by , This is one of them .
text2: E sluga dikhlia les , ai phendia kodolenge kai sas kotse , " Kodo si iek anda lende . "

text: And he denied it again . And a little after , they that stood by said again to Peter , Surely thou art one of them : for thou art a Galilaean , and thy speech agreeth thereto .
text2: Mai iek data phendias , " Nai chaches , ai tsirha vriama , kodola kai sas pashai iag avile ka Petri ai phende leske , " Chaches tu san iek anda lende , ke tu san andai Galilee , ai cho divano purhil tut . "

text: But he began to curse and to swear , saying , I know not this man of whom ye speak .
text2: Numa o Petri dias pe armaia ai solaxadias lenge , " Me chi zhanav kadale manushes . "

text: And the second time the cock crew . And Peter called to mind the word that Jesus said unto him , Before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice . And when he thought thereon , he wept .
text2: Ai o duito data o kurkorsho bashlo . Ai o Petri diape goji ka le vorbi kai phendiasas leske O Jesus , " Mai anglal sar te bashel duvar o kurkorsho , tu trivar phenesa ke chi zhanes ma . " Ai kana serelas kadia , ruia zurales .

text: And straightway in the morning the chief priests held a consultation with the elders and scribes and the whole council , and bound Jesus , and carried him away , and delivered him to Pilate .
text2: Kana phuterdilo o dies sa le bare rasha , ai le phure kai poronchinas , ai le Gramnoturia avile andek than te den duma pa O Jesus . Ashshile te phanden les , ai ningerde les ka Pilate .

text: And Pilate asked him , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answering said unto him , Thou sayest it .
text2: Ai o Pilato phushlia les , " Tu san O Amperato le Zhidovongo ? " O Jesus phendia leske , " Sar tu phendian . "

text: And the chief priests accused him of many things : but he answered nothing .
text2: Ai le bare le rasha dosharde les , numa O Jesus chi phendia khanchi .

text: And Pilate asked him again , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? behold how many things they witness against thee .
text2: Ai o Pilato mai phushlia les , " Chi phenes khanchi ? Chi ashunes sa le dosha kai phenen pa tute ? "

text: But Jesus yet answered nothing ; so that Pilate marvelled .
text2: Numa O Jesus chi phendia khanchi ; anda kadia o Pilato chudisailo .

text: Now at that feast he released unto them one prisoner , whomsoever they desired .
text2: Sas ek zakono ka o guvernori Pilate po Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo te mekel avri iekes ande temnitsa savo godi mangel o narodo .

text: And there was one named Barabbas , which lay bound with them that had made insurrection with him , who had committed murder in the insurrection .
text2: Sas phandado antunchi iek kai zhanglo liaspe ke de sa nasul lo , ai mudardia vari kas , lesko anav sas Barabbas . ( Ande temnitsa sas iek kai busholas o Barabbas , peske dosha lensa anda iek mudarimos kai kerde ande bunto . )

text: And the multitude crying aloud began to desire him to do as he had ever done unto them .
text2: Sa o narodo gelo ka Pilate ai mangel lestar te kerel o zakono sar kerdia swako bersh .

text: But Pilate answered them , saying , Will ye that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Numa o Pilato phendia lenge , " Mangen te mekav tumenge O Amperato le Zhidovongo ? "

text: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy .
text2: Ke wo zhanglias sostar dine les ando vas , ke le rashan sas inetsia ( zhaluzo ) pe leste .

text: But the chief priests moved the people , that he should rather release Barabbas unto them .
text2: Numa le bare le rasha dziliarde le manushen , ke won mangen o Pilato te mekel Barabbas lenge .

text: And Pilate answered and said again unto them , What will ye then that I shall do unto him whom ye call the King of the Jews ?
text2: Ai o Pilato magdata phendia lenge , " So mangen te kerav kadalesa O Jesus kai mothon leske O Amperato le Zhidovongo ? "

text: And they cried out again , Crucify him .
text2: Ai savorhe phende , " Tho les po trushul ! "

text: Then Pilate said unto them , Why , what evil hath he done ? And they cried out the more exceedingly , Crucify him .
text2: Porme o Pilato phendia lenge , " Sostar , che nasulimos kerdia ? " Numa won mai zurales dine mui , " Tho les po trushul ! "

text: And so Pilate , willing to content the people , released Barabbas unto them , and delivered Jesus , when he had scourged him , to be crucified .
text2: O Pilato manglia te raduin le manushen , meklia lenge o Barabbas , ai marde O Jesusosa le bichosa , antunchi dias les te karfon les po trushul .

text: And the soldiers led him away into the hall , called Praetorium ; and they call together the whole band .
text2: Le ketani ningerde les ando kher , kai bushol Praetorium ; ai chidinisaile kruglom lestar ek antrego kompania ketani .

text: And they clothed him with purple , and platted a crown of thorns , and put it about his head ,
text2: Ai dine pe leste ek brazba raxami , ai kerde korona andal lunzhe kanrhe , ai thode la po lesko shero ,

text: And began to salute him , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: ai phendias leske , " Lungo traio ka O Amperato le Zhidovongo ! "

text: And they smote him on the head with a reed , and did spit upon him , and bowing their knees worshipped him .
text2: Ai line e rhai ai marde les pa shero lasa , ai chungarde pe leste , ai dine changa angla leste , ai luvudisarde les .

text: And when they had mocked him , they took off the purple from him , and put his own clothes on him , and led him out to crucify him .
text2: Kana getosarde te maren mui lestar , line pa leste e brazba raxami , ai dine leske tsalia pe leste , ai ningerde les te karfon les po trushul .

text: And they compel one Simon a Cyrenian , who passed by , coming out of the country , the father of Alexander and Rufus , to bear his cross .
text2: Po drom kai zhanas arakhle ieke manushes anda Cirene kai busholas Simon , o dat le Alexanderosko ai Rufusosko , ai thode les te ningerel o trushul .

text: And they bring him unto the place Golgotha , which is , being interpreted , The place of a skull .
text2: Ai andine les ka kodo than kai bushol Golgatha . " O than kai miazol kokalo sheresko "

text: And they gave him to drink wine mingled with myrrh : but he received it not .
text2: Dine les mol hamime drabensa te pel : chi pelias .

text: And when they had crucified him , they parted his garments , casting lots upon them , what every man should take .
text2: Ai kana karfosarde les po trushul , hulade leske tsalia mashkar pende , ai thodepe te dikhen kon niril peski raxami .

text: And it was the third hour , and they crucified him .
text2: Ai sas inia chasuria diminiatsi , ai karfosarde les .

text: And the superscription of his accusation was written over , THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Opral pa lesko shero amblade ek ramomos kai phenelas che dosh ankerdesas pe leste , " O AMPERATO LE ZHIDOVONGO . "

text: And with him they crucify two thieves ; the one on his right hand , and the other on his left .
text2: Ai lesa won karfosarde dui chor , iek ka lesko chacho vas , ai iek ka lesko stingo .

text: And the scripture was fulfilled , which saith , And he was numbered with the transgressors .
text2: Kadia kerdilia sar o ramomos phendia , won gindisarde pa leste sar iek manush kai phaglo o zakono .

text: And they that passed by railed on him , wagging their heads , and saying , Ah , thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days ,
text2: Le manush kai nakhenas kotsar , kerenas anda shero ai mishkirinas les , ai phenenas , " Tu kai sas te xaiis o tampla , ai ande trin dies te vazdes kadia tampla ,

text: Save thyself , and come down from the cross .
text2: Skepisar tut , ai aidi tele pa trushul . "

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking said among themselves with the scribes , He saved others ; himself he cannot save .
text2: Sakadia le bare le rasha ai le Gramnoturia marde mui lestar mashkar pende , " Skepisardias avren , numa nashti skepil pes . "

text: Let Christ the King of Israel descend now from the cross , that we may see and believe . And they that were crucified with him reviled him .
text2: Mek O Kristo , O Amperato anda Israel , te avel tele pa trushul , ke mangas te dikhas ai pachas ame ande leste . Ai vi le dui kai sas thodine po trushul lesa marde mui lestar sakadia .

text: And when the sixth hour was come , there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour .
text2: Kal desh u dui po mashkar le diesesko avilo , tuniariko sas pe sa e lumia zhi kai trin chasuria .

text: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eloi , Eloi , lama sabachthani ? which is , being interpreted , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Karing le trin chasuria O Jesus dias mui andek baro glaso , " Eloi , Eloi , lema Sabachthani ? " Kadia si , " Murho Del , Murho Del , Sostar meklian ma ? "

text: And some of them that stood by , when they heard it , said , Behold , he calleth Elias .
text2: Uni anda kodola kai sas kotse ashunde les , ai phende , " Eta , akharel o Elias . "

text: And one ran and filled a spunge full of vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink , saying , Let alone ; let us see whether Elias will come to take him down .
text2: Strazo iek anda lende grebisailo , lias ek kotor , thodias les ando lolo shut , thodias po khash ai zumadias te del ka Jesus te pel , phenel , " Mek les : Aven te dikhas te avela o Elias te skepil les . "

text: And Jesus cried with a loud voice , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Antunchi O Jesus dias mui ando baro glaso ai dias pesko duxo opre , ai mulo .

text: And the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom .
text2: Ai e zanaveski ande tampla ande donde de opral zhi tele ( kai sas amblado opre ande tampla shindilo de opral zhi tele ) .

text: And when the centurion , which stood over against him , saw that he so cried out , and gave up the ghost , he said , Truly this man was the Son of God .
text2: O fitsiri o Romano kai beshlo angla leste , dikhlia sar O Jesus dias mui ando baro glaso ai dias pesko duxo opre , ai mulo . Phendia " Chaches kado sas O Shav le Devlesko . "

text: There were also women looking on afar off : among whom was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses , and Salome ;
text2: Ai vi sas zhuvlia kotse kai dikhenas de dural : mashkar lende sas e Maria Magdalena , ai e Maria e dei le Iakovoski ai le Josefoski , ai Salomeski .

text: ( Who also , when he was in Galilee , followed him , and ministered unto him ; ) and many other women which came up with him unto Jerusalem .
text2: Kana wo sas ande Galilee , won linepe pala leste , ai podaisarde les ; ai but kaver zhuvlia avile ka Jerusalem lesa .

text: And now when the even was come , because it was the preparation , that is , the day before the sabbath ,
text2: Kana peli e riata , ke sas o dies mai anglal o lasharimos le Sabatosko .

text: Joseph of Arimathaea , and honourable counseller , which also waited for the kingdom of God , came , and went in boldly unto Pilate , and craved the body of Jesus .
text2: O Josef andai Arimathaea areslo , wo sas ek baro manush ande bar , ai vi wo azhukerelas e amperetsia le Devleski , ai tromailo te zhal ka o Pilato , te mangel le Jesusosko stato .

text: And Pilate marvelled if he were already dead : and calling unto him the centurion , he asked him whether he had been any while dead .
text2: O Pilato chudisailo ke mulo kadia sigo , akhardia o kapitano anda le ketani , ai phushlia les , " Mulo kadia sigo ? " Kana o Pilato ashundia so phendia o kapitano , o Pilato dias ordina te den les leste .

text: And he bought fine linen , and took him down , and wrapped him in the linen , and laid him in a sepulchre which was hewn out of a rock , and rolled a stone unto the door of the sepulchre .
text2: O Josef lias o stato , ai vuluisardias les andek vuzho poxtan , ai thodias les ando nevo greposhevo kai sas shindo ando bax , ai spidias ek baro bax angla greposhevo .

text: And Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joses beheld where he was laid .
text2: Ai e Maria Magdalena , ai e Maria e dei le Josesosko dikhle kai thodia O Jesus .

text: And when the sabbath was past , Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James , and Salome , had bought sweet spices , that they might come and anoint him .
text2: Ai kana nakhlo Sabat , e Maria Magdalena , ai e Maria e dei le Iakovoski ai le Salomeski , chinde le parfumuria te zhan ai thon le parfumuria po le Jesusosko stato .

text: And very early in the morning the first day of the week , they came unto the sepulchre at the rising of the sun .
text2: Ai kana phuterdilo o dies o pervo dies le kurkosko , avile ka greposhevo kana wushtel o kham .

text: And they said among themselves , Who shall roll us away the stone from the door of the sepulchre ?
text2: Phenenas mashkar pende , " Kon spidela palpale o bax katar e wurota le greposhevosko amenge ? "

text: And when they looked , they saw that the stone was rolled away : for it was very great .
text2: Ai kana dikhenas , dikhle ke o bax kai sas angla o greposhevo sas spidias palpale : sas o baro bax .

text: And entering into the sepulchre , they saw a young man sitting on the right side , clothed in a long white garment ; and they were affrighted .
text2: Avile ando greposhevo , dikhle ek terno manush beshelas pe chachi rig , vuriardo ande ek lunzhi parni raxami , ai daraile .

text: And he saith unto them , Be not affrighted : Ye seek Jesus of Nazareth , which was crucified : he is risen ; he is not here : behold the place where they laid him .
text2: Phendia lenge , " Na daran . Tume roden O Jesus andai Nazareth , kai sas karfosardo po trushul ; zhuvindisailo ; nai katse : Dikh ! O than kai sas .

text: But go your way , tell his disciples and Peter that he goeth before you into Galilee : there shall ye see him , as he said unto you .
text2: Numa zhan sigo , ai phenen leske disiplonge ai o Petri , ke wo zhal mai anglal tumendar ande Galilee : kotse si te dikhen les , sar phendias tumenge .

text: And they went out quickly , and fled from the sepulchre ; for they trembled and were amazed : neither said they any thing to any man ; for they were afraid .
text2: Grebisaile te zhantar katar o greposhevo ande dar , izdraile ai chudisaile , won chi phende khanch kanikaske ke daranas .

text: Now when Jesus was risen early the first day of the week , he appeared first to Mary Magdalene , out of whom he had cast seven devils .
text2: O Jesus zhuvindisailo anda martia kana phuterdilo o dies , o pervo dies le kurkosko . E Maria Magdalena sas iekto te dikhel les . O Jesus gonisardiasas avri anda late efta bengen .

text: And she went and told them that had been with him , as they mourned and wept .
text2: Geli ai phendia leske disiplonge , won nekezhinas ai rovenas .

text: And they , when they had heard that he was alive , and had been seen of her , believed not .
text2: Kana ashunde kai wo traiil , ai kai e Maria dikhlia les , won chi pachanaspe .

text: After that he appeared in another form unto two of them , as they walked , and went into the country .
text2: Pala kodia , wo avilo sar aver manush kal dui anda lende kai zhanas po drom avrial anda foro .

text: And they went and told it unto the residue : neither believed they them .
text2: Gele ai phende le kolavrenge . Le kolaver chi pachanas .

text: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat , and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart , because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen .
text2: Pala kodia avilo ka le desh u iekenge sar xanas andek than , ai dino le trad , phendia lenge zurale vorbi ke chi pachanpe ai zurade lengo ilo , ke chi pachaie kodolen kai dikhle les pala o zhuvindimos .

text: And he said unto them , Go ye into all the world , and preach the gospel to every creature .
text2: Ai phendia lenge , zhan pe sa e lumia , ai phenen e lashi viasta savorhenge .

text: He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved ; but he that believeth not shall be damned .
text2: Kodo kai pachala ai avela boldo avela skepime ; numa kado kai chi pachala avela kris pe leste .

text: And these signs shall follow them that believe ; In my name shall they cast out devils ; they shall speak with new tongues ;
text2: Ai kadala mirakluria zhana kodolensa kai pachanape . Ando murho anav gonina bengen ; denas duma neve shibasa .

text: They shall take up serpents ; and if they drink any deadly thing , it shall not hurt them ; they shall lay hands on the sick , and they shall recover .
text2: Astaren le sapen ; te won pen vari so kai mudarel o manush , chi mudarela len ; thona le vas pe naswalen , ai avena saste .

text: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them , he was received up into heaven , and sat on the right hand of God .
text2: Pala O Jesus dias duma lenge , sas lino opre ando rhaio , ai beshlo po chacho vas le Devlesko .

text: And they went forth , and preached everywhere , the Lord working with them , and confirming the word with signs following . Amen .
text2: Ai won geletar , ai dine duma po Del pe swako rig , ai O Del kerelas buchi lensa , O Del sikadias kai E Vorba le Devleski sas chachi pala le mirakluria kai kerdionas .

text: Forasmuch as many have taken in hand to set forth in order a declaration of those things which are most surely believed among us ,
text2: O Theophilus : But narodo zumade te ramon pa so kerdilia mashkar amende ,

text: Even as they delivered them unto us , which from the beginning were eyewitnesses , and ministers of the word ;
text2: ai won ramosarde so kerdilia sar sas amenge , kodola kai dikhle de anda gor , ai kai sas lenge phendo te phenen e vorba le Devleski .

text: It seemed good to me also , having had perfect understanding of all things from the very first , to write unto thee in order , most excellent Theophilus ,
text2: Ai akana me lem o gor mishto te zhanav so godi kerdilia de anda gor , miazilia mange mishto lasho te ramov tumenge pa kadala dieli kai sas .

text: That thou mightest know the certainty of those things , wherein thou hast been instructed .
text2: Me kerav kadia saxke tume te sai len po gor o chachimos kai sas tumenge phendo .

text: There was in the days of Herod , the king of Judaea , a certain priest named Zacharias , of the course of Abia : and his wife was of the daughters of Aaron , and her name was Elisabeth .
text2: Kana o Herod sas o amperato ande Judea , sas iek rashai kai bushol Zechariah , wo sas andal rasha kai busholas Abijah . Leski rhomni busholas Elizabeth , ai woi sas andai vitsa le rashaske kai busholas Aaron , o baro rashai .

text: And they were both righteous before God , walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless .
text2: Won le dui zhene sas vorta angla Del , ai kerdia mishto sa le zakonuria ai sa le krisa le Devleski .

text: And they had no child , because that Elisabeth was barren , and they both were now well stricken in years .
text2: Nas le glati ke e Elizabeth nashti avelas le glate , ai vi le dui zhene sas phure .

text: And it came to pass , that while he executed the priest ' s office before God in the order of his course ,
text2: Iek dies o Zechariah kerelas peski buchi le rashaski angla Del .

text: According to the custom of the priest ' s office , his lot was to burn incense when he went into the temple of the Lord .
text2: Ke pala zakono le rashango , o Zacharias sas alosardia te zhal ande tampla te phabarelas e thumwiia pe altari .

text: And the whole multitude of the people were praying without at the time of incense .
text2: Sa o narodo rhugilaspe avri ka chaso kai phabarenas e Thumwiia .

text: And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense .
text2: Ek angelo le Devlesko antunchi sikadilo ka Zachariah , wo beshelas pe chachi rik kai sas o altari kai phabarenas e Thumwiia .

text: And when Zacharias saw him , he was troubled , and fear fell upon him .
text2: Kana o Zechariah dikhlia o angelos , wo sas nekezhisailo ai darailo .

text: But the angel said unto him , Fear not , Zacharias : for thy prayer is heard ; and thy wife Elisabeth shall bear thee a son , and thou shalt call his name John .
text2: Numa o angelo phendia leske , " Na dara o Zechariah ! O Del ashundia cho rhugimos , ai Elizabeth , chi rhomni dela tu iek shav kai akharesa les Iovano .

text: And thou shalt have joy and gladness ; and many shall rejoice at his birth .
text2: Ai tu avesa defial raduime , ai but narodo raduilape kana kerdiola !

text: For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord , and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink ; and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost , even from his mother ' s womb .
text2: Ke baro manush avela anglal iakha Devleske , ai shoxar chi pela mol ai chi iek pimos kai si alkolsa . Avela pherdo le Swuntone Duxoske kana kerdiola .

text: And many of the children of Israel shall he turn to the Lord their God .
text2: Anelas palpale buten andal Zhiduvuria ka lenge Del .

text: And he shall go before him in the spirit and power of Elias , to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children , and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just ; to make ready a people prepared for the Lord .
text2: Wo zhala mai anglal lestar le duxosa ai la putierasa le profetoske o Elijah te thon pale andek than le daden ai le shaven ai te anen palpale kodolen kai chi pachaie o mui ka goji le manushenge kai sas chache ; wo lasharela narodos vorta angla Del . "

text: And Zacharias said unto the angel , Whereby shall I know this ? for I am an old man , and my wife well stricken in years .
text2: O Zechariah phenel le angeloske , " Sar te zhanav ke so phenes si chaches ? Ke phuro sim ai vi murhi rhomni . "

text: And the angel answering said unto him , I am Gabriel , that stand in the presence of God ; and am sent to speak unto thee , and to shew thee these glad tidings .
text2: Ai o angelo del les atweto , " Me sim o Gabriel , me beshav angla Del , vo tradia ma te dav tusa duma ai te anav tuke kadia lashi vorba .

text: And , behold , thou shalt be dumb , and not able to speak , until the day that these things shall be performed , because thou believest not my words , which shall be fulfilled in their season .
text2: Num chi pachaian murhe vorbi , kai savon avena pe kana avela e vriama . Anda kodia si te kerdios muto ai nashti desa duma zhi ka dies kai avela pe so phendem tuke . "

text: And the people waited for Zacharias , and marvelled that he tarried so long in the temple .
text2: Ande kodia vriama le kolaver narodo azhukerenas o Zechariah , ai chudinaspe sostar beshel kadia but vriama kotse andre tampla .

text: And when he came out , he could not speak unto them : and they perceived that he had seen a vision in the temple : for he beckoned unto them , and remained speechless .
text2: Kana anklisto avri nashti delas lensa duma , ai o narodo aliardia ke O Del sikadiasas leske vari so ande tampla . Wo sikavelas lenge le vastensa numa nashti delas duma .

text: And it came to pass , that , as soon as the days of his ministration were accomplished , he departed to his own house .
text2: Kana o Zechariah getosardia peski vriama kai trobulas te podail ande tampla , gelo peste khere .

text: And after those days his wife Elisabeth conceived , and hid herself five months , saying ,
text2: Xantsi vriama pala kodia e Elizabeth leski rhomni pharisas , ai garadile panzh shon ando kher .

text: Thus hath the Lord dealt with me in the days wherein he looked on me , to take away my reproach among men .
text2: Woi motholas ande peste , " Eta , so kerdia O Del mange , manglia te ankalavel ma akana so sas mange lazhav anglal manush ! "

text: And in the sixth month the angel Gabriel was sent from God unto a city of Galilee , named Nazareth ,
text2: Ai ando shovto shon O Del tradia o angelo kai bushol Gabriel andek foro kai bushol Galilee ando Nazareth .

text: To a virgin espoused to a man whose name was Joseph , of the house of David ; and the virgin ' s name was Mary .
text2: Kai iek shei bari kai trobulas te ansurilpe ieke manushesa kai bushol Josef , wo sas andai vitsa le amperatoski o David , o anav kodola zhuvliako kay sas shei bari busholas Maria .

text: And the angel came in unto her , and said , Hail , thou that art highly favoured , the Lord is with thee : blessed art thou among women .
text2: O angelo gelo late khere ai phendia lake , " Pacha tuke , tu kai O Del andia mishtimos , O Del tusa . "

text: And when she saw him , she was troubled at his saying , and cast in her mind what manner of salutation this should be .
text2: E Maria daraili xantsi palal vorbia kai phendia lake , ai gindilas pa so phendia lake o angelo ,

text: And the angel said unto her , Fear not , Mary : for thou hast found favour with God .
text2: O angelo phendia lake , " Na dara , Maria , ke drago sanas le Devleske .

text: And , behold , thou shalt conceive in thy womb , and bring forth a son , and shalt call his name JESUS .
text2: Si te aves phari ai avela tu iek shav kai desa les o anav Jesus .

text: He shall be great , and shall be called the Son of the Highest : and the Lord God shall give unto him the throne of his father David :
text2: Baro avela ai akharena les O Shav le Devlesko kai si opre . O Del kerela anda leste amperato , sar sas o David , kodo kai sas mai anglal lestar .

text: And he shall reign over the house of Jacob for ever ; and of his kingdom there shall be no end .
text2: Ai poronchila po narodo kai si ande Israel kai bushon zhiduvuria sagda , ai leski amperetsia shoxar chi getolpe ! "

text: Then said Mary unto the angel , How shall this be , seeing I know not a man ?
text2: E Maria phendia le angeloske , " Sar sai kerdiola so mothos mange , ke shei bari sim ? "

text: And the angel answered and said unto her , The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee , and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee : therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God .
text2: O angelo dia atweto , " O Swunto Duxo avela pe tute , ai e putiera le Devleski . Vusharela tu sar iek vushalin , anda kodia avela akhardo Swunto O Shav le Devlesko ek glata kai kerdiola .

text: And , behold , thy cousin Elisabeth , she hath also conceived a son in her old age : and this is the sixth month with her , who was called barren .
text2: Ai eta , Elizabeth chi vara , vi woi azhukerel iek shav . Marka ke si phuri , mothonas ke nashti avela glate , ai akana ka pesko shovto shon la .

text: For with God nothing shall be impossible .
text2: Ke kanchi nai so O Del nashti kerel . "

text: And Mary said , Behold the handmaid of the Lord ; be it unto me according to thy word . And the angel departed from her .
text2: Antunchi Maria phendia , " Me sim e sluga Devleski , te avel mange sar tu phenes " , ai o angelo gelotar .

text: And Mary arose in those days , and went into the hill country with haste , into a city of Juda ;
text2: Ande kodia vriama e Maria sigo gelitar karing le plaia andek gav kai sas ande Judea .

text: And entered into the house of Zacharias , and saluted Elisabeth .
text2: Geli ando kher ka Zechariah ai dia dies lasho kai Elizabeth .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Elisabeth heard the salutation of Mary , the babe leaped in her womb ; and Elisabeth was filled with the Holy Ghost :
text2: Kana Elizabeth ashundia so phendia lake e Maria , o glata mishtisailo ande late . Elizabeth pherdo sas le Swuntone Duxosa .

text: And she spake out with a loud voice , and said , Blessed art thou among women , and blessed is the fruit of thy womb .
text2: Ai tsipisardia zurales . " O Del swuntsosardia tu mai but ke sar sa le zhuvlia ai lesko swuntsomos beshel pe glata kai avela tu !

text: And whence is this to me , that the mother of my Lord should come to me ?
text2: Kon si me , kai e dei murhi Devleski avel mande ?

text: For , lo , as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears , the babe leaped in my womb for joy .
text2: Ke dikhes kana ashundem ke dian ma dies lasho o glata mishtisailo raduimastar ande mande .

text: And blessed is she that believed : for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord .
text2: Tu raduime san kai pachaian tu so sas tuke phendo katar O Del ai kerdiola ! "

text: And Mary said , My soul doth magnify the Lord ,
text2: E Maria phendia , " Murho ilo naisil o barimos le Devlesko ;

text: And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour .
text2: Murho ilo pherdo raduimos lo pala Del murho skepitori .

text: For he hath regarded the low estate of his handmaiden : for , behold , from henceforth all generations shall call me blessed .
text2: O Del dikhlia pe mande , leski sluga kai nai kanch ! Numa akana ai sagda sa o manush akharena ma raduime .

text: For he that is mighty hath done to me great things ; and holy is his name .
text2: Ke O Del kai si les e putiera kerdia mange lasho dieli . Lesko anav si Swunto .

text: And his mercy is on them that fear him from generation to generation .
text2: Sikavel leski mila sagda ka kodola kai daran lestar , katar e vitsa po vitsa .

text: He hath shewed strength with his arm ; he hath scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts .
text2: Kerdia bare dieli leske vastesa , le zuralesa lia pal manush le barimata kai sas le ande ilo .

text: He hath put down the mighty from their seats , and exalted them of low degree .
text2: Lia le amperaton anda penge amperetsia ai dia iek than kai si opre kal manush kai si lashe .

text: He hath filled the hungry with good things ; and the rich he hath sent empty away .
text2: Wo dia but lashimos ka kodola kai sas bokhale , ai tradia palpale le barvalen le vastensa mange .

text: He hath holpen his servant Israel , in remembrance of his mercy ;
text2: Wo garado leski vorba kai shinado sas ka le Zhidovon , ai avilo te zhutil leske naroduria le Zhidovon .

text: As he spake to our fathers , to Abraham , and to his seed for ever .
text2: Chi busterdia te sikavel leski mila karing o Abraham ai kodola kai sas mai palal lestar sagda .

text: And Mary abode with her about three months , and returned to her own house .
text2: E Maria beshli peska varasa Elizabeth trin shon , porme gelitar peste khere .

text: Now Elisabeth ' s full time came that she should be delivered ; and she brought forth a son .
text2: Kana e vriama avili kai Elizabeth trobulas te avel la iek glata sas la iek shav .

text: And her neighbours and her cousins heard how the Lord had shewed great mercy upon her ; and they rejoiced with her .
text2: O narodo kai beshelas pashai Elizabeth ai lake naimuria dine po gor ke O Del dias la kodo mishtimos , vi won raduisaile lasa .

text: And it came to pass , that on the eighth day they came to circumcise the child ; and they called him Zacharias , after the name of his father .
text2: Kana o tsinorho sas kurkesko avile te shinen kotor anda lesko boriko ; ai mangenas te del anav peske dadesko Zechariah ,

text: And his mother answered and said , Not so ; but he shall be called John .
text2: numa leski dei phendia , " Nichi , Iovano busholas . " Numa phende lake ,

text: And they said unto her , There is none of thy kindred that is called by this name .
text2: " Na khonik ande chi familia kai si les kado anav ! "

text: And they made signs to his father , how he would have him called .
text2: Antunchi phushle le vastensa le dades , te zhanen sar mangel te akharel o shav .

text: And he asked for a writing table , and wrote , saying , His name is John . And they marvelled all .
text2: O Zechariah manglia iek skafidi te ramol ai ramosardia , " Iovano busholas . " ai savorhe chudisaile !

text: And his mouth was opened immediately , and his tongue loosed , and he spake , and praised God .
text2: Strazo o Zechariah sai delas duma ai liape te naisil le Devles zurales .

text: And fear came on all that dwelt round about them : and all these sayings were noised abroad throughout all the hill country of Judaea .
text2: Katar godi antunchi sa narodo kai beshelas pasha leste daraile , ai sa e viasta pa so kerdili geli kruglom karing le plaia ande Judea .

text: And all they that heard them laid them up in their hearts , saying , What manner of child shall this be ! And the hand of the Lord was with him .
text2: Kon godi ashunelas so kerdilia denas pe goji ai denas pe duma , so avela kodia glata e putiera le Devleski sas chaches lesa .

text: And his father Zacharias was filled with the Holy Ghost , and prophesied , saying ,
text2: O Zechariah , o dat la glatako sas pherdo le Swuntone Duxosa , ai dia duma E Vorba le Devleski .

text: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel ; for he hath visited and redeemed his people ,
text2: Luvudime te avel le Devles , O Del le Zhidovongo , ke andia te lia sama pe pesko narodo ai skepisardia les .

text: And hath raised up an horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David ;
text2: Dia ame iek putiera ai iek skepitori amenge kai sam andai vitsa le amperatoski o David leski sluga .

text: As he spake by the mouth of his holy prophets , which have been since the world began :
text2: Kadia si kai phendias , de mult katar swuntso profeturia :

text: That we should be saved from our enemies , and from the hand of all that hate us ;
text2: Phendiasas te skepil ame katar amare duzhmaia ; ai katar e putiera katar kodola kai sam lenge griatsa .

text: To perform the mercy promised to our fathers , and to remember his holy covenant ;
text2: Inker sikavela peski mila amenge sar si kadia kodolenge kai sas mai anglal amendar , ai serela pe peski swinto vorba kai phendiasas te beshel amensa ;

text: The oath which he sware to our father Abraham ,
text2: Ke O Del phendiasas le Abramoske kadala dieli kai sas mai anglal amendar .

text: That he would grant unto us , that we being delivered out of the hand of our enemies might serve him without fear ,
text2: Te ankalavel ame katar e putiera amare duzhmange , ai te podaisaras le Devles bi darako ;

text: In holiness and righteousness before him , all the days of our life .
text2: Te sai avas swintsi ai vorta angla Del , swako dies ande amaro traio .

text: And thou , child , shalt be called the prophet of the Highest : for thou shalt go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways ;
text2: Ai tu , murho tsinorho , avesa akhardo o profeto le Devlesko kai si opre , ke phiresa angla Del te lashares lesko drom ;

text: To give knowledge of salvation unto his people by the remission of their sins ,
text2: Ai te sikaves leske narodoske ke skepila le kana iertila lenge bezexa .

text: Through the tender mercy of our God ; whereby the dayspring from on high hath visited us ,
text2: Ke amaro Del lasholo , ai kerela te strefial pe amende iek vediara kai avel opral .

text: To give light to them that sit in darkness and in the shadow of death , to guide our feet into the way of peace .
text2: Te sikavel e vediara kodolenge kai si ando tuniariko ai kai si ande vushalin la martiake , te ingerel amare punrhe po drom la pachako . "

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , and was in the deserts till the day of his shewing unto Israel .
text2: Ai tsinorho bariolas ai o Swunto Duxo le Devlesko lel les zor ande leste . Wo beshlo ande pusta zhi ka dies kai sikadilo kal Zhiduvuria .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that there went out a decree from Caesar Augustus , that all the world should be taxed .
text2: Ande kodia vriama iek baro manush kai busholas Ceasar Augustus dia ordina te dikhen sode narodo sas ando them .

text: ( And this taxing was first made when Cyrenius was governor of Syria . )
text2: Kana jinde le narodos e pervo data kana inker aver manush kai busholas Cyrenius sas baro pe them kai busholas Syria .

text: And all went to be taxed , every one into his own city .
text2: Savorhe gele te ramonpe ando foro kai kerdiol .

text: And Joseph also went up from Galilee , out of the city of Nazareth , into Judaea , unto the city of David , which is called Bethlehem ; ( because he was of the house and lineage of David : )
text2: O Josef gelotar anda kado foro Nazareth kai sas ande Galilee te zhal ande Judea , andek foro kai busholas Bethlehem , kai kerdilo o amperato David . Ke wo sas andai vitsa le Davidoski .

text: To be taxed with Mary his espoused wife , being great with child .
text2: Gelo vi wo te ramol pe la Mariasa , kodia kai sas tomnime pala leste .

text: And so it was , that , while they were there , the days were accomplished that she should be delivered .
text2: Woi azhukerelas iek glata , kana sas ando Bethlehem e vriama avili kai o shav trobulas te kerdiol .

text: And she brought forth her firstborn son , and wrapped him in swaddling clothes , and laid him in a manger ; because there was no room for them in the inn .
text2: O Shav kerdilo , o pervo andai lake glate , pachardia les andel poxtan ai thodia les ande liagano pel suluma ke nas than lenge ando hotelo .

text: And there were in the same country shepherds abiding in the field , keeping watch over their flock by night .
text2: Ande kodo foro sas pastuxuria kai nakhavenas e riat pel kimpuria te garaven le bakriorhan .

text: And , lo , the angel of the Lord came upon them , and the glory of the Lord shone round about them : and they were sore afraid .
text2: Ek angelo le Devlesko sikadilo lenge , ai o barimos le Devlesko strefial pe lende : ai won daraile ,

text: And the angel said unto them , Fear not : for , behold , I bring you good tidings of great joy , which shall be to all people .
text2: Numa o angelo phendia lenge , " Na daran ! Ke me anav tumenge ek lashi viasta , kai raduila zurales sa le narodos .

text: For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour , which is Christ the Lord .
text2: Kadia dies ando foro le Davidosko ek skepitori kerdilo , wo si o Kristo le Devles .

text: And this shall be a sign unto you ; Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes , lying in a manger .
text2: Sar te prinzharen les arakhena iek tsinorho kai si pachardo andel poxtan ai ande liagano . "

text: And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God , and saying ,
text2: Strazo angelosa but aver angeluria anda cheri luvudinas le Devles ai mothonas ,

text: Glory to God in the highest , and on earth peace , good will toward men .
text2: " O barimos ka Del ke si ando rhaio , ai leski pacha dinila pe phuv kal manush kai si leske drago ! "

text: And it came to pass , as the angels were gone away from them into heaven , the shepherds said one to another , Let us now go even unto Bethlehem , and see this thing which is come to pass , which the Lord hath made known unto us .
text2: Kana le angeluria geletar katar le pastuxuria te zhantar ando rhaio , le pastuxuria denas pe duma mashkar pende , " Aven ando Bethlehem ke trobul te dikhas so si so O Del phendia amenge . "

text: And they came with haste , and found Mary , and Joseph , and the babe lying in a manger .
text2: Grebisaile te zhan ai kotse arakhle la Maria ai Josefos , ai dikhle o tsinorho kai sas ande liagano .

text: And when they had seen it , they made known abroad the saying which was told them concerning this child .
text2: Kana dikhle les phende so phendiasas lenge o angelo pai glata .

text: And all they that heard it wondered at those things which were told them by the shepherds .
text2: Savorhe kai ashunde le pastuxuria chudisaile so phendesas lenge .

text: But Mary kept all these things , and pondered them in her heart .
text2: Numa e Maria garavelas kodola dieli ande peske goji ai delas pe goji ande peste .

text: And the shepherds returned , glorifying and praising God for all the things that they had heard and seen , as it was told unto them .
text2: Porme le pastuxria geletar palpale khere , jilabenas pa drom o barimos le Devlesko ai naisinas leske anda so ashunde ai dikhle ; ke swako diela kerdili sar o angelo phendiasas lenge .

text: And when eight days were accomplished for the circumcising of the child , his name was called JESUS , which was so named of the angel before he was conceived in the womb .
text2: Ek kurko pala kodia , kana e vriama avili te shinen lesko boriko , ai dine les o anav kai si Jesus , o anav kai phendiasas lenge o angelo te thon leske mai anglal sar te avel e Maria phari .

text: And when the days of her purification according to the law of Moses were accomplished , they brought him to Jerusalem , to present him to the Lord ;
text2: Porme e vriama avili le Josefoske ai la Mariake te keren so o zakono le Mosesoske sas te vuzharenpe , antunchi andine o tsinorho ando foro kai si ando Jerusalem te sikaven o tsinorho ka Del .

text: ( As it is written in the law of the Lord , Every male that openeth the womb shall be called holy to the Lord ; )
text2: Ke ramome ando zakono le Devlesko , swako mursh glata o pervo kai kerdilo avela thodino rigate le Devlesko . "

text: And to offer a sacrifice according to that which is said in the law of the Lord , A pair of turtledoves , or two young pigeons .
text2: Ai mai kerde vari so kai o zakono le Devlesko mangelas te den dui terne golumburia . ( Turtledoves vai pigeons )

text: And , behold , there was a man in Jerusalem , whose name was Simeon ; and the same man was just and devout , waiting for the consolation of Israel : and the Holy Ghost was upon him .
text2: Sas ando Jerusalem iek manush kai busholas Simeon . Kodo manush lasho sas ai respektilas le Devles , ai azhukerelas pala e vriama kana le Zhiduvuria avena skepime , ai O Swunto Duxo sas lesa .

text: And it was revealed unto him by the Holy Ghost , that he should not see death , before he had seen the Lord ' s Christ .
text2: Ai O Swunto Duxo phendia leske ke chi merela mai anglal sar te dikhel le skepitores kai si tradino katar O Del .

text: And he came by the Spirit into the temple : and when the parents brought in the child Jesus , to do for him after the custom of the law ,
text2: O Swunto Duxo sikavelas leske kai te zhal , o Simeon gelo ande tampla . O dat ai e dei le Kristoske andine pengo Shav O Jesus ande tamplo te keren so mangelas o zakono .

text: Then took he him up in his arms , and blessed God , and said ,
text2: O Simeon lia le Kristos ande peske vas ai naisilas le Devles , ai motholas :

text: Lord , now lettest thou thy servant depart in peace , according to thy word :
text2: " Devla , akana so phendian kerdilia , ai sai mekes man te merav pachasa .

text: For mine eyes have seen thy salvation ,
text2: Ke dikhlem murhe iakhensa cho skepimos , kai dian ka sa le thema :

text: A light to lighten the Gentiles , and the glory of thy people Israel .
text2: Vediara te sikavel sa le themenge kai si ande lumia , ai dela barimos ande Israel kai si cho narodo . "

text: And Joseph and his mother marvelled at those things which were spoken of him .
text2: O dat ai e dei le Kristoske chudisaile so motholas o Simeon pa Jesus .

text: And Simeon blessed them , and said unto Mary his mother , Behold , this child is set for the fall and rising again of many in Israel ; and for a sign which shall be spoken against ;
text2: O Simeon swuntsosardia le ai phendia la Mariake e dei le Kristoski , O Del alosardia kadala glata te pherel ai te vazdel buten kai si ande Israel . Wo avela katar O Del kai le manush chi mangena .

text: ( Yea , a sword shall pierce through thy own soul also , ) that the thoughts of many hearts may be revealed .
text2: Ai kadia sikavela le ginduria kai si garade ando lengo ilo . Numa tu zhuvlio , e dukh dukhavela cho duxo sar ek sabia . "

text: And there was one Anna , a prophetess , the daughter of Phanuel , of the tribe of Aser : she was of a great age , and had lived with an husband seven years from her virginity ;
text2: Sas ek profeti , Anna busholas , woi sas e shei le manusheske kai busholas Phanuel , ande vitsa kodolenge kai bushon Asher . Phuri sas , traiisardiasas efta bersh le manushesa kai ansurisailisas lesa kana sas terni .

text: And she was a widow of about fourscore and four years , which departed not from the temple , but served God with fastings and prayers night and day .
text2: Ai akana kai si phivli areslisas kal bersh kai sas oxtovardesh tai shtar bersh . Chi zhalastar anda tampla , numa podailas le Devles e diese ai e riate chi xalas ai rhugilaspe .

text: And she coming in that instant gave thanks likewise unto the Lord , and spake of him to all them that looked for redemption in Jerusalem .
text2: Ande kodia momento aresli ai naisilas le Devles , ai delas duma pai glata sa kodolenge kai azhukerenas te skepil O Del o Jerusalem .

text: And when they had performed all things according to the law of the Lord , they returned into Galilee , to their own city Nazareth .
text2: kana kerde so godi mangelas o zakono le Devlesko geletar palpale ande Galilee , ande pengo foro kai bushol Nazareth .

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , filled with wisdom : and the grace of God was upon him .
text2: O tsinorho bariolas , ai zuriavolas ando duxo ; ai gojaver sas e goji , ai o mishtimos le Devlesko sas po leste .

text: Now his parents went to Jerusalem every year at the feast of the passover .
text2: Swako bersh o dat ai e dei le Kristoske zhanas ando Jerusalem pala O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo .

text: And when he was twelve years old , they went up to Jerusalem after the custom of the feast .
text2: Kana O Jesus pherdilo desh u do bershengo gele te xan O Baro Dies le Zhidovongo sar keren swako bersh .

text: And when they had fulfilled the days , as they returned , the child Jesus tarried behind in Jerusalem ; and Joseph and his mother knew not of it .
text2: Kana getosaile le diesa kana xanas O Baro Dies le Zhidovongo geletar , numa O Jesus beshlo ande Jerusalem , ai lesko dat ai leski dei chi zhanenas .

text: But they , supposing him to have been in the company , went a day ' s journey ; and they sought him among their kinsfolk and acquaintance .
text2: Won gindinas ke O Jesus sas penge vortakonsa kai zhanas pa drom , phirde iek dies , porme rodenas les ka penge naimuria ai ka penge vortacha .

text: And when they found him not , they turned back again to Jerusalem , seeking him .
text2: Numa chi arakhle les , pale gele ande Jerusalem te roden les .

text: And it came to pass , that after three days they found him in the temple , sitting in the midst of the doctors , both hearing them , and asking them questions .
text2: O trito dies arakhel les ande tampla , beshelas tele mashkar le Zhiduvuria kai sicharenas o zakono le Devlesko , O Jesus ashunelas lende ai phushelas le vari so .

text: And all that heard him were astonished at his understanding and answers .
text2: Ai sa kai ashunde les chudinaspe che gojaver sas ai sar delas le atweto .

text: And when they saw him , they were amazed : and his mother said unto him , Son , why hast thou thus dealt with us ? behold , thy father and I have sought thee sorrowing .
text2: Lesko dat ai leski dei chudisaile zurales kana dikhle les . Leski dei phendia leske , " Murho shav , sostar kerdian kadia ? Cho dat ai me nekezhisas ai rodasas tu . "

text: And he said unto them , How is it that ye sought me ? wist ye not that I must be about my Father ' s business ?
text2: Ai wo dia le atweto , " Sostar roden ma ? Pate tume chi zhanen ke trobul te avav ando kher murho Dadesko ? "

text: And they understood not the saying which he spake unto them .
text2: Numa won chi haliarde so motholas lenge .

text: And he went down with them , and came to Nazareth , and was subject unto them : but his mother kept all these sayings in her heart .
text2: Porme O Jesus gelotar palpale lensa ande Nazareth , ai pachalas lenge mui , leski dei garavelas sa le vorbi ande pesko ilo .

text: And Jesus increased in wisdom and stature , and in favour with God and man .
text2: O Jesus bariolas ande pesko stato ai vi leski goji , ai bariolas ande dragostia le Devleski ai le manushengi .

text: Now in the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Caesar , Pontius Pilate being governor of Judaea , and Herod being tetrarch of Galilee , and his brother Philip tetrarch of Ituraea and of the region of Trachonitis , and Lysanias the tetrarch of Abilene ,
text2: Kado sas o desh u panshto bersh kai sas o baro themesko kai busholas Tiberius , ai Pontius Pilate sas guvernori ande Judea , o Herod poronchilas pe Galilee , ai lesko phral o Philip poronchilas pe phuv kai bushol Iturea ai Trachonitis ; ai o Lisanias poronchilas pe Abilene ,

text: Annas and Caiaphas being the high priests , the word of God came unto John the son of Zacharias in the wilderness .
text2: Ai Annas ai o Caiaphas sas le bare rasha . E vorba le Devleski geli zhi ka Iovano , o shav kodolesko kai bushol Zechariah , ande pusta .

text: And he came into all the country about Jordan , preaching the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins ;
text2: O Iovano gelo ande sa o them kruglom o pai kai zhal busholas Jordan . Motholas le narodoske , " Keiin tume katar che bezexa ai aven bolde , ai O Del iertila tumare bezexa . "

text: As it is written in the book of the words of Esaias the prophet , saying , The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Kadia areslia so o profeto Isaiah ramosardiasas ande peske klishka , o glaso le manushesko kai tsipil ande pusta , lasharen o drom le Devlesko , keren leske droma vorta !

text: Every valley shall be filled , and every mountain and hill shall be brought low ; and the crooked shall be made straight , and the rough ways shall be made smooth ;
text2: So godi gropi mashkar le plaia aven pherdo sar le plaia ai le mai tsinorhe aven vortome , le droma kai nai vorta avena vortome . Le mai tsinorhe droma kai si chorhe aven vortome .

text: And all flesh shall see the salvation of God .
text2: Ai swako manush dikhela sar skepil O Del ! "

text: Then said he to the multitude that came forth to be baptized of him , O generation of vipers , who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come ?
text2: But narodo avelas kai Iovano te bolel le , ai motholas lenge , " Tume kai san sar o sap , kon sichardia tume ke sai den rigate anglai Swunto xoli kai si te avel ?

text: Bring forth therefore fruits worthy of repentance , and begin not to say within yourselves , We have Abraham to our father : for I say unto you , That God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham .
text2: Keren tumaro zakono vorta kai sikaven kai keisardian katar tumaro bezex , ai na mothon ande tumende , ' Abraham si amaro dat . ' Phenav tumenge chachimasa , O Del sai kerel manush le Abrahamoske katar kadale bax .

text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees : every tree therefore which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: O tover gatalo te shinel le krenzhi kal vuni , swako krenzha kai nai fruta si te avel shindi ai shudini ande iag . "

text: And the people asked him , saying , What shall we do then ?
text2: Antunchi o narodo phushelas les , " So trobul te keras ? "

text: He answereth and saith unto them , He that hath two coats , let him impart to him that hath none ; and he that hath meat , let him do likewise .
text2: Ai wo dia le atweto , " Kodo kai si les dui gada trobul te del iek ka kodo kai nai les , ai kodo kai si les xaben trobul te del kodo kai nai les . "

text: Then came also publicans to be baptized , and said unto him , Master , what shall we do ?
text2: Uni manush kai lenas le love pal taksa , vi won avile te bolenpe ai phushle katar o Iovano , " Gazda , so trobul te keras ? " Ai wo phendia lenge ,

text: And he said unto them , Exact no more than that which is appointed you .
text2: " Na keren te pochinel o narodo ke so si o zakono . "

text: And the soldiers likewise demanded of him , saying , And what shall we do ? And he said unto them , Do violence to no man , neither accuse any falsely ; and be content with your wages .
text2: Ai vi ketani phushenas les , " Ai ame so trobul te keras ? " ai wo phendia lenge , " Na len love kanikastar zorasa vai te xoxaven pe kodo manush . Numa aven raduime so si tumenge pochindo . "

text: And as the people were in expectation , and all men mused in their hearts of John , whether he were the Christ , or not ;
text2: O narodo ashunelas ai pachalaspe , savorhe gindinas ke o Iovano sas o skepitori ( Messiah ) .

text: John answered , saying unto them all , I indeed baptize you with water ; but one mightier than I cometh , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to unloose : he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost and with fire :
text2: Antunchi o Iovano phendia lenge , " Me bolav tume ando pai numa iek manush kai si mai zuralo mandar si te avel , ai me chi sim dosta lasho te phutrav le doria leske papuchenge . Wo bolela tume le Swuntone Duxosa ai iagasa .

text: Whose fan is in his hand , and he will throughly purge his floor , and will gather the wheat into his garner ; but the chaff he will burn with fire unquenchable .
text2: Ande lesko vas si le o pata te alol o jiv ai le suluma , wo chidela o jiv ande peske shtala , numa phabarela le suluma andek iag kai shoxar chi getolpe .

text: And many other things in his exhortation preached he unto the people .
text2: Ai kadia motholas lenge so te keren kai o Iovano motholas e lashi viasta le narodoske .

text: But Herod the tetrarch , being reproved by him for Herodias his brother Philip ' s wife , and for all the evils which Herod had done ,
text2: Numa o Iovano phendia zurale vorbi le guvernoske , o Herod , ke ansurisailo ieka zhuvliasa kai bushol Herodias , kai sas e rhomni leske phraleske , ai vi ke mai kerdiasas but aver chorhe dieli .

text: Added yet this above all , that he shut up John in prison .
text2: Antunchi o Herod mai kerdia iek chorhi diela , thodia le Iovanos ande temnitsa .

text: Now when all the people were baptized , it came to pass , that Jesus also being baptized , and praying , the heaven was opened ,
text2: Kana sa narodo sas boldo , O Jesus vi vo boldiape , ai kana rhugilaspe o cheri phuterdilo .

text: And the Holy Ghost descended in a bodily shape like a dove upon him , and a voice came from heaven , which said , Thou art my beloved Son ; in thee I am well pleased .
text2: Ai O Swunto Duxo vulisto pe leste ande ek stato sar ek gulumbo , ai ek glaso avilo anda rhaio , " Tu san murho Shav kai san mange drago ai ande tute thav murho raduimos . "

text: And Jesus himself began to be about thirty years of age , being ( as was supposed ) the son of Joseph , which was the son of Heli ,
text2: Kana O Jesus nachinail peske buchi trenda bershengolo sas ; le manush gindinas ke sas o shav le Josefosko , ai O Josef sas o shav le Helisosko ,

text: Which was the son of Matthat , which was the son of Levi , which was the son of Melchi , which was the son of Janna , which was the son of Joseph ,
text2: o shav le Matthatosko , o shav le Levisosko , o shav le Mechisosko , o shav le Jannaisosko , o shav le Josefosko ,

text: Which was the son of Mattathias , which was the son of Amos , which was the son of Naum , which was the son of Esli , which was the son of Nagge ,
text2: o shav le Mattathiasosko , o shav le Amososko , o shav le Nahumosko , o shav le Eslisosko , o shav le Naggaisosko ,

text: Which was the son of Maath , which was the son of Mattathias , which was the son of Semei , which was the son of Joseph , which was the son of Juda ,
text2: o shav le Maathosko , o shav le Mattathiasosko , o shav le Semeinosko , o shav le Josefosko , o shav le Jodasosko ,

text: Which was the son of Joanna , which was the son of Rhesa , which was the son of Zorobabel , which was the son of Salathiel , which was the son of Neri ,
text2: o shav le Joananosko , o shav le Rhesasosko , o shav le Zerubbabelosko , o shav le Shealtielosko , o shav le Nerisosko ,

text: Which was the son of Melchi , which was the son of Addi , which was the son of Cosam , which was the son of Elmodam , which was the son of Er ,
text2: o shav le Melchisosko , o shav le Addisosko , o shav le Cosamosko , o shav le Elmadamosko , o shav le Erosko ,
