text: Which was the son of Jose , which was the son of Eliezer , which was the son of Jorim , which was the son of Matthat , which was the son of Levi ,
text2: o shav le Joshuasosko , o shav le Eliezerosko , o shav le Jorimosko , o shav le Matthatosko , o shav le Levisosko ,

text: Which was the son of Simeon , which was the son of Juda , which was the son of Joseph , which was the son of Jonan , which was the son of Eliakim ,
text2: o shav le Simeonosko , o shav le Judahosko , o shav le Josefosko , o shav le Jonamosko , o shav le Eliakimosko ,

text: Which was the son of Melea , which was the son of Menan , which was the son of Mattatha , which was the son of Nathan , which was the son of David ,
text2: o shav le Meleasosko , o shav le Mennasosko , o shav le Mattathasosko , o shav le Nathanosko , o shav le Davidosko ,

text: Which was the son of Jesse , which was the son of Obed , which was the son of Booz , which was the son of Salmon , which was the son of Naasson ,
text2: o shav le Jessesosko , o shav le Obedosko , o shav le Boazosko , o shav le Salmonosko , o shav le Nahshonosko ,

text: Which was the son of Aminadab , which was the son of Aram , which was the son of Esrom , which was the son of Phares , which was the son of Juda ,
text2: o shav le Amminadabosko , o shav le Adminosko , o shav le Arnisosko , o shav le Hezronosko , o shav le Perezosko , o shav le Judahosko ,

text: Which was the son of Jacob , which was the son of Isaac , which was the son of Abraham , which was the son of Thara , which was the son of Nachor ,
text2: o shav le Iakovosko , o shav le Isaakosko , o shav le Abrahamosko , o shav le Terahosko , o shav le Nahorosko ,

text: Which was the son of Saruch , which was the son of Ragau , which was the son of Phalec , which was the son of Heber , which was the son of Sala ,
text2: o shav le Serugosko , o shav le Reusosko , o shav le Pelegosko , o shav le Eberosko , o shav le Shelahosko ,

text: Which was the son of Cainan , which was the son of Arphaxad , which was the son of Sem , which was the son of Noe , which was the son of Lamech ,
text2: o shav le Cainanosko , o shav le Arphaxadosko , o shav le Shemosko , o shav le Noahosko , o shav le Lamechosko ,

text: Which was the son of Mathusala , which was the son of Enoch , which was the son of Jared , which was the son of Maleleel , which was the son of Cainan ,
text2: o shav le Methuselahosko , o shav le Enochosko , o shav le Jaredosko , o shav le Mahalaleelosko , o shav le Cainanosko ,

text: Which was the son of Enos , which was the son of Seth , which was the son of Adam , which was the son of God .
text2: o shav le Enososko , o shav le Sethosko , o shav le Adamosko , o shav le Devlesko .

text: And Jesus being full of the Holy Ghost returned from Jordan , and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness ,
text2: O Jesus pherdo sas le Swuntone Duxosko kana gelotar katar o Jordan , ai sas angerdo katar O Swunto Duxo ande pusta .

text: Being forty days tempted of the devil . And in those days he did eat nothing : and when they were ended , he afterward hungered .
text2: Kotse zumadia les o beng shtarvardesh dies ai chi xalia kanchi sa kodola dies , ai kana nakhle kodola dies bokhailo .

text: And the devil said unto him , If thou be the Son of God , command this stone that it be made bread .
text2: Antunchi o beng phendia leske , " Te san tu O Shav le Devlesko , phen kadale bax te kerdion manrho . "

text: And Jesus answered him , saying , It is written , That man shall not live by bread alone , but by every word of God .
text2: O Jesus dia les atweto , " E Vorba le Devleski mothol , ' O manush nashtil traiil ferdi anda manrho , ' "

text: And the devil , taking him up into an high mountain , shewed unto him all the kingdoms of the world in a moment of time .
text2: Porme o beng angerdia les mai opre , ai sikadia leske strazo sa le amperetsi la phuviake .

text: And the devil said unto him , All this power will I give thee , and the glory of them : for that is delivered unto me ; and to whomsoever I will I give it .
text2: O beng phendia ka Jesus , " Dava tu sakadia putiera ai o barvalimos kadale amperetsiango , sa kadala dieli sas dini mange ai me sai dav le kaske mangav .

text: If thou therefore wilt worship me , all shall be thine .
text2: Ferdi te desa changa angla mande dav le sa tuke . "

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Get thee behind me , Satan : for it is written , Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God , and him only shalt thou serve .
text2: O Jesus dia les atweto , " E Vorba le Devleski mothol , ' Rhugisavo ka cho Del ai ferdi les podaisar . ' "

text: And he brought him to Jerusalem , and set him on a pinnacle of the temple , and said unto him , If thou be the Son of God , cast thyself down from hence :
text2: Antunchi o beng angerdia les ando Jerusalem ai thodia les ta opre pe tampla , ai phendia les , " Te san tu O Shav le Devlesko , shude tu katsar tele .

text: For it is written , He shall give his angels charge over thee , to keep thee :
text2: Ke ramome ande Vorba le Devleski , ' Ke O Del dela ordina peske angelon te arakhen tu . '

text: And in their hands they shall bear thee up , lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone .
text2: Ai phenel , ' Ankerena tu pe penge vas te na dukhaves cho punrho po bax . ' "

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , It is said , Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God .
text2: O Jesus dia les atweto , " E Vorba le Devleski mothol , ' Na zumav che Devles . ' "

text: And when the devil had ended all the temptation , he departed from him for a season .
text2: Kana o beng getosardia te zumavel le Kristos sar wo manglia , wo meklia les xantsi vriama .

text: And Jesus returned in the power of the Spirit into Galilee : and there went out a fame of him through all the region round about .
text2: O Jesus gelo palpale ande Galilee , ande putiera le Swuntone Duxoski . Sa o narodo delas duma pa leste kotsar .

text: And he taught in their synagogues , being glorified of all .
text2: Wo sicharelas ande le synagoguria ai sa o narodo luvudisardia les .

text: And he came to Nazareth , where he had been brought up : and , as his custom was , he went into the synagogue on the sabbath day , and stood up for to read .
text2: O Jesus gelo ando Nazareth kotse kai barilo sas , iek dies kana sas Sabato gelo ande synagogue sar kerelas butivar . Wushtilo opre te jinel E Vorba le Devleski .

text: And there was delivered unto him the book of the prophet Esaias . And when he had opened the book , he found the place where it was written ,
text2: Dine les e klishka le profetoske kai busholas Isaiah . Phuterdia la ai arakhlia kai si ramome ,

text: The Spirit of the Lord is upon me , because he hath anointed me to preach the gospel to the poor ; he hath sent me to heal the brokenhearted , to preach deliverance to the captives , and recovering of sight to the blind , to set at liberty them that are bruised ,
text2: " O Swunto Duxo le Devlesko pe mandelo , wo alosardia ma te anav e lashi viasta kal chorhe . Wo tradia ma te anav o skepimos kodolenge kai si phangle , ai te sastiarav le korhen , te skepiv le manushen kai si chinuime .

text: To preach the acceptable year of the Lord .
text2: Te mothav o bersh kai sikadiola o lashimos le Devlesko . "

text: And he closed the book , and he gave it again to the minister , and sat down . And the eyes of all them that were in the synagogue were fastened on him .
text2: Porme O Jesus phandadia e klishka ai dia la kal slugi la synagogaki ai beshlo tele . Sa o narodo kai sas ande synagogue dikhenas pe leste .

text: And he began to say unto them , This day is this scripture fulfilled in your ears .
text2: Ai wo antunchi mothon lenge , " So jindem ande Vorba le Devleski sikadilia adies kana tume ashundian so jindem . "

text: And all bare him witness , and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth . And they said , Is not this Joseph ' s son ?
text2: Savorhe raduimesas karing O Jesus ai chudinaspe andal shukar vorbi kai motholas .

text: And he said unto them , Ye will surely say unto me this proverb , Physician , heal thyself : whatsoever we have heard done in Capernaum , do also here in thy country .
text2: Ai mothonas , " Nai kado o shav le Josefosko ? " O Jesus phendia lenge , " Suguro si te mothol mange , ' Dokxtoro , sastiar tu tut . ' Ai vi mothon mange , ' Ashundiam , so godi kerdian ando foro kai bushol Capernaum , kerdian sa kodola dieli katse ande cho foro . ' "

text: And he said , Verily I say unto you , No prophet is accepted in his own country .
text2: Porme mai phendia , " Phenav tumenge o chachimos , ' Chi iek profeto nai premisardo ande pesko foro kai kerdilo .

text: But I tell you of a truth , many widows were in Israel in the days of Elias , when the heaven was shut up three years and six months , when great famine was throughout all the land ;
text2: Ashun mange , suguro ke sas but phivlia ande Israel , ande vriama kai sas o Elijah kana o breshind chi dia trin bersh ai dopash , ai ma nas xaben ando them .

text: But unto none of them was Elias sent , save unto Sarepta , a city of Sidon , unto a woman that was a widow .
text2: Ai O Del chi tradia kudules kai bushol Elisha lende numa kai ek zhuvli ka ma nas la rhom kai traiilas andek foro kai busholas Zarephath karing Sidon .

text: And many lepers were in Israel in the time of Eliseus the prophet ; and none of them was cleansed , saving Naaman the Syrian .
text2: Ai sas vi but lepuria ( manush kai chirniolas ka lenge morchi ) ando Israel kana sas o profeto o Elisha , inker chi iek anda lende chi sastilo , numa iek manush kai busholas Namaan ande Syria . "

text: And all they in the synagogue , when they heard these things , were filled with wrath ,
text2: Savorhe ande synagogue sas xoliariko kana ashunde kodola vorbi .

text: And rose up , and thrust him out of the city , and led him unto the brow of the hill whereon their city was built , that they might cast him down headlong .
text2: Wushtilo opre , angerde O Jesus avri anda foro ai angerde les opre po plai kai lengo foro sas kerdo , te shuden les tele .

text: But he passing through the midst of them went his way ,
text2: Numa O Jesus nakhlo mashkar lende ai gelotar .

text: And came down to Capernaum , a city of Galilee , and taught them on the sabbath days .
text2: Antunchi O Jesus gelo ando Capernaum , o foro ande Galilee , kai sicharelas le narodos dies savatosko .

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for his word was with power .
text2: Kodo narodo chudimesas sar sicharelas , ke O Jesus delas duma putierasa .

text: And in the synagogue there was a man , which had a spirit of an unclean devil , and cried out with a loud voice ,
text2: Ande synagogue sas iek manush kai sas ande leste ek beng ; kodo manush tsipilas zurales .

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art ; the Holy One of God .
text2: " So manges amendar , Jesus andai Nazareth ? Tu avilian te mudares ame ? Zhanav mishto ke O Swunto san kai si tradino karar O Del ! "

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him . And when the devil had thrown him in the midst , he came out of him , and hurt him not .
text2: O Jesus dia duma zurales le bengesa , ai dia les ordina te na mai del duma ai te anklel avri anda manush ! O beng peredia kodole manushes pe phuv angla sa o narodo ai anklisto avri anda leste , bi te kerel leske chi iek baio .

text: And they were all amazed , and spake among themselves , saying , What a word is this ! for with authority and power he commandeth the unclean spirits , and they come out .
text2: Sa o narodo chudisailo ai mothonas iek kavreske , " Savata vorba ? Kado manush del ordina putierasa ai zorasa le benges ai anklel avri ! "

text: And the fame of him went out into every place of the country round about .
text2: Ai porme katar godi o narodo delas duma pa Jesus ande kodo foro .

text: And he arose out of the synagogue , and entered into Simon ' s house . And Simon ' s wife ' s mother was taken with a great fever ; and they besought him for her .
text2: O Jesus gelotar andai synagogue ai gelo ka Simon leste khere . E sakra le Simonoski sas la e baro zharo , ai mangle katar O Jesus te sastiarel la .

text: And he stood over her , and rebuked the fever ; and it left her : and immediately she arose and ministered unto them .
text2: Pashilo karing late , ai dia duma zurales ai dia ordina le zharos , ai o zharo gelotar pa late , wushtilo opre ai podaisardia les .

text: Now when the sun was setting , all they that had any sick with divers diseases brought them unto him ; and he laid his hands on every one of them , and healed them .
text2: Kana o kham pelo tele , sa kodola kai sa le naswale kai sas len but fialuria naswalimata . Andine le ka Jesus ai thodia le vas pe lende ai sastiardia le .

text: And devils also came out of many , crying out , and saying , Thou art Christ the Son of God . And he rebuking them suffered them not to speak : for they knew that he was Christ .
text2: Ai vi but benga ankliste avri anda lende , ai tsipinas , " Tu san O Shav le Devlesko ! " Numa O Jesus dias le trad te na mothon , ke zhanenas won ke wo sas o skepitori .

text: And when it was day , he departed and went into a desert place : and the people sought him , and came unto him , and stayed him , that he should not depart from them .
text2: Kana phuterdilo o dies O Jesus anklisto avri anda foro , ai gelotar vari kai te avel korkorho . But narodo rodelas les , kana arakhle les mangenas te ankeren les ai te na meken te zhaltar lendar .

text: And he said unto them , I must preach the kingdom of God to other cities also : for therefore am I sent .
text2: Numa O Jesus phendia lenge , " Trobul te phenav e lashi viasta le rhaioski le Devleski ande kolaver foruria , ke anda kodia O Del tradia ma . "

text: And he preached in the synagogues of Galilee .
text2: Vi delas duma pa Del ande le synagoguria ande Galilee .

text: And it came to pass , that , as the people pressed upon him to hear the word of God , he stood by the lake of Gennesaret ,
text2: Andek dies O Jesus beshelas pasha maria le Gennersaretako , ai o narodo sas pasha leste te ashunen E Vorba le Devleski .

text: And saw two ships standing by the lake : but the fishermen were gone out of them , and were washing their nets .
text2: Dikhlia dui chunuria pasha pai , le masharia nas kotse ke xalavenas penge siti .

text: And he entered into one of the ships , which was Simon ' s , and prayed him that he would thrust out a little from the land . And he sat down , and taught the people out of the ship .
text2: O Jesus anklisto ande iek chuno kai sas le Simonosko , ai mangle lestar te duriol xantsi mai dur katar e phuv . O Jesus beshlo tele ande chuno ai sicharelas le narodos .

text: Now when he had left speaking , he said unto Simon , Launch out into the deep , and let down your nets for a draught .
text2: Kana getosardia te del duma , phendia le Simonoske , " An cho chuno pek than kai si baro pai , ai porme tu ai kodola kai si tusa shuden tumare siti te len mashe . "

text: And Simon answering said unto him , Master , we have toiled all the night , and have taken nothing : nevertheless at thy word I will let down the net .
text2: O Simon phendia leske , " Gazda , sorho riat kerdiam buchi ai chi astardiam kanch , numa pala che vorbi shudav murhe siti tele ando pai . "

text: And when they had this done , they inclosed a great multitude of fishes : and their net brake .
text2: Ai kana shude le , won line but mashe , ke de but mashe kai sas lenge siti shinenas .

text: And they beckoned unto their partners , which were in the other ship , that they should come and help them . And they came , and filled both the ships , so that they began to sink .
text2: Antunchi akharde penge vortakon , kai kerenas buchi ando kolaver chuno , te aven te zhutin le . Avile , ai pherde dui chunuria , de fial but mashe kai tasonas .

text: When Simon Peter saw it , he fell down at Jesus ' knees , saying , Depart from me ; for I am a sinful man , O Lord .
text2: Kana o Simon Petri dikhlia so kerdilia , pelo ande changende angla Jesus ai phendia , " Duriol mandar Devla , ke sim ek bezexalo manush ! "

text: For he was astonished , and all that were with him , at the draught of the fishes which they had taken :
text2: O Simon ai vi kodola kai sas lesa chudisaile pala but mashe kai line sas .

text: And so was also James , and John , the sons of Zebedee , which were partners with Simon . And Jesus said unto Simon , Fear not ; from henceforth thou shalt catch men .
text2: Sakadia sas le vortacha le Simonoske , o Iakov , o Iovano , le shave le Zebedoske . O Jesus phendia le Simonosko , " Na dara , de akanara le manushen astaren . "

text: And when they had brought their ships to land , they forsook all , and followed him .
text2: Antunchi line penge chunuria ai tsirde le pe phuv , ai mekle sa ai linepe pala Jesus .

text: And it came to pass , when he was in a certain city , behold a man full of leprosy : who seeing Jesus fell on his face , and besought him , saying , Lord , if thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Kana O Jesus sas andek foro avilo iek manush kai sas pherdo lepra , kana dikhlia O Jesus shudiape angla leste le mosa pe phuv , ai rhugisailo leste ai phendia , " Gazda , te mangesa sai sastiares ma ! "

text: And he put forth his hand , and touched him , saying , I will : be thou clean . And immediately the leprosy departed from him .
text2: O Jesus lunzhardia o vas , azbadia les ai phendia , " Me mangav ai akana te aves vuzho ! " Ai strazo e lepra gelitar pa kado manush .

text: And he charged him to tell no man : but go , and shew thyself to the priest , and offer for thy cleansing , according as Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: O Jesus dia les trad " Na phen kanikaste so kerdem tuke , numa zhas sikav le rashange sar san , ai mudar la bakrorha kai o Moses dia sas ordina te sikaves savorhenge ke san sasto .

text: But so much the more went there a fame abroad of him : and great multitudes came together to hear , and to be healed by him of their infirmities .
text2: Numa e viasta pe Jesus ashundesas mai but ai mai but , ai but narodo chidelaspe te ashunen leste , ai te sastion ande penge naswalimata .

text: And he withdrew himself into the wilderness , and prayed .
text2: Numa O Jesus duriolas kai nas khonik korkorho te rhugilpe .

text: And it came to pass on a certain day , as he was teaching , that there were Pharisees and doctors of the law sitting by , which were come out of every town of Galilee , and Judaea , and Jerusalem : and the power of the Lord was present to heal them .
text2: Andek dies O Jesus sicharelas , uni Farizeanuria ai le manush kai sicharno zakono beshenas tele , won avile anda gava kai si ande Galilee ai Judea , ai anda Jerusalem , ai O Jesus sas les e putiera te sastiarel le naswalen .

text: And , behold , men brought in a bed a man which was taken with a palsy : and they sought means to bring him in , and to lay him before him .
text2: Uni manush avile , andine manushes po than kai nashti phirelas ; won rodenas te anen les ando kher , ai te thon les angle leste , O Jesus .

text: And when they could not find by what way they might bring him in because of the multitude , they went upon the housetop , and let him down through the tiling with his couch into the midst before Jesus .
text2: Numa chi zhanenas katar te keren te den ando kher , ke but narodo sas , ankliste po chardako , ai vuliarde les tele pai iek gropa kai sas opre le patosa mashkar o narodo ai angla Jesus .

text: And when he saw their faith , he said unto him , Man , thy sins are forgiven thee .
text2: Kana O Jesus dikhlia lengo pachamos , wo phendia kal manushes " Che bezexa iertimele , murho vortako . "

text: And the scribes and the Pharisees began to reason , saying , Who is this which speaketh blasphemies ? Who can forgive sins , but God alone ?
text2: Le Farizeanuria ai le Gramnoturia denas pe duma ande pende , ai phenenas , " Kon si kado manush kai del duma nasul pa Del ? Chi iek manush sai iertil le bezexa , ferdi O Del sai iertil . "

text: But when Jesus perceived their thoughts , he answering said unto them , What reason ye in your hearts ?
text2: O Jesus zhanglia lengo ginduria , ai phendia lenge ,

text: Whether is easier , to say , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Rise up and walk ?
text2: " Savendar ginduria si tume ando ilo ? So si mai vushoro te phenel tu " Che bezexa iertimele " vai " Vushti opre ai phir ? "

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power upon earth to forgive sins , ( he said unto the sick of the palsy , ) I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy couch , and go into thine house .
text2: " Numa ke zhanen ke O Shav le Manushengo pe phuv si les putiera te iertil le bezexa , ai phendia le bangeske , " Vushti opre , le cho than ai zha khere . "

text: And immediately he rose up before them , and took up that whereon he lay , and departed to his own house , glorifying God .
text2: Strazo vushtilo angla lende , lia pesko than kai beshelas pe leste , ai gelotar khere . Ai naisilas le Devles .

text: And they were all amazed , and they glorified God , and were filled with fear , saying , We have seen strange things to day .
text2: Sa narodo chudisailo , naisin le Devles , ai darasa , phenenas , " Dikhliam adies shodo dieli . "

text: And after these things he went forth , and saw a publican , named Levi , sitting at the receipt of custom : and he said unto him , Follow me .
text2: Pala kodia O Jesus anklisto avri ai dikhlia ieke manushes kai chidelas le love le guvernoske , wo busholas Levi , wo beshelas po than kai avenas le manush te pochinen e taksa , ai O Jesus phendia leske , " Aidi pala mande . "

text: And he left all , rose up , and followed him .
text2: Ai kodo manush vushtilo opre , meklia sa ai liape pala leste .

text: And Levi made him a great feast in his own house : and there was a great company of publicans and of others that sat down with them .
text2: Porme o Levi kerdia iek bari pachiv le Jesusos ando pesko kher . Ai but manush kai chidenas taksa ai aver narodo sas kai skafidi lensa .

text: But their scribes and Pharisees murmured against his disciples , saying , Why do ye eat and drink with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Uni Farizeanuria ai le Gramnoturia marenas mui pa leske disipluria , " Sostar tume xan ai pen le manushensa kai chiden love ( taksa ) ai le bezexalensa ? "

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , They that are whole need not a physician ; but they that are sick .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Chi trobul o dokxtoro kodolen kai si saste , numa kodolen kai si naswale .

text: I came not to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Chi avilem te akharav le lashe manushen . Avilem te akharav le bezexalen . "

text: And they said unto him , Why do the disciples of John fast often , and make prayers , and likewise the disciples of the Pharisees ; but thine eat and drink ?
text2: Ai phenen leske , " Le disipluria le Iovanoske ai vi le disipluria le Farizeanonge postin butivar ai rhuginpe , numa che disipluria xan ai pen . "

text: And he said unto them , Can ye make the children of the bridechamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ?
text2: Ai O Jesus phendia lenge , " Sar sai postin le vortacha le rhomeske , kana o rhom lensa lo ?

text: But the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , and then shall they fast in those days .
text2: Numa le dies aven , kai o rhom zhalatar , antunchi sai postina . "

text: And he spake also a parable unto them ; No man putteth a piece of a new garment upon an old ; if otherwise , then both the new maketh a rent , and the piece that was taken out of the new agreeth not with the old .
text2: Antunchi O Jesus phendia lenge ek paramichi : " Khonik chi shinel iek kotor andal neve tsalia te thol pal phurane tsalia , ke antunchi wo shinel le tsalia neve , ai o kotor kai shindia chi maladiol kal phurane .

text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles ; else the new wine will burst the bottles , and be spilled , and the bottles shall perish .
text2: Khonik chi thol nevi mol andel phurane morchia ; ke e mol e nevi shinel e morchi , ai e mol shordiol ai e morchi nai lashi .

text: But new wine must be put into new bottles ; and both are preserved .
text2: Numa trobul te thon e nevi mol andel nevi morchi .

text: No man also having drunk old wine straightway desireth new : for he saith , The old is better .
text2: Ai khonik kana pela e mol phurai chi mangel nevi mol . E phurai mol mai lashi .

text: And it came to pass on the second sabbath after the first , that he went through the corn fields ; and his disciples plucked the ears of corn , and did eat , rubbing them in their hands .
text2: Andek dies Savatone O Jesus nakhelas andel kimpuria le jiveske , leske disipluria lenas jiv , phagenas le jiv ande penge vas , ai xale .

text: And certain of the Pharisees said unto them , Why do ye that which is not lawful to do on the sabbath days ?
text2: Uni Farizeanuria phende lenge , " Sostar keren so nai slobodo te keren Savatone ? "

text: And Jesus answering them said , Have ye not read so much as this , what David did , when himself was an hungred , and they which were with him ;
text2: O Jesus dia le atweto , " Pate chi jindian so kerdia o David , kana wo ai kodola kai sas lesa bokhale sas .

text: How he went into the house of God , and did take and eat the shewbread , and gave also to them that were with him ; which it is not lawful to eat but for the priests alone ?
text2: Gelo ando kher le Devlesko , ai lia le manrhe ( Shewbread ) , ai xalia ai dia kodolen kai sas lesa , ai nai slobodo te keren kadia de ferdi le rashange te xan kodo manrho ? "

text: And he said unto them , That the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath .
text2: Ai mai phendia lenge , " Ke O Shav le Manushesko si o Gazda po Savato . "

text: And it came to pass also on another sabbath , that he entered into the synagogue and taught : and there was a man whose right hand was withered .
text2: Aver dies pale Savatone O Jesus gelo ande synagogue ai sicharelas ; ai kotse sas o manush kai o vas o chacho kodole le manushesko sas shuko .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees watched him , whether he would heal on the sabbath day ; that they might find an accusation against him .
text2: Le Gramnoturia ai le Farizeanuria mangenas te thon dosh pe leste . Lenas sama po Jesus te sastiarela vari kas Savatone .

text: But he knew their thoughts , and said to the man which had the withered hand , Rise up , and stand forth in the midst . And he arose and stood forth .
text2: Numa O Jesus zhanelas lenge ginduria , ai phendia le manusheske kai sas lesko vas shuko , " Vushti opre , ai besh kata mashkaral . " Vushtilo opre .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , I will ask you one thing ; Is it lawful on the sabbath days to do good , or to do evil ? to save life , or to destroy it ?
text2: Antunchi O Jesus phendia lenge , " Phushav tume , So si slobodo adies Savatosko te kerel mishtimos vai te kerel nasulimos ; te sai skepis le manushes vai te mudares le manushes ? "

text: And looking round about upon them all , he said unto the man , Stretch forth thy hand . And he did so : and his hand was restored whole as the other .
text2: Wo dikhlia pe lende , ai phendia le manusheske , " Lunzhar cho vas , " ai kodo manush lunzhardia pesko vas ai lesko vas sastilo .

text: And they were filled with madness ; and communed one with another what they might do to Jesus .
text2: Savorhe xolaile ai denas pe duma mashkar pende so te keren le Jesusosko .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that he went out into a mountain to pray , and continued all night in prayer to God .
text2: Ande kodia vriama O Jesus gelo po plai te rhugilpe , ai sa e riat nakhlo te rhugilpe ka Del .

text: And when it was day , he called unto him his disciples : and of them he chose twelve , whom also he named apostles ;
text2: Kana phuterdiol o dies O Jesus akhardia peske disiplon ; ai alosardia desh u dui , ai akhardia le Apostles .

text: Simon , ( whom he also named Peter , ) and Andrew his brother , James and John , Philip and Bartholomew ,
text2: Ai dia le anav , iek busholas o Simon kai akhardo sas o Petri ai lesko phral Andre , o Iakov ai o Iovano , o Philip ai o Bartholomew ,

text: Matthew and Thomas , James the son of Alphaeus , and Simon called Zelotes ,
text2: Mate ai o Thomas , Iakov o shav le Alphaeusosko , ai o Simon akharenas les Zelotes .

text: And Judas the brother of James , and Judas Iscariot , which also was the traitor .
text2: O Judas o shav le Iakovosko , ai Judas Iscariot , kodo kai purhisardia O Jesus .

text: And he came down with them , and stood in the plain , and the company of his disciples , and a great multitude of people out of all Judaea and Jerusalem , and from the sea coast of Tyre and Sidon , which came to hear him , and to be healed of their diseases ;
text2: Ai avilo tele lensa katar e plaiing , ai terdilo pek than kai sas but narodo anda leske disipluria . Sas but narodo anda Judea ai anda Jerusalem , ai anda le gava Tire ai Sidon pasha pai , won avile te ashunen les , ai te aven saste anda penge naswalimos .

text: And they that were vexed with unclean spirits : and they were healed .
text2: Kodola kai sas chinuime katar o bi vuzho sastionas ,

text: And the whole multitude sought to touch him : for there went virtue out of him , and healed them all .
text2: ai sa o narodo rodelas te azbal le Jesusos , ke putiera anklelas angla leste , ai sastiarelas le savorhen .

text: And he lifted up his eyes on his disciples , and said , Blessed be ye poor : for yours is the kingdom of God .
text2: Antunchi O Jesus vazdia le iakha pe peske disipluria , ai phendia " Raduime te aven tume kai san chorhe ; ke o rhaio le Devlesko tumaro si .

text: Blessed are ye that hunger now : for ye shall be filled . Blessed are ye that weep now : for ye shall laugh .
text2: Raduime te aven tume kai san bokhale akana ; ke avela tume dino but .

text: Blessed are ye , when men shall hate you , and when they shall separate you from their company , and shall reproach you , and cast out your name as evil , for the Son of man ' s sake .
text2: Raduime te aven tume kai roven akana ; ke asana . Raduime te aven gretsona tume le manush , kana gonina tume , kana chinuina tume , ai kana shudena tumaro anav sar kanch pa O Shav le Manushesko .

text: Rejoice ye in that day , and leap for joy : for , behold , your reward is great in heaven : for in the like manner did their fathers unto the prophets .
text2: Raduin tume kodo dies , ai xoten raduimastar ke tumari podarka avela bari ando rhaio , ke kadia kerenas lenge dada le profetonsa .

text: But woe unto you that are rich ! for ye have received your consolation .
text2: " Numa nasul avela tumenge kai san barvale , ke si tume swako fielo .

text: Woe unto you that are full ! for ye shall hunger . Woe unto you that laugh now ! for ye shall mourn and weep .
text2: Nasul avela tumenge kai si tume but xabe , ke avena bokhale . Nasul avela tumenge kai asan akana , ke nekezhis ai roves .

text: Woe unto you , when all men shall speak well of you ! for so did their fathers to the false prophets .
text2: Nasul avela , kana sa le manush phenena mishtimos pa tumende ! Ke kadia kerenas lenge dada le profetonsa .

text: But I say unto you which hear , Love your enemies , do good to them which hate you ,
text2: " Numa me phenav tumenge kai ashunen ma te aven tumenge drago tumare duzhmaia , keren mishtimos kodolenge kai san lenge griatsia .

text: Bless them that curse you , and pray for them which despitefully use you .
text2: Swuntson kodolen kai den tume armaia , rhugin kodolenge kai chi keren tumensa mishto .

text: And unto him that smiteth thee on the one cheek offer also the other ; and him that taketh away thy cloke forbid not to take thy coat also .
text2: Te dela tu vari kon iek palma pai buka , de les vi le kolaver ; te lela vari kon chi raxami , mek les te lel vi chi bunda .

text: Give to every man that asketh of thee ; and of him that taketh away thy goods ask them not again .
text2: De kodoles kai mangel vari so tutar , ai te lel vari so tutar na manges palpale katar kodo kai dian les .

text: And as ye would that men should do to you , do ye also to them likewise .
text2: So mangen tume te keren le kolaver tumenge , keren vi tume lenge .

text: For if ye love them which love you , what thank have ye ? for sinners also love those that love them .
text2: " Te aven tumenge drago kodola kai san vi tume lenge drago , che mishtimos keren ? Vi le bezexale drago lenge kodola kai si vi won lenge drago .

text: And if ye do good to them which do good to you , what thank have ye ? for sinners also do even the same .
text2: Te kerena mishtimos kodolenge kai keren tumenge mishtimos , che mishtimos keren ? Vi le bezexale keren kadia .

text: And if ye lend to them of whom ye hope to receive , what thank have ye ? for sinners also lend to sinners , to receive as much again .
text2: Ai te dena le kodolen kai tume zhanen ke vi won dena tumen , che mishtimos keren ? Vi le bezexale den kal bezexale saxke te keren vi le sakadia .

text: But love ye your enemies , and do good , and lend , hoping for nothing again ; and your reward shall be great , and ye shall be the children of the Highest : for he is kind unto the unthankful and to the evil .
text2: Numa te aven tumenge drago tumare duzhmaia , ai keren mishtimos lenge ; den bi te azhukeren palpale . Ai tumari podarka avela bari ai aven shave le Devleski ; ke O Del lasholo kodolensa kai chi naisin leske , ai vi kodolensa kai nai lashe .

text: Be ye therefore merciful , as your Father also is merciful .
text2: Aven lasho sar tumaro Dat , lasholo .

text: Judge not , and ye shall not be judged : condemn not , and ye shall not be condemned : forgive , and ye shall be forgiven :
text2: " Na keren kris pe kanikaste , ai chi avel chi pe tumende kris ; na thon dosh ai chi tume chi aven doshale ; iertin ai vi tume aven iertime ;

text: Give , and it shall be given unto you ; good measure , pressed down , and shaken together , and running over , shall men give into your bosom . For with the same measure that ye mete withal it shall be measured to you again .
text2: Den , ai avela vi tumen dino ; ai si tume dosta , ai vi mai but , sar den ka kolaver , avena palpale tumen mai but sar dian .

text: And he spake a parable unto them , Can the blind lead the blind ? shall they not both fall into the ditch ?
text2: Ai O Jesus phendia lenge aver paramichi , " Sar sai iek korho manush angerel avre korhes . Vi le dui peren ande gropa .

text: The disciple is not above his master : but every one that is perfect shall be as his master .
text2: O disiplo nai mai baro katar pesko gazda , numa swako disiplo kai phirela vorta avela sar pesko gazda .

text: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye , but perceivest not the beam that is in thine own eye ?
text2: Sostar dikhes e sulum kai si ande iakh che phraleski , kana tut si tu khash ande chiri iakh ?

text: Either how canst thou say to thy brother , Brother , let me pull out the mote that is in thine eye , when thou thyself beholdest not the beam that is in thine own eye ? Thou hypocrite , cast out first the beam out of thine own eye , and then shalt thou see clearly to pull out the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye .
text2: Vai sar sai mothos che phraleske , ' Phrala , mek ma te lav e sulum kai si tu ande iakh , ' kana tu chi dikhes o khash kai si ande chiri iakh ? O manush kai ankerdiol so chi san ! Le avri mai anglal o khash kai si ande chiri iakh , ai antunchi dikhesa sar te ankalaves e sulum kai si ande iakh che phraleski .

text: For a good tree bringeth not forth corrupt fruit ; neither doth a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit .
text2: E lashi khash nashti bariol fruta chorhi , ai chi e chorhi khash chi bariol fruta lashi .

text: For every tree is known by his own fruit . For of thorns men do not gather figs , nor of a bramble bush gather they grapes .
text2: Ke palai fruta dikhes te si e khash chorhi vai lashi . Le manush nashti chidenpe figi katar kanrhe , vai stuguro katar kanrhe .

text: A good man out of the good treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is good ; and an evil man out of the evil treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is evil : for of the abundance of the heart his mouth speaketh .
text2: O manush o lasho , ankalavel lashe dieli anda lashimos ka si les anda ilo , ai o manush o chorho ankalavel chorhe dieli andal chorhe dieli kai si les garade , ke o manush mothol anda mui so si les ando ilo . "

text: And why call ye me , Lord , Lord , and do not the things which I say ?
text2: " Sostar akharen ma , Devla , ai chi keren so mothav tumenge ?

text: Whosoever cometh to me , and heareth my sayings , and doeth them , I will shew you to whom he is like :
text2: Sikavava tumenge pe kaste miazol , swako manush kai avel mande ashunel murhe vorbi ai kerel le .

text: He is like a man which built an house , and digged deep , and laid the foundation on a rock : and when the flood arose , the stream beat vehemently upon that house , and could not shake it : for it was founded upon a rock .
text2: Kodo manush si sar iek manush kai kerel iek kher , kerdia bari gropa , ai kerdia bax , fundania po bax , o pai kai xhal dia opral , o pai avilo po kher , ai o kher chi mishtisailo , ke kodo kher mishto kerdo sas .

text: But he that heareth , and doeth not , is like a man that without a foundation built an house upon the earth ; against which the stream did beat vehemently , and immediately it fell ; and the ruin of that house was great .
text2: Numa kodo kai ashunel ai chi kerel so mothav , wo si sar iek manush kai kerdia iek kher pe phuv , bi fundaniako , o pai avilo pe kodo kher ai kodo kher pelo , ai chi mai arashilia kanch .

text: Now when he had ended all his sayings in the audience of the people , he entered into Capernaum .
text2: Kana O Jesus getosardia sa pesko divano angla narodo , gelo ando Capernaum .

text: And a certain centurion ' s servant , who was dear unto him , was sick , and ready to die .
text2: Iek manush kai poronchilas pe iek shel ketani sas les iek sluga kai sas leske drago ; ai kudia sluga sas naswalo , merimasko .

text: And when he heard of Jesus , he sent unto him the elders of the Jews , beseeching him that he would come and heal his servant .
text2: Kodo manush kana ashundia pa Jesus , tradia phure Zhidovon leste te phushel les te avel te sastiarel lesko sluga .

text: And when they came to Jesus , they besought him instantly , saying , That he was worthy for whom he should do this :
text2: Avile ka Jesus , ai phushenas les , phenenas , " Kodo manush si respektime ai trobul te avela sasto .

text: For he loveth our nation , and he hath built us a synagogue .
text2: Ke kodo manush drago leske amaro narodo , ai wo kerdia amare synagogue . "

text: Then Jesus went with them . And when he was now not far from the house , the centurion sent friends to him , saying unto him , Lord , trouble not thyself : for I am not worthy that thou shouldest enter under my roof :
text2: O Jesus gelo lensa , nas dur katar lesko kher , kana kodo manush kai poronchilas peske ketani , tradia peske vortachen te mothon le Devleski , " Na nashen pala mande , ke chi sim dosta vorta te aves mande khere .

text: Wherefore neither thought I myself worthy to come unto thee : but say in a word , and my servant shall be healed .
text2: Sa anda kodia chi haliardema dosta vorta te zhav me karing tute , numa phen iek vorba , ai murho sluga avela sasto .

text: For I also am a man set under authority , having under me soldiers , and I say unto one , Go , and he goeth ; and to another , Come , and he cometh ; and to my servant , Do this , and he doeth it .
text2: Ke me kai trobul te kerav so mothon kodola kai si mai bare mandar , si ma ketani te lel murho vas , ai phenav iekeske , " Zha ' , ai kodo zhal ; ai kolavreske mothav , ' Aidi ' , ai avel ; ai murha slugaki mothav , ' Ker kadia ' , ai wo kerel .

text: When Jesus heard these things , he marvelled at him , and turned him about , and said unto the people that followed him , I say unto you , I have not found so great faith , no , not in Israel .
text2: Kana O Jesus ashundia kadala vorbi , chudisailo ai boldinisailo karing o narodo kai lelas pala leste , ai phendia , " Me mothav tumenge , chi anda Israel chi arakhlem kasavestar pachamos , "

text: And they that were sent , returning to the house , found the servant whole that had been sick .
text2: Kana aresle khere le manush kai sas tradine katar kodo manush karing O Jesus , arakhle sasto o sluga kai sas naswalo .

text: And it came to pass the day after , that he went into a city called Nain ; and many of his disciples went with him , and much people .
text2: O kolaver dies O Jesus gelo andek gav kai bushol Nain ; leske disipluria ai but narodo zhanas lesa .

text: Now when he came nigh to the gate of the city , behold , there was a dead man carried out , the only son of his mother , and she was a widow : and much people of the city was with her .
text2: Kana areslo pasha o wudar le forosko , manush zhanas te gropon mules , iek zhuvli kai sas la ferdi iek shav , phivli sas , ai but narodo sas lasa kodo le gavesko .

text: And when the Lord saw her , he had compassion on her , and said unto her , Weep not .
text2: Kana O Del dikhlia la , pelia leski mila anda late , ai phendia lake , " Na rov ! "

text: And he came and touched the bier : and they that bare him stood still . And he said , Young man , I say unto thee , Arise .
text2: Pashilo ai azbadia o khash kai sas o mulo andre ; kodola manush kai ingerenas o khash terdile . O Jesus phendia . " Terno manush , me phenav tuke , Vushti opre ! "

text: And he that was dead sat up , and began to speak . And he delivered him to his mother .
text2: O mulo vushtilo opre ai beshlo tele ai delas duma , ai O Jesus del les palpale ka peski dei .

text: And there came a fear on all : and they glorified God , saying , That a great prophet is risen up among us ; and , That God hath visited his people .
text2: Savorhe daraile , ai luvudinas le Devles , ai mothonas , " Iek baro profeto si mashkar amende ! O Del avilo te skepil pesko narodo ! "

text: And this rumour of him went forth throughout all Judaea , and throughout all the region round about .
text2: E viasta pa Jesus geli ande sa e Judea , ai sa le foruria kai sas pashe .

text: And the disciples of John shewed him of all these things .
text2: Le Iovanoske disipluria phende leske pa kadala dieli .

text: And John calling unto him two of his disciples sent them to Jesus , saying , Art thou he that should come ? or look we for another ?
text2: O Iovano akhardia duien andal slugi ai tradia le karing O Jesus , te phushen lestar , " Tu san kodo kai trobulas te avel , vai trobul te azhukeras avres ? "

text: When the men were come unto him , they said , John Baptist hath sent us unto thee , saying , Art thou he that should come ? or look we for another ?
text2: Kana aresle ka Jesus , phende , " O Iovano o baptisto tradia amen karing tute , te mothos , " Tu san kodo kai trobul te avel , vai trobul te azhukeras avres ? "

text: And in that same hour he cured many of their infirmities and plagues , and of evil spirits ; and unto many that were blind he gave sight .
text2: Ande kadia vriama O Jesus sastiardia bute manushen kai sas naswale , bange , kodola kai sas beng ande lende , ai phuterdia le iakha bute korhen .

text: Then Jesus answering said unto them , Go your way , and tell John what things ye have seen and heard ; how that the blind see , the lame walk , the lepers are cleansed , the deaf hear , the dead are raised , to the poor the gospel is preached .
text2: O Jesus dia atweto ka le Iovanoske disipluria , " Zhan palpale ! Mothon le Iovanoske so dikhlian ai so ashundian ! Le korhe dikhen , le bange phiren , le lepra vuzhile , le kashuke ashunen , le mule vushten , e lashi viasta si phendi le chorhe manushenge .

text: And blessed is he , whosoever shall not be offended in me .
text2: Raduime te avel kodo kai chi rimol leske kanch ! "

text: And when the messengers of John were departed , he began to speak unto the people concerning John , What went ye out into the wilderness for to see ? A reed shaken with the wind ?
text2: Kana kodola kai tradia sas o Iovano geletar , O Jesus phendia le narodoske pai Iovano , " So gelian tume te dikhen ande pusta ? Iek sulum kai mishtil katar e barval ?

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A man clothed in soft raiment ? Behold , they which are gorgeously apparelled , and live delicately , are in kings ' courts .
text2: Numa so gelian te dikhen ? Iek manush kai si vuriardo ande shukar tsalia ? Eta , kodola kai si le shukar tsalia , ai kai traiin ando mishtimos , kodola traiin andel khera le amperatonge !

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A prophet ? Yea , I say unto you , and much more than a prophet .
text2: So gelian tume te dikhen ? Iek profeto ? E , me phenav tumenge , dikhliam mai but sar iek profeto .

text: This is he , of whom it is written , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: O Iovano si kodo kai si ramome , " Eta , tradav murha sluga kai anel e viasta angle tute , te lasharel o drom angla tute . "

text: For I say unto you , Among those that are born of women there is not a greater prophet than John the Baptist : but he that is least in the kingdom of God is greater than he .
text2: Me phenav tumenge , " Mashkar kodole kai arakhadile katar e zhuvli nai mai bare de sar o Iovano o baptisto , inker o mai tsinorho ando rhaio le Devlesko mai baro lestar . "

text: And all the people that heard him , and the publicans , justified God , being baptized with the baptism of John .
text2: Ai sa o narodo kai ashundia les , ai vi le manush kai chiden e taksa , phende ke vorta so phenel O Del , ai mekle te bolel o Iovano .

text: But the Pharisees and lawyers rejected the counsel of God against themselves , being not baptized of him .
text2: Numa le Farizeanuria ai le ablokatura chi bolenas pe lestar , phende ke nas vorta so mothol O Del .

text: And the Lord said , Whereunto then shall I liken the men of this generation ? and to what are they like ?
text2: " No pala kaste malaven kadala manush kadala vriamake , ai pe kaste miazon .

text: They are like unto children sitting in the marketplace , and calling one to another , and saying , We have piped unto you , and ye have not danced ; we have mourned to you , and ye have not wept .
text2: Won miazon sar glate kai beshen ando bazari , ai kai den duma iek kavresa ai mothon , ' Jilabadiam ande tuturaza , ai tume chi kheldian ai jilabadian jilia miloso ai tume chi ruian . '

text: For John the Baptist came neither eating bread nor drinking wine ; and ye say , He hath a devil .
text2: O Iovano o baptisto avilo ai chi xal o manrho ai chi pel mol ; ai tume mothon ' o beng si ande leste . '

text: The Son of man is come eating and drinking ; and ye say , Behold a gluttonous man , and a winebibber , a friend of publicans and sinners !
text2: O Shav le Manushesko avilo , ai xalas ai pelas ; ai tume phende , " Dikh , kado manush xal but ai pel but , ek vortakolo le manushensa kai chiden e taksa ai le bezexalensa ! "

text: But wisdom is justified of all her children .
text2: Numa o chachimos sikadilo katar le glate .

text: And one of the Pharisees desired him that he would eat with him . And he went into the Pharisee ' s house , and sat down to meat .
text2: Iek Farisi mangliape katar O Jesus te xal lesa . O Jesus gelo ando kher le manushengo ai thodiape kai skafidi te xal .

text: And , behold , a woman in the city , which was a sinner , when she knew that Jesus sat at meat in the Pharisee ' s house , brought an alabaster box of ointment ,
text2: Sas iek zhuvli bezexali kai sas ando gav , kana ashundia ke O Jesus sas pa e skafidi ando kher le Farizeanongo , andini iek botela pherdo duxi .

text: And stood at his feet behind him weeping , and began to wash his feet with tears , and did wipe them with the hairs of her head , and kissed his feet , and anointed them with the ointment .
text2: Ai beshelas pashal punrhe le Jesusoske , ai rovelas ; ai lake asua chindarde le punrhe le Jesusoske , ai porme koslia leske balensa ai chumidia leske punrhe , ai thodia duxi pe lende .

text: Now when the Pharisee which had bidden him saw it , he spake within himself , saying , This man , if he were a prophet , would have known who and what manner of woman this is that toucheth him : for she is a sinner .
text2: O Farisi kai akhardiasas le Jesusos ando pesko kher ai dikhlia so kerdilia , motholas ande peste , " Kado manush te avilino profeto , zhanglino so si kodia zhuvli kai azbal les ; wo zhanglino ke bezexalila . "

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Simon , I have somewhat to say unto thee . And he saith , Master , say on .
text2: O Jesus phendia leske , " Simon , si ma vari so te mothav tuke . " O Simon phendia , " De duma , Gazda . "

text: There was a certain creditor which had two debtors : the one owed five hundred pence , and the other fifty .
text2: Dui manush sas kai kamenas leske love , iek kamelas leske pansh shela teliara ai o kolaver panvardesh teliara .

text: And when they had nothing to pay , he frankly forgave them both . Tell me therefore , which of them will love him most ?
text2: Sar nas le love te pochinen , wo chi mai manglia peske love lendar . No O Jesus phushel , " Savo andal dui avela lenge drago kodo manush ? "

text: Simon answered and said , I suppose that he , to whom he forgave most . And he said unto him , Thou hast rightly judged .
text2: O Simon dia atweto , " Me gindiv ke kuko kai diasas les mai but . " O Jesus phendia leske , " Vorta phendian . "

text: And he turned to the woman , and said unto Simon , Seest thou this woman ? I entered into thine house , thou gavest me no water for my feet : but she hath washed my feet with tears , and wiped them with the hairs of her head .
text2: Porme dikhlia pe zhuvli , ai phendia le Simonoske , " Dikhes kacha zhuvli ? Avilem ande cho kher ; ai chi dian ma vov si pai te xalavel murhe punrhe numa woi chindiatar le peske asuensa ai koslia le balensa .

text: Thou gavest me no kiss : but this woman since the time I came in hath not ceased to kiss my feet .
text2: Chi chumidian ma , numa woi de sar avilem ando kher , sa murhe punrhe chumidel .

text: My head with oil thou didst not anoint : but this woman hath anointed my feet with ointment .
text2: Chi shordian vov si vuloi pe murho shero , numa woi shordia duxi pe murhe punrhe .

text: Wherefore I say unto thee , Her sins , which are many , are forgiven ; for she loved much : but to whom little is forgiven , the same loveth little .
text2: Anda kodia mothav tuke , lake but bezexa iertimele , ke drago simas lake . Numa kodoles ke kai iertin xantsi , kodo volil xantsi . "

text: And he said unto her , Thy sins are forgiven .
text2: Ai O Jesus mothol la zhuvliake , " Che bezexa iertimele ! "

text: And they that sat at meat with him began to say within themselves , Who is this that forgiveth sins also ?
text2: Kodola kai sas kai skafidi lesa mothon ande pende , " Kon si kado kai iertil vi le bezexa ? "

text: And he said to the woman , Thy faith hath saved thee ; go in peace .
text2: Numa O Jesus phendia la zhuvliake , " Cho pachamos skepisardia tu , zha pachasa . "

text: And it came to pass afterward , that he went throughout every city and village , preaching and shewing the glad tidings of the kingdom of God : and the twelve were with him ,
text2: Porme O Jesus zhalas foro forestar , ai gav gavestar ai motholas e lashi viasta pa rhaio le Devlesko ;

text: And certain women , which had been healed of evil spirits and infirmities , Mary called Magdalene , out of whom went seven devils ,
text2: ai xantsi zhuvlia kai sastilesas anda chorhe duxuria ai andal naswalimata : e Maria , kai akharenas la Magalena , ai anklistesas anda late le efta bengen ;

text: And Joanna the wife of Chuza Herod ' s steward , and Susanna , and many others , which ministered unto him of their substance .
text2: Joanna , e rhomni le Chazasosli , kai lele sama katar o amperato Herod ; ai Susanna ; ai but aver zhuvli kai zhutisarde le Jesososke penge mishtimasa .

text: And when much people were gathered together , and were come to him out of every city , he spake by a parable :
text2: But manush avenas ai avenas anda foro forestar ka Jesus , ai kana o narodo chidinisailo , O Jesus phendia lenge ek paramichi .

text: A sower went out to sow his seed : and as he sowed , some fell by the way side ; and it was trodden down , and the fowls of the air devoured it .
text2: " Iek manush gelo te shudel peske sumuntsi ; kana shudelas sumuntsi , uni pelia andal sumuntsi pasha drom , kai le manush phiravenas ai le sumuntsi sas telal punrhe , ai le chiriklia avile ai xale le .

text: And some fell upon a rock ; and as soon as it was sprung up , it withered away , because it lacked moisture .
text2: Ai uni pele po than kai sas bax ; ai kana barile shuchile ; ke nas vov si chingo .

text: And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns sprang up with it , and choked it .
text2: Ai uni pele mashkar le kanrhe ; kodola kanrhe barile mashkar le patria ai tasade le .

text: And other fell on good ground , and sprang up , and bare fruit an hundredfold . And when he had said these things , he cried , He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Uni sumuntsi pele ande lashi phuv ; barile le sumuntsi ai dine fruta iek shel pek shel . " Ai kana dia duma kadia , O Jesus phendia , " Ashun , kodo kai si les khan te ashunel , trobul e ashunel . "

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , What might this parable be ?
text2: Leske disipluria phushle les , " So znachil kadia paramichi ? "

text: And he said , Unto you it is given to know the mysteries of the kingdom of God : but to others in parables ; that seeing they might not see , and hearing they might not understand .
text2: O Jesus dia le atweto , " Ke tumenge sas shinado te zhanen so si garado pa e amperetsia le Devleski , numa le kolavrenge si phendo ande paramichi , saxke te dikhen numa chi dikhen , ai te ashunen numa chi haliaren kanch . "

text: Now the parable is this : The seed is the word of God .
text2: " Eta , so znachil kadia paramichi : e sumuntsa si E Vorba le Devleski .

text: Those by the way side are they that hear ; then cometh the devil , and taketh away the word out of their hearts , lest they should believe and be saved .
text2: Le sumuntsi kai pele pasha drom si kodola kai ashunen ; numa o beng avel ai lel anda lengo ilo e vorba , ke zhanel ke te pachanape si te skepinpe .

text: They on the rock are they , which , when they hear , receive the word with joy ; and these have no root , which for a while believe , and in time of temptation fall away .
text2: Le sumuntsi kai pele po than kai sas bax si kodola kai ashunen e vorba ai lel la raduimasa , numa nai vov si vuni ande lende ; pachalpe xantsi vriama , ai kana avel o beng te zumavel le , peren .

text: And that which fell among thorns are they , which , when they have heard , go forth , and are choked with cares and riches and pleasures of this life , and bring no fruit to perfection .
text2: Le sumuntsi kai pele mashkar le kanrhe si kodola kai ashundesas ; numa o nekazo , o barvalimos , ai le dieli le traioske tasaven le , ai lenge fruta shoxar chi bariol .

text: But that on the good ground are they , which in an honest and good heart , having heard the word , keep it , and bring forth fruit with patience .
text2: Le sumuntsi kai pelia ande lashi phuv si kodola kai ashunen e vorba , won garaven la ande lasho ilo , ai ankeren e vorba , ai anen fruta chachimasa . "

text: No man , when he hath lighted a candle , covereth it with a vessel , or putteth it under a bed ; but setteth it on a candlestick , that they which enter in may see the light .
text2: " Khonik chi del iag iek lampo , ai te garavel les telai e vadra vai telai e skafidi , numa thol les opral pe skafidi te del e vediara savorhenge kai den ando kher .

text: For nothing is secret , that shall not be made manifest ; neither any thing hid , that shall not be known and come abroad .
text2: Ke nai kanchi garado , kai trobul te avel sikado ; kanchi garado , kai trobul te zhanen ai te dikhen savorhe .

text: Take heed therefore how ye hear : for whosoever hath , to him shall be given ; and whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken even that which he seemeth to have .
text2: No len sama sar ashunen ; ke avela dino kodoles kai si les , numa ka kodo kai nai avela lestar lino vi savo gindin ke si les . "

text: Then came to him his mother and his brethren , and could not come at him for the press .
text2: E dei ai le phral le Jesusoske avile leste , numa nashti aresle leste pala but narodo .

text: And it was told him by certain which said , Thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to see thee .
text2: Ai mothol leske , " Chi dei ai che phral avri le , ai mangen te dikhen tu . "

text: And he answered and said unto them , My mother and my brethren are these which hear the word of God , and do it .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Murhi dei ai murhe phral si kodola kai ashunen E Vorba le Devleski , ai kai keren lesko zakono . "

text: Now it came to pass on a certain day , that he went into a ship with his disciples : and he said unto them , Let us go over unto the other side of the lake . And they launched forth .
text2: Andek dies O Jesus anklisto ando pharaxoditsi peska disiplonsa ai phende lenge , " Aven pe kolaver rik le paieske , " ai gele .

text: But as they sailed he fell asleep : and there came down a storm of wind on the lake ; and they were filled with water , and were in jeopardy .
text2: Sar zhanas po pai O Jesus sovelas , ek bari barval avili po pai , ai pherdiolas o paraxodo le paiesa , ai xaiinas .

text: And they came to him , and awoke him , saying , Master , master , we perish . Then he arose , and rebuked the wind and the raging of the water : and they ceased , and there was a calm .
text2: Le disipluria pashile pasha Jesus , ai vushtiarde les , phenenas , " Gazda , Gazda , xaiisavas . " Porme O Jesus vushtilo , ai dia mui pe barval ai po pai ; ai terdili ai sas trankilo .

text: And he said unto them , Where is your faith ? And they being afraid wondered , saying one to another , What manner of man is this ! for he commandeth even the winds and water , and they obey him .
text2: Porme phendia le disiplonge , " Kai tumaro pachamos ? " Daraile leske disipluria ai chudisaile , ai phende iek kavreske , " Che fielo manush kado ? Ke dia mui pe barval ai pe maria , ai vi e barval ai e maria pachan lesko mui . "

text: And they arrived at the country of the Gadarenes , which is over against Galilee .
text2: Aresle ando them le manushengo kai bushon Gadarenes , kai si inchal e Galilee .

text: And when he went forth to land , there met him out of the city a certain man , which had devils long time , and ware no clothes , neither abode in any house , but in the tombs .
text2: Kana O Jesus vulisto pe phuv , avilo karing leste iek manush le forosko , kai sas ande leste but beng de dumut nas pe leste tsalia , ai vo chi beshelas khere numa andel mumuntsi .

text: When he saw Jesus , he cried out , and fell down before him , and with a loud voice said , What have I to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of God most high ? I beseech thee , torment me not .
text2: Kana dikhlia le Jesusos , tsipisardia ai shudiape ka leske punrhe ai phendia zurales , " So si mashkar tute ai mashkar mande ; Jesus , tu O Shav le Devlesko kai si opre ! So mangesa mandar , na chinuisar ma . "

text: ( For he had commanded the unclean spirit to come out of the man . For oftentimes it had caught him : and he was kept bound with chains and in fetters ; and he brake the bands , and was driven of the devil into the wilderness . )
text2: O Jesus dia ordina ka o beng te anklel avri anda kodo manush . Butivar o bi vuzho tsodiasaspe anda leste ; le manush phandenas les lantsonsa ai sastrensa pel punrhe ai vi pel vas , numa wo shinelas le , ai o beng angerelas les ande pusta .

text: And Jesus asked him , saying , What is thy name ? And he said , Legion : because many devils were entered into him .
text2: O Jesus phushlia les , " Sar bushos ? " Wo dia atweto , " Le Legion " ke but beng sas ande leste .

text: And they besought him that he would not command them to go out into the deep .
text2: Le beng rhuginaspe ka Jesus te na zhan ando pai .

text: And there was there an herd of many swine feeding on the mountain : and they besought him that he would suffer them to enter into them . And he suffered them .
text2: Sas kotse po plai but bale kai xanas . Le beng manglepe katar O Jesus te sai den andel bale , ai O Jesus phendia lenge te zhan andel bale .

text: Then went the devils out of the man , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the lake , and were choked .
text2: Le beng ankliste avri anda kado manush ai dine andel bale ; ai le bale shudepe pai xar ande maria , ai tasule .

text: When they that fed them saw what was done , they fled , and went and told it in the city and in the country .
text2: Le manush kai ningerenas le balen dikhle so kerdilia , nashle , ai phende e viasta so dikhle andel gava ai avrial le gava .

text: Then they went out to see what was done ; and came to Jesus , and found the man , out of whom the devils were departed , sitting at the feet of Jesus , clothed , and in his right mind : and they were afraid .
text2: Narodo zhalas te dikhel so kerdilia , avile ka Jesus , ai arakhle le manushes kai anklistesas le beng anda leste , ai beshelas tele kal punrhe le Jesusoske , vuriardo , ai leske goji vorta ; ai daraile .

text: They also which saw it told them by what means he that was possessed of the devils was healed .
text2: Kodola kai dikhle so kerdiliasas phende sar kodo manush kai sas le beng ande leste sastilo .

text: Then the whole multitude of the country of the Gadarenes round about besought him to depart from them ; for they were taken with great fear : and he went up into the ship , and returned back again .
text2: Antunchi sa o narodo kodole gavesko kai bushonas Gadarenes , rhugisaile ka Jesus te duriol lendar ke daranas . O Jesus anklisto ande pharaxoditsi , ai gelotar .

text: Now the man out of whom the devils were departed besought him that he might be with him : but Jesus sent him away , saying ,
text2: O manush kai ; ankliste sas le beng anda leste mangliape katar O Jesus , " Mek ma te zhav tusa . " Numa O Jesus tradia les ai phendia les ,

text: Return to thine own house , and shew how great things God hath done unto thee . And he went his way , and published throughout the whole city how great things Jesus had done unto him .
text2: " Zha ando cho kher , ai phen so godi kerdia tuke O Del . " Gelotar ai phendia anda sa o foro so godi kerdia leske O Jesus .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Jesus was returned , the people gladly received him : for they were all waiting for him .
text2: Kana avilo palpale O Jesus , o narodo primisarde les , ke savorhe azhukerenas les .

text: And , behold , there came a man named Jairus , and he was a ruler of the synagogue : and he fell down at Jesus ' feet , and besought him that he would come into his house :
text2: Eta , avilo iek manush kai busholas Jairus , wo sas o baro pe synagogue ; shudiape kal punrhe le Jesusoske , ai mangliape lestar te avel ande lesko kher .

text: For he had one only daughter , about twelve years of age , and she lay a dying . But as he went the people thronged him .
text2: Ke sas les ferdi iek shei , kai sas desh u do bershengi merimaski sas . Numa sar O Jesus zhalas late le manush avenas pasha leste katar swako rik .

text: And a woman having an issue of blood twelve years , which had spent all her living upon physicians , neither could be healed of any ,
text2: Sas iek zhuvli , kai xasarelas pesko rat de desh u dui bersh , ai kai xaliasas sa peske love kal dokxturia , numa chi iek chi sastiardia la .

text: Came behind him , and touched the border of his garment : and immediately her issue of blood stanched .
text2: Avili palal pala leste ai azbadia e tivala la bundako kai sas po Jesus , ai strazo o rat kai xasarelas terdilo .

text: And Jesus said , Who touched me ? When all denied , Peter and they that were with him said , Master , the multitude throng thee and press thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
text2: O Jesus phushlia , " Kon azbadian ma ? " Numa savorhe phende ke chi azbade les , ai o Petri phendias , " Gazda , but narodo si pasha tute ai tu mothos " Kon azbadia ma ? "

text: And Jesus said , Somebody hath touched me : for I perceive that virtue is gone out of me .
text2: Numa O Jesus phendia , " Vari kon azbadia ma ; ke haliardem ke zor anklisto anda mande . "

text: And when the woman saw that she was not hid , she came trembling , and falling down before him , she declared unto him before all the people for what cause she had touched him and how she was healed immediately .
text2: Ai kana e zhuvli dikhlia ke nas garadi , geli ai izdralas , ai shudiape kal punrhe le Jesusoske , ai phendia angla sa o narodo sostar azbadia le Jesusos , ai sar sastili strazo .

text: And he said unto her , Daughter , be of good comfort : thy faith hath made thee whole ; go in peace .
text2: O Jesus phendia lake , " Murhi shei , cho pachamos sastiardia tu , zha pachasa . "

text: While he yet spake , there cometh one from the ruler of the synagogue ' s house , saying to him , Thy daughter is dead ; trouble not the Master .
text2: Sar delas duma inker , avilia vari kon katar o baro le kheresko , ai phendia , " Chi shei muli , na mai dziliaren le Jesusos .

text: But when Jesus heard it , he answered him , saying , Fear not : believe only , and she shall be made whole .
text2: Numa O Jesus ashundia ai phendia ka Jairus , " Na dara ; ferdi pachas tu , ai woi avela sastiarel . "

text: And when he came into the house , he suffered no man to go in , save Peter , and James , and John , and the father and the mother of the maiden .
text2: Kana areslo ka kher O Jesus chi meklia te del khonik lesa ando kher , ferdi o Petri , o Iovano , ai o Iakov , ai o dat ai e dei la glatake .

text: And all wept , and bewailed her : but he said , Weep not ; she is not dead , but sleepeth .
text2: Savorhensa roven ai pherde nekezhime . Antunchi O Jesus phendia , " Na roven ; chi muli , numa sovel ! "

text: And they laughed him to scorn , knowing that she was dead .
text2: Asanas lestar , ke won zhanenas ke muli .

text: And he put them all out , and took her by the hand , and called , saying , Maid , arise .
text2: Numa O Jesus lia la le vastesa , ai phendia zurales , " Vushti opre , Glata ! "

text: And her spirit came again , and she arose straightway : and he commanded to give her meat .
text2: Ai lako duxo avilo ande late , ai strazo vushtilo opre ; ai O Jesus phendia , " Den la te xal . "

text: And her parents were astonished : but he charged them that they should tell no man what was done .
text2: Lako dat ai laki dei chudisaile , ai O Jesus phendia lenge te na mothon kanikaske .

text: Then he called his twelve disciples together , and gave them power and authority over all devils , and to cure diseases .
text2: Jesus chidia andek than le desh u do disiplon ai dia le zor ai putiera pe sa le beng , ai e zor te sastiaren le naswalen .

text: And he sent them to preach the kingdom of God , and to heal the sick .
text2: Tradia len te mothon e viasta le rhaioski le Devleski , ai te sastiaren le naswalen .

text: And he said unto them , Take nothing for your journey , neither staves , nor scrip , neither bread , neither money ; neither have two coats apiece .
text2: Porme phendia lenge , " Na len kanchi tumensa kai zhan ; chi rhai , chi gono , chi manrho , chi love , chi dui raxamia .

text: And whatsoever house ye enter into , there abide , and thence depart .
text2: Andel khera kai zhana , beshen kotsar zhi kana zhanatar .

text: And whosoever will not receive you , when ye go out of that city , shake off the very dust from your feet for a testimony against them .
text2: Ai te na primila tumen o narodo , anklen avri anda kodo gav , ai kosen e pulberia pa tumare punrhe te sikaven lenge so si won . "

text: And they departed , and went through the towns , preaching the gospel , and healing every where .
text2: Geletar , ai gele gav gavestar , ai phende e lashi viasta , sastiarenas le naswalen .

text: Now Herod the tetrarch heard of all that was done by him : and he was perplexed , because that it was said of some , that John was risen from the dead ;
text2: Herod , o Tetrach , ashundia so godi kerdiolas , ai ferdi delas pe goji , ke uni mothonas ke o Iovano zhuvindisailo andal mule ;

text: And of some , that Elias had appeared ; and of others , that one of the old prophets was risen again .
text2: Uni mothonas ke o Elijah sikadilo ; ai uni , ke iek phurano profeto zhuvindisailo .

text: And Herod said , John have I beheaded : but who is this , of whom I hear such things ? And he desired to see him .
text2: Ai o Herod phendia , " Phendem te shinen o shero le Iovanosko ; numa savo si , kado kai ashunav ai mothol kasavendar dieli ? " Ai mangelas te dikhel les .

text: And the apostles , when they were returned , told him all that they had done . And he took them , and went aside privately into a desert place belonging to the city called Bethsaida .
text2: Le desh u dui disipluria kana avile palpale , phende ka Jesus so godi kerde . Lia le pesa , ai gelo karing o foro kai bushol Bethsaida .

text: And the people , when they knew it , followed him : and he received them , and spake unto them of the kingdom of God , and healed them that had need of healing .
text2: Kana o narodo ashundia , liape pala leste , O Jesus primilas le , ai phendia lenge pa rhaio le Devlesko , ai sastiarelas kodolen kai trobulas te aven saste .

text: And when the day began to wear away , then came the twelve , and said unto him , Send the multitude away , that they may go into the towns and country round about , and lodge , and get victuals : for we are here in a desert place .
text2: Kana perelas e riat , le desh u dui disipluria avile leste , ai phende leske , " Trade le narodos te zhan andel gava ai kruglom te soven av te arakhen xaben ke katse kai sam pusta si . "

text: But he said unto them , Give ye them to eat . And they said , We have no more but five loaves and two fishes ; except we should go and buy meat for all this people .
text2: Numa O Jesus phendia lenge , " Den le tume te xan . " Numa won phende , " Ferdi panzh manrhe ai dui mashe . Zhasa ame te chinas xaben kadale narodoske ? "

text: For they were about five thousand men . And he said to his disciples , Make them sit down by fifties in a company .
text2: Sas pashte panzh mi zhene kotse . O Jesus phendia peske disiplonge , " Keren le te beshen tele ai te thon andek than po panvardesh zhene . "

text: And they did so , and made them all sit down .
text2: Ai kerde kadia , kerde le te beshen tele .

text: Then he took the five loaves and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed them , and brake , and gave to the disciples to set before the multitude .
text2: O Jesus lia le panzh manrhe ai le dui mashe , ai vazdia le iakha karing o rhaio , ai naisisardias , porme phaglia ai dia le ka peske disiplonge te den ka narodo .

text: And they did eat , and were all filled : and there was taken up of fragments that remained to them twelve baskets .
text2: Savorhe xale ai chailile ; ai le disipluria chide le kotora kai ashshilia desh u dui shkonitsi pherde sas .

text: And it came to pass , as he was alone praying , his disciples were with him : and he asked them , saying , Whom say the people that I am ?
text2: Andek jes O Jesus rhugilas pe korkorho , peske disipluria avile leste , ai phushlia le , " So mothon o narodo , ke sim ? "

text: They answering said , John the Baptist ; but some say , Elias ; and others say , that one of the old prophets is risen again .
text2: Won phende , " O Iovano o baptisto ; uni mothon , o Elijah ; uni phenen , iek phurano profeto kai zhuvindisailo .

text: He said unto them , But whom say ye that I am ? Peter answering said , The Christ of God .
text2: Phendia lenge , " Kon mothon ke sim ? " O Petri dia atweto , " O Kristo le Devlesko . "

text: And he straitly charged them , and commanded them to tell no man that thing ;
text2: Ai O Jesus dia le trad te na mothon kanikaske .

text: Saying , The Son of man must suffer many things , and be rejected of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be slain , and be raised the third day .
text2: Ai mai phendia , " Ke o Shav le manushesko chinuil but , wo avela shudino lendar , le phure , le bare le rashange , ai le Gramnoturia , Mudarena les ai o trito jes zhuvindila . "

text: And he said to them all , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross daily , and follow me .
text2: Porme phendia savorhenge , " Te mangela vari kon te lelpe pala mande , te bustrel pe pes , ai te lel swako jes pesko trushul ai te lelpe pala mande .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : but whosoever will lose his life for my sake , the same shall save it .
text2: Ke kodo kai mangela te skepil pesko traio xasarela les ; numa kodo kai xasarela pesko traio pala mande , skepila les .

text: For what is a man advantaged , if he gain the whole world , and lose himself , or be cast away ?
text2: Ai so nirila o manush te avel leske sa e lumia , ai te xasarela pe pes ?

text: For whosoever shall be ashamed of me and of my words , of him shall the Son of man be ashamed , when he shall come in his own glory , and in his Father ' s , and of the holy angels .
text2: Ke kon godi lazhala mandar ai katar murhe vorbi , o Shav le Manushesko avela lestar lazhal , kana avela anda pesko barimos , ai ande barimos le Dadesko , ai le Swuntsi angeluria .

text: But I tell you of a truth , there be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the kingdom of God .
text2: Phenav tumenge chachimasa , uni kai si katse , chi merena mai anglal sar te dikhen o rhaio le Devlesko . "

text: And it came to pass about an eight days after these sayings , he took Peter and John and James , and went up into a mountain to pray .
text2: Oxto jes pala kodia kana phendia kadala vorbi , O Jesus lia pesa O Petri ai o Iovano ai o Iakov , ai anklisto po plai te rhuginpe .

text: And as he prayed , the fashion of his countenance was altered , and his raiment was white and glistering .
text2: Sar O Jesus rhugilaspe , lesko mui pharhudilo , ai leske tsalia parnile zurales .

text: And , behold , there talked with him two men , which were Moses and Elias :
text2: Eta , dui manush denas duma lesa , kai sas o Moses , ai o Elijah ,

text: Who appeared in glory , and spake of his decease which he should accomplish at Jerusalem .
text2: Kai dichonas ande barimos , ai denas duma pai leski martia ando Jerusalem kai trobul te kerdiol .

text: But Peter and they that were with him were heavy with sleep : and when they were awake , they saw his glory , and the two men that stood with him .
text2: O Petri , ai kodola kai sas lesa sovenas , numa sar beshenas vushtiarde , dikhle o barimos le Jesusoske , ai le dui manush kai sas lesa .

text: And it came to pass , as they departed from him , Peter said unto Jesus , Master , it is good for us to be here : and let us make three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias : not knowing what he said .
text2: Sar le manush zhanastar katar O Jesus , o Petri phendia leske , " Gazda , mai mishto ke sam tusa . Keras trin tseri , tuke , iek le Mosesoske , iek o Elijahoske . " Chi zhanelas so motholas .

text: While he thus spake , there came a cloud , and overshadowed them : and they feared as they entered into the cloud .
text2: Sar divinilas kadia , ek nuvero vulisto pe lende ; ai le disipluria daraile kana dikhle sar o nuvero vulisto pe lende .

text: And there came a voice out of the cloud , saying , This is my beloved Son : hear him .
text2: Ai anda nuvero avilo ek glaso , phenenas , " Kako si murho Shav kai si mange mai drago ; ashunen leste . "

text: And when the voice was past , Jesus was found alone . And they kept it close , and told no man in those days any of those things which they had seen .
text2: Kana ashundilo kodo glaso , O Jesus korkorho sas . Le disipluria chi mothonas kanch , ai ande kodia vriama chi phende kanikaske so dikhle .

text: And it came to pass , that on the next day , when they were come down from the hill , much people met him .
text2: Pe terharin kana vuliste pai plaiin , but narodo avelas karing O Jesus .

text: And , behold , a man of the company cried out , saying , Master , I beseech thee , look upon my son : for he is mine only child .
text2: Ai mashkar o narodo ek manush tsipisardia , " Gazda , rhugiv ma tute , dikh pe murho shav , ke ferdi kado si ma !

text: And , lo , a spirit taketh him , and he suddenly crieth out ; and it teareth him that he foameth again , and bruising him hardly departeth from him .
text2: O beng lia kodo raklorho ai kerelas les te tsipil ; ai drechinilas les zurales , ai zhala leske spuma anda mui . Chinuilas les ai chi mekelas les vushoro .

text: And I besought thy disciples to cast him out ; and they could not .
text2: Rhugisailem ka che disipluria te gonin le benges ; ai nashtisarde . "

text: And Jesus answering said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you , and suffer you ? Bring thy son hither .
text2: O Jesus phendia , " Tume kai chi pachan tume ai chorhe kai san ! Sode virama trobul te beshav tumensa ? Sode vriama rhevdiv tumen ? An che shaves katse . "

text: And as he was yet a coming , the devil threw him down , and tare him . And Jesus rebuked the unclean spirit , and healed the child , and delivered him again to his father .
text2: Sar o shav pasholas karing O Jesus , o beng shudia les pe phuv , ai drechinisardia les zurales . Numa O Jesus gonisardia le benges , ai sastiardia le raklorhes , ai dia les palpale ka pesko dat .

text: And they were all amazed at the mighty power of God . But while they wondered every one at all things which Jesus did , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Ai savorhe chudisaile anda barimos le Devlesko . Ai sar savorhe dikhenas o lashimos kai kerelas O Jesus , phendia leske disiplonge .

text: Let these sayings sink down into your ears : for the Son of man shall be delivered into the hands of men .
text2: " Tumenge ashunen mishto so mothav ; O Shav le Manushesko trobul te avel dino andal vas le manushenge . "

text: But they understood not this saying , and it was hid from them , that they perceived it not : and they feared to ask him of that saying .
text2: Numa won chi haliarde kadia vorba , ke garado sas lendar , saxke te na haliaren ; ai daraile te phushen lestar pa kadia vorba .

text: Then there arose a reasoning among them , which of them should be greatest .
text2: Le disipluria marenas mui mashkar pende , te zhanen savo sas mai baro anda lende .

text: And Jesus , perceiving the thought of their heart , took a child , and set him by him ,
text2: O Jesus zhanglia so gindinaspe , lia ieke raklorhes , ai thodia les pasha peste ,
