text: Then he said , I pray thee therefore , father , that thou wouldest send him to my father ' s house :
text2: Porme o barvalo manush phendia , " Rhugiv ma tute , murho dat , O Abraham , trade o Lazarus ando kher murho dadesko :

text: For I have five brethren ; that he may testify unto them , lest they also come into this place of torment .
text2: Ke si ma pansh phral ; te mothol lenge te arakhenpe , te na aresen vi won ande parha . "

text: Abraham saith unto him , They have Moses and the prophets ; let them hear them .
text2: O Abraham phendia leske , " Si le o ramomos le Mosesosko ai le profetongo te phenen lenge , ashunen lende . " Ai o barvalo manush phendia ,

text: And he said , Nay , father Abraham : but if one went unto them from the dead , they will repent .
text2: " Nichi , murho dat , Abraham ; numa te zhala vari kon andal mule karing lende , antunchi keinape . "

text: And he said unto him , If they hear not Moses and the prophets , neither will they be persuaded , though one rose from the dead .
text2: Numa o Abraham phendia leske , " Te na ashunena so mothol o Moses ai le profeturia , won chi pachana vi te zhuvindil vari kon andal mule . "

text: Then said he unto the disciples , It is impossible but that offences will come : but woe unto him , through whom they come !
text2: O Jesus phendia peske disiplonge , " Musai avel o zumaimos kai ingerel le manushen te peren ando bezex ; numa nasul kodoleske kastar avel o zumaimos !

text: It were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and he cast into the sea , than that he should offend one of these little ones .
text2: Mai bini te avel ek baro bax phanglo ka peski kox kai te avel shudino ande bari maria , de sar te kerel iek anda kadala tsinorhe kai pachanpe ande mande te peren ando bezex .

text: Take heed to yourselves : If thy brother trespass against thee , rebuke him ; and if he repent , forgive him .
text2: " Arakhen tume ! Te kerela bezex cho phral , phen leske zurale vorbi ; te keilpe ai boldela palpale , iertisar les .

text: And if he trespass against thee seven times in a day , and seven times in a day turn again to thee , saying , I repent ; thou shalt forgive him .
text2: Te kerel bezex karing tute eftavar ande iek dies , ai eftavar avela tute , ai phenel , ' Keisailem anda so kerdem tuke . ' Tu iertisar leske . "

text: And the apostles said unto the Lord , Increase our faith .
text2: Le Apostles phendia le Devleske , " De ame mai pachamos . "

text: And the Lord said , If ye had faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye might say unto this sycamine tree , Be thou plucked up by the root , and be thou planted in the sea ; and it should obey you .
text2: Ai O Del phendia , " Te si tume pachamos sar iek sumuntsi garchitsaki , tu sai phenena kakala krenzhaki , ' Ankli avri andai phuv , ai tho tu ande maria ! ' ai kodia krenzha pachala tumaro mui . "

text: But which of you , having a servant plowing or feeding cattle , will say unto him by and by , when he is come from the field , Go and sit down to meat ?
text2: Savo anda tumende , kai si les ek sluga kai lasharel e phuv vai lel sama katar le bakre , phenela leske kana avela pal kimpuria . " Aidi sigo ai tho tu kai skafidi ? "

text: And will not rather say unto him , Make ready wherewith I may sup , and gird thyself , and serve me , till I have eaten and drunken ; and afterward thou shalt eat and drink ?
text2: Vai chi phenela leske , " Lashar mange te xav , tho angla tute pishtiri ai podaisar ma zhi kai xav ai piiav ; ai antunchi tu xasa ai pesa . "

text: Doth he thank that servant because he did the things that were commanded him ? I trow not .
text2: Chi trobul te naisil le slugako anda so phendiasas leske te kerel , si vai nai ?

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall have done all those things which are commanded you , say , We are unprofitable servants : we have done that which was our duty to do .
text2: Vi tume , kana kerdian so godi sas phendo tumenge te keren , phenen , " Ame sam ferdi slugi ; ame kerdiam ferdi so sas phendo amenge te keras . "

text: And it came to pass , as he went to Jerusalem , that he passed through the midst of Samaria and Galilee .
text2: O Jesus zhalas ando Jerusalem , ai nakhelas mashkar e Samaria ai Galilee .

text: And as he entered into a certain village , there met him ten men that were lepers , which stood afar off :
text2: Sar zhalas andek gav , desh manush kai sas lepra avile karing Jesus numa dural sas ;

text: And they lifted up their voices , and said , Jesus , Master , have mercy on us .
text2: vazde pengo glaso , ai phende , " Jesus ! Tu o Gazda ! Av tuke mila anda amende ! "

text: And when he saw them , he said unto them , Go shew yourselves unto the priests . And it came to pass , that , as they went , they were cleansed .
text2: Ai kana O Jesus dikhlia le , phendia lenge , " Zhan sikadion kal rasha , " ai pa drom kai zhanas kal rasha sastile .

text: And one of them , when he saw that he was healed , turned back , and with a loud voice glorified God ,
text2: Iek anda lende , kana dikhlia ke sastilo , boldiape palpale , ai naisilas le Devleske zurales ,

text: And fell down on his face at his feet , giving him thanks : and he was a Samaritan .
text2: shudiape le mosa pe phuv kal punrhe le Jesusoske , ai naisisardia leske ; kodo manush sas ek Samaritano .

text: And Jesus answering said , Were there not ten cleansed ? but where are the nine ?
text2: O Jesus phendia , " Sastile sas le desh . Kai le kolaver inia ?

text: There are not found that returned to give glory to God , save this stranger .
text2: Ferdi kako streino avilo palpale te naisil le Devles . "

text: And he said unto him , Arise , go thy way : thy faith hath made thee whole .
text2: Porme O Jesus phendia , " Wushti ai zhas : cho pachamos sastiardian tu . "

text: And when he was demanded of the Pharisees , when the kingdom of God should come , he answered them and said , The kingdom of God cometh not with observation :
text2: Uni Farizeanuria phushle katar O Jesus kana avela e amperetsia le Devleski . O Jesus phendia lenge , " E amperetsia le Devleski chi avel te dikhen la le manush

text: Neither shall they say , Lo here ! or , lo there ! for , behold , the kingdom of God is within you .
text2: Khonik chi phenela , " Dikh ! Katarlo ! " vai " Kotelo ! " Ke e amperetsia le Devleski mashkar tumende lo . "

text: And he said unto the disciples , The days will come , when ye shall desire to see one of the days of the Son of man , and ye shall not see it .
text2: O Jesus phendia le disiplonge , " Avena uni diesa kana mangenas te dikhen iek andal diesa O Shav le Manushesko , numa chi dikhena les .

text: And they shall say to you , See here ; or , see there : go not after them , nor follow them .
text2: Uni phenena tumenge , " Dikh ! Katar lo ! " vai " Kote lo ! " Na zhan pala lende .

text: For as the lightning , that lighteneth out of the one part under heaven , shineth unto the other part under heaven ; so shall also the Son of man be in his day .
text2: Sar o rhunjito sikadiol ai strefial anda iek gor le cheresko zhando kolaver gor , kadia aven O Shav le Manushesko kana avela lesko dies .

text: But first must he suffer many things , and be rejected of this generation .
text2: Numa trobul mai anglal te chinuil but , te gonin les le manush .

text: And as it was in the days of Noe , so shall it be also in the days of the Son of man .
text2: " Sar sas ando dies kana sas o Noah , sakadia si te avel kana avela O Shav le Manushesko .

text: They did eat , they drank , they married wives , they were given in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark , and the flood came , and destroyed them all .
text2: Le manush xanas , penas , ansurinas penge shaven zhi ka dies kai o Noah gelo ande pharaxodo , avilo baro pai , ai savorhe xasaile .

text: Likewise also as it was in the days of Lot ; they did eat , they drank , they bought , they sold , they planted , they builded ;
text2: Sar sas ando dies kana sas o Lot ; sakadia le manush xanas ai penas , chinenas ai bichinenas , bariarenas ai kerenas khera ;

text: But the same day that Lot went out of Sodom it rained fire and brimstone from heaven , and destroyed them all .
text2: Numa o dies kai o Lot anklisto avri anda Sodom , iag ai Sulfer pelo anda cheri sar breshind , ai savorhe xasaile .

text: Even thus shall it be in the day when the Son of man is revealed .
text2: Sakadia avela kana O Shav le Manushesko sikadiola .

text: In that day , he which shall be upon the housetop , and his stuff in the house , let him not come down to take it away : and he that is in the field , let him likewise not return back .
text2: " Ande kodo dies , kodo kai si opral pesko kheresko , ai si les leske dieli ando kher , nashti hulela tele te les le ; ai kuko kai si ando kimpo ( niva ) , nashti zhal palpale ka pesko kher .

text: Remember Lot ' s wife .
text2: Den tume goji kai zhuvli le manushesko kai busholas Lot .

text: Whosoever shall seek to save his life shall lose it ; and whosoever shall lose his life shall preserve it .
text2: " Kodo kai rodela te skepil pesko traio xasarela les ; ai kodo kai xasarela pesko traio skepila les .

text: I tell you , in that night there shall be two men in one bed ; the one shall be taken , and the other shall be left .
text2: Phenav tumenge , kodia riat dui manush sovena ande iek pato ; iek avela lino , ai iek ashela .

text: Two women shall be grinding together ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Dui zhuvlia licharena jiv andek than ; iek avela lini , ai iek ashela .

text: Two men shall be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Dui manush si te aven ande niva ( kimpo ) ; iek avel lino , ai iek ashela . "

text: And they answered and said unto him , Where , Lord ? And he said unto them , Wheresoever the body is , thither will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Ai le disipluria phushle les , " Kai kerdiola kadia diela , Devla ? " O Jesus phendia , " Kai si ek mulo stato , kotse chidenape le ulruria . "

text: And he spake a parable unto them to this end , that men ought always to pray , and not to faint ;
text2: O Jesus mai phendia lenge ek paramichi , te sikavel ke trobul sa data te rhugis tu , ai na aterdios ;

text: Saying , There was in a city a judge , which feared not God , neither regarded man :
text2: phenelas , " Sas andek foro iek ablakato , kai chi daralas katar O Del , ai vi chi respektisardia le manushen .

text: And there was a widow in that city ; and she came unto him , saying , Avenge me of mine adversary .
text2: Ai sas ek phivli ande kudo foro ; woi avelas leste , phenelas , " Ker mange kris pek manush kai rodel mange nasul . "

text: And he would not for a while : but afterward he said within himself , Though I fear not God , nor regard man ;
text2: Ai but vriama chi manglia te kerel lake so mangelas , numa antunchi phendia wo ande peste , " Chi darav katar O Del , ai chi respektiv le manush .

text: Yet because this widow troubleth me , I will avenge her , lest by her continual coming she weary me .
text2: Numa ke kodia phivli dziliarel ma , kerava lake so mangel , saxke te na mai avel te dziliarel ma . "

text: And the Lord said , Hear what the unjust judge saith .
text2: O Devla mai phendia , " Ashunen so phendia o chorho ablakato .

text: And shall not God avenge his own elect , which cry day and night unto him , though he bear long with them ?
text2: O Del sar te na kerel vorta peske manushenge kai mangenas lestar kuriat ai kujes ? Azhukerel lungo vriama te zhutil le ?

text: I tell you that he will avenge them speedily . Nevertheless when the Son of man cometh , shall he find faith on the earth ?
text2: Phenav tumenge , kerela lenge sigo kris , numa kana O Shav le Manushesko avela , arakhela pachamos pe phuv ? "

text: And he spake this parable unto certain which trusted in themselves that they were righteous , and despised others :
text2: O Jesus phendia kacha paramichi pal manush kai pachanpe ande pende , ai vurhitsisardia sa le kolaver .

text: Two men went up into the temple to pray ; the one a Pharisee , and the other a publican .
text2: " Dui manush gele ande tamplo te rhuginpe ; iek sas Farisi , ai o kaver sas manush kai chidelas e taksa .

text: The Pharisee stood and prayed thus with himself , God , I thank thee , that I am not as other men are , extortioners , unjust , adulterers , or even as this publican .
text2: O Farisi ande punrhende rhugilaspe ande peste , " O Devla , naisiv tuke , ke chi sim sar le kolaver manush , kai si chor , nai chacho , kai keren kurvia , ai vi sar o manush kai chidelas e taksa .

text: I fast twice in the week , I give tithes of all that I possess .
text2: Postiv duvar ando kurko , dav desh anda ek shel partia . "

text: And the publican , standing afar off , would not lift up so much as his eyes unto heaven , but smote upon his breast , saying , God be merciful to me a sinner .
text2: O manush kai chidelas e taksa , beshelas mai dur , chi tromalas te vazdel le iakha karing o cheri , numa marelaspe ande kolin , ai phendia , " O Devla te avel tuke mila anda mande kai sim bezexalo . "

text: I tell you , this man went down to his house justified rather than the other : for every one that exalteth himself shall be abased ; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted .
text2: Phenav tumenge , " Kado manush gelo peste khere iertime mai sigo ke sar o kolaver ; ke kon godi vazdelape avela meklo tele ; ai kodo kai mekelape tele avela vazdino . "

text: And they brought unto him also infants , that he would touch them : but when his disciples saw it , they rebuked them .
text2: Andine ka Jesus le tsinorhe glaten , te thol peske vas pe lende ; numa kana le disipluria dikhle , dine le trad .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Suffer little children to come unto me , and forbid them not : for of such is the kingdom of God .
text2: Numa O Jesus akhardia le glaten peste , " Mek te aven le glate mande , ai na aterdiaren le , ke e amperetsia le Devleski si kodolenge kai miazon sar lende .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child shall in no wise enter therein .
text2: Phenav tumenge o chachimos , kako kai chi primila e amperetsia le Devleski sar ek glata nashti zhala andre . "

text: And a certain ruler asked him , saying , Good Master , what shall I do to inherit eternal life ?
text2: Iek manush la Krisako phushlia le Jesusos , " Lasho Gazda , so trobul te kerav te avel ma traio kai chi mai getol pe ? "

text: And Jesus said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? none is good , save one , that is , God .
text2: O Jesus phendia leske , " Sostar mothos mange lasho ? Ke nai khonik lasho . O Del ferdi lasho . "

text: Thou knowest the commandments , Do not commit adultery , Do not kill , Do not steal , Do not bear false witness , Honour thy father and thy mother .
text2: Zhanes le zakonuria , " Na ker kurvia , na mudar , na chor , na xoxav , preznaisar che dades ai cha da . "

text: And he said , All these have I kept from my youth up .
text2: O manush phendia , " Sa kadala zakonuria ankerdem de sar sim tsinorho . "

text: Now when Jesus heard these things , he said unto him , Yet lackest thou one thing : sell all that thou hast , and distribute unto the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come , follow me .
text2: Kana O Jesus ashundia kodia , phendia leske , " Mai trobul te keres iek diela . Bichin sa so si tu , ai de kal chorhe , ai avela tu manjin ando rhaio ; antunchi aidi pala mande . "

text: And when he heard this , he was very sorrowful : for he was very rich .
text2: Kana kodo manush ashundia kodia , nekezhisailo ; ke defial barvalo sas .

text: And when Jesus saw that he was very sorrowful , he said , How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Kana O Jesus dikhlia ke tristosailo , phendia , " Trutno kodolenge kai si le barvalimos te zhan ande amperetsia le Devleski .

text: For it is easier for a camel to go through a needle ' s eye , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Ke mai vushoro te nakhel iek gemula andai iakh la suviaki , de sar iek barvalo manush te zhal ande amperetsia le Devleski .

text: And they that heard it said , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Le manush kai ashunenas leste phende , " Apo , kon sai avela skepime ? "

text: And he said , The things which are impossible with men are possible with God .
text2: O Jesus phendia , " Le manush anda pende nashtin , numa le Devlesa vari so sai kerdiol . "

text: Then Peter said , Lo , we have left all , and followed thee .
text2: Antunchi o Petri phendia , " Dikh ! Ame mekliam swako fielo ai liam ame pala tute . " O Jesus phendia lenge ,

text: And he said unto them , Verily I say unto you , There is no man that hath left house , or parents , or brethren , or wife , or children , for the kingdom of God ' s sake ,
text2: " Phenav tumenge o chachimos , Kon godi mekela kher , rhomni , vai phralen , dades , vai da , vai glaten pala e amperetsia le Devleski ,

text: Who shall not receive manifold more in this present time , and in the world to come life everlasting .
text2: avela les mai but pe kadia phuv , ai ande kolaver traio kai chi mai getolpe . "

text: Then he took unto him the twelve , and said unto them , Behold , we go up to Jerusalem , and all things that are written by the prophets concerning the Son of man shall be accomplished .
text2: Antunchi O Jesus lia le desh u do disiplon rigate , ai phendia lenge , " Ashun , ame zhas ando Jerusalem , ai so godi sas ramome katar le profeturia pa Shav le Manushesko kerdiola .

text: For he shall be delivered unto the Gentiles , and shall be mocked , and spitefully entreated , and spitted on :
text2: Dena les kal manush kai Nai Zhiduvuria te marena mui lestar , ai chinuina les , ai chungardena pe leste , ai marena les le bichosa , ai mudarena les ,

text: And they shall scourge him , and put him to death : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: ai o trito dies si te zhuvindil . "

text: And they understood none of these things : and this saying was hid from them , neither knew they the things which were spoken .
text2: Numa le disipluria chi haliarde so phendia lenge ; ai kadala vorbi garadesas lendar , won chi haliarenas sar divinilas O Jesus .

text: And it came to pass , that as he was come nigh unto Jericho , a certain blind man sat by the way side begging :
text2: Kana O Jesus pasholas pasha Jericho , iek korho beshelas tele pasha drom , ai mangelas kristaradia :

text: And hearing the multitude pass by , he asked what it meant .
text2: Kai ashundia le manushen sar nakhen , phushelas , " So si ? "

text: And they told him , that Jesus of Nazareth passeth by .
text2: Phende leske , O Jesus anda Nazareth nakhel katsar .

text: And he cried , saying , Jesus , thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Numa wo tsipisardia , phenelas , " Jesus , tu Shav le Davidosko ! Av tuke mila anda mande ! "

text: And they which went before rebuked him , that he should hold his peace : but he cried so much the more , Thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Le manush kai sas anglal tsipinas pe leste te ashel , numa wo tsipilas mai zurales , " Tu Shav le Davidosko ! Av tuke mila anda mande . "

text: And Jesus stood , and commanded him to be brought unto him : and when he was come near , he asked him ,
text2: O Jesus aterdilo , ai phendia o korho te anen leste ; ai kana andine les , phushlia les , phenelas ,

text: Saying , What wilt thou that I shall do unto thee ? And he said , Lord , that I may receive my sight .
text2: " So manges te kerav tuke ? " Wo phendia , " Devla , Phuter murhe iakha te dikhav . "

text: And Jesus said unto him , Receive thy sight : thy faith hath saved thee .
text2: O Jesus phendia leske , " Antunchi dikhes ! Cho pachamos sastiardian tu . "

text: And immediately he received his sight , and followed him , glorifying God : and all the people , when they saw it , gave praise unto God .
text2: Ai strazo dikhlia , ai liape pala Jesus , ai luvudilaspe ka Del ; ai sa o narodo kana dikhle so kerdilia luvudinaspa ka Del .

text: And Jesus entered and passed through Jericho .
text2: O Jesus gelo ando Jericho , nakhlo anda foro .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Zacchaeus , which was the chief among the publicans , and he was rich .
text2: Sas iek manush barvalo kai busholas Zacchaeus . Wo sas o baro mashkar le manush kai chidenas e taksa ,

text: And he sought to see Jesus who he was ; and could not for the press , because he was little of stature .
text2: ai kado manush rodelas te zhanel kon si O Jesus ; numa nashtilas katar o but narodo , ke tsinorho sas .

text: And he ran before , and climbed up into a sycomore tree to see him : for he was to pass that way .
text2: Nashlo angle , ai anklisto pe ek khash kai busholas Sicamore te dikhel les ; ke O Jesus sas te nakhel kotsar .

text: And when Jesus came to the place , he looked up , and saw him , and said unto him , Zacchaeus , make haste , and come down ; for to day I must abide at thy house .
text2: Kana O Jesus areslo pe kodo than , vazdia le iakha opre , dikhlia les , ai phendia leske , " Zacchaeus , huli tele mai sigo , ke trobul adies te beshav ande cho kher . "

text: And he made haste , and came down , and received him joyfully .
text2: O Zacchaeus hulisto sigo tele , ai premisardia les peste raduimasa .

text: And when they saw it , they all murmured , saying , That he was gone to be guest with a man that is a sinner .
text2: Ai kana le manush dikhle so kerdilia , denas pe duma , phenenas , " O Jesus zhal te beshel le manusha kai si bezexalo . "

text: And Zacchaeus stood , and said unto the Lord ; Behold , Lord , the half of my goods I give to the poor ; and if I have taken any thing from any man by false accusation , I restore him fourfold .
text2: O Zacchaeus angla Jesus sa , ai phendia le Devleske , " Ashun Devla ! Dav dopash anda murho barvalimos kal chorhe ; ai te lem katar vari kon ande vari soste , dava les shtarvar mai but . "

text: And Jesus said unto him , This day is salvation come to this house , forsomuch as he also is a son of Abraham .
text2: O Jesus phendia leske , " O skepimos avilo adies ande kado kher , ke vi kako si iek shav le Abrahamosko .

text: For the Son of man is come to seek and to save that which was lost .
text2: Ke O Shav le Manushesko avilo te rodel ai te skepil kon sas xasardo . "

text: And as they heard these things , he added and spake a parable , because he was nigh to Jerusalem , and because they thought that the kingdom of God should immediately appear .
text2: Sar le manush ashunenas , O Jesus phendia lenge ek paramichi , ke pasha Jerusalem sas , ai ke gindinaspe ke e amperetsia le Devleski sas te sikadiol strazo .

text: He said therefore , A certain nobleman went into a far country to receive for himself a kingdom , and to return .
text2: No O Jesus phendia , " Iek manush barvalo gelotar ande them dur te keren anda leste amperato ai te avel palpale .

text: And he called his ten servants , and delivered them ten pounds , and said unto them , Occupy till I come .
text2: Ai akhardia peske desh slugen , ai dia sakones iek galbano sumnakuno , ai phendia lenge , " Keren buchi kadale sumnakasa zhi kai avav . "

text: But his citizens hated him , and sent a message after him , saying , We will not have this man to reign over us .
text2: Numa le manush kodole manusheske gretsosarde les , ai trade vari kas te phenen leske , " Chi mangas kado manush te avela amaro amperato . "

text: And it came to pass , that when he was returned , having received the kingdom , then he commanded these servants to be called unto him , to whom he had given the money , that he might know how much every man had gained by trading .
text2: Kotse kai gelo kerde amperato anda leste , ai kana avilo palpale ande pesko them , wo akhardia le slugen kai dias len o sumnakai , wo manglia te zhanel sode mai but swako sluga sas les pala leski buchi .

text: Then came the first , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained ten pounds .
text2: O pervo avilo ai phendia , " Gazda , nirisardem aver desh galbi le galbanosa kai dian ma .

text: And he said unto him , Well , thou good servant : because thou hast been faithful in a very little , have thou authority over ten cities .
text2: Ai o gazda phendia leske , " Mishto kerdian , lasho sluga ; kai sanas lasho ande xantsi buchi , dava tu desh foruria te poronchis pe lende . "

text: And the second came , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained five pounds .
text2: O duito avilo ai phendia leske , " Gazda , nirisardem aver pansh galbi le galbanosa kai dian ma . "

text: And he said likewise to him , Be thou also over five cities .
text2: O gazda phendia leske , " Vi tu poronchisa pe pansh foruria . "

text: And another came , saying , Lord , behold , here is thy pound , which I have kept laid up in a napkin :
text2: Aver avilo phenelas , " Gazda , Dikh ! Katse si cho galbano kai dian ma , garadem les ande poxtan .

text: For I feared thee , because thou art an austere man : thou takest up that thou layedst not down , and reapest that thou didst not sow .
text2: Ke darailem tutar , ke tu san manush zurale ilesko : tu les so chi dian , ai chides so chi bariardian . "

text: And he saith unto him , Out of thine own mouth will I judge thee , thou wicked servant . Thou knewest that I was an austere man , taking up that I laid not down , and reaping that I did not sow :
text2: O amperato phendia leske , " Dav tu kris pala che vorbi , tu san chorho sluga , tu zhanesas ke sim manush zurale ilesko , lav so chi dem , ai chidav so chi bariardem .

text: Wherefore then gavest not thou my money into the bank , that at my coming I might have required mine own with usury ?
text2: Apo , " Sostar chi thodian murhe love ande banka ? Saxke , kana avilemas khere sas te bution ? "

text: And he said unto them that stood by , Take from him the pound , and give it to him that hath ten pounds .
text2: Porme phendia kodolenge kai sas kotse , " Len lestar o galbano , ai den les ka kako kai si les desh . "

text: ( And they said unto him , Lord , he hath ten pounds . )
text2: Le kolaver phendia leske , " Gazda , si les vunzhe desh galbi ! "

text: For I say unto you , That unto every one which hath shall be given ; and from him that hath not , even that he hath shall be taken away from him .
text2: O Jesus phendia , " Me phenav tumenge , avela dino ka kuko kai si les ; numa ka kuko kai nai , avela lino lestar vi so si les .

text: But those mine enemies , which would not that I should reign over them , bring hither , and slay them before me .
text2: Numa le manush kai chi mai le te avav lengo amperato , anen le katse , ai mudaren le angla mande . "

text: And when he had thus spoken , he went before , ascending up to Jerusalem .
text2: Kana phendia kodia paramichi , O Jesus gelotar angla manush te zhal ande Jerusalem .

text: And it came to pass , when he was come nigh to Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount called the mount of Olives , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Kana pashilo pashai Bethphage ai Bethani karing e plai kai busholas E Plai le Maslinengi , O Jesus tradia dui anda peske disiplonge , phenelas ,

text: Saying , Go ye into the village over against you ; in the which at your entering ye shall find a colt tied , whereon yet never man sat : loose him , and bring him hither .
text2: " Zhan ando gav kai si angla amende ; ai kana aresena , arakhena kotse ieke magares kai si phanglo , pe kodo magari inker chi iek manush chi beshlo ; phutren les , ai anen les katse .

text: And if any man ask you , Why do ye loose him ? thus shall ye say unto him , Because the Lord hath need of him .
text2: Te phushela tumen vari kon , " Sostar phutren le magares ? " Tume phenen leske , " Ke trobul le Devles . "

text: And they that were sent went their way , and found even as he had said unto them .
text2: Le disipluria kai sas tradino gele , ai arakhle sa le dieli sar O Jesus phendiasas lenge .

text: And as they were loosing the colt , the owners thereof said unto them , Why loose ye the colt ?
text2: Kana phutrenas le magares , o gazda phendia lenge , " Sostar phutren le magares ? "

text: And they said , The Lord hath need of him .
text2: Ai won phende , " Ke trobul le Devles . "

text: And they brought him to Jesus : and they cast their garments upon the colt , and they set Jesus thereon .
text2: Angerde le magares ka Jesus ; ai thode pe penge raxamia po magari , ai thode le Jesusos te beshel opral .

text: And as he went , they spread their clothes in the way .
text2: Sar phirelas , won shudenas penge raxamia po drom .

text: And when he was come nigh , even now at the descent of the mount of Olives , the whole multitude of the disciples began to rejoice and praise God with a loud voice for all the mighty works that they had seen ;
text2: Ai kana pasholas pashai Jerusalem , karing e plaiing kai xulelas e plaiing kai bushol E Plaiing le Maslinenge , sa le disipluria raduime sas , ai dine naisimos ka Del pala sa le mirakluria kai dikhle ; phenenas ,

text: Saying , Blessed be the King that cometh in the name of the Lord : peace in heaven , and glory in the highest .
text2: " Raduime te avel o amperato kai avel ando anav le Devlesko ! Pacha ando rhaio , ai o barimos te avel ando rhaio . "

text: And some of the Pharisees from among the multitude said unto him , Master , rebuke thy disciples .
text2: Ai uni Farizeanonge kai sas mashkar o narodo , phende le Jesusoske , " Gazda , phen che disiplonge te terdion . "

text: And he answered and said unto them , I tell you that , if these should hold their peace , the stones would immediately cry out .
text2: Ai O Jesus phendia lenge , " Me phenav tumenge , te terdiona won te tsipin , le bax si te tsipin . "

text: And when he was come near , he beheld the city , and wept over it ,
text2: Ai kana pasholas pasha foro , O Jesus dikhelas pe Jerusalem ai rovelas ,

text: Saying , If thou hadst known , even thou , at least in this thy day , the things which belong unto thy peace ! but now they are hid from thine eyes .
text2: ai phenelas , " Te zhanglianas ande kado dies le dieli kai si cha pachake ! Numa akana garade le angla che iakha .

text: For the days shall come upon thee , that thine enemies shall cast a trench about thee , and compass thee round , and keep thee in on every side ,
text2: Uni diesa avela pe tute kana che duzhmaia avena kruglom tutar , phandavena tu , ai chidena tu pa sako rik .

text: And shall lay thee even with the ground , and thy children within thee ; and they shall not leave in thee one stone upon another ; because thou knewest not the time of thy visitation .
text2: Phagavena tu ai sa le manushen mashkar tute ; ai chi mekena pe tute te ashel bax pe baxeste ke chi zhanglian e vriama kana O Del avilo te skepil tu . "

text: And he went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold therein , and them that bought ;
text2: O Jesus avilo ande tampla , ai gonisardia sa kodolen kai bichinenas ai chinenas ,

text: Saying unto them , It is written , My house is the house of prayer : but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: ai phenel lenge , " Ramome , ' Murho kher si o kher le rhugimasko ; numa tume kerdian anda leste kher chorengo . ' "

text: And he taught daily in the temple . But the chief priests and the scribes and the chief of the people sought to destroy him ,
text2: O Jesus sicharelas swako dies ande tampla , ai le bare rasha , ai le Gramnoturia , ai le bare le narodoske rodenas te mudaren le Jesusos .

text: And could not find what they might do : for all the people were very attentive to hear him .
text2: Numa chi zhanenas sar te keren ; ke sa le manush drago lenge te ashunen leste .

text: And it came to pass , that on one of those days , as he taught the people in the temple , and preached the gospel , the chief priests and the scribes came upon him with the elders ,
text2: Andek dies , kana O Jesus sas ande tampla sicharelas le narodos ai delas duma e lashi viasta , le bare rasha ai le Gramnoturia , ai le mai phure avile .

text: And spake unto him , saying , Tell us , by what authority doest thou these things ? or who is he that gave thee this authority ?
text2: Ai phende leske , " Phen amenge , katar si tu kadia putiera te keres so keres ? Vai kon si kodo kai dia tu kadia putiera ? "

text: And he answered and said unto them , I will also ask you one thing ; and answer me :
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Vi me akana phushav tumendar ek divano ,

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ?
text2: o bolimos le Iovanosko katar sas , anda rhaio vai manushendar ? "

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then believed ye him not ?
text2: Ai dinepe duma mashkar pende , phenenas , " Te phenasa ' Anda rhaio , ' wo phenela , ' Sostar chi pachaian les ? '

text: But and if we say , Of men ; all the people will stone us : for they be persuaded that John was a prophet .
text2: Numa te phenasa , ' Katar le manush , ' sa o narodo shudela bax pe amende ; ke o narodo zhanelas ke o Iovano sas ek profeto .

text: And they answered , that they could not tell whence it was .
text2: No won phende , ' Chi zhanas katar avilo . ' "

text: And Jesus said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Ai O Jesus phendia lenge , " Chi me chi phenav tumenge katar che putiera kerav so kerav . "

text: Then began he to speak to the people this parable ; A certain man planted a vineyard , and let it forth to husbandmen , and went into a far country for a long time .
text2: Porme O Jesus phendia le narodoske ek paramichi : " Iek manush thodia te bariol rez , ai meklia les kaver manush te len sama , ai gelotar andek dur them but vriama .

text: And at the season he sent a servant to the husbandmen , that they should give him of the fruit of the vineyard : but the husbandmen beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Kana avili e vriama te chidelpe o struguro , wo tradia ieke sluga karing le kolaver manush te lel lendar so trobul te avel lesko . Numa le manush kai chidenas o struguro marde les , ai trade les palpale bi kanchesko .

text: And again he sent another servant : and they beat him also , and entreated him shamefully , and sent him away empty .
text2: Kodo manush mai tradia ieka sluga ; ai pale marde les , chinuisarde les , ai trade les bi kanchesko .

text: And again he sent a third : and they wounded him also , and cast him out .
text2: Numa kodo manush mai tradia mai ieka sluga , ( o trito ) ai won dukhade les , ai gonisarde les .

text: Then said the lord of the vineyard , What shall I do ? I will send my beloved son : it may be they will reverence him when they see him .
text2: Antunchi o gazda la rezako phendia , " So te kerav ? Tradav murhe shaves kai si mange drago ; amborim lena pe pala leste ! "

text: But when the husbandmen saw him , they reasoned among themselves , saying , This is the heir : come , let us kill him , that the inheritance may be ours .
text2: Numa kana le manush kai chidenas o struguro dikhle les , denas pe duma mashkar pende , " Kodo si o shav le gazdasko , mudaras les , ai e phuv ashela amenge ! "

text: So they cast him out of the vineyard , and killed him . What therefore shall the lord of the vineyard do unto them ?
text2: Ai gonisarde les dur katar e rez , ai mudarde les . " Akana , so kerel lenge o gazda la rezako ? " " Avela ai mudarela kodole manushen , ai dela e rez kal kolaver . "

text: He shall come and destroy these husbandmen , and shall give the vineyard to others . And when they heard it , they said , God forbid .
text2: Kana o narodo ashundia kodia , phendia , " Kasavatar diela nashti kerdiol ! "

text: And he beheld them , and said , What is this then that is written , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner ?
text2: O Jesus dikhlia pe lende , ai phendia , " So znachil kado ramomos ? O bax kai shude kukula , saikfielo bax sas o bax kai trobulsarde . "

text: Whosoever shall fall upon that stone shall be broken ; but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Kon godi perela pe kodo bax avela phaglo ; ai kuko kai perela o bax wo avela lichardo . "

text: And the chief priests and the scribes the same hour sought to lay hands on him ; and they feared the people : for they perceived that he had spoken this parable against them .
text2: Le bare rasha ai le Gramnoturia dinepe duma sar te astaren les ; ai won daranas anda le manushenge , ke won haliarde ke O Jesus lenge phendia kodia paramichi .

text: And they watched him , and sent forth spies , which should feign themselves just men , that they might take hold of his words , that so they might deliver him unto the power and authority of the governor .
text2: Ai won lenas sama les , ai trade manushen te dikhen so kerel , kerenaspe sar chache manush , saxke te astaren les ande lesko divano , saxke te den les ka guvernori ( kai si les e putiera te kerel sa wo mangel ) .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , we know that thou sayest and teachest rightly , neither acceptest thou the person of any , but teachest the way of God truly :
text2: Kodala manush phushle les , " Gazda , zhanas so phenes ai sichares si vorta , ai zhanas ke chi respektis iek manush mai but sar kaver , numa sichares o zakono le Devlesko chachimasa .

text: Is it lawful for us to give tribute unto Caesar , or no ?
text2: Phen amenge , si amenge slobodo vai nai te pochinas taksa ka Caesar ? "

text: But he perceived their craftiness , and said unto them , Why tempt ye me ?
text2: Numa O Jesus haliardia lenge nasul ginduria , ai phendia lenge , " Sostar tume zumaven ma ? "

text: Shew me a penny . Whose image and superscription hath it ? They answered and said , Caesar ' s .
text2: Sikaven mange ek kotor rupone , " Kaske fatsa ai ramomos si kado ? "

text: And he said unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which be Caesar ' s , and unto God the things which be God ' s .
text2: Won phende , " O Caesar . " O Jesus phendia lenge , " Den ka Caesar so si lesko , ai den ka Del so si le Devlesko . "

text: And they could not take hold of his words before the people : and they marvelled at his answer , and held their peace .
text2: Nashti thode leske dosh pe kado divano angla narodo ; numa chudisaile andal atweto kai dia le , ai chi mai phende kanch .

text: Then came to him certain of the Sadducees , which deny that there is any resurrection ; and they asked him ,
text2: Uni Saduseanuria avile ka Jesus , ke mothonas ke nai traio pala e martia ; ai phushle ,

text: Saying , Master , Moses wrote unto us , If any man ' s brother die , having a wife , and he die without children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: " Gazda , o Moses ramosardia o zakono amenge ; " Te merela vari kasko phral , ai si les ek rhomni , ai nas les glate , lesko phral ansurilape leska rhomniasa , ai vazdel familia leske phraleske . "

text: There were therefore seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and died without children .
text2: Sas efta phral : o pervo ansurisailo , ai mulo bi te avel les glate , meklia rhomnia peske phraleske .

text: And the second took her to wife , and he died childless .
text2: Sakadia o duito ,

text: And the third took her ; and in like manner the seven also : and they left no children , and died .
text2: ai o trito , sakadia kerdilia vi le efta phralensa . Mule vi te aven le glate .

text: Last of all the woman died also .
text2: Akana vi e zhuvli muli .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife of them is she ? for seven had her to wife .
text2: Kana avela te zhuvindin le mule te zhan ando rhaio , saveski andal efta phral avela e rhomni ke savorhenge sas ? "

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , The children of this world marry , and are given in marriage :
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Le mursh ai le zhuvlia la lumiake akana ansurinpe ;

text: But they which shall be accounted worthy to obtain that world , and the resurrection from the dead , neither marry , nor are given in marriage :
text2: Numa le mursh ai le zhuvlia kai sai zhuvindin andai martia ka traio ai te traiin ande kolaver lumia chi mai ansurinpe .

text: Neither can they die any more : for they are equal unto the angels ; and are the children of God , being the children of the resurrection .
text2: Nashti mai meren ; ke won avena sar le angeluria ai chi meren , ai avena shaves le Devleske , ke zhuvindisar le andai martia .

text: Now that the dead are raised , even Moses shewed at the bush , when he calleth the Lord the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob .
text2: Ai o Moses sikadia kai le mule zhuvindinas ka traio . Ande Vorba le Devleski kai mothol pai krenzha kai zhalas e iag , kana wo akharel les " O Del le Abrahamosko , O Del le Isakosko , ai O Del le Iakovosko . "

text: For he is not a God of the dead , but of the living : for all live unto him .
text2: Ke wo nai O Del le mulengo , numa le zhuvindengo ; savorhe traiin leske . "

text: Then certain of the scribes answering said , Master , thou hast well said .
text2: Uni andal Gramnoturia phende , " Gazda , mishto dia duma . "

text: And after that they durst not ask him any question at all .
text2: Ai chi mai tromanas te mai phushen les kanch .

text: And he said unto them , How say they that Christ is David ' s son ?
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Sar mothon ke O Kristo si Shav le Davidosko ?

text: And David himself saith in the book of Psalms , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: Ke o David phendia ande Vorba le Devleski ( Psalms ) , " O Del phendia murhe Devleske : Besh tele pa murhi chachi rik ,

text: Till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: zhi kai kerav anda che duzhmaia iek than te hodinis che punrhe pa lende . "

text: David therefore calleth him Lord , how is he then his son ?
text2: O David akhardia les Devla , sar sai avel vo lesko shav ? "

text: Then in the audience of all the people he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Sar sa o narodo ashunelas leste , O Jesus phendia peske disiplonge .

text: Beware of the scribes , which desire to walk in long robes , and love greetings in the markets , and the highest seats in the synagogues , and the chief rooms at feasts ;
text2: Arakhen tume katar le Gramnoturia , kai si lenge drago te phiravenpe andel rhochi lunzhe , ai den le manush lasho dies pel droma , ai roden la mai lashe skamina ande synagogue , ai drago lenge te beshen ka shero la skafidiako kal pachiva .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a shew make long prayers : the same shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Ke tume xan le phivliange khera , ai rhugin tume lungo rhugimos te miazol ke lashe san : anda kodia si te perel mai phari kris pe tumende . "

text: And he looked up , and saw the rich men casting their gifts into the treasury .
text2: O Jesus vazdia le iakha , ai dikhlia le barvale manushen thonas penge love ande gono ande tampla .

text: And he saw also a certain poor widow casting in thither two mites .
text2: Ai vi dikhlia ek chorhi phivli sar tholas dui xarkune kotora .

text: And he said , Of a truth I say unto you , that this poor widow hath cast in more than they all :
text2: Ai phendia , " Phenav tumenge chachimasa , kacha chorhi phivli thodia mai but de sar savorhe ;

text: For all these have of their abundance cast in unto the offerings of God : but she of her penury hath cast in all the living that she had .
text2: Ke le barvale thode xantsi love anda lengo barvalimos ; numa woi thodia so godi sas la te traiil .

text: And as some spake of the temple , how it was adorned with goodly stones and gifts , he said ,
text2: Uni zhene denas duma pal tampla , sar shukarenas o tampla le lashe baxensa ai podarki kai dine ka Del , O Jesus phendia lenge ,

text: As for these things which ye behold , the days will come , in the which there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: " Sa so dikhena avela pherdo , chi ashela iek bax po kaver . " Won phushen lestar ,

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , but when shall these things be ? and what sign will there be when these things shall come to pass ?
text2: " Gazda , kana kerdiola kodia ? Che semno avela kana kerdiona kodola ? "

text: And he said , Take heed that ye be not deceived : for many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and the time draweth near : go ye not therefore after them .
text2: O Jesus phendia , " Arakhen tume , te na atsaven tume khonik , ke but avena ande murho anav , phenenas , " Me sim o Kristo ! " E vriama pashili , na len tume pala lende .

text: But when ye shall hear of wars and commotions , be not terrified : for these things must first come to pass ; but the end is not by and by .
text2: Kana ashunena ke marenpe ai vieste kai marenpe ande uni thana , Na Daran ; ke kodia musai te kerdiol , numa nai inker o gor .

text: Then said he unto them , Nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom :
text2: Antunchi O Jesus phendia lenge , " Iek them marelape aver themesa ; ai iek amperetsia marelape avria amperetsiasa :

text: And great earthquakes shall be in divers places , and famines , and pestilences ; and fearful sights and great signs shall there be from heaven .
text2: Ai izdrala e phuv zurales , ai ande but thana chi avela dosta te xan , ai avela but naswalimos , ai kerdionape zhungale bucha kai chi mai dichilia , ai avela bare semnuria ando cheri .

text: But before all these , they shall lay their hands on you , and persecute you , delivering you up to the synagogues , and into prisons , being brought before kings and rulers for my name ' s sake .
text2: Numa mai anglal sar kodola dieli , lena tume le manush ai chinuina tume , dena tume kal synagoguria , thona tume andel temnitsi , angerena tume anglal la amperatsi ai le bare le foroske pala murho anav .

text: And it shall turn to you for a testimony .
text2: Kodola kerdiona tumenge saxke te aven marturia .

text: Settle it therefore in your hearts , not to meditate before what ye shall answer :
text2: Na gindin tume mai anglal so te phenen , ai na daran .

text: For I will give you a mouth and wisdom , which all your adversaries shall not be able to gainsay nor resist .
text2: Ke dava tume le vorbi ai e goji , kai tumare duzhmaia nashti den ando gor vai te mothon ke nai kadia .

text: And ye shall be betrayed both by parents , and brethren , and kinsfolks , and friends ; and some of you shall they cause to be put to death .
text2: Vi tumaro dat ai tumari dei purhila tume , ai tumare phral , ai tumare niamuria , ai tumare vortacha ; ai mudaren buten anda tumende .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake .
text2: Avena gratsia savorhenge pala murho anav .

text: But there shall not an hair of your head perish .
text2: Numa chi xasavola chi iek bal anda tumaro shero .

text: In your patience possess ye your souls .
text2: Ai kai inkerena zhando gor tume skepina tumaro traio le Devlesa .

text: And when ye shall see Jerusalem compassed with armies , then know that the desolation thereof is nigh .
text2: Kana dikhena ke le thema chidenape te marenpe pe Jerusalem , antunchi zhanen ke Jerusalem sigo avela peradi .

text: Then let them which are in Judaea flee to the mountains ; and let them which are in the midst of it depart out ; and let not them that are in the countries enter thereinto .
text2: Antunchi kodola kai si ande Judea trobula te nashen andel plaia ; ai kodola kai si mashkaral ande Jerusalem trobula te zhantar ; ai kodola kai si ande niva te na aven andel foruria .

text: For these be the days of vengeance , that all things which are written may be fulfilled .
text2: Ke kodola diesa avena diesa chorhe , ai te kerdiol so godi sas ramome .

text: But woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck , in those days ! for there shall be great distress in the land , and wrath upon this people .
text2: Nasul le zhuvliange kai si pharia glatasa , ai kodolen kai si le glate pe chuchi ande kodola dies ! Ai avela baro nekazo ando them , ai xoli pe kado narodo .

text: And they shall fall by the edge of the sword , and shall be led away captive into all nations : and Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles , until the times of the Gentiles be fulfilled .
text2: Le manush avena mudarde katar e sabia , ai aver avena line ai thode ande temnitsa mashkar sa le thema ; ai le manush kai Nai Zhiduvuria phiren le punrhensa pai Jerusalem , zhi kai getolpe lenge vriama .

text: And there shall be signs in the sun , and in the moon , and in the stars ; and upon the earth distress of nations , with perplexity ; the sea and the waves roaring ;
text2: " Kerdiola semnuria ando kham , ai ando shunuto , ai andal chererhaia ; ai pe phuv avela dar mashkar le thema , kai chi mai zhanena so te keren . E maria ai le talazuria keren bunto ;

text: Men ' s hearts failing them for fear , and for looking after those things which are coming on the earth : for the powers of heaven shall be shaken .
text2: le manush merena daratar ke zhanena so kerdiola pe phuv ; ke e putiera le chereski izdrala .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in a cloud with power and great glory .
text2: Antunchi dikhena sar O Shav le Manushesko avela pel nuveria putierasa ai barimasa .

text: And when these things begin to come to pass , then look up , and lift up your heads ; for your redemption draweth nigh .
text2: Kana kadala dieli nachinaina te kerdiol , antunchi dikhen opre , ai vazden tumaro shero , ke tumaro skepimos pashelo . "

text: And he spake to them a parable ; Behold the fig tree , and all the trees ;
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge ek paramichi , " Dikhen e pruing le figengi , ai sa le khash ;

text: When they now shoot forth , ye see and know of your own selves that summer is now nigh at hand .
text2: sar barion ai anklen patria , tume dikhen ai zhanen ke o milai pashelo .

text: So likewise ye , when ye see these things come to pass , know ye that the kingdom of God is nigh at hand .
text2: Sakadia , kana dikhena kadala dieli ke kerdion , zhanen ke e amperetsia le Devleski pashela .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass away , till all be fulfilled .
text2: Chachimasa , phenav tumenge , kadia vitsa chi nakhela zhi pon chi kerdion kadala dieli .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: O cheri ai e lumia nakhena , numa murhe vorbi shoxar chi nakhena .

text: And take heed to yourselves , lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting , and drunkenness , and cares of this life , and so that day come upon you unawares .
text2: Arakhen tume ! Na meken tumaro ilo te pherdiol pachiva ai mol , ai nekazo kadale traiosko , ai kodo dies avela pe tumende kana chi zhanen .

text: For as a snare shall it come on all them that dwell on the face of the whole earth .
text2: Ke kodo dies avela sar iek selia pe sa kodola kai beshen pe sa e lumia .

text: Watch ye therefore , and pray always , that ye may be accounted worthy to escape all these things that shall come to pass , and to stand before the Son of man .
text2: Arakhen tume ! Ai rhugin tume sagda , saxke te avel tume zor te na kerdiol tumenge sa kadala dieli , ai te beshen ande punrhende angla Shav le Manushesko . "

text: And in the day time he was teaching in the temple ; and at night he went out , and abode in the mount that is called the mount of Olives .
text2: E diese O Jesus sicharelas ande tamplo ; ai e riat zhalas te beshel pe plaiin kai busholas Masleni .

text: And all the people came early in the morning to him in the temple , for to hear him .
text2: Ai sa o narodo diminiatsi avile leste ande tampla te ashunen leste .

text: Now the feast of unleavened bread drew nigh , which is called the Passover .
text2: Akana e pachiv le manrheski bi drozhdengi pasholas kai busholas ' O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo ' .

text: And the chief priests and scribes sought how they might kill him ; for they feared the people .
text2: Ai le bare rasha ai le Gramnoturia rodenas sar te mudaren les ; ke daranas katar o narodo .

text: Then entered Satan into Judas surnamed Iscariot , being of the number of the twelve .
text2: Antunchi o beng gelo ande Judas , kai akharenas les Iscariot , kai sas ek andal desh u dui disipluria .

text: And he went his way , and communed with the chief priests and captains , how he might betray him unto them .
text2: Ai o Judas gelo kal le bare rasha ai kal le bare le ketanenge , te del les ande lenge vas .

text: And they were glad , and covenanted to give him money .
text2: Kodola manush raduisaile , ai shinade te den les love .

text: And he promised , and sought opportunity to betray him unto them in the absence of the multitude .
text2: Ai o Judas shinadia te lel le love , ai rodias sar te del les ande lenge vas , bi te zhanel o narodo .

text: Then came the day of unleavened bread , when the passover must be killed .
text2: Antunchi o dies le manrhesko bi drozhdengo avilo , kana trobulas te mudaren le bakriorhan ,

text: And he sent Peter and John , saying , Go and prepare us the passover , that we may eat .
text2: ai O Jesus tradia le Petres ai le Ioanos , phenelas , " Zhan ai lasharen amende O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo te xas . "

text: And they said unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare ?
text2: Ai won phende leske , " Kai manges te lasharas ? "

text: And he said unto them , Behold , when ye are entered into the city , there shall a man meet you , bearing a pitcher of water ; follow him into the house where he entereth in .
text2: Wo phendia lenge , " Ashun , kana aresena ando foro , arakhena ieke manushes kai si les iek vaza paieske ; len tume pala leste ando kher kai zhala .

text: And ye shall say unto the goodman of the house , The Master saith unto thee , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: Ai phenena le gazdaske kodole kheresko , " Amaro gazda phenel tuke , ' Kai o than kai trobul te xav O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo murhe displonsa ? ' "

text: And he shall shew you a large upper room furnished : there make ready .
text2: Wo sikavela tumenge iek bari soba opre kai si swako fielo andre ; kotse lasharena .

text: And they went , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Geletar , ai arakhle sar phendiasas lenge ; ai lasharde O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo .

text: And when the hour was come , he sat down , and the twelve apostles with him .
text2: Ai kana o chaso avilo , wo beshlo kai skafidi le desh u do disiplonsa .

text: And he said unto them , With desire I have desired to eat this passover with you before I suffer :
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Drago sas mange te xav kadia Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo tumensa mai anglal sar te chinuiv .

text: For I say unto you , I will not any more eat thereof , until it be fulfilled in the kingdom of God .
text2: Ke phenav tumenge , chi mai xava tumensa , zhi kai kerdiol ande e amperetsia le Devleski . "

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and said , Take this , and divide it among yourselves :
text2: Lia e kuchi , ai dias naisimos , ai phendia , " Len , ai pen savorhe anda late . "

text: For I say unto you , I will not drink of the fruit of the vine , until the kingdom of God shall come .
text2: Ke phenav tumenge , chi mai piiava andai fruta le struguroski , zhi kai e amperetsia le Devleski avel .

text: And he took bread , and gave thanks , and brake it , and gave unto them , saying , This is my body which is given for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: Antunchi lia manrho , ai dias naisimos , phaglia les , ai dia lende , phenelas , " Kako si murho stato kai si dino tumenge ; keren kadia te seren tume pa mande . "

text: Likewise also the cup after supper , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood , which is shed for you .
text2: Sakadia kana getosarde te xan manrho , wo lia e kuchi , phenelas , " Kacha kuchi ai o nevo kontrakto ando murho rat , kai shordilo pala tumende . "

text: But , behold , the hand of him that betrayeth me is with me on the table .
text2: Ashun ! Kodo kai purhila ma , katse lo kai skafidi mansa .

text: And truly the Son of man goeth , as it was determined : but woe unto that man by whom he is betrayed !
text2: Ai chaches O Shav le Manushesko trobul te merel sar O Del manglia ; numa nasul avela kodoleske kai purhila les ! "

text: And they began to inquire among themselves , which of them it was that should do this thing .
text2: Ai porme denaspe duma mashkar pende , savo si anda lende kai purhila les .

text: And there was also a strife among them , which of them should be accounted the greatest .
text2: Won marenas mui mashkar pende te zhanen savo anda lende avela o mai baro .

text: And he said unto them , The kings of the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and they that exercise authority upon them are called benefactors .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Le amperatsi kadala lumiake si le putiera pe pengo narodo , ai kodola manush bushon " Vortacha le manushenge . "

text: But ye shall not be so : but he that is greatest among you , let him be as the younger ; and he that is chief , as he that doth serve .
text2: Numa te na avel tumenge sakadia ; numa o mai baro kai si mashkar tumende musai avel sar o mai tsinorho ; ai kuko kai si baro musai avel sar kuko sluga .

text: For whether is greater , he that sitteth at meat , or he that serveth ? is not he that sitteth at meat ? but I am among you as he that serveth .
text2: Kon si o mai baro , kodo kai beshel kai skafidi vai kodo kai podail ? Kodo si kai skafidi numa me sim mashkar tumende sar kodo kai podail .

text: Ye are they which have continued with me in my temptations .
text2: Tume san kodola kai rhevdisardian mansa kana avilo zumaimos pe mande .

text: And I appoint unto you a kingdom , as my Father hath appointed unto me ;
text2: Anda kodia si ma e amperetsia te dav tumen , sar murho Dat dia man .

text: That ye may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom , and sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Saxke te xan ai te pen kai murhi skafidi ande murhi amperetsia ; ai te beshen pel bare skamina te den kris le desh u dui vitsi le Israelonge .

text: And the Lord said , Simon , Simon , behold , Satan hath desired to have you , that he may sift you as wheat :
text2: Ai O Jesus phendia , " Simon , Simon Ashun ! O beng manglia te sai chinol tu , sar chinolpe o jiv te thol les rigate katar le suluma ;

text: But I have prayed for thee , that thy faith fail not : and when thou art converted , strengthen thy brethren .
text2: Numa rhugisailem anda tute , te na rimolpe cho pachamos . Ai kana avesa palpale mande . Tu musai zhutis che phralen te aven mai zurale . "

text: And he said unto him , Lord , I am ready to go with thee , both into prison , and to death .
text2: O Petri phendia leske , " Devla , me zhav tusa , ande temnitsa , ai kai martia ! "

text: And he said , I tell thee , Peter , the cock shall not crow this day , before that thou shalt thrice deny that thou knowest me .
text2: Ai O Jesus phendia , " Petri , phenav tuke , o kurkorsho chi bashel adies , kai tu phenesa trivar ke chi zhanes ma . "

text: And he said unto them , When I sent you without purse , and scrip , and shoes , lacked ye any thing ? And they said , Nothing .
text2: Ai mai phendia lenge , " Kana tradem tumen bi lovengo , bi gonesko , ai bi papuchengo , trobulsardia tume vari so ? " Won phende , " Kanchi . "

text: Then said he unto them , But now , he that hath a purse , let him take it , and likewise his scrip : and he that hath no sword , let him sell his garment , and buy one .
text2: Antunchi phendia lenge , " Numa , akana , kodo kai si les love , lel les , ai vi lesko gono ; ai kodo kai nai les sabia , mek te bichinel peske raxami , ai chinel iek sabia .

text: For I say unto you , that this that is written must yet be accomplished in me , And he was reckoned among the transgressors : for the things concerning me have an end .
text2: Ke phenav tumenge , o ramomos kai phenel , " Wo sas mashkar le chorenge , " Musai te kerdiol vorta pa mande . Ke kadia kai sas ramome pa mande avela , chachimasa . "

text: And they said , Lord , behold , here are two swords . And he said unto them , It is enough .
text2: Won phende , " Devla , Dikh ! Katse si dui sebi . " O Jesus phendia leske , " Dosta si ! "

text: And he came out , and went , as he was wont , to the mount of Olives ; and his disciples also followed him .
text2: Ai avilo avri anda foro , sar kerelas butivar , gelo po Plai le Maslinenge ; ai leske disipluria linepe pala leste .

text: And when he was at the place , he said unto them , Pray that ye enter not into temptation .
text2: Kana areslo po than , phendia lenge , " Rhugin tume saxke te na peren ando zumaimos . "

text: And he was withdrawn from them about a stone ' s cast , and kneeled down , and prayed ,
text2: Ai porme durilo lendar xantsi tu sai shudes ek bax . Ai thodiape pe changende , ai rhugisailo ,

text: Saying , Father , if thou be willing , remove this cup from me : nevertheless not my will , but thine , be done .
text2: phenelas , " Murho Dat , te sai mek te nakhel kadia kuchi mandar ; numa na murhi voia , chiri voia te avel kerdi . "

text: And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven , strengthening him .
text2: Strazo iek angelo anda rhaio avilo leste te del les zor .

text: And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly : and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground .
text2: Sar chinolas , rhugilaspe mai zurales ; ai le paia kai zhanas pa leste kerdionas sar bambi rateske kai perenas pe phuv .

text: And when he rose up from prayer , and was come to his disciples , he found them sleeping for sorrow ,
text2: Kana rhugisailo wushtilo opre , ai avilo palpale ka peske disipluria , ai arakhlia le sovenas , kai nekezhinas .

text: And said unto them , Why sleep ye ? rise and pray , lest ye enter into temptation .
text2: Ai phendia lenge , " Sostar soven ? Wushten opre ai rhugin tume , te na peren ando zumaimos . "

text: And while he yet spake , behold a multitude , and he that was called Judas , one of the twelve , went before them , and drew near unto Jesus to kiss him .
text2: Sar delas duma inker , o narodo avilo ai kodo kai busholas Judas , iek andal desh u dui disipluria , wo sas anglal , ai pashilo pasha Jesus te chumidel les .

text: But Jesus said unto him , Judas , betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss ?
text2: Ai O Jesus phendia leske , " Judas , pala kako chumidimos purhidian O Shav le Manushesko ? "

text: When they which were about him saw what would follow , they said unto him , Lord , shall we smite with the sword ?
text2: Kana kodola kai sas le Jesusosa , dikhle so kerdilia , phende leske , " Devla , trobul te das la sabiasa ? "

text: And one of them smote the servant of the high priest , and cut off his right ear .
text2: Ai iek anda lende dia la sabiasa , o sluga le bare rashasko , ai shindia lesko chacho khan .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Suffer ye thus far . And he touched his ear , and healed him .
text2: Numa O Jesus phendia , " Aterdion ! Dosta si . " Ai azbadia o khan pe kodole manushesko ai sastilo .

text: Then Jesus said unto the chief priests , and captains of the temple , and the elders , which were come to him , Be ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and staves ?
text2: Antunchi O Jesus phendia le bare le rashange , ai le barenge kai poronchinas la tamplaske , ai le mai phure , kai sas lesa . " Tume avilian , sar pala iek chor , le sabiensa , ai le khashtensa ? "

text: When I was daily with you in the temple , ye stretched forth no hands against me : but this is your hour , and the power of darkness .
text2: Swako dies simas tumensa ande tampla , ai chi thodian o vas pe mande ; numa si tumaro chaso , ai putiera le tuniarikoski . "

text: Then took they him , and led him , and brought him into the high priest ' s house . And Peter followed afar off .
text2: Antunchi line les , angerde les ando kher le baro le rashasko . Ai o Petri liape pala lende de dural .

text: And when they had kindled a fire in the midst of the hall , and were set down together , Peter sat down among them .
text2: Kerde iag mashkar e bar , ai beshle tele andek than , o Petri beshelas tele mashkar lende .

text: But a certain maid beheld him as he sat by the fire , and earnestly looked upon him , and said , This man was also with him .
text2: Ek sluga dikhlia le Petres pashai iag , ai dikhelas pe leste , ai phendia , " Vi kado manush sas lesa . "

text: And he denied him , saying , Woman , I know him not .
text2: Numa o Petri phendia , " Zhuvlio , chi zhanav les . "

text: And after a little while another saw him , and said , Thou art also of them . And Peter said , Man , I am not .
text2: Pala kodia aver sluga dikhlia les , ai phendia , " Vi tu sanas lensa . " O Petri phendia , " Manusha , chi sim me . "

text: And about the space of one hour after another confidently affirmed , saying , Of a truth this fellow also was with him : for he is a Galilaean .
text2: Iek chaso pala kodia , aver manush phendia , " Suguro ke kado manush sas lesa ; ke wo si Galilean . "

text: And Peter said , Man , I know not what thou sayest . And immediately , while he yet spake , the cock crew .
text2: Ai o Petri phendia , " Manusha , chi zhanav so phenes , ai strazo sar delas duma o kurkorsho bashlo .

text: And the Lord turned , and looked upon Peter . And Peter remembered the word of the Lord , how he had said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Ai O Jesus boldinisailo , dikhlia po Petri , ai o Petri diape goji ka le vorbi kai O Jesus phendiasas leske , mai anglal sar te bashel o kurkorsho , tu phenesa trivar ke chi zhanes ma . "

text: And Peter went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Ai o Petri anklisto avri , ai ruia zurales .

text: And the men that held Jesus mocked him , and smote him .
text2: Ai le manush kai ankerenas le Jesusos , marenas mui lestar , ai marenas les ,

text: And when they had blindfolded him , they struck him on the face , and asked him , saying , Prophesy , who is it that smote thee ?
text2: ai kana thode derza pe lesko mui , marde les palmi pe lesko mui ai phushle , " Kon mudardia tu ? "

text: And many other things blasphemously spake they against him .
text2: Ai phende leske but zhangale vorbi ai asanas lestar .

text: And as soon as it was day , the elders of the people and the chief priests and the scribes came together , and led him into their council , saying ,
text2: Kana phuterdilo o dies , le bare rasha , ai le phure le manushenge , ai le Gramnoturia avile andek than , ai ningerde les anglai kris . Phenenas ,

text: Art thou the Christ ? tell us . And he said unto them , If I tell you , ye will not believe :
text2: " Te san tu O Kristo ? Phen amenge , " O Jesus phendia lenge , " Te phenava tumenge , tume chi pachan ;

text: And if I also ask you , ye will not answer me , nor let me go .
text2: Ai te phushav tumen , tume chi den atweto , vai mek ma te zhav .

text: Hereafter shall the Son of man sit on the right hand of the power of God .
text2: Dakanara O Shav le Manushesko beshel pe rik e chachi , kai si e putiera le Devleski . "

text: Then said they all , Art thou then the Son of God ? And he said unto them , Ye say that I am .
text2: Antunchi savorhe phenenas , " Tu san O Shav le Devlesko ? " Ai wo phendia lenge , " Tume phenen , ke sim me . "

text: And they said , What need we any further witness ? for we ourselves have heard of his own mouth .
text2: Ai won phende , " Chi mai trobul ame martero ! Ke ame ashundiam so wo phendia anda pesko mui . "

text: And the whole multitude of them arose , and led him unto Pilate .
text2: Wushtilo savorhe ai ningerde les ka Pilate .

text: And they began to accuse him , saying , We found this fellow perverting the nation , and forbidding to give tribute to Caesar , saying that he himself is Christ a King .
text2: Ai dosharenas les , phenenas , " Kado manush rimol amaro them ai vazdelpe o narodo pe amende , ai phenel le narodoske te na pochinen ka Caesar e taksa , ai phenelas ke wo si O Kristo , ek amperato . "

text: And Pilate asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answered him and said , Thou sayest it .
text2: O Pilate phushel les , " San tu o amperato le Zhidovongo ? " O Jesus phendia leske , " Tu mothos . "

text: Then said Pilate to the chief priests and to the people , I find no fault in this man .
text2: O Pilate phendia ka le bare rashange ai le narodoske , " Me chi arakhav chi iek dosh ande kado manush .

text: And they were the more fierce , saying , He stirreth up the people , teaching throughout all Jewry , beginning from Galilee to this place .
text2: Numa mai xoliariko sas won , phenenas , " Kado manush vazdel o narodos , ai sicharel kodolen kai si ande Judah , zhal de Galilee ai de katsar naichidisardia .

text: When Pilate heard of Galilee , he asked whether the man were a Galilaean .
text2: Kana o Pilate ashundia e vorba " Galilee , " phushlia , " Kodo manush sas Galilean ? "

text: And as soon as he knew that he belonged unto Herod ' s jurisdiction , he sent him to Herod , who himself also was at Jerusalem at that time .
text2: Kana ashundia ke O Jesus sas andai Galilee ai ke o Herod poronchilas ande Galilee , tradia les ka Herod . O Herod sas ande Jerusalem ande kodia vriama .

text: And when Herod saw Jesus , he was exceeding glad : for he was desirous to see him of a long season , because he had heard many things of him ; and he hoped to have seen some miracle done by him .
text2: Ai kana o Herod dikhlia O Jesus , raduisailo ; ke demult mangelas te dikhel les , ke ashundia but vorbi pa leste ; ai mangelas te dikhel les te kerel mirakluria angla leste .

text: Then he questioned with him in many words ; but he answered him nothing .
text2: O Herod phushlia but vorbi katar o Jesusos , numa O Jesus chi phendia leske kanchi .

text: And the chief priests and scribes stood and vehemently accused him .
text2: Ai le bare rasha ai le Gramnoturia kotse sas , ai thonas dosh pe leste zurales .

text: And Herod with his men of war set him at nought , and mocked him , and arrayed him in a gorgeous robe , and sent him again to Pilate .
text2: Ai o Herod peske ketanensa kerenas zhungales le Jesusosa , ai marenas mui lestar , ai dia pe leste iek rhocha shukar , ai pale tradia les ka Pilate .

text: And the same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together : for before they were at enmity between themselves .
text2: Sa kodo dies o Pilate ai o Herod kerdile vortacha , kai won mai anglal sas duzhmaia iek kavreske .

text: And Pilate , when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people ,
text2: Ai kana o Pilate chidia le bare rashan , ai le bare kai poronchin ai le narodos andek than ,

text: Said unto them , Ye have brought this man unto me , as one that perverteth the people : and , behold , I , having examined him before you , have found no fault in this man touching those things whereof ye accuse him :
text2: phendia lenge , " Tume andian mange kakale manushes , ke buntuil le narodos , ai me phushlem lestar angla tumende , ai chi arakhlem chi iek dosh ande leste . Nai chi iek diela kai tume dosharen les ;

text: No , nor yet Herod : for I sent you to him ; and , lo , nothing worthy of death is done unto him .
text2: Ai chi o Herod chi arakhlia dosh pe leste , ke wo tradia les amende . Kado manush chi kerdia kasavestar o baio kai trobul mudardo .

text: I will therefore chastise him , and release him .
text2: Phenav le ketanenge te maren les le bichosa , ai porme mekav les te zhaltar . "

text: ( For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast . )
text2: Ka swako pachiv sas ek zakono kai trobulas te mekel avri iekes anda temnitsa .

text: And they cried out all at once , saying , Away with this man , and release unto us Barabbas :
text2: Numa savorhen tsipinas andek than , phenenas , " Mudaren les ! Mekes o Barabbas te zhaltar . "

text: ( Who for a certain sedition made in the city , and for murder , was cast into prison . )
text2: O Barabbas sas ande temnitsa kai buntuisailo sas andek foro , ai kai mudardia vari kas .

text: Pilate therefore , willing to release Jesus , spake again to them .
text2: OPilate mai phendia lenge , " Meken le Jesusos te zhaltar . "

text: But they cried , saying , Crucify him , crucify him .
text2: Numa narodo tsipilas , phenelas , " Karfosar les ! Karfosar les ! "

text: And he said unto them the third time , Why , what evil hath he done ? I have found no cause of death in him : I will therefore chastise him , and let him go .
text2: O Pilate mai phendia lenge e trito data , " Savestar baio kerdia kado manush ? Chi arakhlem kanch ande leste te avel mudardo : No mekava les kana avela mardo . "

text: And they were instant with loud voices , requiring that he might be crucified . And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed .
text2: Numa o narodo tsipilas mai zurales , ai mangena te karfon les . Pala pengo tsipimos o Pilate kerdia pe lende .

text: And Pilate gave sentence that it should be as they required .
text2: O Pilate phendia , " So mangen avela pe tumaro . "

text: And he released unto them him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison , whom they had desired ; but he delivered Jesus to their will .
text2: Meklia kodoles kai sas ande temnitsa kai kerdiasas baio ai mudardiasas kodo kai won mangenas ; numa meklia le Jesusos pe lenge vas te keren so won mangen lesa .

text: And as they led him away , they laid hold upon one Simon , a Cyrenian , coming out of the country , and on him they laid the cross , that he might bear it after Jesus .
text2: Sar ningerenas les , line pesa ieke manushes kai busholas Simon , andak foro kai busholas Cyrene , wo avelas andai them , ai thode les te ningerel o trushul pala Jesus .

text: And there followed him a great company of people , and of women , which also bewailed and lamented him .
text2: Ai linepe pala leste but narodo , ai zhuvlia kai rovenas ai nekezhinas pala leste .

text: But Jesus turning unto them said , Daughters of Jerusalem , weep not for me , but weep for yourselves , and for your children .
text2: O Jesus boldiape karing kodola zhuvlia , ai phendia , " Sheiale anda Jerusalem , na roven pe mande , numa roven pe tumende , ai pe tumare glate .

text: For , behold , the days are coming , in the which they shall say , Blessed are the barren , and the wombs that never bare , and the paps which never gave suck .
text2: Ashun ! Le diesa avena kai phenenas , " Raduime kodala zhuvlia kai nashti aven le glate , kodala kai shoxar nas le glate , ai kodala kai shoxar chi dine chuchi . "

text: Then shall they begin to say to the mountains , Fall on us ; and to the hills , Cover us .
text2: Antunchi phenena le plaienge , " Peren pe amende ; " ai phenena le plaiorhange , " Garaven ame . "

text: For if they do these things in a green tree , what shall be done in the dry ?
text2: Ke te kerena kadia le khashtensa kai si zeleno , so kerena kana si shuko ? "

text: And there were also two other , malefactors , led with him to be put to death .
text2: Aver dui manush sas ningerde le Jesusosa te aven mardo .

text: And when they were come to the place , which is called Calvary , there they crucified him , and the malefactors , one on the right hand , and the other on the left .
text2: Kana areslo po than , kai bushol " Calvary vai Shero , " kotse karfosarde les po trushul , ai vi le duie choren , iek pe rik e chachi , ai iek pe rik o stingo .

text: Then said Jesus , Father , forgive them ; for they know not what they do . And they parted his raiment , and cast lots .
text2: Antunchi O Jesus phendia , " Murho Dat , iertis le ; ke chi zhanen so keren . " Ai hulade leske tsalia , ai thodepe te dikhen kon niril leske tsalia .

text: And the people stood beholding . And the rulers also with them derided him , saying , He saved others ; let him save himself , if he be Christ , the chosen of God .
text2: O narodo sas kotse ai dikhelas . Ai le bare manush kai poronchin marenas mui lestar , phenenas , " Skepisardia kavren ; mek te skepil pe pes , te si wo O Kristo , kai alosardia O Del . "

text: And the soldiers also mocked him , coming to him , and offering him vinegar ,
text2: Ai le ketani marenas mui lestar , ai avile leste , ai denas les shut .

text: And saying , If thou be the king of the Jews , save thyself .
text2: Ai phenenas leske , " Te san tu o amperato le Zhidovongo , skepisar tu tut . "

text: And a superscription also was written over him in letters of Greek , and Latin , and Hebrew , THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Opral pa lesko shero ramolaspe ande shiba le Greksisko , ai Latinesko , ai Zhiduviska , " Kado si O AMPERATO LE ZHIDOVONGO . "

text: And one of the malefactors which were hanged railed on him , saying , If thou be Christ , save thyself and us .
text2: Iek andal chor kai sas pasha leste , marelas mui lestar , phenelas , " Te san tu O Kristo , skepisar tu tut , ai ame . "

text: But the other answering rebuked him , saying , Dost not thou fear God , seeing thou art in the same condemnation ?
text2: Numa kolaver chor phendia kolavreske , phenelas , " Chi daras katar O Del , tu kai mudardias ai avela kris pe tute ?

text: And we indeed justly ; for we receive the due reward of our deeds : but this man hath done nothing amiss .
text2: Ame , si kris pe amende ; ke ame keras amensa kadia , ke chorhe sam kai kerdiam baiuria : numa kado chi kerdia chi iek baio .

text: And he said unto Jesus , Lord , remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom .
text2: Ai phendia le Jesusoske " Devla , desa tu goji mande kana avesa ando chi amperetsia . "

text: And Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , To day shalt thou be with me in paradise .
text2: Ai O Jesus phendia leske , " Phenav tuke chachimasa , adies vi tu avesa mansa ando rhaio . "

text: And it was about the sixth hour , and there was a darkness over all the earth until the ninth hour .
text2: Kal desh u dui po mashkar le diesesko tuniariko avilo pe sa e lumia zhi kai trin chasuria .

text: And the sun was darkened , and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst .
text2: Ai o kham chi mai strefialas , ai e selia ( kortina ) ande tampla shindili ande donde de opral zhi tele .

text: And when Jesus had cried with a loud voice , he said , Father , into thy hands I commend my spirit : and having said thus , he gave up the ghost .
text2: Ai kana O Jesus dias mui andek baro glaso , " Murho Dat , thav murho duxo ande che vas , ai phendia kadala vorbi , mulo .

text: Now when the centurion saw what was done , he glorified God , saying , Certainly this was a righteous man .
text2: Akana kana o ketano diklia so kerdilia , luvudisardia O Del , phenelas , " Chaches kado manush vorta sas . "

text: And all the people that came together to that sight , beholding the things which were done , smote their breasts , and returned .
text2: Ai sa o narodo kai chidelas andek than te dikhel , kana dikhle so kerdilia , marenas pe kolin ai geletar khere .

text: And all his acquaintance , and the women that followed him from Galilee , stood afar off , beholding these things .
text2: Sa leske vortacha , ai le zhuvlia kai linepe pala leste andai Galilee , de dural beshenas , dikhenas so kerdiolas .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Joseph , a counseller ; and he was a good man , and a just :
