text2: Sas iek manush kai busholas Josef andai foro kai bushol Arimathea , kado manush lasho sas ai vorta .

text: ( The same had not consented to the counsel and deed of them ; ) he was of Arimathaea , a city of the Jews : who also himself waited for the kingdom of God .
text2: Wo nas kana dosharde le Jesusos , wo sas andek foro busholas Arimathea , o foro le Zhidovongo , wo azhukerelas e amperetsia le Devleski .

text: This man went unto Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus .
text2: Kodo manush gelo ka Pilate , ai manglia te len o stato le Jesusosko .

text: And he took it down , and wrapped it in linen , and laid it in a sepulchre that was hewn in stone , wherein never man before was laid .
text2: Gelo ai lia les tele pa trushul , ai vuluisardia les ando tsolo , ai thodia les ando greposhevo kai sas ando bax , kai inker khonik nas thodino .

text: And that day was the preparation , and the sabbath drew on .
text2: Parashtuine sas , ai o Savato nachinuilas .

text: And the women also , which came with him from Galilee , followed after , and beheld the sepulchre , and how his body was laid .
text2: Ai le zhuvlia kai avile lesa andai Galilee linepe pala lende , ai dikhle o greposhevo ai sar sas thodino lesko stato .

text: And they returned , and prepared spices and ointments ; and rested the sabbath day according to the commandment .
text2: Porme gele palpale khere , ai lasharde le vuloia ai duxi le statoski ; ai hodinisarde po dies le Savatosko , sar o zakono phenel te kerel .

text: Now upon the first day of the week , very early in the morning , they came unto the sepulchre , bringing the spices which they had prepared , and certain others with them .
text2: Kana phuterdilo o dies po pervo dies le kurkoske , avile ka greposhevo te angeren le vuloia ai duxuria kai lasharde sas .

text: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre .
text2: Numa dikhle e bax spidias palpale katar o greposhevo .

text: And they entered in , and found not the body of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Gele andre , numa chi arakhle o stato le Devlesko , Jesus .

text: And it came to pass , as they were much perplexed thereabout , behold , two men stood by them in shining garments :
text2: Sar chi zhanenas so kerdilia , dikhle dui manushen pasha lende kai sas vuriarde andel tsalia kai strefianas ;

text: And as they were afraid , and bowed down their faces to the earth , they said unto them , Why seek ye the living among the dead ?
text2: Daraile , shudepe tele le mosa pe phuv , le manush phende lenge , " Sostar roden mashkar le mule kodoles kai si zhuvindo ?

text: He is not here , but is risen : remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in Galilee ,
text2: Nai katse , numa wushtilo ! Seren tume sar delas duma tumensa kana sas tumensa inker ande Galilee , phenelas ,

text: Saying , The Son of man must be delivered into the hands of sinful men , and be crucified , and the third day rise again .
text2: " O Shav le Manushesko te avel dino andel vas le bezexalenge , ai avela karfosardo po trushul , ai te zhuvindila o trito dies . "

text: And they remembered his words ,
text2: Ai won dinepe goji leske vorbi ,

text: And returned from the sepulchre , and told all these things unto the eleven , and to all the rest .
text2: ai avile palpale khere katar o greposhevo , ai phende sa kodola dieli le desh u iek disiplonge , ai le kolavrenge .

text: It was Mary Magdalene , and Joanna , and Mary the mother of James , and other women that were with them , which told these things unto the apostles .
text2: Kodia kai phendia kodola dieli le slugenge sas e Maria Magdalena , ai e Ioanna , ai e Maria e dei le Iakovoske , ai le kolaver zhuvlia kai sas lensa .

text: And their words seemed to them as idle tales , and they believed them not .
text2: Numa le disipluria gindinas ke so mothonas kodala zhuvlia nai chaches , ai chi pachaiele .

text: Then arose Peter , and ran unto the sepulchre ; and stooping down , he beheld the linen clothes laid by themselves , and departed , wondering in himself at that which was come to pass .
text2: Antunchi o Petri wushtilo opre ai nashlo ka greposhevo ; bandilo tele , ai dikhlia ferdi le tsoluria , ai gelotar khere , ai chudisailo anda so kerdilia .

text: And , behold , two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus , which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs .
text2: Eta , sa kodo dies dui anda lende gele ande gav kai busholas Emmaus , kai sas desh u iek kilometeria vai efta maili anda Jerusalem ,

text: And they talked together of all these things which had happened .
text2: ai phenenas mashkar pende pa so godi kerdilia .

text: And it came to pass , that , while they communed together and reasoned , Jesus himself drew near , and went with them .
text2: Sar denas duma , O Jesus pashilo pasha lende , ai phirelas lensa .

text: But their eyes were holden that they should not know him .
text2: Numa lenge iakha nashti te dikhenas ke wo si .

text: And he said unto them , What manner of communications are these that ye have one to another , as ye walk , and are sad ?
text2: Ai phendia lenge , " Pa soste divinin ando tumaro phirimos nekazosa ? "

text: And the one of them , whose name was Cleopas , answering said unto him , Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem , and hast not known the things which are come to pass therein these days ?
text2: Iek anda lende , kai busholas Cleopas , phendia leske , " Tu san ek streino ando Jerusalem , ai chi zhanes so kerdilia kadala dies . "

text: And he said unto them , What things ? And they said unto him , Concerning Jesus of Nazareth , which was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people :
text2: Ai O Jesus phendia lenge , " So kerdilia ? " Ai won phende leske , " Pa Jesus anda Nazareth , kai sas iek profeto , kai sas les bari putiera kana kerelas peske bucha , ai kana divinilas angla Del ai sa le manushenge ;

text: And how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him to be condemned to death , and have crucified him .
text2: Ai sar amare bare kai poronchin dine les te den les kris , te karfon les po trushul .

text: But we trusted that it had been he which should have redeemed Israel : and beside all this , to day is the third day since these things were done .
text2: Ame gindisas ke wo sas kai sas te skepil o Israel ; numa sa kadale dielensa , adies si o trito dies kai kadala dieli kerdile .

text: Yea , and certain women also of our company made us astonished , which were early at the sepulchre ;
text2: Ai uni zhuvlia ande amare chudisarde amen , chaches ke won gele diminiatsi ka greposhevo ;

text: And when they found not his body , they came , saying , that they had also seen a vision of angels , which said that he was alive .
text2: Numa chi arakhle lesko stato , avile te phenen amenge , ke angeluria sikadile lenge , ai phende lenge ke zhuvindolo .

text: And certain of them which were with us went to the sepulchre , and found it even so as the women had said : but him they saw not .
text2: Uni kai sas amensa gele ka greposhevo , ai arakhle le dieli sar phende sas kodola zhuvlia ; numa chi dikhle le Jesusos . "

text: Then he said unto them , O fools , and slow of heart to believe all that the prophets have spoken :
text2: Antunchi O Jesus phendia lenge , " Tume prosto manush . Ai kai o ilo lungo lo te pachal so godi phende le profeturia .

text: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things , and to enter into his glory ?
text2: Pate chi trobulas O Kristo te chinuil kadia , ai te zhal ande pesko barimos ? "

text: And beginning at Moses and all the prophets , he expounded unto them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself .
text2: Porme phendia lenge so sas phendo pa leste ande Vorba le Devleski , de katar o Moses zhi ka sa le profeturia .

text: And they drew nigh unto the village , whither they went : and he made as though he would have gone further .
text2: Kana aresle pasha gav kai zhanas ; O Jesus kerdia sar ke mangelas te zhal mai dur .

text: But they constrained him , saying , Abide with us : for it is toward evening , and the day is far spent . And he went in to tarry with them .
text2: Numa phende leske , " Besh amensa ; ke perel e riat , ai o dies tsigniol . " Ai gelo te beshel lensa .

text: And it came to pass , as he sat at meat with them , he took bread , and blessed it , and brake , and gave to them .
text2: Sar sas lensa kai skafidi , lia o manrho , ai kana rhugisailo , phaglia o manrho , ai dia le .

text: And their eyes were opened , and they knew him ; and he vanished out of their sight .
text2: Antunchi lenge iakha phuterdile , ai prinzharde les ; numa strazo bilailo .

text: And they said one to another , Did not our heart burn within us , while he talked with us by the way , and while he opened to us the scriptures ?
text2: Ai denaspe duma won de won , " Nas sar iek iag kai phabolas anda amaro ilo ; kana delas duma amensa pa drom , ai kana phenelas amenge pai Vorba le Devleski ? "

text: And they rose up the same hour , and returned to Jerusalem , and found the eleven gathered together , and them that were with them ,
text2: Wushtilo opre strazo , ai gele palpale ande Jerusalem , ai arakhle le kolaver desh u iek disipluria chidine andek than , ai le kolaver kai sas lensa .

text: Saying , The Lord is risen indeed , and hath appeared to Simon .
text2: Phenenas , " Chaches O Del zhuvindisailo , ai sikadilo le Simonoske . "

text: And they told what things were done in the way , and how he was known of them in breaking of bread .
text2: Ai phenenas so kerdilia lensa pa drom , ai sar prinzharde les kana phagelas o manrho .

text: And as they thus spake , Jesus himself stood in the midst of them , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Sar denas duma , O Jesus avilo mashkar lende , ai phendia lenge , " E pacha te avel tumensa , "

text: But they were terrified and affrighted , and supposed that they had seen a spirit .
text2: Won daraile ai pherde dar sas , won gindinas ke dikhle ieke duxos ,

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye troubled ? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts ?
text2: ai wo phendia lenge , " Sostar daran ? Ai sostar kasavendar ginduria si tume ande tumaro ile ?

text: Behold my hands and my feet , that it is I myself : handle me , and see ; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones , as ye see me have .
text2: Dikhen murhe vas ai murhe punrhe , me sim , azban ma , ai dikhen ! Ke o duxo nai les , chi morchi ai chi kokola , sar dikhen tume ke si man . "

text: And when he had thus spoken , he shewed them his hands and his feet .
text2: Sar phenelas kodo divano , sikadia lenge peske vas ai peske punrhe .

text: And while they yet believed not for joy , and wondered , he said unto them , Have ye here any meat ?
text2: Ande pengo raduimos inker chi pachanas , ai chudinaspe , ai wo phendia lenge , " Si tume vari so te xav ? "

text: And they gave him a piece of a broiled fish , and of an honeycomb .
text2: Won dine les masho peko , ai avjin .

text: And he took it , and did eat before them .
text2: Lia ai xalia angla lende .

text: And he said unto them , These are the words which I spake unto you , while I was yet with you , that all things must be fulfilled , which were written in the law of Moses , and in the prophets , and in the psalms , concerning me .
text2: Ai phendia lenge , " Kadala dieli kai phenavas tumenge , kana simas inker tumensa kai trobulas te kerdiol , so godi si ramome pa mande anda zakono le Mosesosko , ai andel le profetonge , ai andel Psalms . "

text: Then opened he their understanding , that they might understand the scriptures ,
text2: Antunchi phuterdia lengo ilo te sai haliaren E Vorba le Devleski .

text: And said unto them , Thus it is written , and thus it behoved Christ to suffer , and to rise from the dead the third day :
text2: Ai phendia lenge , " Kadia si ramome , ke O Kristo chinuila , ai zhuvindila andai martia o trito dies ;

text: And that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations , beginning at Jerusalem .
text2: Ai ke o keimos ai o iertimos le bezexxengo avela phendo ande lesko anav sa le themenge , mai anglal ande Jerusalem .

text: And ye are witnesses of these things .
text2: Tume san marturia pe kadala dieli .

text: And , behold , I send the promise of my Father upon you : but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem , until ye be endued with power from on high .
text2: Ashun ! Tradava pe tumende so murho Dat shinadia , numa tume beshen ando foro Jerusalem , zhi kai aven pherde putiera kai avel katar opral . "

text: And he led them out as far as to Bethany , and he lifted up his hands , and blessed them .
text2: Angerdia le karing e Bethani ; ai vazdia le vas , ai swuntsosardia le .

text: And it came to pass , while he blessed them , he was parted from them , and carried up into heaven .
text2: Ande kodia , kai swuntholas le , durilo lendar , ai gelotar ando rho .

text: And they worshipped him , and returned to Jerusalem with great joy :
text2: Won rhugisaile leste , ai geletar palpale ande Jerusalem bare raduimasa ;

text: And were continually in the temple , praising and blessing God . Amen .
text2: Ai sagda sas ande tampla , bariarenas o anav le Devlesko ai swunthonas le Devles . Amen

text: In the beginning was the Word , and the Word was with God , and the Word was God .
text2: Anda gor sas E Vorba , ai E Vorba sas le Devlesa , ai E Vorba sas O Del .

text: The same was in the beginning with God .
text2: Wo anda gor sas le Devlesa .

text: All things were made by him ; and without him was not any thing made that was made .
text2: Wo kerdia swako fielo , ai kanchi so kerdilo nas kerdo bi leste .

text: In him was life ; and the life was the light of men .
text2: Ande leste sas o traio , ai o traio sas e vediara le manushenge .

text: And the light shineth in darkness ; and the darkness comprehended it not .
text2: E vediara strefial ando tuniariko , ai o tuniariko shoxar chi mudardia e vediara .

text: There was a man sent from God , whose name was John .
text2: Sas iek manush tradino katar O Del , lesko anav sas Iovano .

text: The same came for a witness , to bear witness of the Light , that all men through him might believe .
text2: Avilo o Iovano te phenel le manushenge pai vediara . Kashke savorhe te pachanape pala leste .

text: He was not that Light , but was sent to bear witness of that Light .
text2: O Iovano nas e vediara , numa wo sas tradino te phenel pai vediara .

text: That was the true Light , which lighteth every man that cometh into the world .
text2: Kadia chachi vediara avel ande lumia te del vediara ka swako manush kai avela ande lumia .

text: He was in the world , and the world was made by him , and the world knew him not .
text2: Wo sas ande lumia , ai e lumia sas kerdi pala leste numa e lumia chi zhanglia les .

text: He came unto his own , and his own received him not .
text2: Wo avilo ka peske , ai leske chi premisarde les .

text: But as many as received him , to them gave he power to become the sons of God , even to them that believe on his name :
text2: Uni premisarde les ai pachaiepe ande leste ; wo dia len e putiera te aven shave Devleske .

text: Which were born , not of blood , nor of the will of the flesh , nor of the will of man , but of God .
text2: Kodola kai arakhadile , na anda rat , chi andai voia le statoski , chi andai voia le manusheski , numa katar O Del .

text: And the Word was made flesh , and dwelt among us , ( and we beheld his glory , the glory as of the only begotten of the Father , ) full of grace and truth .
text2: Ai E Vorba kerdile stato ai beshelas mashkar amende . Ame dikhliam lesko barimos , pherdo mishtimasa ai chachimasa , kadia sas o barimos le ieke Shavesko kai avilo katar O Dat .

text: John bare witness of him , and cried , saying , This was he of whom I spake , He that cometh after me is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: O Iovano phendia pa leste , phenelas , " Kado si kai phendem , ' Wo avela pala mande , numa wo si mai baro mandar , ke wo sas mai anglal arakhadilem . ' "

text: And of his fulness have all we received , and grace for grace .
text2: Ai ame savorhe liam anda lesko baro lashimos . Mishtimos pe mishtimos .

text: For the law was given by Moses , but grace and truth came by Jesus Christ .
text2: Ke o zakono sas dino katar o Moses , numa o mishtimos ai o chachimos avilo katar O Jesus Kristo .

text: No man hath seen God at any time ; the only begotten Son , which is in the bosom of the Father , he hath declared him .
text2: Khonik shoxar chi dikhlia le Devles , ferdi o iek Shav kai si le Dadesa , ai wo si kai kerdia te zhanas les .

text: And this is the record of John , when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him , Who art thou ?
text2: Ai kodia si o ramomos le Iovanosko , le Zhiduvuria trade le bare rasha ai le Levituria andai Jerusalem te phushen les ,

text: And he confessed , and denied not ; but confessed , I am not the Christ .
text2: " Tu kon san ? " Ai wo phendias lenge ai chi garadia kanch , phenelas , " Chi sim O Kristo . "

text: And they asked him , What then ? Art thou Elias ? And he saith , I am not . Art thou that prophet ? And he answered , No .
text2: Ai won phushen les , " Kon san tu , Tu san o Elijah ? " ai wo phendia , " Chi sim ! " Antunchi won phushle , " Tu san o profeto ? " ai wo phendia , " Nichi . "

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? that we may give an answer to them that sent us . What sayest thou of thyself ?
text2: Porme phende leske , " Kon san tu ? Te das atweto kodolenge kai tradine ame . So phenes pa tute , kon san ? "

text: He said , I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness , Make straight the way of the Lord , as said the prophet Esaias .
text2: O Iovano phendia , " Me sim o glaso kodoleske kai tsipil ande pusta , " Vorton o drom le Devlesko " sar phendia o Isaiah o profeto . "

text: And they which were sent were of the Pharisees .
text2: Won kai sas tradine , sas anda le Farizeanuria .

text: And they asked him , and said unto him , Why baptizest thou then , if thou be not that Christ , nor Elias , neither that prophet ?
text2: Ai mai phushle les , phenenas , " Antunchi , sostar boles te chi san e Messiah vai chi o Elijah , vai chi o profeto ? "

text: John answered them , saying , I baptize with water : but there standeth one among you , whom ye know not ;
text2: O Iovano dia le atweto , phenelas " Me bolav ando pai , numa mashkar tumende , si vari kon kai chi zhanen .

text: He it is , who coming after me is preferred before me , whose shoe ' s latchet I am not worthy to unloose .
text2: Wo si kai avela pala mande , chi sim dosta lasho te phutrav le doria leske papuchenge . "

text: These things were done in Bethabara beyond Jordan , where John was baptizing .
text2: Kadala dieli kerdionas ando Bethany inchal o Jordan , kai o Iovano bolelas .

text: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him , and saith , Behold the Lamb of God , which taketh away the sin of the world .
text2: Pe terharin o Iovano dikhlia O Jesus sar avelas leste , ai phendia , Dikh ! O Bakriorho le Devlesko , kai lel e bezex le lumiako !

text: This is he of whom I said , After me cometh a man which is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Pa kado si kai phendem , " Pala mande avel iek manush kai si mai baro mandar , ke wo sas mai anglal mandar . "

text: And I knew him not : but that he should be made manifest to Israel , therefore am I come baptizing with water .
text2: Me chi zhanavas les ; numa avilem te bolav le paiesa , kashke sai Israel te zhanel les . "

text: And John bare record , saying , I saw the Spirit descending from heaven like a dove , and it abode upon him .
text2: Porme o Iovano phendia , " Dikhlem O Swunto Duxo sar hulelas anda cheri sar iek gulumbo , ai beshlo pe leste .

text: And I knew him not : but he that sent me to baptize with water , the same said unto me , Upon whom thou shalt see the Spirit descending , and remaining on him , the same is he which baptizeth with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ai chi zhanavas les , numa kodo kai tradia ma te bolav ando pai , phendia mange , " Pe kodo kai dikhesa O Swunto Duxo te hulela , ai te beshela pe leste , kodo si kai bolel le Swuntone Duxosa . "

text: And I saw , and bare record that this is the Son of God .
text2: Ai dikhlem , ai phenav tumenge ke wo si O Shav le Devlesko . "

text: Again the next day after John stood , and two of his disciples ;
text2: Pe terharin o Iovano mai sas pe kodo than duiensa anda leske disipluria .

text: And looking upon Jesus as he walked , he saith , Behold the Lamb of God !
text2: Kana dikhlias O Jesus nakhelas , wo phendia , " Katse si O Bakrorho le Devlesko ! "

text: And the two disciples heard him speak , and they followed Jesus .
text2: Le dui disipluria ashunenas le vorbi kai phendia , ai linepe pala Jesus .

text: Then Jesus turned , and saw them following , and saith unto them , What seek ye ? They said unto him , Rabbi , ( which is to say , being interpreted , Master , ) where dwellest thou ?
text2: Porme O Jesus boldinisailo ai dikhlia ke avenas pala leste , ai phushlia len , " So roden ? " Ai won dine atweto , " Xazhainona , kai beshes ? " ( xazhainono znachil o manush kai sicharel ) .

text: He saith unto them , Come and see . They came and saw where he dwelt , and abode with him that day : for it was about the tenth hour .
text2: Phendia lenge , " Aven ai dikhen . " Won avile ai dikhle kai beshelas , beshlo lesa kodo dies . Kodo sas pala miazutso karing le shtar chasuria .

text: One of the two which heard John speak , and followed him , was Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother .
text2: O Andre , phral le Simonosko Petri , sas iek andal dui manush kai ashundia so phendia o Iovano , ai liape pala Jesus .

text: He first findeth his own brother Simon , and saith unto him , We have found the Messias , which is , being interpreted , the Christ .
text2: Strazo o Andre arakhlia peske phrales o Simon , ai phendia leske , " Arakhliam e Messiah , , " ( E vorba znachil " Kristo . " )

text: And he brought him to Jesus . And when Jesus beheld him , he said , Thou art Simon the son of Jona : thou shalt be called Cephas , which is by interpretation , A stone .
text2: Ai o Andre angerdia o Simon karing O Jesus . Kana O Jesus dikhlia pe leste , phendia , " Tu san o Simon o shav le Iovanosko , te aves akhardo Cephas . " O anav Cephas znachil Petri vai bax .

text: The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee , and findeth Philip , and saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Pe terharin O Jesus manglia te zhal ando them kai busholas Galilee . Wo arakhlia le Filipos , ai phendia leske , " Le tu pala mande . " '

text: Now Philip was of Bethsaida , the city of Andrew and Peter .
text2: O Filip sas anda foro , kai busholas Bethsaida , o foro kai beshle o Andre ai o Petri .

text: Philip findeth Nathanael , and saith unto him , We have found him , of whom Moses in the law , and the prophets , did write , Jesus of Nazareth , the son of Joseph .
text2: O Filip arakhlia le Nathanael ai phendia leske , " Arakhliam kodoles kai o Moses ai le profeturia ramosarde ande klishka le zakonosko , wo si O Jesus andai Nazareth , o shav le Josefosko . "

text: And Nathanael said unto him , Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth ? Philip saith unto him , Come and see .
text2: O Nathanael phendia leske , " Sai avel anda Nazareth vari so lasho ? " O Filip phendia leske , " Aidi ai Dikh . "

text: Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him , and saith of him , Behold an Israelite indeed , in whom is no guile !
text2: O Jesus dikhlia o Nathanael avelas leste , ai phenel pa leste , " Dikh ! Iek chacho Zhidovo . Nai chi iek atsaimos ande leste ! "

text: Nathanael saith unto him , Whence knowest thou me ? Jesus answered and said unto him , Before that Philip called thee , when thou wast under the fig tree , I saw thee .
text2: O Nathanael phendia leske , " Katar zhanes ma tu ? " O Jesus phendia leske , " Mai anglal o Filip akhardia tu , kana sanas telal pruing le figenge , Me dikhlem tu . "

text: Nathanael answered and saith unto him , Rabbi , thou art the Son of God ; thou art the King of Israel .
text2: Porme o Nathanael phendia leske , " Gazda , tu san O Shav le Devlesko . Tu san O Amperato le Zhidovongo . "

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Because I said unto thee , I saw thee under the fig tree , believest thou ? thou shalt see greater things than these .
text2: O Jesus phendia leske , " Anda kodia ke phendem tuke , " Dikhlem tu telai pruing le figenge , tu pachas ? Numa dikhesa mai bare dieli sar kadala . "

text: And he saith unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Hereafter ye shall see heaven open , and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man .
text2: Phenel leske , Chachimasa , chachimasa , phenav tumenge chachimos , dikhena o cheri phuterdiol , ai le angeluria le Devleske anklen ai hulen tele po Shav le Manushesko .

text: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee ; and the mother of Jesus was there :
text2: Trin dies pala kodia sas iek abiav ando gav kai bushol Cana , ando them Galilee ; ai e dei le Jesusoski sas kotse .

text: And both Jesus was called , and his disciples , to the marriage .
text2: Ai vi O Jesus sas akhardo peske disiplonsa ka abiav .

text: And when they wanted wine , the mother of Jesus saith unto him , They have no wine .
text2: Ai kana mangle mol , e dei le Jesusoski phendia leske , ma nai le mol .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , what have I to do with thee ? mine hour is not yet come .
text2: O Jesus phendia lake , " Zhuvlio , so si mashkar tute ai mande , murho chaso inker chi avilo . "

text: His mother saith unto the servants , Whatsoever he saith unto you , do it .
text2: Leski dei phenel le slugenge , " Keren so godi phenela tumenge . "

text: And there were set there six waterpots of stone , after the manner of the purifying of the Jews , containing two or three firkins apiece .
text2: Kotse sas shov phiria chikake , thodinesas te vuzharenpe le Zhiduvuria , swako phiri sai zhalas bish tai pansh galonuria vai iek shel litre pai . ( Thodinesas kotse te halaven penge vas te keren sar lenge zakono phenel . )

text: Jesus saith unto them , Fill the waterpots with water . And they filled them up to the brim .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Peren le phiria le paiesa . " Line le slugi ai pherde le zhando mui .

text: And he saith unto them , Draw out now , and bear unto the governor of the feast . And they bare it .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Len akana ai angeren ka o dat la shako kai kerdia o abiav , " ai ingerde leske .

text: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine , and knew not whence it was : ( but the servants which drew the water knew ; ) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom ,
text2: Kana o dat le shako zumadia o pai kai kerdilosas mol , wo chi zhanelas katar avelas kodia mol , numa le slugi kai linesas anda kodo pai zhanenas mishto . Porme o dat la shako akhardia le manushes kai ansurilaspe .

text: And saith unto him , Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine ; and when men have well drunk , then that which is worse : but thou hast kept the good wine until now .
text2: Ai phenel leske , " Swako manush del e mai lashi mol mai anglal ; ai porme kana savorhe machile , del e mai chorhi , numa tu garadian e lashi mol zhi akana . "

text: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee , and manifested forth his glory ; and his disciples believed on him .
text2: Kado sas o pervo miraklo kai kerdia O Jesus ando gav kai bushol Cana ando them Galilee . Kotse sikadia pesko putiera , ai leski disipluria pachaiepe ande leste .

text: After this he went down to Capernaum , he , and his mother , and his brethren , and his disciples : and they continued there not many days .
text2: Pala kodia O Jesus , ai leski dei , ai leske phral , ai leske disipluria gele lesa ando foro kai bushol Capernaum , ai beshle xantsi dies .

text: And the Jews ' passover was at hand , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem ,
text2: Ai o dies O Baro le Zhidovongo pasholas , ai O Jesus gelo ando Jerusalem .

text: And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves , and the changers of money sitting :
text2: Ai arakhlia ande tampla manushen kai bichinenas guruven ai bakrian ai gulumburia , ai vi manush kai parhuvenas love beshenas kotse .

text: And when he had made a scourge of small cords , he drove them all out of the temple , and the sheep , and the oxen ; and poured out the changers ' money , and overthrew the tables ;
text2: Ai kana O Jesus lia shelo ai kerdia peske bicho anda leste , wo gonisardia savorhen avri andai tampla ai vi le bakrian , ai le guruven , ai dia muial le skafidia kodolenge kai parhuvenas le love .

text: And said unto them that sold doves , Take these things hence ; make not my Father ' s house an house of merchandise .
text2: Ai phendia le manushenge kai bichinenas le gulumbon , " Len kadala dieli katsar ! Na keren anda kher murhe Dadesko bazari . "

text: And his disciples remembered that it was written , The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up .
text2: Ai leske disipluria dinepe goji ke ramomesas ande Vorba le Devleski , " De drago kai si mange cho kher , Devla , phabol ande mande sar ek iag . "

text: Then answered the Jews and said unto him , What sign shewest thou unto us , seeing that thou doest these things ?
text2: Porme le Zhiduvuria phushle les , " Che miraklo sai keres tu te sikaves amenge , ke si tu putiera te keres kadia ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Destroy this temple , and in three days I will raise it up .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Peraven kadia tampla , ai ande trin dies te vazdav la . "

text: Then said the Jews , Forty and six years was this temple in building , and wilt thou rear it up in three days ?
text2: Le Zhiduvuria phende leske , " Trobulsardia shtarvardesh tai shov bersh te keras kadia tampla ! Ai tu phenes ke ande trin dies vazdes la palpale ? "

text: But he spake of the temple of his body .
text2: Numa O Jesus delas duma pai tampla peske statosko .

text: When therefore he was risen from the dead , his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them ; and they believed the scripture , and the word which Jesus had said .
text2: Sa anda kodia O Jesus zhuvindisailo andai martia ka traio , leske disipluria dine pe goji ke phendiasas kadia , ai won pachanaspe o ramomos ai e vorba kai phendiasas O Jesus .

text: Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover , in the feast day , many believed in his name , when they saw the miracles which he did .
text2: Ande vriama kai O Jesus sas ando Jerusalem ka dies O Baro le Zhidovongo , but narodo pachanaspe ando lesko anav , kana dikhenas le mirakluria kai kerdia .

text: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them , because he knew all men ,
text2: Numa O Jesus chi jinelas pe lende , ke wo zhanelas len savorhen .

text: And needed not that any should testify of man : for he knew what was in man .
text2: Ai chi trobulas vari kon te phenel leske pa manush ; ke wo zhanelas korkorho si si ando manush .

text: There was a man of the Pharisees , named Nicodemus , a ruler of the Jews :
text2: Sas iek manush anda le Farizeanuria kai busholas Nicodemus , iek baro le Zhidovongo .

text: The same came to Jesus by night , and said unto him , Rabbi , we know that thou art a teacher come from God : for no man can do these miracles that thou doest , except God be with him .
text2: Ai avilo andek e riate ka Jesus ai phendia leske , " Xazhainona , ame zhanas ke O Del tradia tu te sichares amen ; ke khonik nashti kerel kadala mirakluria kai keres , te nai O Del kodolesa . "

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born again , he cannot see the kingdom of God .
text2: O Jesus dia les atweto ai phendia leske , " Chachimasa , chachimasa , phenav tuke , khonik nashti dikhela o rhaio le Devlesko te na kerdiola aver data . "

text: Nicodemus saith unto him , How can a man be born when he is old ? can he enter the second time into his mother ' s womb , and be born ?
text2: O Nicodemus phendia leske , " Sar dashtilpe iek manush te kerdiol aver data kana si phuro ? Sai mai zhal palpale ando ji peska dako , ai te kerdiol aver data ? "

text: Jesus answered , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit , he cannot enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: O Jesus phendia , " Chachimasa , chachimasa , phenav tuke , khonik nashti zhal ando rhaio le Devlesko te na kerdiola anda pai ai anda Swunto Duxo .

text: That which is born of the flesh is flesh ; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit .
text2: So kerdilo katar o stato , stato si ; ai so kerdilo katar O Swunto Duxo , Swunto Duxo si .

text: Marvel not that I said unto thee , Ye must be born again .
text2: Te na chudis tu kai phendem tuke , ke trobul te kerdion aver data .

text: The wind bloweth where it listeth , and thou hearest the sound thereof , but canst not tell whence it cometh , and whither it goeth : so is every one that is born of the Spirit .
text2: E barval phurdel kai woi mangel , ai ashunes o shumo , numa tu chi zhanes katar avel , ai chi kai zhal ; sakadia si swako manush kai kerdilo anda Swunto Duxo . "

text: Nicodemus answered and said unto him , How can these things be ?
text2: O Nicodemus phendia leske , " Sar kadia diela sai kerdiol ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Art thou a master of Israel , and knowest not these things ?
text2: O Jesus dia les atweto ai phendia leske , " Tu san ek gazda anda Israel , ai chi zhanes kadala dieli ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , We speak that we do know , and testify that we have seen ; and ye receive not our witness .
text2: Chachimasa , chachimasa , phenav tuke , ame mothas so zhanas , ai sam marturia anda so dikhliam , numa tume chi primin amari vorba .

text: If I have told you earthly things , and ye believe not , how shall ye believe , if I tell you of heavenly things ?
text2: Tume chi pachan man kana phenav tumenge pal dieli la phuviake , sar pachan tume kana phenava tumenge pal dieli le rhaioske ?

text: And no man hath ascended up to heaven , but he that came down from heaven , even the Son of man which is in heaven .
text2: Khonik chi anklisto ando rhaio , ke ferdi kodo kai hulisto tele anda rhaio , O Shav le Manushesko kai si ando rhaio . "

text: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness , even so must the Son of man be lifted up :
text2: Ai sar o Moses vazdia o sap ando pusta , sa kadia trobul O Shav le Manushesko te avel vazdino .

text: That whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have eternal life .
text2: Kashke kon godi kai pachalpe ande leste te na xaiil , numa avel les o traio le rhaiosko .

text: For God so loved the world , that he gave his only begotten Son , that whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have everlasting life .
text2: O Del drago sas e lumia , ai wo tradia peske ieke shaves , kashke kon godi kai pachalpe ande leste te na xaiil , numa te avel les o traio kai chi mai getolpe .

text: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world ; but that the world through him might be saved .
text2: Ke O Del chi tradia peske shaves ande lumia te del kris la lumia , numa e lumia te sai avel skepime lestar .

text: He that believeth on him is not condemned : but he that believeth not is condemned already , because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God .
text2: Kodo kai pachalpe ande leste , nai kris pe leste ; numa kodo kai chi pachalpe , e kris vunzhe si pe leste , ke chhi pachaiepe ando anav le ieke Devlesko Shav .

text: And this is the condemnation , that light is come into the world , and men loved darkness rather than light , because their deeds were evil .
text2: Katar avel e kris , si ke e vediara avili ande lumia , ai le manush alosarde o tuniariko ke sar e vediara , ke so kerde sas nasul .

text: For every one that doeth evil hateth the light , neither cometh to the light , lest his deeds should be reproved .
text2: Ke kon godi kerel o nasulimos nai leske drago e vediara , ai chi avel kai vediara , ke chi mangel te dichol leske bezexa .

text: But he that doeth truth cometh to the light , that his deeds may be made manifest , that they are wrought in God .
text2: Numa kodo kai kerel so si vorta avel kai vediara , ke lesko lashimos sai dichol , ke kerdiol lo pala Del .

text: After these things came Jesus and his disciples into the land of Judaea ; and there he tarried with them , and baptized .
text2: Pala kodia O Jesus ai peske disipluria avile ando them kai busholas Judea ; ai kotse beshlo lensa , ai bolelas .

text: And John also was baptizing in Aenon near to Salim , because there was much water there : and they came , and were baptized .
text2: Ai vi o Iovano bolelas ando Enon pasha Salim , ke sas kotse but pai , ai avenas kotse le manush te bolin .

text: For John was not yet cast into prison .
text2: Ke o Iovano nas inker thodino ande temnitsa .

text: Then there arose a question between some of John ' s disciples and the Jews about purifying .
text2: Antunchi uni andal disipluria le Iovanoske ai ek Zhidovo marenas mui pa vuzhimos .

text: And they came unto John , and said unto him , Rabbi , he that was with thee beyond Jordan , to whom thou barest witness , behold , the same baptizeth , and all men come to him .
text2: Ai avile ka Iovano , ai phende leske , " Xazhainona , kodo kai sas tusa inchal o Jordan , pa kudo kai dian amenge duma ? Eta , wo bolel , ai savorhe zhan leste ! "

text: John answered and said , A man can receive nothing , except it be given him from heaven .
text2: O Iovano phendia , " Khonik nashti avel les vari so te na avela leske dino katar O Del .

text: Ye yourselves bear me witness , that I said , I am not the Christ , but that I am sent before him .
text2: Tume san murhe marturia , ke phendem , " Chi sim o Kristo , numa sim tradino angla leste . "

text: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom : but the friend of the bridegroom , which standeth and heareth him , rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom ' s voice : this my joy therefore is fulfilled .
text2: Kodo kai si les e rhomni si o ternaxar ; numa o vortako le ternaxaresko , kai beshel pasha leste ai ashunel les , raduilas but pala glaso le ternaxaresko : me sim pherdo kadia raduimasko .

text: He must increase , but I must decrease .
text2: Wo musai bariol , ai me musai teliuvav . "

text: He that cometh from above is above all : he that is of the earth is earthly , and speaketh of the earth : he that cometh from heaven is above all .
text2: Kodo avel katar opral , si opral pe savorhe ; kodo kai si la phuviako , la phuviako ashel , ai del duma sar te avino phuviako : kodo kai avel anda rhaio , si opral pa savorhe .

text: And what he hath seen and heard , that he testifieth ; and no man receiveth his testimony .
text2: Wo phenel so dikhlia ai ashundia , numa khonik chi pachal leske vorbi .

text: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true .
text2: Savo kai premisardia so ashundia lestar , kodo preznail ke O Del si chacho .

text: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God : for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him .
text2: Kodoles kai O Del tradia phenel le vorbi le Devleske ; ke O Del chi del les O Swunto Duxo pe musura .

text: The Father loveth the Son , and hath given all things into his hand .
text2: O Dat drago le Shaves , ai thodia swako fielo ande leske vas .

text: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life : and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life ; but the wrath of God abideth on him .
text2: Kodo kai pachalpe ando Shav si les o traio kai chi mai getolpe : numa kodo kai chi pachalpe ando Shav chi dikhela o traio ; numa e xoli le Devleski beshel pe leste .

text: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John ,
text2: Le Farizeanuria ashunde ke O Jesus kerelas ai bolelas mai but disipluria de sar o Iovano .

text: ( Though Jesus himself baptized not , but his disciples , )
text2: Numa O Jesus chi bolelas , numa leske disipluria .

text: He left Judaea , and departed again into Galilee .
text2: O Jesus meklia e Judea , ai gelo palpale ande Galilee .

text: And he must needs go through Samaria .
text2: Numa trobulas te nakhel pai Samaria .

text: Then cometh he to a city of Samaria , which is called Sychar , near to the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph .
text2: Areslo andek gav ande Samaria kai busholas Sychar , pasha kimpo kai o Iakov diasas ka Josef pesko shav .

text: Now Jacob ' s well was there . Jesus therefore , being wearied with his journey , sat thus on the well : and it was about the sixth hour .
text2: Kotse sas e xaiin le Iakovoski , O Jesus chino sas katar o phirimos , thodiape pashai xaiin ai beshlo tele : sas karing le desh u dui chasuria .

text: There cometh a woman of Samaria to draw water : Jesus saith unto her , Give me to drink .
text2: Iek zhuvli andai Samaria avilo te lel pai ; O Jesus phenel lake , " De ma pai te piiav . "

text: ( For his disciples were gone away unto the city to buy meat . )
text2: Ke leske disipluria gelesas ando foro te chinen xabe .

text: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him , How is it that thou , being a Jew , askest drink of me , which am a woman of Samaria ? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans .
text2: Antunchi e zhuvli andai Samaria phendia leske , " Sar tu kai san Zhidovo , manges mandar pai te pes ? Ke sim zhuvli andai Samaria . Ke le Zhiduvuria chaches chi brotinas le manushensa kai si andai Samaria .

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , If thou knewest the gift of God , and who it is that saith to thee , Give me to drink ; thou wouldest have asked of him , and he would have given thee living water .
text2: O Jesus phendia lake , " Te zhanglianas tu e podarka le Devleski , ai kon si kodo kai phenel tuke , " De man te piiav ; " Tu korkorho manglianas lestar te pes , ai del tu pai zhuvindo . "

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , thou hast nothing to draw with , and the well is deep : from whence then hast thou that living water ?
text2: E zhuvli phendia leske , " Gazda , Nai tu kanchi te tsirdes ai e xaiin tele la , katar anesa kodo pai zhuvindo ?

text: Art thou greater than our father Jacob , which gave us the well , and drank thereof himself , and his children , and his cattle ?
text2: San tu mai baro katar amaro dat o Iakov , kai dia ame kadia xaiin , ai pilia vi wo , ai leske shave , ai leske zhigeni ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again :
text2: O Jesus phendia lake , " Kon godi pela anda kado pai mai avela trushalo ;

text: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst ; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life .
text2: Numa kado kai pela anda pai kai dava les chi mai avela trushalo ; numa o pai ai dava les kerdiola ande leste xaiin paieske kai zhal zhando traio kai chi mai getolpe . "

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , give me this water , that I thirst not , neither come hither to draw .
text2: E zhuvli phendia leske , " Gazda , de ma kado pai , saxke te na mi avav trushali , ai te na mai avav katse te tsirdav pai anda xaiin . "

text: Jesus saith unto her , Go , call thy husband , and come hither .
text2: O Jesus phendia lake , " Zha . Akhar che rhomes , ai aida katse . "

text: The woman answered and said , I have no husband . Jesus said unto her , Thou hast well said , I have no husband :
text2: E zhuvli phendia leske , " Nai ma rhom . " ai O Jesus phendia lake , " Vorta phenes , ke nai tu rhom ,

text: For thou hast had five husbands ; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband : in that saidst thou truly .
text2: ke sas tu pansh rhom ; ai kado kai si tu akana nai cho rhom ; chaches so phendian . "

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , I perceive that thou art a prophet .
text2: E zhuvli phendia leske , " Gazda , Dikhav ke tu san profeto .

text: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain ; and ye say , that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship .
text2: Amare dada rhuginaspe kacha plaiin ; ai phenes , si ando Jerusalem o than kai trobul te rhugisavas ka Del . "

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , believe me , the hour cometh , when ye shall neither in this mountain , nor yet at Jerusalem , worship the Father .
text2: O Jesus phendia lake , " Zhuvlio , o chaso avela , kai chi mai rhugina le Dades chi pe kacha plaiin ai chi ando Jerusalem .

text: Ye worship ye know not what : we know what we worship : for salvation is of the Jews .
text2: Tune chi zhanen kas te rhugin tume ; ke o skepimos avel katar le Zhiduvuria .

text: But the hour cometh , and now is , when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth : for the Father seeketh such to worship him .
text2: Numa o chaso avel , ai vunzhe avili , kana le chache manush rhuginpe ka Dat ando duxo ai ando chachimos ; ke kadia mangel O Dat te rhuginpe le manush .

text: God is a Spirit : and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth .
text2: O Del si Duxo , ai kodola kai rhuginpe leste , trobul te rhugin leste ando duxo ai ando chachimos . "

text: The woman saith unto him , I know that Messias cometh , which is called Christ : when he is come , he will tell us all things .
text2: E zhuvli phendia leske , " Zhanav ke O Messiah avela , kodo kai si O Kristo : Kana avela , Wo sicharel ame swako fielo . "

text: Jesus saith unto her , I that speak unto thee am he .
text2: O Jesus phendia lake , " Me sim kodo kai dav duma tusa . "

text: And upon this came his disciples , and marvelled that he talked with the woman : yet no man said , What seekest thou ? or , Why talkest thou with her ?
text2: Pe kadia aresle leske disipluria , ai chudisaile te dikhen sar del duma la zhuvliasa ; numa chi iek chi tromailo te phushel les , " So manges latar " , vai " Sostar des duma lasa ? "

text: The woman then left her waterpot , and went her way into the city , and saith to the men ,
text2: E zhuvli meklia peski vadra , ai gelitar ando gav , ai phenel le manusheske .

text: Come , see a man , which told me all things that ever I did : is not this the Christ ?
text2: " Aven , dikhen iek manush kai phendia mange so godi kerdem . Nai kado O Kristo ? "

text: Then they went out of the city , and came unto him .
text2: Anklisto avri anda foro , ai avile leste .

text: In the mean while his disciples prayed him , saying , Master , eat .
text2: Ande kodia vriama leske disipluria grebinas , phenenas leske , " Gazda , xas vari so . "

text: But he said unto them , I have meat to eat that ye know not of .
text2: Numa wo phendia lenge , " Si ma xabe te xav kai tume chi zhanen . "

text: Therefore said the disciples one to another , Hath any man brought him ought to eat ?
text2: Le disipluria denas pe duma iek kavres , " Pate andia leske vari kon te xal ? "

text: Jesus saith unto them , My meat is to do the will of him that sent me , and to finish his work .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Murho xabe si te kerav e voia kodoleski kai tradia man , ai te getov leske buchi .

text: Say not ye , There are yet four months , and then cometh harvest ? behold , I say unto you , Lift up your eyes , and look on the fields ; for they are white already to harvest .
text2: Chi phenen tume , " Si shtar shon zhi kai chiden o jiv ? " Ashun ! phenav tumenge , phutren che iakha , ai dikhen le kimpuria ; ke vunzhe o jiv gatalo te avel chidino .

text: And he that reapeth receiveth wages , and gathereth fruit unto life eternal : that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together .
text2: Kodo kai chidel lel peske pochin , ai chidel fruti pala o traio le rhaiosko ; ai kodo kai shudel o jiv ai kodo kai chidel raduinpe andek than .

text: And herein is that saying true , One soweth , and another reapeth .
text2: Kadala vorbi si chache , iek shudel o jiv , ai kaver chidel o jiv .

text: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour : other men laboured , and ye are entered into their labours .
text2: Tradem tume te chiden so chi shudian , aver kerde buchi . Aver bariarde ai tume avile te chiden lenge fruti . "

text: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman , which testified , He told me all that ever I did .
text2: But Samaritanuria kodole gaveske pachanaspe ando Jesus pala kacha viasta chachi la zhuvliaki , woi phendia , " Phendia mange so godi kerdem . "

text: So when the Samaritans were come unto him , they besought him that he would tarry with them : and he abode there two days .
text2: Ai vi le Samaritanuria avile ka Jesus , ai mangenaspe lestar te beshel pasha lende : wo beshlo dui dies .

text: And many more believed because of his own word ;
text2: Ai mai but narodo pachanaspe ando Jesus pala leske vorbi .

text: And said unto the woman , Now we believe , not because of thy saying : for we have heard him ourselves , and know that this is indeed the Christ , the Saviour of the world .
text2: Ai mothonas la zhuvliake , " Akana pachas ame , nai ke pala so tu phendian amenge , ke ame ashundiam les ame , ai zhanas ke chaches wo si O Kristo , O Skepitori la lumiako . "

text: Now after two days he departed thence , and went into Galilee .
text2: Pala kodola dui dies O Jesus gelotar kotsar te zhal ande Galilee .

text: For Jesus himself testified , that a prophet hath no honour in his own country .
text2: Ke O Jesus phendiasas , " Ke ek profeto nai jindo ande pesko them . "

text: Then when he was come into Galilee , the Galilaeans received him , having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast : for they also went unto the feast .
text2: Kana areslo ande Galilee , le Galilenuria premisarde les , kai dikhle so godi O Jesus kerdiasas ando Jerusalem kana sas e pachiv ; ke vi won sas ka kodia pachiv .

text: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee , where he made the water wine . And there was a certain nobleman , whose son was sick at Capernaum .
text2: O Jesus avilo palpale ando gav kai bushol Cana andai Galilee , kai parhudiasas o pai te kerdiol mol . Sas ando Capernaum iek fitsiri le amperatosko , kai sas lesko shav naswalo .

text: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judaea into Galilee , he went unto him , and besought him that he would come down , and heal his son : for he was at the point of death .
text2: Kana ashundia ke O Jesus avilo andai Judea ande Galilee , gelo karing leste , ai mangliape lestar te avel te sastiarel leske shaves , kai si po merimos .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Except ye see signs and wonders , ye will not believe .
text2: Porme O Jesus phendia leske , " Te na dikhena mirakluria chi pachan tume , vov si . "

text: The nobleman saith unto him , Sir , come down ere my child die .
text2: O fitsiri le amperatosko phendia leske , " Gazda , Aida mande mai anglal te merel murho shav . "

text: Jesus saith unto him , Go thy way ; thy son liveth . And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him , and he went his way .
text2: O Jesus phendia leske , " Zha khere , cho shav traiil ! " Ai kodo manush pachaiape e vorba kai O Jesus phendia leske , ai gelo .

text: And as he was now going down , his servants met him , and told him , saying , Thy son liveth .
text2: Inker po drom sas te zhal peste khere , kana leske slugi avile ande lesko drom , ai mothon leske . " Cho shav traiil . "

text: Then inquired he of them the hour when he began to amend . And they said unto him , Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him .
text2: Ai wo phushel len , " Ka che chaso sastilo ? " ai won phende leske , " Arachi karing o pervo pala miatsuzo o zharo gelotar . "

text: So the father knew that it was at the same hour , in the which Jesus said unto him , Thy son liveth : and himself believed , and his whole house .
text2: Antunchi o dat zhanelas ke sas kodo chaso kana O Jesus phendiasas leske , " Cho shav traiila . " Wo ai savorhe ando lesko kher pachanaspe ando Jesus .

text: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did , when he was come out of Judaea into Galilee .
text2: Kado sas o duito miraklo kai kerdia O Jesus kana avilo andai Judea ande Galilee .

text: After this there was a feast of the Jews ; and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
text2: Pala kodia sas iek pachiv le Zhidovongi ; ai O Jesus gelo ando Jerusalem .

text: Now there is at Jerusalem by the sheep market a pool , which is called in the Hebrew tongue Bethesda , having five porches .
text2: Ai ando Jerusalem sas pasha wudar le bakriango , sas iek balta paieske panshe wudarensa , ai akharenas la Zhidovisko Bethesda .

text: In these lay a great multitude of impotent folk , of blind , halt , withered , waiting for the moving of the water .
text2: Andre sas but naswale kai beshenas tele , korhe , bange , ai paralitikuri azhukerenas te mishtil o pai .

text: For an angel went down at a certain season into the pool , and troubled the water : whosoever then first after the troubling of the water stepped in was made whole of whatsoever disease he had .
text2: Ke ek angelo le Devlesko hulelas pe vriama ai mishtilas o pai ; o pervo naswalo kai hulelas ando pai kana sas buntuime , sastiolas anda pesko naswalimos . Savestar godi sas .

text: And a certain man was there , which had an infirmity thirty and eight years .
text2: Kotse sas ek manush naswalo de trenda ai oxto bersh .

text: When Jesus saw him lie , and knew that he had been now a long time in that case , he saith unto him , Wilt thou be made whole ?
text2: Kana O Jesus dikhlia les tele , ai zhanglia ke sas naswalo de dumult , phushlia les , " Kames te aves sasto ? "

text: The impotent man answered him , Sir , I have no man , when the water is troubled , to put me into the pool : but while I am coming , another steppeth down before me .
text2: O naswalo manush phendia leske , " Gazda , nai khonik katse te shudel ma ando pai kana si buntuime ; ai kana avav , aver hulel tele mai anglal mandar .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Rise , take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Jesus phendia leske , " Wushti , le cho than ai phir . " Ai strazo kodo manush sastilo , wo lia pesko than ai phirdia .

text: And immediately the man was made whole , and took up his bed , and walked : and on the same day was the sabbath .
text2: Numa sa kodia diela kerdili Savatone .

text: The Jews therefore said unto him that was cured , It is the sabbath day : it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed .
text2: Le Zhiduvuria phende le manusheske kai sastilo , " Adies si Savato , ai nai slobodo tuke te angeres cho than . "

text: He answered them , He that made me whole , the same said unto me , Take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Wo phendia lenge , " O manush kai sastiardia ma , phendia mange , " Le cho than , ai phir . "

text: Then asked they him , What man is that which said unto thee , Take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Antunchi phushle les , " Kon si o manush kai phendia tuke , te les cho than ai phires ? "

text: And he that was healed wist not who it was : for Jesus had conveyed himself away , a multitude being in that place .
text2: Numa o manush kai sastilo chi zhanelas o anav kodolesko kai sastiardia les , ke O Jesus gelotar ke sas but narodos ande kodo than .

text: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple , and said unto him , Behold , thou art made whole : sin no more , lest a worse thing come unto thee .
text2: Pala kodia , O Jesus arakhlia les ande tampla , ai phenel leske , Ashun ! Sastilian anda cho naswalimos , na mai ker bezexa akana . Te na mai kerdiol tuke vari so mai nasul .

text: The man departed , and told the Jews that it was Jesus , which had made him whole .
text2: Kodo manush gelotar , ai phendia le Zhidovonge ke O Jesus sastiardia les .

text: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus , and sought to slay him , because he had done these things on the sabbath day .
text2: Sa anda kodia le Zhiduvuria chinuisarde Jesus , ai rodenas te mudaren les , ke kerdia kodia o dies Savatone .

text: But Jesus answered them , My Father worketh hitherto , and I work .
text2: Numa O Jesus phendia lenge , " Murho Dat kerel buchi sorho dies , ai vi me kerav bichi . "

text: Therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him , because he not only had broken the sabbath , but said also that God was his Father , making himself equal with God .
text2: Pa kadala vorbi le Zhiduvuria rodenas mai but te mudaren les ; na ferdi ke kerdia kodia Savatone , numa ke phendia ke O Del si lesko Dat , ai wo kerdilo iek fielo sar O Del .

text: Then answered Jesus and said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , The Son can do nothing of himself , but what he seeth the Father do : for what things soever he doeth , these also doeth the Son likewise .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Chachimasa , chachimasa , phenav tumenge , O Shav nashti kerel kanchi pestar , numa kerel so dikhel O Dat kerel ; so godi kerel O Dat , vi O Shav kerel .

text: For the Father loveth the Son , and sheweth him all things that himself doeth : and he will shew him greater works than these , that ye may marvel .
text2: Ke O Dat drago le Shaves , ai sikavel leske so godi kerel . Ai O Dat sikavela leske mai bare buchi sar kadala . Chudina tume .

text: For as the Father raiseth up the dead , and quickeneth them ; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will .
text2: Ke sar O Dat wushtiavel le mulen , ai del le o traio , saikfielo O Shav del o traio kodolen kai mangel wo .

text: For the Father judgeth no man , but hath committed all judgment unto the Son :
text2: O Dat chi kerel kris pe khanikaste , numa dia e putiera le Shaves te krisinil .

text: That all men should honour the Son , even as they honour the Father . He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him .
text2: Kashte savorhe te luvudin le Shaves , sar luvudin le Dades . Kodo kai chi luvudil le Shaves , chi luvudil le Dades kai tradia les .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that heareth my word , and believeth on him that sent me , hath everlasting life , and shall not come into condemnation ; but is passed from death unto life .
text2: " Chachimasa , chachimasa , phenav tumenge , Kon godi kai ashunel murhi vorba , ai pachalpe ande kodo kai tradia ma , avela les o traio kai chi mai getolpe , ai chi avela pe leste kris ; numa nakhlo anda merimos ai gelo ka traio kai chi mai getolpe .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The hour is coming , and now is , when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God : and they that hear shall live .
text2: " Chachimasa , chachimasa , phenav tumenge , O chaso avela , ai vunzhe avili , kana le mule ashunena o glaso le Shavesko le Devlesko ; ai kodola kai ashunena les traiina .

text: For as the Father hath life in himself ; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself ;
text2: Ke sar O Dat si les o traio ande peste , saikfielo wo kerdia peske Shaves te avel o traio ande peste .

text: And hath given him authority to execute judgment also , because he is the Son of man .
text2: Ai dia peske Shaves e putiera te kerel e kris , ke wo si O Shav le Manushesko .

text: Marvel not at this : for the hour is coming , in the which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice ,
text2: Na chudin tume ke o chaso avela , ke sa le mule kai si andel le greposhevuria ashunen lesko glaso .

text: And shall come forth ; they that have done good , unto the resurrection of life ; and they that have done evil , unto the resurrection of damnation .
text2: Ai anklena avri andal greposhevuria , kodola kai kerde mishto anklena avri te len o traio kai chi mai getolpe . Ai kodola kai kerde o nasulimos , wushtena te nakhen pe kris te zhan ando iado .

text: I can of mine own self do nothing : as I hear , I judge : and my judgment is just ; because I seek not mine own will , but the will of the Father which hath sent me .
text2: " Nashti kerav kanchi anda mande . Sar ashunav , kerav kris pala so phenel mange O Del , ai murhi kris si vorta , ke chi rodav te kerav so mangav anda mande , numa ferdi so mangel te kerav kodo kai tradia ma .

text: If I bear witness of myself , my witness is not true .
text2: Te mothava pa mande , so phenav nashti te avel chachimos .

text: There is another that beareth witness of me ; and I know that the witness which he witnesseth of me is true .
text2: Numa aver si kai phenel pa mande , ai me zhanav le vorbi kai wo mothol pa mande si o chachimos .

text: Ye sent unto John , and he bare witness unto the truth .
text2: " Tume tradian marturia ka Iovano o baptisto , ai wo phendia tumenge o chachimos .

text: But I receive not testimony from man : but these things I say , that ye might be saved .
text2: Man , chi trobul le vorbi katar le manushen te phenel ke vorta sim , numa phenav kadia , saxke te sai aven skepime .

text: He was a burning and a shining light : and ye were willing for a season to rejoice in his light .
text2: O Iovano sas sar ek lampo kai phabolas ai sar e vediara kai strefialas ; ai tume manglian te raduin tume xantsi vriama ande leski vediara .

text: But I have greater witness than that of John : for the works which the Father hath given me to finish , the same works that I do , bear witness of me , that the Father hath sent me .
text2: Numa , man si man ek mai baro chachimos pa mande sar o Iovano , me kerav e buchi kai murho Dat dia ma te kerav , kodola bucha kai kerav sikaven pa mande ke O Dat tradia ma .

text: And the Father himself , which hath sent me , hath borne witness of me . Ye have neither heard his voice at any time , nor seen his shape .
text2: Ai O Dat kai tradia ma , phenel vi wo pa mande . Tume shoxar chi ashundian lesko glaso , ai shoxar chi dikhlian lesko mui .

text: And ye have not his word abiding in you : for whom he hath sent , him ye believe not .
text2: Chi garaven leske vorbi ande tumende , ke chi pachan tume ande kodo kai tradia les .

text: Search the scriptures ; for in them ye think ye have eternal life : and they are they which testify of me .
text2: " Sichon o ramomos ande Vorba le Devleski , ke tume gindin kai arakhena ande late o traio kai chi mai getolpe .

text: And ye will not come to me , that ye might have life .
text2: Ai o ramomos del duma pa mande ! Ai tume chi aven mande , te avel tumen o traio .

text: I receive not honour from men .
text2: Chi rodav o luvudimos andal manush .

text: But I know you , that ye have not the love of God in you .
text2: Numa me zhanav tumen ; ke nai dragostia le Devleski ande tumende .

text: I am come in my Father ' s name , and ye receive me not : if another shall come in his own name , him ye will receive .
text2: Avilem ando o anav murhe Dadesko , numa chi premisardian ma ; numa te avela aver ande pesko anav , premisaren les .

text: How can ye believe , which receive honour one of another , and seek not the honour that cometh from God only ?
text2: Drago tumenge te aven luvudime iek avrestar , numa chi roden o luvudimos te avel ferdi katar O Del ; sar sai pachan tume ?

text: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father : there is one that accuseth you , even Moses , in whom ye trust .
text2: Na gindin ke dosharava tumen ka murho Dat . Si ek kai dosharela tumen , kodo si o Moses kai thodian tumaro pachamos ande leste .

text: For had ye believed Moses , ye would have believed me : for he wrote of me .
text2: Te pachaianas tume chaches ando Moses , pachadian vi ande mande ; ke wo ramosardia pa mande .

text: But if ye believe not his writings , how shall ye believe my words ?
text2: Numa te chi pachana tume so ramosardian , sar sai pachan murhe vorbi ? "

text: After these things Jesus went over the sea of Galilee , which is the sea of Tiberias .
text2: Pala kodia , O Jesus gelotar inchal o pai kai busholas Galilee ( vai Tiberias ) .

text: And a great multitude followed him , because they saw his miracles which he did on them that were diseased .
text2: But narodo lelaspe pala leste , ke le manush dikhenas le mirakluria kai kerelas , ai sastiarelas le naswalen .

text: And Jesus went up into a mountain , and there he sat with his disciples .
text2: O Jesus anklisto po plai ai beshlo tele kotse peske disiplonsa .

text: And the passover , a feast of the Jews , was nigh .
text2: Ai O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo pasholas .

text: When Jesus then lifted up his eyes , and saw a great company come unto him , he saith unto Philip , Whence shall we buy bread , that these may eat ?
text2: O Jesus vazdia le iakha , ai dikhlia ek baro narodo avel leste , wo phendia le Filiposke , " Kai sai chinasa dosta xabe te pravaras sa kadale narodos ? "

text: And this he said to prove him : for he himself knew what he would do .
text2: Wo phendia kadia te zumavel les , numa O Jesus zhanglia so kerelas .

text: Philip answered him , Two hundred pennyworth of bread is not sufficient for them , that every one of them may take a little .
text2: O Filip phendia leske , " Dui shela teliara rupunen chi avela ame dosta te chinas manrho te das xantsi kotororho swakones .

text: One of his disciples , Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother , saith unto him ,
text2: Iek anda leske disipluria , o Andre , o phral le Simonosko Petri , phenel leske ,

text: There is a lad here , which hath five barley loaves , and two small fishes : but what are they among so many ?
text2: " Si katse iek raklorho , kai si les panzh manrhe , ai dui tsinorhe mashe . Numa so si kadala pe kado but narodo ? "

text: And Jesus said , Make the men sit down . Now there was much grass in the place . So the men sat down , in number about five thousand .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Antunchi keren te beshen savorhe tele . Kotse sas but char . Le manush beshle tele . Won sas pashte panzh mi mursh .

text: And Jesus took the loaves ; and when he had given thanks , he distributed to the disciples , and the disciples to them that were set down ; and likewise of the fishes as much as they would .
text2: O Jesus lia le manrhe , naisisardia le Devles , ai O Jesus dia le kal disipluria , ai leske disipluria dia le ka narodo kai beshelas tele , ai sakadia le masheske , ai sas le sode won mangle .

text: When they were filled , he said unto his disciples , Gather up the fragments that remain , that nothing be lost .
text2: Kana xale dosta savorhe , wo phenel peske disiplonge , " Chiden le kotora kai ashshile ; te na xasavol kanchi . "

text: Therefore they gathered them together , and filled twelve baskets with the fragments of the five barley loaves , which remained over and above unto them that had eaten .
text2: Le disipluria chide le desh u dui shkonitsi pherdesas le kotorensa kay ashshile katar le panzh manrhe kana savorhe xale .

text: Then those men , when they had seen the miracle that Jesus did , said , This is of a truth that prophet that should come into the world .
text2: Le zhene kai dikhle o miraklo kai kerdia O Jesus , phende " Kado si o chacho profeto kai trobulas te avel ande lumia ! "

text: When Jesus therefore perceived that they would come and take him by force , to make him a king , he departed again into a mountain himself alone .
text2: Ai O Jesus zhanelas ke si te aven te len les pe zor , te keren les amperato , gelotar po plai kokorho .

text: And when even was now come , his disciples went down unto the sea ,
text2: Kana e riat avili , leske disipluria gele karing e maria .

text: And entered into a ship , and went over the sea toward Capernaum . And it was now dark , and Jesus was not come to them .
text2: Ankliste ande ek chuno , ai thodepe te nakhen o pai palpale karing o Capernaum . Akana sas tumiariko , ai O Jesus inker chi avilo lende .

text: And the sea arose by reason of a great wind that blew .
text2: Ai e maria buntuime sas ke barval phurdelas zurales .

text: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs , they see Jesus walking on the sea , and drawing nigh unto the ship : and they were afraid .
text2: Kana kerdesas trin vai shtar maili vai pansh vai shov kilometre po pai ando chuno . Won dikhle O Jesus phirelas pe maria , ai pasholas lende ando chuno ; ai won daraile .

text: But he saith unto them , It is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Numa O Jesus phendia lenge , " Me sim , na daran . "

text: Then they willingly received him into the ship : and immediately the ship was at the land whither they went .
text2: Mangenas te len les ande pengo chuno ; ai strazo o chuno areslo karing e phuv kai trobulas te zhan .

text: The day following , when the people which stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was none other boat there , save that one whereinto his disciples were entered , and that Jesus went not with his disciples into the boat , but that his disciples were gone away alone ;
text2: Pe terharin , kana o narodo kai beshle pe kolaver rig la mariako , dikhle ke sas kotse ferdi iek chuno . Won zhangle ke O Jesus chi anklisto ando chuno peske disiplonsa , numa geletar korkorho .

text: ( Howbeit there came other boats from Tiberias nigh unto the place where they did eat bread , after that the Lord had given thanks : )
text2: Numa aver chunuria avile andai Tiberias , areslesas pasha o than kai xalesas o manrho , kana O Jesus naisisardiasas le Devles .

text: When the people therefore saw that Jesus was not there , neither his disciples , they also took shipping , and came to Capernaum , seeking for Jesus .
text2: Kana o narodo dikhle ke O Jesus nas kotse , ai chi leske disipluria . Won ankliste ande lenge chunuria , ai gele ando Capernaum te roden les .

text: And when they had found him on the other side of the sea , they said unto him , Rabbi , when camest thou hither ?
text2: Kana o narodo arakhle O Jesus pe kolaver rig la mariako , won phende leske , " Gazda , kana avilian tu katse ? "

text: Jesus answered them and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Ye seek me , not because ye saw the miracles , but because ye did eat of the loaves , and were filled .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Chachimasa , chachimasa , phenav tumege : roden ma , ke xalian o manrho ai chaililian , ai na ke dikhlian le mirakluria .

text: Labour not for the meat which perisheth , but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life , which the Son of man shall give unto you : for him hath God the Father sealed .
text2: Na keren buchi le xabeneski kai rimolpe , numa keren buchi le xabeneski kai beshel but vriama ai kai kerel te avel o traio kai chi mai getolpe . Ai ke O Shav le Manushesko dela tumenge ; ke O Del , O Dat , thodia pe leste o semno leska putierako . "

text: Then said they unto him , What shall we do , that we might work the works of God ?
text2: Antunchi won phende leske , " So trobul te keras , te keras e buchi maladi angla Del ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , This is the work of God , that ye believe on him whom he hath sent .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Kadia si e buchi le Devleski , te pachan tume ande kodo kai wo tradia . "

text: They said therefore unto him , What sign shewest thou then , that we may see , and believe thee ? what dost thou work ?
text2: Phen leske , " Che semno la putierako sikaves tu , kashte te dikhas , vai pachas ame ande tute ? So keres tu ? "

text: Our fathers did eat manna in the desert ; as it is written , He gave them bread from heaven to eat .
text2: Amare dada xale o manrho ande pusta ; sar si ramome , wo dia le manrho anda cheri te xan . "

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Moses gave you not that bread from heaven ; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven .
text2: O Jesus phenel lenge , " Chachimasa , chachimasa , phenav tumenge , O Moses chi dia tume o manrho anda cheri ; numa murho Dat del tumen o chacho manrho anda cheri .

text: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven , and giveth life unto the world .
text2: Ke o manrho kai del O Del , kodo si kai hulel anda rhaio , ai del traio la lumiako . "

text: Then said they unto him , Lord , evermore give us this bread .
text2: Won phenen leske , " Gazda , de ame kodo manrho sagda . "

text: And Jesus said unto them , I am the bread of life : he that cometh to me shall never hunger ; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Me sim o manrho le traiosko ; kodo kai avela mande shoxar chi avela bokhalo ; kodo kai pachal ande mande shoxar chi avela trushalo . "

text: But I said unto you , That ye also have seen me , and believe not .
text2: Numa phendem tumenge , " Tume dikhlian ma numa chi pachan ma .

text: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me ; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out .
text2: So godi murho Dat del ma avela mande . Ai kodales kai avela mande shoxar chi dava avri .

text: For I came down from heaven , not to do mine own will , but the will of him that sent me .
text2: Ke hulistem anda rhaio , te kerav e voia kodoleski kai tradia ma , ai na murhi voia .

text: And this is the Father ' s will which hath sent me , that of all which he hath given me I should lose nothing , but should raise it up again at the last day .
text2: Ai kadia si e voia le Dadeski kai tradia ma ; te na xasarav chi iek anda kodola kai dia ma , numa te vushtiavav le savorhen ka traio ka mai paluno dies .

text: And this is the will of him that sent me , that every one which seeth the Son , and believeth on him , may have everlasting life : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Ai kadia si leski voia , ke kon godi dikhela le Shaves , ai pachalape ande leste , avela les o traio kai chi mai getolpe ; ai vushtiavava le ka traio ka paluno dies .

text: The Jews then murmured at him , because he said , I am the bread which came down from heaven .
text2: Le Zhiduvuria line xoli po Jesus , ke phendia lenge , " Me sim o manrho kai hulisto anda rhaio . "

text: And they said , Is not this Jesus , the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we know ? how is it then that he saith , I came down from heaven ?
text2: Pate won phende , " Nai wo O Jesus , o shav le Josefesko , ai zhanas leske dades ai leska da ? Sar sai mothol ke hulisto anda rhaio ? "

text: Jesus therefore answered and said unto them , Murmur not among yourselves .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Na xoliavon mashkar tumende .

text: No man can come to me , except the Father which hath sent me draw him : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Khonik nashtil te avel mande , te na avela O Dat kai tradia ma te tsirdel les mande ; ai vushtiavava les anda merimos ka traio le rhaiosko ka paluno dies .

text: It is written in the prophets , And they shall be all taught of God . Every man therefore that hath heard , and hath learned of the Father , cometh unto me .
text2: Le profeturia ramosarde , " Savorhe avena sicharde katar O Del . " Savo godi manush ashunela le Dades ai lelape pala lesko sicharimos avela mande .

text: Not that any man hath seen the Father , save he which is of God , he hath seen the Father .
text2: Khonik chi dikhlia le Dades ; kodo kai avilo katar O Del , si kodo kai dikhlia le Dades .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me hath everlasting life .
text2: Chachimasa , chachimasa , phenav tumenge : kodo kai pachalpe ande mande avela les o traio kai chi mai getolpe .

text: I am that bread of life .
text2: Me sim o manrho le traiosko .

text: Your fathers did eat manna in the wilderness , and are dead .
text2: Tumare dada xale o manrho ande pusta , numa mule .

text: This is the bread which cometh down from heaven , that a man may eat thereof , and not die .
text2: Numa o manrho kai hulel anda rhaio kadia lo ke savo kai xala les chi merela .

text: I am the living bread which came down from heaven : if any man eat of this bread , he shall live for ever : and the bread that I will give is my flesh , which I will give for the life of the world .
text2: Me sim o manrho o zhuvindo kai hulisto anda rhaio . Te si vari kon kai xala anda kadia manrho , traiila sagda . Ai o manrho kai dava si murho stato , ai dava les te avel o traio la lumiako . "

text: The Jews therefore strove among themselves , saying , How can this man give us his flesh to eat ?
text2: Pe kadia le Zhiduvuria denas pe duma mashkar pende , phenenas , " Sar sai wo del amen pesko stato te xa ? "

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except ye eat the flesh of the Son of man , and drink his blood , ye have no life in you .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Chachimasa , chachimasa , phenav tumenge , te na xana o stato katar O Shav le Manushesko , ai te na pena lesko rat , chi avela tumen o traio ande tumende .

text: Whoso eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , hath eternal life ; and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Savo kai xala murho stato , ai pela murho rat avela les o traio le rhaiosko , ai vushtiavava les ka traio le rhaiosko o paluno dies .

text: For my flesh is meat indeed , and my blood is drink indeed .
text2: Ke murho stato si chacho pravarimos , ai murho rat si chacho pimos .

text: He that eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , dwelleth in me , and I in him .
text2: Savo kai xal murho stato ai pel murho rat traiil ande mande ai traiiv ande leste .

text: As the living Father hath sent me , and I live by the Father : so he that eateth me , even he shall live by me .
text2: O Dat kai tradia ma zhuvindo lo , ai traiiv anda leste sakadia , kodo kai xal murho stato traiila anda mande .

text: This is that bread which came down from heaven : not as your fathers did eat manna , and are dead : he that eateth of this bread shall live for ever .
text2: Kado si o manrho kai hulisto anda rhaio ; nai sar tumare phurane dada kai xale o manrho ande pusta , ai mule . Kon xala kado manrho traiila sa data .

text: These things said he in the synagogue , as he taught in Capernaum .
text2: O Jesus phendia kadala vorbi kana sicharelas ande synagogue ando Capernaum .

text: Many therefore of his disciples , when they had heard this , said , This is an hard saying ; who can hear it ?
text2: But anda peske disipluria , kana ashunde kadia , phende , " Kadala vorbi si trutno . Kon sai ashunel le ? "

text: When Jesus knew in himself that his disciples murmured at it , he said unto them , Doth this offend you ?
text2: O Jesus haliardia ande peste ke leske disipluria denas pe duma mashkar pende pa kado divano , anda kodia phendia lenge , " Dukhavel tumen so ashundian ? "

text: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before ?
text2: So keren tume kana dikhena ke O Shav le Manushesko anklel kotse kai sas mai anglal ?

text: It is the spirit that quickeneth ; the flesh profiteth nothing : the words that I speak unto you , they are spirit , and they are life .
text2: Le Devlesko Duxo del o traio : o stato chi mol kanchi . Le vorbi kai phendem tumenge , won si duxo ai traio .

text: But there are some of you that believe not . For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were that believed not , and who should betray him .
text2: Numa si mashkar tumende uni kai chi pachan . " Ke O Jesus zhanglia de mai anglal kon si kodola kai chi pachanpe , ai kon si kodo kai purhila les .

text: And he said , Therefore said I unto you , that no man can come unto me , except it were given unto him of my Father .
text2: Wo phendia , " Sostar phendem tumenge , ke khonik nashtil te avel mande te na tsirdela les O Del mande . "

text: From that time many of his disciples went back , and walked no more with him .
text2: Ai de katar kodia vriama but anda leske disipluria geletar , ai chi mai zhanas lesa .

text: Then said Jesus unto the twelve , Will ye also go away ?
