text2: Ai O Jesus phendia le desh u dui disiplonge , " Ai tume , chi mangen vi tume te zhantar ? "

text: Then Simon Peter answered him , Lord , to whom shall we go ? thou hast the words of eternal life .
text2: Ai O Simon Petri phendia leske , " Devla , kaste te zhasas ame ? Si tu le vorbi kai den o traio le rhaiosko .

text: And we believe and are sure that thou art that Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Ai akana pachas ai zhanas kai tu san O Kristo , O Swunto Shav le Devlesko .

text: Jesus answered them , Have not I chosen you twelve , and one of you is a devil ?
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Pate chi alosardem tumen me , le desh u duien ? Ai iek anda tumende si iek beng ! "

text: He spake of Judas Iscariot the son of Simon : for he it was that should betray him , being one of the twelve .
text2: Wo delas duma pa Judas Iscariot o shav le Simonosko . Ke wo sas kai trobulas te purhil les , iek andal desh u dui .

text: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee : for he would not walk in Jewry , because the Jews sought to kill him .
text2: Pala kodia O Jesus phiradia ande Galilee ; ke chi mangel te phirel ande Judea , ke le Zhiduvuria rodenas te mudaren les .

text: Now the Jews ' feast of tabernacles was at hand .
text2: Ai O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo le Tabernacles pasholas .

text: His brethren therefore said unto him , Depart hence , and go into Judaea , that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest .
text2: Leske phral phende leske , " Zhatar katse , ai zha ando Judea , kashte che disipluria te sai dikhen le mirakluria kai tu keres .

text: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret , and he himself seeketh to be known openly . If thou do these things , shew thyself to the world .
text2: Khonik chi garavel so kerel te mangel te sikadiol . Te keres kadalendar dieli , sikav tu ka sa la lumiake ! "

text: For neither did his brethren believe in him .
text2: Ke chi leske chache phral chi pachanaspe ande leste .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , My time is not yet come : but your time is alway ready .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Murhi vriama chi avili inker ; numa tumari vriama sagda gata la .

text: The world cannot hate you ; but me it hateth , because I testify of it , that the works thereof are evil .
text2: E lumia nashti gretsol tumen , numa gretsol man , ke phenav pa late , ke laki buchi so kerel si nasul .

text: Go ye up unto this feast : I go not up yet unto this feast ; for my time is not yet full come .
text2: Zhantar tume ka Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo , me chi zhav ka kado Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo inker , ke murhi vriama chi avili inker .

text: When he had said these words unto them , he abode still in Galilee .
text2: Wo phendia lenge kadala vorbi ai beshlo ando Galilee .

text: But when his brethren were gone up , then went he also up unto the feast , not openly , but as it were in secret .
text2: Kana leske phral gele ka Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo , antunchi O Jesus gelo , vi wo numa na angle narodo , numa sar chordanes .

text: Then the Jews sought him at the feast , and said , Where is he ?
text2: Le Zhiduvuria rodenas les ka O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo . Ai phende , " Kai lo ? "

text: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him : for some said , He is a good man : others said , Nay ; but he deceiveth the people .
text2: But manush denas duma pala leste ando narodo . Uni phende , " Wo si iek manush o lasho . " Aver phenenas , " Nichi . " Wo atsavel le manushen . "

text: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews .
text2: Numa khonik chi delas duma pa leste angla manush , ke daranas katar le Zhiduvuria .

text: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple , and taught .
text2: Karing mashkar O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo O Jesus gelo ande tampla , ai sicharelas .

text: And the Jews marvelled , saying , How knoweth this man letters , having never learned ?
text2: Le Zhiduvuria chudinaspe , ai phenenas , " Sar wo zhanel kadia but kana shoxar chi sichilo . "

text: Jesus answered them , and said , My doctrine is not mine , but his that sent me .
text2: O Jesus phenel lenge , " O sicharimos kai dav nai murho , numa avel katar O Del kai tradia ma .

text: If any man will do his will , he shall know of the doctrine , whether it be of God , or whether I speak of myself .
text2: Te vari kon te kerel so mangel O Del , zhanela ke so sicharav avel katar O Del , vai te dava duma anda mande .

text: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory : but he that seeketh his glory that sent him , the same is true , and no unrighteousness is in him .
text2: Kon del duma pestar rodel pesko barimos : numa kodo kai rodel o barimos kodolesko kai tradia les , kodo si chacho , ai nai xoxaimos ande leste .

text: Did not Moses give you the law , and yet none of you keepeth the law ? Why go ye about to kill me ?
text2: O Moses dia tume o zakono ? Numa khonik anda tumende chi keren o zakono . Sostar roden tume te mudaren ma ? "

text: The people answered and said , Thou hast a devil : who goeth about to kill thee ?
text2: Le manush phende leske , " Tut si tu iek beng ande tute ! Kon rodel te mudarel tu ? " "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , I have done one work , and ye all marvel .
text2: O Jesus phenel lenge , " Kerdem iek diela , ai savorhe chudisailian .

text: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision ; ( not because it is of Moses , but of the fathers ; ) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man .
text2: Ke o Moses dia tumen o zakono te shinen pe murshen ( na ke avel katar o Moses , numa katar tumare phure ) , ai tume shinen ieke manushes po dies O Savatone .

text: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision , that the law of Moses should not be broken ; are ye angry at me , because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day ?
text2: Te sai shinen ieke manushes po dies O Savatone , te phagen o zakono le Mosesosko . Sostar xoliavon pe mande , ke sastiardem ieke manushes sa antrego po dies O Savatone ?

text: Judge not according to the appearance , but judge righteous judgment .
text2: Aterdion te keren kris pala so dikhen avrial po manush , aven vorta ai chache ande tumare kris kana keren la . "

text: Then said some of them of Jerusalem , Is not this he , whom they seek to kill ?
text2: Uni manush anda o Jerusalem phende , " Pate nai kado o manush kai rodas te mudaras les ?

text: But , lo , he speaketh boldly , and they say nothing unto him . Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ ?
text2: Dikh ! Del duma angla savorhenge , ai khonik chi phenel leske kanchi ! Amborim ke le bare kai poronchin zhanen ke wo si O Kristo ?

text: Howbeit we know this man whence he is : but when Christ cometh , no man knoweth whence he is .
text2: Numa kana O Kristo avela , khonik chi zhanela katar avel , numa ame zhanas katar avel kado manush . "

text: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught , saying , Ye both know me , and ye know whence I am : and I am not come of myself , but he that sent me is true , whom ye know not .
text2: Sar O Jesus sicharelas ande tampla , tsipisardia , " Tume zhanen ma , ai zhanen katar sim : ai chi avilem anda mande , numa kodo kai tradia ma wo si chacho , ai tume chi zhanen les .

text: But I know him : for I am from him , and he hath sent me .
text2: Numa me zhanav les ; ke avav lestar , ai wo tradia ma . "

text: Then they sought to take him : but no man laid hands on him , because his hour was not yet come .
text2: Antunchi rodenas sar te len les ; numa khonik chi thode o vas pe leste , ke lesko chaso chi avilo inker .

text: And many of the people believed on him , and said , When Christ cometh , will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done ?
text2: Numa but mashkar o narodo pachanaspe ande leste , ai phende , " Kana O Kristo avela , sai kerela mai but mirakluria sar kerdia kado ? "

text: The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him ; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him .
text2: Le Farizeanuria ashunde ke o narodo mothon kodala dieli pa Jesus ; ai le Farizeanuria ai le bare rasha trade penge zhandari te len les .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Yet a little while am I with you , and then I go unto him that sent me .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Me beshav tumensa mai xantsi vriama , ai porme zhavtar karing kodo kai tradia ma .

text: Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come .
text2: Tume rodena ma , numa chi arakhena ma , ke nashti avena kai zhava . "

text: Then said the Jews among themselves , Whither will he go , that we shall not find him ? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles , and teach the Gentiles ?
text2: Le Zhiduvuria phenen mashkar pende , " Kai wo zhala kai chi arakhasa les ? Zhala karing le foruria kai si ande Gretsia , ai sicharel le Grekone ?

text: What manner of saying is this that he said , Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come ?
text2: So si kadala vorbi kai phendia , Tume rodena ma , numa chi arakhena ma , ke nashti aven kai me zhava . So znachil ? "

text: In the last day , that great day of the feast , Jesus stood and cried , saying , If any man thirst , let him come unto me , and drink .
text2: O paluno Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo sas o mai baro , ai O Jesus beshelas ande punrhende ai tsipisardia , phenelas , " Te si vari kon trushalo , mek te avel mande , ai pel

text: He that believeth on me , as the scripture hath said , out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water .
text2: " Kon pachalape ande mande , sar E Vorba le Devleski phenel , pai zhuvindo hulela anda lesko ilo . "

text: ( But this spake he of the Spirit , which they that believe on him should receive : for the Holy Ghost was not yet given ; because that Jesus was not yet glorified . )
text2: O Jesus phendia pa Swunto Duxo , kodala kai pachanpe ande leste premina : ke O Swunto Duxo nai dino inker , ke O Jesus nas vazdino ando rhaio inker .

text: Many of the people therefore , when they heard this saying , said , Of a truth this is the Prophet .
text2: Kana but le manusheske ashunde leske vorbi , phenenas , " Chaches , kado manush si o profeto . "

text: Others said , This is the Christ . But some said , Shall Christ come out of Galilee ?
text2: Aver phende , " Wo si O Kristo ! " Numa aver phende , " Pate , sai Kristo avel andai Galilee !

text: Hath not the scripture said , That Christ cometh of the seed of David , and out of the town of Bethlehem , where David was ?
text2: Pate o ramomos chi phendia , ke O Kristo si te avel ande vitsa le Davidoski , ai anda foro kai bushol Bethlehem , kai beshlo o David ? "

text: So there was a division among the people because of him .
text2: Anda kodia chi haliarenas mashkar pende iek fialo pala Jesus .

text: And some of them would have taken him ; but no man laid hands on him .
text2: Uni mangenas te len les , numa khonik chi thode o vas pe leste .

text: Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees ; and they said unto them , Why have ye not brought him ?
text2: Le zhandari gele palpale ka le bare rasha ai le Farizeanuria , ai phende lenge , " Sostar tume chi andian les ? "

text: The officers answered , Never man spake like this man .
text2: Le zhandari phende lenge , " Chi iek manush chi dia duma sar kado manush ! "

text: Then answered them the Pharisees , Are ye also deceived ?
text2: Le Farizeanuria phushle len , " Vi tume atsardian pala leste .

text: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him ?
text2: Pate si vari kon andal le bare kai poronchin , vai iek andal Farizeanuria kai pachanpe ande leste ?

text: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed .
text2: Numa kodo narodo kai chi zhanen o zakono o Mosesosko , si armandine . "

text: Nicodemus saith unto them , ( he that came to Jesus by night , being one of them , )
text2: O Nicodemus sas iek baro mashkar lende ; wo gelosas mai anglal te dikhel O Jesus , phendia lenge ,

text: Doth our law judge any man , before it hear him , and know what he doeth ?
text2: " Amaro zakono chi kerel kris po manush mai anglal sar te ashunas les , ai te zhanas so kerdia . "

text: They answered and said unto him , Art thou also of Galilee ? Search , and look : for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet .
text2: Won phende leske , " Vi tu san anda Galilee ? Sichos o ramomos le Devlesko ai dikhesa , ke chi iek profeto avel anda Galilee .

text: And every man went unto his own house .
text2: Antunchi swako gelo peske khere .

text: Jesus went unto the mount of Olives .
text2: O Jesus gelo po Plai le Maslinengo .

text: And early in the morning he came again into the temple , and all the people came unto him ; and he sat down , and taught them .
text2: De diminiatsi pale avilo ande tampla , ai sa le manush pashile pasha leste , ai wo beshlo tele , ai sichardia len .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees brought unto him a woman taken in adultery ; and when they had set her in the midst ,
text2: Ai le Gramnoturia ai le Farizeanuria andine leste ek zhuvli kai line sar kerelas kurvia : ai thode la angla le manushen .

text: They say unto him , Master , this woman was taken in adultery , in the very act .
text2: Phende leske , " Gazda , kadia zhuvli liam la sar kerelas kurvia .

text: Now Moses in the law commanded us , that such should be stoned : but what sayest thou ?
text2: Ando amaro zakono , o Moses dia ame ordina te mudaras baxensa kadalatar zhuvli . Numa so phenes tu ? "

text: This they said , tempting him , that they might have to accuse him . But Jesus stooped down , and with his finger wrote on the ground , as though he heard them not .
text2: Won phende kadia te zumaven les , kashte te astaren les andek dosh . Numa O Jesus bandilo , ai ramolas le naiesa pe phuv , sar chi ashundia len .

text: So when they continued asking him , he lifted up himself , and said unto them , He that is without sin among you , let him first cast a stone at her .
text2: Sar mai mangenas te phushen les , wushtilo opre , ai phenel lenge , " Savo anda tumende kai chi kerdia shoxar bezex , wo sai shudel o pervo bax pe late .

text: And again he stooped down , and wrote on the ground .
text2: Ai pale bandilo , ai ramolas pe phuv .

text: And they which heard it , being convicted by their own conscience , went out one by one , beginning at the eldest , even unto the last : and Jesus was left alone , and the woman standing in the midst .
text2: Kana ashunde so phendia , iek po iek geletar , de katar o mai phuro ai zhi kai savorhe geletar ; ai O Jesus ashilo korkorho la zhuvliasa kai beshelas angla leste .

text: When Jesus had lifted up himself , and saw none but the woman , he said unto her , Woman , where are those thine accusers ? hath no man condemned thee ?
text2: Kana O Jesus wushtilo , ai chi dikhlia khonik ferdi e zhuvli , wo phendia lake , " Zhuvlio , kai che kristatoria kai dosharenas tu ? Chi iek chi dia tu kris ? "

text: She said , No man , Lord . And Jesus said unto her , Neither do I condemn thee : go , and sin no more .
text2: Woi phendia leske , " Chi iek , Gazda , " ai O Jesus phenel lake , " Chi me chi dav tu pe kris . Zha , ai na mai ker bezexa . "

text: Then spake Jesus again unto them , saying , I am the light of the world : he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness , but shall have the light of life .
text2: O Jesus mai phendia lenge , ai phenelas , " Me sim e vediara la lumiaki . Kodo kai lelape pala mande avela les e vediara le traioski ai chi phirela shoxar ando tuniariko . "

text: The Pharisees therefore said unto him , Thou bearest record of thyself ; thy record is not true .
text2: Le Farizeanuria phende leske , " Akana tu keres tu marturo anda tute ; so phenes nai vorta . "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Though I bear record of myself , yet my record is true : for I know whence I came , and whither I go ; but ye cannot tell whence I come , and whither I go .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Marka ke me dav duma pa mande , so phenav si chachimos , ke me zhanav katar avilem , ai kai zhav . Numa tume chi zhanen katar avav ai kai zhav .

text: Ye judge after the flesh ; I judge no man .
text2: Tumare kris si manusheske ; me chi kerav kris pe khanikaste .

text: And yet if I judge , my judgment is true : for I am not alone , but I and the Father that sent me .
text2: Ai te dava kris , murhi kris chachila ; ke chi sim korkorho ; numa O Dat tradia ma , mansa lo .

text: It is also written in your law , that the testimony of two men is true .
text2: Ai ramome ande tumaro zakono , ke kana dui zhene phenen iek fielo , so phenen si chachimos .

text: I am one that bear witness of myself , and the Father that sent me beareth witness of me .
text2: Me phenav pa mande , ai vi O Dat kai tradia ma phenel pa mande . "

text: Then said they unto him , Where is thy Father ? Jesus answered , Ye neither know me , nor my Father : if ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also .
text2: " Kai cho Dat ? " phushen les . O Jesus phendia lenge , " Tume chi zhanen man vai murhe Dades . Te zhanenas man , tume zhanglianas vi murhe Dades . "

text: These words spake Jesus in the treasury , as he taught in the temple : and no man laid hands on him ; for his hour was not yet come .
text2: O Jesus phendia sa kodala vorbi , kana sichardia ande tampla , po than kai thon le love . Ai khonik chi thode vas pe leste , ke lesko chaso chi avilosas inker .

text: Then said Jesus again unto them , I go my way , and ye shall seek me , and shall die in your sins : whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: O Jesus mai phendia lenge , " Zhavtar , ai tume roden man , numa tume merena ande tumare bezexa ; tume nashtin te aven kai me zhav . "

text: Then said the Jews , Will he kill himself ? because he saith , Whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Le Zhiduvuria phende , " Zhala wo te mudarelpe ? Ke phenel , " Ke nashti aven kai me zhav . "

text: And he said unto them , Ye are from beneath ; I am from above : ye are of this world ; I am not of this world .
text2: Ai O Jesus phendia lenge , " Tume avilian katsar telal , ai me avilem katsar opral . Tume san kadala lumiake ; numa me chi sim andai kadia lumia .

text: I said therefore unto you , that ye shall die in your sins : for if ye believe not that I am he , ye shall die in your sins .
text2: Sa anda kodia phendem tumenge , ke merena ande tumare bezexa . Ai tume merena ande tumare bezexa te na pachana tume . ' Kon sim me ' "

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? And Jesus saith unto them , Even the same that I said unto you from the beginning .
text2: Phendia leske , " Kon san tu ? " Ai O Jesus phendia lenge ,

text: I have many things to say and to judge of you : but he that sent me is true ; and I speak to the world those things which I have heard of him .
text2: " Sar phendem tumenge ando gor . But dieli si ma te phenav pa tumende , ai te kerav kris pa tumende . Numa kodo kai tradia ma si chacho , ai phenav la lumiake ferdi so ashundem lestar . "

text: They understood not that he spake to them of the Father .
text2: Won chi haliarde ke delas duma pa Dat .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , When ye have lifted up the Son of man , then shall ye know that I am he , and that I do nothing of myself ; but as my Father hath taught me , I speak these things .
text2: Antunchi O Jesus phendia lenge , " Kana vazden le Shaves le Manushesko , antunchi zhanena " Kon sim me , " ai ke chi kerav kanchi mandar , numa dav duma ferdi so O Dat sichardia ma .

text: And he that sent me is with me : the Father hath not left me alone ; for I do always those things that please him .
text2: Ai kodo kai tradia ma mansa lo , ai O Dat chi meklia ma korkorho ; ke me kerav so godi si leske drago .

text: As he spake these words , many believed on him .
text2: Sar dia duma kadala vorbi but pachaiepe ande leste .

text: Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him , If ye continue in my word , then are ye my disciples indeed ;
text2: Antunchi O Jesus phendia le Zhidovongo kai pachaiepe ande leste , " Te kerena so godi phenel murhi vorba , tume san chache murhe disipluria .

text: And ye shall know the truth , and the truth shall make you free .
text2: Ai tume zhanena o chachimos , ai o chachimos skepisarela tumen . "

text: They answered him , We be Abraham ' s seed , and were never in bondage to any man : how sayest thou , Ye shall be made free ?
text2: Won phende leske , " Ame sam anda e vitsa le Abrahamoski , ai ame chi samas shoxar slugi . Sar phenes tu , " Tume skepime ? "

text: Jesus answered them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Phenav tumenge o chachimos , swako manush kai kerel o bezex si ek sluga le bezexeski .

text: And the servant abideth not in the house for ever : but the Son abideth ever .
text2: Ai e sluga chi beshel ando kher sagda , numa o Shav beshel kotse sa data .

text: If the Son therefore shall make you free , ye shall be free indeed .
text2: Te skepil tu O Shav , antunchi chaches avena skepime .

text: I know that ye are Abraham ' s seed ; but ye seek to kill me , because my word hath no place in you .
text2: Zhanav ke tume aven anda e vitsa katar o Abraham ; numa tume roden te mudaren man , ke murhi vorba nai ande tumare ile .

text: I speak that which I have seen with my Father : and ye do that which ye have seen with your father .
text2: Me phenav so sikadia mange murho Dat ; ai tume keren so phendia tumenge tumaro Dat . "

text: They answered and said unto him , Abraham is our father . Jesus saith unto them , If ye were Abraham ' s children , ye would do the works of Abraham .
text2: Won phenen leske , " Amaro dat si o Abraham . " O Jesus phendia lenge , " Te avilianas chaches shave le Abrahamoske , tume kerdianas sa kodola buchia kai kerdia o Abraham .

text: But now ye seek to kill me , a man that hath told you the truth , which I have heard of God : this did not Abraham .
text2: Numa akana roden te mudaren ma , ek manush kai phendia tumenge o chachimos , kai ashundem katar O Del : o Abrahan chi kerdia saikfialo .

text: Ye do the deeds of your father . Then said they to him , We be not born of fornication ; we have one Father , even God .
text2: Tume keren sar kerdia tumaro dat . " Won phende leske , " Chi sam ame shave avereske , si ame ferdi iek Dat , O Del . "

text: Jesus said unto them , If God were your Father , ye would love me : for I proceeded forth and came from God ; neither came I of myself , but he sent me .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Te avilino chaches O Del tumaro Dat , tumenge drago mange , ke avilem katar O Del ai akana katse sim , chi avilem anda mande , numa wo tradia man .

text: Why do ye not understand my speech ? even because ye cannot hear my word .
text2: Sostar chi haliaren so me phenav tumenge ? Ke nashtin te ashunen so phenel murhi vorba .

text: Ye are of your father the devil , and the lusts of your father ye will do . He was a murderer from the beginning , and abode not in the truth , because there is no truth in him . When he speaketh a lie , he speaketh of his own : for he is a liar , and the father of it .
text2: Tume san shave che dadesko o beng , ai mangen te keren so mangel tumaro dat . Wo sas ek mudardari de ando gor , ai chi beshlo shoxar ando chachimos ke nai chachimos ande leste . Kana wo del duma ek xoxaimos , wo del duma peske shavenge : ke wo si xoxamno , ai o dat le xoxaimasko .

text: And because I tell you the truth , ye believe me not .
text2: Ai ke phenav tumenge o chachimos , chi pachan man . Kon anda tumende sai phenel ke kerdem bezex ?

text: Which of you convinceth me of sin ? And if I say the truth , why do ye not believe me ?
text2: Te phenav o chachimos , sostar tume chi pachan man ?

text: He that is of God heareth God ' s words : ye therefore hear them not , because ye are not of God .
text2: Kon si le Devlesko ashunel le vorbi le Devleske . Numa tume chi san le Devleske shave , anda kodia tume chi ashunen . "

text: Then answered the Jews , and said unto him , Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan , and hast a devil ?
text2: Le Zhiduvuria phende leske , phenenas , " Chi phenas vorta kana phendiam ke tu san ek Samaritano , ai si tu iek beng ande tute ? "

text: Jesus answered , I have not a devil ; but I honour my Father , and ye do dishonour me .
text2: " Nai ma beng , " O Jesus mai phendia , " Numa luvudiv murhe Dades , ai tume chi luvudin man .

text: And I seek not mine own glory : there is one that seeketh and judgeth .
text2: Me chi rodav luvudimos mange , numa si iek kai rodel les ai krisinil .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , If a man keep my saying , he shall never see death .
text2: Phenav tumenge o chachimos : Savo kai kerela so phenel murhi vorba , chi dikhela o merimos . "

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Now we know that thou hast a devil . Abraham is dead , and the prophets ; and thou sayest , If a man keep my saying , he shall never taste of death .
text2: Le Zhiduvuria phende leske , " Akana ame zhanas ke si tu ek beng ande tute . O Abraham mulo , ai le profeturia mule , ai tu phenes , savo kai kerel so phenel murhi vorba , chi dikhela o merimos .

text: Art thou greater than our father Abraham , which is dead ? and the prophets are dead : whom makest thou thyself ?
text2: Amaro dat o Abraham mulo ; sai aves tu mai baro sar o Abraham ? Ai le profeturia vi won mule . Kon gindis ke tu san ? "

text: Jesus answered , If I honour myself , my honour is nothing : it is my Father that honoureth me ; of whom ye say , that he is your God :
text2: O Jesus phendia , " Te luvudiv man , murho luvudimos nai kanchi : si murho Dat kai luvudil man , tume phenen ke si tumaro Del , ai tume chi zhanen les , numa me zhanav les .

text: Yet ye have not known him ; but I know him : and if I should say , I know him not , I shall be a liar like unto you : but I know him , and keep his saying .
text2: Te phendemas ke chi zhanav les , avilemas iek fialo sar tumende , iek xoxamno . Numa zhanav les , ai kerav so phenel leske vorba .

text: Your father Abraham rejoiced to see my day : and he saw it , and was glad .
text2: Tumaro dat o Abraham raduisailo mai anglal te dikhel murho dies ; ai wo dikhlia les , raduisailo . "

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Thou art not yet fifty years old , and hast thou seen Abraham ?
text2: Le Zhiduvuria phende leske , " Chi san panvardesh bershengo inker , ai phenes ke dikhlian le Abrahamos ? " O Jesus phendia lenge ,

text: Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Before Abraham was , I am .
text2: " Phenav tumenge o chachimos , mai anglal sar te arakhadilo o Abraham , Me simas . "

text: Then took they up stones to cast at him : but Jesus hid himself , and went out of the temple , going through the midst of them , and so passed by .
text2: Pe kodia line bax te shuden pe leste , numa O Jesus garadilo ai anklisto avri anda e tampla .

text: And as Jesus passed by , he saw a man which was blind from his birth .
text2: Sar O Jesus nakhelas , wo dikhlia iekes manushes kai arakhadilo korho .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Master , who did sin , this man , or his parents , that he was born blind ?
text2: Leske disipluria phushle les , " Gazda , sostar arakhadiol korho ? Kon kerdia bezexa , kado manush vai leske dades vai leska da ?

text: Jesus answered , Neither hath this man sinned , nor his parents : but that the works of God should be made manifest in him .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Nai wo ai chi leske dades ai chi leska da kai kerde bezexa , numa wo si korho kashte te dichol e putiera le Devleski pe leste .

text: I must work the works of him that sent me , while it is day : the night cometh , when no man can work .
text2: Trobul te kerav e buchi kodaleske kai tradia man zhi kai o dies ; e riat avela , kana khonik nashti kerela buchi .

text: As long as I am in the world , I am the light of the world .
text2: Zhi kai sim ande e lumia , me sim e vediara la lumiaki . "

text: When he had thus spoken , he spat on the ground , and made clay of the spittle , and he anointed the eyes of the blind man with the clay ,
text2: Kana phendia kadala vorbi , O Jesus chungardia tele pe phuv , ai kerdia chik peske cungaresa ; porme thodia kodia chik pel iakha le korheske ,

text: And said unto him , Go , wash in the pool of Siloam , ( which is by interpretation , Sent . ) He went his way therefore , and washed , and came seeing .
text2: ai phendia leske , " Zha , te xalav tu ando pai kai bushol Siloam . " ( anav kai bushol , " Tradino " ) . O korho manush gelo , ai xaladiape , ai avilo palpale ai dikhelas .

text: The neighbours therefore , and they which before had seen him that he was blind , said , Is not this he that sat and begged ?
text2: Le manush kai sas pasha leste ai kodola kai zhanenas les sar iek korhovetso , phenenas , " Nai kado kai beshelas tele ai kai mangelas ? "

text: Some said , This is he : others said , He is like him : but he said , I am he .
text2: Uni phenen , " Wo si , " numa aver phenenas , " Wo miazolpe leste . " Numa wo phendia , " Me sim . "

text: Therefore said they unto him , How were thine eyes opened ?
text2: Won phenen leske , " Sarta chire iakha phuterdile ? "

text: He answered and said , A man that is called Jesus made clay , and anointed mine eyes , and said unto me , Go to the pool of Siloam , and wash : and I went and washed , and I received sight .
text2: Wo phendia lenge , " O manush kai akharen les O Jesus kerdia chira chik , ai thodia la pe murhe iakha , ai phendia mange , " Zh ka pai kai busholas Siloam , ai xalav tu . " ai gelem , ai xaladem ma , ai dikhlem .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is he ? He said , I know not .
text2: Antunchi phende leske , " Kai kodo manush ? " Wo phendia , " Chi zhanav . "

text: They brought to the Pharisees him that aforetime was blind .
text2: Ingerde karing le Farizeanuria kodales kai sas korho .

text: And it was the sabbath day when Jesus made the clay , and opened his eyes .
text2: Kana O Jesus kerdia e chik ai phuterdia leske iakha sas o dies Savatone .

text: Then again the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight . He said unto them , He put clay upon mine eyes , and I washed , and do see .
text2: Sa anda kodia le Farizeanuria phushle le korhes , " Sar premisardian cho dikhimos ? " Ai wo phendia lenge , " Thodia chik pe murhe iakha , xaladem ma , ai akana dikhav . "

text: Therefore said some of the Pharisees , This man is not of God , because he keepeth not the sabbath day . Others said , How can a man that is a sinner do such miracles ? And there was a division among them .
text2: Uni andal le Farizeanuria phende , " Kado manush chi avel katar O Del , ke chi kerel o zakono kai si Savato . " Aver phenen , " Sar iek manush bezexa lo sai kerel kasave mirakluria ? " Anda kodia chi haliarenas mashkar pende iek fialo .

text: They say unto the blind man again , What sayest thou of him , that he hath opened thine eyes ? He said , He is a prophet .
text2: Mai iek data le Farizeanuria phushen le korhes kai sastilo , " So phenes tu pa leste , kai phuterdia chire iakha ? " Wo phendia lenge , " Wo si iek profeto . "

text: But the Jews did not believe concerning him , that he had been blind , and received his sight , until they called the parents of him that had received his sight .
text2: Le Zhiduvuria chi pachanaspe ke wo sas korho , ai ke akana dikhel , zhi kai andine leske dades ai leska da .

text: And they asked them , saying , Is this your son , who ye say was born blind ? how then doth he now see ?
text2: Ai phushle lendar , phenen , " Kako si tumaro shav , kai phenen ke arakhadilo korho ? Sar wo dikhel akana ? "

text: His parents answered them and said , We know that this is our son , and that he was born blind :
text2: Leske dat ai dei phende , " Ame zhanas ke si amaro shav , ai zhanas ke arakhadilo korho .

text: But by what means he now seeth , we know not ; or who hath opened his eyes , we know not : he is of age ; ask him : he shall speak for himself .
text2: Numa chi zhanas so sai dikhel akana , ai chi zhanas kon phuterdia leske iakha . Phushen lestar , si peske bershengo , wo sai del atweto . "

text: These words spake his parents , because they feared the Jews : for the Jews had agreed already , that if any man did confess that he was Christ , he should be put out of the synagogue .
text2: Lesko dat ai dei denas duma kadia ke daranas katar le Zhiduvuria ; ke le Zhiduvuria dinepe duma mashkar pende , ke te mothona avri kon ke O Jesus si O Kristo , den les avri anda e tampla .

text: Therefore said his parents , He is of age ; ask him .
text2: Sa anda kodia leske dat ai dei phende , " Si peske bershengo , phushen lestar ! "

text: Then again called they the man that was blind , and said unto him , Give God the praise : we know that this man is a sinner .
text2: Le Farizeanuria akharen pe duito data le manushes kai sas korho , ai phende leske , " Phen o chachimos angla Del ! Ame zhanas ke kodo manush si bezexa lo . "

text: He answered and said , Whether he be a sinner or no , I know not : one thing I know , that , whereas I was blind , now I see .
text2: Wo phendia lenge , " Chi zhanav te si ek bezexalo vai nai , numa zhanav iek diela , ke simas korho , akana dikhav . "

text: Then said they to him again , What did he to thee ? how opened he thine eyes ?
text2: Ai mai phushle les , " So kerdia tuke ? Sar kerdia te phutrel che iakha ? "

text: He answered them , I have told you already , and ye did not hear : wherefore would ye hear it again ? will ye also be his disciples ?
text2: Phendia lenge , " Phendem tumenge iek data , ai chi ashundian mande . Sostar mai mangen te ashunen ? Vi tume mangen te aven leske disipluria ? "

text: Then they reviled him , and said , Thou art his disciple ; but we are Moses ' disciples .
text2: Akushle les , ai phende leske , " Tu san disiplo ; ame sam le disipluria le Mosesoske .

text: We know that God spake unto Moses : as for this fellow , we know not from whence he is .
text2: Ame zhanas ke O Del dia duma le Mosesosa ; numa kado , chi zhanas katar lo ! "

text: The man answered and said unto them , Why herein is a marvellous thing , that ye know not from whence he is , and yet he hath opened mine eyes .
text2: O manush phendia lenge , " Shodo diela si ! Ke chi zhanen katar lo , numa wo phuterdia murhe iakha !

text: Now we know that God heareth not sinners : but if any man be a worshipper of God , and doeth his will , him he heareth .
text2: Ame zhanas ke O Del chi ashunel le bezexalen ; numa ashunel le manushes kai chetil les ai kerel leski voia .

text: Since the world began was it not heard that any man opened the eyes of one that was born blind .
text2: De anda gor la lumiake shoxar chi ashundian ke vari kon phuterdia le iakha le korheske kana arakhadilo korho .

text: If this man were not of God , he could do nothing .
text2: Kodo manush te na avilino katar O Del , nashtisardino te kerel kanchi . "

text: They answered and said unto him , Thou wast altogether born in sins , and dost thou teach us ? And they cast him out .
text2: Ai won phende leske , " Tu arakhadilian antrego ando bezex , ai manges te sichares amen ? " Ai dine les avri anda tampla .

text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out ; and when he had found him , he said unto him , Dost thou believe on the Son of God ?
text2: O Jesus ashundia ke dine les avri , ai kana arakhlia les , phendia leske , " Pachas tu ando Shav le Manushesko ? "

text: He answered and said , Who is he , Lord , that I might believe on him ?
text2: Wo phendia ka Jesus , " Phen mange , savo si , Gazda ? Kaste te sai pachav ma ande leste ! "

text: And Jesus said unto him , Thou hast both seen him , and it is he that talketh with thee .
text2: O Jesus phendia leske , " Dikhes les , wo si kai del duma tusa akana . "

text: And he said , Lord , I believe . And he worshipped him .
text2: Phendia leske , " Gazda , Pachav ma ! " ai dia changa angla leste .

text: And Jesus said , For judgment I am come into this world , that they which see not might see ; and that they which see might be made blind .
text2: Porme O Jesus phendia , " Avilem ande kadia lumia te kerav e kris , kaste le korhe te sai dikhen ; ai kodala kai dikhen te aven korhe .

text: And some of the Pharisees which were with him heard these words , and said unto him , Are we blind also ?
text2: Uni andal Farizeanuria kai sas lesa , ashunde kodala vorbi , ai phende leske , " Vi ame , sam korhe ? "

text: Jesus said unto them , If ye were blind , ye should have no sin : but now ye say , We see ; therefore your sin remaineth .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Te avilianas korhe , nas te aven doshale : numa akana tume phenen , " Ame dikhas , " sa anda kodia tumare bezexa ashen .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that entereth not by the door into the sheepfold , but climbeth up some other way , the same is a thief and a robber .
text2: " Phenav tumenge o chachimos , kodo kai chi del pa wudar ande shtala le bakriangi , numa kai anklel pa kaver rig , si ek chor ai nasul manush .

text: But he that entereth in by the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
text2: Numa kodo kai avel pa wudar si o pastuxo le bakriango .

text: To him the porter openeth ; and the sheep hear his voice : and he calleth his own sheep by name , and leadeth them out .
text2: Phutren o wudar angla leste , ai le bakria ashunen lesko glaso , ai akharel leske bakrorhen pa anaveste , ai ingerel le avri .

text: And when he putteth forth his own sheep , he goeth before them , and the sheep follow him : for they know his voice .
text2: Kana ankaladia avri sa peske bakrorhan , phirel angla lende , ai le bakriorha zhan pala leste , ke prinzharen lesko glaso .

text: And a stranger will they not follow , but will flee from him : for they know not the voice of strangers .
text2: Chi zhana pala iek streino ; numa nashena dur lestar , ke chi prinzharena o glaso le streinosko . "

text: This parable spake Jesus unto them : but they understood not what things they were which he spake unto them .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge kadia paramichi , numa chi haliarde pa soste delas duma .

text: Then said Jesus unto them again , Verily , verily , I say unto you , I am the door of the sheep .
text2: O Jesus mai phendia lenge , " Phenav tumenge o chachimos , me sim o wudar le bakriango .

text: All that ever came before me are thieves and robbers : but the sheep did not hear them .
text2: Sa le kaver kai avile mai anglal mandar si chor ai nasul manush , numa le bakrorha chi ashunde lenge .

text: I am the door : by me if any man enter in , he shall be saved , and shall go in and out , and find pasture .
text2: Me sim o wudar . Kon avela andre mandar , avela skepime ; dela andre ai anklela avri , ai arakhela ek kimpo kai si char ( arakhel xabe ) .

text: The thief cometh not , but for to steal , and to kill , and to destroy : I am come that they might have life , and that they might have it more abundantly .
text2: O chor avel ferdi te chorel , te mudarel , ai te pharhavel ; me avilem te avel le manushen o traio , ai te avel len but traio ando mishtimos .

text: I am the good shepherd : the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep .
text2: " Me sim o lasho pastuxo . O lasho pastuxo del pesko traio pala peske bakriorha .

text: But he that is an hireling , and not the shepherd , whose own the sheep are not , seeth the wolf coming , and leaveth the sheep , and fleeth : and the wolf catcheth them , and scattereth the sheep .
text2: O buchari ( o manush pochindo ) kai nai o pastuxo , ai nai leske le bakriorha , nashel kana dikhel ke avel o ruv , ai o ruv lel len ai rhespil len .

text: The hireling fleeth , because he is an hireling , and careth not for the sheep .
text2: Wo nashel ke si o buchari kai si pochindo , ai chi lel sama andal bakriorha .

text: I am the good shepherd , and know my sheep , and am known of mine .
text2: Me sim o lasho pastuxo . Zhanav murhe bakrorhan , ai won zhanen man .

text: As the Father knoweth me , even so know I the Father : and I lay down my life for the sheep .
text2: Sar O Dat zhanel man , ai me zhanav le Dades . Me zhanav murhe bakriorhan ai won zhanen man ; ai me dav murho traio pala murhe bakriorha .

text: And other sheep I have , which are not of this fold : them also I must bring , and they shall hear my voice ; and there shall be one fold , and one shepherd .
text2: Mai si ma aver bakriorha , kai nai ande kadia shtala ; trobul te anav vi len , te phiravav len te ashunen murho glaso ; ai avena iek fialo bakriorha , ai iek pastuxosa .

text: Therefore doth my Father love me , because I lay down my life , that I might take it again .
text2: " O Dat drago mange ke dav murho traio , te lav les aver data palpale .

text: No man taketh it from me , but I lay it down of myself . I have power to lay it down , and I have power to take it again . This commandment have I received of my Father .
text2: Khonik chi lel murho traio mandar , numa dav les me mandar . Si ma e putiera te dav les , ai si ma e putiera te lav les palpale . Kadia si o zakono kai dia ma O Dat . "

text: There was a division therefore again among the Jews for these sayings .
text2: Anda kodia le Zhiduvuria chi haliarenas mashkar pende pala kadala vorbi , ke chi pachan iek fielo .

text: And many of them said , He hath a devil , and is mad ; why hear ye him ?
text2: But anda lende phenenas , si le iek beng ande leste ! Dzilo lo ! Sostar ashunen leste ? "

text: Others said , These are not the words of him that hath a devil . Can a devil open the eyes of the blind ?
text2: Numa aver phenenas , " Iek manush kai si les beng ande leste nashti del duma kadia ! Sar sai iek beng phutrel le iakha le korhenge ? "

text: And it was at Jerusalem the feast of the dedication , and it was winter .
text2: E vriama avili te keren O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo ande Jerusalem ; sas ivend .

text: And Jesus walked in the temple in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Ai O Jesus phiravelaspe ande tampla ando kalidori le Solomonosko .

text: Then came the Jews round about him , and said unto him , How long dost thou make us to doubt ? If thou be the Christ , tell us plainly .
text2: Le Zhiduvuria thodepe kolo lestar , ai phende leske , " Sode vriama zhi kana tu manges amen te zhanas ? Phenes amenge o chachimos ; " San tu O Kristo ? "

text: Jesus answered them , I told you , and ye believed not : the works that I do in my Father ' s name , they bear witness of me .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Mai phendem tumenge , numa chi pachan ma . Le buchia kai kerav ando o anav murho Dadesko , sikaven pa mande .

text: But ye believe not , because ye are not of my sheep , as I said unto you .
text2: Numa tume chi pachan , ke tume chi san anda murhe bakria , sar phendem tumenge .

text: My sheep hear my voice , and I know them , and they follow me :
text2: Murhe bakria ashunen murho glaso , ai zhanav le , ai aven pala mande .

text: And I give unto them eternal life ; and they shall never perish , neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand .
text2: Ai dav le o traio le rhaiosko ; ai chi xasavona shoxar , ai khonik chi lena le anda murho vas .

text: My Father , which gave them me , is greater than all ; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father ' s hand .
text2: Murho Dat kai dia le mange , wo mai baro lo savorhendar ; ai khonik nashti lel le anda vas murhe Dadesko .

text: I and my Father are one .
text2: Me ai O Dat sam iek .

text: Then the Jews took up stones again to stone him .
text2: Antunchi le Zhiduvuria mai line bax te shuden pe leste .

text: Jesus answered them , Many good works have I shewed you from my Father ; for which of those works do ye stone me ?
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Sikadem tumenge but lashe buchia kai avile katar murho Dat ; anda savi buchi tume mangen te shuden bax pe mande ? "

text: The Jews answered him , saying , For a good work we stone thee not ; but for blasphemy ; and because that thou , being a man , makest thyself God .
text2: Le Zhiduvuria phende , phenenas , " Nai anda ek lashi buchi ke mangas te shudas bax pe tute , numa ke rimos le Devles , ai tu san ek manush ai keres anda tute Del ! "

text: Jesus answered them , Is it not written in your law , I said , Ye are gods ?
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Si ramome ande tumaro zakono , Me phendem , ' Tume san dela ? '

text: If he called them gods , unto whom the word of God came , and the scripture cannot be broken ;
text2: Ai ame zhanas ke e vorba le Devleski si chachi sa data ai nashtil te thol la rigate ; ai O Del akhardia le dela , kodolenge kai O Del dia peske vorba .

text: Say ye of him , whom the Father hath sanctified , and sent into the world , Thou blasphemest ; because I said , I am the Son of God ?
text2: Ai man , O Dat alosardia ma ai tradia ma ande lumia . Sar , antunchi , sai phenen " Tu tromas te les o than le Devlesko , " ke phendem , " Me sim O Shav le Devlesko ?

text: If I do not the works of my Father , believe me not .
text2: Chi pachan ma , antunchi , te na kerava le buchia murhe Dadeske .

text: But if I do , though ye believe not me , believe the works : that ye may know , and believe , that the Father is in me , and I in him .
text2: Numa te kerava le , makar tume chi pachan ma , pachan ma pala murhe buchia kai kerav , kaste te sai zhanen , ai pachan , ke O Dat si ande mande , ai me sim ando Dat . "

text: Therefore they sought again to take him : but he escaped out of their hand ,
text2: Pe kadia mai zumade te len les ; numa skepisailo anda lenge vas .

text: And went away again beyond Jordan into the place where John at first baptized ; and there he abode .
text2: O Jesus mai gelo inchal o Jordan kotse kai o Iovano mai anglal ambolelas , ai beshlo kotse .

text: And many resorted unto him , and said , John did no miracle : but all things that John spake of this man were true .
text2: But zhene avile leste ai phende , " O Iovano chi kerdia chi iek miraklo : numa so godi o Iovano phendia pa kado manush sas chacho . "

text: And many believed on him there .
text2: Ai but pachaiepe ande leste kotse .

text: Now a certain man was sick , named Lazarus , of Bethany , the town of Mary and her sister Martha .
text2: Ek manush kai busholas Lazarus naswalosas . Beshlo ande foro kai busholas Bethany leske pheiasa , e Maria ai e Martha .

text: ( It was that Mary which anointed the Lord with ointment , and wiped his feet with her hair , whose brother Lazarus was sick . )
text2: Kodia Maria sas kai thodia pel punrhe le Devleske e duxi , ai koslia leske punrhe peske balensa , ai lako phral o Lazarus naswalo sas .

text: Therefore his sisters sent unto him , saying , Lord , behold , he whom thou lovest is sick .
text2: Le dui pheia trade ieke manushes te phenen ka Jesus , " Devla , kodo kai si tuke drago si naswalo . "

text: When Jesus heard that , he said , This sickness is not unto death , but for the glory of God , that the Son of God might be glorified thereby .
text2: Kana O Jesus ashundia kodia , phendia , " Kodo naswalimos le Lazarusosko nai merimasko , numa te anel o luvudimos ka Del , ai vi O Shav le Devlesko avela luvudime . "

text: Now Jesus loved Martha , and her sister , and Lazarus .
text2: O Jesus drago sas leske e Martha , ai laki phei e Maria , ai o Lazarus .

text: When he had heard therefore that he was sick , he abode two days still in the same place where he was .
text2: Kana O Jesus ashundia ke o Lazarus naswalo sas , mai beshlo dui dies ando than kai sas .

text: Then after that saith he to his disciples , Let us go into Judaea again .
text2: Pala kodia phendia peske disiplonge , " Aven palpale ande Judea . "

text: His disciples say unto him , Master , the Jews of late sought to stone thee ; and goest thou thither again ?
text2: Leske disipluria phende leske , " Gazda , de xantsi vriama palpale le Zhiduvuria mangenas te shuden bax pe tute ; ai tu manges te zhas palpale kotse ? "

text: Jesus answered , Are there not twelve hours in the day ? If any man walk in the day , he stumbleth not , because he seeth the light of this world .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Nai desh u dui chasuria ando iek dies ? Te si vari kon kai phirel adiese , chi perel , ke dikhel e vediara la lumiaki .

text: But if a man walk in the night , he stumbleth , because there is no light in him .
text2: Numa te si vari kon kai phirela e riate , perel , ke nai les vediara ande leste .

text: These things said he : and after that he saith unto them , Our friend Lazarus sleepeth ; but I go , that I may awake him out of sleep .
text2: Pala kodola vorbi , phendia lenge , " O Lazarus , amaro vortako sovel ; numa zhav te wushtiavav les . "

text: Then said his disciples , Lord , if he sleep , he shall do well .
text2: Antunchi leske disipluria phende , " Gazda , te sovela , sastiola . "

text: Howbeit Jesus spake of his death : but they thought that he had spoken of taking of rest in sleep .
text2: Numa O Jesus dia duma pa lesko merimos ; numa won gindinas ke wo dia duma pa sovimos sar kana sovel .

text: Then said Jesus unto them plainly , Lazarus is dead .
text2: Antunchi O Jesus phendia lenge , " O Lazarus mulo .

text: And I am glad for your sakes that I was not there , to the intent ye may believe ; nevertheless let us go unto him .
text2: Ai pala tumende raduime sim ke chi simas lesa , ke kadia si te pachan tume ; aven leste akana . "

text: Then said Thomas , which is called Didymus , unto his fellowdisciples , Let us also go , that we may die with him .
text2: O Thomas phendia , kai sas akhardo Didimus , phendia le avre disiplonge , " Aven vi ame te meras lesa ! "

text: Then when Jesus came , he found that he had lain in the grave four days already .
text2: Kana O Jesus areslo , ashundia ke o Lazarus sas de shtar dies ando greposhevo .

text: Now Bethany was nigh unto Jerusalem , about fifteen furlongs off :
text2: Ai sar o Bethany nai dur katar o Jerusalem , pashe trin kilmeturia vai dui maili .

text: And many of the Jews came to Martha and Mary , to comfort them concerning their brother .
text2: But Zhiduvuria avile te dikhen e Martha , ai Maria , ke nekezhime kai mulo lengo phral .

text: Then Martha , as soon as she heard that Jesus was coming , went and met him : but Mary sat still in the house .
text2: Kana e Martha ashundia ke O Jesus avelas , geli karing leste , numa e Maria beshli tele ando kher .

text: Then said Martha unto Jesus , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: E Martha phendia ka Jesus , " Gazda , te avilianas katse , murho phral nas te avel mulo !

text: But I know , that even now , whatsoever thou wilt ask of God , God will give it thee .
text2: Numa vi akana zhanav , ke so godi manges katar O Del , O Del del les tuke . "

text: Jesus saith unto her , Thy brother shall rise again .
text2: O Jesus phendia lake , " Cho phral zhuvindila . "

text: Martha saith unto him , I know that he shall rise again in the resurrection at the last day .
text2: E Martha phendia , " Zhanav ke wo zhuvindila kana savorhe wushtena paluno dies , "

text: Jesus said unto her , I am the resurrection , and the life : he that believeth in me , though he were dead , yet shall he live :
text2: O Jesus phendia lake , " Me sim o zhuvindimos ai o traio : Kon pachalape ande mande , traiila , marka te merela ;

text: And whosoever liveth and believeth in me shall never die . Believest thou this ?
text2: Ai kon godi traiil ai pachalape ande mande shoxar chi merela . Pachas tu kadia ? " Woi phenel leske ,

text: She saith unto him , Yea , Lord : I believe that thou art the Christ , the Son of God , which should come into the world .
text2: " E , Gazda , pachav ma ke tu san O Kristo , O Shav le Devlesko , kai trobulas te avel ande lumia .

text: And when she had so said , she went her way , and called Mary her sister secretly , saying , The Master is come , and calleth for thee .
text2: Kana phendia kadia . Martha gelitar te akharel chorial peska pheia e Maria , phenelas , " O Gazda katse lo ai akharel tu . "

text: As soon as she heard that , she arose quickly , and came unto him .
text2: Kana e Maria ashundia kadala vorbi , strazo wushtili , ai geli karing leste .

text: Now Jesus was not yet come into the town , but was in that place where Martha met him .
text2: Ke O Jesus chi areslo sas ando gav inker , numa kotse sas kai e Martha arakhlia les .

text: The Jews then which were with her in the house , and comforted her , when they saw Mary , that she rose up hastily and went out , followed her , saying , She goeth unto the grave to weep there .
text2: Le Zhiduvuria kai sas ando kher la Mariasa te pochin la , dikhle ke strazo wushtili ai geli avri , gele pala late , phenenas ; " Woi zhal ka greposhevo te rovel . "

text: Then when Mary was come where Jesus was , and saw him , she fell down at his feet , saying unto him , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Kana e Maria aresli kai sas O Jesus . Ai dikhlia les , peli ka leske punrhe , ai phenel leske , " Gazda , te avilianas katse , murho phral nas te merel . "

text: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping , and the Jews also weeping which came with her , he groaned in the spirit , and was troubled ,
text2: O Jesus dikhlia ke rovel , woi ai vi le Zhiduvuria kai avile lasa , nekezhisailo ando pesko duxo , ai sas leske mila .

text: And said , Where have ye laid him ? They said unto him , Lord , come and see .
text2: Ai wo phushlia len , " Kai groposardian les ? " Won phende leske , " Gazda , aidi ai dikh . "

text: Jesus wept .
text2: O Jesus ruiia .

text: Then said the Jews , Behold how he loved him !
text2: Pe kodia le Zhiduvuria phende , " Dikhen sar sas leske drago ! "

text: And some of them said , Could not this man , which opened the eyes of the blind , have caused that even this man should not have died ?
text2: Ai uni anda lende phende , " Wo kai phuterdia le iakha le korheske , nashti kerdia vi kado manush te na merel ? "

text: Jesus therefore again groaning in himself cometh to the grave . It was a cave , and a stone lay upon it .
text2: Mai iek data O Jesus nekezhisailo ande peste , ai gelo ka greposhevo . Sas iek podruma , ai ek bax thodino anglal .

text: Jesus said , Take ye away the stone . Martha , the sister of him that was dead , saith unto him , Lord , by this time he stinketh : for he hath been dead four days .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Len o bax ! " E Martha , e phei le muleski , phendia leske , " Gazda , vunzhe khandel ; ke de shtar dies katse lo ! "

text: Jesus saith unto her , Said I not unto thee , that , if thou wouldest believe , thou shouldest see the glory of God ?
text2: O Jesus phendia lake , " Chi phendem tuke , ke te pachasa tu , dikhesa o barimos le Devlesko ? "

text: Then they took away the stone from the place where the dead was laid . And Jesus lifted up his eyes , and said , Father , I thank thee that thou hast heard me .
text2: Line o bax ai O Jesus vazdia le iakha opre , ai phendia , " Murho Dat , naisiv tuke ke kerdian so mangav .

text: And I knew that thou hearest me always : but because of the people which stand by I said it , that they may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Me zhanav ke tu ashunes ma sagda ; numa dem duma pala o narodo katse , kaste te pachanpe ke tu tradian ma . "

text: And when he thus had spoken , he cried with a loud voice , Lazarus , come forth .
text2: Kana phendia kodia , tsipisardia ieke glaso zurales , " Lazarus , ankli avri ! "

text: And he that was dead came forth , bound hand and foot with graveclothes : and his face was bound about with a napkin . Jesus saith unto them , Loose him , and let him go .
text2: Ai o mulo anklisto , le vas ai le punrhe phangle andel le derzi , ai lesko mui phanglo poxtan parno . O Jesus phendia lenge , " Phutren les , ai meken les te zhal . "

text: Then many of the Jews which came to Mary , and had seen the things which Jesus did , believed on him .
text2: But andel le Zhiduvuria avile karing e Maria ai dikhle so kerdia O Jesus , ai pachaiepe ande leste .

text: But some of them went their ways to the Pharisees , and told them what things Jesus had done .
text2: Numa uni anda lende gele kal le Farizeanonge , ai phende lenge so kerdia O Jesus .

text: Then gathered the chief priests and the Pharisees a council , and said , What do we ? for this man doeth many miracles .
text2: Antunchi le Farizeanuria ai le bare rasha chidinisaile andek than , ai phende , " So te keras . " Ke kado manush kerel but mirakluria !

text: If we let him thus alone , all men will believe on him : and the Romans shall come and take away both our place and nation .
text2: Te mekasa les te kerel , savorhe pachanpe ande leste ; ai le Romanuria avena ai pharhaven amari tampla ai amaro them ! "

text: And one of them , named Caiaphas , being the high priest that same year , said unto them , Ye know nothing at all ,
text2: Iek anda lende , kai busholas Caiaphas , kai sas o baro rashai kodo bersh , phendia lenge , " Tume chi zhanen kanchi !

text: Nor consider that it is expedient for us , that one man should die for the people , and that the whole nation perish not .
text2: Tume chi haliaren ke mai mishto tumenge te avel iek manush te merel pala sa o narodo , de sar pala sa o them te avela pharhado ? "

text: And this spake he not of himself : but being high priest that year , he prophesied that Jesus should die for that nation ;
text2: Wo chi phendia kodia anda peste ; numa sar sas o baro rashai kodo bersh , profesisardia ke O Jesus trobul te merel pala o them le Zhidovongo .

text: And not for that nation only , but that also he should gather together in one the children of God that were scattered abroad .
text2: Ai na ferdi pala kado them , numa vi te chiden ande iek stato sa le shave le Devleske kai si pe swako rig .

text: Then from that day forth they took counsel together for to put him to death .
text2: De katar kodo dies , phenenas mashkar pende sar te mudaren les .

text: Jesus therefore walked no more openly among the Jews ; but went thence unto a country near to the wilderness , into a city called Ephraim , and there continued with his disciples .
text2: Sa anda kodia O Jesus chi mai phiravelas anglal le Zhiduvuria , numa gelotar karing iek rik kai si e pusta , ande ek gav kai busholas Ephraim , kai beshlo peske disiplonsa .

text: And the Jews ' passover was nigh at hand : and many went out of the country up to Jerusalem before the passover , to purify themselves .
text2: Ai O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo pashiol ; ai but manush andai them avenas ando o Jerusalem mai anglal sar o dies o baro , te vuzharenpe anda penge bezexa .

text: Then sought they for Jesus , and spake among themselves , as they stood in the temple , What think ye , that he will not come to the feast ?
text2: Won rodenas le Jesusos , kana chidenape ande tampla , ai phenenas iek kavreske , " So gindin ? Chi avela po dies o baro ? "

text: Now both the chief priests and the Pharisees had given a commandment , that , if any man knew where he were , he should shew it , that they might take him .
text2: Le bare rasha ai le Farizeanuria dine iek ordina , " Ke te si vari kon kai zhanena kai lo O Jesus , trobul te phenel les , ke trobul te astarel les . "

text: Then Jesus six days before the passover came to Bethany , where Lazarus was which had been dead , whom he raised from the dead .
text2: Shov dies mai anglal O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo , O Jesus areslo ande Bethany , kai beshlo o Lazarus , kai O Jesus zhuvindisardia les anda le mule .

text: There they made him a supper ; and Martha served : but Lazarus was one of them that sat at the table with him .
text2: Kotse dine les te xan ; e Martha podailas les ; numa Lazarus sas iek anda kodala kai sas lesa ka e skafidi .

text: Then took Mary a pound of ointment of spikenard , very costly , and anointed the feet of Jesus , and wiped his feet with her hair : and the house was filled with the odour of the ointment .
text2: E Maria lia dopash litre pherdi duxi kai si kuchi , thodia la pe le punrhe le Jesusoske , ai woi koslia leske punrhe peska balensa . Ai sa o kher pherdilo sunga katar e duxi .

text: Then saith one of his disciples , Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , which should betray him ,
text2: Iek anda leske disiplonge , o Judas Iscariot  kodo kai trobul te purhil les , phendia ,

text: Why was not this ointment sold for three hundred pence , and given to the poor ?
text2: " Sostar chi bichindian kadia duxi trin shela teliara , ai le love dine kal chorhe ? "

text: This he said , not that he cared for the poor ; but because he was a thief , and had the bag , and bare what was put therein .
text2: Wo phendia kadia lenge , na ke sas leske mila anda le chorhe , numa ke sas chor , ai sas les o gono , ai lelas so sas andre ando gono .

text: Then said Jesus , Let her alone : against the day of my burying hath she kept this .
text2: Numa O Jesus phendia lenge , " Mek la ! Woi garadiasas kadia duxi pala e vriama kana groposarena ma .

text: For the poor always ye have with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Ke le chorhe sagda avena tumensa , numa me chi avava tumensa sagda . "

text: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there : and they came not for Jesus ' sake only , but that they might see Lazarus also , whom he had raised from the dead .
text2: But narodo anda le Zhiduvuria ashunde ke O Jesus sas ande Bethany , ai avenas na ferdi pala O Jesus , numa vi te dikhen o Lazarus , kai O Jesus zhuvindisailo anda le mule .

text: But the chief priests consulted that they might put Lazarus also to death ;
text2: Le bare rasha dine pe duma te mudaren vi le Lazarusos ,

text: Because that by reason of him many of the Jews went away , and believed on Jesus .
text2: ke but Zhiduvuria geletar lendar pala leste , ai pachanaspe ando Jesus .

text: On the next day much people that were come to the feast , when they heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem ,
text2: Terharin but narodo avile ka O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo , kana ashunde ke O Jesus zhal ando Jerusalem .

text: Took branches of palm trees , and went forth to meet him , and cried , Hosanna : Blessed is the King of Israel that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Line patria katar le krenzhi , ai gele angla leste , ai tsipinas , " Hosana ! Raduime O Amperato le Zhidovongo kai avel ando anav le Devlesko ! "

text: And Jesus , when he had found a young ass , sat thereon ; as it is written ,
text2: O Jesus arakhlia iek magari ai beshlo pe leste , sar sas ramome ,

text: Fear not , daughter of Sion : behold , thy King cometh , sitting on an ass ' s colt .
text2: " Na dara , tu foro anda Zion ! Dikh ! Cho Amperato avel , beshel pe iek terno magari . "

text: These things understood not his disciples at the first : but when Jesus was glorified , then remembered they that these things were written of him , and that they had done these things unto him .
text2: Leske disipluria chi haliarde mai anglal kadala dieli ; numa kana O Jesus lia pesko barimos , denas pe goji ke sas ramome pa leste , ai kerdilo sa so trobul te kerdiol .

text: The people therefore that was with him when he called Lazarus out of his grave , and raised him from the dead , bare record .
text2: Sa kodala kai sas lesa kana akhardia o Lazarus anda o greposhevo , ai wushtiardia les anda le mule , phende so dikhle ai so kerdia .

text: For this cause the people also met him , for that they heard that he had done this miracle .
text2: Ai o narodo avel angla leste , ke ashunde ke kerdia kodo miraklo .

text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves , Perceive ye how ye prevail nothing ? behold , the world is gone after him .
text2: Le Farizeanuria phenenas iek kavreske , " Tume dikhen , ke chi nirin kanchi ! Dikh ! Sa e lumia geli pala leste ! "

text: And there were certain Greeks among them that came up to worship at the feast :
text2: Uni Grekuria anda kodala kai gele ando Jerusalem te rhugin po Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo :

text: The same came therefore to Philip , which was of Bethsaida of Galilee , and desired him , saying , Sir , we would see Jesus .
text2: Won avile ka Filip , wo sas anda Bethsaida ande Galilee , ai phende . " Raia , ame mangas te dikhas O Jesus . "

text: Philip cometh and telleth Andrew : and again Andrew and Philip tell Jesus .
text2: O Philip gelo ai phendia o Andre , antunchi o Andre ai o Philip gele ai phende ka O Jesus .

text: And Jesus answered them , saying , The hour is come , that the Son of man should be glorified .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " O chaso avilo kai O Shav le Manushesko trobul te luvudinles .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except a corn of wheat fall into the ground and die , it abideth alone : but if it die , it bringeth forth much fruit .
text2: Phenav tumenge o chachimos : te na merela e sumuntsa kai peli ande e phuv ashel korkorho ; numa te merela , dela but fruti .

text: He that loveth his life shall lose it ; and he that hateth his life in this world shall keep it unto life eternal .
text2: Savo kai si leske drago kado traio xasarela les ; ai kodo kai gretsol kado traio ande kadia lumia garavel les te zhal ando traio le rhaiosko .

text: If any man serve me , let him follow me ; and where I am , there shall also my servant be : if any man serve me , him will my Father honour .
text2: Te si vari kon kai podail ma , mek te lelpe pala mande ; ai kotse kai avava me , kotse avela vi murhi sluga ; kodo kai podaila ma , murho Dat luvudila les .

text: Now is my soul troubled ; and what shall I say ? Father , save me from this hour : but for this cause came I unto this hour .
text2: " Akana murho duxo si buntuime . Ai so sai phenav ? " Murho Dat , le ma anda kado chaso ? " Numa pala kodia avilem zhi ka kado chaso .

text: Father , glorify thy name . Then came there a voice from heaven , saying , I have both glorified it , and will glorify it again .
text2: " Murho Dat , luvudisar chiro anav ! " Ai iek glaso dia duma anda o rhaio , phenelas , " Bariardem les , ai mai luvudiva les . "

text: The people therefore , that stood by , and heard it , said that it thundered : others said , An angel spake to him .
text2: O narodo kai sas kotse , ashunde o glaso , ai uni phenenas , " Iek rhonjito si ! " Aver phenenas , " Iek angelo dia lesa duma ! "

text: Jesus answered and said , This voice came not because of me , but for your sakes .
text2: Numa O Jesus phendia lenge , " Na ke pala mande kado glaso ashundilo , numa pala tumende .

text: Now is the judgment of this world : now shall the prince of this world be cast out .
text2: Akana avili e kris la lumiaki ; akana o beng kai si ande lumia avela shudino avri .

text: And I , if I be lifted up from the earth , will draw all men unto me .
text2: Ai me , kana avava vazdino opre katar e phuv , tsirdava sa le manushen mande . "

text: This he said , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Sar del duma kadia , sikavelas lenge sar si te merel .

text: The people answered him , We have heard out of the law that Christ abideth for ever : and how sayest thou , The Son of man must be lifted up ? who is this Son of man ?
text2: Le manush phende leske , " Ashundian andai klishka le zakonoske ke O Kristo beshela sa data . " Sar sai phenes , " O Shav le Manushesko trobul te avel vazdino ? Kon si kodo Shav le Manushesko ? "

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Yet a little while is the light with you . Walk while ye have the light , lest darkness come upon you : for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " E vediara si tumensa mai xantsi vriama . Phiren zhi kai si tumen e vediara , kashte te na avela o tuniariko pe tumende , ke kodo kai phirel ando tuniariko chi zhanel kai zhal .

text: While ye have light , believe in the light , that ye may be the children of light . These things spake Jesus , and departed , and did hide himself from them .
text2: Zhi kai si tume e vediara , pachan tume ande vediara , kashte te aven shave la vediarake . " O Jesus phendia kadala dieli , gelotar , ai garadilo dur lendar .

text: But though he had done so many miracles before them , yet they believed not on him :
text2: Marka ke kerdia but mirakluria angla lende , chi pachanaspe ande leste ,

text: That the saying of Esaias the prophet might be fulfilled , which he spake , Lord , who hath believed our report ? and to whom hath the arm of the Lord been revealed ?
text2: Eta , te pherdiol e vorba le profetoski o Isaiah , kai phendiasas , " Devla , kon pachaiape ande so phendem ? Ai kaske O Kristo sikadia peski putiera ? "

text: Therefore they could not believe , because that Esaias said again ,
text2: Anda kodia won nashti pachanaspe , ke o Isaiah mai phendia ,

text: He hath blinded their eyes , and hardened their heart ; that they should not see with their eyes , nor understand with their heart , and be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: " Korhandia lenge iakha , ai zulardia lenge ilo ; te na dikhen penge iakhensa , ai te na haliaren penge ilesa , ai chi aven mande te aven skepime , ai te na sastiarav le . "

text: These things said Esaias , when he saw his glory , and spake of him .
text2: Isaiah phendia kadala dieli , kana dikhlia lesko barimos , ai dia duma pa leste .

text: Nevertheless among the chief rulers also many believed on him ; but because of the Pharisees they did not confess him , lest they should be put out of the synagogue :
text2: Numa vi anda le bare le Zhidovongo pachaiepe ande leste ; numa angla le Farizeanuria , chi sikavenas ke pachanpe , daratar ke den len avri anda e synagogue .

text: For they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God .
text2: Ke mai drago lenge o chetaimos le manushenge de sar o luvudimos katar O Del .

text: Jesus cried and said , He that believeth on me , believeth not on me , but on him that sent me .
text2: O Jesus dia duma ando baro glaso , " Kodo kai pachal ande mande , pachalpe na ande mande ferdi , numa ande kodo kai tradia ma .

text: And he that seeth me seeth him that sent me .
text2: Ai kodo dikhel ma , dikhel kodales kai tradia ma .

text: I am come a light into the world , that whosoever believeth on me should not abide in darkness .
text2: Avilem ande lumia sar iek vediara , kashte kon godi pachalape ande mande te na beshel ando tuniariko .

text: And if any man hear my words , and believe not , I judge him not : for I came not to judge the world , but to save the world .
text2: Te si vari kon kai ashunel murhe vorbi , numa chi pachal le , chi krisiniv les , ke me chi avilem te krisiniv e lumia , numa te skepiv la lumia .

text: He that rejecteth me , and receiveth not my words , hath one that judgeth him : the word that I have spoken , the same shall judge him in the last day .
text2: Kodo kai shudel ma , ai kai chi premil murhe vorbi si les iek kai krisinila les . E vorba kai phendem , woi dela les pe kris po paluno dies !

text: For I have not spoken of myself ; but the Father which sent me , he gave me a commandment , what I should say , and what I should speak .
text2: Ke chi den duma anda mande ; numa O Dat kai tradia ma , phendia mange so trobul te phenav .

text: And I know that his commandment is life everlasting : whatsoever I speak therefore , even as the Father said unto me , so I speak .
text2: Ai zhanav ke anda leske vorbi si o traio le rhaiosko . Sa anda kodia le dieli kai phenav , phenav le sar O Dat phendia le mange . "

text: Now before the feast of the passover , when Jesus knew that his hour was come that he should depart out of this world unto the Father , having loved his own which were in the world , he loved them unto the end .
text2: Akana sa o dies mai anglal O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo , O Jesus zhanelas ke lesko chaso avilo te mukhel kadia lumia ai te zhal kai Dat . De zurales sas leske drago leske manush kai sas ande kadia lumia , ai sas leske drago leske manush zhando gor .

text: And supper being ended , the devil having now put into the heart of Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , to betray him ;
text2: O Jesus ai leske disipluria xanas , o beng vunzhe thodiasas ando ilo le Judasosko Iscariot , o shav le Simonosko , te purhil les

text: Jesus knowing that the Father had given all things into his hands , and that he was come from God , and went to God ;
text2: O Jesus zhanelas ke O Dat diasas swako diela ande leske vas , ke avilo katar O Del , ai zhalatar ka Del .

text: He riseth from supper , and laid aside his garments ; and took a towel , and girded himself .
text2: Wushtilo katar e skafidi , ai shudia peske tsalia pa peste , ai lia iek pishtiri ai phandiolas pe lasa .

text: After that he poureth water into a bason , and began to wash the disciples ' feet , and to wipe them with the towel wherewith he was girded .
text2: Pala kadia shordia pai ande iek balai , ai thodiape te xalavel le punrhe le disiplonge , ai te kosel le la pishtiriasa kai phandiolas pe lasa .

text: Then cometh he to Simon Peter : and Peter saith unto him , Lord , dost thou wash my feet ?
text2: Ai avilo ka Simon Petri , ai o Petri phendia leske , " Devla , tu xalaves murhe punrhe ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , What I do thou knowest not now ; but thou shalt know hereafter .
text2: O Jesus phendia leske , " So kerav chi haliares akana , numa haliaresa mai angle . "

text: Peter saith unto him , Thou shalt never wash my feet . Jesus answered him , If I wash thee not , thou hast no part with me .
text2: O Petri phendia leske , " Na chi iek data chi xalavesa murhe punrhe ! " O Jesus phendia leske , " Te na xalavav che punrhe tu chi mai avesa murho disiplo . "

text: Simon Peter saith unto him , Lord , not my feet only , but also my hands and my head .
text2: O Simon Petri phendia leske , " Devla , na ferdi murhe punrhe ! Numa vi murhe vas ai vi murho shero ! "

text: Jesus saith to him , He that is washed needeth not save to wash his feet , but is clean every whit : and ye are clean , but not all .
text2: O Jesus phendia leske , " Kodo kai si xalado mai trobul ferdi te xalavel peske punrhe , te avel antrego vuzho ; ai tume vuzhe , numa na savorhe . "

text: For he knew who should betray him ; therefore said he , Ye are not all clean .
text2: Ke zhanelas savo si te purhila les , sa anda kodia phendia , " Chi san savorhe vuzhe . "

text: So after he had washed their feet , and had taken his garments , and was set down again , he said unto them , Know ye what I have done to you ?
text2: Pala kadia kana xaladia lenge punrhe , ai lia pe peste peske tsalia thodiape kai skafidi , ai phendia lenge , " Haliardian so me kerdem tumenge ? "

text: Ye call me Master and Lord : and ye say well ; for so I am .
text2: " Tume akharen ma o Gazda ai Devla ; ai vorta phenen ; ke sim .

text: If I then , your Lord and Master , have washed your feet ; ye also ought to wash one another ' s feet .
text2: Te xaladem tumare punrhe , tumaro Devla ai tumaro Gazda ; vi tume trobul te xalaven tumare punrhe iek kavreske .

text: For I have given you an example , that ye should do as I have done to you .
text2: Ke sikadem tumenge sar te keren , kaste te keren sar me kerdem tumenge .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord ; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him .
text2: Chachimasa , chachimasa , phenav tumenge , e sluga nai mai bari sar pesko Gazda ; chi o manush kai si tradino nai mai baro katar kodo kai tradia les .

text: If ye know these things , happy are ye if ye do them .
text2: Te zhanena kadala dieli , tume san raduime ferdi te thona tume te keren le !

text: I speak not of you all : I know whom I have chosen : but that the scripture may be fulfilled , He that eateth bread with me hath lifted up his heel against me .
text2: " Chi phenav , ke dav duma pa savorhende ; zhanav save alosardem ; numa trobul o ramomos te kerdiol , so phenel , " Kodo kai xal manrho mansa vazdia peske kur pe mande .

text: Now I tell you before it come , that , when it is come to pass , ye may believe that I am he .
text2: Akana phenav tumenge mai anglal sar te kerdiol , kashte kana kerdiola , tume sai pachan ke sim me wo .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that receiveth whomsoever I send receiveth me ; and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: Chachimasa , chachimasa , phenav tumenge , kodo kai premila kodoles kai me tradem , premil man ; ai kodo kai premil man , premil kodoles kai tradia man . "

text: When Jesus had thus said , he was troubled in spirit , and testified , and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Kana O Jesus phendia kadia , sas buntuime ande pesko duxo , ai phendia , " Magdata , chachimasa , chachimasa phenav tumenge , ' Iek anda tumende purhila ma . ' "

text: Then the disciples looked one on another , doubting of whom he spake .
text2: Le disipluria dikhenas pe iek kavreste , chi zhanenas pa kaste del duma .

text: Now there was leaning on Jesus ' bosom one of his disciples , whom Jesus loved .
text2: Iek anda leske disipluria , kodo kai O Jesus sas leske drago , beshelas pasha Jesus .

text: Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him , that he should ask who it should be of whom he spake .
text2: O Simon Petri kerel leske semno , te phushel savo si kado kai O Jesus phenel pa leste .

text: He then lying on Jesus ' breast saith unto him , Lord , who is it ?
text2: Ai kodia disiplo bandilo po kolin le Jesusosko , ai phendia leske , " Gazda , kon si kodo ? "

text: Jesus answered , He it is , to whom I shall give a sop , when I have dipped it . And when he had dipped the sop , he gave it to Judas Iscariot , the son of Simon .
text2: O Jesus phendia leske , " Kodo si kai dava les o kotor manrho pala te thav les ando tiari . " Antunchi thodia o manrho ando tiari , ai dia les ka Judas Iscariot , o shav le Simonosko .

text: And after the sop Satan entered into him . Then said Jesus unto him , That thou doest , do quickly .
text2: Ai sar o kotor manrho sas dino o beng dia ande leste . O Jesus phendia leske , " So si tu te keres , keres les sigo . "

text: Now no man at the table knew for what intent he spake this unto him .
text2: Numa chi iek anda kodola kai sas kai skafidi chi haliarde sostar phenelas leske kadia .

text: For some of them thought , because Judas had the bag , that Jesus had said unto him , Buy those things that we have need of against the feast ; or , that he should give something to the poor .
text2: Ke uni anda lende gindinas , ke o Judas sas leste gonorho le lovenge , ai O Jesus phendia leske , " Chin amenge so trobul ame kana avela O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo ; vai te del vari so le chorhenge .

text: He then having received the sop went immediately out : and it was night .
text2: O Judas lia o kotor manrho , ai grebisailo te anklel avri ; ai vunzhe e riat sas .

text: Therefore , when he was gone out , Jesus said , Now is the Son of man glorified , and God is glorified in him .
text2: Kana o Judas anklisto avri , O Jesus phendia , " Akana O Shav le Manushesko sas luvudime , ai O Del sas luvudime ande leste . "

text: If God be glorified in him , God shall also glorify him in himself , and shall straightway glorify him .
text2: Te sas O Del luvudime ande leste , O Del vi wo luvudila les ande peste , ai luvudila les mai sigo .

text: Little children , yet a little while I am with you . Ye shall seek me : and as I said unto the Jews , Whither I go , ye cannot come ; so now I say to you .
text2: Murhe tsinorhe shave , me sim tumensa pe xantsi vriama . Tume rodena ma ; ai sar phendem le Zhidovonge , tume nashtin te aven kai me zhav .

text: A new commandment I give unto you , That ye love one another ; as I have loved you , that ye also love one another .
