text2: Phenav tumenge magdata akana , dav tumen iek nevo zakono , aven drago iek kavreske ; sar sanas mange drago , vi tume aven drago iek kavreske .

text: By this shall all men know that ye are my disciples , if ye have love one to another .
text2: Pala kodo savorhe zhanena ke tume san murhe disipluria , te avena drago iek kavreske .

text: Simon Peter said unto him , Lord , whither goest thou ? Jesus answered him , Whither I go , thou canst not follow me now ; but thou shalt follow me afterwards .
text2: O Simon Petri phendia leske , " Devla , kai zhas tu ? " Jesus phendia leske , " Nashtis akana te aves pala mande kai zhav ; numa avesa pala mande mai palal . "

text: Peter said unto him , Lord , why cannot I follow thee now ? I will lay down my life for thy sake .
text2: O Petri phendia leske , " Devla , Sostar nashtiv te zhav pala tute akana ? Ke me dav murho traio pala tute . "

text: Jesus answered him , Wilt thou lay down thy life for my sake ? Verily , verily , I say unto thee , The cock shall not crow , till thou hast denied me thrice .
text2: O Jesus phendia leske , " De sa cho traio pala mande : Chachimasa , chachimasa , phenav tuke , mai anglal sar te bashel o kurkorsho , tu phenesa trivar ke chi zhanes ma . "

text: Let not your heart be troubled : ye believe in God , believe also in me .
text2: Na meken te nekezhilpe tumaro ilo : pachan tume ando Del , ai vi pachan tume ande mande .

text: In my Father ' s house are many mansions : if it were not so , I would have told you . I go to prepare a place for you .
text2: Si but sobi ando kher murhe Dadesko , te na avilino , me sas te phenav tumenge . Me zhav te lasharav tumenge iek than .

text: And if I go and prepare a place for you , I will come again , and receive you unto myself ; that where I am , there ye may be also .
text2: Ai kana zhavatar ai lasharava tumenge iek than , avava palpale ai lava tume mande , saxke avava , vi tume aven .

text: And whither I go ye know , and the way ye know .
text2: Tume zhanen kai zhav , ai zhanen vi o drom .

text: Thomas saith unto him , Lord , we know not whither thou goest ; and how can we know the way ?
text2: O Thomas phendia leske , " Devla , ame chi zhanas kai tu zhas . Sar sai zhanas o drom ? "

text: Jesus saith unto him , I am the way , the truth , and the life : no man cometh unto the Father , but by me .
text2: O Jesus phendia leske , " Me sim o drom , o chachimos , ai o traio . Khonik nashti avel ka Dat , de ferdi te nakhela mandar .

text: If ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also : and from henceforth ye know him , and have seen him .
text2: Tume te zhanglianas man , zhanglianas vi murhe Dades ; numa akana zhanen les , ai vi dikhlian les .

text: Philip saith unto him , Lord , shew us the Father , and it sufficeth us .
text2: O Filip phendia leske , " Devla , sikav amenge le Dades , ai dosta avela amenge . "

text: Jesus saith unto him , Have I been so long time with you , and yet hast thou not known me , Philip ? he that hath seen me hath seen the Father ; and how sayest thou then , Shew us the Father ?
text2: O Jesus phendia leske , " Pala sa kadia vriama sim tumensa ai inker chi zhanes ma , kodo kai dikhlia man dikhlia vi le Dades ; sar sai mothos tu , ' Sikav amenge le Dades ? '

text: Believest thou not that I am in the Father , and the Father in me ? the words that I speak unto you I speak not of myself : but the Father that dwelleth in me , he doeth the works .
text2: Tu chi pachas ke me sim ando Dat , ai ke O Dat si ande mande ? Le vorbi kai mothav tumenge chi mothav le anda mande : numa O Dat kai traiil ande mande , wo si kai kerel e buchi .

text: Believe me that I am in the Father , and the Father in me : or else believe me for the very works ' sake .
text2: Pachan ma kai me sim ando Dat , ai O Dat si ande mande : vai pachan ma pala le buchia kai kerav .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me , the works that I do shall he do also ; and greater works than these shall he do ; because I go unto my Father .
text2: Chachimasa , chachimasa , me phenav tmenge , kodo kai pachalpe ande mande , kerela vi wo le buchia kai kerav ; ai inker kerela vi mai bare ; ke me zhavtar ka Dat .

text: And whatsoever ye shall ask in my name , that will I do , that the Father may be glorified in the Son .
text2: Ai so godi tume mangena ande murho anav , me kerava , saxke te avel O Dat luvudime ando Shav .

text: If ye shall ask any thing in my name , I will do it .
text2: Te mangena tume vari so ande murho anav , me kerava .

text: If ye love me , keep my commandments .
text2: " Te sim tumenge drago , garaven murho zakono .

text: And I will pray the Father , and he shall give you another Comforter , that he may abide with you for ever ;
text2: Ai me rhugiva ma ka Dat , ai wo dela tumen aver Zhutitori , saxke te beshel sagda tumensa .

text: Even the Spirit of truth ; whom the world cannot receive , because it seeth him not , neither knoweth him : but ye know him ; for he dwelleth with you , and shall be in you .
text2: O Swunto Duxo le chachimasko , kai e lumia nashti premil , ke chi dikhel les , ai chi zhanel les : numa tume zhanen les ; ke wo traiil tumensa , ai avela ande tumende .

text: I will not leave you comfortless : I will come to you .
text2: " Me chi mekava tume sirotki : avava tumende .

text: Yet a little while , and the world seeth me no more ; but ye see me : because I live , ye shall live also .
text2: Mai xantsi vriama , ai lumia chi mai dikhela ma ; numa tume dikhena ma : ke me traiiv , vi tume traiina .

text: At that day ye shall know that I am in my Father , and ye in me , and I in you .
text2: Kado dies tume zhanena ke me sim ando murho Dat , ai tume san ande mande , ai me sim ande tumende .

text: He that hath my commandments , and keepeth them , he it is that loveth me : and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father , and I will love him , and will manifest myself to him .
text2: Kodo kai si les murhe zakonuria , ai kai garavel len , kodo si kai leske drago mange ; ai kodo kai leske drago mange , murho Dat avela leske drago leske , ai te avela mange drago leske ai sikavava ma leste . "

text: Judas saith unto him , not Iscariot , Lord , how is it that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us , and not unto the world ?
text2: O Judas , na o Iscariot phendia leske . " Devla sar ta trobul ferdi te sikadios amenge ai na la lumiake ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , If a man love me , he will keep my words : and my Father will love him , and we will come unto him , and make our abode with him .
text2: O Jesus phendia leske , " Te sim vari kaske drago , wo garavela murhe vorbi : ai murho Dat drago leske , ame avasa leste , ai traiis lesa .

text: He that loveth me not keepeth not my sayings : and the word which ye hear is not mine , but the Father ' s which sent me .
text2: Kodo kai leske drago mange chi garavel vov si murhe vorbi , ai e vorba kai tume ashunen nai mandar , numa katar O Dat kai tradia ma .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , being yet present with you .
text2: Me phendem tumenge kadala dieli zhi kai sim tumensa ,

text: But the Comforter , which is the Holy Ghost , whom the Father will send in my name , he shall teach you all things , and bring all things to your remembrance , whatsoever I have said unto you .
text2: numa O Zhutitori , kai si O Swunto Duxo , kai O Dat tradela ande murho anav , sicharela tume swako fielo , ai serela tume so godi phendem tumenge .

text: Peace I leave with you , my peace I give unto you : not as the world giveth , give I unto you . Let not your heart be troubled , neither let it be afraid .
text2: Me mekav tumenge e pacha , Me dav tume murhi pacha , Me chi dav la tumenge sar del la tumenge e lumia , na meken te nekezhil pe tumaro ilo , ai te na daral .

text: Ye have heard how I said unto you , I go away , and come again unto you . If ye loved me , ye would rejoice , because I said , I go unto the Father : for my Father is greater than I .
text2: Tume ashundian ke phendem tmenge , Me zhavtar , ai pale avav tumen , te sanas tume drago mange , tume raduisailianas , ke phendem . Zhav ka Dat , ke murho Dat mai baro lo mandar .

text: And now I have told you before it come to pass , that , when it is come to pass , ye might believe .
text2: Ai akana phendem tumenge kadala dieli mai anglal sar te kerdion ; saxke kana kerdiona te pachan tume .

text: Hereafter I will not talk much with you : for the prince of this world cometh , and hath nothing in me .
text2: Chi mai dava duma tumensa , ke o baro la lumiako avel , wo nai les chi iek putiera pe mande .

text: But that the world may know that I love the Father ; and as the Father gave me commandment , even so I do . Arise , let us go hence .
text2: Numa saxke te zhanel e lumia ke mange drago le Dades ; ai ke kerav palai ordina kai dia ma O Dat . ' Wushten opre , ai aventar katsar . ' "

text: I am the true vine , and my Father is the husbandman .
text2: " Me sim o chacho khash le strugurosko , ai murho Dat si kodo kai lel sama katar e rez .

text: Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away : and every branch that beareth fruit , he purgeth it , that it may bring forth more fruit .
text2: Ai swako krenga kai si ande mande kai chi anel fruta , wo shinel la ; numa swako krenga kai anel fruta ; wo shinel la , saxke te avel la mai but fruta .

text: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you .
text2: Akana te san vuzho / vuzhi palai vorba kai phendem tute .

text: Abide in me , and I in you . As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself , except it abide in the vine ; no more can ye , except ye abide in me .
text2: Beshes ande mande , ai me beshava ande tute , sar e krenzha kai nashtil anda peste te avel la fruta , te na beshela phangli ka khash ; kadia tu nashtis te na beshesa ande mande .

text: I am the vine , ye are the branches : He that abideth in me , and I in him , the same bringeth forth much fruit : for without me ye can do nothing .
text2: Me sim o khash le strugurosko , ai tume san le krenzhi . Kuko kai beshel ande mande , ai me beshav ande leste , wo anel but fruta ; ke tu bi mango nashtis te keres khanchi .

text: If a man abide not in me , he is cast forth as a branch , and is withered ; and men gather them , and cast them into the fire , and they are burned .
text2: Te si vari kon kai chi beshel ande mande , wo shudino lo avri sar e krenzha , ai shuchol ; ai porme chiden le , ai shuden le ande iag , kai phabosarde .

text: If ye abide in me , and my words abide in you , ye shall ask what ye will , and it shall be done unto you .
text2: Te beshena ande mande , ai murhe vorbi te beshena ande tuende , phushen so tume mange , ai avela tume dino so mangen .

text: Herein is my Father glorified , that ye bear much fruit ; so shall ye be my disciples .
text2: Kana tume den but fruta , murho Dat si luvudime ; kadia sikavel kai san murhe disipluria .

text: As the Father hath loved me , so have I loved you : continue ye in my love .
text2: Sar O Dat drago mange , mange drago sas tumen ; beshen ande murhe dragostia .

text: If ye keep my commandments , ye shall abide in my love ; even as I have kept my Father ' s commandments , and abide in his love .
text2: Te garavena murhe zakonuria , tume beshena ande murhe dragostia ; sa sar garadem me le zakonuria murhe Dadeske , ai ke beshav ando leski dragostia .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that my joy might remain in you , and that your joy might be full .
text2: Me phendem tumenge kadala dieli , saxke te avel murho raduimos ande tumende , ai tumaro raduimos te avel pherdo .

text: This is my commandment , That ye love one another , as I have loved you .
text2: Eta , murho zakono , aven drazhi iek kavreske , sar sas mange drazhi tumenge . Nai mai bari dragostia de sar te des pesko traio leske vortachenge .

text: Ye are my friends , if ye do whatsoever I command you .
text2: Tume san murhe vortacha , te kerena so phenav tumenge .

text: Henceforth I call you not servants ; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth : but I have called you friends ; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you .
text2: Chi mai akharav tumen slugi ; ke e sluga chi zhanel so kerel lako gazda : numa akhardem tume vortacha ; ke phendem tumenge swako fielo sa so godi kai ashundem katar murho Dat .

text: Ye have not chosen me , but I have chosen you , and ordained you , that ye should go and bring forth fruit , and that your fruit should remain : that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name , he may give it you .
text2: Tume chi alosardian ma , numa me alosardem tumen , ai phendem tumenge te zhan ai te avel tume fruta , ai tumare fruta te avel fruta kai inkerel : saxke so tume mangena katar O Dat ande murho anav , wo dela tume .

text: These things I command you , that ye love one another .
text2: So mangav me tumendar , si te aven drazhi iek kavreske .

text: If the world hate you , ye know that it hated me before it hated you .
text2: Te e lumia gretsol tume , tume zhanen ke e lumia gretsosardia ma mai anglal tumendar .

text: If ye were of the world , the world would love his own : but because ye are not of the world , but I have chosen you out of the world , therefore the world hateth you .
text2: Te avilianas andai lumia , e lumia sas te avel lake drago so si lako ; numa ke chi san andai lumia , ai ke alosardem tume andai lumia , anda kadia e lumia gretsol tume .

text: Remember the word that I said unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord . If they have persecuted me , they will also persecute you ; if they have kept my saying , they will keep yours also .
text2: Dem tume goji kai vorba kai phendem tumenge . ' E sluga nai mai bari katar pesko gazda . ' Te chinuisarde man , chinuina vi tumen ; te garade murhi vorba , garavena vi tumari .

text: But all these things will they do unto you for my name ' s sake , because they know not him that sent me .
text2: Numa won kerena tumenge sa kadala dieli pala murho anav , ke chi zhanen kodoles kai tradia ma .

text: If I had not come and spoken unto them , they had not had sin : but now they have no cloke for their sin .
text2: Te na avilemas ai te na demas lensa duma , nas te aven doshale ke kerde bezexa : numa akana nashtin motson ke nai doshale anda penge bezexa .

text: He that hateth me hateth my Father also .
text2: Kodoleske kai gretsol man , gretsol vi murho Dat .

text: If I had not done among them the works which none other man did , they had not had sin : but now have they both seen and hated both me and my Father .
text2: Te na kerdemas mashkar lende bucha kai khonik aver chi kerdia , nas te avel le bezexa : Numa akana won dikhlesas so kerdem , ai won gretson ma ai murho Dat .

text: But this cometh to pass , that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law , They hated me without a cause .
text2: Numa kadala dieli kerdile , saxke te kerdiol e vorba kai si ramome ande lengo zakono , ' Won gretsosarde ma intaino . '

text: But when the Comforter is come , whom I will send unto you from the Father , even the Spirit of truth , which proceedeth from the Father , he shall testify of me :
text2: Kana avela O Zhutitori , kodo kai tradava tumenge katar le Dadesko , ai vi O Swunto Duxo le chachimasko avel katar O Dat , wo mothola pa mande .

text: And ye also shall bear witness , because ye have been with me from the beginning .
text2: Ai vi tume mothona pa mande , ke tume san mansa de anda gor .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that ye should not be offended .
text2: Me phendem tumenge kadala dieli , saxke te na rimon tume .

text: They shall put you out of the synagogues : yea , the time cometh , that whosoever killeth you will think that he doeth God service .
text2: Won shudena tume avri andal Synagoguria : ai vi avela e vriama , kai kon godi mudarela tume gindila ke kerel vorta angla Del .

text: And these things will they do unto you , because they have not known the Father , nor me .
text2: Ai won kerena kadia , ke chi zhangle chi le Dades , ai chi man .

text: But these things have I told you , that when the time shall come , ye may remember that I told you of them . And these things I said not unto you at the beginning , because I was with you .
text2: Me phendem tumenge kadala dieli , saxke kana avela e vriama , tume serenape kai phendem tumenge . Me chi phendem tumenge pa kadala dieli de anda gor , ke me simas tumensa .

text: But now I go my way to him that sent me ; and none of you asketh me , Whither goest thou ?
text2: Numa akana zhavtar karing kodo kai tradia ma ; ai chi iek anda tumende chi phushel ma , " Kai zhas ? "

text: But because I have said these things unto you , sorrow hath filled your heart .
text2: Numa ke phendem tumenge kadale dieli , tumaro ilo nekezhisailo .

text: Nevertheless I tell you the truth ; It is expedient for you that I go away : for if I go not away , the Comforter will not come unto you ; but if I depart , I will send him unto you .
text2: Numa phenav tumenge o chachimos : mai mishto avela tumenge te zhavtar : ke te na zhavatar , O Zhutitori chi avela tumende ; numa te zhavatar , tradava les tumende .

text: And when he is come , he will reprove the world of sin , and of righteousness , and of judgment :
text2: Ai kana avela , sikavela le narodoske ke shubinpe pa bezex , pa so si vorta , ai pai kris le Devleski .

text: Of sin , because they believe not on me ;
text2: Won shubinpe pa bezex , ke chi pachanpe ande mande ;

text: Of righteousness , because I go to my Father , and ye see me no more ;
text2: pa so si vorta , ke me zhav ka murho Dat , ai ke chi mai dikhena ma ;

text: Of judgment , because the prince of this world is judged .
text2: pai kris , ke o baro kadala lumiako dino lo pe kris .

text: I have yet many things to say unto you , but ye cannot bear them now .
text2: Mai si ma inker but dieli te phenav tumenge , numa nashtin te haliaren le akana .

text: Howbeit when he , the Spirit of truth , is come , he will guide you into all truth : for he shall not speak of himself ; but whatsoever he shall hear , that shall he speak : and he will shew you things to come .
text2: Kana O Swunto Duxo le chachimosko avela , wo ingerela tume ande sa o chachimos : ke wo chi dela duma pa peste ; numa phenela so godi ashunel : ai phenela tumenge le dieli kai avena .

text: He shall glorify me : for he shall receive of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Wo luvudila man : ke lela so si murho , ai phenela tumenge .

text: All things that the Father hath are mine : therefore said I , that he shall take of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: So godi kai si O Dat , murho si : anda kodia phendem , " Te lel so si murho , ai te phenela tumenge . "

text: A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me , because I go to the Father .
text2: " Mai xantsi vriama , ai chi mai dikhena ma ; ai porme mai xantsi vriama , ai dikhena ma , ke me zhav ka Dat . "

text: Then said some of his disciples among themselves , What is this that he saith unto us , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me : and , Because I go to the Father ?
text2: Pe kado divano uni anda leske disiplonge denas pe duma won de won . Ai mothonas , " So znachil so phenel amenge , mai xantsi vriama , ai chi mai dikhena ma , ai porme mai xantsi vriama , ai dikhena ma , ke me zhav ka Dat ? "

text: They said therefore , What is this that he saith , A little while ? we cannot tell what he saith .
text2: No won phende " So znachil so phenel , mai xantsi vriama ? Ame chi zhanas pa soste del duma . "

text: Now Jesus knew that they were desirous to ask him , and said unto them , Do ye inquire among yourselves of that I said , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me ?
text2: O Jesus zhanelas ke mangenas te phushen lestar , ai phendia lenge , " Tume phushen iek kavrestar so phendem . " Mai xantsi vriama ai chi mai dikhena ma , ai porme mai xantsi vriama , ai dikhena ma ? "

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , That ye shall weep and lament , but the world shall rejoice : and ye shall be sorrowful , but your sorrow shall be turned into joy .
text2: Chachimasa , chachimasa , me phenav tumenge , tume rovena ai suspinina ai le lumia raduilape ; tume avena nekezhime , numa tumaro nekazo parhudiola ai avela raduimos .

text: A woman when she is in travail hath sorrow , because her hour is come : but as soon as she is delivered of the child , she remembereth no more the anguish , for joy that a man is born into the world .
text2: E zhuvli kana si te avel la glata nekezhime la , ke lako chaso avilo : numa kana o tsinorho arakhadilo , chi mai serelpe ka chino , pala raduimos kai si la , ke iek manush kerdilo ande lumia .

text: And ye now therefore have sorrow : but I will see you again , and your heart shall rejoice , and your joy no man taketh from you .
text2: No vi tume akana san nekeshime : numa mai dikhava tume , ai tumaro ilo raduilape , ai khonik chi lela tumendar tumaro raduimos .

text: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing . Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name , he will give it you .
text2: Kana avela kodo dies tume chi mai phushena mandar khanchi . Chachimasa , chachimasa , me phenav tumenge , so tume mangena katar O Dat ande murho anav , wo dela tumen .

text: Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name : ask , and ye shall receive , that your joy may be full .
text2: Zhi akana tume chi manglian khanchi ande murho anav : mangen , ai avela tumen dino ; saxke te pherdiol tumaro raduimos .

text: These things have I spoken unto you in proverbs : but the time cometh , when I shall no more speak unto you in proverbs , but I shall shew you plainly of the Father .
text2: Me phendem tumenge kadala dieli andel paramicha : numa e vriama avela , kana chi mai dava tumensa duma andel paramichi , numa dava tumensa duma vorta pa Dat .

text: At that day ye shall ask in my name : and I say not unto you , that I will pray the Father for you :
text2: Kana kodia dies avela tume mangena ande murho anav : ai chi phenav tumenge , ke rhugiva ma ka Dat anda tumende :

text: For the Father himself loveth you , because ye have loved me , and have believed that I came out from God .
text2: Ke O Dat leske drago tumenge , ke sanas tume drazhi mange , ai tume pachaian tume ke me avilem katar Del .

text: I came forth from the Father , and am come into the world : again , I leave the world , and go to the Father .
text2: " Me avilem katar O Dat , ai avilem ande lumia : numa akana zhavtar andai lumia , ai zhav ka Dat . "

text: His disciples said unto him , Lo , now speakest thou plainly , and speakest no proverb .
text2: Leske disipluria phende leske , " Eta tu des duma akana vorta , ai chi des duma andel paramichia .

text: Now are we sure that thou knowest all things , and needest not that any man should ask thee : by this we believe that thou camest forth from God .
text2: Akana zhanas ke tu zhanes swako fielo , ai ke chi trobul vari kon te phushel tu vari so : anda kodia ame pachas ame ke tu avilian katar O Del . "

text: Jesus answered them , Do ye now believe ?
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Tume pachan akana ?

text: Behold , the hour cometh , yea , is now come , that ye shall be scattered , every man to his own , and shall leave me alone : and yet I am not alone , because the Father is with me .
text2: Eta , e vriama avela , ai vunzhe avili , kai avela swako ande tumende respiime , pe peski rik , ai mekena ma korkorho ; numa chi sim korkorho , ke O Dat si mansa .

text: These things I have spoken unto you , that in me ye might have peace . In the world ye shall have tribulation : but be of good cheer ; I have overcome the world .
text2: Me phendem tumenge kadala dieli , saxke te avel tume e pacha ande mande . Tume avena zumade ande lumia : numa na daran ; ke me nirisardem pe lumia ! "

text: These words spake Jesus , and lifted up his eyes to heaven , and said , Father , the hour is come ; glorify thy Son , that thy Son also may glorify thee :
text2: Pala kodia kana dine duma O Jesus , vazdia le iakha po cheri , ai phendia , " Murho Dat , e vriama avili ;

text: As thou hast given him power over all flesh , that he should give eternal life to as many as thou hast given him .
text2: luvudisar che Shaves , saxke cho Shav te luvudil tut : ke dian les e putiera pe sa le manush , te del o traio le rhaiosko ka sa kodola ka dian les .

text: And this is life eternal , that they might know thee the only true God , and Jesus Christ , whom thou hast sent .
text2: Ai o traio le rhaiosko si te zhanen tu tut ferdi o chacho Del , ai O Jesus Kristo , kodoles kai tradian .

text: I have glorified thee on the earth : I have finished the work which thou gavest me to do .
text2: Me luvudisardem tu pe phuv : me kerdem e buchi kai dian ma te kerav .

text: And now , O Father , glorify thou me with thine own self with the glory which I had with thee before the world was .
text2: Ai akana , murho Dat , luvudisar ma pasha tute , sakadia luvudimos kai sas ma pasha tute ma anglal e lumia kerdilisas .

text: I have manifested thy name unto the men which thou gavest me out of the world : thine they were , and thou gavest them me ; and they have kept thy word .
text2: Kerdem te zhangliolpe cho anav kal manush kai dian ma mashkar e lumia : Won sas chire , ai tu dian le mange ; ai won garade chi vorba .

text: Now they have known that all things whatsoever thou hast given me are of thee .
text2: Akana won zhanen ke so godi dian ma tutar avel .

text: For I have given unto them the words which thou gavest me ; and they have received them , and have known surely that I came out from thee , and they have believed that thou didst send me .
text2: Ke me dem le le vorbi kai dian ma ; ai won premisarde le , ai won chaches zhanen ke me avilem tutar , ai won pachaie ke tu tradian ma .

text: I pray for them : I pray not for the world , but for them which thou hast given me ; for they are thine .
text2: Me rhugiv ma lenge : chi rhugiv ma anda lumia , numa kodolenge kai dian ma ; ke won chire si .

text: And all mine are thine , and thine are mine ; and I am glorified in them .
text2: Ai so godi si murho chiro si , ai so si chiro murho si ; ai me sim luvudime ande lende .

text: And now I am no more in the world , but these are in the world , and I come to thee . Holy Father , keep through thine own name those whom thou hast given me , that they may be one , as we are .
text2: Me chi mai sim ande lumia , numa won si ande lumia , ai me avav tute . Murho Swunto Dat , garav le ande cho anav kai dian ma , saxke te aven iek , sar sam ame .

text: While I was with them in the world , I kept them in thy name : those that thou gavest me I have kept , and none of them is lost , but the son of perdition ; that the scripture might be fulfilled .
text2: Kana me simas lensa ande lumia , me garadem le ande chiro anav ; ai me garadem kodolen kai dian ma , ai chi iek anda lende chi xasailo , numa ferdi o shav le xasarimasko ; saxke te kerdiol so phendia E Vorba le Devleski .

text: And now come I to thee ; and these things I speak in the world , that they might have my joy fulfilled in themselves .
text2: Ai akana me avav tute ; ai phenav kadala dieli ande lumia , saxke te pherdiol ande lende murho raduimos .

text: I have given them thy word ; and the world hath hated them , because they are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Me dem len chi vorba ; ai e lumia gretsosardia le , ke won nai andai lumia , sar me chi sim andai lumia .

text: I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world , but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil .
text2: Me chi rhugiv ma te les le andai lumia , numa me mangav tu te arakhes le katar o nasulimos .

text: They are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Won nai andai lumia , sar me chi sim andai lumia .

text: Sanctify them through thy truth : thy word is truth .
text2: Vuzhar le che chachimasa , che vorba si o chachimos .

text: As thou hast sent me into the world , even so have I also sent them into the world .
text2: Sar tu tradian ma ande lumia , i me tradem le ande lumia .

text: And for their sakes I sanctify myself , that they also might be sanctified through the truth .
text2: Ai me korkorho vuzharav man lenge , saxke vi won te aven vuzharde katar o chachimos .

text: Neither pray I for these alone , but for them also which shall believe on me through their word ;
text2: Chi rhugiv ma ferdi anda lende , numa vi kodolenge kai pachanaspe ande mande katar penge vorba .

text: That they all may be one ; as thou , Father , art in me , and I in thee , that they also may be one in us : that the world may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Saxke savorhe te aven iek ; sar tu , murho Dat , san ande mande , ai me sim ande tute , saxke vi won te aven iek ande amende : te pachalpe e lumia kai tu tradian ma .

text: And the glory which thou gavest me I have given them ; that they may be one , even as we are one :
text2: Me dem le o luvudimos kai dian ma , saxke te aven vi won iek , sar ame sam iek :

text: I in them , and thou in me , that they may be made perfect in one ; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me , and hast loved them , as thou hast loved me .
text2: Me ande lende , ai tu ande mande , saxke te aven vorta ande iek ; ai e lumia te zhanel ke tu tradian ma , ai ke sas tumenge drazhi mange , sar simas drago tuke .

text: Father , I will that they also , whom thou hast given me , be with me where I am ; that they may behold my glory , which thou hast given me : for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world .
text2: " Murho Dat , mangav kodolen kai dian ma te aven vi won mansa kai sim ; saxke te dikhen murho luvudimos , o luvudimos kai dian ma ; ke sanas tuke drago mange mai anglal kerdili sas e lumia .

text: O righteous Father , the world hath not known thee : but I have known thee , and these have known that thou hast sent me .
text2: Murho Dat o chacho , e lumia chi zhanglia tu : numa me zhanglem tu , ai kodola zhangle ke tu tradian ma .

text: And I have declared unto them thy name , and will declare it : that the love wherewith thou hast loved me may be in them , and I in them .
text2: Me kerdem len te zhanen chiro anav , ai mai kerava len te zhanen tu : saxke e dragostia kai si tu mange te avel ande lende , ai vi me te avav ande lende . "

text: When Jesus had spoken these words , he went forth with his disciples over the brook Cedron , where was a garden , into the which he entered , and his disciples .
text2: Kana O Jesus phendiasas kadala vorbi , gelo peske disiplonsa inchal o pai kai bushol Cedron , kotse sas iek sado , ai wo gelo andre peske disiplonsa .

text: And Judas also , which betrayed him , knew the place : for Jesus ofttimes resorted thither with his disciples .
text2: Ai vi o Judas , kai purhisardia les , zhanelas kodo tsan ; ke O Jesus ai leske disipluria butivar chidepe kotse andek than .

text: Judas then , having received a band of men and officers from the chief priests and Pharisees , cometh thither with lanterns and torches and weapons .
text2: O Judas gelo ka sado , ai andia pesa ketanen ai le zhandari kai sas tradine katar le bare le rashange ai katar le Farizeanuria ; won avenas le sabiensa , ai le lamponsa , ai le khashtensa kai phabonas .

text: Jesus therefore , knowing all things that should come upon him , went forth , and said unto them , Whom seek ye ?
text2: O Jesus zhanelas so si te kerdiol pe lesa , gelo karing lende , ai phendia lenge , " Kas roden ? " Le ketani phende leske ,

text: They answered him , Jesus of Nazareth . Jesus saith unto them , I am he . And Judas also , which betrayed him , stood with them .
text2: " O Jesus andai Nazareth . " O Jesus phendia lenge , " Me sim . " Ai o Judas , kai purhisardia les , lensa sas .

text: As soon then as he had said unto them , I am he , they went backward , and fell to the ground .
text2: Kana O Jesus phendia lenge , " Me sim , " won dinepe palpale , ai pele tele .

text: Then asked he them again , Whom seek ye ? And they said , Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: O Jesus mai phushlia le , " Kas roden ? " Ai won phende , " O Jesus andai Nazareth . "

text: Jesus answered , I have told you that I am he : if therefore ye seek me , let these go their way :
text2: O Jesus phendia , " Me phendem tumenge ke me sim : No te sim me kai roden , meken kodolen te zhantar .

text: That the saying might be fulfilled , which he spake , Of them which thou gavest me have I lost none .
text2: Wo phendia kadia saxke te kerdiolpe e vorba , kai phendiasas . Chi xasardem chi iek anda kodola kai dian ma .

text: Then Simon Peter having a sword drew it , and smote the high priest ' s servant , and cut off his right ear . The servant ' s name was Malchus .
text2: O Simon Petri kai sas les iek sabia lia la , ai dia iek le bare rashaska sluga , ai shindia lako khan o chacho . Kodia sluga busholas Malchus .

text: Then said Jesus unto Peter , Put up thy sword into the sheath : the cup which my Father hath given me , shall I not drink it ?
text2: O Jesus phendia le Petreske , " Tho palpale chi sabia , so te na piiav e kuchi kai murho Dat dia ma te piiav ? "

text: Then the band and the captain and officers of the Jews took Jesus , and bound him ,
text2: Antunchi le ketani lenge bare ai zhandari le Zhidovonge line le Jesusos , ai phangle les .

text: And led him away to Annas first ; for he was father in law to Caiaphas , which was the high priest that same year .
text2: Ingerde les mai anglal kai Annas ; ke sas o sokro le Caiaphasosko , kai sas baro rashai kodo bersh .

text: Now Caiaphas was he , which gave counsel to the Jews , that it was expedient that one man should die for the people .
text2: Ai o Caiaphas sas kodo kai phendiasas le Zhidovonge , " Mai mishto te merel iek manush le narodoske . "

text: And Simon Peter followed Jesus , and so did another disciple : that disciple was known unto the high priest , and went in with Jesus into the palace of the high priest .
text2: O Simon Petri ai aver disiplo lenaspe pala Jesus , kodia disiplo zhanelas les o baro rashai , ai gelo vi wo le Jesusosa ande bar le baro rashasko .

text: But Peter stood at the door without . Then went out that other disciple , which was known unto the high priest , and spake unto her that kept the door , and brought in Peter .
text2: Numa o Petri beshlo avri pasha wudar , o kolaver disiplo kai zhanelas les o baro rashai , anklisto avri ai dia duma la zhuvliasa kai arakhelas o wudar , ai angerdia o Petri andre .

text: Then saith the damsel that kept the door unto Peter , Art not thou also one of this man ' s disciples ? He saith , I am not .
text2: Antunchi e sluga kai garavelas o wudar phendia le Petreske , pate chi san vi tu iek disiplo kadale manushesko ? Ai wo phendia " Nichi , chi sim . "

text: And the servants and officers stood there , who had made a fire of coals ; for it was cold : and they warmed themselves : and Peter stood with them , and warmed himself .
text2: Ai le slugi ai zhandari beshenas anda punrhende kotse , kai kerde iag le angaresa , ke shil sas : Ai tachonas , vi o Petri sas lensa , ai tacholas vi wo .

text: The high priest then asked Jesus of his disciples , and of his doctrine .
text2: O baro rashai phushelas le Jesusos pa leske disipluria , ai pa lesko sicharimos .

text: Jesus answered him , I spake openly to the world ; I ever taught in the synagogue , and in the temple , whither the Jews always resort ; and in secret have I said nothing .
text2: O Jesus phendia leske , " Me dem duma angla savorhende le narodosa ; me sichardem sagda ande synagogue , ai ando tampla , kai sa le Zhiduvuria chidenaspe ; ai me chi phendem khanchi chordanes .

text: Why askest thou me ? ask them which heard me , what I have said unto them : behold , they know what I said .
text2: Sostar tu phushes mandar ? Phush kodolendar kai ashunde man , so phendem lenge : Ashun ! Won zhanen so phendem . "

text: And when he had thus spoken , one of the officers which stood by struck Jesus with the palm of his hand , saying , Answerest thou the high priest so ?
text2: Pe kodo divano , iek andal zhandari kai sas kotse dia iek palma le Jesusos , ai phendia , " Kadia si sar des duma kal bare rashas ? "

text: Jesus answered him , If I have spoken evil , bear witness of the evil : but if well , why smitest thou me ?
text2: O Jesus phendia leske , " Te si ke dem duma nasul , phen mange che nasulimos phendem : ai te dem duma mishto , sostar des ma iek palma ? "

text: Now Annas had sent him bound unto Caiaphas the high priest .
text2: Annas tradia les phanglo ka Caiaphas o baro rashai .

text: And Simon Peter stood and warmed himself . They said therefore unto him , Art not thou also one of his disciples ? He denied it , and said , I am not .
text2: O Simon Petri kotse sas ai tacholas . Ai won phende leske , " Pate tu chi san anda kodola disipluria ? " Ai wo phendia , " Nichi , me chi sim anda kodola . "

text: One of the servants of the high priest , being his kinsman whose ear Peter cut off , saith , Did not I see thee in the garden with him ?
text2: Iek sluga le bare rashaski sas ek niamo kodolesa kai o Petri shindiasas lesko khan , phendia , " Pate chi dikhlem tu ando sado lesa ? "

text: Peter then denied again : and immediately the cock crew .
text2: O Petri pale phendia , " Chi zhanav les , " ai strazo o kurkorsho bashadia .

text: Then led they Jesus from Caiaphas unto the hall of judgment : and it was early ; and they themselves went not into the judgment hall , lest they should be defiled ; but that they might eat the passover .
text2: Porme angerde le Jesusos katar o Caiaphas ka kher la krisako le guvernorosko kai keren kris : diminiatsi sas ; numa le Zhiduvuria chi gele andre ando kher , saxke te na aven marime , ai te sai xan O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo .

text: Pilate then went out unto them , and said , What accusation bring ye against this man ?
text2: O Pilate anklisto avri te zhal karing lende , ai phendia , " Savatar dosh si tume pe kado manush ? "

text: They answered and said unto him , If he were not a malefactor , we would not have delivered him up unto thee .
text2: Ai won phende leske , " Te na avilino bi lasho , nas te anas les tute . "

text: Then said Pilate unto them , Take ye him , and judge him according to your law . The Jews therefore said unto him , It is not lawful for us to put any man to death :
text2: O Pilate phendia lenge , " Len les tume ai den les pe kris pala tumaro zakono . Le Zhiduvuria phende leske , " Amenge nai slobodo te mudares vari kas : "

text: That the saying of Jesus might be fulfilled , which he spake , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Kodia sas saxke te kerdiol e vorba kai O Jesus phendiasas , kana sikadia sar si te merel .

text: Then Pilate entered into the judgment hall again , and called Jesus , and said unto him , Art thou the King of the Jews ?
text2: O Pilate gelo ando kher la krisako ai akhardia le Jesusos , ai phendia leske , " San tu o amperato le Zhidovongo ? "

text: Jesus answered him , Sayest thou this thing of thyself , or did others tell it thee of me ?
text2: O Jesus dia les atweto , " Tu anda tute mothos kodia , vai le kolaver phende tuke pa mande ? "

text: Pilate answered , Am I a Jew ? Thine own nation and the chief priests have delivered thee unto me : what hast thou done ?
text2: O Pilate dia les atweto , " Pate me sim Zhidovo ? Chiro narodo ai le bare rasha andine tu mande ; so kerdian tu ? "

text: Jesus answered , My kingdom is not of this world : if my kingdom were of this world , then would my servants fight , that I should not be delivered to the Jews : but now is my kingdom not from hence .
text2: O Jesus phendia , " Murhi amperetsia nai ande kadia lumia ; te avilino murhi amperetsia ande kadia lumia , antunchi murhe slugi marenaspe pala mande , saxke te na avav dino kal Zhiduvuria : Numa akana murhi amperetsia nai katse pe lumia .

text: Pilate therefore said unto him , Art thou a king then ? Jesus answered , Thou sayest that I am a king . To this end was I born , and for this cause came I into the world , that I should bear witness unto the truth . Every one that is of the truth heareth my voice .
text2: O Pilate phendia leske , " No tu san amperato ? " O Jesus phendia , " Tu mothos me sim amperato . Me arakhadilem ai avilem ande lumia , te phenav pa chachimos . Kon godi si le chachimasko ashunel murho glaso .

text: Pilate saith unto him , What is truth ? And when he had said this , he went out again unto the Jews , and saith unto them , I find in him no fault at all .
text2: O Pilate phendia leske , " So si o chachimos ? " Ai kana phendia kadia , anklisto avri pale te zhal karing le Zhiduvuria , ai phende lenge , " Me chi arakhav chi iek nasulimos ande leste . "

text: But ye have a custom , that I should release unto you one at the passover : will ye therefore that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Numa sar si mashkar tumende iek zakono , te mekav vari kas tumenge kana si O Dies O Baro : mangen ma te mekav tumenge O Amperato le Zhidovongo ? "

text: Then cried they all again , saying , Not this man , but Barabbas . Now Barabbas was a robber .
text2: Pale savorhe tsipinas , " Nichi , na les , numa o Barabbas . " Numa o Barabbas sas ek chor .

text: Then Pilate therefore took Jesus , and scourged him .
text2: Antunchi O Pilate lia le Jesusos , ai kerdia te maren les le bichosa .

text: And the soldiers platted a crown of thorns , and put it on his head , and they put on him a purple robe ,
text2: Le ketani kerde andal kanrhe iek korona , ai tsode la pe lesko shero , ai dine pe leste iek rhocha brazbi .

text: And said , Hail , King of the Jews ! and they smote him with their hands .
text2: Porme pashile pasha leste , ai phende , " Droboitu , Amperato le Zhidogongo ! " ai denas les palmi po mui .

text: Pilate therefore went forth again , and saith unto them , Behold , I bring him forth to you , that ye may know that I find no fault in him .
text2: O Pilate pale ankliste avri , ai phendia le Zhidovonge , " Eta , anav les tumenge avri , saxke te zhanen ke chi arakhav ande leste chi iek nasulimos .

text: Then came Jesus forth , wearing the crown of thorns , and the purple robe . And Pilate saith unto them , Behold the man !
text2: Antunchi O Jesus anklisto avri la koronasa kai sas kanrhale , ai le rasha kai sas brazbi , ai o Pilate phendia lenge , " Eta , o manush ! "

text: When the chief priests therefore and officers saw him , they cried out , saying , Crucify him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Take ye him , and crucify him : for I find no fault in him .
text2: Numa kana le bare le rashange ai zhandari dikhle les , tsipinas , phenenas , " Karfon les , karfon les . " O Pilate phendia lenge , " Len les tume , ai karfon les : ke me chi arakhav chi iek nasulimos ande leste . "

text: The Jews answered him , We have a law , and by our law he ought to die , because he made himself the Son of God .
text2: Le Zhiduvuria phende leske , " Amen si ame iek zakono , ai pala amaro zakono wo trobul te merel ; ke wo kerdia anda peste O Shav le Devlesko . "

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he was the more afraid ;
text2: Kana o Pilate ashundia kodia , wo mai zurales darailo ;

text: And went again into the judgment hall , and saith unto Jesus , Whence art thou ? But Jesus gave him no answer .
text2: ai pale gelo ando kher la krisako , ai phushlia katar O Jesus , " Katar san tu ? " Numa O Jesus chi phendia kanch .

text: Then saith Pilate unto him , Speakest thou not unto me ? knowest thou not that I have power to crucify thee , and have power to release thee ?
text2: O Pilate phendia leske , " Mansa chi des duma ? Pate chi zhanes ke man si ma e putiera te karfon tu po trushul , ai ke si ma vi e putiera te mekav tu ? "

text: Jesus answered , Thou couldest have no power at all against me , except it were given thee from above : therefore he that delivered me unto thee hath the greater sin .
text2: O Jesus phendia , " Tut nas te avel tu chi iek putiera pe mande , te na avilino tu dini putiera opral : anda kudia kodo kai andia ma tute kerel iek mai baro bezex .

text: And from thenceforth Pilate sought to release him : but the Jews cried out , saying , If thou let this man go , thou art not Caesar ' s friend : whosoever maketh himself a king speaketh against Caesar .
text2: Pala kodia o Pilate mangelas te mekel les , numa le Zhiduvuria tsipinas , phenenas , " Te mekesa les , tu chi san o vortako le Caesarosko : ke kon godi kerel anda peste amperato , wo kerel anda peste o duzhmano le Caesarosko .

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he brought Jesus forth , and sat down in the judgment seat in a place that is called the Pavement , but in the Hebrew , Gabbatha .
text2: O Pilate kana ashundia kodia , andia le Jesusos avri , ai beshlo tele po skamin la krisako po tsan kai bushol o Bax , ai Zhidovisko Gabbatha .

text: And it was the preparation of the passover , and about the sixth hour : and he saith unto the Jews , Behold your King !
text2: Antunchi sas e vriama kai lasharenas O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo , ai pashte mizmeri sas : O Pilate phendia le Zhidovonge , " Dikh , tumaro Amperato ! "

text: But they cried out , Away with him , away with him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Shall I crucify your King ? The chief priest answered , We have no king but Caesar .
text2: Numa won tsipinas , " Mudar les , Mudar les , Karfosar les po trushul . " O Pilate phendia lenge , " Tume mangen ma te mudarav tumare amperatos ? " Le bare rasha phenenas , " Amaro amperato si o Caesar . "

text: Then delivered he him therefore unto them to be crucified . And they took Jesus , and led him away .
text2: Antunchi dia les lende te karfon les . Won line le Jesus , ai ingerde les .

text: And he bearing his cross went forth into a place called the place of a skull , which is called in the Hebrew Golgotha :
text2: O Jesus ingerelas pesko trushul , ai areslo po tsan kai bushol shero , ai Zhidovisko mothonas Golgotha :

text: Where they crucified him , and two other with him , on either side one , and Jesus in the midst .
text2: ai kotse karfosarde les , ai dui aver manush sas lesa , iek pal dui riga , ai O Jesus mashkaral .

text: And Pilate wrote a title , and put it on the cross . And the writing was , JESUS OF NAZARETH THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: O Pilate ramosardiape vari soste , ai thodia po trushul , ai kodo ramomos motholas , " O JESUS ANDAI NAZARETH , O AMPERATO LE ZHIDOVONGO . "

text: This title then read many of the Jews : for the place where Jesus was crucified was nigh to the city : and it was written in Hebrew , and Greek , and Latin .
text2: But Zhiduvuria jinde so sas ramome : ke o than kai O Jesus sas karfome pasha foro sas : ai ramome sas Zhidovisko , Grechisko ai Latinesko .

text: Then said the chief priests of the Jews to Pilate , Write not , The King of the Jews ; but that he said , I am King of the Jews .
text2: Le bare le rashange phende le Pilatoske , " Na ramosar , O Amperato Le Zhidovongo ; numa ramosar ke wo phendia , ' Me sim O Amperato le Zhidovongo . ' "

text: Pilate answered , What I have written I have written .
text2: O Pilate phendia , " So me ramosardem , trobul te beshel ramome . "

text: Then the soldiers , when they had crucified Jesus , took his garments , and made four parts , to every soldier a part ; and also his coat : now the coat was without seam , woven from the top throughout .
text2: Le ketani , kana karfosarde le Jesusos , line leske tsalia , ai kerde shtar kotora anda lende , iek kotor swakona ketanake ; ai line vi leski raxami , kai nas suvdi , numa anda iek kotor sas de opral zhi tele .

text: They said therefore among themselves , Let us not rend it , but cast lots for it , whose it shall be : that the scripture might be fulfilled , which saith , They parted my raiment among them , and for my vesture they did cast lots . These things therefore the soldiers did .
text2: Ai phende mashkar pende , " Na shinas la , numa thodepe te dikhen kon niril la , " lela la : saxke te kerdiol so phendiasas E Vorba le Devleski , kai phenel , " Won hulade murhe tsalia mashkar pende , ai thodepe te dikhen kon niril murhi raxami . " So kerde le ketani .

text: Now there stood by the cross of Jesus his mother , and his mother ' s sister , Mary the wife of Cleophas , and Mary Magdalene .
text2: Pasha trushul le Jesusosko sas leski dei , ai e phei leska daki , e Maria e rhomni le Cleophaski , ai e Maria Magdalene .

text: When Jesus therefore saw his mother , and the disciple standing by , whom he loved , he saith unto his mother , Woman , behold thy son !
text2: Kana O Jesus dikhlia peska da , ai pasha late o disiplo , kai sas leske drago , phenel peska dake , " Zhuvlio , Eta , cho shav ! "

text: Then saith he to the disciple , Behold thy mother ! And from that hour that disciple took her unto his own home .
text2: Ai porme phendia le disiploske , " Eta , chi dei ! ai antunchi kodia disiplo lia la ka lesko kher te beshel leste .

text: After this , Jesus knowing that all things were now accomplished , that the scripture might be fulfilled , saith , I thirst .
text2: Pala kodia , O Jesus kai zhanelas ke vunzhe sa gata sas , saxke te kerdiol so phendia E Vorba le Devleski , wo phendia , " Trushalo sim . "

text: Now there was set a vessel full of vinegar : and they filled a spunge with vinegar , and put it upon hyssop , and put it to his mouth .
text2: Ai sas kotse iek piri chikaki pherdo shut . Le ketani bolde ieke ponzha pherdi shut , ai kana phangle la pe iek kotor khash kai bushol hisop , tsode la ka lesko wush .

text: When Jesus therefore had received the vinegar , he said , It is finished : and he bowed his head , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Kana o shut areslo pel le Jesusoske wush , wo phendia " Sa gata " ; ai kana meklia o shero tele , mulo .

text: The Jews therefore , because it was the preparation , that the bodies should not remain upon the cross on the sabbath day , ( for that sabbath day was an high day , ) besought Pilate that their legs might be broken , and that they might be taken away .
text2: Kodia sas iek dies mai anglal sar o Savato , ai le Zhiduvuria chi mangenas le staturia te beshen pel trushula Savatone , ke kodo Savato sas iek baro dies . Le Zhiduvuria mangenas katar o Pilate te phagen le punrhe kodolenge kai sas karfome , ai te len le pal trushula .

text: Then came the soldiers , and brake the legs of the first , and of the other which was crucified with him .
text2: Antunchi le ketani avile , ai phagle le punrhe le pervoneske , porme le kolavreske kai sas karfome lesa .

text: But when they came to Jesus , and saw that he was dead already , they brake not his legs :
text2: Numa kana pashile pasha Jesus , ai dikhle ke vunzhe mulo sas , chi phagle leske punrhe .

text: But one of the soldiers with a spear pierced his side , and forthwith came there out blood and water .
text2: Numa iek andal ketani kerdia gropa ande lesko prashav la sabiasa , ai strazo anklisto rat avri ai pai .

text: And he that saw it bare record , and his record is true : and he knoweth that he saith true , that ye might believe .
text2: O manush kai dikhlia le mothol pa kadala dieli kai kerdile , ai so mothol o chachimos si ; wo zhanel ke mothol o chachimos , saxke te pachan tume .

text: For these things were done , that the scripture should be fulfilled , A bone of him shall not be broken .
text2: Kadala dieli kerdile , saxke te kerdiol so phendia E Vorba le Devleski , chi iek kokola anda leske chi avela phaglo .

text: And again another scripture saith , They shall look on him whom they pierced .
text2: Ai ande averik E Vorba le Devleski mai phenel , " Won dikhena kodoles kai xiviarde . "

text: And after this Joseph of Arimathaea , being a disciple of Jesus , but secretly for fear of the Jews , besought Pilate that he might take away the body of Jesus : and Pilate gave him leave . He came therefore , and took the body of Jesus .
text2: Pala kodia o Joseph andai Arimathea , kai sas ek disiplo le Jesusosko , numa chordanes ke daralas katar le Zhiduvuria , manglia katar o Pilate te sai lel o stato le Jesusosko : ai o Pilate phendia leske ke sai . Wo avilo ai lia o stato le Jesusosko .

text: And there came also Nicodemus , which at the first came to Jesus by night , and brought a mixture of myrrh and aloes , about an hundred pound weight .
text2: O Nicodemus avilo , kai mai anglal avilo sas e riate ka Jesus , ai andia pashte trenda kili Mirrh ai Aloes amime andek than .

text: Then took they the body of Jesus , and wound it in linen clothes with the spices , as the manner of the Jews is to bury .
text2: Line o stato le Jesusosko , ai vuluisarde les andek vuzho poxtan , parno ai tsode andre aromat , ke kadia si o zakono le Zhidovongo te gropon .

text: Now in the place where he was crucified there was a garden ; and in the garden a new sepulchre , wherein was never man yet laid .
text2: Ai sas iek sado pe kodo tsan kai sas O Jesus karfome ; ai ande kodo sado sas iek nevo greposhevo , kai inker khonik nas thodino andre .

text: There laid they Jesus therefore because of the Jews ' preparation day ; for the sepulchre was nigh at hand .
text2: Kotse thode le Jesusos ke sas O Dies O Baro le Zhidovongo mai anglal sar o Savato le Zhidovongo , ai ke o greposhevo sas pashe .

text: The first day of the week cometh Mary Magdalene early , when it was yet dark , unto the sepulchre , and seeth the stone taken away from the sepulchre .
text2: Kurke diminiatsi , ai kana kerelas inker tuniariko , e Maria Magdalene geli ka greposhevo , ai dikhlia ke o bax sas lino katar o wudar .

text: Then she runneth , and cometh to Simon Peter , and to the other disciple , whom Jesus loved , and saith unto them , They have taken away the Lord out of the sepulchre , and we know not where they have laid him .
text2: Woi nashli karing o Simon Petri , ai karing o kolaver disiplo kai sas drago le Jesusosko , ai phendia lenge , " Line le Devles anda greposhevo ai chi zhanas kai thode les . "

text: Peter therefore went forth , and that other disciple , and came to the sepulchre .
text2: O Petri ai o kolaver disiplo gele , ai avile ka greposhevo .

text: So they ran both together : and the other disciple did outrun Peter , and came first to the sepulchre .
text2: Vi le dui zhene nashenas andek than : numa o kolaver disiplo nashelas mai zurales katar o Petri , ai areslo pervo ka greposhevo .

text: And he stooping down , and looking in , saw the linen clothes lying ; yet went he not in .
text2: Bandilo tele ai dikhlia o poxtan o parno kai sas pe phuv ; numa chi gelo andre .

text: Then cometh Simon Peter following him , and went into the sepulchre , and seeth the linen clothes lie ,
text2: O Simon Petri lelaspe pala leste areslo , ai gelo andre ando greposhevo , ai dikhlia o poxtan o parno kai sas pe phuv .

text: And the napkin , that was about his head , not lying with the linen clothes , but wrapped together in a place by itself .
text2: Ai e kotor dirza kai thode sas po shero le Jesusosko , nas le poxtanosa le parnesa , numa pakhuime sas rigate ande kolaverik .

text: Then went in also that other disciple , which came first to the sepulchre , and he saw , and believed .
text2: Antunchi le kolaver disiplo , kai areslo sas o pervo ka greposhevo , gelo vi wo andre , ai dikhlia , ai pachaiape .

text: For as yet they knew not the scripture , that he must rise again from the dead .
text2: Ke chi haliarenas inker ke E Vorba le Devleski motholas ke O Kristo trobulas te zhuvindil mashkar le mule .

text: Then the disciples went away again unto their own home .
text2: Ai le disipluria geletar porme khere .

text: But Mary stood without at the sepulchre weeping : and as she wept , she stooped down , and looked into the sepulchre ,
text2: Numa e Maria beshelas avri pasha greposhevo ai rovelas : numa ande kodia kai rovelas , bandili tele te dikhel ando greposhevo .

text: And seeth two angels in white sitting , the one at the head , and the other at the feet , where the body of Jesus had lain .
text2: Ai dikhlia duie angelon kai sas vuriarde ando parno , ai beshenas tele po than kai sas thodino o stato le Jesusosko . Iek beshelas ka shero ai o kolaver kal punrhe .

text: And they say unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? She saith unto them , Because they have taken away my Lord , and I know not where they have laid him .
text2: Ai phende lake , " Zhuvlio , Sostar roves ? " Ai woi phendia lenge , " Me rovav ke line murhe Devles , ai chi zhanen kai thode les ! "

text: And when she had thus said , she turned herself back , and saw Jesus standing , and knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: Ai kana phendia kadia , woi boldinisaili , ai dikhlia le Jesusos ande punrnende ; numa woi chi zhanelas ke sas O Jesus .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? whom seekest thou ? She , supposing him to be the gardener , saith unto him , Sir , if thou have borne him hence , tell me where thou hast laid him , and I will take him away .
text2: O Jesus phendia lake , " Zhuvlio , Sostar roves ? Kas rodes ? " Ai woi gindilas ke wo sas o manush kai lel sama katar o sado , phenel leske , " Gazda , te lian les vari kai , phen mange kai thodian les , ai me lava les . "

text: Jesus saith unto her , Mary . She turned herself , and saith unto him , Rabboni ; which is to say , Master .
text2: O Jesus phendia lake , " Maria ! " ai woi boldinisaili , ai phendia leske Zhidovesko , " Rabboni ! " kodia znachil , Gazda .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Touch me not ; for I am not yet ascended to my Father : but go to my brethren , and say unto them , I ascend unto my Father , and your Father ; and to my God , and your God .
text2: O Jesus phendia lake , " Na azba ma ; ke inker chi gelem ka murho Dat ; numa zha ka murhe phral , ai phen lenge mange , " Ke ma zhav ka murho Dat , ai tumaro Dat ; ka murho Del ai tumaro Del . "

text: Mary Magdalene came and told the disciples that she had seen the Lord , and that he had spoken these things unto her .
text2: E Maria Magdalene geli ai phendia le disiplonge ke dikhlia le Devles , ai ke phendia lake kadala dieli .

text: Then the same day at evening , being the first day of the week , when the doors were shut where the disciples were assembled for fear of the Jews , came Jesus and stood in the midst , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Pozno sas o pervo dies le kurkosko , le disipluria chidinesas andek than ande iek kher , ai phandadesas le wudara zurales ke daranas katar le Zhiduvuria , O Jesus avisailo mashkar lende , ai phendia lenge , " E pacha te avel tumensa . "

text: And when he had so said , he shewed unto them his hands and his side . Then were the disciples glad , when they saw the Lord .
text2: Ai kana phendia lenge kadala vorbi , wo sikadia lenge peske vas ai pesko prashav . Le disipluria raduisaile , kana dikhle le Devles .

text: Then said Jesus to them again , Peace be unto you : as my Father hath sent me , even so send I you .
text2: O Jesus mai phendia lenge , " E pacha te avel tumensa , sar murho Dat tradia man , i me tradav tumen . "

text: And when he had said this , he breathed on them , and saith unto them , Receive ye the Holy Ghost :
text2: Ai kana phendia kodia divano , phurdia pe lende , ai phendia lenge , " Premin O Swunto Duxo :

text: Whose soever sins ye remit , they are remitted unto them ; and whose soever sins ye retain , they are retained .
text2: Te iertina tume le bezexa le manushenge , lenge bezexa avena iertime ; te na iertin le , chi aven iertime . "

text: But Thomas , one of the twelve , called Didymus , was not with them when Jesus came .
text2: Numa o Thomas , kai akharenas les Didimus , iek andal desh dui disipluria , nas lensa kana O Jesus avisailo .

text: The other disciples therefore said unto him , We have seen the Lord . But he said unto them , Except I shall see in his hands the print of the nails , and put my finger into the print of the nails , and thrust my hand into his side , I will not believe .
text2: Le kolaver disipluria phende leske , " Ame dikhliam le Devles . " Numa wo phendia lenge , " Te na dikhava ande leske vas le semnuria le karfiango , ai te na tsava murho nai andel semnuria le karfiange , ai te na tsava murho vas ande lesko prashav , chi pachava . "

text: And after eight days again his disciples were within , and Thomas with them : then came Jesus , the doors being shut , and stood in the midst , and said , Peace be unto you .
text2: Oxto dies pala kodia le disipluria le Jesusoske sas pale ando kher ai o Thomas sas lensa : O Jesus avisailo , le wudara phandadesas zurales , numa O Jesus avilo mashkar lende , ai phendia , " E pacha te avel tumensa . " Porme phendia le Thomasoske , " Tho cho nai kata , ai dikh murhe vas ; an vi cho vas ai tho les ande murho prashav : ai na kerdiol manush kai chi pachalpe , numa pachas tu . "

text: And Thomas answered and said unto him , My Lord and my God .
text2: O Thomas phendia leske , " Murho Devla ai murho Del , "

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thomas , because thou hast seen me , thou hast believed : blessed are they that have not seen , and yet have believed .
text2: O Jesus phendia leske , " Tu dikhlian man anda kodia pachaian tu : numa raduime kodola kai chi dikhle ai kai pachaiepe . "

text: And many other signs truly did Jesus in the presence of his disciples , which are not written in this book :
text2: O Jesus mai kerdia angla peske disipluria but aver mirakluria , kai nai ramome ande kadia klishka .

text: But these are written , that ye might believe that Jesus is the Christ , the Son of God ; and that believing ye might have life through his name .
text2: Numa kadala dieli sas ramome , saxke te pachan tume ke O Jesus si O Kristo , O Shav le Devlesko ; ai kana pachan tume te avel tume o traio ande lesko anav .

text: After these things Jesus shewed himself again to the disciples at the sea of Tiberias ; and on this wise shewed he himself .
text2: Pala kodia O Jesus mai avisailo le disiplonge pashai maria kai bushol Tiberias ; ai eta , sar avisailo lenge .

text: There were together Simon Peter , and Thomas called Didymus , and Nathanael of Cana in Galilee , and the sons of Zebedee , and two other of his disciples .
text2: O Simon Petri , ai o Thomas kai akharenas les Didimus , ai o Nathanael andai Cana kai si ande Galilee , ai le shav le Zebedeske , ai dui aver disipluria le Jesusoske sas andek than .

text: Simon Peter saith unto them , I go a fishing . They say unto him , We also go with thee . They went forth , and entered into a ship immediately ; and that night they caught nothing .
text2: O Simon Petri phendia lenge , " Me zhav te astarav mashe . " Ai won phende leske , " Vi ame zhas tusa . " Ankliste avri , ai ankliste andek paraxoditsi ; numa kodia riat chi astarde khanch .

text: But when the morning was now come , Jesus stood on the shore : but the disciples knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: Kana phuterdilo o dies , O Jesus sas pashai maria pe chishai ; numa le disipluria chi zhanenas ke O Jesus sas .

text: Then Jesus saith unto them , Children , have ye any meat ? They answered him , No .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Shavorhale , nai tume khanchi te xan ? " ai won dine les atweto , " Nichi . "

text: And he said unto them , Cast the net on the right side of the ship , and ye shall find . They cast therefore , and now they were not able to draw it for the multitude of fishes .
text2: Ai phendia lenge , " Shuden e sita pe rik e chachi le paraxodoski ai arakhena mashe . " Won shude , ai nashti mai ankalavenas e sita avri de but mashe kai sas .

text: Therefore that disciple whom Jesus loved saith unto Peter , It is the Lord . Now when Simon Peter heard that it was the Lord , he girt his fisher ' s coat unto him , ( for he was naked , ) and did cast himself into the sea .
text2: Antunchi o disiplo kai sas drago le Jesusoske phendia le Petreske , " Devla si " ai kana o Simon Petri ashundia ke O Del si , lia pe peste peske tsalia , ai thodia peske prashtia ( ke nango sas ) , ai shudiape ande maria .

text: And the other disciples came in a little ship ; ( for they were not far from land , but as it were two hundred cubits , ) dragging the net with fishes .
text2: Ai le kolaver disipluria avile ande paraxodoski , tsirdenas e sita kai sas pherdo mashe , ke nas dur katar o bedigo , iek shel meteria sas . ( 200 cubits ) .

text: As soon then as they were come to land , they saw a fire of coals there , and fish laid thereon , and bread .
text2: Kana huliste pe phuv , dikhle kotse angara dine iag , ai masho sas opral , ai sas vi manrho .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Bring of the fish which ye have now caught .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Anen mashe kai astardian akana .

text: Simon Peter went up , and drew the net to land full of great fishes , and hundred and fifty and three : and for all there were so many , yet was not the net broken .
text2: O Simon Petri anklisto anda paraxodo , ai andia pe phuv e sita pherdo iek shel ai panvardesh bare mashe : ai marka ke sas but , e sita chi shindili .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Come and dine . And none of the disciples durst ask him , Who art thou ? knowing that it was the Lord .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Aven ai xan . " Ai chi iek andal disipluria chi tromailo te phushel lestar , " Kon san tu ? " ke anenas ke O Del si .

text: Jesus then cometh , and taketh bread , and giveth them , and fish likewise .
text2: O Jesus pashilo , lia o manrho , ai dia len , ai porme lia o masho ai dia len .

text: This is now the third time that Jesus shewed himself to his disciples , after that he was risen from the dead .
text2: Kodia sas e trito data kai O Jesus sikadiolaspe peske disiplonge , de sar zhuvindisailo sas mashkar le mule .

text: So when they had dined , Jesus saith to Simon Peter , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me more than these ? He saith unto him , Yea , Lord ; thou knowest that I love thee . He saith unto him , Feed my lambs .
text2: Kana getosarde te xan , O Jesus phendia le Simonoske Petri , " Simon , shav le Jonasosko , san tuke drago mange mai but sar kodola ? " Ai wo phendia leske , " E Devla , tu zhanes ke sim mange drago tuke . " O Jesus phendia leske , " Le sama katar murhe bakriorha . "

text: He saith to him again the second time , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me ? He saith unto him , Yea , Lord ; thou knowest that I love thee . He saith unto him , Feed my sheep .
text2: Ai mai phendia leske pe duito data , " Simon , shav le Jonasosko , san tuke drago mange ? " O Petri phendia leske , " E Devla , Tu zhanes ke sim mange drago tuke . " O Jesus phendia leske , " Le sama katar murhe bakriorha . "

text: He saith unto him the third time , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me ? Peter was grieved because he said unto him the third time , Lovest thou me ? And he said unto him , Lord , thou knowest all things ; thou knowest that I love thee . Jesus saith unto him , Feed my sheep .
text2: Ai mai phendia leske pe trito data , " Simon , shav le Jonasosko , san tuke drago mange ? " O Petri nekezhisailo anda so phendia leske pe trito data , " San tuke drago mange ? " ai phendia leske , " Devla , tu zhanes swako fielo ; tu zhanes ke sim mange drago tuke . " O Jesus phendia leske , " Le sama katar murhe bakriorha . "

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , When thou wast young , thou girdedst thyself , and walkedst whither thou wouldest : but when thou shalt be old , thou shalt stretch forth thy hands , and another shall gird thee , and carry thee whither thou wouldest not .
text2: " Chachimasa , chachimasa , me phenav tuke , kana sanas mai terno , tu thosas pe tute e prashtia , ai zhasas kai tu mangesas ; numa kana avesa phuro , tu vazdesa che vas opre , ai aver thola e prashtia pe tute , ai ingerela tu kai tu chi mangesa te zhas . "

text: This spake he , signifying by what death he should glorify God . And when he had spoken this , he saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Wo phendia kadia te sikavel sar o Petri merela ai luvudila le Devles . Porme kana phendia kodo divano , phendia leske , " Le tu pala mande . "

text: Then Peter , turning about , seeth the disciple whom Jesus loved following ; which also leaned on his breast at supper , and said , Lord , which is he that betrayeth thee ?
text2: O Petri , kana boldinisailo , dikhlia ke lelaspe pala lende o disiplo kai sas drago le Jesusosko . Kodo kai thodiasas pe po kolin le Jesusosko kana xanas , ai phushliasas lestar , " Devla , savo si kodo kai si te purhil tu ? "

text: Peter seeing him saith to Jesus , Lord , and what shall this man do ?
text2: Kana o Petri dikhlia les phendia le Jesusosko , " Devla , so kerdiolape kodo manush ? "

text: Jesus saith unto him , If I will that he tarry till I come , what is that to thee ? follow thou me .
text2: O Jesus phendia leske , " Te mangava te traiil zhi kai avava palpale , soi tuke kotsar ? Le tu pala mande . "

text: Then went this saying abroad among the brethren , that that disciple should not die : yet Jesus said not unto him , He shall not die ; but , If I will that he tarry till I come , what is that to thee ?
text2: Kodia viasta geli antunchi mashkar le phral , ke kodia disiplo chi merela : Numa O Jesus chi phendiasas le Petreske , ke chi merela ; numa phendia , te mangava te traiil zhi kai avav palpale , soi tuke kotsar ? "

text: This is the disciple which testifieth of these things , and wrote these things : and we know that his testimony is true .
text2: No kodia disiplo si kai phenel pa kadala dieli kai kerdile , ai kai ramosardia le ; ai ame zhanas ke so phendia si chacho .

text: And there are also many other things which Jesus did , the which , if they should be written every one , I suppose that even the world itself could not contain the books that should be written . Amen .
text2: O Jesus mai kerdia but aver dieli , te ramosardiamas le , divano pe divanoste , me gindiv ke sa e lumia nashtisardino te inkerel le klishki kai ramosardamas . Amen .

text: The former treatise have I made , O Theophilus , of all that Jesus began both to do and teach ,
text2: Theophilus , dem duma ande murhi pervo klishka pa sa le dieli kai O Jesus nachinaisardia te kerel ai te sicharel de anda gor ,

text: Until the day in which he was taken up , after that he through the Holy Ghost had given commandments unto the apostles whom he had chosen :
text2: zhi ka dies kai gelotar ando rhaio , ai kai dia ordina katar O Swunto Duxo le apostlonge kai alosardiasas ;

text: To whom also he shewed himself alive after his passion by many infallible proofs , being seen of them forty days , and speaking of the things pertaining to the kingdom of God :
text2: pala peske martia sikadilo lenge zhuvindo , ai sikadia lenge butivar ke zhuvindolo ke beshlo lensa shtarvardesh dies , ai delas duma lensa pal dieli le amperetsia le Devleski .

text: And , being assembled together with them , commanded them that they should not depart from Jerusalem , but wait for the promise of the Father , which , saith he , ye have heard of me .
text2: Andek dies kai sas lensa O Jesus phendia lenge , " Te na zhan anda Jerusalem , numa te azhukeren so lesko Dat shinadiasas lenge . Tume ashundian tumenge pe kadia .

text: For John truly baptized with water ; but ye shall be baptized with the Holy Ghost not many days hence .
text2: Ke o Iovano boldia ando paiesa , numa tume pa xantsi dies avena bolde le Swuntone Duxosa . "

text: When they therefore were come together , they asked of him , saying , Lord , wilt thou at this time restore again the kingdom to Israel ?
text2: Kana le disipluria ai O Jesus sas andek than , won pushle les , " Devla , Kana si kadia vriama kai anesa palpale e amperetsia ka Israel ? "

text: And he said unto them , It is not for you to know the times or the seasons , which the Father hath put in his own power .
text2: O Jesus phendia lenge , " Nai tumendar te zhanen e vriama vai le diesa , ke ferdi O Dat si les e putiera te phenel kana kerdiol .

text: But ye shall receive power , after that the Holy Ghost is come upon you : and ye shall be witnesses unto me both in Jerusalem , and in all Judaea , and in Samaria , and unto the uttermost part of the earth .
text2: Numa tume avena pherde putierasa kana O Swunto Duxo avela pe tumende , ai avena murhe marturia ande Jerusalem , ai ande sa Judea , ai Samaria , ai pe sa e lumia . "

text: And when he had spoken these things , while they beheld , he was taken up ; and a cloud received him out of their sight .
text2: Kana phendia kodo divano , O Jesus gelotar ando rhaio , andek nuvero angla lenge iakha .

text: And while they looked stedfastly toward heaven as he went up , behold , two men stood by them in white apparel ;
text2: Ai sar dikhenas po cheri sar zhaltar O Jesus , eta , dui manush kai sas vuliarde ando parno sikadile lenge ;

text: Which also said , Ye men of Galilee , why stand ye gazing up into heaven ? this same Jesus , which is taken up from you into heaven , shall so come in like manner as ye have seen him go into heaven .
text2: ai phende lenge , " Tume kai san anda Galilee , sostar dikhen po cheri ? O Jesus kai sas lino tumendar ando rhaio avela palpale sakadia sar tume dikhlian les te zhaltar ando rhaio . "

text: Then returned they unto Jerusalem from the mount called Olivet , which is from Jerusalem a sabbath day ' s journey .
text2: Antunchi gele palpale ando Jerusalem anda E Plaiin le Maslinenge kai si pashai Jerusalem sar lel iek dies le Savatosko te zhal .

text: And when they were come in , they went up into an upper room , where abode both Peter , and James , and John , and Andrew , Philip , and Thomas , Bartholomew , and Matthew , James the son of Alphaeus , and Simon Zelotes , and Judas the brother of James .
text2: Kana aresle , gele andek soba opre kai beshenas o Petri , o Iakov , ai o Iovano , ai o Andre , o Filip , ai o Thomas , o Bartholomew , ai o Mate , o Iakov o shav le Alphaeusosko , ai o Simon ( o zealot ) , ai o Judas o shav le Iakovosko .

text: These all continued with one accord in prayer and supplication , with the women , and Mary the mother of Jesus , and with his brethren .
text2: Ai savo andek than rhuginas pe chachimasa , le zhuvliansa , ai e Maria e dei le Jesusoski , ai leske phral .

text: And in those days Peter stood up in the midst of the disciples , and said , ( the number of names together were about an hundred and twenty , )
text2: Ai andek dies ande kodia vriama o Petri wushtilo opre mashkar le disiplonge , ai phendia , won sas chidine andek than sas iek shel ai bish ,

text: Men and brethren , this scripture must needs have been fulfilled , which the Holy Ghost by the mouth of David spake before concerning Judas , which was guide to them that took Jesus .
text2: " Murhe phral , o ramomos trobulas te kerdiol , so O Swunto Duxo ande Vorba le Devleski phendiasas mai anglal katar o mui le Davidosko pa Judas , kai dia O Jesus ando lengo vas te astaren les .

text: For he was numbered with us , and had obtained part of this ministry .
text2: O Judas sas mashkar amende , ke alosardiasas te kerel buchi amensa .

text: Now this man purchased a field with the reward of iniquity ; and falling headlong , he burst asunder in the midst , and all his bowels gushed out .
text2: Le lovensa kai dine les te purhisar O Jesus . O Judas chindia peske iek kimpo , ai amboldia pe o shero pervo , ai lesko stato pharhadilo mashkaral , ai sa lesko porha ankliste avri .

text: And it was known unto all the dwellers at Jerusalem ; insomuch as that field is called in their proper tongue , Aceldama , that is to say , The field of blood .
text2: Sa o narodo anda Jerusalem ashunde so kerdilia , ai akharde kodole kimpos ande penge shib Acel ' dama kodia znachil , O Kimpo le Ratesko .

text: For it is written in the book of Psalms , Let his habitation be desolate , and let no man dwell therein : and his bishoprick let another take .
text2: Ke te si ramome andel Psalms , te kerdiol lesko kher sar iek pusta , ai " Te na beshel khonik ande kodo kher ; ai aver manush te lel lesko than te kerel buchi . "

text: Wherefore of these men which have companied with us all the time that the Lord Jesus went in and out among us ,
text2: " Trobul o manush te avel pala amende te avel marturo anda zhuvindimos le Jesusosko . Kodo manush trobul te avel iek ando kodola kai sas mashkar amende sagda kai O Jesus phirdia amensa ,

text: Beginning from the baptism of John , unto that same day that he was taken up from us , must one be ordained to be a witness with us of his resurrection .
text2: de katar e vriama kai o Iovano boldia les ai zhi ka dies kai O Jesus gelotar mashkar amendar ando rhaio .

text: And they appointed two , Joseph called Barsabas , who was surnamed Justus , and Matthias .
text2: Andine le duien manushen , o Josef kai busholas Barsabbas , ai vi akharenas les Justus , ai o Matthias .

text: And they prayed , and said , Thou , Lord , which knowest the hearts of all men , shew whether of these two thou hast chosen ,
text2: Ai rhugisaile ai phende , " Devla , tu kai zhanes sa le ile , savo anda kakala dui manush alosardian ,

text: That he may take part of this ministry and apostleship , from which Judas by transgression fell , that he might go to his own place .
text2: te len o than ande kadia buchi sar ek Apostle , o than kai o Judas meklia te zhal ka pesko than ke kerdia bezex . "

text: And they gave forth their lots ; and the lot fell upon Matthias ; and he was numbered with the eleven apostles .
text2: Antunchi kerde vari so te alon iekes andel dui , ai o Matthias sas alome ; ai thodinosas andel desh u iek disiplonsa .

text: And when the day of Pentecost was fully come , they were all with one accord in one place .
text2: Panvardesh dies kai sas Pentecost savorhe sas ande iek than .

text: And suddenly there came a sound from heaven as of a rushing mighty wind , and it filled all the house where they were sitting .
text2: Ai strazo avilo ek bunto sar ek zurali barval phurdelas , ai pherdilo sa o kher kai beshenas tele .

text: And there appeared unto them cloven tongues like as of fire , and it sat upon each of them .
text2: Antunchi sikadilia lenge shiba kai miazonas sar parha iagaki , ai kodola shiba huladile , ai thodepe iek po iek pe lende .

text: And they were all filled with the Holy Ghost , and began to speak with other tongues , as the Spirit gave them utterance .
text2: Ai savorhe pherdile le Swuntone Duxosa , ai nachinaisarde te den duma aver shiba , sar O Swunto Duxo dia le le vorbi te phenen .

text: And there were dwelling at Jerusalem Jews , devout men , out of every nation under heaven .
text2: Sas ando Jerusalem Zhiduvuria , manush kai pachanaspe zurales ando zakono , anda sa le thema la lumiake .

text: Now when this was noised abroad , the multitude came together , and were confounded , because that every man heard them speak in his own language .
text2: Pala bunto kai kerdiliasas , but narodo chidinisailia , ai savorhe chudisaile , ke swako anda lende ashunelas le manushen kai pachanaspe sar denas duma ande penge shib .

text: And they were all amazed and marvelled , saying one to another , Behold , are not all these which speak Galilaeans ?
text2: Savorhe chudisaile ai shodo sas lenge , ai mothonas iek kavreske , " Eta , kodola manush kai den duma si andal Galileanuria ?

text: And how hear we every man in our own tongue , wherein we were born ?
text2: Ai sarta sai dashtil pe , ke swako anda amende ashunel le , sar den duma ande penge shib .
