text: Wherefore , my brethren , ye also are become dead to the law by the body of Christ ; that ye should be married to another , even to him who is raised from the dead , that we should bring forth fruit unto God .
text2: Sakadia tumenge , murhe phral . Tume san mule le zakonoske kai san andek than chidine ka stato le Kristosko ; ai te aven avresko , tume san akana kodoleske kai sas zhuvindime mashkar le mule , saxke te keras lashe dieli le Devleske .

text: For when we were in the flesh , the motions of sins , which were by the law , did work in our members to bring forth fruit unto death .
text2: Chaches kana traiisarasas pala amaro stato , le chorhe dieli , kai o zakono rimolas , kerdionas ande sa amaro stato , ai angerenas ame kai martia .

text: But now we are delivered from the law , that being dead wherein we were held ; that we should serve in newness of spirit , and not in the oldness of the letter .
text2: Numa akana skepime sam katar o zakono , ke muliam kal dieli kai ankerenas ame phangle ; akana sai keras buchi le Devleski aver fielo tela putiera le Swuntone Duxoski , ai na mai sar mai anglal telai puiera le zakonoske kai sas ramome .

text: What shall we say then ? Is the law sin ? God forbid . Nay , I had not known sin , but by the law : for I had not known lust , except the law had said , Thou shalt not covet .
text2: Apo so mothas ? Ke o zakono bezex si ? Nichi , Vov si ! Numa o zakono kerdia ma te zhanav so si o bezex . Ke nas te zhanav ke nai mishto te mangav so si avres , te na phendino mange o zakono , " Te na mangav so si avres . "

text: But sin , taking occasion by the commandment , wrought in me all manner of concupiscence . For without the law sin was dead .
text2: O bezex dabai astardia te kerel ande mande katar o zakono , but dieli chorhe kai keren ma te mangav so si avres .

text: For I was alive without the law once : but when the commandment came , sin revived , and I died .
text2: ke bi le zakonosko o bezex nulo lo . Mai anglal bi le zakonosko traiivas ; numa kana avilo o zakono , o bezex zhuvindisailo , ai me mulem .

text: And the commandment , which was ordained to life , I found to be unto death .
text2: O zakono , kai trobulas te ingerel ka traio , ingerdia man kai martia .

text: For sin , taking occasion by the commandment , deceived me , and by it slew me .
text2: Ke o bezex dabai astardia , kerdia te shubiv ma le zakonosa , ai kerdia te merav .

text: Wherefore the law is holy , and the commandment holy , and just , and good .
text2: O zakono Swunto lo , ai vorta , ai lasho .

text: Was then that which is good made death unto me ? God forbid . But sin , that it might appear sin , working death in me by that which is good ; that sin by the commandment might become exceeding sinful .
text2: Apo so si lasho kerdilo antunchi martia mange ? Nichi , Vov si ! Pala bezex si , o baio ke si kadia , kadia vorta sar si o bezex . Lia o lashimos te mudarel ma , ai kadia o bezex kerdilo pala zakono defial nasulimos .

text: For we know that the law is spiritual : but I am carnal , sold under sin .
text2: Zhanas ke o zakono katar O Del si ; Numa me sim stato , bichindo le bezexeske .

text: For that which I do I allow not : for what I would , that do I not ; but what I hate , that do I .
text2: Ke chi zhanav so kerav ; chi kerav so mangav , ai kerav so chi mangav .

text: If then I do that which I would not , I consent unto the law that it is good .
text2: Kana kerav so chi mangav , ai haliarav kadia ke o zakono lasho lo .

text: Now then it is no more I that do it , but sin that dwelleth in me .
text2: Ai akana chi sim me kai kerav kodia , numa o bezex kai si ande mande .

text: For I know that in me ( that is , in my flesh , ) dwelleth no good thing : for to will is present with me ; but how to perform that which is good I find not .
text2: Zhanav ke so si lasho nai ande mande , nai ande murho stato . Me mangav , numa nai ma e putiera te kerav o mishtimos .

text: For the good that I would I do not : but the evil which I would not , that I do .
text2: Ke chi kerav o mishtimos kai mangav , numa kerav o nasulimos kai chi mangav .

text: Now if I do that I would not , it is no more I that do it , but sin that dwelleth in me .
text2: Ai te kerava so chi mangav te kerav , chi sim me kai kerav , kodo si o bezex kai si ande mande .

text: I find then a law , that , when I would do good , evil is present with me .
text2: No arakhav ande mande kado zakono , kana mangav te kerav o mishtimos , o nasulimos astardiol mandar .

text: For I delight in the law of God after the inward man :
text2: Ke voliv o zakono le Devlesko ande murho ilo .

text: But I see another law in my members , warring against the law of my mind , and bringing me into captivity to the law of sin which is in my members .
text2: Numa dikhav ande murho stato aver zakono , kai marelpe kodole zakonosa kai murhi goji aliarel ke mishto . Kerel te astardiuav ka zakono le bezexesko kai si ande murho stato .

text: O wretched man that I am ! who shall deliver me from the body of this death ?
text2: Che chinuime manush sim ! Kon skepila ma anda kado stato kai ingerel ma kai martia ?

text: I thank God through Jesus Christ our Lord . So then with the mind I myself serve the law of God ; but with the flesh the law of sin .
text2: O naisimos te avel le Devleske katar O Jesus Kristo amaro Del ! Kadia sai kerav buchi le zakonoski kai si le Devlesko murha gojasa , numa murho stato kerel buchi le zakonoske , o zakono le bezexesko .

text: There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus , who walk not after the flesh , but after the Spirit .
text2: Akana ma nai chi iek kris pe kodola kai traiin le Jesus Kristosa , kai chi phiren na pala stato , numa pala Swunto Duxo .

text: For the law of the Spirit of life in Christ Jesus hath made me free from the law of sin and death .
text2: Ke o zakono le Swuntone Duxosko kai del o traio ando Jesus Kristo , skepisardia ma anda zakono le bezexesko ai katar e martia .

text: For what the law could not do , in that it was weak through the flesh , God sending his own Son in the likeness of sinful flesh , and for sin , condemned sin in the flesh :
text2: O Del kerdia so o zakono le Mosesosko nashti kerelas , ke o stato le manushesko nai zuralo . Doshardia le bezexes kai si ando stato le manushesko kana tradia peske shaves saikfialo sar andek stato kai si sar o bezex le manushesko te ankalavel o bezex .

text: That the righteousness of the law might be fulfilled in us , who walk not after the flesh , but after the Spirit .
text2: Ai O Del kerdia kodia saxke e kris le zakonoski te kerdiol anda amende kai phiras na pala stato , numa pala Swunto Duxo .

text: For they that are after the flesh do mind the things of the flesh ; but they that are after the Spirit the things of the Spirit .
text2: Ke kodola kai traiin pala stato , roden le dieli kai mangel o stato . Numa kodola kay traiin pala Swunto Duxo lenpe pala so mangel o Swunto Duxo .

text: For to be carnally minded is death ; but to be spiritually minded is life and peace .
text2: Te lesa tu pala le dieli kai mangel o stato kodia angerel kai martia ; numa te lesa tu pala so mangel o Swunto Duxo kodia angerel ando traio ai kai pacha .

text: Because the carnal mind is enmity against God : for it is not subject to the law of God , neither indeed can be .
text2: Ke kodola kai lenpe pala le dieli le statoske , won si le duzhmaia le Devleske ; ke chi lenpe pala zakono le Devlesko , ai vi nashtin .

text: So then they that are in the flesh cannot please God .
text2: Kodola kai traiin le statoske nashtin te aven drago le Devleske .

text: But ye are not in the flesh , but in the Spirit , if so be that the Spirit of God dwell in you . Now if any man have not the Spirit of Christ , he is none of his .
text2: Numa tume chi traiin le statoske , numa traiin pala Swunto Duxo , ke o Swunto Duxo le Devlesko traiil ande tumende . Kodo kai nai o Swunto Duxo le Kristosko ande leste , nai lesko .

text: And if Christ be in you , the body is dead because of sin ; but the Spirit is life because of righteousness .
text2: Te si o Kristo ande tumende , marka ke tumaro stato mulo lo pala bezex , o Swunto Duxo si traio ande tumende ke O Del kerdia anda tumende te aven vorta angla leste .

text: But if the Spirit of him that raised up Jesus from the dead dwell in you , he that raised up Christ from the dead shall also quicken your mortal bodies by his Spirit that dwelleth in you .
text2: Te si o Swunto Duxo le Devlesko , kai zhuvindisardia le Kristos andai martia ai andia les ka traio , te si ke traiil vi ande tumende , dela vi o traio ka tumare staturia la phuviake peske Swuntone Duxosa kai traiil ande tumende .

text: Therefore , brethren , we are debtors , not to the flesh , to live after the flesh .
text2: Murhe phral , chi mangas kanchi le statoske te keras so mangel amendar .

text: For if ye live after the flesh , ye shall die : but if ye through the Spirit do mortify the deeds of the body , ye shall live .
text2: Ke te traiina le statoske , si te meren ; numa le Swuntone Duxosa te mudarena so mangel o stato , traiina .

text: For as many as are led by the Spirit of God , they are the sons of God .
text2: Sa kodola kai lenpe pala Swunto Duxo le Devlesko si shave Devleske .

text: For ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear ; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption , whereby we cry , Abba , Father .
text2: Ke o Swunto Duxo kai sas tume dino nai iek duxo kai inkerel tume sar rhobuvria ai te thol pale e dar ande tumende ; numa kado Swunto Duxo kerel anda tumende shave le Devleske , ai kai kerel ame te tsipisaras po Del ai te mothas leske , " Dat ! Murho Dat ! "

text: The Spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit , that we are the children of God :
text2: O Swunto Duxo le Devlesko mothol amare Duxoske ke shave Devleske sam .

text: And if children , then heirs ; heirs of God , and joint - heirs with Christ ; if so be that we suffer with him , that we may be also glorified together .
text2: No te sam leske shave , liam ame avela dino o lashimos le Devlesko , kai O Del shinadia peske narodoske , liam ame avela dino le Kristosa ; ke te chinuisarasa lesa , avasa lesa luvudime .

text: For I reckon that the sufferings of this present time are not worthy to be compared with the glory which shall be revealed in us .
text2: Gindiv ke o chino kai dikhas akana nashtil te avel iekfialo ke sar o luvudimos le Devlesko kai O Del sikavela amenge .

text: For the earnest expectation of the creature waiteth for the manifestation of the sons of God .
text2: Sai e lumia azhukerel sar mai sigo e vriama kai O Del sikavela peske shaven .

text: For the creature was made subject to vanity , not willingly , but by reason of him who hath subjected the same in hope ,
text2: Ke e lumia sas thodini kal dieli kai chi mon kanch , na ke won mangle , numa ke O Del manglia kadia . Numa sai azhukeren vari so .

text: Because the creature itself also shall be delivered from the bondage of corruption into the glorious liberty of the children of God .
text2: Kodia si ke e lumia avela skepime andek dies katar e putiera le nasulimaski kai ankerel le , ai vi won avela len o skepimos sar le shave le Devleske .

text: For we know that the whole creation groaneth and travaileth in pain together until now .
text2: Zhanas ke akana e lumia inker tsipil ai chinuil sar iek zhuvli kana si la glata .

text: And not only they , but ourselves also , which have the firstfruits of the Spirit , even we ourselves groan within ourselves , waiting for the adoption , to wit , the redemption of our body .
text2: Numa na ferdi e lumia ; ame kai si ame vunzhe O Swunto Duxo sar o pervo andal podarki le Devleski , iame suspinisaras andral zhi kai azhukeras te kerel O Del peske shave anda amende , ai te ankalavel amaro stato anda bezex .

text: For we are saved by hope : but hope that is seen is not hope : for what a man seeth , why doth he yet hope for ?
text2: Ke O Del skepisardia ame ; numa inker azhukeras te dikhasa so azhukeras ; ma nai so azhukeras ; savo mai azhukerel so vunzhi ?

text: But if we hope for that we see not , then do we with patience wait for it .
text2: Numa te azhukerasa so chi dikhas , azhukeras vriamasa .

text: Likewise the Spirit also helpeth our infirmities : for we know not what we should pray for as we ought : but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered .
text2: Sakadia o Swunto Duxo avel te zhutil ame , ame kai sam kovle . Ke chi zhanas te rhugisavas sar trobul pe ; Numa O Swunto Duxo rhugilpe ka Del amenge , tsipilimasa kai nashti phenas le vorbensa .

text: And he that searcheth the hearts knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit , because he maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God .
text2: Ai O Del , kai dikhel andel ile , aliarel so mangel O Swunto Duxo ; ke O Swunto Duxo rhugilpe anda kodola kai si le Devleske sar O Del mangel .

text: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God , to them who are the called according to his purpose .
text2: Zhanas ke O Del kerel buchi ande soste godi po mishtimos kodolenge kai drago le Devles , kodola kai akhardia le te keren so mangel .

text: For whom he did foreknow , he also did predestinate to be conformed to the image of his Son , that he might be the firstborn among many brethren .
text2: Ke kodola kai O Del alosardia le mai anglal manglia vi mai anglal te miazon sar lesko shav , saxke lesko shav te avel o mai baro bute phralengo .

text: Moreover whom he did predestinate , them he also called : and whom he called , them he also justified : and whom he justified , them he also glorified .
text2: Kodolenge kai O Del mai anglal manglia kadia ; vi akhardia le kodolen kai akhardia , vi kerdia anda lende vorta angla leste ; anda kodola kai kerdia vorta vi dia le te aven luvudime lesa .

text: What shall we then say to these things ? If God be for us , who can be against us ?
text2: So te mothas mai but ? Te si O Del amensa , kon sai avel pe amende ?

text: He that spared not his own Son , but delivered him up for us all , how shall he not with him also freely give us all things ?
text2: Wo kai chi spasaisardia peske shaves , numa dia les amenge savorhenge , sar te na del ame vi le kolaver dieli lesa ?

text: Who shall lay any thing to the charge of God ' s elect ? It is God that justifieth .
text2: Kon thola dosh pe kodola kai O Del alosardia ?

text: Who is he that condemneth ? It is Christ that died , yea rather , that is risen again , who is even at the right hand of God , who also maketh intercession for us .
text2: Khonik ke O Del mothol ke nai doshale ! Kon sai dosharel antunchi ? Khonik ke O Jesus Kristo si kodo kai mulo , inker mai but zhuvindisailo , pe chachi rik le Devleski lo , ai rhugilpe anda amende !

text: Who shall separate us from the love of Christ ? shall tribulation , or distress , or persecution , or famine , or nakedness , or peril , or sword ?
text2: Kon sai duriarel ame katar e dragostia le Kristoski ? o chino sai dashtil , vai o nekazo , vai te chinuin ame , vai e bokh , o chorimos , e dar , vai e martia ?

text: As it is written , For thy sake we are killed all the day long ; we are accounted as sheep for the slaughter .
text2: Ke E Vorba le Devleske mothol , " Pala tute sam thodine kai martia antrego dies ; ai keren amensa sar le bakriorhansa kai angeren le kamasari . " ( Ps 44 : 22 ) .

text: Nay , in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us .
text2: Numa ande sa kadala dieli sam mai but ke sar zurale ande kodo kai manglia amen !

text: For I am persuaded , that neither death , nor life , nor angels , nor principalities , nor powers , nor things present , nor things to come ,
text2: Ke pachav ma ke kanchi nashtil te duriarel amen katar e dragostia le Devleski ; chi e martia , chi o traio ; chi le angeluria , chi iek aver zor , vai putiera chereske ; chi so si akana ai chi so avel ;

text: Nor height , nor depth , nor any other creature , shall be able to separate us from the love of God , which is in Christ Jesus our Lord .
text2: chi e zor kai si opre , chi e zor kai si tele - ai chi iek aver diela kai si , kanch shoxar nashtila te duriarel ame katar e dragostia le Devleski kai dia ame O Del ando Jesus Kristo amaro Del .

text: I say the truth in Christ , I lie not , my conscience also bearing me witness in the Holy Ghost ,
text2: O chachimos phenav , le Kristosko sim ai chi xoxavav , ke murho ilo pherdo lo katar o Swunto Duxo , ai mothol mange ke o chachimos si .

text: That I have great heaviness and continual sorrow in my heart .
text2: Baro nekazo si ma , ai ande murho ilo sagda iek nekazo si ma pala murho narodoske .

text: For I could wish that myself were accursed from Christ for my brethren , my kinsmen according to the flesh :
text2: Manglemas te avav dino armaia katar O Del , ai te na mai avav le Kristosa te sai aven murhe phral skepime , murhe phralenge le Zhiduvuria .

text: Who are Israelites ; to whom pertaineth the adoption , and the glory , and the covenants , and the giving of the law , and the service of God , and the promises ;
text2: Won andai vitsa le Zhidovongi ; O Del kerdia anda lende peske shave ai dia le te avel peske luvudimasa lensa ; kerdia lensa shinaimata ai dia len o zakono ; dia le te rhuginpe ai dia le shinaimata ;

text: Whose are the fathers , and of whom as concerning the flesh Christ came , who is over all , God blessed for ever . Amen .
text2: Won si andai vitsa le phurenge , ai o Kristo , sar iek manush , vi wo si anda lenge vitsa , wo kai si opral pa swako fialo , O Del te avel Swuntsome anda swako vriama ! Amen .

text: Not as though the word of God hath taken none effect . For they are not all Israel , which are of Israel :
text2: Ai chi mothav ke E Vorba le Devleski chi kerdia kanchi ; Ke sa kodola kai si andai vitsa le Zhidovonge nai savorhe chache Zhiduvuria .

text: Neither , because they are the seed of Abraham , are they all children : but , In Isaac shall thy seed be called .
text2: Ai kodola kai si andai vitsa le Abrahamoski nai savorhe chache shave le Abrahamoske , ke O Del phendia le Abrahamoske ferdi kodola kai si andai vitsa le Isaakoske avena jinde sar te aven chire . "

text: That is , They which are the children of the flesh , these are not the children of God : but the children of the promise are counted for the seed .
text2: Kodia si nai le shave kai kerdile e pervo data kai si le shave le Devleske numa ferdi kodola shave kai sas shinade katar O Del si jinde sa le chache anda kodia vitsa .

text: For this is the word of promise , At this time will I come , and Sara shall have a son .
text2: Ke eta so phendia O Del kana shinadia , " Kana avela e vriama avava palpale ai Sarah avela la iek shav .

text: And not only this ; but when Rebecca also had conceived by one , even by our father Isaac ;
text2: Ai mai le dui shave la Rebekake sa iek dat sas le , amaro dat o Isaak .

text: ( For the children being not yet born , neither having done any good or evil , that the purpose of God according to election might stand , not of works , but of him that calleth ; )
text2: Numa O Del zhanel sar te alol le manushen , lesko alomos si sar akharela len wo ai na ke won keren vari so te sikaven ke saikfialo beshen sar mangel O Del .

text: It was said unto her , The elder shall serve the younger .
text2: O Del phendia la Rebekake , kana lake shave inker chi kerdile sas , ai chi kerde sas chi mishtimos ai chi nasulimos ; ke lako shav o mai baro podaila le mai ternes .

text: As it is written , Jacob have I loved , but Esau have I hated .
text2: Sar si ramome ande Vorba le Devleski , " Drago sas mange o Iakov , ai gratsia sas mange o Esau .

text: What shall we say then ? Is there unrighteousness with God ? God forbid .
text2: So te mothas ? Ke O Del chi kerel vorta ? Nichi .

text: For he saith to Moses , I will have mercy on whom I will have mercy , and I will have compassion on whom I will have compassion .
text2: Ke phendia le Mosesoske , " Avela mange mila anda kaste mangav te avel mange mila , ai avela mange drago anda kaste mangava te avel mange drago . '

text: So then it is not of him that willeth , nor of him that runneth , but of God that sheweth mercy .
text2: No kodia nai katar o manush ke mangel vai te kerel vari so , numa ferdi O Del si kai si leske mila .

text: For the scripture saith unto Pharaoh , Even for this same purpose have I raised thee up , that I might shew my power in thee , and that my name might be declared throughout all the earth .
text2: Ande Vorba le Devleski O Del mothol le amperatoske kai si ande Egypt o Pharaoh , " Thodem tu te aves amperato saxke te sikavav ande tute murhi putiera , ai te kerav te zhanen murho anav pe sa e lumia . "

text: Therefore hath he mercy on whom he will have mercy , and whom he will he hardeneth .
text2: No le Devleske si mila anda kaste mangel , ai zuralel o ilo kodolesko kai mangel .

text: Thou wilt say then unto me , Why doth he yet find fault ? For who hath resisted his will ?
text2: Amborim phenena mange , " Te si kadia , so si kai O Del inker arakhel shipki pel manush ? Ke kon sai inkerel kai putiera le Devleski ? "

text: Nay but , O man , who art thou that repliest against God ? Shall the thing formed say to him that formed it , Why hast thou made me thus ?
text2: Numa kon san tu , manusha , kai des atweto le Devles ? Pate o khoro la chikako phushel kodoles kai kerdia les ? Sostar kerdian anda mande kadia ?

text: Hath not the potter power over the clay , of the same lump to make one vessel unto honour , and another unto dishonour ?
text2: O manush kai kerel buchi la chikasa kerel so mangel andai chik , sa anda iek chik sai kerel iek khoro kai mol kuchi , ai vi sai kerel iek prosto khoro .

text: What if God , willing to shew his wrath , and to make his power known , endured with much longsuffering the vessels of wrath fitted to destruction :
text2: Apo so si tume te mothon pa Del , manglia te sikavel peski xoli , saxke te sikavel leski putiera . Anda kodia rhevdisardia but ai azhukerdia kodolen kai trobulas te xoliavol pe lende , ai kai sai mudardino le .

text: And that he might make known the riches of his glory on the vessels of mercy , which he had afore prepared unto glory ,
text2: Numa manglia vi te sikavel sode lesko barimos , barvalo lo amenge , No mila leske anda amende , kai lashardia mai anglal te las lesko barimos .

text: Even us , whom he hath called , not of the Jews only , but also of the Gentiles ?
text2: Ke ame sam kodola kai akhardia ame , na ferdi mashkar le Zhiduvuria , numa vi mashkar le kolaver thema .

text: As he saith also in Osee , I will call them my people , which were not my people ; and her beloved , which was not beloved .
text2: Ai kodia mothol ande Vorba le Devleske ando Hosea , " Kodola kai nas anda murho narodo , akharava le murho narodo ; ai o them kai nas mange drago , avela mange kodo them drago .

text: And it shall come to pass , that in the place where it was said unto them , Ye are not my people ; there shall they be called the children of the living God .
text2: Ai kotse kai mothonas lenge ' Ke nai murho narodo , ' avena akharde shave le Devleske kai si zhuvindo . "

text: Esaias also crieth concerning Israel , Though the number of the children of Israel be as the sand of the sea , a remnant shall be saved :
text2: O Isaiah mothol pai Israel , " Kana sa o narodo le shave le Israelonge avena sar e chishai la mariaki , ferdi xantsi avena skepime .

text: For he will finish the work , and cut it short in righteousness : because a short work will the Lord make upon the earth .
text2: Ke O Del kerela so godi phendia ai sigo peski vorba pe phuv . "

text: And as Esaias said before , Except the Lord of Sabaoth had left us a seed , we had been as Sodoma , and been made like unto Gomorrha .
text2: Ai sar phendiasas o Esais mai anglal , te na meklino amenge O Del xantsi anda amari vitsa , iame aviliamas sar o Sodom sas te miazovas po Gormorrha .

text: What shall we say then ? That the Gentiles , which followed not after righteousness , have attained to righteousness , even the righteousness which is of faith .
text2: Apo so te mothas andal manush ? Kai nai Zhiduvuria , ai kai chi roden te aven vorta angla Del , kerdile vorta angla Del katar pengo pachamos .

text: But Israel , which followed after the law of righteousness , hath not attained to the law of righteousness .
text2: Numa le Zhiduvuria , kai rodenas iek zakono te kerel anda lende te aven vorta angla Del , chi aresle te arakhen kasavestar zakono .

text: Wherefore ? Because they sought it not by faith , but as it were by the works of the law . For they stumbled at that stumblingstone ;
text2: Sostar ? Ke chi rodenas te aven vorta angla Del anda pachamos , numa gindinas ke sai aven vorta angla Del penga buchasa , pele pa bax kai peravel ,

text: As it is written , Behold , I lay in Sion a stumblingstone and rock of offence : and whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed .
text2: Kai E Vorba le Devleski mothol pa leste , " Dikhen , tsav ando Zion iek bax kai kerela le manush te peraven , iek bax kai kerel le te peraven ; numa kodo kai pachalpe ande leste chi avela leske lazhav .

text: Brethren , my heart ' s desire and prayer to God for Israel is , that they might be saved .
text2: Murhe phral , mange drago sa murhe ilesa , ai so mangav katar O Del le Zhidovonge si te aven skepime .

text: For I bear them record that they have a zeal of God , but not according to knowledge .
text2: Ke sai mothav pa lende ke sa penge ilesa mangen te keren buchi le Devleske , numa bi gojako .

text: For they being ignorant of God ' s righteousness , and going about to establish their own righteousness , have not submitted themselves unto the righteousness of God .
text2: Ke chi haliarde sar O Del kerel le manushen te aven vorta angla leste , ai won rode te keren pengo zakono te aven vorta , ai kadia chi manglia te keren sar O Del kerel andal manush vorta .

text: For Christ is the end of the law for righteousness to every one that believeth .
text2: Ke o Kristosi kai getolpe o zakono te kerel te aven vorta angla Del kodola kai pachanpe .

text: For Moses describeth the righteousness which is of the law , That the man which doeth those things shall live by them .
text2: Eta so o Moses ramosardia pa sar sai te aves vorta angla Del trobul te les tu pala zokono , o manush kai lela pe pala zakono traiila katar kodo zakono .

text: But the righteousness which is of faith speaketh on this wise , Say not in thine heart , Who shall ascend into heaven ? ( that is , to bring Christ down from above : )
text2: Numa eta , sar si phendo te sai aves vorta angla Del pala pachamos : na phen ande cho ilo , kon zhala ando rhaio ?

text: Or , Who shall descend into the deep ? ( that is , to bring up Christ again from the dead . )
text2: Kodia si te keres te hulel o Kristo . Ai chi na phen , kon zhala ande iado ? Kodia si te keres te avel o Kristo palpale katar le mule .

text: But what saith it ? The word is nigh thee , even in thy mouth , and in thy heart : that is , the word of faith , which we preach ;
text2: So mothol kacha ? E vorba pashe tute la ande cho mui , ai ande cho ilo :

text: That if thou shalt confess with thy mouth the Lord Jesus , and shalt believe in thine heart that God hath raised him from the dead , thou shalt be saved .
text2: kodia vorba si e viasta le pachamoski kai phenas , anda cho mui mothos angla savorhenge ke O Jesus si O Del , ai te pachasa tu ande cho ilo ke O Del andia les katar e martia ka traio , avesa skipime .

text: For with the heart man believeth unto righteousness ; and with the mouth confession is made unto salvation .
text2: Ke o manush pachalpe ande pesko ilo , ai O Del kerel les te avel vorta angla leste ; o manush mothol peske muiesa , ai O Del skepil les .

text: For the scripture saith , Whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed .
text2: Ke E Vorba le Devleski mothol , kon godi pachalape ando Del chi avela leske lazhav .

text: For there is no difference between the Jew and the Greek : for the same Lord over all is rich unto all that call upon him .
text2: Le Zhiduvuria ai kodola kai Nai Zhiduvuria saikfialo le , savorhe si le iek Del kai del pesko mishtimos ka sa kodola kai akharen les .

text: For whosoever shall call upon the name of the Lord shall be saved .
text2: Kon godi kai akharel po anav le Devlesko avela skepime .

text: How then shall they call on him in whom they have not believed ? and how shall they believe in him of whom they have not heard ? and how shall they hear without a preacher ?
text2: Numa sar te akharena pe kodo kai chi pachaiepe ande leste ? Ai sar te pachanpe ande kodo kai chi ashunde pa leste ? Ai sar te ashunen pa leste kana nai khonik te mothol pa leste ?

text: And how shall they preach , except they be sent ? as it is written , How beautiful are the feet of them that preach the gospel of peace , and bring glad tidings of good things !
text2: Ai sar te avel manush kai den duma pa Del , te na avena tradine ? Che shukar le punrhe kodolenge kai mothon pai pacha , ai kodola kai anen e lashi viasta !

text: But they have not all obeyed the gospel . For Esaias saith , Lord , who hath believed our report ?
text2: Numa chi linepe savorhe palai lashi viasta . o Esaiah mothol , " Devla , kon pachaiepe kana diam duma pa tute ? "

text: So then faith cometh by hearing , and hearing by the word of God .
text2: No antunchi o pachamos avel katar so ashunes , ai so ashunes avel katar E Vorba le Devleske .

text: But I say , Have they not heard ? Yes verily , their sound went into all the earth , and their words unto the ends of the world .
text2: Numa me mothav , pate zhi ashunde e lashi viasta ? E , ashunde la , lenge vorba ashundili pe sa e lumia .

text: But I say , Did not Israel know ? First Moses saith , I will provoke you to jealousy by them that are no people , and by a foolish nation I will anger you .
text2: Numa me mothav , pate le Zhiduvuria chi zhanenas ? o Moses o pervo phendia , kerava te avel tume xoli pe kodola kai nai chacho them , kerava te xolavon pek them kai nai gojaver .

text: But Esaias is very bold , and saith , I was found of them that sought me not ; I was made manifest unto them that asked not after me .
text2: O Esaiah tromal te mothol mai but , " Arakhlema kodola kai chi rodenas ma ; sikadilem kodolenge kai chi mangenas mandar kanchi .

text: But to Israel he saith , All day long I have stretched forth my hands unto a disobedient and gainsaying people .
text2: Numa le Zhidovonge mothol , sorho dies vazdem le vas karing iek narodo kai chi pachal o mui ai kai chi mangen .

text: I say then , Hath God cast away his people ? God forbid . For I also am an Israelite , of the seed of Abraham , of the tribe of Benjamin .
text2: Phushav tumen , O Del dia rigate peske narodos ? Nichi , ke I me sim zhidovo andai vitsa le Abrahamoski , andal Benjamin .

text: God hath not cast away his people which he foreknew . Wot ye not what the scripture saith of Elias ? how he maketh intercession to God against Israel , saying ,
text2: O Del chi dia vov si rigate peske narodos kai zhanelas len mai anglal , pate chi zhanen so mothol E Vorba le Devleski pa Elijah ? o Elijah mothol le Devleske ke le Zhiduvuria chi keren mishto . Phenelas ,

text: Lord , they have killed thy prophets , and digged down thine altars ; and I am left alone , and they seek my life .
text2: " Devla , mudarde le profeton , ai perade che altaria ; me ashilem korkorho , ai roden te mudaren vi man . "

text: But what saith the answer of God unto him ? I have reserved to myself seven thousand men , who have not bowed the knee to the image of Baal .
text2: Ai so phendia leske O Del , " Garadem mange efta mi zhene kai chi dine changa angla o xoxamlo del o Baal . "

text: Even so then at this present time also there is a remnant according to the election of grace .
text2: Ai vi akana mai si xantsi narodo kai O Del alosardia len pala pesko lashimos .

text: And if by grace , then is it no more of works : otherwise grace is no more grace . But if it be of works , then is it no more grace : otherwise work is no more work .
text2: Alosardia le pala pesko lashimos , na ke won keren vari so mishto ; ke antunchi o lashimos le Devlesko nas te avel chacho lashimos .

text: What then ? Israel hath not obtained that which he seeketh for ; but the election hath obtained it , and the rest were blinded
text2: So te mothas ? So rodenas le Zhiduvuria chi line , ferdi kodolen kai alosardia O Del line so rodenas , le kolaver lengo ilo zurailo sas ,

text: ( According as it is written , God hath given them the spirit of slumber , eyes that they should not see , and ears that they should not hear ; ) unto this day .
text2: Sar si ramome ande Vorbe le Devleski , O Del kerdia te sovel lenge goji , ai kerdia te na dikhen penge iakhensa , ai te na ashunen penge khanensa , zhi adies .

text: And David saith , Let their table be made a snare , and a trap , and a stumbling block , and a recompence unto them :
text2: O David mai mothol , " Lengi skafidi te avel lenge duzhmano , ai te peren , ai te pochinen o baio kai kerde .

text: Let their eyes be darkened , that they may not see , and bow down their back alway .
text2: Lenge iakha te phandadion ai te na mai dikhen , ai ker te aven sagda lenge zea bange .

text: I say then , Have they stumbled that they should fall ? God forbid : but rather through their fall salvation is come unto the Gentiles , for to provoke them to jealousy .
text2: Phushav , kana le Zhiduvuria pele , pele ai nashti mai vazden pe ? Nichi , numa pala penge shipki , o kolaver narodo sai lia o skepimos , ai sai sikipin le Zhidovon .

text: Now if the fall of them be the riches of the world , and the diminishing of them the riches of the Gentiles ; how much more their fulness ?
text2: Te sas ke palai shipka le Zhidovongi . E lumia lia barvalimos ando Del , ai kai sas won mekle tele o kolaver narodo barvalo ando Del . Sode mai but avela kana dena pa savorhe ka Del ?

text: For I speak to you Gentiles , inasmuch as I am the apostle of the Gentiles , I magnify mine office :
text2: Me mothav tumenge ke chi san Zhiduvuria , me sim e sluga kai sas shinadi le narodoski kai Nai Zhiduvuria , ai kai sim kadia raduime sim anda kadia buchi kai sima .

text: If by any means I may provoke to emulation them which are my flesh , and might save some of them .
text2: Ai te sai xoliarav te dashtiva murhe narodos kai si zhaluzo , ai te skepiv unen .

text: For if the casting away of them be the reconciling of the world , what shall the receiving of them be , but life from the dead ?
text2: E , kana sas thodine rigate e lumia kadia lashardili le Devlesa . So kerdiola kana lela le O Del pasha peste ? Antunchi avela o traio kodolenge kai sas mule .

text: For if the firstfruit be holy , the lump is also holy : and if the root be holy , so are the branches .
text2: Te si o pervo kotor le manrhesko andino angla Del , sa manrho antrego lesko si ; te si le vuni la krenzhaki dine le Devleske , vi le krenzhi si leske .

text: And if some of the branches be broken off , and thou , being a wild olive tree , wert graffed in among them , and with them partakest of the root and fatness of the olive tree ;
text2: Le Zhiduvuria si sar iek khash maslenengo kai si lasharde , ai kai uni krenzhi sas shinde , tu kai chi san Zhidovo , tu san sar iek krenzha maslenengi chorhi thodino ando lengo than , ai tu akana les andai vuna kai pravarel le maslenen kai si lasharde .

text: Boast not against the branches . But if thou boast , thou bearest not the root , but the root thee .
text2: Anda kodia c hi trobul te avel tuke gratsia le krenzhi kai sas shinde . Sar te keres barimata ? Ke chi san tu kai ingeres le vunen - numa le vuni ingeren tut .

text: Thou wilt say then , The branches were broken off , that I might be graffed in .
text2: Amborim mothos mange , " Ke kodola krenzhi shinde sas katar o khash te avav me astardo ande lengo than . "

text: Well ; because of unbelief they were broken off , and thou standest by faith . Be not highminded , but fear :
text2: E vorta , shinde sas kodola krenzhi katar o khash ke nas le dosta pachamos , ai tu san akana ande lengo than ke tu pachas tu . Numa arakh tu katar le barimata ai arakh tu .

text: For if God spared not the natural branches , take heed lest he also spare not thee .
text2: Ke te nas defial lasho O Del le Zhidovonsa kai si krenzhi lashe , chi tusa chi avela lasho .

text: Behold therefore the goodness and severity of God : on them which fell , severity ; but toward thee , goodness , if thou continue in his goodness : otherwise thou also shalt be cut off .
text2: Le sama sar O Del sikavel pesko lashimos ai peske xoli , xoliariko lo pe kodola kai durile lestar , ai lasho lo tusa , numa trobul te beshes ande lesko lashimos ; te na nichi , vi tu avesa shinado sar iek krenzha .

text: And they also , if they abide not still in unbelief , shall be graffed in : for God is able to graff them in again .
text2: Ai te mangena le Zhiduvuria te boldenpe karing mande , ai te pachanpe , aven astarde kotse kai sas astarde mai anglal , ke O Del si les e putiera te astarel le palpale .

text: For if thou wert cut out of the olive tree which is wild by nature , and wert graffed contrary to nature into a good olive tree : how much more shall these , which be the natural branches , be graffed into their own olive tree ?
text2: Tu kai chi san Zhidovo , tu san ferdi iek krenzha ieke khashteske maslenengo chorho shinde la , ai astarde la kai chi trobulas pe iek khash maslenengo lashardo le Zhiduvuria , won si le krenzhi le chache kodole khashtesko maslenengo kai si lashardo , No avela but mai lioxo te astaras le pale po khash kai sas vunzhe mai anglal .

text: For I would not , brethren , that ye should be ignorant of this mystery , lest ye should be wise in your own conceits ; that blindness in part is happened to Israel , until the fulness of the Gentiles be come in .
text2: Murhe phral , eta iek chachimos garado kai mangav te mothav tumenge . Saxke te na gindin ke gojaver san , uni andal Zhiduvuria nashtin te haliaren , numa kodia chi avela sagda , numa zhi kai le kolaver thema aven skepime .

text: And so all Israel shall be saved : as it is written , There shall come out of Sion the Deliverer , and shall turn away ungodliness from Jacob :
text2: Ai eta , sa le Zhiduvuria avena skepime . Sar mothol Vorba le Devleske , " O skepitori avela anda Zion , ankalavela so godi si chorho andai vitsa le Iakovoske .

text: For this is my covenant unto them , when I shall take away their sins .
text2: Ai eta , so kerela lensa , kana lava le bezexa pa lende . "

text: As concerning the gospel , they are enemies for your sakes : but as touching the election , they are beloved for the fathers ' sakes .
text2: Te dikhasa sar le Zhiduvuria chi mangle e lashi viasta , won si le duzhmaia le Devleske pe tumaro lashimos . Numa te dikhasa o alomos kai sas kerdo katar O Del , won si kodola kai O Del mangel pala lenge dada .

text: For the gifts and calling of God are without repentance .
text2: Ke O Del chi lel palpale so dia , ai chi parhuvel pesko gindo karing kodola kai akhardia le .

text: For as ye in times past have not believed God , yet have now obtained mercy through their unbelief :
text2: Mai anglal chi pachaian o mui le Devlesko , numa akana lian o lashimos le Devlesko ke le Zhiduvuria chi pachaie lesko mui .

text: Even so have these also now not believed , that through your mercy they also may obtain mercy .
text2: Ai vi chi pachaie le Devlesko mui , akana saxke o lashimos le Devlesko avel tumen dino , numa saxke vi won sai zhanen akana kodo lashimos .

text: For God hath concluded them all in unbelief , that he might have mercy upon all .
text2: Ke O Del kerdia anda sako manush te avel phanglo ai te na pachal o mui , saxke te sikavel savorhenge pesko lashimos .

text: O the depth of the riches both of the wisdom and knowledge of God ! how unsearchable are his judgments , and his ways past finding out !
text2: Che baro lo o barvalimos le Devlesko , ai che bari leski goji ai sode zhanel , kon sai mothol so mangel te kerel O Del ?

text: For who hath known the mind of the Lord ? or who hath been his counseller ?
text2: Kon sai haliarela so mangel te kerel ? " Kon zhanel o gindo le Devlesko ?

text: Or who hath first given to him , and it shall be recompensed unto him again ?
text2: Kon sai mothol leske so te kerel ? Kon sas o pervo kai dia les vari so , ai porme te avel pochindo lestar ? "

text: For of him , and through him , and to him , are all things : to whom be glory for ever . Amen .
text2: Ke swako fialo avel katar O Del , swako fialo si pala leste , ai leske , ka Del te avel sa o barimos ande swako vriama ! Amen .

text: I beseech you therefore , brethren , by the mercies of God , that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice , holy , acceptable unto God , which is your reasonable service .
text2: Murhe phral , O Del sikadia peske lashimos karing amende , mangav tumendar te den tumar stato sar manush shinade le Devleske , vuzhe ai vorta angla Del , ke kodia si e buchi e vorta kai trobul te keren le Devleske .

text: And be not conformed to this world : but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind , that ye may prove what is that good , and acceptable , and perfect , will of God .
text2: Na len tume pala traio kadala lumiako , numa meken le Devles te parhuvel tumen sa vi tumari goji , ai antunchi sai haliarena so O Del mangel - so si malades , so si leske drago , ai so si vorta .

text: For I say , through the grace given unto me , to every man that is among you , not to think of himself more highly than he ought to think ; but to think soberly , according as God hath dealt to every man the measure of faith .
text2: Palai podarka kai O Del dia ma ande pesko lashimos , phenav tumenge savorhenge : na gindin pa tumende ke san mai but ke so san . Numa te avel tume ginduria lashe , swako anda tumende te haliarel pe ke nai mai but ke ferdi pala pachamos kai O Del dia les .

text: For as we have many members in one body , and all members have not the same office :
text2: Ande iek stato manushesko si ame but kotora kai swako kerel aver buchi .

text: So we , being many , are one body in Christ , and every one members one of another .
text2: Ai sakadia , o but kai sam , savorhe andek than keras iek stato chidine le Kristosa , ai sam savorhe chidine iek kavresa ke sar le kotora ieke statoske .

text: Having then gifts differing according to the grace that is given to us , whether prophecy , let us prophesy according to the proportion of faith ;
text2: Swakones sas ame dine na saikfielo podarki kai trobul te keras lensa buchi sar O Del dia ivia sakones . Te si iekes anda amende e podarka te mothol E Vorba le Devleski kai sas les dino katar O Del , trobul te kerel kodia buchi pala pachamos kai si les ;

text: Or ministry , let us wait on our ministering : or he that teacheth , on teaching ;
text2: Te sas avres dini e podarka te podail , mek te podail ; kodo kai sas les dini e podarka te sicharel , trobul te sicharel ;

text: Or he that exhorteth , on exhortation : he that giveth , let him do it with simplicity ; he that ruleth , with diligence ; he that sheweth mercy , with cheerfulness .
text2: Kodoles kai sas les dini e podarka te zhutin , trobul te phen le vorbi kai zhutin vai pechin ; kodo kai del pesko mishtimos , te del sa peske ilesa ; kodo kai sikavel o drom trobul , te kerel vorta kodia buchi , kodo kai zhutil le choren te keren kodia sa peske ilesa ;

text: Let love be without dissimulation . Abhor that which is evil ; cleave to that which is good .
text2: E dragostia trobul te avel andai ilo . Te avel tumenge gratsia o nasulimos , ai astardion ka lashimos .

text: Be kindly affectioned one to another with brotherly love ; in honour preferring one another ;
text2: Te aven drago iek kavreske sar phral kai si drago iek kavreske ; ai lazhan iek kavrestar ;

text: Not slothful in business ; fervent in spirit ; serving the Lord ;
text2: Keren buchi ilesa ai te na aven kandine ; podain le Devles sa tumare ilesa ;

text: Rejoicing in hope ; patient in tribulation ; continuing instant in prayer ;
text2: Aven raduime ke zhanen ande soste pachan tume ; kana avel o baio pe tumende , rhevdin ; rhugin tume sagda ;

text: Distributing to the necessity of saints ; given to hospitality .
text2: zhutin tumare phral kai trobul le zhutimos ; ai premin mishto kodolen kai aven tumende .

text: Bless them which persecute you : bless , and curse not .
text2: Swuntson kodolen kai chinuin tume : swuntson ai na te del le armaia .

text: Rejoice with them that do rejoice , and weep with them that weep .
text2: Raduin tume kodolensa kai raduin pe , ai roven kodolensa kai roven .

text: Be of the same mind one toward another . Mind not high things , but condescend to men of low estate . Be not wise in your own conceits .
text2: Traiin ai malaven pala iek kavreste . Na aven barimatange , numa keren le bucha kai nai barimata anda lende , ai na gindin tume gojaver .

text: Recompense to no man evil for evil . Provide things honest in the sight of all men .
text2: Te kerdia tumenge vari kon nasulimos na keren vi tume leske . Roden ta keren o lashimos angla sa le manush .

text: If it be possible , as much as lieth in you , live peaceably with all men .
text2: Keren so godi dashtin , ai kodia si pala tumende , te traiin ande pacha sa le manushensa .

text: Dearly beloved , avenge not yourselves , but rather give place unto wrath : for it is written , Vengeance is mine ; I will repay , saith the Lord .
text2: Murhe phral , le shave le Devleske , te kerdia tumenge vari kon nasulimos na keren vi tume palpale , numa meken e xoli le Devleski te kerel kodia . Ke si ramome , " Me kerava nasulimos kodoleske kai kerdia nasulimos karing mande . Me pochinava palpale mothol O Del . "

text: Therefore if thine enemy hunger , feed him ; if he thirst , give him drink : for in so doing thou shalt heap coals of fire on his head .
text2: Te avela cho duzhmano bokhalo , del les te xal ; te avela trushalo , del les te pel ; ke te keresa kadia , kodia si sar te chidianas angara phabarde pe lesko shero .

text: Be not overcome of evil , but overcome evil with good .
text2: Na mek o nasulimos te niril tut ; numa tu nirisar o nasulimos le lashimasa .

text: Let every soul be subject unto the higher powers . For there is no power but of God : the powers that be are ordained of God .
text2: Swako manush trobul te lelpe palai kris kai si ando them . Ke nai chi iek zakono kai chi avel katar O Del , ai le zakonuria kai si pe phuv O Del meklia le .

text: Whosoever therefore resisteth the power , resisteth the ordinance of God : and they that resist shall receive to themselves damnation .
text2: Kon godi chi mangel te lelpe pala zakono chi lelpe pala zakono kai meklia O Del : ai kodola kai chi lenpe pala zakono anena e kris pe pende .

text: For rulers are not a terror to good works , but to the evil . Wilt thou then not be afraid of the power ? do that which is good , and thou shalt have praise of the same :
text2: Chi trobul te daral pe katar le bare kai poronchin kana le manush keren mishto , numa katar kodola kai keren o nasulimos . Manges te na daras katar o zhandari ? Apo , antunchi ker o mishtimos , ai mothona mishtimos pa tute .

text: For he is the minister of God to thee for good . But if thou do that which is evil , be afraid ; for he beareth not the sword in vain : for he is the minister of God , a revenger to execute wrath upon him that doeth evil .
text2: Ke wo kerel buchi le Devleski te kerel tu te keres o mishtimos . Numa te keresa o nasulimos , trobul te daras ; ke nai intaino kai si les e putiera te kerel tu te pochines o nasulimos kai kerdian : ke wo kerel buchi le Devleske te sikavel e xoli le Devleski kana kerel te pochinel kodo kai kerdia o nasulimos .

text: Wherefore ye must needs be subject , not only for wrath , but also for conscience sake .
text2: Anda kodia trobul te les tu pala zakono le barenge ande cho them , na ferdi te na avel e xoli le Devleske pe tute , numa ke chi goji trobul te kerel kadia .

text: For for this cause pay ye tribute also : for they are God ' s ministers , attending continually upon this very thing .
text2: Anda kodia tume pochinen taksa , ke le manush kai chiden le love keren buchi le Devleske te keren vorta kodia buchi .

text: Render therefore to all their dues : tribute to whom tribute is due ; custom to whom custom ; fear to whom fear ; honour to whom honour .
text2: Pochinen savorhenge so kamen lenge , pochinen so kamen kodolenge so trobul te pochinen , ai pochinen le love pe tumari phuv kodoleske kai trobul te avel pochindo , sikaven ke lazhan katar kodo kai kamen leske , ai keren vorta kodolesa kai trobul te keren vorta .

text: Owe no man any thing , but to love one another : for he that loveth another hath fulfilled the law .
text2: Na kamen love kanikaske , de ferdi te aven drago iek kavreske . Ke kodo kai si leske drago le kolaver , kodo kerdia o zakono .

text: For this , Thou shalt not commit adultery , Thou shalt not kill , Thou shalt not steal , Thou shalt not bear false witness , Thou shalt not covet ; and if there be any other commandment , it is briefly comprehended in this saying , namely , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Ke o zakono si , " Te na keres kurvia ; te na mudares ; te na chores ; ai na pupuin , ai na mang so si avresko " Kadia diela ai le kolaver si sa iek zakono , " Te avel tuke drago cho vortako sar san tu drago tuke . "

text: Love worketh no ill to his neighbour : therefore love is the fulfilling of the law .
text2: E dragostia chi kerel vov si nasulimos le vortakoske . Kana si amenge drago le kolaver kadia si kai keras sa o zakono .

text: And that , knowing the time , that now it is high time to awake out of sleep : for now is our salvation nearer than when we believed .
text2: No keren kadia ke zhanen ande che vriama sam , avili e vriama te pominin tume anda tumaro sovimos . Ke o skepimos mai pasha amende lo akana de sar kana pachaiam ame e pervo data .

text: The night is far spent , the day is at hand : let us therefore cast off the works of darkness , and let us put on the armour of light .
text2: E riat pashte nakhli , o dies si te phuterdiol . Mek te shudas pa amende le dieli kai keren o tuniariko , ai las pe amende le dieli le vediarike .

text: Let us walk honestly , as in the day ; not in rioting and drunkenness , not in chambering and wantonness , not in strife and envying .
text2: Phiras vorta , sar trobul ande vediara le dieseski ; arakhas ame katar le chingara ai katar o pimos , ai katar le dieli le bi vuzhe ai katar e kurvia , na maras ame ai te na aven zhaluzuria vai te na mangen so si avres .

text: But put ye on the Lord Jesus Christ , and make not provision for the flesh , to fulfil the lusts thereof .
text2: Numa len pe tumende o nevo traio kai si ando Jesus Kristo O Del , ai na mai len tume pala tumaro stato , te keren so wo mangel .

text: Him that is weak in the faith receive ye , but not to doubtful disputations .
text2: Len tumensa kodoles kai nai les baro pachamos , ai na xan tume lesa pe so gindil wo .

text: For one believeth that he may eat all things : another , who is weak , eateth herbs .
text2: Iek manush gindil ke sai xal swako fielo , ai aver manush , kai nai les baro pachamos , xal ferdi legumi .

text: Let not him that eateth despise him that eateth not ; and let not him which eateth not judge him that eateth : for God hath received him .
text2: Kodo kai xal anda swako fielo te na xoliavol pe kodo kai chi xal uni dieli ; ai kodo kai chi xal uni dieli chi trobul te dosharel kodoles kai xal swako fielo ; ke O Del lia les peste .

text: Who art thou that judgest another man ' s servant ? to his own master he standeth or falleth . Yea , he shall be holden up : for God is able to make him stand .
text2: Kon san tu te doshares avreska sluga ? Te kerela peski buchi vorta vai nichi . Kodia zhanela lesko gazda so kerela lesa . Numa beshela vorta , ke O Del si les e putiera te del les zor .

text: One man esteemeth one day above another : another esteemeth every day alike . Let every man be fully persuaded in his own mind .
text2: Uni gindin ke uni dies mai bare le sar aver dies , numa uni gindin ke sa le dies iek fielo le . Swako trobul te pachalpe zurales ande so gindil .

text: He that regardeth the day , regardeth it unto the Lord ; and he that regardeth not the day , to the Lord he doth not regard it . He that eateth , eateth to the Lord , for he giveth God thanks ; and he that eateth not , to the Lord he eateth not , and giveth God thanks .
text2: Kodo kai si leske bari diela o dies , kerel kodia te luvudil le Devles ; kodo kai xal swako fielo kerel kodia te luvudil le Devles , ke naisil le Devles anda pesko xabe . Kodo kai chi xal anda swako fielo kerel kodia te luvudil le Devles , ai naisil le Devles .

text: For none of us liveth to himself , and no man dieth to himself .
text2: Swako anda amende traiil peske , ai khonik chi merel peske ; Te traiisaras , traiisaras le Devleske , ai te merasa , meras le Devleske . No te traiisarasa vai te merasa , sa ame Devleske sam .

text: For to this end Christ both died , and rose , and revived , that he might be Lord both of the dead and living .
text2: Ke o Kristo mulo ai avilo palpale ka traio te avel O Del le mulengo ai zhuvindengo .

text: But why dost thou judge thy brother ? or why dost thou set at nought thy brother ? for we shall all stand before the judgment seat of Christ .
text2: Numa tu - Sostar doshares che phrales ? Ai tu - gratsia tuke cho phral ? Ke savorhe avasa angla Del , te kerel kris pe amende wo .

text: For it is written , As I live , saith the Lord , every knee shall bow to me , and every tongue shall confess to God .
text2: Ke si ramome ande Vorba le Devleski , " Chaches traiiv , mothol O Del , ai swako manush dela changa angla mande , ai swako manush phenela ke me sim O Del . "

text: So then every one of us shall give account of himself to God .
text2: No swako anda amende trboula te avel angla Del ai te mothol pa peste .

text: Let us not therefore judge one another any more : but judge this rather , that no man put a stumblingblock or an occasion to fall in his brother ' s way .
text2: Na mai dosharas iek kavres ; ai mai bini den tume goji , te nai keren so nai vorta kai sai rimol tumare phrales , ai te perel ando bezex .

text: I know , and am persuaded by the Lord Jesus , that there is nothing unclean of itself : but to him that esteemeth any thing to be unclean , to him it is unclean .
text2: Me zhanav , ai pachav ke kadia si katar O Del O Jesus , ke kanchi nai bi vuzho wo korkorho , numa te gindila vari kon ke iek diela bi vuzhi la , kodia diela kerdiol bi vuzhi leske .

text: But if thy brother be grieved with thy meat , now walkest thou not charitably . Destroy not him with thy meat , for whom Christ died .
text2: Te nekezhisas chi phrales pala iek diela kai xas , antunchi chi mai phires ande dragostia , na xasar kodoles kai o Kristo mulo pala leste , pala xaben kai xas !

text: Let not then your good be evil spoken of :
text2: So si tumenge lasho chi trobul kodia diela avrenge te mothon nasulimos pa late .

text: For the kingdom of God is not meat and drink ; but righteousness , and peace , and joy in the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ke o rhaio le Devlesko nai o xaben ai o pimos ; numa so si vorta , ai e pacha , ai o raduimos kai del o Swunto Duxo .

text: For he that in these things serveth Christ is acceptable to God , and approved of men .
text2: Kodo kai kerel buchi le Kristoske kadia drago lo le Devleske , ai le manush mothon leske kai vorta kerel .

text: Let us therefore follow after the things which make for peace , and things wherewith one may edify another .
text2: Rodas le dieli kai anen e pacha , ai so zuralel ame savorhen ando pachamos .

text: For meat destroy not the work of God . All things indeed are pure ; but it is evil for that man who eateth with offence .
text2: Na rimosar e buchi le Devleski pala xaben . Ke sa le xabenata sai xanpe , numa nai mishto te xas vari so kai kerel che phrales te perel ando bezez .

text: It is good neither to eat flesh , nor to drink wine , nor any thing whereby thy brother stumbleth , or is offended , or is made weak .
text2: So si mishto si te na xas mas , ai te na pes mol , ai mekes kadala dieli , te sai rimolpe cho phral pala lende , vai te kovliarel les . Si tu pachamos ?

text: Hast thou faith ? have it to thyself before God . Happy is he that condemneth not himself in that thing which he alloweth .
text2: So haliares tu korkorho pa kodia diela garav tuke ai angla Del . Raduime lo kodo kai chi haliarel pe doshalo kana mangel te kerel iek diela !

text: And he that doubteth is damned if he eat , because he eateth not of faith : for whatsoever is not of faith is sin .
text2: Numa kodo kai chi zhanel te si vorta vai nichi te xal iek diela , doshalo lo katar O Del te xala . Ke chi kerel kodia diela peske pachamasa . Ai so godi diela kai keres kai chi avel katar o pachamos bezex si .

text: We then that are strong ought to bear the infirmities of the weak , and not to please ourselves .
text2: Ame kai sam zurale ando pachamos trobul te zhutisaras kodolen kai nai zurale ando pachamos , ai te zhutisaras le kana si kovle . Ai te na rodas so plachal ame .

text: Let every one of us please his neighbour for his good to edification .
text2: Trobul swako anda amende te rodel te avel drago peske vortakoske , pe lesko mishtimos ai te bariol ando pachamos .

text: For even Christ pleased not himself ; but , as it is written , The reproaches of them that reproached thee fell on me .
text2: Ke O Kristo chi rodelas kon plachal les numa sar mothol E Vorba le Devleski , " Le dieli le chorhe kodolenge kai marenas mui lestar pele pe leste . "

text: For whatsoever things were written aforetime were written for our learning , that we through patience and comfort of the scriptures might have hope .
text2: So godi sas ramome mai anglal si te sicharel amen te avel ame e rhavda , ai zor kai del E Vorba le Devleske te sai avel ame ando ilo kodo pachamos te azhukeras .

text: Now the God of patience and consolation grant you to be likeminded one toward another according to Christ Jesus :
text2: O Del kai lestar avel e rhavda ai e zor , kerel te sai traiin andek than iek kavresa sar sas o Kristo Jesus .

text: That ye may with one mind and one mouth glorify God , even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Saxke savorhe andek than , ai ande iek glaso luvudin le Devles , o Dat amare Devlesko O Jesus Kristo .

text: Wherefore receive ye one another , as Christ also received us to the glory of God .
text2: Premin iek kavres , sar o Kristo premisardia tumen ando barimos le Devlesko .

text: Now I say that Jesus Christ was a minister of the circumcision for the truth of God , to confirm the promises made unto the fathers :
text2: Akana phenav tumenge ke o Kristo kerdilo e sluga le Zhidovongi te kerel le shinaimata kai O Del kerdia lenge dadange , ai te sikavel ke O Del kerel so mothol ,

text: And that the Gentiles might glorify God for his mercy ; as it is written , For this cause I will confess to thee among the Gentiles , and sing unto thy name .
text2: Avilo saxke vi kodola kai Nai Zhiduvuria luvudin le Devles pala pesko lashimos . E Vorba le Devleske mothol , " Anda kodia luvudiva tu mashkar le thema , ai jilabava ande cho anav . "

text: And again he saith , Rejoice , ye Gentiles , with his people .
text2: Ai mai mothol E Vorba le Devleske , " Tume kai Nai Zhiduvuria , raduin tume leske narodosa , kai O Del alosardia ! "

text: And again , Praise the Lord , all ye Gentiles ; and laud him , all ye people .
text2: Ai mai mothol , " Naisin le Devleske ai luvudin le Devles , tume kai chi san Zhidovon , ai sa o narodo te luvudil le Devles ! "

text: And again , Esaias saith , There shall be a root of Jesse , and he that shall rise to reign over the Gentiles ; in him shall the Gentiles trust .
text2: Ai o Isaiah mai mothol , " O shav le Jessesko avela ; ai tholape te poronchil pel Nai Zhiduvuria , ai le Nai Zhiduvuria pachanape ande leste . "

text: Now the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing , that ye may abound in hope , through the power of the Holy Ghost .
text2: O Del kai del e rhavda , te pherel tume raduimos ai pacha vorta ando pachamos kai si tume ande leste , saxke te aven barvale ande rhavda katar e putiera le Swuntone Duxoski .

text: And I myself also am persuaded of you , my brethren , that ye also are full of goodness , filled with all knowledge , able also to admonish one another .
text2: Murhe phral : zhanav ke pherdo lashimos san , pherdo zhanglimos san , ai sai sicharen iek kavres .

text: Nevertheless , brethren , I have written the more boldly unto you in some sort , as putting you in mind , because of the grace that is given to me of God ,
text2: Numa tromailem te ramov tumenge ai ande murho lil ande but thana , ramosardem tumenge te seren tume so vunzhe sichilian . Ramosardem tumenge kadia pala lashimos kai dia ma O Del .

text: That I should be the minister of Jesus Christ to the Gentiles , ministering the gospel of God , that the offering up of the Gentiles might be acceptable , being sanctified by the Holy Ghost .
text2: Te avav ek pasturi le Kristosko le narodoske kai Nai Zhiduvuria , ai kadia kerav iek buchi swunto kai angerav e lashi viasta le Devleski , saxke kodola manush kai Nai Zhiduvuria aven lashe le Devleske , ai sai aven leske katar o Swunto Duxo .

text: I have therefore whereof I may glory through Jesus Christ in those things which pertain to God .
text2: Andek than le Kristosa sai luvudiv ma ande buchi kai kerav le Devleske .

text: For I will not dare to speak of any of those things which Christ hath not wrought by me , to make the Gentiles obedient , by word and deed ,
text2: Ke chi tromailemas te mothav chi iek diela kai o Kristo chi kerdia mansa , te anav kodolen kai Nai Zhiduvuria te pachanpe ando Del , numa peska vorbasa ai so kerdia .

text: Through mighty signs and wonders , by the power of the Spirit of God ; so that from Jerusalem , and round about unto Illyricum , I have fully preached the gospel of Christ .
text2: Palai putiera le semnongi ai le miraklongi , ai katar e putiera le Swuntone Duxoski , o Duxo le Devlesko ; kadia de andai Jerusalem , ai le thema kai sas pashe zhi ande Illiricum , phendem e lashi viasta le Kristoski .

text: Yea , so have I strived to preach the gospel , not where Christ was named , lest I should build upon another man ' s foundation :
text2: Drago sas mange te mothav e viasta le Kristoski , kotse kai chi ashunde pa Kristo , saxke te na kerav khangeri kotse kai kerdia aver .

text: But as it is written , To whom he was not spoken of , they shall see : and they that have not heard shall understand .
text2: Sar ramol E Vorba le Devleske , " Kodolenge kai chi phende pa Kristo , dikhena , ai kodola kai chi ashunde pa leste , haliarena . "

text: For which cause also I have been much hindered from coming to you .
text2: Kodia aterdiardia ma butivar te zhav tumende .

text: But now having no more place in these parts , and having a great desire these many years to come unto you ;
text2: Numa akana getosardem murhi buchi katse kai si ande kadala thema , ai de but bersh manglem te dikhav tume ;

text: Whensoever I take my journey into Spain , I will come to you : for I trust to see you in my journey , and to be brought on my way thitherward by you , if first I be somewhat filled with your company .
text2: Ai mangav te dikhav tume kana avava ande Shpania , avav tumende ; ke mangav te dikhav tume kana nakhava kotsar , kana beshava tumensa xantsi vriama mai anglal , sai zhutin ma te zhav ande Shpania ,

text: But now I go unto Jerusalem to minister unto the saints .
text2: Numa akana zhav ande Jerusalem te kerav buchi le Devleski mashkar le shave le Devleske kai si kotse .

text: For it hath pleased them of Macedonia and Achaia to make a certain contribution for the poor saints which are at Jerusalem .
text2: Ke le shave le Devleske andai Macedonia ai andai Gretsia magle te chiden love le chorhenge kai si anda narodo le Devlesko ande Jerusalem .

text: It hath pleased them verily ; and their debtors they are . For if the Gentiles have been made partakers of their spiritual things , their duty is also to minister unto them in carnal things .
text2: Won mangle te keren kodia ; numa chaches trobulas te keren kodole chorhenge kadia diela , ke le shave le Devleske le Zhiduvuria andai Jerusalem vulade pengo mishtimos kai dia le O Del kodolensa kai Nai Zhiduvuria , No kodola kai Nai Zhiduvuria trobul vi won te zhutin le ai te den le so trobul le katse pe phuv .

text: When therefore I have performed this , and have sealed to them this fruit , I will come by you into Spain .
text2: Kana getova kadia buchi ai dava le le love kai chide lenge , zhavatar ande Shpania ai nakhava tumendar kana zhava kotse .

text: And I am sure that , when I come unto you , I shall come in the fulness of the blessing of the gospel of Christ .
text2: Ai zhanav ke kana zhava tumende , avava le lashimasa katar o Kristo .

text: Now I beseech you , brethren , for the Lord Jesus Christ ' s sake , and for the love of the Spirit , that ye strive together with me in your prayers to God for me ;
text2: Numa eta so mangav tumendar , murhe phral , katar amaro Del O Jesus Kristo , ai katar e dragostia kai del O Swunto Duxo : maren tume mansa ando rhugimos ka Del mange :

text: That I may be delivered from them that do not believe in Judaea ; and that my service which I have for Jerusalem may be accepted of the saints ;
text2: Rhugin tume saxke te skepiv katar kodola kai chi pachanpe ando Del kai si ande Judea , ai o zhutimos kai anav ando Jerusalem te avel mishto chetaiime kotse mashkar o narodo le Devleske .

text: That I may come unto you with joy by the will of God , and may with you be refreshed .
text2: Kadia aresava tumende pherdo raduimos te mangela O Del , ai arakhava pacha mashkar tumende .

text: Now the God of peace be with you all . Amen .
text2: O Del kai del e pacha te avel tumensa savorhensa . Amen .

text: I commend unto you Phebe our sister , which is a servant of the church which is at Cenchrea :
text2: Tradav tumenge amare phei e Phoebe , kai kerel buchi ande khangeri ando Cencheae .

text: That ye receive her in the Lord , as becometh saints , and that ye assist her in whatsoever business she hath need of you : for she hath been a succourer of many , and of myself also .
text2: Premin la ando anav le Devlesko , sar kerel pe mashkar o narodo le Devlesko , ai zhutin la ande soste godi kai trobula la te zhutin la ; woi zhutisardia bute narodos vi man , ai zhutisardia but .

text: Greet Priscilla and Aquila my helpers in Christ Jesus :
text2: Roden ai dikhen le Priscilla ai Aquila , won kerde buchi mansa ande buchi le Jesus Kristoski .

text: Who have for my life laid down their own necks : unto whom not only I give thanks , but also all the churches of the Gentiles .
text2: Won thode pengo traio te skepin murho , chi naisiv lenge - ferdi me , numa sa le khangeria kodolenge kai Nai Zhiduvuria ande lumia naisin lenge .

text: Likewise greet the church that is in their house . Salute my wellbeloved Epaenetus , who is the firstfruits of Achaia unto Christ .
text2: Ai dikhen vi e khangeri kai chidelpe ande lengo kher . Dikhen vi murhe vortakos o Epenetus , kai sas o pervo kai pachaiape ando Kristo ande Asia .

text: Greet Mary , who bestowed much labour on us .
text2: Dikhen vi la Maria , kai kerdia but buchi tumenge .

text: Salute Andronicus and Junia , my kinsmen , and my fellowprisoners , who are of note among the apostles , who also were in Christ before me .
text2: Dikhen o Andronicus ai o Junias , kai si murhe niamuria ai vi won sas ande temnitsa mansa . Won mishto chetaiimele mashkar le apostluria ; inker mai anglal mandar dine sas pe ka Del .

text: Greet Amplias my beloved in the Lord .
text2: Dikhen o Ampliatus , murho lasho vortako ando Del .

text: Salute Urbane , our helper in Christ , and Stachys my beloved .
text2: Dikhen le Urbanus , amaro zhutitori ande buchi le Kristoski , ai o Stachys kai si mange drago .

text: Salute Apelles approved in Christ . Salute them which are of Aristobulus ' household .
text2: Dikhen le Apelles kai sikadia pesko pachamos ando Krsto . Dikhen le narodos kai si anda kher kodoleske kai bushol Aristobulus .

text: Salute Herodion my kinsman . Greet them that be of the household of Narcissus , which are in the Lord .
text2: Dikhen o Herodion murho niamos , dikhen le narodos anda kher le Narcissus kai pachanpe ando Del .

text: Salute Tryphena and Tryphosa , who labour in the Lord . Salute the beloved Persis , which laboured much in the Lord .
text2: Dikhen o Tryphaena ai o Tryphosa kai keren buchi le Devleski , ai murhi kuchi Persis kai kerdia but buchi leske ,

text: Salute Rufus chosen in the Lord , and his mother and mine .
text2: Dikhen o rufus , kai si ek lasho servatori le Devlesko , ai leske dei , kai si i mange sar iek dei .

text: Salute Asyncritus , Phlegon , Hermas , Patrobas , Hermes , and the brethren which are with them .
text2: Dikhen o Asyncritus , o Phlegon , o Hermes , o Patrobas , o Hermas , ai le kolavre phralen kai si lensa .

text: Salute Philologus , and Julia , Nereus , and his sister , and Olympas , and all the saints which are with them .
text2: Dikhen o Philologus , ai e Julia , o Nereus , ai leski phei , o Olimpas , ai sa le shave le Devleske kai si lensa .

text: Salute one another with an holy kiss . The churches of Christ salute you .
text2: Dikhen tume iek kavres ai chumiden tume pe buka sar phral . Sa le khangeria le Kristoske traden tumenge but bax , zor ai sastimos .

text: Now I beseech you , brethren , mark them which cause divisions and offences contrary to the doctrine which ye have learned ; and avoid them .
text2: Mangav tumendar , murhe phral : arakhen tume katar kodola kai rimon ai xasaren kodolen kai pachanpe ando Del , kai mothon ke nai vorta o zakono kai sicharde tume ; durion lendar .

text: For they that are such serve not our Lord Jesus Christ , but their own belly ; and by good words and fair speeches deceive the hearts of the simple .
text2: Ke kasavestar narodo chi keren buchi le Kristoski amaro Del , numa penge jieske ; Ai andel vorbi le shukar kai mothon , ai lenge divanuria le barimatange atsaven le ile le manushenge kai si proste .

text: For your obedience is come abroad unto all men . I am glad therefore on your behalf : but yet I would have you wise unto that which is good , and simple concerning evil .
text2: Sa e lumia zhanel ke pachan o mui le Devlesko , raduima anda tumende : Numa mangav te aven gojaver saxke te keren o lashimos . Ai vuzhe te na keren o nasulimos .

text: And the God of peace shall bruise Satan under your feet shortly . The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you . Amen .
text2: O Del kai del e pacha , sigo vriama licharela le benges tela tumare punrhe . Te avel o lashimos amaro Devlesko O Jesus Kristo tumensa .

text: Timotheus my workfellow , and Lucius , and Jason , and Sosipater , my kinsmen , salute you .
text2: O Timothe , murhe zhutitori ande buchi , tradel tumenge but bax , zor ai sastimos , ai vi o Lucius , o Jason , ai o Sosipater , murhe miamuria .

text: I Tertius , who wrote this epistle , salute you in the Lord .
text2: Ai me , o Tertius , kai ramosardia kado lil , tradav tumenge but bax , zor ai sastimos ando Del .

text: Gaius mine host , and of the whole church , saluteth you . Erastus the chamberlain of the city saluteth you , and Quartus a brother .
text2: O Gaius , kado kai si mande khere , ai kai leste chidelpe e khangeri , tradel tumenge but bax , zor ai sastimos ; o Erastus , kai lel sama katar le love le foroske , ai amaro phral o Quartus , traden tumenge but bax , zor ai sastimos .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: O lashimos amaro Devlesko O Jesus Kristo te avel tumensa savorhensa . Amen .

text: Now to him that is of power to stablish you according to my gospel , and the preaching of Jesus Christ , according to the revelation of the mystery , which was kept secret since the world began ,
text2: Luvudisaras le Devles ! Kai leste si e putiera te del tume zor ando pachamos , ande lashi viasta kai anav , e viasta kai phenav pa Jesus Kristo , ai so sichiliam kai sas garado katar O Del , kadia diela sas garadi but vriama palpale .

text: But now is made manifest , and by the scriptures of the prophets , according to the commandment of the everlasting God , made known to all nations for the obedience of faith :
text2: Numa akana kodia diela sas thodi ande vediara , katar E Vorba le Devleske le profetonge , kai sas dine katar O Del , kai shoxar chi merela , ai kadia viasta si sa le themenge , saxke te pachanpe ai te lenpe pala late .

text: To God only wise , be glory through Jesus Christ for ever . Amen .
text2: Ka Del ferdi e goji , te avel o barimos katar O Jesus Kristo ande swako vriama ! Amen .

text: Paul , called to be an apostle of Jesus Christ through the will of God , and Sosthenes our brother ,
text2: O Pavlo , akhardo te avel apostle le Jesus Kristosko katar e voia le Devleski , ai o phral Sostenes .

text: Unto the church of God which is at Corinth , to them that are sanctified in Christ Jesus , called to be saints , with all that in every place call upon the name of Jesus Christ our Lord , both theirs and ours :
text2: La khangeriaki le Devleski kai si ande Corinth , kodolenge kai sas swuntsome ando Jesus Kristo , akharde te aven Swuntse , ai sa kodola kai si ande swako than ande vari savo than , phenen o anav amaro Devlesko Jesus Kristo , lengo Del si ai amare Del si .

text: Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Te avel tumenge dino o mishtimos , ai e pacha , katar O Del amaro Dat , ai katar O Del Jesus Kristo .

text: I thank my God always on your behalf , for the grace of God which is given you by Jesus Christ ;
text2: Bi te terdiuav naisiv le Devleske anda tumende , anda mishtimos le Devlesko kai si tumenge dino ando Jesus Kristo ;

text: That in every thing ye are enriched by him , in all utterance , and in all knowledge ;
text2: Ke ande leste pherdilian sa le barvalimata kai si ande vorba ai ando divinimos , ai ando zhanglimos ;

text: Even as the testimony of Christ was confirmed in you :
text2: O zakono le Kristosko thodiape zurales mashkar tumende ;

text: So that ye come behind in no gift ; waiting for the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Anda kodia chi mai trobul tume chi iek zhanglimos zhi kai azhukeren te sikadiol amaro Del O Jesus Kristo .

text: Who shall also confirm you unto the end , that ye may be blameless in the day of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Vi zurarel tume zhando gor , kashte te aven bi doshako o dies amaro Devlesko Jesus Kristo .

text: God is faithful , by whom ye were called unto the fellowship of his Son Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Phrala le , sicharav tume pa anav amare Devlesko O Jesus Kristo .

text: Now I beseech you , brethren , by the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , that ye all speak the same thing , and that there be no divisions among you ; but that ye be perfectly joined together in the same mind and in the same judgment .
text2: Te avel tume savorhen iek divano ai te na avel mashkar tumende xuliamata , numa te aven mishto , chidine ande iek gindo ai iek zakono .

text: For it hath been declared unto me of you , my brethren , by them which are of the house of Chloe , that there are contentions among you .
text2: Ke murhe phral ashundem pa tumende katar le manush anda Chole , ke si mashkar tumende chingara .

text: Now this I say , that every one of you saith , I am of Paul ; and I of Apollos ; and I of Cephas ; and I of Christ .
text2: Mangav te phenav ke swako anda tumende del duma kadia , me sim katar o Pavlo , ai me katar Apollos , ai me katar o Cephas , ai me katar O Kristo .

text: Is Christ divided ? was Paul crucified for you ? or were ye baptized in the name of Paul ?
text2: O Kristo xulado lo , o Pavlo sas karfomesas po trushul anda tumende ? Vai ando anav o Pavlo sanas bolde ?

text: I thank God that I baptized none of you , but Crispus and Gaius ;
text2: Naisiv le Devleske ke chi boldem chi iekes anda tumende , ferdi Crispus ai o Gaius .

text: Lest any should say that I had baptized in mine own name .
text2: Kashte khonik te na phenel ke sanas bolde ande murho anav .

text: And I baptized also the household of Stephanas : besides , I know not whether I baptized any other .
text2: Mai boldem la familia le Stephanoske ; chi zhanav te mai boldem avre manushes .

text: For Christ sent me not to baptize , but to preach the gospel : not with wisdom of words , lest the cross of Christ should be made of none effect .
text2: O Kristo chi tradia ma te bolav , numa te phenav e lashi viasta ; ai kodia bi te avel gojaver divano , kashte te na xasavol o trushul le Kristoske .

text: For the preaching of the cross is to them that perish foolishness ; but unto us which are saved it is the power of God .
text2: Ke o divinimos le trushulesko dilimos si kodolenge kai xaiin ; numa amenge kai sam skepime , wo si e putiera le Devleski .

text: For it is written , I will destroy the wisdom of the wise , and will bring to nothing the understanding of the prudent .
text2: Vi ramome si , phagava o zhanglimos kodolengo kai zhanen , ai bi lava e goji le gojavrenge .

text: Where is the wise ? where is the scribe ? where is the disputer of this world ? hath not God made foolish the wisdom of this world ?
text2: Kai lo o gojarver ? Kai lo kai ramon ? Kai lo o chingaras kadala vriamako ? O Del sikadia kai o zhanglimos la lumiako si prosto .

text: For after that in the wisdom of God the world by wisdom knew not God , it pleased God by the foolishness of preaching to save them that believe .
text2: Ke fin e lumia peske zhanglimasa chi prinzhardia le Devles ando zhanglimos le Devles , drago sas le Devleske te skepil kodolen kai pachanpe pa dilo divano .

text: For the Jews require a sign , and the Greeks seek after wisdom :
text2: Le Zhiduvuria mangen ek semno , ai le Grekuria roden zhanglimos .

text: But we preach Christ crucified , unto the Jews a stumblingblock , and unto the Greeks foolishness ;
text2: Ame das duma pa Kristo karfome , lazhav le Zhidovonge , dilimos le Grekonge .

text: But unto them which are called , both Jews and Greeks , Christ the power of God , and the wisdom of God .
text2: Numa putiera le Devleski , ai goji le Devleski kodolenge kai si akharde , kadia le Zhidovonge sar le Grekonge .

text: Because the foolishness of God is wiser than men ; and the weakness of God is stronger than men .
text2: Ke o dilimos le Devlesko mai gojaver lo sar le manush ; ai slabomos le Devlesko mai zuralo lo sar le manush .

text: For ye see your calling , brethren , how that not many wise men after the flesh , not many mighty , not many noble , are called :
text2: Le sama , phrala le , ke mashkar tumende kai san akharde nai but gojaver po manushenge , nai chi but zurale , chi but andai vari vitsa :

text: But God hath chosen the foolish things of the world to confound the wise ; and God hath chosen the weak things of the world to confound the things which are mighty ;
text2: Numa O Del alosardia le dile dieli la lumiake te sikavel e dosh le gojavrenge , O Del alosardia le slabi dieli la lumiake te rimol zurales .

text: And base things of the world , and things which are despised , hath God chosen , yea , and things which are not , to bring to nought things that are :
