text2: Tumendar ankliste le Vorba le Devleski vai ferdi tumende avili ?

text: If any man think himself to be a prophet , or spiritual , let him acknowledge that the things that I write unto you are the commandments of the Lord .
text2: Te gindilpe vari kon profeto , vai ke zhanel te dikhel , ke so ramov tumenge , zakono si katar O Del .

text: But if any man be ignorant , let him be ignorant .
text2: Ai te na zhanel vari kon , mek te na zhanel .

text: Wherefore , brethren , covet to prophesy , and forbid not to speak with tongues .
text2: Kadia , phrala le , roden e podarka le profesiaki , ai chi aterdion le te den duma pel shiba .

text: Let all things be done decently and in order .
text2: Numa swako fialo te kerdiol mishto ai vorta .

text: Moreover , brethren , I declare unto you the gospel which I preached unto you , which also ye have received , and wherein ye stand ;
text2: Dav tume goji phrale , mangav te phenav tumenge e lashi viasta mai iek data sar phendem tumenge mai anglal , tume lian les , ai cho pachamos zuriarde .

text: By which also ye are saved , if ye keep in memory what I preached unto you , unless ye have believed in vain .
text2: Ai pa kodo san skepime , te ninkerena les sar phendem les tumenge .

text: For I delivered unto you first of all that which I also received , how that Christ died for our sins according to the scriptures ;
text2: Sichardem tume mai anglal sa sar vi me sichilem , ke O Kristo mulo anda amare bezexa . Sar phenel o ramomos .

text: And that he was buried , and that he rose again the third day according to the scriptures :
text2: Ke sas gropome , ai zhuvindisailo o trito dies sar phenel o ramomos .

text: And that he was seen of Cephas , then of the twelve :
text2: Ai ke sikadilo ka Cephas , porme le desh u donge .

text: After that , he was seen of above five hundred brethren at once ; of whom the greater part remain unto this present , but some are fallen asleep .
text2: Porme sikadilo mai but de pansh shela phralen iek data , ai mai but anda lende inker zhuvinde le , ai uni mule .

text: After that , he was seen of James ; then of all the apostles .
text2: Porme sikadilo ka Iakov , ai sa le apostluria .

text: And last of all he was seen of me also , as of one born out of due time .
text2: Pala lende savorhe vi mange sikadilo , sar le bi vriamako .

text: For I am the least of the apostles , that am not meet to be called an apostle , because I persecuted the church of God .
text2: Ke sim o mai tsigno andal apostluria , chi trobul te akharen ma apostle , ke chinuisardem e khangeri le Devleski .

text: But by the grace of God I am what I am : and his grace which was bestowed upon me was not in vain ; but I laboured more abundantly than they all : yet not I , but the grace of God which was with me .
text2: Katar o mishtimos le Devlesko sim so sim : ai o mishtimos le Devlesko karing mande nas intaino , dur kotsar , kerdem mai but buchi lendar savorhe , na me , numa o mishtimos le Devlesko kai si mansa .

text: Therefore whether it were I or they , so we preach , and so ye believed .
text2: No kadia te avela me vai te aven won , eta , so das duma pa Del , ai pachaie tume .

text: Now if Christ be preached that he rose from the dead , how say some among you that there is no resurrection of the dead ?
text2: Fin phenas ke Kristo zhuvindisailo andal mulen . Sar uni anda tumende phenen ke nai zhuvindimos le mulen ?

text: But if there be no resurrection of the dead , then is Christ not risen :
text2: Te na avela zhuvindimos le mulengo , chi O Kristo chi zhuvindisailo .

text: And if Christ be not risen , then is our preaching vain , and your faith is also vain .
text2: Ai te Kristo nai zhuvindime , amaro divano antunchi intaino , ai vi tumaro pachamos intaino le .

text: Yea , and we are found false witnesses of God ; because we have testified of God that he raised up Christ : whom he raised not up , if so be that the dead rise not .
text2: Antunchi vi sam xoxamne marturia ke phendiam ke O Del zhuvindisardia le Kristos : numa O Del chi zhuvindisardia les anda le mule te na wushten le mule andai martia .

text: For if the dead rise not , then is not Christ raised :
text2: Te na zhuvindila le mule chi O Kristo nai zhuvindime .

text: And if Christ be not raised , your faith is vain ; ye are yet in your sins .
text2: Ai te O Kristo nai zhuvindime , tumaro pachamos intainalo , inker san ande tumare bezex .

text: Then they also which are fallen asleep in Christ are perished .
text2: Ai vi kodola kai mule ando Kristo , xasarde le .

text: If in this life only we have hope in Christ , we are of all men most miserable .
text2: Te si ferdi ande kado traio ke jinas po Kristo , sam le mai nekezhime andal sa manush .

text: But now is Christ risen from the dead , and become the firstfruits of them that slept .
text2: Numa akana O Kristo zhuvindime lo andal mule , ai angluno lo anda kodola kai mule .

text: For since by man came death , by man came also the resurrection of the dead .
text2: Ke te avili e martia katar iek manush , vi katar iek manush avilo o zhuvindimos le mulenge .

text: For as in Adam all die , even so in Christ shall all be made alive .
text2: Ai sar savorhe meren ando Adam , savorhe zhuvindina ando Kristo .

text: But every man in his own order : Christ the firstfruits ; afterward they that are Christ ' s at his coming .
text2: Numa swako pe pesko rhindo , O Kristo sar le anglune , porme kodola kai si le Kristoske kana avela , porme avela o getomos .

text: Then cometh the end , when he shall have delivered up the kingdom to God , even the Father ; when he shall have put down all rule and all authority and power .
text2: Kana dela amperetsia ka kado kai si Del , ai Dat ; pala kodia kai peravela swako barimos , swako poronchimos ai swako zor .

text: For he must reign , till he hath put all enemies under his feet .
text2: Ke trobul te poronchil , zhi kai thola sa le duzhmanon telai leske punrhe .

text: The last enemy that shall be destroyed is death .
text2: O paluno duzhmano kai avela perado si e martia .

text: For he hath put all things under his feet . But when he saith , all things are put under him , it is manifest that he is excepted , which did put all things under him .
text2: O Del chaches sa thodia tela leske punrhe . Numa kana phenel , ke swako fialo si tela leste , chaches ke kodo kai thodiape pala leste swako fialo wo nai .

text: And when all things shall be subdued unto him , then shall the Son also himself be subject unto him that put all things under him , that God may be all in all .
text2: Ai kana swako fialo avena tela leste , porme O Shav vi wo avela tela kodo kai thodai tela leste , kashte te avel O Del sa ando swako fialo .

text: Else what shall they do which are baptized for the dead , if the dead rise not at all ? why are they then baptized for the dead ?
text2: Te na , nichi , so keren kodola ke bolenpe le mulenge , te na zhuvindila vov si le mule ? Sostar bolenpe anda lende ?

text: And why stand we in jeopardy every hour ?
text2: Ai ame sostar sam swako chaso ande dar ?

text: I protest by your rejoicing which I have in Christ Jesus our Lord , I die daily .
text2: Ke swako dies sai merav , phenav phrala le pala putiera ke sam mange ando Jesus Kristo amaro Del .

text: If after the manner of men I have fought with beasts at Ephesus , what advantageth it me , if the dead rise not ? let us eat and drink ; for to morrow we die .
text2: Te si sar manushenge dikhimos ke marde ma le zhigeniensa ando Ephesus , che mishtimos lav anda kodia , te na zhuvindin le mulen ? Xas , piias , ke terhara meras .

text: Be not deceived : evil communications corrupt good manners .
text2: Na shubin tume , le chorhe ginduria rimon vi lasho zakono .

text: Awake to righteousness , and sin not ; for some have not the knowledge of God : I speak this to your shame .
text2: Ambolden palpale tumende so si mishto , ai na keren bezex , ke uni chi zhanen le Devles : phenav tumaro lazhav .

text: But some man will say , How are the dead raised up ? and with what body do they come ?
text2: No vari kon phenela , sar le mule zhuvindin ? Ai che statosa ambolden ?

text: Thou fool , that which thou sowest is not quickened , except it die :
text2: Dilia , e sumuntsa kai thos chi zhuvindil , te na merel .

text: And that which thou sowest , thou sowest not that body that shall be , but bare grain , it may chance of wheat , or of some other grain :
text2: Soste bariol , nai o stato kai bariol , ferdi iek sumuntsa jiveske amborim , vai aver sumuntsa .

text: But God giveth it a body as it hath pleased him , and to every seed his own body .
text2: Porme O Del del les iek stato sar mangel , ai swako sumuntsa del iek stato kai si leske .

text: All flesh is not the same flesh : but there is one kind of flesh of men , another flesh of beasts , another of fishes , and another of birds .
text2: Swako mas nai iek mas , numa aver si o mas le manushenge , aver si le shtare punrhenge , aver le chirikliange , aver le masenge .

text: There are also celestial bodies , and bodies terrestrial : but the glory of the celestial is one , and the glory of the terrestrial is another .
text2: Si vi staturia chereske , ai staturia phuviake : numa aver si o strefiamos le staturia le chereske , aver si le staturia la phuviake .

text: There is one glory of the sun , and another glory of the moon , and another glory of the stars : for one star differeth from another star in glory .
text2: Aver si o strefiamos la khamesko , aver si o strefiamos le shunutosko , ai aver si o strefiamos le cherhaiengo . Iek chererhai strefial aver fialo katar aver chererhai .

text: So also is the resurrection of the dead . It is sown in corruption ; it is raised in incorruption :
text2: Kadia si anda zhuvindimos le mulenge , o stato bariardo kai rimolpe , zhuvindil kai chi mai rimol .

text: It is sown in dishonour ; it is raised in glory : it is sown in weakness ; it is raised in power :
text2: Bariol gratsia , zhuvindil vuzho : bariol kovlo , zhuvindil pherdo zor .

text: It is sown a natural body ; it is raised a spiritual body . There is a natural body , and there is a spiritual body .
text2: Bariol zhigania , zhuvindil swuntsome stato . Si iek stato zhigania , si vi iek stato swuntso .

text: And so it is written , The first man Adam was made a living soul ; the last Adam was made a quickening spirit .
text2: Anda kodia ramome , si o angluno manush Adam kerdilo stato zhuvindo , o paluno Adam kerdilo iek duxo kai zhuvindil .

text: Howbeit that was not first which is spiritual , but that which is natural ; and afterward that which is spiritual .
text2: Numa so si swunto nai o angluno so si zhigania , ai so si swunto avela mai palal .

text: The first man is of the earth , earthy : the second man is the Lord from heaven .
text2: O angluno manush ankalado andai phuv , phuviako lo , o duito manush si andai rhaio .

text: As is the earthy , such are they also that are earthy : and as is the heavenly , such are they also that are heavenly .
text2: Kadia si la phuviako , kadia si vi le phuviako , ai kadia si le cheresko .

text: And as we have borne the image of the earthy , we shall also bear the image of the heavenly .
text2: Ai sar savorhe ningerdiam o patreto la phuviakoresko , vi kadia ningerasa le cheresko .

text: Now this I say , brethren , that flesh and blood cannot inherit the kingdom of God ; neither doth corruption inherit incorruption .
text2: So phenav , phrala le , ke o mas ai o rat nashtil len o rhaio le Devlesko , ai ke o rimome nashti lel kai chi mai rimolpe .

text: Behold , I shew you a mystery ; We shall not all sleep , but we shall all be changed ,
text2: Eta , phenav tumenge iek shodenia , chi meras sa , numa savorhe parhuenas sa .

text: In a moment , in the twinkling of an eye , at the last trump : for the trumpet shall sound , and the dead shall be raised incorruptible , and we shall be changed .
text2: Ande ek tsikon ( momento ) , ai ande dikhimos iakhako , kai palui tuturaza , ke e tuturaza bashela ai le mule zhuvindila , ke chi mai rimonpe ai ame savorhe avasa parhuenasa .

text: For this corruptible must put on incorruption , and this mortal must put on immortality .
text2: Ke trobul kado stato kai rimolpe te vuriarelpe so chi mai rimolpe , ai kado stato kai merel lelpe peste kai chi mai merel .

text: So when this corruptible shall have put on incorruption , and this mortal shall have put on immortality , then shall be brought to pass the saying that is written , Death is swallowed up in victory .
text2: Kana kado stato kai rimolpe vuriarelpe kai chi mai rimolpe , ai kado stato kai merel kana vuriarelape kai chi mai merel , antunchi kerdiol e vorba kai si ramome .

text: O death , where is thy sting ? O grave , where is thy victory ?
text2: E martia sas tasadi ando nirimos . Martio , kai cho nirimos ? Martio , kai chi kanrho ?

text: The sting of death is sin ; and the strength of sin is the law .
text2: O kanrho la martiako si o bezex , ai e zor le bezexesko si o zakono .

text: But thanks be to God , which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Numa nais le Devleske kai dia ame o nirimos katar amaro Del , O Jesus Kristo .

text: Therefore , my beloved brethren , be ye stedfast , unmoveable , always abounding in the work of the Lord , forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord .
text2: Kadia , murhe drazhe phral , aven zurale , na parhudion , keren buchi mai mishto , ai mai mishto ande diela le Devleske , te zhanen ke tumari buchi chi avela intaino ando Del .

text: Now concerning the collection for the saints , as I have given order to the churches of Galatia , even so do ye .
text2: Anda so si o chidimos karing le swuntsi , keren vi tume sar phendem le khangeriange andai Galatia .

text: Upon the first day of the week let every one of you lay by him in store , as God hath prospered him , that there be no gatherings when I come .
text2: Ke swako andal tumende , o angluno dies le kurkesko , thol rigate peste so dashtila pala pesko barvalimos .

text: And when I come , whomsoever ye shall approve by your letters , them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem .
text2: Kashte te na azhkeren murho areslimos te chiden le podarki , ai kana avava tradav lila te ningeren tumaro mishtimos ando Jerusalem .

text: And if it be meet that I go also , they shall go with me .
text2: Te sai zhav , won sai zhan mansa .

text: Now I will come unto you , when I shall pass through Macedonia : for I do pass through Macedonia .
text2: Zhava tumende kana nakhava e Macedonia , ke nakhava e Macedonia .

text: And it may be that I will abide , yea , and winter with you , that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go .
text2: Amborim beshava tumende , vai amborim nakhav po ivend . Kashte te ninkeren ma compania kotse kai zhava .

text: For I will not see you now by the way ; but I trust to tarry a while with you , if the Lord permit .
text2: Chi mangav kadia data te dikhav tume ando nakhimos , numa mangavas te beshav iek vriama pasha tumende te mangela O Del .

text: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost .
text2: Beshava ando Ephesus zhi ka Pentecost .

text: For a great door and effectual is opened unto me , and there are many adversaries .
text2: Ke iek bari vurota kai vushoro zhav andre phuterdile manush , ai le duzhmaia but si .

text: Now if Timotheus come , see that he may be with you without fear : for he worketh the work of the Lord , as I also do .
text2: Te aresela o Timote , keren kadia te avel mashkar tumende bi darako , ke vi wo kerel buchi sar mande anda diela le Devleske .

text: Let no man therefore despise him : but conduct him forth in peace , that he may come unto me : for I look for him with the brethren .
text2: Khonik te na shudel les , ningeren les pachasa , kashte te avel karing mande , ke azhukerav les le phralensa .

text: As touching our brother Apollos , I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren : but his will was not at all to come at this time ; but he will come when he shall have convenient time .
text2: So si anda phral o Apollos , thodem but zor pe leste te zhal tumende le phralensa : numa chaches na leske voia te kerel kadia akana . Te avela kana moladiola .

text: Watch ye , stand fast in the faith , quit you like men , be strong .
text2: Len sama , beshen zurales anda pachamos , aven rhom , zuraven tume .

text: Let all your things be done with charity .
text2: So godi keren , te kerdiol dragostimasa .

text: I beseech you , brethren , ( ye know the house of Stephanas , that it is the firstfruits of Achaia , and that they have addicted themselves to the ministry of the saints , )
text2: Mai phenav tumenge mai iek diela phrala le , zhanen ke familia le Stephenas , ai le anglune andai Achaia , kerdiape te podail le swuntson .

text: That ye submit yourselves unto such , and to every one that helpeth with us , and laboureth .
text2: Phushav tumendar te ashunen , ai aven vi tume karing kasavendar manush ai karing savorhe kai keren buchi amensa .

text: I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus : for that which was lacking on your part they have supplied .
text2: Raduiva ma kotse ka o Stephonas , ai o Fortunates , ai o Achaicus : thodepe ande tumaro than kana chi sanas katse .

text: For they have refreshed my spirit and yours : therefore acknowledge ye them that are such .
text2: Ke pechisarde vi man , ai vi tumen te zhanen te thon te luvudin kasavendar manushen .

text: The churches of Asia salute you . Aquila and Priscilla salute you much in the Lord , with the church that is in their house .
text2: Le khangeria ande Asia den tume dies lasho . E Aquila ai e Priscilla la khangeriasa kai si ande lengo kher den tume dies lasho ando Del .

text: All the brethren greet you . Greet ye one another with an holy kiss .
text2: Sa le phral den tume dies lasho , den tume iekavres dies lasho ieke Swunto chumidimasa .

text: The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand .
text2: Dav tume dies lasho me o Pavlo murhe vastesa .

text: If any man love not the Lord Jesus Christ , let him be Anathema Maranatha .
text2: Te vari kaske nai drago Del Jesus Kristo  ek armaia pe leste , Maranatha , amaro Del , aves !

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you .
text2: O mishtimos le Devlesko O Jesus Kristo , te avel tumensa .

text: My love be with you all in Christ Jesus . Amen .
text2: Murhi dragostia ando Del tumensa lo . Amen .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timothy our brother , unto the church of God which is at Corinth , with all the saints which are in all Achaia :
text2: Katar o Pavlo , ek apostle le Jesus Kristoske katar e voia le Devleski , ai amaro phral o Timote kai khangeri le Devleski kai si ando Corinth , ai sa le shave le Devleske kai si ande sa e Gretsia .

text: Grace be to you and peace from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: O mishtimos ai e pacha katar O Del amaro Dat , ai katar le Devles O Jesus Kristo .

text: Blessed be God , even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of mercies , and the God of all comfort ;
text2: Raduime te avel O Del , O Dat amare Devlesko O Jesus Kristo , O Dat kai si pherdi mila , ai O Del kai pechil / zhutil ande soste godi .

text: Who comforteth us in all our tribulation , that we may be able to comfort them which are in any trouble , by the comfort wherewith we ourselves are comforted of God .
text2: Wo pechil ame ande sa amaro chinuria , saxke te sai ame pechisaras kodolen kai nakhen ande swako chinuria , ai te anas lenge o pechimos kai sas amen dino katar O Del .

text: For as the sufferings of Christ abound in us , so our consolation also aboundeth by Christ .
text2: Ke sar le chinuria kai sas le Kristos bution ande amende , sakadia amaro pechimos bariol le Kristosa .

text: And whether we be afflicted , it is for your consolation and salvation , which is effectual in the enduring of the same sufferings which we also suffer : or whether we be comforted , it is for your consolation and salvation .
text2: Te chinuisaras , si te aven tume pechime , ai te aven skepime ; te sam ame pechime si te aven tume pechime , kai kodo pechimos dela tume te sai ankeren rhavdasa sa kodola chinuria kai ame chinuisaras .

text: And our hope of you is stedfast , knowing , that as ye are partakers of the sufferings , so shall ye be also of the consolation .
text2: Ame pachas ai zhanas so avela tumensa , ke ame zhanas ke sar vi tume chinuin sar amende , vi tume sai aven pechime sar sam ame pechime .

text: For we would not , brethren , have you ignorant of our trouble which came to us in Asia , that we were pressed out of measure , above strength , insomuch that we despaired even of life :
text2: Mangas amare phral te xhanen savestar chino dikhliam ande Asia . O chino kadia de baro sas amenge , ai nashti mai rhevdisarasas kai darasas ke si te meras .

text: But we had the sentence of death in ourselves , that we should not trust in ourselves , but in God which raiseth the dead :
text2: Gindisardiam ke trobulas te meras ame , kodia kerdiliasas saxke te sichuas te na pachas ame ande amende , numa te pachas ame ferdi ando Del kai zhuvindil le mulen .

text: Who delivered us from so great a death , and doth deliver : in whom we trust that he will yet deliver us ;
text2: Wo si kai skepisardia ame anda kodia bari martia , ai wo kai mai skepila ame ; e , si ame kodo pachamos ande leste ke mai skepila amen ;

text: Ye also helping together by prayer for us , that for the gift bestowed upon us by the means of many persons thanks may be given by many on our behalf .
text2: ke tume zhutin ame kana rhugin tume anda amende , kadia O Del ashunela le rhugimata butenge kai rhuginpe anda amende , O Del zhutila amen ; ai but naisina leske pa amende .

text: For our rejoicing is this , the testimony of our conscience , that in simplicity and godly sincerity , not with fleshly wisdom , but by the grace of God , we have had our conversation in the world , and more abundantly to you - ward .
text2: Eta , ande soste sai luvudisavas , amaro ilo mothol amenge ke amaro traio ande kadia lumia , ai mai but mashkar tumende sas prosto ai chachimasa angla Del , ai ninkerdo katar o mishtimos le Devlesko ai na katar e goji le manusheske .

text: For we write none other things unto you , than what ye read or acknowledge ; and I trust ye shall acknowledge even to the end ;
text2: Ande amare lila chi ramosaras tumenge aver diela , de ferdi so si ramome ai so haliaren .

text: As also ye have acknowledged us in part , that we are your rejoicing , even as ye also are ours in the day of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Ai pachav ma ke aresena te haliaren vorta so godi si ramome . Akana haliaren xantsi ferdi , numa kana avela O Jesus Kristo sai luvudin tume anda amende , sar ame avasa anda tumende .

text: And in this confidence I was minded to come unto you before , that ye might have a second benefit ;
text2: Pachavas ma ande kodia kai mangavas mai anglal te zhav tumende , saxke te avel tumen dino o mishtimos duvar .

text: And to pass by you into Macedonia , and to come again out of Macedonia unto you , and of you to be brought on my way toward Judaea .
text2: Mangavas te nakhav tumendar te zhav ande Macedonia , porme kana avilemas palpale pale avilemas tumende , ai porme zhutisardianas ma te zhav ande Judea .

text: When I therefore was thus minded , did I use lightness ? or the things that I purpose , do I purpose according to the flesh , that with me there should be yea yea , and nay nay ?
text2: Kana manglem te kerav kadia so gindin , ke pirasa kerdem ? Vai so manglem te kerav si ferdi dieli mausheske saxke te mothav " E " vai " Nichi " andak data ?

text: But as God is true , our word toward you was not yea and nay .
text2: Numa O Del si chacho , so phendem tumenge nai " E " ai " Nichi " .

text: For the Son of God , Jesus Christ , who was preached among you by us , even by me and Silvanus and Timotheus , was not yea and nay , but in him was yea .
text2: Ke O Shav le Devlesko O Jesus Kristo sas phendo mashkar tumende katar o Silvanus , ai o Timote , ai vi me , chi aviliam te mothas " E " vai " Nichi " , numa ferdi " E " kai si katar O Del .

text: For all the promises of God in him are yea , and in him Amen , unto the glory of God by us .
text2: Wo si O Del kai si " E " ka sa le dieli kai shinadia . Katar O Jesus Kristo sai mothas " Amen " te bariaras le Devlesko anav .

text: Now he which stablisheth us with you in Christ , and hath anointed us , is God ;
text2: Ai wo si O Del kai del ame zor tumensa andak than ando traio le Kristosko . O Del si kai thodia ame rigate .

text: Who hath also sealed us , and given the earnest of the Spirit in our hearts .
text2: Kai thodia lesko semno pe amende , ai dia ande amare ile O Swunto Duxo , sar te ashel lasho andal dieli kai shinadia amenge .

text: Moreover I call God for a record upon my soul , that to spare you I came not as yet unto Corinth .
text2: Me akharav O Del sar murho marturo , wo zhanel murho ilo ! Te na avela vari so pe tumende si kai manglem te na zhav inker ande Corinth .

text: Not for that we have dominion over your faith , but are helpers of your joy : for by faith ye stand .
text2: Ame chi rodas te sicharas tume so te pachan , ke tume ankeren tumaro pachamos . Numa , ame mangas te keras buchi tumensa pe tumaro raduimos .

text: But I determined this with myself , that I would not come again to you in heaviness .
text2: Manglem te na zhav tumende , saxke te na nekezhiv tume pale .

text: For if I make you sorry , who is he then that maketh me glad , but the same which is made sorry by me ?
text2: Ke te nekezhiva tumen , kon sai del man o raduimos ? De ferdi kodola kai nekezhisardem le .

text: And I wrote this same unto you , lest , when I came , I should have sorrow from them of whom I ought to rejoice ; having confidence in you all , that my joy is the joy of you all .
text2: Eta , Sostar ramosardem tumenge kadia , chi mangavas te avav tumende ai te avav nekezhime katar le manush kai trobunas te den ma raduimos , zhanav ke kana sim raduime , vi tume san raduime .

text: For out of much affliction and anguish of heart I wrote unto you with many tears ; not that ye should be grieved , but that ye might know the love which I have more abundantly unto you .
text2: E ramov tumenge ieke ilesa kai si chinuime ai dukhado , ai bute asuensa , te na nekezhiv tume , numa te zhanen sode de san mange drago .

text: But if any have caused grief , he hath not grieved me , but in part : that I may not overcharge you all .
text2: Te si vari kon mashkar tumende kai nekezhisailo , chi nekezhisardia ma , numa savorhe tume ; vai amborim na savorhe , numa xantsi anda tumende .

text: Sufficient to such a man is this punishment , which was inflicted of many .
text2: Dosta sas kodole manusheske kai sas doshardo katar o mai but anda tumende .

text: So that contrariwise ye ought rather to forgive him , and comfort him , lest perhaps such a one should be swallowed up with overmuch sorrow .
text2: Anda kodia akana trobul mai bini te iertin leske ai te zhutin les , saxke te na perel ande mai baro nekazo ai te rimolpe .

text: Wherefore I beseech you that ye would confirm your love toward him .
text2: Akana mangav tumendar , keren lesa vorta te sikaven leske ke tume drago leske .

text: For to this end also did I write , that I might know the proof of you , whether ye be obedient in all things .
text2: Eta , vi sostar ramosardem tumenge , manglemas te zumavav tume ai te dikhav , keren inker so mothav tumenge .

text: To whom ye forgive any thing , I forgive also : for if I forgave any thing , to whom I forgave it , for your sakes forgave I it in the person of Christ ;
text2: Kana iertin vari kaske vari so kai shubisailo , i me iertiv leske . Ke kana iertiva te trobul te iertiv vari so , kerav kodia pala tumende angla Kristo ,

text: Lest Satan should get an advantage of us : for we are not ignorant of his devices .
text2: saxke te na mekav le benges te niril pe amende ; ke ame zhanas so mangel te kerel .

text: Furthermore , when I came to Troas to preach Christ ' s gospel , and a door was opened unto me of the Lord ,
text2: Kana areslem ando Troas te mothav pai lashi viasta le Kristoski , arakhalem ke O Del phuterdia o drom te dav duma pa leste kotse .

text: I had no rest in my spirit , because I found not Titus my brother : but taking my leave of them , I went from thence into Macedonia .
text2: Numa nas mange mishto ke chi arakhlem amare phrales o Titus . Anda kodia phendem le narodoske kai sas ando Troas te ashen Devlesa , ai gelemtar ande Maacedonia .

text: Now thanks be unto God , which always causeth us to triumph in Christ , and maketh manifest the savour of his knowledge by us in every place .
text2: Ame naisisarasle Devles ! Kai del ame te nirisaras sagda le Kristosa ande soste godi . O Del kerel amensa buchi te das duma pa Kristo kai godi zhas sar iek duxi , kai laki sung xhal katar godi .

text: For we are unto God a sweet savour of Christ , in them that are saved , and in them that perish :
text2: Ame sam le Devleske e duxi le Kristoski , mashkar kodola kai si skepime , ai mashkar kodola kai xasavon .

text: To the one we are the savour of death unto death ; and to the other the savour of life unto life . And who is sufficient for these things ?
text2: Kodolenge kai xasavon , si iek sung martiaki kai mudarel ; ai kodolenge kai si skepime , si iek sung traioski kai del o traio . Ai kon sai kerel kasavatar diela ?

text: For we are not as many , which corrupt the word of God : but as of sincerity , but as of God , in the sight of God speak we in Christ .
text2: Chi sam sar but aver , kai chinen ai bichinen E Vorba le Devleski ; numa ke O Del tradia ame , das duma chachimasa angla leste , sar le slugi le Kristoske .

text: Do we begin again to commend ourselves ? or need we , as some others , epistles of commendation to you , or letters of commendation from you ?
text2: So znachil kado divano ? Ke pale ame nachinaisavas te luvudisavas ? Vai trobulsardino ame , sar uni , te sikavas tumenge lila so te keren , vai ame te mangas tumendar lela ?

text: Ye are our epistle written in our hearts , known and read of all men :
text2: Tuma san amaro lil kai si ramome ande amaro ilo , kai sa e lumia sai zhanel ai diinel .

text: Forasmuch as ye are manifestly declared to be the epistle of Christ ministered by us , written not with ink , but with the Spirit of the living God ; not in tables of stone , but in fleshy tables of the heart .
text2: Te iazno si ke tume san iek lil ramome katar O Kristo ai tradino amendar . Kodo lil nai ramome chernilasa , numa le Duxosa le Devlesko o zhuvindo . Nai ramome pel skafidia baxrenge , numa ande ile le manushenge .

text: And such trust have we through Christ to God - ward :
text2: Ame sai mothas chachimasa kadia diela , ke pala amaro pachamos kai si ame ando Del katar O Kristo .

text: Not that we are sufficient of ourselves to think any thing as of ourselves ; but our sufficiency is of God ;
text2: Ame nashtisaras te mothas ke sai keras kasaviatar buchi anda amende , numa so keras katar O Del avel .

text: Who also hath made us able ministers of the new testament ; not of the letter , but of the spirit : for the letter killeth , but the spirit giveth life .
text2: Ke wo dia ame te avas slugi kadale nevia viastako ; nai iek zakono kai si ramome , numa katar O Swunto Duxo : o zakono o ramome mudarel , numa O Swunto Duxo del o traio .

text: But if the ministration of death , written and engraven in stones , was glorious , so that the children of Israel could not stedfastly behold the face of Moses for the glory of his countenance ; which glory was to be done away :
text2: O zakono sas ramome , vorba pe vorbate pel skafidia le baxrenge ai andai martia , ai o barimos le Devlesko strefial , antunchi o mui le Mosesosko strefialas kadia de zurales kai le Zhiduvuria nashtinas te dikhen pe leste , marka ke kodo strefaimos sas te zhaltar .

text: How shall not the ministration of the spirit be rather glorious ?
text2: Sode de baro trobul te avel o luvudimos la buchako kai kerel O Swunto Duxo !

text: For if the ministration of condemnation be glory , much more doth the ministration of righteousness exceed in glory .
text2: E buchi kai doshardia le manushen sas luvudime , sode mai but luvudime e buchi kai si te kerel andel manush vorta angla Del !

text: For even that which was made glorious had no glory in this respect , by reason of the glory that excelleth .
text2: Sai vi mothas , ke o luvudimos kai strefial mai anglal , nai kanchi angla luvudimos kai si akana , kai si but mai baro .

text: For if that which is done away was glorious , much more that which remaineth is glorious .
text2: So sas kai ankerdia xantsi vriama sas luvudime , sode mai but luvudime so si kai shoxar chi getolpe !

text: Seeing then that we have such hope , we use great plainness of speech :
text2: Te si ame kodo pachamos , sai das duma bi darako .

text: And not as Moses , which put a vail over his face , that the children of Israel could not stedfastly look to the end of that which is abolished :
text2: Ame chi sam sar o Moses , kai vusharavelas pesko mui seliasa , saxke te na dikhen le Zhiduvuria e vediara kai nakhelas sigo .

text: But their minds were blinded : for until this day remaineth the same vail untaken away in the reading of the old testament ; which vail is done away in Christ .
text2: Numa lenge goji nashti ma haliarel , ai zhi adies lenge goji vusharadila sa kodola seliasa kana jinen o zakono le Mosesosko . Kodia selia zhaltar ferdi kana o manush si astardo le Kristosa .

text: But even unto this day , when Moses is read , the vail is upon their heart .
text2: Inker adies , swako data kai jinen o zakono le Mosesosko , e selia vusharavel lenge goji .

text: Nevertheless when it shall turn to the Lord , the vail shall be taken away .
text2: Numa sar mothol E Vorba le Devleski , kana boldelpe iek manush karing O Del , e selia zhaltar .

text: Now the Lord is that Spirit : and where the Spirit of the Lord is , there is liberty .
text2: O Del si O Swunto Duxo , ai kotse kai si O Swunto Duxo le Devlesko , kotse si liberte .

text: But we all , with open face beholding as in a glass the glory of the Lord , are changed into the same image from glory to glory , even as by the Spirit of the Lord .
text2: Ame savorhe , bi la seliako pe amaro mui strefialas o barimos le Devlesko , ai sam parhude te avas sar O Del , ai nakhas andak barimos ande iek mai baro barimos . Kadia si e buchi kai kerel O Swunto Duxo le Devlesko .

text: Therefore seeing we have this ministry , as we have received mercy , we faint not ;
text2: O Del ande pesko lashimos , dia ame kadia buchi , ai anda kodia chi xasaras zor .

text: But have renounced the hidden things of dishonesty , not walking in craftiness , nor handling the word of God deceitfully ; but by manifestation of the truth commending ourselves to every man ' s conscience in the sight of God .
text2: Shudiam le dieli le chorhe kai kerdionas chordanes , ai chi keras buchi bi malades , ai chi parhuvas E Vorba le Devleski . Numa phenas o chachimos , ai ame tasame angla sako manush te dikhen amaro traio kai thodiam angla Del .

text: But if our gospel be hid , it is hid to them that are lost :
text2: Numa te si e lashi viasta kai phenas garadi , garadi la ferdi kodolenge kai xzasavon .

text: In whom the god of this world hath blinded the minds of them which believe not , lest the light of the glorious gospel of Christ , who is the image of God , should shine unto them .
text2: Chi pachanpe ke O Del o nasul kadala lumiako korhardia lenge goji , kodo del ( o beng ) chi mekel le te dikhen e vediara kai si andini katar e lashi viasta le Kristosko kai phenel pa lesko barimos , wo si o patreto le Devlesko .

text: For we preach not ourselves , but Christ Jesus the Lord ; and ourselves your servants for Jesus ' sake .
text2: Ke chi das duma pa amende ; numa das duma pa Jesus Kristo le Devles ; ai ame jinas ame sar tumare slugi pala Kristo .

text: For God , who commanded the light to shine out of darkness , hath shined in our hearts , to give the light of the knowledge of the glory of God in the face of Jesus Christ .
text2: O Del kai phendia , " Te strefial e vediara mashkar o tuniariko , " ai vi kado si , kai kerdia te strefial peski vediara ande amare ile , te zhanas e vediara kai si o barimos le Devlesko , kai strefial po mui le Jesus Kristosko .

text: But we have this treasure in earthen vessels , that the excellency of the power may be of God , and not of us .
text2: Numa ame kai ingeras kodo barvalimos le Devlesko , sam sar kanta chikaki , te sai dichol mishto ke kodia putiera e bari si le Devleski , ai na amari .

text: We are troubled on every side , yet not distressed ; we are perplexed , but not in despair ;
text2: But chinuimata si pe amende , numa chi sam licharde ; nekezhisaras , numa chi rimovsavas ;

text: Persecuted , but not forsaken ; cast down , but not destroyed ;
text2: Chinuin ame , numa O Del chi mekel ame , shudiam tele , numa na xasarde .

text: Always bearing about in the body the dying of the Lord Jesus , that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our body .
text2: Si ame sagda ande amaro stato e martia le Jesus Kristoski , saxke te sikadiol lesko traio ande amaro stato .

text: For we which live are alway delivered unto death for Jesus ' sake , that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our mortal flesh .
text2: Ande amaro traio sagda sam angla e martia pala Kristo , saxke lesko traio te sikadiol ande amaro stato kai merel .

text: So then death worketh in us , but life in you .
text2: E martia kerel buchi ande amende ; numa o traio kerel buchi ande tumende .

text: We having the same spirit of faith , according as it is written , I believed , and therefore have I spoken ; we also believe , and therefore speak ;
text2: E Vorba le Devleski mothol , " Pachaie ma , anda kodia dem duma . " Vi ame ande sa kodo duxo pachamasko pachas ame , ai anda kodo das duma .

text: Knowing that he which raised up the Lord Jesus shall raise up us also by Jesus , and shall present us with you .
text2: Zhanas ke O Del , kai andia le Devles O Jesus katar e martia ka traio , anela iamen ka traio le Kristosa , ai kerela ame te sikadiuas tumensa angla leste .

text: For all things are for your sakes , that the abundant grace might through the thanksgiving of many redound to the glory of God .
text2: Sa kadia tumenge ; saxke o lashimos le Devlesko aresel te skepil mai bute manushen , saxke mai but rhugimata naisimaske te aven angla barimos le Devlesko .

text: For which cause we faint not ; but though our outward man perish , yet the inward man is renewed day by day .
text2: Anda kodia shoxar chi xasaras zor . Marka ke rimolape amaro stato xantsi po xantsi , amaro traio kai dia ame O Del neviol swako dies .

text: For our light affliction , which is but for a moment , worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory ;
text2: Ke amaro chinuria le tsinorhe , kai si ame akana , lasharen amenge iek mai baro lashimos kai chi mai getolpe , but mai but ke so chinuisaras .

text: While we look not at the things which are seen , but at the things which are not seen : for the things which are seen are temporal ; but the things which are not seen are eternal .
text2: Ke chi las sama pel dieli kai dichon , numa pel dieli kai chi dichon : so dichol ferdi xantsi vriama inkerel , numa so chi dichol inkerel sagda .

text: For we know that if our earthly house of this tabernacle were dissolved , we have a building of God , an house not made with hands , eternal in the heavens .
text2: Zhanas ke ande tsera kai traiisaras , kodia si amaro stato la phuviako , merel . O Del garavel amenge iek kher ando cheri , iek kher kai kerdia les wo , ai kai beshela sagda .

text: For in this we groan , earnestly desiring to be clothed upon with our house which is from heaven :
text2: Ai ame rovas ande amende ke zurales mangas te avel ame amaro nevo stato kai avela ame ando rhaio .

text: If so be that being clothed we shall not be found naked .
text2: Chi avasa arakhliam bi o stato , traiisarasa ando nevo stato .

text: For we that are in this tabernacle do groan , being burdened : not for that we would be unclothed , but clothed upon , that mortality might be swallowed up of life .
text2: Ke ame kai sam ande kado stato vachisaras ai nekezhime ; na ke mangas te shudas amaro stato , numa mangas te las pe amende o stato o zhuvindo kai chi mai merel .

text: Now he that hath wrought us for the selfsame thing is God , who also hath given unto us the earnest of the Spirit .
text2: Saxke so merel te avel tasado ando traio . O Del si kai dia ame te zhanas kasavestar parhuimos , ai dia ame pesko Swunto Duxo sar marturo pel dieli kai garavel amenge .

text: Therefore we are always confident , knowing that , whilst we are at home in the body , we are absent from the Lord :
text2: Ame sam sagda zurale . Zhanas ke zhi kai godi avasa ande kado stato , dur sam katar o kher le Devlesko .

text: ( For we walk by faith , not by sight : )
text2: Anda pachamos phiras , ai na ande so dikhas .

text: We are confident , I say , and willing rather to be absent from the body , and to be present with the Lord .
text2: Si ame pachamos , ai mangliamas mai mishto te zhastar anda kado stato , ai te zhas te beshas le Devlesa .

text: Wherefore we labour , that , whether present or absent , we may be accepted of him .
text2: Numa mangas mai anglal sar sa te avas leske drago , te beshasa ande kado stato vai mekasa les .

text: For we must all appear before the judgment seat of Christ ; that every one may receive the things done in his body , according to that he hath done , whether it be good or bad .
text2: Ke trobul savorhe te nakhas angla Del te avas dine pe kris lestar . Saxke swako te lel so avel leske , ai pala so kerdia , mishtimos vai nasulimos , kana sas ande pesko stato .

text: Knowing therefore the terror of the Lord , we persuade men ; but we are made manifest unto God ; and I trust also are made manifest in your consciences .
text2: Zhanas so si te daras katar O Del , ai rodas te parhavas le manushen ; O Del zhanel ame mishto , ai gindiv ke ande tumaro gindo zhanen ma vi tume .

text: For we commend not ourselves again unto you , but give you occasion to glory on our behalf , that ye may have somewhat to answer them which glory in appearance , and not in heart .
text2: Ame chi mai pale mangas te mothas pa amende so kerdiam tumenge , numa das tume te sai luvudin tume pala amende , ai kadia sai den atweto kodolen kai keren barimata andal dieli kai si avrial , ai na so si ando ilo .

text: For whether we be beside ourselves , it is to God : or whether we be sober , it is for your cause .
text2: Te si chaches ke dzilo sim ? Le Devleske sim , vai te sim gojaver ?

text: For the love of Christ constraineth us ; because we thus judge , that if one died for all , then were all dead :
text2: Tumenge sim . Ke e dragostia le Kristoski poronchil pe amende , ame kai pachas ame , ke iek mulo savorhenge , ai kodia znachil ke savorhe mule lesa .

text: And that he died for all , that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves , but unto him which died for them , and rose again .
text2: Wo mulo savorhenge , saxke kodola kai traiin te na mai traiin penge , numa kodoleske kai mulo ai zhuvindisailo lenge .

text: Wherefore henceforth know we no man after the flesh : yea , though we have known Christ after the flesh , yet now henceforth know we him no more .
text2: No akana , chi mai zhanas kanikas ando stato . Ai te zhangliam le Kristos ando stato mai anglal , numa akana chi mai zhanas les sakadia .

text: Therefore if any man be in Christ , he is a new creature : old things are passed away ; behold , all things are become new .
text2: Te astardilo vari kon le Kristosa , wo si iek nevo manush ; le dieli le phurane nakhle , ai akana swako diela kerdili nevi .

text: And all things are of God , who hath reconciled us to himself by Jesus Christ , and hath given to us the ministry of reconciliation ;
text2: Ai sa kodia avel katar O Del , kai chidia ame pale pesa katar O Kristo , ai kai dia ame e buchi , saxke te mothas le kolavrenge te chidenpe pasha Del .

text: To wit , that God was in Christ , reconciling the world unto himself , not imputing their trespasses unto them ; and hath committed unto us the word of reconciliation .
text2: Ke O Del sas ando Kristo , ai lesa kerdia O Del te chidel sa le manushen peste , bi te lel sama lenge dosha , ai O Del dia amen te mothas kodia buchi kai chidel le manushen pasha Del .

text: Now then we are ambassadors for Christ , as though God did beseech you by us : we pray you in Christ ' s stead , be ye reconciled to God .
text2: Ame keras buchi le Kristoski , O Del del duma tumensa pala amenge , ame mangas tumendar ando anav le Kristosko te premon le Devles .

text: For he hath made him to be sin for us , who knew no sin ; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him .
text2: O Kristo nas chi iek bezex pe leste , numa O Del kerdia te perel amaro bezex pe leste , saxke ame te avas vorta angla Del katar o Kristo .

text: We then , as workers together with him , beseech you also that ye receive not the grace of God in vain .
text2: Ame kai keras buchi andek than le Devleske , ame mangas tumendar te na meken te xasavol o mishtimos kai sas tume dino lestar .

text: ( For he saith , I have heard thee in a time accepted , and in the day of salvation have I succoured thee : behold , now is the accepted time ; behold , now is the day of salvation . )
text2: O Del mothol , " Ashundem tute kana avili e vriama , o dies le skepimasko zhutisardem tu . " Eta , akana e vriama e lashi , adies o dies le skepimasko !

text: Giving no offence in any thing , that the ministry be not blamed :
text2: Ame mangas te na mothon ke amari buchi nai chachi , anda kodia ame rodas te na rimosaras kanikaske ande kancheste .

text: But in all things approving ourselves as the ministers of God , in much patience , in afflictions , in necessities , in distresses ,
text2: Numa sikavas ande soste godi ke sam slugi le Devleske , ande rhavda , ande chinuria , ande so trobulsardiam ame , ai ande nekazuria .

text: In stripes , in imprisonments , in tumults , in labours , in watchings , in fastings ;
text2: Samas marde , ai thode amen ande temnitsa , ai buntuisarde le narodos pe amende , kerdiam buchi kai sas defial phare , chi sovasas , ai chi xasas .

text: By pureness , by knowledge , by longsuffering , by kindness , by the Holy Ghost , by love unfeigned ,
text2: Ame sikavas ke sam slugi le Devleske katar amaro vuzhimos angla Del , ai kai zhanas E Vorba le Devleski , katar amari rhavda , ai amaro lashimos kai si ame katar o Swunto Duxo , ai katar amari dragostia e chachi .

text: By the word of truth , by the power of God , by the armour of righteousness on the right hand and on the left ,
text2: Ai kai das duma pa chachimos , ai katar e putiera le Devleski , amari armia si o chachimos kai si ando chacho vas te arakhas ame ai si ando stingo vas te maras ame .

text: By honour and dishonour , by evil report and good report : as deceivers , and yet true ;
text2: Uni manush luvudin ame , ai uni manush keren lazhav anda amende ; uni manush mothon nasulimos pa amende , ai uni manush phenen mishtimos pa amende ; uni manush dikhen pe amende sar te aviliamas xoxamle , ai ame o chachimos phenas ;

text: As unknown , and yet well known ; as dying , and , behold , we live ; as chastened , and not killed ;
text2: uni manush dikhen pe amende sar te na zhanglino amen , numa savorhe zhanen ame ; won keren sar muliam , numa ame zhuvinde sam tume dikhen ; maren ame , numa chi mudaren ame ;

text: As sorrowful , yet alway rejoicing ; as poor , yet making many rich ; as having nothing , and yet possessing all things .
text2: Pherdo nekezhime sam , numa sa ame raduime sam ; sam chorhe , numa ame barvalas bute narodos ; nai ame kanchi , numa chaches amen si ame swako fialo .

text: O ye Corinthians , our mouth is open unto you , our heart is enlarged .
text2: Chachimasa diam tumensa duma , murhe vortacha ande Corinth ! Ame phuterdiam tumenge sa amaro ilo .

text: Ye are not straitened in us , but ye are straitened in your own bowels .
text2: Chi phandadiam tumenge amaro ilo ; numa tume phandadian tumaro ilo amenge .

text: Now for a recompence in the same , ( I speak as unto my children , ) be ye also enlarged .
text2: Dav tumensa duma sar te avilianas murhe shave . Keren amensa sar ame keras tumensa , phutren amenge zurales tumaro ilo .

text: Be ye not unequally yoked together with unbelievers : for what fellowship hath righteousness with unrighteousness ? and what communion hath light with darkness ?
text2: Na thon tume kodolensa kai chi pachanpe ando Del , ke won chi malaven pala tumende . Sar sai so si vorta malavel pala nasulimos ? Sar sai e vediara tholpe le tuniarikosa andek than ?

text: And what concord hath Christ with Belial ? or what part hath he that believeth with an infidel ?
text2: Sar sai O Kristo malavel pala beng ? Ai so lel o manush kai pachalpe ando Del katar kado kai chi pachalpe ?

text: And what agreement hath the temple of God with idols ? for ye are the temple of the living God ; as God hath said , I will dwell in them , and walk in them ; and I will be their God , and they shall be my people .
text2: Sar sai e khangeri le Devleski ai le ikoni le manushenge kai chi pachan pe ando Del aven andek than ? Ke ame sam e khangeri le Devleski , O Del o zhuvindo , ke O Del phendia , " Beshava ande lende , ai traiiva ande lende , me avava lengo Del , ai won avena murho narodo . "

text: Wherefore come out from among them , and be ye separate , saith the Lord , and touch not the unclean thing ; and I will receive you ,
text2: Anda kodia O Del mothol , " Trobul te meken le , ai te vuladion katar kodala manush kai chi pachanpe ando Del , ai nazban kanchi kai si bi vuxho , ai me lava tume mande .

text: And will be a Father unto you , and ye shall be my sons and daughters , saith the Lord Almighty .
text2: Me avava tumaro Dat , ai tume aven murhe shave ai murhe sheia , mothol O Del o Baro . "

text: Having therefore these promises , dearly beloved , let us cleanse ourselves from all filthiness of the flesh and spirit , perfecting holiness in the fear of God .
text2: Sa kadala dieli sas shinade amende , murhe kuchi vortacha . Vuzhuvas anda so godi maril o stato ai o duxo , ai luvudis O Del la dragostiasa , ai das amaro traio ka Del ande swako fialo ande dar le Devleske .

text: Receive us ; we have wronged no man , we have corrupted no man , we have defrauded no man .
text2: Den ame iek than ande tumaro ilo . Chi shubisailiam angla kanikaste , chi kerdiam te shubilpe khonik , chi dziliardiam kanikas te las so si lesko .

text: I speak not this to condemn you : for I have said before , that ye are in our hearts to die and live with you .
text2: Nai te dosharav tume kai dav duma kadia , ke mai phendem , ke tume san ande amare ile vi ando traio ai vi kai martia .

text: Great is my boldness of speech toward you , great is my glorying of you : I am filled with comfort , I am exceeding joyful in all our tribulation .
text2: Si ma iek baro pachamos ande tumende , ai sai luvudiv tume ! Pechime sim ai defial raduime andel nekazuira kai sam .

text: For , when we were come into Macedonia , our flesh had no rest , but we were troubled on every side ; without were fightings , within were fears .
text2: Ke de sar aresliam ande Macedonia , amaro stato chi pashlilo vov si , numa sas ame baiuria pa swako rik ; ai xasas ame uni manushensa , ai dar sas ame ande amare ile .

text: Nevertheless God , that comforteth those that are cast down , comforted us by the coming of Titus ;
text2: Numa O Del kai pechil kodolen kai si nekezhime , pechisardia ame kana tradia amenge o Titus .

text: And not by his coming only , but by the consolation wherewith he was comforted in you , when he told us your earnest desire , your mourning , your fervent mind toward me ; so that I rejoiced the more .
text2: Ai samas pechime , na ferdi ke avilo , numa ke phendia amenge sar tume pechisardian les . Ai phendia amenge sode mangen te dikhen ma , ai sode nekezhime san , ai sode gata san te thon mange partia ; anda kodia akana sim mai raduime .

text: For though I made you sorry with a letter , I do not repent , though I did repent : for I perceive that the same epistle hath made you sorry , though it were but for a season .
text2: Amborim kado lil kai tradem nekezhisardia tumen , numa nai baio akana . Numa baio sas kana dikhlem ke kodo lil nekezhisardia tume pe xantsi vriama .

text: Now I rejoice , not that ye were made sorry , but that ye sorrowed to repentance : for ye were made sorry after a godly manner , that ye might receive damage by us in nothing .
text2: Numa raduiv ma akana , na ke nekezhisailianas pala murho lil , numa ke tumaro nekazo kerdia tume te kein tume anda so kerenas ka Del , kodole nekazosa kai sas tume kerdia tume te kein , ai ame chi kerdiam tumenge chi iek baio .

text: For godly sorrow worketh repentance to salvation not to be repented of : but the sorrow of the world worketh death .
text2: Ke o nekazo kai kerel O Del lesa buchi parhuvel o traio ai ingerel ka skepimos - ai chi mothas ke nas mishto ! Numa o nekazo la lumiako angerel ka martia .

text: For behold this selfsame thing , that ye sorrowed after a godly sort , what carefulness it wrought in you , yea , what clearing of yourselves , yea , what indignation , yea , what fear , yea , what vehement desire , yea , what zeal , yea , what revenge ! In all things ye have approved yourselves to be clear in this matter .
text2: O Del kerdia buchi le nekazosa kai avilo pe tumende : ai dikhen akana so kerdilia ande tumende , ai dikhen kodo nekazo kerdia te avel tumenge e buchi le Devleske po ilo , ai kerdia te aven tumare ilesa te roden te thon tumenge partia ! Che xoli , che dar , che dragostia ando ilo te dikhen ma , ai le ilesa , ai sigo te dosharen le nasulimos !

text: Wherefore , though I wrote unto you , I did it not for his cause that had done the wrong , nor for his cause that suffered wrong , but that our care for you in the sight of God might appear unto you .
text2: No te ramov tumenge , nai pala kodo kai kerdia o nasulimos , vai kodoleske kai kerdia , numa ramosardem tumenge te dikhen mishto angla Del sode sam tumenge drago .

text: Therefore we were comforted in your comfort : yea , and exceedingly the more joyed we for the joy of Titus , because his spirit was refreshed by you all .
text2: Pala kodia liam zor . Chi liam ferdi zor , numa amaro raduimos mai baro sas , kana dikhliam sode o Titus raduime sas , kana tume savorhe pechisardian les .

text: For if I have boasted any thing to him of you , I am not ashamed ; but as we spake all things to you in truth , even so our boasting , which I made before Titus , is found a truth .
text2: Ai te luvudisardem tume xantsi angla leste , nas mange lazhav tumendar . Numa sar phendiam sagda tumenge o chachimos . Vi o luvudimos kai kerdem angla Titus chachimos si .

text: And his inward affection is more abundant toward you , whilst he remembereth the obedience of you all , how with fear and trembling ye received him .
text2: Ai kadia leski dragostia karing tumende mai bari la , kana delpe goji sar savorhe mangenas te pachan o mui , ai sar premisardian les darasa ai izdraimasa .

text: I rejoice therefore that I have confidence in you in all things .
text2: Defial raduime sim ke zhanav ke sai jinav pe tumende ande soste godi .

text: Moreover , brethren , we do you to wit of the grace of God bestowed on the churches of Macedonia ;
text2: Keras tume te zhanen murhe phral , o lashimos le Devlesko kai kerdilo andel khangeria kai si ande Macedonia .

text: How that in a great trial of affliction the abundance of their joy and their deep poverty abounded unto the riches of their liberality .
text2: Le shave le Devleske sas zurales zumade le chinosa kai sas le ; numa lengo raduimos kadia de baro sas kai denas so godi dashtinas , marka ke chorhe sas .

text: For to their power , I bear record , yea , and beyond their power they were willing of themselves ;
text2: Phenav tumenge , won dine so dashtinas ai inker mai but de sode dashtinas pendar .

text: Praying us with much intreaty that we would receive the gift , and take upon us the fellowship of the ministering to the saints .
text2: Mangle amendar ai butivar sa penge ilesa te sai zhutin ai te traden vari so le Devleske shavenge kai si ande Judea .

text: And this they did , not as we hoped , but first gave their own selves to the Lord , and unto us by the will of God .
text2: Ai chi ferdi zhutisarde ando tovaro sar ame azhukerasas , numa dine pe won mai anglal ka Del , porme dinepe amenge ande voia le Devleski .

text: Insomuch that we desired Titus , that as he had begun , so he would also finish in you the same grace also .
text2: Anda kodia mangliam ame katar o Titus te zhal tumende , ai te kerel e buchi kai nachinaisardiasas te kerel te zhutil tume te geton kodia lashi buchi .

text: Therefore , as ye abound in every thing , in faith , and utterance , and knowledge , and in all diligence , and in your love to us , see that ye abound in this grace also .
text2: Barvale san ande soste godi , ando pachamos , ando divano , ande goji , ai ando zhutimos , ande soste godi , ai tumari dragostia kai si tume amenge , ai ame mangas te aven barvale ande kadia buchi la dragostiaki .

text: I speak not by commandment , but by occasion of the forwardness of others , and to prove the sincerity of your love .
text2: Chi dav tume iek ordina . Numa phenav tumenge sode mangen te zhutin le kolaver , ai te lav sama o chachimos tumare dragostiako .

text: For ye know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ , that , though he was rich , yet for your sakes he became poor , that ye through his poverty might be rich .
text2: Ke zhanen o mishtimos amare Devlesko O Jesus Kristo ; kai wo kai sas barvalo , kerdilo chorho tumenge , ai te barvalon tume katar pesko chorhimos .

text: And herein I give my advice : for this is expedient for you , who have begun before , not only to do , but also to be forward a year ago .
text2: Phenav tumenge so me gindiv pa kadia diela ; mishto avelas tumenge te geton so nachinaisardian o bersh kai nakhlo .

text: Now therefore perform the doing of it ; that as there was a readiness to will , so there may be a performance also out of that which ye have .
text2: Ke tume sanas le perve , na ferdi te keren , numa kai mangenas te keren . Zhan angle akana , ai geton kodia buchi ! Ai thon sa tumaro ilo te geton ke sar thodianas tumaro ilo te keren , so sa sas tumen .

text: For if there be first a willing mind , it is accepted according to that a man hath , and not according to that he hath not .
text2: Ke kana des sa che ilesa , O Del premol so dian ai dikhel pe so si amen , ai na so nai amen !

text: For I mean not that other men be eased , and ye burdened :
text2: Ke chi mothav tumenge te chorhavon tume ai te den le kolavren , numa trobul te avel tume saikfielo , akana si tume but ai sai zhutin kodolen kai nai le .

text: But by an equality , that now at this time your abundance may be a supply for their want , that their abundance also may be a supply for your want : that there may be equality :
text2: Ai porme te na avela tumen andek dies ai len te avela , won sai dena tumen , ai kadia si kai avela saikfielo .

text: As it is written , He that had gathered much had nothing over ; and he that had gathered little had no lack .
text2: Ke E Vorba le Devleski mothol , " Kodo kai chidia but nas les kanchi mai but , ai kodo kai chidia xantsi nas les mai xantsi . "

text: But thanks be to God , which put the same earnest care into the heart of Titus for you .
text2: Luvudime te avel O Del kai thodia ando ilo le Titosko sa kodo dragostia tumenge .

text: For indeed he accepted the exhortation ; but being more forward , of his own accord he went unto you .
text2: Ke premosardia so manglian lestar ; ai neve ilesa mangelas te zhutil , ai ande peste manglia te zhal tumende .

text: And we have sent with him the brother , whose praise is in the gospel throughout all the churches ;
text2: Ai lesa tradas ieke phrales kai sa le khangeria luvudin les ande peski buchi kai anel e lashi viasta le Devleski .

text: And not that only , but who was also chosen of the churches to travel with us with this grace , which is administered by us to the glory of the same Lord , and declaration of your ready mind :
text2: Inker le khangeria alosarde les te zhal amensa pe kado drom kai ame kerasa kadia lashi buchi ando anav le Devlesko , ai te sikavas sode mangas te zhutisaras le kolavren .

text: Avoiding this , that no man should blame us in this abundance which is administered by us :
text2: Ame arakhas ame saxke khonik te na xoliavol pe amende kai si ame kadala but love kai chidiam ai kai thode ame te arakhas le .

text: Providing for honest things , not only in the sight of the Lord , but also in the sight of men .
text2: Ke ame rodas o mishtimos , na ferdi angla Del , numa vi anglal manush .

text: And we have sent with them our brother , whom we have oftentimes proved diligent in many things , but now much more diligent , upon the great confidence which I have in you .
text2: Tradas lensa amare phrales , kai butivar zumadiam les , ai wo sagda sa peske ilesa mangelas te kerel buchi . Numa akana mai but mangel te kerel buchi , ke pala baro pachamos kai si les ande tumende .

text: Whether any do inquire of Titus , he is my partner and fellowhelper concerning you : or our brethren be inquired of , they are the messengers of the churches , and the glory of Christ .
text2: O Titus , si murho zhutitori ai kerel buchi mansa tumenge ; ai le kolaver phral kai si lesa , tradine le katar le khangeria ai keren buchi ando anav le Kristosko .

text: Wherefore shew ye to them , and before the churches , the proof of your love , and of our boasting on your behalf .
text2: Sikaven lenge ke mangen le chaches , saxke le khangeria te zhanen mishto ai te zhanen ke ame zhanas sostar luvudis tume .

text: For as touching the ministering to the saints , it is superfluous for me to write to you :
text2: Chi mai trobul te tradav tumenge lil ai te mothav tumenge pa zhutimos kai si tradino ka narodo le Devlesko kai si ande Judea .

text: For I know the forwardness of your mind , for which I boast of you to them of Macedonia , that Achaia was ready a year ago ; and your zeal hath provoked very many .
text2: Zhanav ke tume drago tumenge te zhutin , ai luvudisardem tume angla narodo kai si ande Macedonia . Ai phendem lenge , " Le phral kai si ande Gretsia , gatale te zhutin de katar o bersh kai nakhlo . " Tume kai drago tumenge te zhutin dia zor ka but anda lende .

text: Yet have I sent the brethren , lest our boasting of you should be in vain in this behalf ; that , as I said , ye may be ready :
text2: Tradav tumenge kadala phralen , saxke o luvudimos kai kerdiam pa tumende ande kadia diela te na rimolpe , mangav te aven chaches gata sar phendem .

text: Lest haply if they of Macedonia come with me , and find you unprepared , we ( that we say not , ye ) should be ashamed in this same confident boasting .
text2: Te na nichi , o narodo kai si ande Macedonia te avena mansa ai te na arakhena tumen gata , lazhav avela amenge , ke ame kai jinasas pe tumende te aven gata , ai savestar lazhav avela tumenge .

text: Therefore I thought it necessary to exhort the brethren , that they would go before unto you , and make up beforehand your bounty , whereof ye had notice before , that the same might be ready , as a matter of bounty , and not as of covetousness .
text2: No haliardem te mangav kadale phralen te zhan tumende mai anglal mandar te lasharen e podarka kai shinadian vunzhe , ai kadia avela gata kana avava , ai kodia sikavela ke tume den tumare ilesa , ai na bi lesko .

text: But this I say , He which soweth sparingly shall reap also sparingly ; and he which soweth bountifully shall reap also bountifully .
text2: Den tume goji , kodo kai bariarel xantsi chidela xantsi , ai kodo kai bariarel but chidela but .

text: Every man according as he purposeth in his heart , so let him give ; not grudgingly , or of necessity : for God loveth a cheerful giver .
text2: Trobul swako manush te del , sar haliarel ande pesko ilo , ai na te mothol sostar dem , vai musai sas leske te del ; ke O Del drago leske kodo kai del raduimasa .

text: And God is able to make all grace abound toward you ; that ye , always having all sufficiency in all things , may abound to every good work :
text2: Ai O Del si les e putiera te del tume but lashimata , saxke te avel tume sagda so trobul tume , ai mai but opral pala mishtimos kai keren .

text: ( As it is written , He hath dispersed abroad ; he hath given to the poor : his righteousness remaineth for ever .
text2: Ke E Vorba le Devleski mothol , " O Del del but kal chorhe ; lesko lashimos shoxar chi getolpe . "

text: Now he that ministereth seed to the sower both minister bread for your food , and multiply your seed sown , and increase the fruits of your righteousness ; )
text2: O Del , kai del sumuntsa kodoles kai shudel e sumuntsa ai manrho te pravardiol , dela tume sa e sumuntsa kai trobul tumen ai kerela te butiarela , ai butiol e fruta tumare chachimaski .

text: Being enriched in every thing to all bountifulness , which causeth through us thanksgiving to God .
text2: Kerela tumen te aven barvale ande swako vriama , saxke sagda te zhutin , ai kadia but naisina le Devles anda tumare podarki kai das le ame .

text: For the administration of this service not only supplieth the want of the saints , but is abundant also by many thanksgivings unto God ;
text2: Ke kado zhutimos kai keren chi ferdi zhutil le Devleske narodos , numa kerela but rhugimata ai naisimata le Devleske .

text: Whiles by the experiment of this ministration they glorify God for your professed subjection unto the gospel of Christ , and for your liberal distribution unto them , and unto all men ;
text2: Kodo zhutimos sikavela so san , ai kadia but luvudina le Devles ke dikhena sar sikaven tumaro pachamos ande lashi viasta le Kristoski , ai luvudina les , vi sar hulaven dragosa tumaro mishtimos lensa , ai vi le kolavrensa .

text: And by their prayer for you , which long after you for the exceeding grace of God in you .
text2: Ai rhugin tumenge , ai avena lenge drago katar o lashimos o baro kai O Del shordia pe tumende .

text: Thanks be unto God for his unspeakable gift .
text2: Luvudime te avel O Del anda peski bari podarka !

text: Now I Paul myself beseech you by the meekness and gentleness of Christ , who in presence am base among you , but being absent am bold toward you :
text2: Me o Pavlo , phenav tumenge , me kai sim sar mothon lazhano kana sim tumensa , numa kana chi mai sim tumensa , chi mai sim lazhano . Mangav ma tumendar katar o kovlimos ai o lashimos le Kristosko .

text: But I beseech you , that I may not be bold when I am present with that confidence , wherewith I think to be bold against some , which think of us as if we walked according to the flesh .
text2: Na keren te na mai lazhav tumendar kana avava tumen ; ke zhanav ke sai sikavav ke chi lazhav mashkar kodola kai gindin ke keras le dieli le statoske .

text: For though we walk in the flesh , we do not war after the flesh :
text2: Chaches traiisaras andek stato manushesko , numa chi maras ame sar le manush .

text: ( For the weapons of our warfare are not carnal , but mighty through God to the pulling down of strong holds ; )
text2: Numa e armia kai si ame te maras ame , nai armia le manushengi kai si pe kadia phuv , numa e armia e zurali le Devleski kai sai peravel le dieli le bengeske .

text: Casting down imaginations , and every high thing that exalteth itself against the knowledge of God , and bringing into captivity every thought to the obedience of Christ ;
text2: Ame peravas le dieli kai nai chache angla Del ; Ame peravas so godi vazden andel barimata karing e goji le Devleski ; ai ame astaras so godi gindo te pachal o mui le Kristosko .

text: And having in a readiness to revenge all disobedience , when your obedience is fulfilled .
text2: Ai gata sam te dosharas so godi chi pachal o mui le Krstosko , kana tume pachana vorta o mui le Kristosko .

text: Do ye look on things after the outward appearance ? If any man trust to himself that he is Christ ' s , let him of himself think this again , that , as he is Christ ' s , even so are we Christ ' s .
text2: Tume dikhen avrial te mothola vari kon ke wo si le Kristosko ? Ai te mothol peske mishto wo ande peste , ke sar wo si le Kristosko iame sam .

text: For though I should boast somewhat more of our authority , which the Lord hath given us for edification , and not for your destruction , I should not be ashamed :
text2: Ke nai mange lazhav , marka ke luvudisailem , xantsi but andai putiera kai O Del dia ame , e putiera kai si te barion ando pachamos , ai na te rimon tume .

text: That I may not seem as if I would terrify you by letters .
text2: Chi mangav te miazol ke rodav te daravav tumen le lilensa kai tradav tumenge .

text: For his letters , say they , are weighty and powerful ; but his bodily presence is weak , and his speech contemptible .
text2: Ke eta so mothon , " Le lila kai tradel o Pavlo defial zuralele , numa kana si mashkar amende o Pavlo kovlo lo , ai lesko divano nai lasho . "

text: Let such an one think this , that , such as we are in word by letters when we are absent , such will we be also in deed when we are present .
text2: Kodo kai mothol kadia , mangav te zhanel mishto ke saikfielo ande so ramosaras ande amare lila kana chi sam tumensa , ai so kerasa kana avasa mashkar tumende .

text: For we dare not make ourselves of the number , or compare ourselves with some that commend themselves : but they measuring themselves by themselves , and comparing themselves among themselves , are not wise .
text2: Ame chi tromas te avas iek fielo vai te miazuas sar uni kai miazol lenge mai lashe le sar savorhe . Ke won chi haliaren ! Won keren pengi musura te musurin pe , ai keren kris pe pende sar won gindin !

text: But we will not boast of things without our measure , but according to the measure of the rule which God hath distributed to us , a measure to reach even unto you .
text2: Numa ame , chi mangas te luvudisavas opral pai musura kai O Del thodia amenge , kai dia ame te avas zhi tumende .

text: For we stretch not ourselves beyond our measure , as though we reached not unto you : for we are come as far as to you also in preaching the gospel of Christ :
text2: Chi nakhas amare musuri sar te avilino te na aviliamas zhi tumende , numa aresliam zhi tumende , ai andiam tumenge e lashi viasta le Kristoski .

text: Not boasting of things without our measure , that is , of other men ' s labours ; but having hope , when your faith is increased , that we shall be enlarged by you according to our rule abundantly ,
text2: No chi anklias avri andal musuri kai sas thodine . Chi luvudisavas andai buchi kai kerde le kolaver , numa inker ame pachas ame ke tumaro pachamos bariola , ai ke ame sai kerasa iek buchi but mai bari mashkar tumende , numa beshas sagda andel musuri kai O Del thodia amenge .

text: To preach the gospel in the regions beyond you , and not to boast in another man ' s line of things made ready to our hand .
text2: Porme ame sai phenas e lashi viasta andel gava kai si mai dur tumendar , bi te luvudisavas anda so le kolaver vunzhe kerde ande penge gava .

text: But he that glorieth , let him glory in the Lord .
text2: Numa sar mothol E Vorba le Devleski , " Kodo kai mangel te luvudilpe , luvudilpe anda so kerdia O Del . "

text: For not he that commendeth himself is approved , but whom the Lord commendeth .
text2: Chaches o manush kai si chaches lasho , nai kodo kai mothol peske wo ke lasho lo , numa kodo si lasho kai mothol O Del pa leste ke lasho lo .

text: Would to God ye could bear with me a little in my folly : and indeed bear with me .
text2: Manglemas te rhevdin xantsi dzilimos , e rhevdin man ! Zhaluzo sim anda tumende numa iek zhaluzia kai si Devleski .

text: For I am jealous over you with godly jealousy : for I have espoused you to one husband , that I may present you as a chaste virgin to Christ .
text2: Ke tume san sar iek shei bari vuzhi kai shinadem te ansurilpe ieke rhomesa , kodo si O Kristo .

text: But I fear , lest by any means , as the serpent beguiled Eve through his subtilty , so your minds should be corrupted from the simplicity that is in Christ .
text2: Numa dar mange ke tumari goji shindiol ai ke meken tume katar tumaro phanglimos kai si vorta ai vuzho le Kristosa , sar e Eve kai meklia pe te xasavol katar le xoxaimata le gojaver le sapeske .

text: For if he that cometh preacheth another Jesus , whom we have not preached , or if ye receive another spirit , which ye have not received , or another gospel , which ye have not accepted , ye might well bear with him .
text2: Ke te avela vari kon te mothol tumenge pa aver Jesus , ke sar kodo kai phendiam ame ; vai te premina aver duxo ke sar kodo kai premisardian , vai aver lashi viasta ke sar kucha kai premisardian ! Tume rhevdin mishto kodia .

text: For I suppose I was not a whit behind the very chiefest apostles .
text2: Gindiv ke chi sim mai tele ande kancheste ke sar tumare slugi !

text: But though I be rude in speech , yet not in knowledge ; but we have been throughly made manifest among you in all things .
text2: Amborim ke chi dav duma mishto , numa zhanav but dieli ; sikadiam tumenge vorta kana godi dashtisardiam ai ande soste godi .

text: Have I committed an offence in abasing myself that ye might be exalted , because I have preached to you the gospel of God freely ?
text2: Kana andem tumenge e lashi viasta le Devleski ivia kerdem kodia ; meklema man tele saxke te vazden tume . So aliaren ke shubisailem kai kerdem kadia ?

text: I robbed other churches , taking wages of them , to do you service .
text2: Premisardem te avav pochindo katar aver khangeria .

text: And when I was present with you , and wanted , I was chargeable to no man : for that which was lacking to me the brethren which came from Macedonia supplied : and in all things I have kept myself from being burdensome unto you , and so will I keep myself .
text2: Lem lenge love te zhutiv tume . Ai kana simas tumende chi lem kanikastar love kana trobulas man ; ke le phral kai avile andai Macedonia andine mange so godi trobulas ma . Arakhlema te na mangav tumendar kanchi , ai kadia kerava .

text: As the truth of Christ is in me , no man shall stop me of this boasting in the regions of Achaia .
text2: Ando chachimos le Kristosko kai si ande mande , phenav tumenge ke kado luvudimos chi avela mandar lino ande chi iek than ande Gretsia .

text: Wherefore ? because I love you not ? God knoweth .
text2: Sostar phendem kadia ? Ke nai mange drago tume ? Nichi . O Del zhanel .

text: But what I do , that I will do , that I may cut off occasion from them which desire occasion ; that wherein they glory , they may be found even as we .
text2: Zhava angle ai kerava sar kerava akana , saxke te lav so godi sai del kodolen te sai luvudinpe , ai te mothon ke sa sar amende keren buchi .

text: For such are false apostles , deceitful workers , transforming themselves into the apostles of Christ .
text2: Kodola manush si xoxamle apostluria , xoxaven ande pengi buchi , ai won keren te miazon apostluria le Kristoske .

text: And no marvel ; for Satan himself is transformed into an angel of light .
text2: Nai shodo ! Ke o beng sai kerdiol te miazol angelo vediarako !

text: Therefore it is no great thing if his ministers also be transformed as the ministers of righteousness ; whose end shall be according to their works .
text2: Nai shodo ke leske slugi keren te miazon sar slugi le chachimaske . Numa avela lenge ando gor pala so kerde .

text: I say again , Let no man think me a fool ; if otherwise , yet as a fool receive me , that I may boast myself a little .
text2: Mai mothav iek data : te na dikhel khonik pe mande sar pek dzilo . Te na nichi , premin mai sar iek dzilo , saxke te luvudiv ma ; me xantsi .

text: That which I speak , I speak it not after the Lord , but as it were foolishly , in this confidence of boasting .
text2: E so mothav akana , nai so manglino O Del , ande kodia diela kai luvudiv ma , numa sar iek dzilo dav duma .

text: Seeing that many glory after the flesh , I will glory also .
text2: Ke si but zhene kai luvudinpe ando stato , I me luvudiv ma .

text: For ye suffer fools gladly , seeing ye yourselves are wise .
text2: Ke tume rhevdin ilesa le dzilen , tume kai san gojaver .

text: For ye suffer , if a man bring you into bondage , if a man devour you , if a man take of you , if a man exalt himself , if a man smite you on the face .
text2: Tume rhevdin te mothon tumenge so te keren sar le rhoburia , vai len sama so keren , vai dziliaren tume , ai dikhen banges pe tumende , ai den tume palmi palmi pa mui .

text: I speak as concerning reproach , as though we had been weak . Howbeit whereinsoever any is bold , ( I speak foolishly , ) I am bold also .
text2: Lazhav mange te mothav ke sikadiam ke kovle samas , no te tromala vari kon te luvudilpe ande vari soste me dav duma sar te avilemas dzilo , ai i me tromava .

text: Are they Hebrews ? so am I . Are they Israelites ? so am I . Are they the seed of Abraham ? so am I .
text2: Won si Zhidovo ? I me sim . Won si Israelite ? I me sim . Won si andai vitsa le Abrahamoski ? I me sim .

text: Are they ministers of Christ ? ( I speak as a fool ) I am more ; in labours more abundant , in stripes above measure , in prisons more frequent , in deaths oft .
text2: Won si slugi le Kristoske ? Apo , Me dav duma sar te dzilailemas defial , ai me sim mai but ke sar won ! Me kerdem mai but buchi lendar , me simas ande temnitsa mai butivar , simas mardo mai but , ai mai butivar sas te merav lendar .

text: Of the Jews five times received I forty stripes save one .
text2: Panzhvar le Zhiduvuria dine ma le trendai inia bichuria .

text: Thrice was I beaten with rods , once was I stoned , thrice I suffered shipwreck , a night and a day I have been in the deep ;
text2: Trivar simas mardo katar le Romanuria , ai iek data shude le baxensa te mudaren ma ; trivar parhadile le paraxoduria kana simas po pai , ai iek data beshlem iek dies ( bish tai shtar chasuria ) ando pai .

text: In journeyings often , in perils of waters , in perils of robbers , in perils by mine own countrymen , in perils by the heathen , in perils in the city , in perils in the wilderness , in perils in the sea , in perils among false brethren ;
text2: Butivar pe murhe but droma kai zhavas dikhem baiuria katar paia kai denas opral , ai katar le chor , ai katar murho narodo le Zhiduvuria , ai katar kodola kai Nas Zhiduvuria ; dikhlem baiuria andel foruria , ai vi andel pusti , ai pe maria , ai mashkar le xoxamle phral .

text: In weariness and painfulness , in watchings often , in hunger and thirst , in fastings often , in cold and nakedness .
text2: Kerdem defial phare bucha ai bare zumaimata ai butivar chi sutem ; bokhalo simas ai troshalo ; butivar chi xalem ke nas xaben , shil sas mange , ai nas ma tsalia .

text: Beside those things that are without , that which cometh upon me daily , the care of all the churches .
text2: Ai mai aver dieli kai kerdilia mansa , swako dies sim andel nekazuria kai den ma le khangeria .

text: Who is weak , and I am not weak ? who is offended , and I burn not ?
