text2: Te avela vari kon kovlo ando pachamos , i me aliarav ma kovlo ; te perela vari kon ando bezex , vi man dukhal .

text: If I must needs glory , I will glory of the things which concern mine infirmities .
text2: Te trobula te luvudiv ma , luvudiva ma ande sa le dieli kai kovliaren murho stato .

text: The God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , which is blessed for evermore , knoweth that I lie not .
text2: O Del ai o Dat le Devlesko O Jesus , ai kai si swuntsome lesko anav ande swako vriama ! Zhanel ke chi xoxavav .

text: In Damascus the governor under Aretas the king kept the city of the Damascenes with a garrison , desirous to apprehend me :
text2: Kana simas ando Damascus , o governori kai sas tela vas le amperatosko o Aretas thodia ketanen kal vudara le foroske te aterdiarel ma .

text: And through a window in a basket was I let down by the wall , and escaped his hands .
text2: Numa kerde ma te nakhav katar iek feliastra kai sas ando zido le forosko , ai vuliarde ma andel shkonitsa , ai kadia si kai skepisailem lestar .

text: It is not expedient for me doubtless to glory . I will come to visions and revelations of the Lord .
text2: Trobul te luvudiv ma , marka ke kodia nai mishto . Numa si te dav duma akana pal dieli kai dikhlem ai kai dia ma O Del te zhanav .

text: I knew a man in Christ above fourteen years ago , ( whether in the body , I cannot tell ; or whether out of the body , I cannot tell : God knoweth ; ) such an one caught up to the third heaven .
text2: Zhanav ieke manushes kai diasas pe le Devleske kai de desh u shtar bersh palpale sas ingerdo zhi ando trito rhaio . ( Chi zhanav te sas lino peske statosa , vai bi peske statosko , chi zhanav , O Del zhanel ferdi . )

text: And I knew such a man , ( whether in the body , or out of the body , I cannot tell : God knoweth ; )
text2: E zhanav ke kodo manush sas ingerdo ando rhaio ( ai mai iek data mai mothav tumenge , chi zhanav , te sas lino peske statosa , vai bi peske statosko , chi zhanav , ferdi O Del zhanel . )

text: How that he was caught up into paradise , and heard unspeakable words , which it is not lawful for a man to utter .
text2: Ai kotse ando rhaio ashundia vorbi kai nashtilpe te mai motholpe pa lende , ai kai nai lau le manusheske te del duma .

text: Of such an one will I glory : yet of myself I will not glory , but in mine infirmities .
text2: Me luvudisardemas kodole manushes , numa me chi luvudisardemas man , de ferdi te mothav pal dieli kai sikaven murho kovlimos .

text: For though I would desire to glory , I shall not be a fool ; for I will say the truth : but now I forbear , lest any man should think of me above that which he seeth me to be , or that he heareth of me .
text2: Te manglemas te luvudiv ma , chi avilemas iek dzilo , ke phendemas o chachimos , numa arakhav ma te na luvudiv ma , ke chi mangav khonik te gindil pa mande ke sim mai but ke so dikhel ke kerav ai so mothav .

text: And lest I should be exalted above measure through the abundance of the revelations , there was given to me a thorn in the flesh , the messenger of Satan to buffet me , lest I should be exalted above measure .
text2: Numa te na avav barimatango kai sas ma dine dieli te zhanav kai si defial bare , sas ma dino iek naswalimas kai dukhavel , kai avel sar iek sluga tradini katar o beng te marel ma , ai te inkerel ma te na avav barimatango .

text: For this thing I besought the Lord thrice , that it might depart from me .
text2: Trivar rhugisailem ka Del anda kado naswalimos , ai manglem lestar te sastiarel ma .

text: And he said unto me , My grace is sufficient for thee : for my strength is made perfect in weakness . Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities , that the power of Christ may rest upon me .
text2: Ai wo dia ma atweto , " Murho mishtimos si so godi trobul tu , ke murhi putiera sikadiol peski buchi kana san kovlo . " Mai drago mange sas murhe ilesa te luvudiv ma anda murhe kovlimata , saxke e putiera le Kristoski te arakhel man .

text: Therefore I take pleasure in infirmities , in reproaches , in necessities , in persecutions , in distresses for Christ ' s sake : for when I am weak , then am I strong .
text2: Anda kodia raduima andal kovlimata , kai maren mandar mui andal nekazuira , kana chinuin ma , ai le baiuria kai aven pe mande pala Kristo ; ke kana sim kovlo , antunchi sim zuralo .

text: I am become a fool in glorying ; ye have compelled me : for I ought to have been commended of you : for in nothing am I behind the very chiefest apostles , though I be nothing .
text2: Dav duma sar te avilemas dzilo , numa tume kerdia kadia . Tume trobunas te chacharen ma . Ke vi te chi sim kanchi , chi sim vov si mai tele ke sar tumare slugi .

text: Truly the signs of an apostle were wrought among you in all patience , in signs , and wonders , and mighty deeds .
text2: Le dieli kai sikaven ke sim sluga kerdile mashkar tumende ieka rhavda sa kai sas maladi ; kodola dieli sas le semnuria , le chudimata , ai le mirakluria .

text: For what is it wherein ye were inferior to other churches , except it be that I myself was not burdensome to you ? forgive me this wrong .
text2: Ande soste sanas tume mai xantsi arakhle ke sar le kolaver khangeria , de ferdi ke chi manglem tumendar kanchi ? Iertin ma anda kodia .

text: Behold , the third time I am ready to come to you ; and I will not be burdensome to you : for I seek not yours , but you : for the children ought not to lay up for the parents , but the parents for the children .
text2: Eta , gata sim te mai zhav tumende pe trito data , ai pale chi mangava tumendar kanchi . Tumen mangav , ai na tumare loven . Chaches nai le glate kai trobul te nirin love te pravaren penge niamon , numa le niamuria te nirin love ai te pravaren le glaten .

text: And I will very gladly spend and be spent for you ; though the more abundantly I love you , the less I be loved .
text2: Ai te avava raduime te zidiv so godi si ma , ai te zidivma man te zhutiv tumen .

text: But be it so , I did not burden you : nevertheless , being crafty , I caught you with guile .
text2: Avava tumenge mai xantsi drago te avena tume mange kadia de drago ? Tume preznain , ke chi mangavas kanchi tumendar . Numa vari kon mothola , ke zhanglem sar te kerav ai ke astardem tume le xoxaimasa .

text: Did I make a gain of you by any of them whom I sent unto you ?
text2: So aliaren ? Ke lem vari so tumendar katar le manush kai tradem tumenge ?

text: I desired Titus , and with him I sent a brother . Did Titus make a gain of you ? walked we not in the same spirit ? walked we not in the same steps ?
text2: Manglema katar o Titus te zhal tumende , ai tradem lesa le phrales kai zhanen . Tume mothon ke o Titus lia vari so tumendar ? Pate chi kerdiam wo ai me iek fielo buchi ai phirdiam saikfielo ?

text: Again , think ye that we excuse ourselves unto you ? we speak before God in Christ : but we do all things , dearly beloved , for your edifying .
text2: Tume gindin de dumult ke ame rodas te chachuas angla tumende . Nichi ! Ame das duma sar O Kristo mangel angla Del , ai ame phenas tumenge sa kadala dieli , murhe kuchi vortacha , te bariol tumaro pachamos .

text: For I fear , lest , when I come , I shall not find you such as I would , and that I shall be found unto you such as ye would not : lest there be debates , envyings , wraths , strifes , backbitings , whisperings , swellings , tumults :
text2: Ke dar mange ke kana zhava tumende chi arakhav tume sar manglemas , ai ke tume chi arakhen man sar tume manglianas . Dar mange ke arakhava chingara ai zhaluzi , ai xoli , ai kai ferdi tumenge mangen , ai te den po lazhav , ai pupuimos , ai chi len sama , ai barimata , ai bunto .

text: And lest , when I come again , my God will humble me among you , and that I shall bewail many which have sinned already , and have not repented of the uncleanness and fornication and lasciviousness which they have committed .
text2: Dar mange ke kana mai zhava tumende murho Del huliarel ma pale tele angla tumende , ai avela te rovav pe but zhene kai kerde o bezex mai anglal , ai kai chi keisaile anda bi vuzhimos andai kurvia , ai sa le chorhe dieli kai kerde .

text: This is the third time I am coming to you . In the mouth of two or three witnesses shall every word be established .
text2: Pe trito data mai avav tumende . " Ai swako diela lashardiola angla dui vai trin marturia , " sar si ramome ande Vorba le Devleske .

text: I told you before , and foretell you , as if I were present , the second time ; and being absent now I write to them which heretofore have sinned , and to all other , that , if I come again , I will not spare :
text2: Si ma vari so te mothav kodolenge kai kerde bezex mai anglal , ai vi le kolavrenge ; phendemas tumenge kadia diela kana avilemas tumende pe duito data , numa mai mothav akana kai chi sim tumensa : kana mai zhava tumende te dikhav tume chi avava lasho kanikasa .

text: Since ye seek a proof of Christ speaking in me , which to you - ward is not weak , but is mighty in you .
text2: Tume roden te dikhen ke O Kristo del duma ande mande . Wo kai nai kovlo karing tumende , numa kai si la putierasa ande tumende .

text: For though he was crucified through weakness , yet he liveth by the power of God . For we also are weak in him , but we shall live with him by the power of God toward you .
text2: Ke sas karfome po trushul pala pesko kovlimos , numa wo traiil palai putiera le Devleski . Iame sam kovle ande leste , numa traiisaras lesa katar e putiera le Devleski , te kerel buchi karing tumende .

text: Examine yourselves , whether ye be in the faith ; prove your own selves . Know ye not your own selves , how that Jesus Christ is in you , except ye be reprobates ?
text2: Tume zumaven tumen ai len sama pe tumende , ta dikhen traiin ando pachamos . Tume preznain ke O Kristo traiil ande tume ? Vai amborim ke nashtim te sikaven ke pachan tume .

text: But I trust that ye shall know that we are not reprobates .
text2: Pachav ma ke preznaina ke chi sam kodolendar kai nashti sihavas ke pachas ame .

text: Now I pray to God that ye do no evil ; not that we should appear approved , but that ye should do that which is honest , though we be as reprobates .
text2: Me rhugiv ma ka Del te na keren nasulimos , ame mangas na te siavas kotsar so ame nashtis te keras , numa te dikhas tumen sar keren so si vorta , marka ke ame miazol ke nashtisaras .

text: For we can do nothing against the truth , but for the truth .
text2: Ke ame nashti keras kanchi karing o chachimos le Devlesko , de ferdi te keras o chachimos .

text: For we are glad , when we are weak , and ye are strong : and this also we wish , even your perfection .
text2: Ame raduisavas kana sam kovle numa tume zurale san . Ai ame mangas ande amaro rhugimos te kerdion vorta .

text: Therefore I write these things being absent , lest being present I should use sharpness , according to the power which the Lord hath given me to edification , and not to destruction .
text2: Eta , sostar ramov tumenge kadia kai sim dur tumendar ; saxke kana avela e vriama te avav tumende te na kerav tumensa zurales , ai te kerav la putierasa kai O Del dia ma e putiera , kai si te kerel tume te barion ando pachamos , ai na te rimon tume .

text: Finally , brethren , farewell . Be perfect , be of good comfort , be of one mind , live in peace ; and the God of love and peace shall be with you .
text2: Ai akana , murhe phral , ashen Devlesa ! Roden te aven vorta ; den zor iek kavres ; keren buchi andek than ; traiin ande pacha , ai O Del le dragostiamasko ai la pachako avela tumensa .

text: Greet one another with an holy kiss .
text2: Roden ta dikhen iek kavres ai chumiden tumen sar phral .

text: All the saints salute you .
text2: Sa o narodo le Devlesko tradel tumenge bax , zor , ai sastimos .

text: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ , and the love of God , and the communion of the Holy Ghost , be with you all . Amen .
text2: O mishtimos le Devlesko O Jesus Kristo , ai e dragostia le Devleski , ai andek than O Swunto Duxo te aven tumensa savorhensa .

text: Paul , an apostle , ( not of men , neither by man , but by Jesus Christ , and God the Father , who raised him from the dead ; )
text2: O Pavlo , ek apostle , na katar le manush , ai chi katar iek manush , numa katar O Jesus Kristo , ai O Del O Dat , kai zhuvindisardia les andal mule .

text: And all the brethren which are with me , unto the churches of Galatia :
text2: Ai sa le phral kai si katse mansa , te traden kado lil kal khangeria kai si ande Galatia ,

text: Grace be to you and peace from God the Father , and from our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: ai te mothas lenge , O Del amaro Dat , ai O Del O Jesus Kristo te del tume o mishtimos ai a pacha .

text: Who gave himself for our sins , that he might deliver us from this present evil world , according to the will of God and our Father :
text2: O Kristo diape wo te skepil amen anda amare bezexa , saxke te ankkalavel ame anda kadia lumia kai si akana ai kai si nasul , katar e voia amare Devleski ai amaro Dat .

text: To whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Ka Del te avel o barimos ande swako vriama . Amen

text: I marvel that ye are so soon removed from him that called you into the grace of Christ unto another gospel :
text2: Defial chudisailem kai meken kadia sigo kodoles kai akhardia tume pala lashimos le Kristosko , ai ke bolden tume karing iek aver lashi viasta .

text: Which is not another ; but there be some that trouble you , and would pervert the gospel of Christ .
text2: Chaches nai aver lashi viasta , numa dav tumensa duma kadia ke si narodo kai rimol tume , ai kai mangel te parhuvel e lashi viasta le Kristoski .

text: But though we , or an angel from heaven , preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you , let him be accursed .
text2: Numa marka ame , vai iek angelo kai avilo anda rhaio , te phendino tumenge iek aver lashi viasta ke sar kucha kai ame andiam tumenge , kodo te zhal ande iado !

text: As we said before , so say I now again , If any man preach any other gospel unto you than that ye have received , let him be accursed .
text2: Ame phendiam tumenge vunzhe ai mai mothav akana : te anela tumenge vari kon aver lashi viasta ke sar kucha kai sas tume dini , kodo te zhal ande iado !

text: For do I now persuade men , or God ? or do I seek to please men ? for if I yet pleased men , I should not be the servant of Christ .
text2: So znachil kodia , ke rodav te niriv o lashimos le manushengo ? Nichi ! Mangav o lashimos le Devlesko ! Vai rodav te avav drago le manushenge ? Ke te rodemas inker te avav drago le manushenge , nas te avav sluga le Kristoski .

text: But I certify you , brethren , that the gospel which was preached of me is not after man .
text2: Phenav tumenge , murhe phral , e lashi viasta kai phenav , chi avel katar o manush .

text: For I neither received it of man , neither was I taught it , but by the revelation of Jesus Christ .
text2: Chi lem kadia lashi viasta katar iek manush , ai khonik chi sichardia ma , numa O Jesus Kristo dia ma te zhanav la .

text: For ye have heard of my conversation in time past in the Jews ' religion , how that beyond measure I persecuted the church of God , and wasted it :
text2: Tume ashundian sar phiravas kana simas astardo ka zakono le Zhidovongo , zhanen sar chinuivas zurales e khangeri le Devleski ai tsavas sa murhi zor te peravav la .

text: And profited in the Jews ' religion above many my equals in mine own nation , being more exceedingly zealous of the traditions of my fathers .
text2: Me nakhavas buten vortachen le Zhidovon kai sas ande murhe bersh ando zakono o Zhidovisko . Me mai ilesa mangavas te kerav o zakono amare dadengo .

text: But when it pleased God , who separated me from my mother ' s womb , and called me by his grace ,
text2: Numa O Del , ande pesko lashimos , alosardia ma mai anglal sar te kerdiuav . Ai akhardia ma te kerav leski buchi .

text: To reveal his Son in me , that I might preach him among the heathen ; immediately I conferred not with flesh and blood :
text2: Ai kana manglia te sikavel mange peske shaves , saxke te angerav kal manush kai nai Zhiduvuria e pashi viasta le Kristoski . Chi gelem te phushav kanikas so te kerav .

text: Neither went I up to Jerusalem to them which were apostles before me ; but I went into Arabia , and returned again unto Damascus .
text2: Ai chi gelem chi ande Jerusalem te dikhav kodolen kai sas slugi le Devleske mai anglal mandar . Numa gelemtar strazo ande Arabia , porme gelem palpale ando Damsacus .

text: Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to see Peter , and abode with him fifteen days .
text2: Ai ferdi trin bersh pala kodia gelem ando Jerusalem te dikhav le Petres , ai beshlem dui kurke lesa .

text: But other of the apostles saw I none , save James the Lord ' s brother .
text2: Chi dikhlem chi ieka avre sluga , numa ferdi o Iakov , o phral le Kristosko .

text: Now the things which I write unto you , behold , before God , I lie not .
text2: So ramov tumenge akana chachimos si . Phenav angla Del ke chi xoxavav !

text: Afterwards I came into the regions of Syria and Cilicia ;
text2: Porme gelem andel gava kai si karing e Syra ai e Cilicia .

text: And was unknown by face unto the churches of Judaea which were in Christ :
text2: Ande kodia vriama o narodo le khangeriango le shave le Devleske kai sas ande Judea chi zhanenas man .

text: But they had heard only , That he which persecuted us in times past now preacheth the faith which once he destroyed .
text2: Ferdi zhanenas so ashunde katar le kolaver , " Kodo kai mai anglal chinuilas amen del duma akana pa pachamos kai mai anglal rodelas te rimol ! "

text: And they glorified God in me .
text2: Ai naisinas le Devles anda mande .

text: Then fourteen years after I went up again to Jerusalem with Barnabas , and took Titus with me also .
text2: Desh u shtar bersh pala kodia gelem pale ande Jerusalem le Barnabasoske ; ai ingerdem vi le Titus mansa .

text: And I went up by revelation , and communicated unto them that gospel which I preach among the Gentiles , but privately to them which were of reputation , lest by any means I should run , or had run , in vain .
text2: Gelem ke O Del sikadiasas mange ke trobul te zhav . Ai chide ma le barensa rigate kai sas kotse , ai phendem lenge pai lashi viasta kai phenav le manushenge kai Nai Zhiduvuria , ke chi mangav murhi buchi kai kerdem ai kerav akana te avel intaino .

text: But neither Titus , who was with me , being a Greek , was compelled to be circumcised :
text2: Numa o Titus , kai sas mansa ai kai si Greko , nas leske musai te avel semnome , ai marka ke xoxamle phral thodepe mashkar amende , ai mangenas te thon semno pe leste .

text: And that because of false brethren unawares brought in , who came in privily to spy out our liberty which we have in Christ Jesus , that they might bring us into bondage :
text2: Kodo narodo thode sas pe chordanes ande amare saxke te dikhen so kerasas ande amaro chidinimos le Kristosa . Won mangenas te keren anda amende rhoburia .

text: To whom we gave place by subjection , no , not for an hour ; that the truth of the gospel might continue with you .
text2: Ai ame chi meklem ame vov si pala lende , saxke te garavas tumenge o chachimos la nevia viastako .

text: But of these who seemed to be somewhat , ( whatsoever they were , it maketh no matter to me : God accepteth no man ' s person : ) for they who seemed to be somewhat in conference added nothing to me :
text2: Numa kodola kai sas jinde sar le bare , numa so sas kodia nai baio , ke O Del chi kerel kris pe so miazol o manush , kodola bare chi phendem mange te kerav chi iek diela .

text: But contrariwise , when they saw that the gospel of the uncircumcision was committed unto me , as the gospel of the circumcision was unto Peter ;
text2: Inker dikhle ke O Del diasas ma e buchi te phenav e lashi viasta kodolenge kai Nas Zhiduvuria , sar won dinesas ka Petri e buchi te phenel e lashi viasta le Zhidovonge .

text: ( For he that wrought effectually in Peter to the apostleship of the circumcision , the same was mighty in me toward the Gentiles : )
text2: Ke O Del kerdia anda mande e sluga shinadi kodolenge kai Nai Zhiduvuria , sa sar kerdia anda Petri e sluga shinadi le Zhidovongo .

text: And when James , Cephas , and John , who seemed to be pillars , perceived the grace that was given unto me , they gave to me and Barnabas the right hands of fellowship ; that we should go unto the heathen , and they unto the circumcision .
text2: O Iakov , o Petri , ai o Iovano , kai sas jinde sar le bare , preznaisarde ke O Del diasas ma kodia buchi mange ; antunchi dine ame vas ka Barnabas ai man . Ai kadia chidine andek than iek kavresa ai andek than phendiam ke ame zhasa te keras buchi mashkar kodola kai Nai Zhiduvuria , ai ke won zhana mashkar le Zhiduvuria .

text: Only they would that we should remember the poor ; the same which I also was forward to do .
text2: Numa mangle amendar ferdi te das ame goji kal chorhe kai si ande lenge khangeri , ai me kerdem so mangle mandar .

text: But when Peter was come to Antioch , I withstood him to the face , because he was to be blamed .
text2: Kana o Petri avilo ande Antioch , phendem ke nai vorta angla narodo , ke wo nas po drom o vorta .

text: For before that certain came from James , he did eat with the Gentiles : but when they were come , he withdrew and separated himself , fearing them which were of the circumcision .
text2: Chaches mai anglal sar te aven uni manush kai sas tradine katar o Iakov , o Petri xalas le phralensa kai Nas Zhiduvuria , numa kana avile kodola manush liape kotsar , ai chi mai xalas lensa , ke wo daralas katar le manush kai mangenas te semnon .

text: And the other Jews dissembled likewise with him ; insomuch that Barnabas also was carried away with their dissimulation .
text2: Le kolaver phral Zhiduvuria vi won kerde sar o Petri ; ai o Barnabas wo pashte lelaspe pala lende .

text: But when I saw that they walked not uprightly according to the truth of the gospel , I said unto Peter before them all , If thou , being a Jew , livest after the manner of Gentiles , and not as do the Jews , why compellest thou the Gentiles to live as do the Jews ?
text2: Kana dikhlem ke chi phirenas vorta ai malades ando chachimos la nevia viastako , phendem le Petreske , angla sa o narodo , " Tu kai san Zhidovo , traiisardian katse sar kodola kai Nai Zhiduvuria , ai na sar le Zhiduvuria . No sar thos pe zor kodolen kai Nai Zhiduvuria te traiin sar le Zhiduvuria ? "

text: We who are Jews by nature , and not sinners of the Gentiles ,
text2: Ame Zhiduvuria sam ai kadia kerdiliam , ai chi sam bezexale le kolavre tsemenge .

text: Knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law , but by the faith of Jesus Christ , even we have believed in Jesus Christ , that we might be justified by the faith of Christ , and not by the works of the law : for by the works of the law shall no flesh be justified .
text2: Numa zhanas ke o manush si jindo vorta angla Del ferdi pala pesko pachamos ando Jesus Kristo , ai na ke kerel so mothol o zakono . Iame , pachaiam ame ando Jesus Kristo saxke te avas jinde vorta pala amaro pachamos ando Kristo , ai na ke kerdiam so mothol o zakono . Ke khonik chi avela jindo vorta angla Del ke kerdia so mothol o zakono .

text: But if , while we seek to be justified by Christ , we ourselves also are found sinners , is therefore Christ the minister of sin ? God forbid .
text2: Numa te rodasa te avas jinde vorta ke sam astarde le Kristosa , iame sam bezexale sode si kodola kai Nai Zhiduvuria , kodia znachil ke O Kristo kerel buchi le bezexeske ? Nichi !

text: For if I build again the things which I destroyed , I make myself a transgressor .
text2: Te tsava ma pale te lasharav so peradem , sikavav kadia ke chi lav ma pala zakono .

text: For I through the law am dead to the law , that I might live unto God .
text2: Ai le zakonoske , mulo sim , iek martia kai o zakono andai , saxke me te traiiv le Devleske .

text: I am crucified with Christ : nevertheless I live ; yet not I , but Christ liveth in me : and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God , who loved me , and gave himself for me .
text2: Simas thodino te merav le Kristosa po trushul . Ai kadia mai nai me kai traiiv , numa O Kristo traiil ande mande . O traio le manushesko , o traio kai traiiv me akana traiiv ando pachamos ando Shav le Devlesko , kai simas leske drago ai kai dia pesko traio mange . Chi shudav o lashimos le Devlesko .

text: I do not frustrate the grace of God : for if righteousness come by the law , then Christ is dead in vain .
text2: Te si o manush ke pala zakono sai avel vorta angla Del , apo antunchi O Kristo mulo intaino !

text: O foolish Galatians , who hath bewitched you , that ye should not obey the truth , before whose eyes Jesus Christ hath been evidently set forth , crucified among you ?
text2: Tume dzile Galatians ! Kon kerdia farmichi pe tumende ? Ke sas angla tumare iakha vorta o patreto sar mulo O Jesus po trushul .

text: This only would I learn of you , Received ye the Spirit by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Manglemas te den ma atweto pe iek diela kai si te phushav tume : sas tume dino O Swunto Duxo le Devlesko ke kerdian so mothol o zakono , vai ke ashundian ai pachaian tume ande lashi viasta ?

text: Are ye so foolish ? having begun in the Spirit , are ye now made perfect by the flesh ?
text2: Sar sai aven kadia dzile ! Tume nachinaisardian le Devleske swuntsone Duxosa , ai akana mangen te geton tumare zorasa ?

text: Have ye suffered so many things in vain ? if it be yet in vain .
text2: Pate chinuisardian pe kachi dieli intaino ? Nashtilpe te avel intaino !

text: He therefore that ministereth to you the Spirit , and worketh miracles among you , doeth he it by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Kana O Del del tume pesko Swunto Duxo ai kerel mirakluria mashkar tumende , wo kerel kodia ke tume keren so mothol o zakono , vai ke ashunen ai pachan tume ande lashi viasta ?

text: Even as Abraham believed God , and it was accounted to him for righteousness .
text2: Eta so mothol E Vorba le Devleski pa Abraham , " Wo pachaiape ando Del , ai O Del jindia les sar vorta pala pesko pachamos . "

text: Know ye therefore that they which are of faith , the same are the children of Abraham .
text2: No tume trobul te haliaren , ke kodola kai si le o pachamos si andai chachi vitsa le Abrahamoski .

text: And the scripture , foreseeing that God would justify the heathen through faith , preached before the gospel unto Abraham , saying , In thee shall all nations be blessed .
text2: E Vorba le Devleski phendia ma anglal ke O Del kerela kodolen kai Nai Zhiduvuria te aven vorta angla leste pala pengo pachamos . Anda kodia E Vorba le Devleski phendia mai anglal le Abrahamoske kadia lashi viasta .

text: So then they which be of faith are blessed with faithful Abraham .
text2: " O Del swuntsola sa le narodos kai si pe phuv pala tute . " O Abraham pachaiape ai sas swuntsome , no sa kodola kai pachanpe avena swuntsome sar sas o Abraham .

text: For as many as are of the works of the law are under the curse : for it is written , Cursed is every one that continueth not in all things which are written in the book of the law to do them .
text2: Ke sa kodola kai astardion kai buchi le zakonoski avena dine armaia . Ke E Vorba le Devleski mothol , " Dino armaia te avel swako manush kai chi lelpe sagda pala so godi si ramome ande klishka le zakonoski ! "

text: But that no man is justified by the law in the sight of God , it is evident : for , The just shall live by faith .
text2: Akana mishto si phendo ke khonik nashtil te avel jindo vorta angla Del pala zakono ; ke E Vorba le Devleski mothol , " Kodo kai si vorta anglal iakha le Devleske pala pachamos traiila . "

text: And the law is not of faith : but , The man that doeth them shall live in them .
text2: Numa o zakono nai o pachamos , inker E Vorba le Devleski mothol , " Kodo kai kerel so mothol o zakono traiila pala zakono . "

text: Christ hath redeemed us from the curse of the law , being made a curse for us : for it is written , Cursed is every one that hangeth on a tree :
text2: O Kristo sas lino armaia ande amaro than , saxke te ankalavel ame andal armaia le zakonoske . E Vorba le Devleski mothol , " Dino armaia te avel swako manush kai si amblado ka khash . "

text: That the blessing of Abraham might come on the Gentiles through Jesus Christ ; that we might receive the promise of the Spirit through faith .
text2: Ai sas kadia , saxke o swuntsomos kai O Del shinadia le Abrahamoske te avel dino vi kodolenge kai Nai Zhiduvuria katar O Jesus Kristo , ai te las katar o pachamos , O Swunto Duxo kai sas shinado katar O Del .

text: Brethren , I speak after the manner of men ; Though it be but a man ' s covenant , yet if it be confirmed , no man disannulleth , or addeth thereto .
text2: Murhe phral , dav duma sar den duma le manush , kana iek manush shinadia vari so angla iek marturo , khonik nashtil te aterdiarel so sas shinado vai te mai thol vari so opral .

text: Now to Abraham and his seed were the promises made . He saith not , And to seeds , as of many ; but as of one , And to thy seed , which is Christ .
text2: No O Del kerdia shinaimata le Abrahamoske ai kodoleske kai avela pala leste . E Vorba le Devleski chi mothol , " Kodola kai avena pala leste " sar te avilino bute manushenge , numa mothol , " Ai kodoleske kai avela pala tute , " ai kodia znazhil ferdi iek manush , kodo si O Kristo .

text: And this I say , that the covenant , that was confirmed before of God in Christ , the law , which was four hundred and thirty years after , cannot disannul , that it should make the promise of none effect .
text2: Eta , so lav te mothav , O Del diasas iek shinaimos ai shinadiasas te ankerel les , o zakono kai avilo shtar shela ai trenda bersh pala kodia , nashtil te aterdiarel kodo shinaimos ai te aterdiarel so shinadia O Del .

text: For if the inheritance be of the law , it is no more of promise : but God gave it to Abraham by promise .
text2: Numa e podarka kai O Del del sar so phendia te del ashela pala zakono , antunchi chi mai ashel pala shinaimos . Numa pala so sas shinado O Del sikadia pesko lashimos le Abrahamoske .

text: Wherefore then serveth the law ? It was added because of transgressions , till the seed should come to whom the promise was made ; and it was ordained by angels in the hand of a mediator .
text2: Sostar sas dino o zakono ? O zakono sas thodino te sikavel so godi si kai nai e voia le Devleski . O zakono trobulas te ankerel zhi kai avel kodo kai trobulas andai vitsa le Abrahamoski , kodoleske kai sas kerdo o shinaimos . Kodo zakono sas tradino katar le angeluria , numa iek manush sas thodino mashkar O Del ai le manush .

text: Now a mediator is not a mediator of one , but God is one .
text2: Numa o manush kai si mashkar O Del ai le manush , nai mashkar O Del ai le manush , ferdi iekeske , ai O Del si ferdi iek .

text: Is the law then against the promises of God ? God forbid : for if there had been a law given which could have given life , verily righteousness should have been by the law .
text2: Pate o zakono nai so shinadia O Del ? Nichi . Ke te sas dino iek zakono kai sai del o traio le manushenge , apo o manush sai avilino jindo sar vorta angla Del pala zakono .

text: But the scripture hath concluded all under sin , that the promise by faith of Jesus Christ might be given to them that believe .
text2: Numa E Vorba le Devleski mothol ke sa e lumia thodi la telai putiera le bezexeski , saxke e podarka , shinadi katar O Del te avel dini kodolenge kai pachanpe ai pala pengo pachamos ando Jesus Kristo .

text: But before faith came , we were kept under the law , shut up unto the faith which should afterwards be revealed .
text2: Mai anglal sar te avel e vriama le pachamaski , o zakono ankerelas ame phangle , zhi kai avel o pachamos .

text: Wherefore the law was our schoolmaster to bring us unto Christ , that we might be justified by faith .
text2: No o zakono lelas amendar sama zhi kai avel O Kristo , ai porme te avas jinde vorta angla Del pala pachamos .

text: But after that faith is come , we are no longer under a schoolmaster .
text2: Akana kai e vriama le pachamaski avili , chi mai lel sama o zakono pe amende .

text: For ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus .
text2: Ke pala pachamos si kai san shave Devleske ando Kristo .

text: For as many of you as have been baptized into Christ have put on Christ .
text2: Tume savorhe sanas bolde te aven astarde le Kristosa , ai tume kadia lian o nevo traio le Kristosko pe tumende .

text: There is neither Jew nor Greek , there is neither bond nor free , there is neither male nor female : for ye are all one in Christ Jesus .
text2: Le Zhiduvuria ai kodola kai Nai Zhiduvuria saikfielo le , ai vi le manush kai si phangle ai vi kodola kai nai phangle , ai vi le mursh ai le zhuvlia ; tume san savorhe astarde le Kristosa .

text: And if ye be Christ ' s , then are ye Abraham ' s seed , and heirs according to the promise .
text2: Te san le Kristoske , tume san antunchi andai vitsa le Abrahamoski , ai len so O Del shinadia sas te del .

text: Now I say , That the heir , as long as he is a child , differeth nothing from a servant , though he be lord of all ;
text2: Ashun so mai motsav : O shav kai trobul te lel o mishtimos peske dadesko sa andek fielo diela lo ke sar iek manush kai si phanglo zhi kai godi avela terno , marka ke so godi si lesko si .

text: But is under tutors and governors until the time appointed of the father .
text2: Akana kai si terno , thodino lo kal manush kai len sama lestar ai te len sama katar leski dieli zhi pe vriama kai lesko dat phendia .

text: Even so we , when we were children , were in bondage under the elements of the world :
text2: Iame zhi kai godi samas sar glati , phangle sama kal dieli kadala lumiake .

text: But when the fulness of the time was come , God sent forth his Son , made of a woman , made under the law ,
text2: Numa kana e vriama kai sas thodi avili , O Del tradia peske Shaves . Kerdilo katar iek zhuvli , ai traiilas tele zakono le Zhidovongo .

text: To redeem them that were under the law , that we might receive the adoption of sons .
text2: Saxke te ankalavel kodolen kai sas thodine tela zakono , ai ame te sai kerdiuas shave le Devleske .

text: And because ye are sons , God hath sent forth the Spirit of his Son into your hearts , crying , Abba , Father .
text2: Te sikavel tumenge ke leske shave san , O Del tradia ande amare ile O Swunto Duxo peske Shavesko , O Swunto Duxo kai tsipil , " Dat , Murho Dat . "

text: Wherefore thou art no more a servant , but a son ; and if a son , then an heir of God through Christ .
text2: No akana , chi mai san manush phanglo , numa shav ai akana kai san lesko shav , O Del dela tu o mishtimos kai garavel peske shavenge .

text: Howbeit then , when ye knew not God , ye did service unto them which by nature are no gods .
text2: Mai anglal chi zhanenas le Devles , ai phangle sanas kal dieli kai nai chaches dela .

text: But now , after that ye have known God , or rather are known of God , how turn ye again to the weak and beggarly elements , whereunto ye desire again to be in bondage ?
text2: Numa akana kai zhanen le Devles , inker mai bini , akana kai O Del zhanel tume , sar sai mai tume zhan palpale ka kodola kovle ai chorhe dieli la phuviake ? Sar sai dashtilpe ke tume mangen pale te aven phangle lende ?

text: Ye observe days , and months , and times , and years .
text2: Tume len sama zurales ka uni dies , ka uni shon , ka uni vriama , ai ka uni bersh .

text: I am afraid of you , lest I have bestowed upon you labour in vain .
text2: Dar mange ando tumende ! Ke sa e buchi kai kerdem mashkar tumende avela intaino ?

text: Brethren , I beseech you , be as I am ; for I am as ye are : ye have not injured me at all .
text2: Murhe phral , mangav ma tumendar , kerdion sar mande . Sar me kerdilem sar tumende , chi kerdian mange chi iek nasulimos .

text: Ye know how through infirmity of the flesh I preached the gospel unto you at the first .
text2: Tume seren tume sostar , andem tumenge e lashi viasta e pervo data ; sostar ke naswalo simas .

text: And my temptation which was in my flesh ye despised not , nor rejected ; but received me as an angel of God , even as Christ Jesus .
text2: Murho stato o naswalo sas te zumavel tumen , numa chi simas tumenge gratsia ai chi shudian ma . Numa premisardian ma sar iek angelo le Devlesko , vai sar O Jesus Kristo .

text: Where is then the blessedness ye spake of ? for I bear you record , that , if it had been possible , ye would have plucked out your own eyes , and have given them to me .
text2: Defial raduime sanas ! Apo so kerdilia tumensa akana ? Sai mothav kacha diela pa tumende : te sai dashtisardianas lianas tumare iakha avri , ai dianas le mange .

text: Am I therefore become your enemy , because I tell you the truth ?
text2: Apo akana so kerdilem tumaro duzhmano kai mothav tumenge o chachimos ?

text: They zealously affect you , but not well ; yea , they would exclude you , that ye might affect them .
text2: Kodo narodo sikaven but ke volin tume , numa lenge ginduria nai lashe karing tumende . So won mangen si te len tume amendar , saxke te keren buchi lenge .

text: But it is good to be zealously affected always in a good thing , and not only when I am present with you .
text2: Mishto te avel tumen ilo te keren o mishtimos ande swako vriama , ai na ferdi kana sim mashkar tumende .

text: My little children , of whom I travail in birth again until Christ be formed in you ,
text2: Murhe kuchi shave ! Haliarav pale iek chino tumenge , sar iek chino kai si la zhuvlia kana bianjol lake iek glata , zhi kai O Kristo lashardiol ande tumende .

text: I desire to be present with you now , and to change my voice ; for I stand in doubt of you .
text2: Sode manglemas te avav pasha tumende akana , saxke te sai dav tumensa duma averfielo , ke chi zhanav so kerdilia tumensa .

text: Tell me , ye that desire to be under the law , do ye not hear the law ?
text2: Phenen mange tume kai mangen te aven tela zakono , pate chi aliarena so mothol o zakono ?

text: For it is written , that Abraham had two sons , the one by a bondmaid , the other by a freewoman .
text2: O zakono mothol ke o Abraham sas les dui shave , iek katar iek zhuvli kai sas phangli , ai iek katar iek zhuvli kai nas phangli .

text: But he who was of the bondwoman was born after the flesh ; but he of the freewoman was by promise .
text2: O shav kai sas les katar e zhuvli kai sas phangli biandilo sar aver , numa o shav kai sas les katar e zhuvli kai nas phangli biandilo sar O Del shinadiasas .

text: Which things are an allegory : for these are the two covenants ; the one from the mount Sinai , which gendereth to bondage , which is Agar .
text2: Sai haliaren la sar iek patreto : le dui zhuvlia si le dui kontrakturia pachi , iek anda kodola pachi sikavel katar e Hagar , ai kucha anda Mount Sinai , biandiol lake glati phangle .

text: For this Agar is mount Sinai in Arabia , and answereth to Jerusalem which now is , and is in bondage with her children .
text2: E Hagar si o Mount Sinai kai si ande Arabia , woi malavel ka foro kai si ande Jerusalem , kai si phangli peske manushensa .

text: But Jerusalem which is above is free , which is the mother of us all .
text2: Numa e Jerusalem kai si ande rhaio nai phangli , ai woi si amari dei .

text: For it is written , Rejoice , thou barren that bearest not ; break forth and cry , thou that travailest not : for the desolate hath many more children than she which hath an husband .
text2: Ke E Vorba le Devleski mothol , " Raduisavo tu , zhuvlio kai shoxar nashti avilian tu glate ! Tsipisar raduimastar , tu kai shoxar chi zhanglian le dukha la zhuvliake kai sas la glate ! Ke e zhuvli kai sas mekli avela la mai but glate de sar la zhuvlia kai si la rhom .

text: Now we , brethren , as Isaac was , are the children of promise .
text2: Numa tume , murhe phral , tume san shave kai biandilian sar sas shinado katar O Del , sar o Isaac .

text: But as then he that was born after the flesh persecuted him that was born after the Spirit , even so it is now .
text2: Mai anglal o shav kai biandilo ando stato chinuilas kodoles kai biandilosas pala Swunto Duxo le Devlesko ; ai sakadia si akana .

text: Nevertheless what saith the scripture ? Cast out the bondwoman and her son : for the son of the bondwoman shall not be heir with the son of the freewoman .
text2: Numa so mothol E Vorba le Devleski ? Woi mothol , " Gonisar la zhuvlia kai si phangli ai lake shaves ; ke o shav la zhuvliako kai si phanglo chi avela les so sas shinado katar o dat le shavesa kai si la zhuvliako kai nai phanglo . "

text: So then , brethren , we are not children of the bondwoman , but of the free .
text2: Anda kodia , murhe phral , chi sam shave la zhuvliake kai si phangle , numa la zhuvliake kai nai phangle .

text: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free , and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage .
text2: O Kristo phuterdia ame anda phanglimos saxke te na mai avas vov si phangle , O Kristo lia tume anda phanglimos ai beshen kadia , ai arakhen tume te na mai pale kerdion manush phangle .

text: Behold , I Paul say unto you , that if ye be circumcised , Christ shall profit you nothing .
text2: Ashunen mange ! Me , o Pavlo , mothav tumenge , te thona semnuria pe tumende , antunchi O Kristo chi mai avela kanchi .

text: For I testify again to every man that is circumcised , that he is a debtor to do the whole law .
text2: Ai mai mothav iek data , sakone manusheske kai thol semno pe peste ke musai leske te lelpe pala sa o zakono .

text: Christ is become of no effect unto you , whosoever of you are justified by the law ; ye are fallen from grace .
text2: Tume kai roden te aven jinde vorta angla Del ando zakono thodine san rigate katar O Kristo . Ai mai nai tumenge o lashimos le Devlesko .

text: For we through the Spirit wait for the hope of righteousness by faith .
text2: Numa ame , pachas ame ke O Del kerela te avas vorta angla leste ; kodia ame azhukeras , katar O Swunto Duxo kai kerel buchi pala pachamos kai si ande amende .

text: For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision ; but faith which worketh by love .
text2: Ke te sam thodine andek than le Kristosa , te avesa semnome , vai te na avesa nai kanchi ; so trobul te avel o pachamos kai kerel buchi pala dragostia .

text: Ye did run well ; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth ?
text2: Tume nashenas mishto , kon aterdiardia tume , te na mai mekel tume te len tume pala chachimos ? So phende tumenge te parhuven tumaro gindo ?

text: This persuasion cometh not of him that calleth you .
text2: Nas katar O Del , kai akharel tume .

text: A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump .
text2: " Lel xantsi drozhde te vazdelpe sa o arho . "

text: I have confidence in you through the Lord , that ye will be none otherwise minded : but he that troubleth you shall bear his judgment , whosoever he be .
text2: Si ma pachamos ande tumende katar O Del , ke tume chi gindin averfielo ke sar mande , numa kodo kai rimol tume , kon godi avela , avela dino pe kris katar O Del .

text: And I , brethren , if I yet preach circumcision , why do I yet suffer persecution ? then is the offence of the cross ceased .
text2: Me , murhe phral , te mai dava duma pa semno , sostar chinuin ma ? Antunchi murhe vorbi pa o trushul le Kristosko trobulas te na keren baio .

text: I would they were even cut off which trouble you .
text2: Manglemas o narodo kai rimol tume te duriol tumendar .

text: For , brethren , ye have been called unto liberty ; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh , but by love serve one another .
text2: Murhe phral , tume sanas akharde te na mai aven phangle . Numa akana kai chi mai san phangle na len tume pala stato . Numa meken tume pala dragostia te aven le slugi iek kavreske .

text: For all the law is fulfilled in one word , even in this ; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Ke sa o zakono kerdo lo ande iek vorba kacha : " Te avel tuke drago cho vortako sar san tu tuke drago . "

text: But if ye bite and devour one another , take heed that ye be not consumed one of another .
text2: Numa te kerena sar le zhigeni , te dukhaven tume ai keren bi malades iek kavresa , antunchi arakhen tume , ke te na nichi , rimona tumen iek kavres .

text: This I say then , Walk in the Spirit , and ye shall not fulful the lust of the flesh .
text2: Me mothav tumenge , phiren ando Swunto Duxo , ai kadia chi kerena so mangel tumendar o stato .

text: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit , and the Spirit against the flesh : and these are contrary the one to the other : so that ye cannot do the things that ye would .
text2: Ke o stato mangel dieli kai O Swunto Duxo chi mangel , ai O Swunto Duxo mangel dieli kai o stato chi mangel . Won si penge duzhmaia , saxke tume te na keren so tume mangen .

text: But if ye be led of the Spirit , ye are not under the law .
text2: Te san phirade katar O Swunto Duxo , chi san tela zakono .

text: Now the works of the flesh are manifest , which are these ; Adultery , fornication , uncleanness , lasciviousness ,
text2: Ai zhanas so mangel o stato , e kurvia , o bi vuzhimos , o gindo o chorho ;

text: Idolatry , witchcraft , hatred , variance , emulations , wrath , strife , seditions , heresies ,
text2: Te rhugis tu kal ikoni ai o drabarimos , le manush kerdion duzhmaia iek kavreske , xanpe , ai zhaluzi le , e xoli ande lende , sa roden te keren vari so , o sicharimos o xoxamlo pa Del ,

text: Envyings , murders , drunkenness , revellings , and such like : of the which I tell you before , as I have also told you in time past , that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God .
text2: mangen so si avres , mudarimata , kerdion macharne , ai chidenpe andek than te keren dieli zhungale , ai dieli kadalendar . Phenav tumenge mai anglal , sar vunzhe phendem , le manush kai keren kasavendar dieli chi zhana ando rhaio le Devlesko .

text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love , joy , peace , longsuffering , gentleness , goodness , faith ,
text2: Numa e fruta le Swuntone Duxoski si e dragostia , o raduimos , e pacha , e rhavda , o lashimos , o zhutimos , o pachamos ,

text: Meekness , temperance : against such there is no law .
text2: o kovlimos ( chi luvudilape peste ) , ai le sama te na shubis tu . Nai chi iek zakono kai rimol kadala dieli .

text: And they that are Christ ' s have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts .
text2: Kodola kai si le Kristoske karfosarde le statos penge bezexensa , ai le dielensa kai sas lenge drago .

text: If we live in the Spirit , let us also walk in the Spirit .
text2: Te traiisarasa ando Swunto Duxo , vi phiras le Swuntone Duxosa .

text: Let us not be desirous of vain glory , provoking one another , envying one another .
text2: Na keras barimata , ai na xoliaras iek kavres , aina avas zhaluzi pe iek kavreste .

text: Brethren , if a man be overtaken in a fault , ye which are spiritual , restore such an one in the spirit of meekness ; considering thyself , lest thou also be tempted .
text2: Murhe phral , te dikhlian ke shubisailo vari kon ande vari soste , tume kai si tume O Swunto Duxo le Devlesko , anen les palpale po drom o vorta ; numa len les lashimasa , ai arakh tu te na aves vi tu zumado .

text: Bear ye one another ' s burdens , and so fulfil the law of Christ .
text2: Zhutin tume iek kavres ande tumare pharipe , ai kadia kerena o zakono ; le Kristosko .

text: For if a man think himself to be something , when he is nothing , he deceiveth himself .
text2: Te gindila vari kon ke wo si vari so , ai kai wo nai kanchi , wo shubilpe pes .

text: But let every man prove his own work , and then shall he have rejoicing in himself alone , and not in another .
text2: Te lel sama sako so kerel wo , ai porme sai luvudilape pe peste , ai na anda so kerdia o kolaver .

text: For every man shall bear his own burden .
text2: Ke sako trobul te kerel peski buchi .

text: Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things .
text2: Kodo kai phenen leske e lashi viasta trobul te hulavel sa pesko mishtimos kodolesa kai phenel leske e lashi viasta .

text: Be not deceived ; God is not mocked : for whatsoever a man soweth , that shall he also reap .
text2: Na shubin tume ; chi marelpe mui katar O Del , ke o manush chidela so thodia te bariol .

text: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption ; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting .
text2: Te bariarela so si drago leske statoske , lesko stato anela leske e martia ; numa te bariarela so si drago le Swuntone Duxoske , O Swunto Duxo anela leske o traio kai chi mai getolpe .

text: And let us not be weary in well doing : for in due season we shall reap , if we faint not .
text2: Na aterdiuas , keras sagda o mishtimos ; ke te na xasarasas zor , chidasa kana avela e vriama .

text: As we have therefore opportunity , let us do good unto all men , especially unto them who are of the household of faith .
text2: Zhi kai godi sai dashtisaras , keras o mishtimos savorhenge , ai mai but amare phralenge kai pachanpe ando Del .

text: Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine own hand .
text2: Dikhen savestar baro lil ramosardem tumenge murhe vastensa !

text: As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh , they constrain you to be circumcised ; only lest they should suffer persecution for the cross of Christ .
text2: Sa kodola kai mangen te plachan penge statos mangenpe zor te keren semno pe tumaro stato . Saxke te na chinuin won pala trushul le Kristosko .

text: For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law ; but desire to have you circumcised , that they may glory in your flesh .
text2: Ke kodola kai si le semno ande pengo stato chi lenpe pala zakono ; numa mangen te avel tumen semno ando stato te sai luvudinpe pa tumende ke thode semno ande tumaro stato .

text: But God forbid that I should glory , save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ , by whom the world is crucified unto me , and I unto the world .
text2: Me , pa mande , dur mandar o gindo te luvudiv ma andal kolaver dieli , de ferdi anda trushul amare Devlesko O Jesus Kristo ; e , katar o trushul le Kristosko e lumia muli la mange , ai me sim mulo la lumiake .

text: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision , but a new creature .
text2: Ke te avel tu semno ando stato vai te na avel tu kodia na kanchi , numa so trobul si te aves iek nevo manush .

text: And as many as walk according to this rule , peace be on them , and mercy , and upon the Israel of God .
text2: Sa kodolenge kai lenpe pala kodia ande penge traio , mothav e pacha ai o lashimos le Devlesko te avel lensa , lensa ai sa le Devleske narodosa !

text: From henceforth let no man trouble me : for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Te na mai chinuil ma khonik akana , ke si ma pe murho stato le semnuria le Kristoske .

text: Brethren , the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
text2: Murhe phral , o mishtimos amare Devlesko O Jesus Kristo te avel tumensa . Amen .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , to the saints which are at Ephesus , and to the faithful in Christ Jesus :
text2: O Pavlo , ek apostle le Jesus Kristosko katar e voia le Devleski , kal shave le Devleske kai si ande Ephesus , ai kai beshen phangle ka Jesus Kristo .

text: Grace be to you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: O mishtimos , ai e pacha , te avel tumenge dine katar O Del amaro Dat , ai amaro Devlesko O Jesus Kristo .

text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ :
text2: Swuntsome te avel O Del ai O Dat amaro Devlesko O Jesus Kristo , kai swuntsosardia ame , ande but lashimata kai aven katar O Del ando rhaio ando Kristo .

text: According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world , that we should be holy and without blame before him in love :
text2: Ande leste O Del alosardia ame , mai anglal sar te avel e lumia , saxke te avas swuntsi ai bi doshako angla leste ande dragostia .

text: Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself , according to the good pleasure of his will ,
text2: Wo shinadiasas ame ande peski dragostia te avas leske shave katar O Jesus Kristo , wo manglia ke drago sas leske .

text: To the praise of the glory of his grace , wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved .
text2: Luvudisaras le Devles anda barimos peske lashimasko , kai dia ame ande pesko shav kai si leske o mai drago .

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , the forgiveness of sins , according to the riches of his grace ;
text2: Ke palai martia le Kristoski chi mai sam phangle , ai amare bezxa iertimele .

text: Wherein he hath abounded toward us in all wisdom and prudence ;
text2: O Del sikadia amenge kodia sode de barvalo lo ando lashimos ,

text: Having made known unto us the mystery of his will , according to his good pleasure which he hath purposed in himself :
text2: kai dia ame but dieli te zhanas te avas pachivale ai gojaver , dia ame te zhanas so mangelas te kerel , ai kai sas garado kai mangliasas mai anglal te kerel ando Kristo .

text: That in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ , both which are in heaven , and which are on earth ; even in him :
text2: Ai kodia so O Del getola kana getolape e lumia si te chidel so godi si ando rhaio ai pe phuv ; te avel iek Devles O Kristo .

text: In whom also we have obtained an inheritance , being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will :
text2: Ande amaro phanglimos le Kristosa liam amaro skepimos , ke O Del alosardiasas ame mai anglal pala pesko plano , ai O Del kerel swako diela sar manglia wo te kerel .

text: That we should be to the praise of his glory , who first trusted in Christ .
text2: Luvudisaras o barimos e Devlesko ame kai samas le pervi te pachas ame .

text: In whom ye also trusted , after that ye heard the word of truth , the gospel of your salvation : in whom also after that ye believed , ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise ,
text2: Vi tume kana ashundian e vorba le chachimaski , e lashi viasta kai andia tumenge o skepimos ; tume pachaian tume ando Kristo , antunchi O Del semnosardia tume peske anavesa kana dia tume O Swunto Duxo kai shinadiasas .

text: Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession , unto the praise of his glory .
text2: O Swunto Duxo sas dino amenge pala so O Del shinadia peske narodoske sar barvalimos , ai wo shinavel amenge ke O Del dela te na mai aven vov si phangle , kodola kai si leske , luvudin lesko barimos .

text: Wherefore I also , after I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus , and love unto all the saints ,
text2: Anda kodia akana kai ashundem pa tumaro pachamos karing O Del O Jesus ai tumari dragostia sa kodolenge kai si le Devleske .

text: Cease not to give thanks for you , making mention of you in my prayers ;
text2: Sagda naisiv le Devleske anda tumende , da ma goji tumende ande murho rhugimos ;

text: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of glory , may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him :
text2: ai mangav katar O Del amaro Devlesko O Jesus Kristo , O Dat o luvudime , te del tume O Swunto Duxo , kai kerela tume te haliaren ai kai sikavela tumenge le Devles , kadia de mishto kai zhanena les .

text: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened ; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling , and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints ,
text2: Mangav te del tume e vediara andel iakha tumare ileske ; saxke te dikhen ka che pachamos O Del akhardia tume , ai o barvalimos le luvudimasko kai ; shinadia peske narodoske .

text: And what is the exceeding greatness of his power to usward who believe , according to the working of his mighty power ,
text2: Ai savatar putiera de bari si les amenge kai pachas ame . Kadia putiera si sa kucha kai O Del sikadia butia zorasa .

text: Which he wrought in Christ , when he raised him from the dead , and set him at his own right hand in the heavenly places ,
text2: Kana zhuvindisardia le Kristos , ai thodia les te beshel pe peski rik e chachi ando rhaio .

text: Far above all principality , and power , and might , and dominion , and every name that is named , not only in this world , but also in that which is to come :
text2: Kotse O Kristo thodino lo opral pa sa le kai poronchin , ai sa le putiera , ai sa le zora , ai sa le than kai poronchin , ai sa le kolaver anava kai sai aven , na ferdi akana numa pe mai angle .

text: And hath put all things under his feet , and gave him to be the head over all things to the church ,
text2: O Del thodia swako diela telal punrhe le Kristoske , ai dia kai khangeri sar o mai baro gazda ,

text: Which is his body , the fulness of him that filleth all in all .
text2: e khangeri si o stato le Kristosko , ai ande late si kai O Kristo kotselo wo kai perel sa e lumia .

text: And you hath he quickened , who were dead in trespasses and sins ;
text2: Mai anglal mule sanas pala tumare dosha ai tumare bezexa .

text: Wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this world , according to the prince of the power of the air , the spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience :
text2: Ai mai anglal traiinas sar traiilas kadia lumia , tume lenas tume pala baro kai poronchil pel putieri le duxonge kai si ando cheri , ai kodola duxuria akana keren buchi andel manush kai chi mai pachan o mui le Devlesko .

text: Among whom also we all had our conversation in times past in the lusts of our flesh , fulfilling the desires of the flesh and of the mind ; and were by nature the children of wrath , even as others .
text2: Ame savorhe samas sar lende , iame traiisaras te plachas amare statos , ai kerasas so mangelas amaro stato ai amari goji . Ai iame samas shave la xoliarike sar le kolaver .

text: But God , who is rich in mercy , for his great love wherewith he loved us ,
text2: Numa O Del kai si barvalo ande pesko lashimos pala pesko bari dragostia , kai samas leske drago .

text: Even when we were dead in sins , hath quickened us together with Christ , ( by grace ye are saved ; )
text2: Ke kana samas mule pala amare dosha , dia ame traio le Kristosa . Pala lashimos le Devlesko si ke san skepime .

text: And hath raised us up together , and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus :
text2: Ande amaro phanglimos le Kristosa O Del andia ame ka traio lesa , te traiisaras lesa ande lumia kai si ando rhaio :

text: That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus .
text2: ai te sikavel ande vriama kai avela o baro barvalimos peske lashimasko , ai kai samas leske drago ando Jesus Kristo .

text: For by grace are ye saved through faith ; and that not of yourselves : it is the gift of God :
text2: Ke pala lashimos sanas skepime pala pachamos , ai kodo skepime chi avel tumendar , numa e podarka le Devleski si ,

text: Not of works , lest any man should boast .
text2: nai vov si pala so kerel o manush , saxke te na luvudilpe khonik .

text: For we are his workmanship , created in Christ Jesus unto good works , which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them .
text2: Ke O Del kerdia ame te avas astarde ka Jesus Kristo , saxke te avel ame iek traio barvalo ai te keras o mishtimos , kodo mishtimos kai lashardia mai anglal saxke te keras les .

text: Wherefore remember , that ye being in time past Gentiles in the flesh , who are called Uncircumcision by that which is called the Circumcision in the flesh made by hands ;
text2: Tume kai chi san Zhiduvuria , tume kai le Zhiduvuria mothon tumenge bi semnome , ai won kai bushon le semnome ando stato katar le manush , den tume goji ke sanas ande kodia vriama dur katar O Kristo , tume sanas streinuria ai chi sanas anda narodo kai sas alome katar O Del , tume chi sanas andel Alleince kai sas thodine po shinaimos kai sas kerdo katar O Del peske narodoske , tume kai traiin ande lumia bi pachamasko ai bi Devlesko .

text: But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ .
text2: Numa akana , astarde le Kristosa , tume kai sanas dur , akana san pasharde katar o rat le Kristosko .

text: For he is our peace , who hath made both one , and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us ;
text2: Ke O Kristo andia amenge e pacha , kana kerdia andal Zhiduvuria ai anda kodola kai Nai Zhiduvuria iek narodo , kana dia pesko stato peradia o zido kai sas mashkar lende ,

text: Having abolished in his flesh the enmity , even the law of commandments contained in ordinances ; for to make in himself of twain one new man , so making peace ;
text2: aterdiardia o zakono le Zhidovongo , peske zakonosa ai peska krisasa , te kerel anda kodola dui vitsi iek narodo nevo , ai kadia e pacha .

text: And that he might reconcile both unto God in one body by the cross , having slain the enmity thereby :
text2: Pala peski martia pe trushul O Kristo mudardia e xoli , le trushulesa chidia andek than le duie vitsen ande iek stato ai kerdia e pacha mashkar O Del ai won .

text: And came and preached peace to you which were afar off , and to them that were nigh .
text2: Kadia O Kristo avilo te anel e lashi viasta le pachaki tumenge kai chi san Zhiduvuria , kai sanas dur katar O Del , ai le Zhiduvuria , kai sas pasha leste .

text: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father .
text2: Katar O Kristo ame savorhe , Zhiduvuria ai Nai Zhiduvuria avas ka Dat pala iek Swunto Duxo .

text: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners , but fellowcitizens with the saints , and of the household of God ;
text2: Akana , tume kai chi san Zhiduvuria chi mai san streinuria , vai manush kai avilian anda averik , numa san akana chache manush anda narodo Devlesko , ai san andai familia le Devleski ,

text: And are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets , Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone ;
text2: vi tume san so kerdiol pe kai wushtel pel fundani thodine katar le apostluria ai le profeturia , o bax o angluno si O Jesus Kristo .

text: In whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord :
text2: Wo si kai ankerel e zor pe so godi kerdilia , ai wo bariarel te kerdiol iek khangeri Swunto ando Del .

text: In whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit .
text2: Lesa tume san ande so kerdiol te kerdion sa le kolavrensa iek kher kai O Del beshel katar Swunto Duxo .

text: For this cause I Paul , the prisoner of Jesus Christ for you Gentiles ,
text2: Anda kodia , me , o Pavlo , o manush phandado le Jesus Kristosko tumenge kai chi san Zhiduvuria ,

text: If ye have heard of the dispensation of the grace of God which is given me to youward :
text2: tume ashundian kai O Del ande pesko lashimos dia ma kadia buchi te kerav tumenge .

text: How that by revelation he made known unto me the mystery ; ( as I wrote afore in few words ,
text2: O Del sikadia mange peske ginduria kai sas garade , ai ramosardem vari so pa kodia diela ,

text: Whereby , when ye read , ye may understand my knowledge in the mystery of Christ )
text2: ai kana jinena sai haliaren so zhanav pa gindo o garado pa Jesus Kristo .

text: Which in other ages was not made known unto the sons of men , as it is now revealed unto his holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit ;
text2: Mai anglal kado gindo o garado chi zhanenas les le manush , numa O Del sikadia les akana katar pesko Swunto Duxo peske Swuntone apostlonge ai le profetonge .

text: That the Gentiles should be fellowheirs , and of the same body , and partakers of his promise in Christ by the gospel :
text2: Me phenav tumenge : katar e lashi viasta le manush kai Nai Zhiduvuria shinado lenge te avel le le Zhidovonsa . O swuntsomos kai O Del garavel peske narodoske ; vi won si anda iak stato , ai vi lenge si so shinadia O Del ando Jesus Kristo .

text: Whereof I was made a minister , according to the gift of the grace of God given unto me by the effectual working of his power .
text2: Kerdilem ek pasturi te angerav e lashi viasta palai podarka kai O Del anda pesko lashimos dia ma ande peski putiera .

text: Unto me , who am less than the least of all saints , is this grace given , that I should preach among the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ ;
text2: Me sim o mai tele katar kodola kai si mai tele anda sa o narodo le Devlesko ; ai O Del dia ma kadia podarka , te anav ka kodola kai Nai Zhiduvuria e lashi viasta kai mothol pa barvalimos o baro le Kristosko ;

text: And to make all men see what is the fellowship of the mystery , which from the beginning of the world hath been hid in God , who created all things by Jesus Christ :
text2: ai te anav sa le manushen te dikhen sar o garaimos le Devlesko trobul te kerdiol , kado sas garado ando Del de anda gor la lumiako , O Del kerdia swako fielo pala Jesus Kristo .

text: To the intent that now unto the principalities and powers in heavenly places might be known by the church the manifold wisdom of God ,
text2: Saxke akana le khangeriasa , le zora ai le putieri la lumiake kai si ando cheri te zhanen e goji le Devleski ande soste godi .

text: According to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord :
text2: O Del kerdia kadia vorta sar mangelas de demult kai kerdia le Jesus Kristosa amaro Del .

text: In whom we have boldness and access with confidence by the faith of him .
text2: Le Kristosa andek than ai pala amaro pachamos ande leste , chi mai sam phangle ai sai sikadiuas angla Del sa amare ilesa .

text: Wherefore I desire that ye faint not at my tribulations for you , which is your glory .
text2: Akana , mangav tumendar , te na xasaren tumaro pachamos pala chinuimos kai si ma tumenge ; ke tumenge avela baro luvudimos .

text: For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Anda kodia , dav changa angla Dat amare Devlesko O Jesus Kristo .

text: Of whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named ,
text2: Kai lestar sa le famili ando rhaio ai pe phuv len lesko chacho anav .

text: That he would grant you , according to the riches of his glory , to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man ;
text2: Mangav katar O Del te ande pesko barvalimos o luvudime , te del tume te aven zurale la putierasa katar pesko Swunto Duxo ande tumende .

text: That Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith ; that ye , being rooted and grounded in love ,
text2: Ai O Kristo te beshel ande tumare ile pala pachamos . Mangav te avel tumaro pachamos zuralo ande dragostia le Devleski .

text: May be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth , and length , and depth , and height ;
text2: Ai sa le Devleske narodosa , tume sai haliaren sode e dragostia le Kristoski buflo lo , ai lungo , vucho , ai profondo ;

text: And to know the love of Christ , which passeth knowledge , that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God .
text2: ai te zhanen tume leski dragostia , marka ke khonik nashti zhanel sa , ai te avel pherdo ande sa le dieli le Devleske .

text: Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think , according to the power that worketh in us ,
text2: E kodo kai si les e putiera te kerel mai but sar so ame mangas vai gindisaras , katar e putiera kai kerel buchi ande amende .

text: Unto him be glory in the church by Christ Jesus throughout all ages , world without end . Amen .
text2: Ka Del te avel o luvudimos ande khangeri ai ando Jesus Kristo ande swako vriama , Amen .

text: I therefore , the prisoner of the Lord , beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called ,
text2: Me kai sim o manush phandado le Devlesko : mangav tumendar , phiren vorta sar O Del manglia kana akhardia tume .

text: With all lowliness and meekness , with longsuffering , forbearing one another in love ;
text2: Te na aven shoxar barimatange , kovle te aven lashe , ai aven rhavda sa data , zhutin iek kavreske la dragostiamasa .

text: Endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace .
text2: Thon zor te traiin andek than sar iek kai del O Swunto Duxo katar e pacha , kai astarel tume iek kavreste .

text: There is one body , and one Spirit , even as ye are called in one hope of your calling ;
text2: Ferdi iek stato si , ai iek Swunto Duxo , ai ferdi iek pachamos si , kodo kai akhardia tume O Del .

text: One Lord , one faith , one baptism ,
text2: Ferdi iek Devles , iek pachamos , ai iek bolimos ;

text: One God and Father of all , who is above all , and through all , and in you all .
text2: Ferdi iek Del si ai Dat savorhengo , kai poronchil pe savorhenge , ai kerel buchi ande savorhende , ai traiil ande savorhende .

text: But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ .
text2: Sakones anda amende sas les dini iek podarka pala so manglia te del O Kristo .

text: Wherefore he saith , When he ascended up on high , he led captivity captive , and gave gifts unto men .
text2: Sar mothol E Vorba le Devleski , " Kana O Kristo anklisto opre ando rhaio , angerdia pesa manush kai sas phangle , ai dia podarki kal manush .

text: ( Now that he ascended , what is it but that he also descended first into the lower parts of the earth ?
text2: So znachil kodia ke anklisto opre ? Kodia znachil ke mai anglal hulisto andel thana kai si le mai tele ande phuv .

text: He that descended is the same also that ascended up far above all heavens , that he might fill all things . )
text2: Kodo kai hulisto tele sa kodo si kai anklisto o mai opre ando rhaio , saxke te perel swako diela .

text: And he gave some , apostles ; and some , prophets ; and some , evangelists ; and some , pastors and teachers ;
text2: Wo si kai dia podarki ka swako manush ; dia unen te aven apostluria , aver te aven profeturia , kaver te angeren e lashi viasta , ai kaver te aven manush kai den duma pa Del , ai uni te sicharen .

text: For the perfecting of the saints , for the work of the ministry , for the edifying of the body of Christ :
text2: Kerdia kadia te lasharel le Devleske narodos te keren e buchi le Devleski , antunchi e khangeri kai si o stato le Kristosko avela zurali ando pachamos .

text: Till we all come in the unity of the faith , and of the knowledge of the Son of God , unto a perfect man , unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ :
text2: Ai kadia aresasa savorhe andek than ande iek pachamos , ai te zhanas pa Shav le Devlesko ; sar iek manush baro kerdo palai musura vorta sar si O Kristo .

text: That we henceforth be no more children , tossed to and fro , and carried about with every wind of doctrine , by the sleight of men , and cunning craftiness , whereby they lie in wait to deceive ;
text2: Antunchi chi mai avasa glate , kai parhuven penge ginduria ande so pachanpa , ke phendia amenge vari kon aver diela , vai zhanglia sar te xoxavel ame , ai kodo xoxaimos kerel te miazol amenge ke chachimos si .

text: But speaking the truth in love , may grow up into him in all things , which is the head , even Christ :
text2: Numa phenas o chachimos la dragostiasa , sagda dasa duma pa chachimos , ai traiisarasa ando chachimos ai te aresas mai but ai mai but sar O Kristo , kai wo si o shero peske statosko .

text: From whom the whole body fitly joined together and compacted by that which every joint supplieth , according to the effectual working in the measure of every part , maketh increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love .
text2: Ai lesa sa o stato zhal mishto , ai swako kotor zhutil le kolavres , saxke so trobul sa o stato te ankerel andek than ande iek stato . Ai te bariol zuralo ande dragostia .

text: This I say therefore , and testify in the Lord , that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk , in the vanity of their mind ,
text2: Ashun , so mothav ai phenav ando anav le Devlesko , na mai phiren sar le manush kai chi zhanen le Devles ,

text: Having the understanding darkened , being alienated from the life of God through the ignorance that is in them , because of the blindness of their heart :
text2: ai kai lenpe pala pengi goji intaino , ai lengi goji ando tuniariko la , ai nai le vov si o traio kai del O Del ke chi zhanen kanchi , ai lengo ilo defial zuralo lo .

text: Who being past feeling have given themselves over unto lasciviousness , to work all uncleanness with greediness .
text2: Chi mai zhanen vov si so si lazhav , dine pengo stato te keren le dieli le bi vuzhe , chi aterdion vov si , ai ingerde le katar penge ginduria le chorhe te keren so godi si nasul .

text: But ye have not so learned Christ ;
text2: Numa tume chi sichilian kadala dieli katar O Kristo .

text: If so be that ye have heard him , and have been taught by him , as the truth is in Jesus :
text2: Tume ashundian pa leste , ai sicharde tume sar shave Devleske o chachimos kai si ando Jesus .

text: That ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man , which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts ;
text2: Tume trobul te shuden tumaro phurano traio kai sikavelas sar phirenas mai anglal , kodo phurano traio kai leske ginduria le chordane angeren kai martia .

text: And be renewed in the spirit of your mind ;
text2: Trobul tume te aven sa nevearde ande tumare ile ai ande tumari goji .

text: And that ye put on the new man , which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness .
text2: Len pe tumende o nevo traio , kai si kerdo te miazol po Del ai sikadiol ando traio o chacho ai vuzho kai anel o chachimos .

text: Wherefore putting away lying , speak every man truth with his neighbour : for we are members one of another .
text2: Anda kodia na mai xoxaven , ai mothon savorhe o chachimos tumare vortakoske , ke savorhe andek than sam ande iek stato .

text: Be ye angry , and sin not : let not the sun go down upon your wrath :
text2: Te xoliavon , arakhen tume te na peren ando bezex ; na ankeren tumari xoli sorho dies .

text: Neither give place to the devil .
text2: Na meken o beng te kerel so mangel .

text: Let him that stole steal no more : but rather let him labour , working with his hands the thing which is good , that he may have to give to him that needeth .
text2: Kodo kai chorelas te na mai chorel , numa te tholpe te kerel buchi le vastensa , te niril wo pesko traio malades , ai te avel les te sai zhutil le manush kai trobul o zhutimos .

text: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth , but that which is good to the use of edifying , that it may minister grace unto the hearers .
text2: Na mothon chi iek zhungali vorba , numa mothon ferdi vorbi lashe kai zhutin le kolavren te barion ando pachamos , ai te den atweto ka iek zhutimos te keren mishtimos kodolenge kai ashunen tumende .

text: And grieve not the holy Spirit of God , whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption .
text2: Na nekezhin le Devleske Swuntone Duxos , ke O Swunto Duxo si o semno kai O Del thodia anda tumende , si o shinaimos kai o dies avela kana O Del skepil tu .

text: Let all bitterness , and wrath , and anger , and clamour , and evil speaking , be put away from you , with all malice :
text2: Shuden dur tumendar o nasulimos , ai xoli , ai chingara , ai tsipimata , ai te xan tume avrensa . Kadalendar dieli te na avel ande tumaro traio .

text: And be ye kind one to another , tenderhearted , forgiving one another , even as God for Christ ' s sake hath forgiven you .
text2: Numa aven lashe iek kavresa , lashe ilenge , iertin iek kavreske , sar O Del iertisardia tumen ando Kristo .

text: Be ye therefore followers of God , as dear children ;
text2: Tume san le shave kai si drago le Devleske , kerdion sar leste .

text: And walk in love , as Christ also hath loved us , and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour .
text2: Ai phiren ande dragostia sar O Kristo kai sas les dragostia amenge , diape wo ka Del amenge sar ek podarka ai ek sakrifis ka Del kai kandel shukar ai kai plachal les Devles .

text: But fornication , and all uncleanness , or covetousness , let it not be once named among you , as becometh saints ;
text2: Tume san o narodo le Devlesko , no akana chi trobul te avel chi iek kurvia , ai chi iek bi vuzhimos , vai te avel tumenge drago so si le kolavres , chi iek anda kadala dieli te na aven mashkar tumende .

text: Neither filthiness , nor foolish talking , nor jesting , which are not convenient : but rather giving of thanks .
text2: Ai nai chi mishto te mothon zhangale vorbi , dzile vai chorhe ; numa mai bini te naisin le Devles .

text: For this ye know , that no whoremonger , nor unclean person , nor covetous man , who is an idolater , hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God .
text2: Ke tume zhanen mishto , chi iek manush kai kerel o kurvimos , vai o bi vuzho manush , vai o manush kai mangel so si nai lesko , vai manush kai rhugilpe kal ikoni , chi zhala ando rhaio le Kristosko ai le Devlesko .

text: Let no man deceive you with vain words : for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of disobedience .
text2: Te na dziliarel tume khonik dzile vorbensa , ke pala kasavendar dosha si kai e xoli le Devleski si te avel pe kodola kai chi mangen te pachan lesko mui .

text: Be not ye therefore partakers with them .
text2: Te na avel tume kanchi ka save manushensa .

text: For ye were sometimes darkness , but now are ye light in the Lord : walk as children of light :
text2: Tume sanas mai anglal ando tuniariko , numa akana kai san le Devlesa ande vediara . Phiren sar manush kai si la vediarake .

text: ( For the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth ; )
text2: Ke e vediara kerel but lashimos , ai so si vorta , ai o chachimos .

text: Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord .
text2: Len sama so si drago le Devleski .

text: And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness , but rather reprove them .
text2: Ai te na avel tume kanchi kodolensa kai keren dieli intaino , ai kai si le tuniarikoske . Numa keren te sikadion kodola dieli ande vediara .

text: For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done of them in secret .
text2: Inker lazhav amenge te mothas so kodola manush keren chordanes .

text: But all things that are reproved are made manifest by the light : for whatsoever doth make manifest is light .
text2: Kana sa kodola dieli thodine le ande vediara , dichol mishto so si kodola dieli .

text: Wherefore he saith , Awake thou that sleepest , and arise from the dead , and Christ shall give thee light .
text2: Ke so godi si porhime kerdiol vediara . Ke E Vorba le Devleski mothol , " Wushti opre tu kai soves . Wushti opre mashkar le mule ! Ai O Kristo anela tuke e vediara . "

text: See then that ye walk circumspectly , not as fools , but as wise ,
text2: Len sama mishto sar phiren . Na phiren sar manush kai chi zhanen , numa sar manush kai zhanen .

text: Redeeming the time , because the days are evil .
text2: Keren mishtimos ando sako diela kai maladiol tumenge , ke andel diesa kai traiisaras chorhe le .
