text: Wherefore be ye not unwise , but understanding what the will of the Lord is .
text2: Anda kodia , na aven dzile , numa thon zor te haliaren sar O Del mangel te keren .

text: And be not drunk with wine , wherein is excess ; but be filled with the Spirit ;
text2: Na machon le molasa , ke kodia kerela te avel tume xhorho traio ; numa te aven pherdo ando Swunto Duxo .

text: Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord ;
text2: Den duma iekavreske andel vorbi le Psalmoske , ai jilia , ai le jilia le Devleske , jilaben jilia ai Psalms ka Del , ai luvudin les sa tumare ilesa .

text: Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ ;
text2: Sagda de naisimos ka Del ai O Dat ando anav amaro Devleske O Jesus Kristo pala swako fielo .

text: Submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God .
text2: Respektin iek kavreske pala kai si tume le Kristoske .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as unto the Lord .
text2: Rhomniale , respektin tumare rhomen , sar respektin le Devles .

text: For the husband is the head of the wife , even as Christ is the head of the church : and he is the saviour of the body .
text2: Ke o rhom si o gazda peska rhomniako sar O Kristo si o gazda la khangeriako ; ke O Kristo si o skepitori la khangeriako ke e khangeri si lesko stato .

text: Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ , so let the wives be to their own husbands in every thing .
text2: Sa le rhomnia trobul te respektin penge rhomen ande swako fielo sar e khangeri respektil le Kristos .

text: Husbands , love your wives , even as Christ also loved the church , and gave himself for it ;
text2: Tume le rhom , te avel tumenge drago tumare rhomnia saikfielo sar O Kristo sas leske drago e khangeri ai dia pesko traio .

text: That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word ,
text2: Wo kerdia kadia te kerel andai khangeri te sai avel le Devleski kana xaladia la le paiesa ai la vorbasa .

text: That he might present it to himself a glorious church , not having spot , or wrinkle , or any such thing ; but that it should be holy and without blemish .
text2: Ke mangel te nakhavel angla peste e khangeri , ande sa pesko shukarimos , ande pesko vuzhimos , ai bi doshako , bi pechetengo , ai chi iek avre doshensa .

text: So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies . He that loveth his wife loveth himself .
text2: No le rhom trobul te avel lenge drago lenge rhomnia sar si lenge drago pengo stato . Kodo kai drago leske leski rhomni wo drago lo peske .

text: For no man ever yet hated his own flesh ; but nourisheth and cherisheth it , even as the Lord the church :
text2: Khonik shoxar nas leske gratsia lesko stato ; numa pravarel peske statos ai lel sama lestar , sar O Kristo lel sama katar e khangeri ;

text: For we are members of his body , of his flesh , and of his bones .
text2: Ke ame sam manush anda lesko stato , e khangeri .

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and shall be joined unto his wife , and they two shall be one flesh .
text2: E Vorba le Devleski mothol , " Pala kodia , o rhom mekela peske dades ai peska da te traiil peska rhomniasa , ai andal dui zhene kerdiola ferdi iek . "

text: This is a great mystery : but I speak concerning Christ and the church .
text2: Baro chachimos mothol E Vorba le Devleski ai trutno te haliarel , me haliarel ke pa Kristo mothol ai pai e khangeri .

text: Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself ; and the wife see that she reverence her husband .
text2: Numa vi tumenge si te len tume pala late : trobul swako rhom te avel leske drago leski rhomni sar si wo peske drago , ai swako rhomni te respektil peske rhomnes .

text: Children , obey your parents in the Lord : for this is right .
text2: Tume le glate trobul angla Del te pachan o mui tumare niamongo , ke kodia si vorta , malades .

text: Honour thy father and mother ; ( which is the first commandment with promise ; )
text2: " Respektisar che dades ai cha da " ai kado si o pervo zakono zhidovisko kai sas dino kai si les iek shinaimos :

text: That it may be well with thee , and thou mayest live long on the earth .
text2: O shinaimos si : " Te respektis che dades ai cha da , tu traiis lungo vriama pe phuv ai avel tu but mishtimos . "

text: And , ye fathers , provoke not your children to wrath : but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord .
text2: Ai tume le dada , na keren tumare glatensa bi malades ai te xoliavon , numa bariaren le ando sicharimos , ai sicharen le pa Del .

text: Servants , be obedient to them that are your masters according to the flesh , with fear and trembling , in singleness of your heart , as unto Christ ;
text2: Tume le slugi , pachan o mui tumare gazdengo kai si katse pe phuv , respektin le ai izdran angla lende ; ai chache ilesa , sar te podaisardianas le Kristos .

text: Not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but as the servants of Christ , doing the will of God from the heart ;
text2: Na raduin tume ferdi te keren kodia kana tumare gazda len sama pe tumende te aven lenge drago ; numa kerel e voia le Devleski sa tumare ilesa , sar slugi le Kristoske .

text: With good will doing service , as to the Lord , and not to men :
text2: Keren tumari buchi sar slugi la voiasa , sar te kerdianas buchi le Devleski , ai na ferdi le manushenge .

text: Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth , the same shall he receive of the Lord , whether he be bond or free .
text2: Den tume goji , ke kon godi , sluga vai iek kai kerel buchi pala pochin , lela katar O Del so trobul te avel leske pala mishtimos kai kerdia .

text: And , ye masters , do the same things unto them , forbearing threatening : knowing that your Master also is in heaven ; neither is there respect of persons with him .
text2: Ai tume le gazda , keren sakadia karing tumare slugi ; ai na daraven le ke chinuina le . Den tume goji ke tumaro gazda si ando rhaio ; ai kai leske savorhe iekfielo le .

text: Finally , my brethren , be strong in the Lord , and in the power of his might .
text2: Murhe phral , roden tumari zor ando Del ai ande leski putiera .

text: Put on the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil .
text2: Len pe tumende sa e armia kai O Del del tume , saxke te inkeren kai xetrenia le bengeski ai te na peren ando atsaimos le bengesko .

text: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood , but against principalities , against powers , against the rulers of the darkness of this world , against spiritual wickedness in high places .
text2: Ke chi maras ame le manushensa kai si les stato ai rat , numa maras ame kodolensa kai nai le stato , o nasulimos kai poronchil pe lumia kai ame chi dikhas , le angeluria le bengeske , le putieri kai poronchin pe kadia lumia kai si tuniariko .

text: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day , and having done all , to stand .
text2: Anda kodia , len pe tumende sa e armia le Devleski akana ! Ai porme kana avela o dies o chorho , te maresa zurales o duzhmaia zhando gor , ai kana nakhela kodo dies o chorho tu inker sai inkeres .

text: Stand therefore , having your loins girt about with truth , and having on the breastplate of righteousness ;
text2: Te aven gata : te avel tume o chachimos sar iek prashtia chidi pe tumaro mashkar ; len pe tumende so si vorta sar iek charolakolinako ;

text: And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace ;
text2: Len le papucha kai grebin tume te ingeren e lashi viasta la pachaki ;

text: Above all , taking the shield of faith , wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked .
text2: ai opral pa sa kadala dieli , len o buklie sar o vusharimos le pachamasko , kai kodolesa sai mudarena sa le flishila iagake kai aven katar o beng .

text: And take the helmet of salvation , and the sword of the Spirit , which is the word of God :
text2: Len e staji le skepimaski , ai e sabia le Swuntone Duxoski , kadia si E Vorba le Devleski .

text: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit , and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints ;
text2: Rhugis ande swako vriama ando Swunto Duxo sar wo ingerel . Rhugis tu swako data kana trobul vari so , arakhes tu ai sagda rhugis ai na aterdios . Na bustren te rhugis pala sa le shave le Devleske .

text: And for me , that utterance may be given unto me , that I may open my mouth boldly , to make known the mystery of the gospel ,
text2: Rhugin tume vi mange , saxke O Del te del ma le vorbe le chache kana dava duma , ai kana phenava sa murhe ilesa te kerav te zhanen e lashi viasta kai si garadi .

text: For which I am an ambassador in bonds : that therein I may speak boldly , as I ought to speak .
text2: Me sim ek tradino te phenav e lashi viasta le Devleski , marka ke sim phanglo le lantsona akana . Rhugin tume te sai dav duma bi darako sar trobulpe te kerav .

text: But that ye also may know my affairs , and how I do , Tychicus , a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord , shall make known to you all things :
text2: Tychicus , amaro kuchi phral fidel lo ai zhutil ande buchi le Devleski , wo mothola tumenge sa pa mande , saxke te zhanen so kerdiol anda mande .

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that ye might know our affairs , and that he might comfort your hearts .
text2: Me tradav les tumende , saxke te mothol tumenge sar sam , ai te mai raduinpe tumare ile .

text: Peace be to the brethren , and love with faith , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: O Del O Dat ai le Devles O Jesus Kristo te del sa le phralen e pacha ai e dragostia le pachamasa .

text: Grace be with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity . Amen .
text2: O lashimos le Devlesko te avel sa kodolensa kai si lenge drago amaro Devles O Jesus Kristo andek dragostia kai shoxar chi merel .

text: Paul and Timotheus , the servants of Jesus Christ , to all the saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi , with the bishops and deacons :
text2: O Pavlo ai o Timote , le slugi le Jesus Kristoske , ka sa le kai pachanpe ando Jesus Kristo kai si ando Philippi , ai kodola kai inkeren e khangeri ai vi kodola kai zhutin ande khangeri .

text: Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: O Del amaro Dat ai le Devles O Jesus Kristo te del tume o lashimos ai e pacha .

text: I thank my God upon every remembrance of you ,
text2: Naisiv murhe Devleske anda tumende swako data kai dav ma goji tumende ;

text: Always in every prayer of mine for you all making request with joy ,
text2: swako data kai rhugiv ma tumenge , rhugiv ma raduimasa .

text: For your fellowship in the gospel from the first day until now ;
text2: Ke tume zhutisardian ma te ingerav e lashi viasta , de katar o pervo dies zhi akana .

text: Being confident of this very thing , that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ :
text2: Zhanav ai pachav ma : ke O Del kai nachinaisardia kadia buchi e lashi ande tumende , zhala angle zhi kai godi getola la zhi ka dies kai avela la O Jesus Kristo .

text: Even as it is meet for me to think this of you all , because I have you in my heart ; inasmuch as both in my bonds , and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel , ye all are partakers of my grace .
text2: Chaches ke kadia gindiv pa tumende savorhe ke tume san ande murho ilo ! Ke vi tume lian anda lashimos kai O Del dia ma , akana kai sim phanglo ai vi kana chi simas phanglo te thav partia ai te sikavav o chachimos la lashia viastako , tume kai savorhe san ande kado lashimos kai si me .

text: For God is my record , how greatly I long after you all in the bowels of Jesus Christ .
text2: O Del zhanel ke o chachimos mothav , kana mothav ke drago san mange savorhe ande dragostia kai avel katar O Jesus Kristo .

text: And this I pray , that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and in all judgment ;
text2: O rhugimos kai mangav katar O Del tumenge : mangav te bariol tumari dragostia mai but ai mai but , ando zhanglimos ai ande goji , saxke te sai alon so si mishto .

text: That ye may approve things that are excellent ; that ye may be sincere and without offence till the day of Christ ;
text2: Ai kadia aven vuzhe ai khonik nashtila te thol tumenge dosh kana avela o dies le Kristosko .

text: Being filled with the fruits of righteousness , which are by Jesus Christ , unto the glory and praise of God .
text2: Tumaro traio avela pherdo fruti le chachimaski , kai O Jesus Kristo kerel ando barimos ai o luvudimos le Devlesko .

text: But I would ye should understand , brethren , that the things which happened unto me have fallen out rather unto the furtherance of the gospel ;
text2: Murhe phral , mangav te zhanen , ke so kerdilia mange sas te zhal angle e lashi viasta .

text: So that my bonds in Christ are manifest in all the palace , and in all other places ;
text2: Kadia si kai sa le ketani kai garaven o baro kher ai sa le kolaver zhanen ke ande lantsuria sim kai kerdem buchi le Kristoski .

text: And many of the brethren in the Lord , waxing confident by my bonds , are much more bold to speak the word without fear .
text2: Kai zhanen ma andel lantsuria , si mai but phral kai pachanpe ando Del sai mothon bi darako pa E Vorba le Devleski .

text: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife ; and some also of good will :
text2: Chaches ke uni anda lende mothon pa Kristo ke zhaluzole anda mande ai xoliasa keren kodia , numa aver den duma pa Kristo penge ilesa .

text: The one preach Christ of contention , not sincerely , supposing to add affliction to my bonds :
text2: Won keren kodia ande dragostia , ke won zhanen ke O Del dia ma kadia buchi te thav partia la lashia viastaki .

text: But the other of love , knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel .
text2: Numa le kolaver chi mothon pa Kristo penge ilesa , numa ande xoli ke won gindin ke mai butiaren murho chino zhi kai sim andel lantsuria .

text: What then ? notwithstanding , every way , whether in pretence , or in truth , Christ is preached ; and I therein do rejoice , yea , and will rejoice .
text2: Nai mange kanchi ! Te avela lenge ginduria chorhe vai lashe , numa mishto ke den duma pa Kristo . Me raduiv ma anda kodia ai mai raduiva ma .

text: For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer , and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ ,
text2: Ke zhanav ke kodia avela pe murho mishtimos pala tumare rhugimata , ai o zhutimos kai anel O Swunto Duxo le Jesus Kristosko .

text: According to my earnest expectation and my hope , that in nothing I shall be ashamed , but that with all boldness , as always , so now also Christ shall be magnified in my body , whether it be by life , or by death .
text2: Ande murho azhukerimos ai zhanav ke chi azhukerav intaino , chi avel mange lazhav kanchestar , numa akana sar mai anglal O Kristo avela luvudime ande murho stato bi darako , ande murho traio vai ande murhi martia .

text: For to me to live is Christ , and to die is gain .
text2: Ke O Kristo si murho traio , ai te merava mai mishto .

text: But if I live in the flesh , this is the fruit of my labour : yet what I shall choose I wot not .
text2: Numa te mai traiiva ando stato , te sai mai kerav iek buchi kai trobul , chi zhanav so te alov .

text: For I am in a strait betwixt two , having a desire to depart , and to be with Christ ; which is far better :
text2: Haliarav ke tsirdino sim pa dui riga , drago mange te mekav kodo traio te avav le Kristosa , ai kodia avela mai mishto .

text: Nevertheless to abide in the flesh is more needful for you .
text2: Numa mai but zhutimos avela tumenge te mai traiiv .

text: And having this confidence , I know that I shall abide and continue with you all for your furtherance and joy of faith ;
text2: Ai zhanav ke kadia si , zhanav te beshava ai traiiva tumensa savorhensa te zhutiv tume te barion ando pachamos , ai te aven raduime ando pachamos .

text: That your rejoicing may be more abundant in Jesus Christ for me by my coming to you again .
text2: Ai kadia kana avava pale tumensa , avela tumen pala mande anda soste te luvudin tume , ande tumaro traio le Kristosa .

text: Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ : that whether I come and see you , or else be absent , I may hear of your affairs , that ye stand fast in one spirit , with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel ;
text2: Numa traiin kadia sar e lashi viasta le Kristoski sikavel , te zhava te dikhav tume vai nichi , sai ashunava ke tume beshen ande Vorba le Devleski ande iek gindo , ai ke maren tume andek than , sa ieke ilesa , pala pachamos kai del e lashi viasta .

text: And in nothing terrified by your adversaries : which is to them an evident token of perdition , but to you of salvation , and that of God .
text2: Na meken te daraven tume ande kancheste tumare duzhmaia ; ke kodia avela lenge iek semno , ke won xasavona , ai tumenge avela o semno ke san po lasho drom le skepimasko , ai kodia avel katar O Del .

text: For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ , not only to believe on him , but also to suffer for his sake ;
text2: Ke O Del dia tume e voia te keren buchi le Kristoski , na ferdi te pachan tume anda leste , numa vi ke chinuin leske .

text: Having the same conflict which ye saw in me , and now hear to be in me .
text2: Akana vi tume maren tume mansa . Ai kadia kai maras ame sa kodo si kai dikhlian man ke maravas ma mai anglal , ai kai inker kerav tume zhanen .

text: If there be therefore any consolation in Christ , if any comfort of love , if any fellowship of the Spirit , if any bowels and mercies ,
text2: Si tume zor ke chiro traio si ando Kristo ? Leski dragostia pechin tume ? Si tume raduimos ke zhutisardian te ingeren e lashi viasta kal manush le Swuntone Duxosa ? Si tumen dragostia ai lashimos iek kavreske ?

text: Fulfil ye my joy , that ye be likeminded , having the same love , being of one accord , of one mind .
text2: Mangav tumendar , keren anda mande te avav defial raduime te dikhav ke pe iek gindo keren buchi , ai ke san drago iek kavreske , ai te aven tumare ile saikfielo ai vi tumare ginduria .

text: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory ; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves .
text2: Na keren kanchi ande xoli vai te luvudin tume intaino , saxke te sikadion ; numa te aven manush kai chi keren barimata mashkar iek kavreste , ai swako te jinel le kolavren sar mai opre lestar .

text: Look not every man on his own things , but every man also on the things of others .
text2: Te na rodel khonik te kerel ferdi peske mishtimos , numa rodel te kerel vi le kolavrenge .

text: Let this mind be in you , which was also in Christ Jesus :
text2: Te avel ande tumende le ginduria kai sas ando Jesus Kristo .

text: Who , being in the form of God , thought it not robbery to be equal with God :
text2: Wo de sar godi sas Del sas , numa chi phendia ke trobulas te rodel te kerel pe zor te avel saikfielo sar O Del .

text: But made himself of no reputation , and took upon him the form of a servant , and was made in the likeness of men :
text2: Numa wo thodia rigate so godi sas les , ai kerdia anda peste iek sluga . Wo kerdilo saikfielo sar iek manush , ai sikadilo sar iek chacho manush .

text: And being found in fashion as a man , he humbled himself , and became obedient unto death , even the death of the cross .
text2: Manglia te traiil prostovanes ai pachaia o mui zhi kai martia , e martia po trushul .

text: Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him , and given him a name which is above every name :
text2: Anda kodia O Del vazdia les opre ando than o mai opre , ai dia les o anav kai si o mai baro de sar sa le kolaver anava .

text: That at the name of Jesus every knee should bow , of things in heaven , and things in earth , and things under the earth ;
text2: Saxke ando luvudimos le anaveske le Jesusosko , sa le manush kai si ando rhaio , ai pe phuv , ai telai phuv dela changa angla leste .

text: And that every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ is Lord , to the glory of God the Father .
text2: Ai savorhe te mothon ke O Jesus Kristo si le Devles , ando luvudimos le Devlesko O Dat .

text: Wherefore , my beloved , as ye have always obeyed , not as in my presence only , but now much more in my absence , work out your own salvation with fear and trembling .
text2: Murhe vortacha , tume sagda pachaian mui kana simas tumensa , ai akana mai but trobul te pachan o mui kai chi sim tumensa . Keren buchi ka sikaven tumaro skepimos , ai durion katar le dieli nai drago le Devleske .

text: For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure .
text2: Ke O Del kerel buchi ande tumende sagda te kerel anda tumende te sai avel tume e voia ai te keren so wo mangel .

text: Do all things without murmurings and disputings :
text2: Keren swako fielo bi te vachin tume ai bi te xan tume ,

text: That ye may be blameless and harmless , the sons of God , without rebuke , in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation , among whom ye shine as lights in the world ;
text2: saxke te na aven doshale , tume san shave Devleske kai nai doshale mashkar o narodo kai si xoxamle , ai bezexale ande kadia lumia . Tume trobul te strefian mashkar lende sar le chererhaia ando cheri ,

text: Holding forth the word of life ; that I may rejoice in the day of Christ , that I have not run in vain , neither laboured in vain .
text2: ai kai anen lenge e vorba le traioski . Te kerena kadia , luvudiva tumen kana avela O Kristo , ai kodia sikavela ke sa murhi buchi ai sa murhi zor nas intaino .

text: Yea , and if I be offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith , I joy , and rejoice with you all .
text2: Amborim murho rat kodia si murho traio avela thodino sar iek podarka ka sakrifis kai tumaro pachamos anel angla Del . Ai te avela kodia raduime sim ai hulavav murho raduimos tumensa .

text: For the same cause also do ye joy , and rejoice with me .
text2: Ai tume trobul te raduin tume ai te hulaven mansa tumaro raduimos .

text: But I trust in the Lord Jesus to send Timotheus shortly unto you , that I also may be of good comfort , when I know your state .
text2: Gindiv ando anav le Devlesko O Jesus te sai tradav tumenge sigo vriama o Timote , saxke te zuriaren les ando pachamos ai i me kana ashunava pa tumende .

text: For I have no man likeminded , who will naturally care for your state .
text2: Ferdi wo hulavel mansa le dieli kai si ma ando gindo , ai kai si leske chaches anda tumende .

text: For all seek their own , not the things which are Jesus Christ ' s .
text2: Sa le kolaver si lenge ferdi anda penge dieli , ai na andal dieli le Jesus Krisoske .

text: But ye know the proof of him , that , as a son with the father , he hath served with me in the gospel .
text2: Zhanen tume sar o Timote sikadia sar beshel sagda mansa , ai sar kerdia buchi mansa sar iek shav peske dadesa , te ingeras e lashi viasta .

text: Him therefore I hope to send presently , so soon as I shall see how it will go with me .
text2: Mangav te tradav les tumende , kana dikhava so kerdiolpe anda mande .

text: But I trust in the Lord that I also myself shall come shortly .
text2: Ai pachav ma ando Del ke zhava me te dikhav tume .

text: Yet I supposed it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus , my brother , and companion in labour , and fellowsoldier , but your messenger , and he that ministered to my wants .
text2: Haliardem ke trobul te tradav tumenge amare phrales o Epaphroditas , wo si murho vortako ande buchi ai kai marelpe mansa , wo kai tradian mange te zhutil ma kana trobulas ma zhutimos .

text: For he longed after you all , and was full of heaviness , because that ye had heard that he had been sick .
text2: Wo mangel defial te dikhel tume savorhen , ai delpe goji ke ashundian ke wo naswalosas .

text: For indeed he was sick nigh unto death : but God had mercy on him ; and not on him only , but on me also , lest I should have sorrow upon sorrow .
text2: Chaches naswalo sas , ai vi mai xantsi sas te merel . Numa O Del sas leske mila anda leste , ai na ferdi anda leste , numa vi anda mande , saxke te na nekezhima mai zurales .

text: I sent him therefore the more carefully , that , when ye see him again , ye may rejoice , and that I may be the less sorrowful .
text2: Akana grebime sim te tradav les tumende , saxke pale te raduin tume kana dikhena les , ai murho nekazo te zhaltar .

text: Receive him therefore in the Lord with all gladness ; and hold such in reputation :
text2: Premin les , bare raduimasa , sar iek phral kai zhanen le Devles . Tume trobul te sikaven respektimos le manushenge kai si sar leste .

text: Because for the work of Christ he was nigh unto death , not regarding his life , to supply your lack of service toward me .
text2: Ke wo mai xantsi sas te merel palai buchi le Devleski , bunisardia pesko traio te xasarel les te anel mange o zhutimos kai tume nashtin te anen mange .

text: Finally , my brethren , rejoice in the Lord . To write the same things to you , to me indeed is not grievous , but for you it is safe .
text2: Akana , murhe phral , raduin tume ando Del , nai mange chino te mai mothav tumenge so vunzhe ramosardem tume , ai pe tumaro mishtimos si .

text: Beware of dogs , beware of evil workers , beware of the concision .
text2: Arakhen tume katar kodola kai keren o nasulimos , kodola zhukel , kodola manush kai mangen pe zor te keren semno ando stato .

text: For we are the circumcision , which worship God in the spirit , and rejoice in Christ Jesus , and have no confidence in the flesh .
text2: Ame sam ai na won , kai sikavas o chacho semno ando stato , ke ame luvudis le Devles katar lesko Swunto Duxo , ai raduis ame ando amaro pachamos ando Jesus Kristo .

text: Though I might also have confidence in the flesh . If any other man thinketh that he hath whereof he might trust in the flesh , I more :
text2: Te manglemas i me , sai thodemas murho pachamos andel manush . Te gindila vari kon ke sai thol pesko pachamos andel manush , sode mai but me sai gindiv ma ke sar wo .

text: Circumcised the eighth day , of the stock of Israel , of the tribe of Benjamin , an Hebrew of the Hebrews ; as touching the law , a Pharisee ;
text2: Me , thode semno pe murho stato kana simas ferdi ieke kurkesko . Me sim Zhidovo ai kadia biandilem , andai vitsa kodoleske kai busholas Benjamin , wo sas Zhidovo andai chachi vitsa . Ai so si anda zakono le Zhidovongo , Farizeano simas .

text: Concerning zeal , persecuting the church ; touching the righteousness which is in the law , blameless .
text2: Ai kadia de zurales sas mange po ilo te kerav kodo zakono ta chinuivas le Devleske shaven . Ai chi simas doshalo karing e kris le zakonoski .

text: But what things were gain to me , those I counted loss for Christ .
text2: Numa sa kadala dieli kai garavavas sar iek mishtimos , zasardem le pala Kristo .

text: Yea doubtless , and I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord : for whom I have suffered the loss of all things , and do count them but dung , that I may win Christ ,
text2: Nai ferdi le dieli , numa dikhav swako diela sar te avilino xasardi pala kado mishtimos defial mai baro , kai zhanav le Jesus Kristos murho Devles . Pala leste shudem pa mande sa le dieli kai sas ma ; ai jinav kodola dieli sar gunoi , saxke te niriv le Kristos .

text: And be found in him , not having mine own righteousness , which is of the law , but that which is through the faith of Christ , the righteousness which is of God by faith :
text2: Ai te avav vorta astardo leste , ai chi mai jinav ke vorta sim angla Del ke lav ma pala zakono . Numa me sim vorta angla Del pala murho pachamos ando Kristo .

text: That I may know him , and the power of his resurrection , and the fellowship of his sufferings , being made conformable unto his death ;
text2: Me mangav te zhanava le Kristos , ai e putiera kai zhuvindisardia les , ai te avav lesa andel chinuria kai sas les , ai te avav sar leste ande leski martia ,

text: If by any means I might attain unto the resurrection of the dead .
text2: ai te aresav te dashtiva te zhuvindiv mashkar le mule .

text: Not as though I had already attained , either were already perfect : but I follow after , if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus .
text2: Chi mothav ke areslem ka kodia vai ke akana vorta sim . Numa zhav angle te thav zor te astarav kodo mishtimos ke O Jesus Kristo vunzhe lia ma peske .

text: Brethren , I count not myself to have apprehended : but this one thing I do , forgetting those things which are behind , and reaching forth unto those things which are before ,
text2: Nichi , murhe phral , chi gindiv ke lem vunzhe kodo mishtimos ; numa kerav iek diela , bustrav so si pala mande , ai thav zor te aresav kal dieli kai si angla mande .

text: I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus .
text2: No nashav angle te niriv kodo mishtimos , kai O Del katar O Jesus Kristo akharel ame te las kotse opre ando rhaio .

text: Let us therefore , as many as be perfect , be thus minded : and if in any thing ye be otherwise minded , God shall reveal even this unto you .
text2: Ame kai zhanas mishto andel dieli le Devleske trobul te avel ame iek gindo , numa te si uni anda tumende te gindina aver fielo , O Del sikavela tumenge .

text: Nevertheless , whereto we have already attained , let us walk by the same rule , let us mind the same thing .
text2: Numa sar sam akana phiras andek than .

text: Brethren , be followers together of me , and mark them which walk so as ye have us for an ensample .
text2: Murhe phral , keren savorhe sar mande . . Ame sikadiam le kolavrenge sar te keren , dikhen pe kodola kai phiren sar tume sichardian le .

text: ( For many walk , of whom I have told you often , and now tell you even weeping , that they are the enemies of the cross of Christ :
text2: Phendem tumenge butivar , ai mai phenav tumenge akana asuensa . Si but kai phiren sar le duzhmaia kai martia le Kristoski po trushul .

text: Whose end is destruction , whose God is their belly , and whose glory is in their shame , who mind earthly things . )
text2: Kodola zhana ande iado , ke lengo del lenge si lengo ji , won luvudinpe andal dieli kai trobulas te avel lenge lazhav , ai won denpe goji ferdi kal dieli kadala lumiake .

text: For our conversation is in heaven ; from whence also we look for the Saviour , the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Numa ame , amaro kher si ando rhaio , ai azhukeras sa amare ilesa te avel anda rhaio amaro skepitori , le Devles O Jesus Kristo .

text: Who shall change our vile body , that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body , according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself .
text2: Wo parhuvela amaro chorho stato la phuviako ai kerela te avel sar lesko stato o luvudime , kerela kodia le putierasa ke wo dashti kerel kodia peste sa le dieli kai mangel .

text: Therefore , my brethren dearly beloved and longed for , my joy and crown , so stand fast in the Lord , my dearly beloved .
text2: No murhe kuchi phral , tume kai sa murhe ilesa mangav te dikhav tume , tume kai raduin ma , ai kai luvudiv tume ! Beshen phangle ka Del , murhe phral ,

text: I beseech Euodias , and beseech Syntyche , that they be of the same mind in the Lord .
text2: Euodia ai Syntiche , mangav ma tumendar te aven tume andek than sar dui pheia , iek fielo ginduria karing O Del .

text: And I intreat thee also , true yokefellow , help those women which laboured with me in the gospel , with Clement also , and with other my fellowlabourers , whose names are in the book of life .
text2: Vi tu , murho vortako kai shoxar chi meklian ma , mangav tutar te zhutis len ; ke won kerde zurales buchi mansa te mothas e lashi viasta , ai vi le Clementosa ai sa murhe avre vortachensa kai kerenas buchi mansa , kai lenge anava si ramome ande klishka le traioski .

text: Rejoice in the Lord alway : and again I say , Rejoice .
text2: Raduin tume sagda le Devlesa , ai mai mothav , raduin tume !

text: Let your moderation be known unto all men . The Lord is at hand .
text2: Sikaven lashimos karing savorhende . O Del avela sigo vriama .

text: Be careful for nothing ; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God .
text2: Na daran anda kancheste , numa ande soste godi mangen katar O Del ando rhugimos so trobul tumen , ai mangen lestar ieke ilesa kai naisil leske .

text: And the peace of God , which passeth all understanding , shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus .
text2: Ai e pacha le Devleski kai nakhel opral pa so godi o manush sai haliarel , garavela tumare ile ai tumare ginduria ando Jesus Kristo .

text: Finally , brethren , whatsoever things are true , whatsoever things are honest , whatsoever things are just , whatsoever things are pure , whatsoever things are lovely , whatsoever things are of good report ; if there be any virtue , and if there be any praise , think on these things .
text2: Murhe phral , len tume pala dieli kai si lashe ai kai sai luvudis le : ai pe so godi si chacho , ai respektime , vorta , vuzho , drago , kai avel lashe viasti .

text: Those things , which ye have both learned , and received , and heard , and seen in me , do : and the God of peace shall be with you .
text2: Keren so sichilian ai so sas tumen dino mandar , ai so ashundian mandar , ai dikhlian ke kerdem . Ai O Del kai del ame e pacha avela tumensa .

text: But I rejoiced in the Lord greatly , that now at the last your care of me hath flourished again ; wherein ye were also careful , but ye lacked opportunity .
text2: Baro raduimos si ma ando Del ! Ke akana sai sikaven pale ke drago sim tumenge . Chi mangav te mothav ke chi mai denas tume goji mande , numa nas tume te sikaven mange ke inker kamen / volin ma .

text: Not that I speak in respect of want : for I have learned , in whatsoever state I am , therewith to be content .
text2: Ai chi dav duma kadia ke trobul ma vari so , ke sichilem te avel mange mishto so sa si ma .

text: I know both how to be abased , and I know how to abound : every where and in all things I am instructed both to be full and to be hungry , both to abound and to suffer need .
text2: Zhanav te traiiv ando chorimos , ai zhanav te traiiv vi ando but , sichilem te avel mange mishto katar godi , ai sar godi avela , te avela ma dosta te xav vai te avava bokhalo , te avela mai but vai te na avela ma dosta .

text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me .
text2: Sai rhevdiv sa kadala dieli , nais le Devleske kai del ma e zor .

text: Notwithstanding ye have well done , that ye did communicate with my affliction .
text2: Numa mishto kerdian te zhutin ma ande murhe baiuria .

text: Now ye Philippians know also , that in the beginning of the gospel , when I departed from Macedonia , no church communicated with me as concerning giving and receiving , but ye only .
text2: Tume zhanen mishto , tume le Philipiana , kana gelemtar andai Macedonia ande vriama kai lasas ame te mothas e lashi viasta , tume sanas ferdi iek khangeri te zhutil ma ; tume sanas ferdi te len anda so nirivas ai vi so xasaravas .

text: For even in Thessalonica ye sent once and again unto my necessity .
text2: Vunzhe kana simas ande Thessalonika , tradian mange mai but sar iek data o zhutimos kai trobulas man .

text: Not because I desire a gift : but I desire fruit that may abound to your account .
text2: Nai ke rodav ferdi te den ma podarki ; numa mangav te mai butiol opral pa so si tume .

text: But I have all , and abound : I am full , having received of Epaphroditus the things which were sent from you , an odour of a sweet smell , a sacrifice acceptable , wellpleasing to God .
text2: No len so godi tradian mange , ai mai but si sar so trobul ma , akana o Epaphroditus andia mange tumare podarki . Si ma so godi trobul ma , tumare podarki si sar iek sakrifis ai iek sung lashi , iek sakrifis kai O Del premil ai kai si lesko drago .

text: But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus .
text2: Murho Del , dela tume so godi trobula tume ande pesko baro barvalimos ando Jesus Kristo .

text: Now unto God and our Father be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Ka Del amaro Dat te avel luvudimos ande swako vriama . Amen .

text: Salute every saint in Christ Jesus . The brethren which are with me greet you .
text2: Traden but bax , zor ai sastimos ando Jesus Kristo sa le Devleske narodoske . Le phral kai si mansa traden tumenge but bax , zor ai sastimos .

text: All the saints salute you , chiefly they that are of Caesar ' s household .
text2: Sa o narodo le Devlesko kai si katse , ai mai but kodola kai si ando baro kher le amperatosko traden tumenge but bax , zor ai sastimos .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: O mishtimos le Devlesko O Jesus Kristo te avel tumensa savorhensa . Amen .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timotheus our brother ,
text2: O Pavlo , ek apostle le Jesus Kristosko , katar e voia le Devleski , ai katar o Timote amaro phral .

text: To the saints and faithful brethren in Christ which are at Colosse : Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Ka le Devleske narodoske kai si ando Colossae , ai kai si amare phral ando Kristo : O Del amaro Dat ai le Devles Jesus Kristo del tume o mishtimos ai e pacha .

text: We give thanks to God and the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , praying always for you ,
text2: Ame das o naisimos sagda ka Del ai ka Dat amaro Devles O Jesus Kristosko , kana rhugisavas tumenge .

text: Since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus , and of the love which ye have to all the saints ,
text2: De katar ashundiam pa tumaro pachamos kai si tume ando Jesus Kristo , ai e dragostia kai si tume ka le Devleske narodoske .

text: For the hope which is laid up for you in heaven , whereof ye heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel ;
text2: Kana e vorba le chachimaski e lashi viasta avili e pervo data tumende , diam tume te zhanen o raduimos kai del , no tumaro pachamos ai tumari dragostia thodine le ande so azhukeren kai si garado tumenge ando rhaio .

text: Which is come unto you , as it is in all the world ; and bringeth forth fruit , as it doth also in you , since the day ye heard of it , and knew the grace of God in truth :
text2: E lashi viasta zhal katar godi , ai anel pesko swuntsomos ande sa e lumia , vorta sar kerdia mashkar tumende de katar o dies kai e pervo data ashundian pa lashimos le Devlesko , ai sichilian te zhanen so si chaches o lashimos le Devlesko .

text: As ye also learned of Epaphras our dear fellowservant , who is for you a faithful minister of Christ ;
text2: O Epaphras , amare kuchi vortako ande buchi si kai sichardia tume kadia diela , wo si tumenge iek sluga kai kerel e buchi kai dia les O Kristo ;

text: Who also declared unto us your love in the Spirit .
text2: Wo phendia amenge pa dragostia kai O Swunto Duxo dia tume .

text: For this cause we also , since the day we heard it , do not cease to pray for you , and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding ;
text2: Anda kodia ame sagda rhugisavas anda tumende , de katar o dies kai ashundiam pa tumende . Ame mangas katar O Del te del tume te zhanen leski voia , ai te del tume sa o pachivalimos ai e goji kai del lesko Swunto Duxo .

text: That ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing , being fruitful in every good work , and increasing in the knowledge of God ;
text2: Ai kadia sai phirena sar O Kristo mangel , ai te keren sagda so plachal les . Tume kerena but lashe dieli , ai zhana angle te zhanen mai but le Devles .

text: Strengthened with all might , according to his glorious power , unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness ;
text2: Ame mangas katar O Del te aven defial zurliarde katar leski putiera e luvudime , saxke te sai rhevdin swako fielo rhavdasa ai raduimasa .

text: Giving thanks unto the Father , which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light :
text2: Das naisimos raduimasa ka O Dat , kai dia tume te sai aven anda kodola kai si vi lenge o mishtimos kai O Del garavel ando rhaio la vediarako kodolenge kai si leske .

text: Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness , and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son :
text2: Wo lia ame katar e putiera le tuniarikoske , ai andia ame ando rhaio peske shavesko kai si leske drago .

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , even the forgiveness of sins :
text2: Ame samas chindiam pala lesko rat ai amare bezexa iertimele .

text: Who is the image of the invisible God , the firstborn of every creature :
text2: O Kristo si o patreto le Devlesko kai chi dichol . Wo kerdilo o pervo mai anglal sar sa le kolaver dieli .

text: For by him were all things created , that are in heaven , and that are in earth , visible and invisible , whether they be thrones , or dominions , or principalities , or powers : all things were created by him , and for him :
text2: Ke lestar O Del kerdia swako fielo ando rhaio ai pe phuv , so dichol ai vi so chi dichol , le putieri kai chi dichon , le amperaturia vai le amperetsi , vai le putieri ; O Del kerdia swako fielo lestar ai leske .

text: And he is before all things , and by him all things consist .
text2: Wo sas mai anglal sar swako diela , ai lesa andek than sa le dieli kai si kerde beshen pe pengo than .

text: And he is the head of the body , the church : who is the beginning , the firstborn from the dead ; that in all things he might have the preeminence .
text2: Wo si o shero le statosko kai kerel e khangeri ; ande leste si kai nachinail o traio o nevo , wo si o shav kai kerdilo o pervo , wo si o pervo kai sas andino katar e martia ka traio , saxke te avel leste o pervo than ande soste godi .

text: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell ;
text2: Ke O Del manglia te avel wo sa peska putierasa ande pesko Shav .

text: And , having made peace through the blood of his cross , by him to reconcile all things unto himself ; by him , I say , whether they be things in earth , or things in heaven .
text2: Ai vi manglia te chidel sa e lumia peste katar O Shav . O Del andia e pacha kana mulo lesko Shav ai shordia pesko rat po trushul , ai kadia chidia swako diela pesa , pe phuv ai vi ando rhaio .

text: And you , that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works , yet now hath he reconciled
text2: Vi tume mai anglal sanas dur katar O Del , tume sanas leske duzhmaia pala sa o nasulimos kai gindinas ai kerenas .

text: In the body of his flesh through death , to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight :
text2: Numa akana katar e martia kai lesko Shav lia ande pesko stato manushesko , O Del kerdia te avel tume e pacha lesa , saxke te kerel te aven angla leste Swuntsi , vuzhe , ai bi doshako ,

text: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled , and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel , which ye have heard , and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven ; whereof I Paul am made a minister ;
text2: numa akana trobul tume te beshen ando pachamos zurales , thodino andek zurali fundania , ai te na meken tume te durion katar o lashimos kai azhukeren , ai kai si tumaro de sar ashundian e lashi viasta kodia lashi viasta si kodia kai sas phendi swakone manusheske ande lumia , ai kodia kai me o Pavlo kerdilem ek pasturi .

text: Who now rejoice in my sufferings for you , and fill up that which is behind of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body ' s sake , which is the church :
text2: Akana raduiv ma ando chino kai si ma tumenge . Ke katar murhe vutuimata kai sim ando stato , zhutiv te pherav so mai trobul kal vutuimata le Kristoske leske statoske kai si e khangeri .

text: Whereof I am made a minister , according to the dispensation of God which is given to me for you , to fulfil the word of God ;
text2: Me kerdilem ek pasturi la khangeriaki , palai buchi kai O Del dia ma te kerav tumenge , ando gindo le Devlesko te phenav tumenge sa leski vorba .

text: Even the mystery which hath been hid from ages and from generations , but now is made manifest to his saints :
text2: Kodia si e buchi kai garadia sas la sagda katar e lumia . Numa kai sikadia akana kodolenge kai si leske .

text: To whom God would make known what is the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles ; which is Christ in you , the hope of glory :
text2: O Del manglia te del le te zhanen o baro mishtios kai si ande kodo diela kai sas garadi . Mashkar sa le manush kai chi zhanen le Devles . So si kodo lashimos garado ? Te zhanen ke O Kristo ande tumende lo , ai del tume ande tumaro ilo te zhanen ke vi tume avena ando rhaio le Devlesa .

text: Whom we preach , warning every man , and teaching every man in all wisdom ; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus :
text2: No ame mothas pa Kristo swakone manusheske . Ame phenas ai sicharas swakones sa la gojasa kai dashtilpe , saxke te keras te avel angla Del sar iek baro manush astardo le Kristosa .

text: Whereunto I also labour , striving according to his working , which worketh in me mightily .
text2: Te kerav kadia buchi , kerav buchi ai marav ma la putierasa ai la zorasa kai del O Kristo , ai kodia zor kerel buchi ande mande .

text: For I would that ye knew what great conflict I have for you , and for them at Laodicea , and for as many as have not seen my face in the flesh ;
text2: Mangav te zhanen sode de trutno o marimos kai marav ma anda tumende , ai kodolenge kai si ande Laodicea , ai mai sa kodolenge kai chi zhanen ma ai shoxar chi dikhle ma .

text: That their hearts might be comforted , being knit together in love , and unto all riches of the full assurance of understanding , to the acknowledgement of the mystery of God , and of the Father , and of Christ ;
text2: Marav ma me , saxke lengo ilo te avel pherdo zor ai pechime te aven chidine ande dragostia , ai barvale andek bari goji te zhanen e buchi e garadi le Devleske , ai le Dadesko ai le Kristosko .

text: In whom are hid all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge .
text2: Ande leste si garadi sa le barvalimata le pachivalimaske ai le zhanglimaske kai aven katar O Del .

text: And this I say , lest any man should beguile you with enticing words .
text2: Me dav duma tumensa kadia , saxke te na meken khonik te dziliarel tumen la xitreniasa .

text: For though I be absent in the flesh , yet am I with you in the spirit , joying and beholding your order , and the stedfastness of your faith in Christ .
text2: Vi te sim dur tumendar murhe statosa , pasha tumende sim murhe gindonsa , ai raduime sim ke dikhav sar inkeren mishto savorhe andek than ande tumaro pachamos ando Kristo .

text: As ye have therefore received Christ Jesus the Lord , so walk ye in him :
text2: Tume premisardian le Jesus Kristos sar tumaro Devles O Skepitori , traiin andek than lesa .

text: Rooted and built up in him , and stablished in the faith , as ye have been taught , abounding therein with thanksgiving .
text2: Aven zurales astarde ande leste , keren sa tumaro traio pe leste , barion ando pachamos pala so sichilian , ai naisin sagda .

text: Beware lest any man spoil you through philosophy and vain deceit , after the tradition of men , after the rudiments of the world , and not after Christ .
text2: Na meken le kolavren te rimon tumaro pachamos ai tumaro raduimos penge xoxamle sicharimasa , lenge divanuria nai lashe , won len pe palal ginduria le manushenge , ai na pala so phendia O Kristo .

text: For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily .
text2: Ke so godi si O Del thodiape sar stato ando Kristo , saxke te avel sa ande leste .

text: And ye are complete in him , which is the head of all principality and power :
text2: Ai tume lian swako fielo lesa . Ke wo poronchil pe sa le zora ai pe sa le putiera kai chi dichon .

text: In whom also ye are circumcised with the circumcision made without hands , in putting off the body of the sins of the flesh by the circumcision of Christ :
text2: Lesa andek than sanas semnome , na o semno kai si kerdo katar le manush , numa o semno kai avel katar O Kristo , ai kodo semno si te na mai aves phuterdo katar e putiera le statoski kai si bezexalo .

text: Buried with him in baptism , wherein also ye are risen with him through the faith of the operation of God , who hath raised him from the dead .
text2: Kana sanas bolde , tume sanas angropome le Kristosa , ai porme zhuvindisailian lesa , ke tume pachaian tume ande putiera le Devleski kai andia les katar e martia ka traio .

text: And you , being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh , hath he quickened together with him , having forgiven you all trespasses ;
text2: Tume mai anglal mule sanas le Devleske pala tumare bezexa ai ke chi sanas semnome , tume chi zhanenas le Devles . Numa akana O Del dia tume te traiin le Kristosa ; O Del iertisardia ame anda sa amare bezexa .

text: Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us , which was contrary to us , and took it out of the way , nailing it to his cross ;
text2: Wo xaladia e buchi kai o zakono dosharelas ame , ai kai ashelas pe amende , ai lia sa kana karfosardia le Kristos po trushul .

text: And having spoiled principalities and powers , he made a shew of them openly , triumphing over them in it .
text2: Kadia O Del lia le bengeski putiera kai tholas dosh pe tumende ke bezexale san , ai O Del sikadia sa la lumiake , ke O Kristo nirisardia po trushul kana lia sa tumare bezexa .

text: Let no man therefore judge you in meat , or in drink , or in respect of an holyday , or of the new moon , or of the sabbath days :
text2: Na meken khonik te thol tumenge dosh anda so xan , ai anda so pen , vai ke chi keren le praznikuria le Zhidovonge , ai chi rhugin tume ka nevo shunuto , vai kal Sabat .

text: Which are a shadow of things to come ; but the body is of Christ .
text2: Kodia si ek patreto le dielenge kai avena , numa o stato si ando Kristo .

text: Let no man beguile you of your reward in a voluntary humility and worshipping of angels , intruding into those things which he hath not seen , vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind ,
text2: Na meken kanikas te mothol ke chi san skepime ke chi rhugin tume kal angeluria , ke won mothon ke trobul . Won mothon ke dikhle iek vizion , ai mothon ke vi tume trobulas te dikhen , ke kasavendar manush si le defial xitro , bezex ginduria ai won mothon ke nai barimatange .

text: And not holding the Head , from which all the body by joints and bands having nourishment ministered , and knit together , increaseth with the increase of God .
text2: Kodola manush chi beshen astarde le Kristosa kai si o shero , nais le Kristoske ke ame sam o stato antrego le Kristosko . Amari zor te barios ando Del avel katar O Kristo .

text: Wherefore if ye be dead with Christ from the rudiments of the world , why , as though living in the world , are ye subject to ordinances ,
text2: Tume mulian ke Kristosa ai sanas line avri anda phanglimos anda gindo kadala lumiako . Sostar , traiin sar te avilianas kadala lumiake ? Sostar premin te len tume pala kasavendar ginduria ?

text: ( Touch not ; taste not ; handle not ;
text2: " Na azba , na zumav kako , na le kako . " Kadala dieli kai si nai mai aven kana ma nai lashe .

text: Which all are to perish with the using ; ) after the commandments and doctrines of men ?
text2: Kado si o zakono ai o sicharimos le manushengo .

text: Which things have indeed a shew of wisdom in will worship , and humility , and neglecting of the body ; not in any honour to the satisfying of the flesh .
text2: Miazol kai kadala dieli si mishto te keren , ke kodola dieli si trutno po stato , miazon te na aven barimatange . Won chi aterdiaren o manush te mangen te keren bezex .

text: If ye then be risen with Christ , seek those things which are above , where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God .
text2: Tume sanas andine katar e martia ka traio le Kristosa , akana roden le dieli kai si ando rhaio , kotse kai O Kristo beshel pe chachi rik le Devleske .

text: Set your affection on things above , not on things on the earth .
text2: Sagda gindin pa dieli kai so opre , ai na pe dieli kai si pe phuv .

text: For ye are dead , and your life is hid with Christ in God .
text2: Ke tume mule san , ai tumaro traio garado lo le Kristosa ando Del .

text: When Christ , who is our life , shall appear , then shall ye also appear with him in glory .
text2: Tumaro chacho traio si O Kristo , ai kana sikadiola , antunchi vi tume sikadiona lesa ai aven vi tume ande lesko rhaio .

text: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth ; fornication , uncleanness , inordinate affection , evil concupiscence , and covetousness , which is idolatry :
text2: Keren te merel so godi si kadala phuviako ande tumende ; e kurvia , o bi vuzhimos , mangen te keren kurvia , le ginduria le chorhe , ai mangen so si avereske , kadia si te del o luvudimos kal ikoni .

text: For which things ' sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience :
text2: Ke pal kasavendar dieli e xoli le Devleski si te avel pe kodola kai chi pachan lesko mui .

text: In the which ye also walked some time , when ye lived in them .
text2: Tume kadia phirenas mai anglal kana traiinas andel bezexa .

text: But now ye also put off all these ; anger , wrath , malice , blasphemy , filthy communication out of your mouth .
text2: Numa akana shuden sa kadala dieli : e xoli , le chorhe ginduria kai sigo kerel e xoli , ai o bi lashimos , te vuzhukerel kanikas , ai pupuimos , ai den duma nasul kontra O Del , ai le vorbi zhungale anda tumaro mui .

text: Lie not one to another , seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds ;
text2: Na xoxaven tume iek kavres , ke meklian tumaro phurano traio le dielensa kai sas ande leste , ai lian pe tumende o traio o nevo .

text: And have put on the new man , which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him :
text2: O traio le neve manushesko kai neviol sagda pala patreto le Devlesko , kodo kai kerdia les , saxke te aresel te zhanel les mishto .

text: Where there is neither Greek nor Jew , circumcision nor uncircumcision , Barbarian , Scythian , bond nor free : but Christ is all , and in all .
text2: Kai nai chi Grekuria , chi Zhiduvuria , chi manush semnosa , chi manush kai nai semnome , chi barbarians ( le manush kai chi ashunde ai chi zhangle pa Kristo mai anglal ) , chi manush phangle , chi manush kai nai phangle , numa O Kristo si swako fielo , ai ande savorhende .

text: Put on therefore , as the elect of God , holy and beloved , bowels of mercies , kindness , humbleness of mind , meekness , longsuffering ;
text2: Tume san o narodo le Devlesko ; O Del manglia tume ai alosardia tume te aven leske . Anda kodia tume trobul te avel ande tumende lashimos , te zhutin , te na aven barimatange , te na xoliavon , ai te avel tume rhavda ,

text: Forbearing one another , and forgiving one another , if any man have a quarrel against any : even as Christ forgave you , so also do ye .
text2: rhevdin iek kavreske , ai te si iek kai vachilpe anda kolaver , iertin iek kavreske , sar O Kristo iertisardia tumenge , vi tume iertin iek kavreske .

text: And above all these things put on charity , which is the bond of perfectness .
text2: Ai opral , pa sa kadala dieli te avel tume e dragostia , kado si kai kerela te aven mishto phangle iek kavresa .

text: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts , to the which also ye are called in one body ; and be ye thankful .
text2: Ai meken e pacha le Kristoski te lel sama katar tumare ile , ke O Del akhardia tumen andek than sar savorhe andek than sam ande iek stato . Naisin anda kodia .

text: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom ; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord .
text2: E Vorba le Kristoski te avel sa peske mishtimasa ande tumende , sicharen iek kavres ai len sama iek kavrestar pachivales . Jilaben le jilia le Davidoske ai le jilia la khangeriake , ai le jilia le rhaioske ka Del le ilesa pherdo naisimaske .

text: And whatsoever ye do in word or deed , do all in the name of the Lord Jesus , giving thanks to God and the Father by him .
text2: Ai so godi keren vai mothon , keren ando anav le Devlesko O Jesus , ai ande lesko anav naisin le Devleske O Dat .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as it is fit in the Lord .
text2: Rhomnia le , len tume pala tumare rhom , ke kadia mangel O Del tutar te keren .

text: Husbands , love your wives , and be not bitter against them .
text2: Le rhom , avel tumenge drago tumare rhomnia , ai na xoliavon pe lende .

text: Children , obey your parents in all things : for this is well pleasing unto the Lord .
text2: Tume le glate , angla Kristo te pachan o mui ande soste godi tumare niamongo , ke kodia si drago le Devleske .

text: Fathers , provoke not your children to anger , lest they be discouraged .
text2: Tume le dada , na xoliaren tumare glaten saxke te na rimonpe .

text: Servants , obey in all things your masters according to the flesh ; not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but in singleness of heart , fearing God :
text2: Tume le slugi , pachan o mui tumare gazdango ande soste godi katse pe phuv , na raduin tume te keren kadia ferdi kana len sama pe tumende , te plachan le , numa pachan o mui sa tumare ilesa , ke pala respektimos kai si tumen le Kristoske .

text: And whatsoever ye do , do it heartily , as to the Lord , and not unto men ;
text2: Saviatar godi avela tumari buchi keren la sa tumare ilesa , sar te kerdianas buchi le Kristoske , ai na le manushenge .

text: Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance : for ye serve the Lord Christ .
text2: Den tume goji ke O Del dela tume lashimos , tume lena o mishtimos kai garavel le manushenge kai si leske . Ke o chacho gazda kai tume keren leske buchi O Kristo si .

text: But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done : and there is no respect of persons .
text2: Numa kodo kai kerel o nasulimos , avela les pala so kerdia , pala nasulimos kai kerdia ; ke le Devleske sa le manush iek fialo le .

text: Masters , give unto your servants that which is just and equal ; knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven .
text2: Tume le gazda , keren tumare slugensa vorta ai malades , ke den tume goji ke si vi tumen iek gazda ando rhaio .

text: Continue in prayer , and watch in the same with thanksgiving ;
text2: Rhugin tume sagda , ai nachion kana rhugin tume ando naisimos le Devleske .

text: Withal praying also for us , that God would open unto us a door of utterance , to speak the mystery of Christ , for which I am also in bonds :
text2: Ai ande kodia rhugin tume vi amenge , saxke ODel te del ame vriama maladi te das duma pa leski vorba , te mothas o mishtimos o garado le Kristosko , ke pala kado mishtimos o garado si kai sim ande temnitsa .

text: That I may make it manifest , as I ought to speak .
text2: Rhugin tume , saxke te dav duma pa kodia buchi , ai te sikavav mishto te haliaren sar trobul te kerav .

text: Walk in wisdom toward them that are without , redeeming the time .
text2: Traiin pachivales mashkar kodola kai chi zhanen le Devles , keren mishtimos swako data kai dashtina .

text: Let your speech be alway with grace , seasoned with salt , that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man .
text2: Tumaro divano te avel sagda shukar ai malado , ai trobul te zhanen sar te den atweto swakones malades .

text: All my state shall Tychicus declare unto you , who is a beloved brother , and a faithful minister and fellowservant in the Lord :
text2: O Tychicus amaro kuchi phral , kai zhutil ma sagda ai kai si murho vortako ande buchi le Devleske , mothola tumenge sa pa mande .

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that he might know your estate , and comfort your hearts ;
text2: Tradav les tumende narozhno te mothol tumenge sar sam , ai te mai raduinpe tumare ile .

text: With Onesimus , a faithful and beloved brother , who is one of you . They shall make known unto you all things which are done here .
text2: Lesa avela o Onesimus , o kuchi ai zhutitori phral , kai si iek anda tumare ai mothola tumenge so godi kerdiolpe katse .

text: Aristarchus my fellowprisoner saluteth you , and Marcus , sister ' s son to Barnabas , ( touching whom ye received commandments : if he come unto you , receive him ; )
text2: O Aristarchus , kai si mansa ande temnitsa , tradel tumenge but bax , zor ai sastimos , ai vi o Mark , o vero le Barnabasosko . Phendem tumenge pa vunzhe pa Mark te avela te dikhel tume , premil les lashimasa .

text: And Jesus , which is called Justus , who are of the circumcision . These only are my fellowworkers unto the kingdom of God , which have been a comfort unto me .
text2: O Jesus , kai akharen les Justus , tradel tumenge vi wo but bax , zor ai sastimos . Kadala trin manush ferdi mashkar le Zhiduvuria dinepe ka Del ai keren buchi mansa le Devleske amperetsiake , won raduisarde murho ilo zurales .

text: Epaphras , who is one of you , a servant of Christ , saluteth you , always labouring fervently for you in prayers , that ye may stand perfect and complete in all the will of God .
text2: O Epaphras , kai si iek anda tumare e sluga le Jesus Kristoski , tradel tumenge but bax , zor ai sastimos , rhugilpe sa peske ilesa tumenge , saxke te beshen zurales pasha Del , ai te haliaren mishto sar trobul pe , ai te aven mishto gata te keren so godi mangel O Del .

text: For I bear him record , that he hath a great zeal for you , and them that are in Laodicea , and them in Hierapolis .
text2: Sai phenav kacha iek diela pa leste ke kerel zurales buchi tumenge , ai vi kodolenge kai si ando Laodicea , ai kodolenge kai si ando Hierapolis .

text: Luke , the beloved physician , and Demas , greet you .
text2: O Luk , amaro drago doxktoro , ai o Demes traden tumenge but bax , zor ai sastimos .

text: Salute the brethren which are in Laodicea , and Nymphas , and the church which is in his house .
text2: Traden but bax , zor ai sastimos le phralenge kai si ando Laodicea , ai vi le Nymphaske ai la khangeriake kai chidelpe ande lesko kher .

text: And when this epistle is read among you , cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans ; and that ye likewise read the epistle from Laodicea .
text2: Kana jinena kado lil , keren te jinen les vi ande khangeri ando Laodicea , ai vi tume jinen o lil kai tradena tumenge ando Laodicea .

text: And say to Archippus , Take heed to the ministry which thou hast received in the Lord , that thou fulfil it .
text2: Mothon le Archipeske , " Le sama te ker mishto e buchi kai sas tu dini le Devleske . "

text: The salutation by the hand of me Paul . Remember my bonds . Grace be with you . Amen .
text2: Murhe vastesa ramov kadala vorbi : but bax , zor ai sastimos katar o Paul . Na bustren ke ande temnitsa sim ! O lashimos le Devlesko te avel tumensa .

text: Paul , and Silvanus , and Timotheus , unto the church of the Thessalonians which is in God the Father and in the Lord Jesus Christ : Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Katar o Pavlo , o Silas , ai o Timote ka tume kai si ande khangeri ande Thesalonika , kai tume si le Devleske O Dat , ai ande le Devles Jesus Kristos o mishtimos ai e pacha te avel tumen dini katar O Del amaro Dat , ai le Devles Jesus Kristo .

text: We give thanks to God always for you all , making mention of you in our prayers ;
text2: Ame naisisaras sagda le Devleske anda tumende savorhende , ai das ame sagda goji tumende kana rhugisavas .

text: Remembering without ceasing your work of faith , and labour of love , and patience of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ , in the sight of God and our Father ;
text2: Seras ame angla Del amaro Dat sar sikadian tumaro pachamos , ai sar tumari dragostia dia tume voia te keren buchi le Devleske , ai sar tumaro pachamos ando Jesus Kristo ankerel .

text: Knowing , brethren beloved , your election of God .
text2: Amare phral , ame zhanas ke O Del drago sas tumenge , ai alosardia tume te aven leske .

text: For our gospel came not unto you in word only , but also in power , and in the Holy Ghost , and in much assurance ; as ye know what manner of men we were among you for your sake .
text2: Ke andiam tumenge e lashi viasta , na ferdi le vorbensa , numa la putierasa kai avel katar O Swunto Duxo . Ai o pachamos kai si amen ando kado chachimos kai avel katar e viasta . Tume zhanen sar traiisardiam mashkar tumende pe tumaro mishtimos .

text: And ye became followers of us , and of the Lord , having received the word in much affliction , with joy of the Holy Ghost :
text2: Tume liam tume pala amende ai pala Kristo ; chinuisardiam but , numa tume premisardian E Vorba le Devleski le raduimasa kai del O Swunto Duxo .

text: So that ye were ensamples to all that believe in Macedonia and Achaia .
text2: No pe tumende sai len sama sa le phral kai si ande Macedonia ai ande Gretsia sar te traiin angla Del .

text: For from you sounded out the word of the Lord not only in Macedonia and Achaia , but also in every place your faith to God - ward is spread abroad ; so that we need not to speak any thing .
text2: E Vorba le Devleski tumendar avili , na ferdi ande Macedonia ai ande Gretsia , numa katar godi e viasta tumare pachamos ka ando Del ashundili . Ame chi mai trobul te mothas kanikaske .

text: For they themselves shew of us what manner of entering in we had unto you , and how ye turned to God from idols to serve the living and true God ;
text2: Savorhe den duma pa kodia kai premisardian ame kana geliam tumende , ai kai meklian le ikoni te bolden tume karing O Del , saxke te keren buchi le Devleski le zhuvindeske ai le chacheske ;

text: And to wait for his Son from heaven , whom he raised from the dead , even Jesus , which delivered us from the wrath to come .
text2: ai te azhukeren te avel lesko Shav anda rhaio , kai zhuvindisardia les andai martia , lesko Shav O Jesus Kristo , ai kai ankaladia ame avri anda xoli le Devleski kai si te avel .

text: For yourselves , brethren , know our entrance in unto you , that it was not in vain :
text2: Zhanen mishto tume , amare phral , ke chi geliam tumende intaino .

text: But even after that we had suffered before , and were shamefully entreated , as ye know , at Philippi , we were bold in our God to speak unto you the gospel of God with much contention .
text2: Tume zhanen ke chinuisardiam ai vunzhe vutisardia ame ando Filipi mai anglal sar te aresas tumende ande Thesalonika . Numa O Del dia ame e zor te anas tumenge e lashi viasta kai avel lestar , marka ke but roden te rimon .

text: For our exhortation was not of deceit , nor of uncleanness , nor in guile :
text2: Ke amaro divano pa Del kai phenas le manushenge , nai xoxamlo vai bi vuzho , ai chi rodas te shubisaras kanikas .

text: But as we were allowed of God to be put in trust with the gospel , even so we speak ; not as pleasing men , but God , which trieth our hearts .
text2: Numa das duma sagda sar O Del mangel , ke wo manglia ai dia ame peski lashi viasta te ingeras la . Ame chi rodas te avas drazhi le manushenge , numa le Devleske , wo kai lel sama le ginduria amare ileske .

text: For neither at any time used we flattering words , as ye know , nor a cloke of covetousness ; God is witness :
text2: Tume zhanen ke shoxar chi kerdiam barimata ande amaro divano , ai vi chi garadiam ande amare vorbi ke mangas te nirisaras love , ai O Del zhanel !

text: Nor of men sought we glory , neither of you , nor yet of others , when we might have been burdensome , as the apostles of Christ .
text2: Chi rodiam te luvudil ame khonik , chi anda tumende , ai chi andal kolaver , ai te mangliamas sai thodiamas tume te le amari zor sar slugi le Kristoske .

text: But we were gentle among you , even as a nurse cherisheth her children :
text2: Numa lashe samas kana samas tumende , lashe sar iek dei kai lel sama peske glatendar .

text: So being affectionately desirous of you , we were willing to have imparted unto you , not the gospel of God only , but also our own souls , because ye were dear unto us .
text2: Pala amari dragostia tumenge , gata samas te das tume na ferdi e lashi viasta kai avel katar O Del numa vi amaro traio . Ke tume kadia de drago sanas amenge .

text: For ye remember , brethren , our labour and travail : for labouring night and day , because we would not be chargeable unto any of you , we preached unto you the gospel of God .
text2: Tume seren tume , amare phral , sar ame kerdiam buchi ai samas defial chine , ame kerdiam buchi vi adiese ai vi e riate , saxke te na las pe love chi ieskeske anda tumende , phendiam tumenge e lashi viasta kai avel katar O Del .

text: Ye are witnesses , and God also , how holily and justly and unblameably we behaved ourselves among you that believe :
text2: Tume san amare marturia , ai vi O Del si amaro marturo : amaro traio mashkar tumende , tume kai pachan tume ando Del vuzho sas , vorta , ai bi doshako .

text: As ye know how we exhorted and comforted and charged every one of you , as a father doth his children ,
text2: Tume zhanen ke kerdiam swakonesa anda tumende sar kerel iek dat peske shavensa .

text: That ye would walk worthy of God , who hath called you unto his kingdom and glory .
text2: Ame diam tume zor ando pachamos , ai raduisardiam tumare ile , ame mangliam tumendar sa amare ilesa te traiin iek traio kai si drago le Devleske , wo kai akhardia tume te aven ande lesko rhaio ai ande lesko luvudimos .

text: For this cause also thank we God without ceasing , because , when ye received the word of God which ye heard of us , ye received it not as the word of men , but as it is in truth , the word of God , which effectually worketh also in you that believe .
text2: Ame naisisaras le Devleske sagda anda iek kolaver diela , kana andian tumenge E Vorba le Devleski tume ashundian late , ai premisardian la na sar ek vorba kai avel katar o manush numa sar ek Vorba kai avel katar O Del , ai chaches si E Vorba le Devleski , ai e Vorba kerel buchi ande tumende kai pachan tume ande late .

text: For ye , brethren , became followers of the churches of God which in Judaea are in Christ Jesus : for ye also have suffered like things of your own countrymen , even as they have of the Jews :
text2: Tume murhe phral , kerdiliam tumensa sa kodola dieli kai kerdilia le Devleske khangeriange kai si ande Judea , kodole narodoske kai dinepe le Kristoske . Tume sanas chinuime katar o narodo kai si ande tumaro them sa sar won sas chinuime katar le Zhiduvuria .

text: Who both killed the Lord Jesus , and their own prophets , and have persecuted us ; and they please not God , and are contrary to all men :
text2: Won kai mudarde le Jesus Kristos ai le profeton , ai kai chinuisarde amen , won chi traiin sar mangel O Del ai won si duzhmaia sa le manushenge .

text: Forbidding us to speak to the Gentiles that they might be saved , to fill up their sins alway : for the wrath is come upon them to the uttermost .
text2: Won thon zor te aterdiaren ame te ingeras ka kodola kai Nai Zhiduvuria , e Vorba kai anel lenge o skepimos . Kado si lengo mai baro bezex kai thode opral pa penge bezexa kai kerde mai anglal , numa e xoli le Devleski sa woi aresli len .

text: But we , brethren , being taken from you for a short time in presence , not in heart , endeavoured the more abundantly to see your face with great desire .
text2: Numa ame , amare phral , de sar geliamtar tumendar pe xantsi vriama , amaro stato nai tumensa , numa tume ande amare ile san , amenge si anda tumende ai sa amare ilesa mangas te mai dikhas tume !

text: Wherefore we would have come unto you , even I Paul , once and again ; but Satan hindered us .
text2: Ame mangliam te avas tumende , me , o Pavlo zumadem te kerav kodia butivar , numa o beng chi meklia ame .

text: For what is our hope , or joy , or crown of rejoicing ? Are not even ye in the presence of our Lord Jesus Christ at his coming ?
text2: Tume , kai san amaro pachamos , raduimos , ai o semno ke nirisarasa , ai kai ame sai luvudisavas angla amaro Devles Jesus Kristo kana avela palpale .

text: For ye are our glory and joy .
text2: Tume san amaro luvudimos ai amaro raduimos !

text: Wherefore when we could no longer forbear , we thought it good to be left at Athens alone ;
text2: Kana ando gor nashti mai rhevdisarasas te azhukeras , ame mangliam te beshas korkorho ande Athens .

text: And sent Timotheus , our brother , and minister of God , and our fellowlabourer in the gospel of Christ , to establish you , and to comfort you concerning your faith :
text2: Tradiam amare phrales , o Timote o pasturi le Devlesko , wo kai ingerel e lashi viasta pa Kristo , ame tradiam les tumende saxke te zuriarel tume , ai te zhutil tume ande tumaro pachamos ,

text: That no man should be moved by these afflictions : for yourselves know that we are appointed thereunto .
text2: saxke swako anda tumende te na mekelpe te rimolpe palal vutuimata kai si ame . Tume zhanen ke kasavendar vutuimata si sa andal dieli kai aven amenge .

text: For verily , when we were with you , we told you before that we should suffer tribulation ; even as it came to pass , and ye know .
text2: Ke kana samas inker tumensa , phendiam tumenge mai anglal ke si te avas vutuime / chinuime ; ai kadia kerdilia , tume zhanen mishto .

text: For this cause , when I could no longer forbear , I sent to know your faith , lest by some means the tempter have tempted you , and our labour be in vain .
text2: Anda kodia kai ma nas ma rhavda te azhukerav , tradem amare phrales o Timote te dikhel sar si tumaro pachamos . Ke daravas ke o beng rimosardia tume , ai sa amari buchi kai kerdiam mashkar tumende avilino intaino .

text: But now when Timotheus came from you unto us , and brought us good tidings of your faith and charity , and that ye have good remembrance of us always , desiring greatly to see us , as we also to see you :
text2: Numa akana o Timote avilo amende palpale tumendar , ai andai amenge lashe viasta anda tumaro pachamos ai anda tumari dragostia . Wo phendia amenge ke tume den tume goji sagda amende tumare ilesa , ai ke mangen te dikhen ame sa sar ame mangas te mai dikhas tumen .

text: Therefore , brethren , we were comforted over you in all our affliction and distress by your faith :
text2: Amare phral , mashkar sa amare chinuimata ai sa amare vutuimata raduisailem kai ashundiam pa tumende , ai tumaro pachamos zhutisardia amare pachamos .

text: For now we live , if ye stand fast in the Lord .
text2: Ke akana ame pale traiisaras ke tume ankeren zurales tumaro pachamos ando Kristo .

text: For what thanks can we render to God again for you , for all the joy wherewith we joy for your sakes before our God ;
text2: Sar ame naisisarasa amare Devles dosta pa tumende pala sa o raduimos kai dian amen angla leste .

text: Night and day praying exceedingly that we might see your face , and might perfect that which is lacking in your faith ?
text2: Vi diese ai vi e riate ame mangas lestar amare ilesa te sai mai dikhas tume , ai te mai anas tumenge so mai trobul tume ka tumaro pachamos .

text: Now God himself and our Father , and our Lord Jesus Christ , direct our way unto you .
text2: Akana O Del Wo amaro Dat , ai le Devles O Jesus Kristo lasharen o drom saxke te zhas te dikhas tume !

text: And the Lord make you to increase and abound in love one toward another , and toward all men , even as we do toward you :
text2: Ai O Jesus Kristo kerel tume te bariol mai but ai mai but e dragostia kai si tume iek kavreske , ai karing sa le manush , ai te avel tumari dragostia saikfielo sar si amari karing tumende .

text: To the end he may stablish your hearts unblameable in holiness before God , even our Father , at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ with all his saints .
text2: Wo vuzharela tumare ile , ai avena swuntsi ai bi doshako angla Del , amaro Dat , kana avela amaro Devles O Jesus Kristo peske shavensa kai pachaiepe ando leste .

text: Furthermore then we beseech you , brethren , and exhort you by the Lord Jesus , that as ye have received of us how ye ought to walk and to please God , so ye would abound more and more .
text2: Murhe phral , sichilian amendar sar trobul te phiren te aven drago le Devleske . Ai me dikhav te keren kodia , numa akana ame mangas tumendar ai rhugisavas tumende ando anav le Kristosko , te keren mai mishto ai mai mishto .

text: For ye know what commandments we gave you by the Lord Jesus .
text2: Tume zhanen so sichardiam tume ando anav le Kristosko .

text: For this is the will of God , even your sanctification , that ye should abstain from fornication :
text2: O Del mangel tume te aven swuntsi , ai te arakhen tume katar le dieli bi vuzhe ( kurvia ) .

text: That every one of you should know how to possess his vessel in sanctification and honour ;
text2: Trobul swako anda tumende te inkerel pesko stato vuzho ai malado .

text: Not in the lust of concupiscence , even as the Gentiles which know not God :
text2: Ai na te meken tume te avel tume ginduria bi vuzhe , sar le manush kai chi zhanen O Del .

text: That no man go beyond and defraud his brother in any matter : because that the Lord is the avenger of all such , as we also have forewarned you and testified .
text2: Ande kadia diela chi iek manush chi trobul te shubilpe karing pesko phral , vai te amilpe ka so si leske phralesko : ame vunzhe phendiam tumenge , ai phendiam tumenge mishto te arakhen tume , ke O Del xoliavola zurales pel manush kai keren kasavendar dieli bi vuzhe .

text: For God hath not called us unto uncleanness , but unto holiness .
text2: Ke O Del akhardia ame te na traiisaras ando bi vuzhimos , numa ando vuzhimos .

text: He therefore that despiseth , despiseth not man , but God , who hath also given unto us his holy Spirit .
text2: Anda kodia , o manush kai shudel kado sicharimos , chi shudel ieke manushes , numa le Devles , kai del tume O Swunto Duxo .

text: But as touching brotherly love ye need not that I write unto you : for ye yourselves are taught of God to love one another .
text2: Chi trobul ame te mai ramosaras tumenge pa dragostia , kai trobul te avel tume le phralenge kai zhanen le Devles . Ke tume sichilian korkorho katar O Del sar trobul te aven drazhi iek kavreske

text: And indeed ye do it toward all the brethren which are in all Macedonia : but we beseech you , brethren , that ye increase more and more ;
text2: Ai zhanas ke kadia keren mashkar sa le phral kai si ande sa e Macedonia . Numa mangas tumendar amare phral te mai but aven drazhi iek kavreske .

text: And that ye study to be quiet , and to do your own business , and to work with your own hands , as we commanded you ;
text2: Ai thon zor te traiin ande pacha , ai len sama katar tumare dieli , ai te keren buchi tumare vastensa te avel tume so trobul tume , sar ame phendiam tumenge te keren ,

text: That ye may walk honestly toward them that are without , and that ye may have lack of nothing .
text2: ai kadia aven respektime katar kodola kai chi zhanen le Devles , ai kadia chi trobula te mangen vari so katar le kolaver .
