text: But I would not have you to be ignorant , brethren , concerning them which are asleep , that ye sorrow not , even as others which have no hope .
text2: Amare phral , ame mangas te zhanen o chachimos pa kodola kai mule ( soven ) , saxke te na aven nekezhime sar le kolaver manush kai nai le chi iek azhukerimos .

text: For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again , even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him .
text2: Ke ame pachas ame ke O Jesus mulo ai pale zhuvindisailo ; sakadia pachan ame , ame zhanas ke O Del zhuvindila le Kristosa kodolen kai mule .

text: For this we say unto you by the word of the Lord , that we which are alive and remain unto the coming of the Lord shall not prevent them which are asleep .
text2: Ame phenas tumenge kadia sar O Kristo phendia amenge , ame kai avasa inker zhuvinde kana O Kristo avela , ame chi zhasatar mai anglal sar le mule .

text: For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout , with the voice of the archangel , and with the trump of God : and the dead in Christ shall rise first :
text2: Ke O Kristo Wo hulela anda rhaio ek tsipimasa , le glasosa le baro angelosko , le tuturazasa le Devleski , ai kodola kai mule ai pachaiepe ando Kristo zhuvindina mai anglal .

text: Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds , to meet the Lord in the air : and so shall we ever be with the Lord .
text2: Porme ame kai traiisa inker pe phuv avasa line opre lensa andel nuvuria , te zhas ka Kristo ando rhaio ai beshas sagda le Kristosa .

text: Wherefore comfort one another with these words .
text2: Pala kodia , raduin iek kavres kadale vorbensa .

text: But of the times and the seasons , brethren , ye have no need that I write unto you .
text2: Chi trobul tume murhe phral , te ramosaras tumenge pal vriami ai kana kadala dieli kerdiona .

text: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night .
text2: Ke tume zhanen mishto ke o dies kai avela O Kristo , avela sar iek chor kai avel e riate .

text: For when they shall say , Peace and safety ; then sudden destruction cometh upon them , as travail upon a woman with child ; and they shall not escape .
text2: Kana le manush mothona , " Pacha ai nai chi iek baio , " antunchi si kai strazo o nasulimos perela pe lende ai nashtina te skepinpe , avela sar le dukha kai si la zhuvlia kana si phari .

text: But ye , brethren , are not in darkness , that that day should overtake you as a thief .
text2: Numa tume murhe phral , chi san ando tuniariko , ai kodo dies chi trobul te avel pe tumende sar iek chor .

text: Ye are all the children of light , and the children of the day : we are not of the night , nor of darkness .
text2: Tume shavorhe san le vediariake , ai shavorhe le dieseske . Ame chi sam la rachake , chi le tuniarikoske .

text: Therefore let us not sleep , as do others ; but let us watch and be sober .
text2: Ame chi trobul te sovas sar le kolaver ; numa trobul te beshas vushtiarde ai te las sama .

text: For they that sleep sleep in the night ; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night .
text2: Ke e riate sovelpe ; ai vi e riate macholpa .

text: But let us , who are of the day , be sober , putting on the breastplate of faith and love ; and for an helmet , the hope of salvation .
text2: Numa ame sam le dieseske , ai trobul te las sama . Ame trobula te avel ame o pachamos ai e dragostia sar tsalia sastrune , ai o pachamos ke sam skepime sar iek staji sastruni .

text: For God hath not appointed us to wrath , but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Ke O Del chi alosardia ame te avel leski xoli pe amende , numa te avel ame o skepimos katar O Jesus Kristo .

text: Who died for us , that , whether we wake or sleep , we should live together with him .
text2: Ke O Jesus Kristo mulo amenge , saxke , ame te traiisaras vai sovas , ame traiisa lesa .

text: Wherefore comfort yourselves together , and edify one another , even as also ye do .
text2: Den tume zor , ai zhutin iek kavres sar vunzhe keren .

text: And we beseech you , brethren , to know them which labour among you , and are over you in the Lord , and admonish you ;
text2: Amare phral , mangas tumendar te respektin kodolen kai keren buchi mashkar tumende , kodolen kai O Kristo thodia te ingeren tume po drom o lasho ai te sicharen tume .

text: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work ' s sake . And be at peace among yourselves .
text2: Sikaven lenge ke tume gindin pa lende , ai kai si tume e dragostia lenge palai buchi kai keren . Ai traiis ande pacha iek kavresa .

text: Now we exhort you , brethren , warn them that are unruly , comfort the feebleminded , support the weak , be patient toward all men .
text2: Ame mangas tumendar , amare phral , te mothon kodolenge kai chi mangen te keren buchi . Pechin kodolen kai daran , ai zhutin kodolen kai si kovle ando pachamos , haliaren le ai te avel tume rhavda karing savorhende .

text: See that none render evil for evil unto any man ; but ever follow that which is good , both among yourselves , and to all men .
text2: Len sama te na kerel khonik nasulimos ke kerde leske nasulimos . Numa roden ande swako vriama te keren o mishtimos mashkar tumende , ai mashkar sa le manush .

text: Rejoice evermore .
text2: Te aven sagda pherdo raduimasa .

text: Pray without ceasing .
text2: Rhugin tume sa data .

text: In every thing give thanks : for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you .
text2: Naisin le Devleske ande soste godi . Ke so mangel O Del tumendar ande tumaro traio le Jesus Kristosa .

text: Quench not the Spirit .
text2: Na aterdiaren e buchi le Swuntone Duxoski .

text: Despise not prophesyings .
text2: Te na avel tumenge gratsia le profesi ( na asan lende kai keren e buchi le Devleski ) .

text: Prove all things ; hold fast that which is good .
text2: Numa len sama swako fielo . Garaven so si lasho .

text: Abstain from all appearance of evil .
text2: Ai arakhen tume katar so godi si nasulimos ai kai miazol bezex .

text: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly ; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: O Del kai del e pacha te kerel te aven sa leske , te garavel tume sa antrego ; tumaro gindo , tumaro traio , ai tumaro stato bi doshako o dies kai avela O Jesus Kristo .

text: Faithful is he that calleth you , who also will do it .
text2: Ke kodo kai akhardia tume peste kerela kodia , ke wo kerel so mothol .

text: Brethren , pray for us .
text2: Murhe phral , rhugin tume vi amenge .

text: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss .
text2: Ai chumiden sa le phralen sar phral .

text: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren .
text2: Mangav ma tumendar ando anav le Kristosko , jinen kado lil sa le phralenge .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you . Amen .
text2: O mishtimos amaro Devlesko O Jesus Kristo te avel tumensa , Amen .

text: Paul , and Silvanus , and Timotheus , unto the church of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Katar o Pavlo , o Silvanus , ai o Timote , kai khangeri ande Thesalonika kai si le Devleske amare Dadeske ai le Devles O Jesus Kristo :

text: Grace unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: O Del O Dat ai O Jesus Kristo den tume o lashimos ai e pacha .

text: We are bound to thank God always for you , brethren , as it is meet , because that your faith groweth exceedingly , and the charity of every one of you all toward each other aboundeth ;
text2: Ame trobul sagda te naisisaras le Devleske anda tumende , amare phral . Ai vorta keras , ke tumaro pachamos bariol but , ai e dragostia kai swako anda tumende si les le kolavrenge pale barion mai but ai mai but .

text: So that we ourselves glory in you in the churches of God for your patience and faith in all your persecutions and tribulations that ye endure :
text2: Anda kodia ame luvudisaras tumen andal khangeria le Devleske , ke tume zhan angle ai inkeren tumaro pachamos mashkar sa le vutuimata ai le chinuria kai si tume .

text: Which is a manifest token of the righteous judgment of God , that ye may be counted worthy of the kingdom of God , for which ye also suffer :
text2: Katse dikhas e chachi kris le Devleski , ke pala so godi tume rhevdin tume avela tumen o rhaio , kai chinuin pala leste .

text: Seeing it is a righteous thing with God to recompense tribulation to them that trouble you ;
text2: Ke O Del kerela so si vorta ; dela o chino kodolen kai chinuin tume .

text: And to you who are troubled rest with us , when the Lord Jesus shall be revealed from heaven with his mighty angels ,
text2: Ai dela e pacha tumen kai chinuin , ai vi amen . Wo kerela kodia kana O Jesus Kristo avela anda rhaio peske angelonsa kai si le putiera .

text: In flaming fire taking vengeance on them that know not God , and that obey not the gospel of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Andek bari iag te chinuin kodolen kai chi zhanen le Devles , ai kodolen kai chi pachan o mui la lashia viasta kai mothol pa Jesus Kristo .

text: Who shall be punished with everlasting destruction from the presence of the Lord , and from the glory of his power ;
text2: Won avena shudine ande iag kai shoxar chi getolpe ai shoxar chi mai dikhena le Devles , ai dur avena katar leski putiera e bari ;

text: When he shall come to be glorified in his saints , and to be admired in all them that believe ( because our testimony among you was believed ) in that day .
text2: Kana avela kodo dies te avel luvudime katar sa kodola kai si leske , ai luvudime katar sa kodola kai pachanpe ande leste , ai vi tume aven anda kodola , ke pachaian tume ande Vorba le Devleski kai andiam tumenge .

text: Wherefore also we pray always for you , that our God would count you worthy of this calling , and fulfil all the good pleasure of his goodness , and the work of faith with power :
text2: Anda kodia rhugisavas sagda tumenge . Mangas katar amaro Del te del tume o traio kai akhardia tumen te del tumen . Ame mangas katar peski putiera te del tume so godi mangen te keren o mishtimos , ai te kerel te avel vorta e buchi tumare pachamaski :

text: That the name of our Lord Jesus Christ may be glorified in you , and ye in him , according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: ai kadia o anav amare Devlesko O Jesus Kristosko avela luvudime tumendar , ai vi tume avena luvudime lestar , ai katar o mishtimos amare Devlesko ai amaro Devles O Jesus Kristo .

text: Now we beseech you , brethren , by the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ , and by our gathering together unto him ,
text2: Mangas tume , amare phral , pa kodia kai kana avela amaro Devles O Jesus Kristo , ai kai ame avasa lesa ,

text: That ye be not soon shaken in mind , or be troubled , neither by spirit , nor by word , nor by letter as from us , as that the day of Christ is at hand .
text2: na meken vushoro te rimolpe tumare ginduria , ai na daran te phenela vari kon ke o dies kai O Kristo trobul te avel avilo . Shaite ke vari kon phendia tumenge ande profesi vai kana delas duma pa Del , vai amborim phende tumenge ke ame ramosardiam kodia andek lil .

text: Let no man deceive you by any means : for that day shall not come , except there come a falling away first , and that man of sin be revealed , the son of perdition ;
text2: Na meken te xoxavel tume khonik chi iek fielo . Ke O Kristo chi avela palpale zhi kai avela mai anglal sar te kerdion ek vriama kai le manush duriona katar O Del , porme avela o manush kai phaglo o zakono , kodo si o manush le bezexesko .

text: Who opposeth and exalteth himself above all that is called God , or that is worshipped ; so that he as God sitteth in the temple of God , shewing himself that he is God .
text2: Wo mangela te aterdiarel ande so godi le manush pachanpe , ai so godi si le manushenge swunto , wo mangela te aterdiarel sa kadala dieli , ai zhala zhi ande khangeri le Devleski te beshel , ai te mothol ke wo si O Del .

text: Remember ye not , that , when I was yet with you , I told you these things ?
text2: Pate chi seren tume ? Ke phendem tumenge kadala dieli kana simas inker tumensa .

text: And now ye know what withholdeth that he might be revealed in his time .
text2: Numa mai si vari so kai aterdiarel kadale dielen te kerdion akana , ai tume zhanen so si . Ke o manush le bezexesko avela ferdi kana avela leski vriama .

text: For the mystery of iniquity doth already work : only he who now letteth will let , until he be taken out of the way .
text2: E putiera e garadi le nasulimaski vunzhi kerel buchi , numa kadala dieli nashti kerdiona de ferdi kana O Del kai ankerel o nasulimos zhalatar .

text: And then shall that Wicked be revealed , whom the Lord shall consume with the spirit of his mouth , and shall destroy with the brightness of his coming :
text2: Ai antunchi o manush le bezexesko sikadiola , ai O Jesus Kristo mudarela les le phurdimasa kai phurdela anda pesko mui , ai licharela les peska putierasa kai si luvudime kana avela .

text: Even him , whose coming is after the working of Satan with all power and signs and lying wonders ,
text2: O manush le bezexesko le bengeska putiera , ai kerela mirakluria , semnuria , ai bare dieli xoxamle ,

text: And with all deceivableness of unrighteousness in them that perish ; because they received not the love of the truth , that they might be saved .
text2: ai kerela le nasulimasa swako fielo te dziliarel kodolen kai xasavona . Won xasavona ke chi premisarde ai chi mangle e dragostia kai skepisardini le .

text: And for this cause God shall send them strong delusion , that they should believe a lie :
text2: Ande kodia O Del tradel iek putiera kai shubila le , saxke te pachanpe ando xoxaimos .

text: That they all might be damned who believed not the truth , but had pleasure in unrighteousness .
text2: Ai kadia sa kodola kai chi pachaiepe ando chachimos , numa kai mangle te keren o nasulimos , avena xasarde .

text: But we are bound to give thanks alway to God for you , brethren beloved of the Lord , because God hath from the beginning chosen you to salvation through sanctification of the Spirit and belief of the truth :
text2: Ame trobul sagda te naisisaras le Devles anda tumende , amare phral , tume kai san drago le Devleske , ke O Del alosardia tume saxke te aven le pervi skepime katar O Swunto Duxo , kai kerel tume te aven le Devleske , ai katar tumaro pachamos kai si tume ando chachimos .

text: Whereunto he called you by our gospel , to the obtaining of the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: O Del akhardia tume ka kadia buchi katar e lashi viasta kai ame andiam tumenge . Wo akhardia tume te aven vi tume ando luvudimos amare Devlesko O Jesus Kristo .

text: Therefore , brethren , stand fast , and hold the traditions which ye have been taught , whether by word , or our epistle .
text2: No antunchi murhe phral , inkeren tumaro pachamos , ai inkeren sa sichardiam tume kana samas tumensa , vai so tradiam tumenge ande amaro lil .

text: Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself , and God , even our Father , which hath loved us , and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace ,
text2: Amaro Devles O Jesus Kristo Wo , ai O Del , amaro Dat , kai sas lesko drago amenge , ai dia ame katar pesko lashimos iek zor kai shoxar chi mai getolpe , ai lasho pachamos te azhukeras .

text: Comfort your hearts , and stablish you in every good word and work .
text2: Te phenel tumare ile raduimos ai zor te keren so godi si mishtimos ande so keren , ai vi ande tumaro divano .

text: Finally , brethren , pray for us , that the word of the Lord may have free course , and be glorified , even as it is with you :
text2: Murhe palune vorbi tumenge amare phral si te rhugin tume anda amende , saxke e Vorba le Kristoski te zhal angle , ai te ashundiol sigo , ai te avel respektime , sar sas tumende .

text: And that we may be delivered from unreasonable and wicked men : for all men have not faith .
text2: Ai rhugin tume vi te ankalavel ame O Del katar le manush le chorhe ai le bi lashe : ke chi mangen sa le manush te pachanpe .

text: But the Lord is faithful , who shall stablish you , and keep you from evil .
text2: Numa O Kristo shoxar chi mekel ame . Wo dela tume zor ai arakhela tume katar o nasulimos .

text: And we have confidence in the Lord touching you , that ye both do and will do the things which we command you .
text2: Ai O Kristo del ame te na daras anda tumende ; ke tume keren ai tume kerena le dieli kai ame phendiam tumenge .

text: And the Lord direct your hearts into the love of God , and into the patient waiting for Christ .
text2: O Kristo te ingerel tumare ile karing e dragostia le Devleski ai karing e rhavda kai del O Kristo .

text: Now we command you , brethren , in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , that ye withdraw yourselves from every brother that walketh disorderly , and not after the tradition which he received of us .
text2: Amare phral , mangas tumendar ando anav le Kristosko : te durion katar sa le phral kai traiin andek traio kai nai lashai chi lenpe pala so phendiam lenge .

text: For yourselves know how ye ought to follow us : for we behaved not ourselves disorderly among you ;
text2: Tume zhanen mishto sar trobul te keren saxe te len tume pala amende . Ke chi traiisardiam bi malades kana samas tumende .

text: Neither did we eat any man ' s bread for nought ; but wrought with labour and travail night and day , that we might not be chargeable to any of you :
text2: Ame chi mekliam te pravarel ame khonik ivia . Numa kerdiam buchi ai butivar samas defielo chine . Ame kerdiam buchi vi adiese ai vi e riate saxke te na dela ame khonik kanchi anda tumende .

text: Not because we have not power , but to make ourselves an ensample unto you to follow us .
text2: Ame kerdiam kadia , na ke amenge slobodo te premisaras tumaro zhutimos ; numa ke mangliam te sikavas tumenge sar te keren .

text: For even when we were with you , this we commanded you , that if any would not work , neither should he eat .
text2: Chaches kana samas tumende ame phendiam tumenge , " Ke kodo kai chi mangel te kerel buchi chi trobul te xal . "

text: For we hear that there are some which walk among you disorderly , working not at all , but are busybodies .
text2: Ame dasas duma tumensa kadia ke ashundiam ke uni anda tumende kandine le ai chi keren kanchi , ferdi amimpe kal kolavrenge dieli .

text: Now them that are such we command and exhort by our Lord Jesus Christ , that with quietness they work , and eat their own bread .
text2: Kodole manushenge ame mangas ai phenas kacha diela ando anav le Kristosko , te keren buchi swako dies saxke te avel le so trobul le .

text: But ye , brethren , be not weary in well doing .
text2: Numa tume murhe phral , na aterdion te keren o mishtimos .

text: And if any man obey not our word by this epistle , note that man , and have no company with him , that he may be ashamed .
text2: Te si vari kon kai chi pachal o mui kal dieli kai ame phenas ande kado lil . Len sama kon si , ai na mai phiren lesa , saxke te avel leske lazhav .

text: Yet count him not as an enemy , but admonish him as a brother .
text2: Numa na keren lesa sar te avino tumaro duzhmano ; numa sicharen les sar ieke phrales .

text: Now the Lord of peace himself give you peace always by all means . The Lord be with you all .
text2: O Kristo kai del e pacha , te del tume wo e pacha sagda , ai ande soste godi , O Kristo te avel tumensa savorhensa .

text: The salutation of Paul with mine own hand , which is the token in every epistle : so I write .
text2: Murhe vastesa tradav kadala vorbi : but bax , zor ai sastimos katar o Pavlo . Dikh , sar ramov murho anav pe sa murhe lila : ai eta , sar ramov .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: O mishtimos amare Devlesko O Jesus Kristo te avel tumensa savorhensa . Amen .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the commandment of God our Saviour , and Lord Jesus Christ , which is our hope ;
text2: Katar o Pavlo , ek apostle le Jesus Kristosko , me tradino sim katar amaro skepitori ai katar O Jesus Kristo , amaro pachamos :

text: Unto Timothy , my own son in the faith : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Ka Timote , murho chacho shav ando pachamos , O Del O Dat ai O Jesus Kristo amaro skepitori te del tu o lashimos , e mila , ai e pacha .

text: As I besought thee to abide still at Ephesus , when I went into Macedonia , that thou mightest charge some that they teach no other doctrine ,
text2: Sar kana manglem tutar kana gelemtar ande Macedonia te beshes ande Ephesus . Ke si ando Ephesus manush kai parhuven o zakono le Devlesko , ai trobul te des len ordina te aterdion .

text: Neither give heed to fables and endless genealogies , which minister questions , rather than godly edifying which is in faith : so do .
text2: Phen lenge te meken kodola paramicha kai nai chache , ai te na mothon pel but papuria kai sas mai anglal , ke kadala dieli keren ferdi chingara ai chi zhutin lengo pachamos te zurion .

text: Now the end of the commandment is charity out of a pure heart , and of a good conscience , and of faith unfeigned :
text2: Ke so mangav si , ke sa le sgave le Devleske kai si kotse te aven ande dragostia kai avel andak vuzho ilo , ai lenge ginduria te aven vuzhe , ai lengo pachamos te avel chacho .

text: From which some having swerved have turned aside unto vain jangling ;
text2: Uni linepe pa kado drom o lasho ai xasaile ande kadala divanuria bi malade .

text: Desiring to be teachers of the law ; understanding neither what they say , nor whereof they affirm .
text2: Won mangen te aven bare kai zhanen o zakono le Devlesko , numa won chi haliaren penge vorbi , ai chi pal dieli kai den duma ai gindin ke chache le .

text: But we know that the law is good , if a man use it lawfully ;
text2: Ame zhanas ke o zakono lasho lo te las ame pala leste vorta .

text: Knowing this , that the law is not made for a righteous man , but for the lawless and disobedient , for the ungodly and for sinners , for unholy and profane , for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers , for manslayers ,
text2: Ame zhanas ke o zakono nai thodino le manushenge kai keren mishto , numa le manushenge kai keren nasulimos , kodolenge kai chi pachan o mui , le bi lashenge , ai le bezexalenge , le manushenge kai chi respektin chi le Devles ai chi so si swunto , ai kodola kai mudaren penge dades vai penga da , le manushenge kai mudaren ,

text: For whoremongers , for them that defile themselves with mankind , for menstealers , for liars , for perjured persons , and if there be any other thing that is contrary to sound doctrine ;
text2: ai le manushenge kai keren e kurvia , ai le mursh kai soven andek than , ai kodolenge kai bichinen le slugen , le xoxamlenge , ai kodolenge kai solaxan bi malades , vai kodolenge kai keren so godi aver dieli ke so mothol o chacho zakono .

text: According to the glorious gospel of the blessed God , which was committed to my trust .
text2: Kado sicharimos ande lashi viasta lo kai sas ma dini , e lashi viasta kai si pa Del , O Del luvudime ai swuntsome .

text: And I thank Christ Jesus our Lord , who hath enabled me , for that he counted me faithful , putting me into the ministry ;
text2: Me naisiv le Jesus Kristos amaro Devles , kai pherdia ma zor ande buchi kai dia ma . Me naisiv leske ke jindia pe mande , ai kai alosardia ma te kerav leski buchi .

text: Who was before a blasphemer , and a persecutor , and injurious : but I obtained mercy , because I did it ignorantly in unbelief .
text2: Marka ke davas duma bi malades pa leste mai anglal , marka ke chinuisardem les , ai buzhukurisardem les . Numa O Del mila sas leske anda mande , ke nas ma o pachamos ai ke chi zhanavas so keravas .

text: And the grace of our Lord was exceeding abundant with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Amaro Kristo shordia but pesko lashimos pe mande , ai dia ma o pachamos , ai e dragostia kai si ame andek than le Jesus Kristosa .

text: This is a faithful saying , and worthy of all acceptation , that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners ; of whom I am chief .
text2: Kadia vorba chachi la , ai trobul te avel premime , ai te pachanpe ande late le manush : ke O Jesus Kristo avilo ande lumia te skepil le bezexalen . Ai me simas iek baro bezexa lo mashkar le bezexale .

text: Howbeit for this cause I obtained mercy , that in me first Jesus Christ might shew forth all longsuffering , for a pattern to them which should hereafter believe on him to life everlasting .
text2: Numa kodia le Devleske sas mila anda mande , manglia O Jesus Kristo te sikavel ke me sim o mai chorho andal bezexale , ai te sikavel peski rhavda sa kodolenge kai mai angle pachanpe ande leste , ai premina o traio kai chi mai getolpe .

text: Now unto the King eternal , immortal , invisible , the only wise God , be honour and glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Tu amperatona kai ande swako vriama avesa , tu kai shoxar chi meres , tu kai chi dichos , ai tu san ferdi O Del kai zhanel swako fielo . Tuke te avel o respektimos , o luvudimos ande swako vriama . Amen .

text: This charge I commit unto thee , son Timothy , according to the prophecies which went before on thee , that thou by them mightest war a good warfare ;
text2: O Timote , murho shav , mekav tuke , so sas tuke phendo palal vorbi kai sas ande profesi , kai sas phende mai anglal pa tute . Ankerdiol katar kadala vorbi saxke te zhas angle ai te niris .

text: Holding faith , and a good conscience ; which some having put away concerning faith have made shipwreck :
text2: Garav o pachamos , ai lashe ginduria , ke uni chi mangle te lenpe pala pende ginduria , ai porme xasarde pengo pachamos .

text: Of whom is Hymenaeus and Alexander ; whom I have delivered unto Satan , that they may learn not to blaspheme .
text2: Mashkar lende si o Himenaeus ai o Alexander , kai meklem le le bengeske , saxke te sichon te na maren mui katar O Del .

text: I exhort therefore , that , first of all , supplications , prayers , intercessions , and giving of thanks , be made for all men ;
text2: Mai anglal , mangav tumendar te rhugin tume but pala sa le manushenge ai te naisin leske anda sa le manush .

text: For kings , and for all that are in authority ; that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty .
text2: Trobul te rhugisavas andal amperatsi , ai anda sa kodola kai poronchin , saxke te avel ame iek traio lasho ai trankilo , ai te traiisaras vorta angla Del .

text: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour ;
text2: Ke kodia si vorta drago le Devleske amaro skepitori ,

text: Who will have all men to be saved , and to come unto the knowledge of the truth .
text2: ke wo mangel sa le manush te aven skepime , ai te zhanen o chachimos .

text: For there is one God , and one mediator between God and men , the man Christ Jesus ;
text2: Ke ferdi iek Del si , ai iek manush kai anel andek than le manushen ai le Devles , kodo manush si O Jesus Kristo .

text: Who gave himself a ransom for all , to be testified in due time .
text2: Ke wo diape te pochinel te aven savorhe skepime . Ai mangliape vriama kai sas thodini te sikavel ke O Del mangel sa le manush te aven skepime ,

text: Whereunto I am ordained a preacher , and an apostle , ( I speak the truth in Christ , and lie not ; ) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity .
text2: anda kodia me o Pavlo , ek pasturi ai ek apostle tradino sim te sicharel kodolen kai Nai Zhiduvuria pa pachamos ai pa chachimos . Chi xoxavav , o chachimos phenav !

text: I will therefore that men pray every where , lifting up holy hands , without wrath and doubting .
text2: Mangav vari kai le manush te rhuginpe , te vazden le vas te rhuginpe vuzhe ilesa , bi xoliariko ai bi chingarako .

text: In like manner also , that women adorn themselves in modest apparel , with shamefacedness and sobriety ; not with broided hair , or gold , or pearls , or costly array ;
text2: Ai mangav vi le zhuvlia te vuriarenpe malades , prostovanes , ai te na keren barimata penge balensa , ai te na thon pe pende but sumnakai , perli , vai tsalia kai si kuchi .

text: But ( which becometh women professing godliness ) with good works .
text2: Numa te keren lashe dieli sar zhuvlia kai mothon ke pachanpe ando Del , ai keren leski buchi .

text: Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection .
text2: Le zhuvlia trobul te ashunen , ai te sichon ando kalmo , ai te keren so si lenge phendo .

text: But I suffer not a woman to teach , nor to usurp authority over the man , but to be in silence .
text2: Chi mangav e zhuvli te sicharel , vai te poronchil po mursh , numa te na phenen kanchi .

text: For Adam was first formed , then Eve .
text2: Ke chaches o Adam sas kerdo o pervo , ai Eve pala leste .

text: And Adam was not deceived , but the woman being deceived was in the transgression .
text2: Ai o Adam nas atsado , numa e Eve sas atsadi , ai sas doshali angla Del .

text: Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing , if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety .
text2: Numa e zhuvli avela skepime kana avela la glati , numa te inkerela ando pachamos , ande dragostia , ai ando vuzhimos , ai ando prostomo .

text: This is a true saying , If a man desire the office of a bishop , he desireth a good work .
text2: Kacha vorba chachila : te mangela vari kon te avel manush kai del duma pa Del ande khangeri , kado manush mangel iek lashi diela .

text: A bishop then must be blameless , the husband of one wife , vigilant , sober , of good behaviour , given to hospitality , apt to teach ;
text2: Iek manush kai del duma pa Del ande khangeri trobul te na avel chi iek dosh pe leste . Trobul te avel ferdi iek rhomni pala leste , trobul te arakhel pe , trobul te avel les lashe ginduria , ai te traiil malades , ai te premil mishto le manushen kai aven leste , ai te zhanel sar te sicharel .

text: Not given to wine , no striker , not greedy of filthy lucre ; but patient , not a brawler , not covetous ;
text2: Chi trobul chi te pel vai marelpe , ai chi te avel bi lasho , numa lasho , ai te rodel o mishtimos savorhenge ; te avel les rhavda , ai chi trobul te avel leske zurales drago le love ;

text: One that ruleth well his own house , having his children in subjection with all gravity ;
text2: ai trobul te zhanel te sicharel peska familia , ai te sicharel peske glaten te pachan lesko mui ai te respektin les .

text: ( For if a man know not how to rule his own house , how shall he take care of the church of God ? )
text2: Ke o manush te chi zhanela te sicharel peska familia , katar sai lel sama katar e khangeri le Devleski ?

text: Not a novice , lest being lifted up with pride he fall into the condemnation of the devil .
text2: Kodo manush trobul te zhanel le Devles de dumult , ke te na nichi sai avela barimatango ai avela doshalo sar sas o beng .

text: Moreover he must have a good report of them which are without ; lest he fall into reproach and the snare of the devil .
text2: Ai trobul vi te avel respektime katar le manush kai chi zhanen le Devles , saxke te na avel gratsia le manushenge ai te na perel andel atsaimata le bengeske .

text: Likewise must the deacons be grave , not doubletongued , not given to much wine , not greedy of filthy lucre ;
text2: Le manush kai zhutin ande khangeri trobul vi won te aven respektime ai chache ileske ; ai chi trobul te pen but mol ai chi te niril love atsaimasa .

text: Holding the mystery of the faith in a pure conscience .
text2: Won trobun te beshen ando chachimos kai si ando pachamos ai vuzhe gindosa .

text: And let these also first be proved ; then let them use the office of a deacon , being found blameless .
text2: Trobul mai anglal te aven zumade , ai porme te na avela chi iek dosh pe lende sai kerena buchi sar manush kai zhutin ande khangeri .

text: Even so must their wives be grave , not slanderers , sober , faithful in all things .
text2: Vi lenge zhuvlia trobul te aven respektime , ai te na pupuin ; trobul te arakhenpe , ai te aven vorta ande soste godi .

text: Let the deacons be the husbands of one wife , ruling their children and their own houses well .
text2: O manush kai zhutil ande khangeri trobul te avel les ferdi iek rhomni , ai te zhanel sar te sicharel peske glaten ai peska familia .

text: For they that have used the office of a deacon well purchase to themselves a good degree , and great boldness in the faith which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Le manush kai zhutin ande khangeri kai keren pengi buchi malades respektimele katar le manush , ai sai den duma sa penge ilesa pa pachamos kai si ame le Jesus Kristosa .

text: These things write I unto thee , hoping to come unto thee shortly :
text2: Ramov tuke kado lil , numa murho gindo si te zhav te dikhav tu sar mai sigo .

text: But if I tarry long , that thou mayest know how thou oughtest to behave thyself in the house of God , which is the church of the living God , the pillar and ground of the truth .
text2: Numa te chi dikhasa ame strazo , kako lil dela tu te zhanes sar trobul te traiil pe ande familia le Devleske , kodia si ande khangeri le Devleski O Del o zhuvindo , ke wo si e kolon ai kuko kai ankerel o chachimos .

text: And without controversy great is the mystery of godliness : God was manifest in the flesh , justified in the Spirit , seen of angels , preached unto the Gentiles , believed on in the world , received up into glory .
text2: E khonik nashti mothol ke nai kadia o barolo o chachimos o garado amare pachamasko . O Del sikadilo sar iek manush , ai O Swunto Duxo sikadia ke chacho sas , le angeluria dikhle les . Ai phendo sas pa leste ande sa e lumia , ai le manush pachaiepe ande leste , ai porme sas lino opre ando rhaio .

text: Now the Spirit speaketh expressly , that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith , giving heed to seducing spirits , and doctrines of devils ;
text2: O Swunto Duxo mothol vorta , ke uni manush kana pashola e vriama te avel O Kristo mekena pengo pachamos ; ai lenape palal manush kai atsaven , ai palal zakonuria le bengenge .

text: Speaking lies in hypocrisy ; having their conscience seared with a hot iron ;
text2: Won mekenape te duriaren le manush le xoxamle , ai le chor kai kodole le manushenge ginduria mule le , sar te avilino phabarde le sastrensa le lolesa .

text: Forbidding to marry , and commanding to abstain from meats , which God hath created to be received with thanksgiving of them which believe and know the truth .
text2: Kodola manush sicharen ke nai mishto te ansuris tu , ai te na xas anda uni dieli . Numa O Del dia kodola dieli kal manush kai pachanpe ando Del , ai kai zhanen o chachimos .

text: For every creature of God is good , and nothing to be refused , if it be received with thanksgiving :
text2: Naisisaras le Devleske ande lende . So godi kerdia O Del lasho ; kanchi chi trobul shudino , numa trobul te naisin le Devles mai anglal sar te len ,

text: For it is sanctified by the word of God and prayer .
text2: ke swuntsosardia si pala E Vorba le Devleski ai rhugimos .

text: If thou put the brethren in remembrance of these things , thou shalt be a good minister of Jesus Christ , nourished up in the words of faith and of good doctrine , whereunto thou hast attained .
text2: Te sicharen kadala dieli , le Devleske shaven tu avesa iek lashi sluga le Jesus Kristoski , tu sikavesa ke pravares tu le pachamaske vorbensa , ai pala so sichilian .

text: But refuse profane and old wives ' fables , and exercise thyself rather unto godliness .
text2: Numa shude le paramicha le xoxamle kai mothonas dumult , ai kai nai lashe le pachamaske , numa sichos te traiisar pasha Del .

text: For bodily exercise profiteth little : but godliness is profitable unto all things , having promise of the life that now is , and of that which is to come .
text2: O manush te avel zuralo ando stato si mishto , numa te beshel pasha Del si mai mishto , ke wo shinavel amenge o traio pe akana , ai vi pe mai angle .

text: This is a faithful saying and worthy of all acceptation .
text2: Kadia vorba chachila ai trobul te avel sa premime ai pachaie .

text: For therefore we both labour and suffer reproach , because we trust in the living God , who is the Saviour of all men , specially of those that believe .
text2: Sostar keras buchi ai maras ame , ke thodiam amaro pachamos ando Del o zhuvindo , kai si o skepitori sa le manushenge , ai mai but kodolengo kai pachanpe .

text: These things command and teach .
text2: Phen kadia ai sichar sa kadala dieli .

text: Let no man despise thy youth ; but be thou an example of the believers , in word , in conversation , in charity , in spirit , in faith , in purity .
text2: Na mek khonik te rimol tu ka san terno , numa sikav le manushenge kai pachanpe ando Del , sar des duma , sar phires le Devlesa , chi dragostia , cho pachamos , ai cho vuzhimos .

text: Till I come , give attendance to reading , to exhortation , to doctrine .
text2: Ai zhi kai me avav sichu te jin E Vorba le Devleski angla savorhende , ai de duma pa Del ai sichar .

text: Neglect not the gift that is in thee , which was given thee by prophecy , with the laying on of the hands of the presbytery .
text2: Na buster e podarka le Devleski kai si ande tute , kai dia tu kana le profeturia dine duma , ai kai le mai phure thode le vas pe tute te rhugin tuke .

text: Meditate upon these things ; give thyself wholly to them ; that thy profiting may appear to all .
text2: Le sama te ker kadia buchi , ai ker sa chi ilesa , saxke savorhe te dikhen ke zhas angle .

text: Take heed unto thyself , and unto the doctrine ; continue in them : for in doing this thou shalt both save thyself , and them that hear thee .
text2: Le sama tutar , ai le sama so sichares . Ai na mek tu katar kodola dieli , ke te keresa kadia skepisar tu tut , ai vi kodolen kai ashunen tute .

text: Rebuke not an elder , but intreat him as a father ; and the younger men as brethren ;
text2: Na de duma zhungales le manushesa kai si phuro , numa ker lesa sar te avilino cho dat , ai ker le terensa sar te avilino che phral ,

text: The elder women as mothers ; the younger as sisters , with all purity .
text2: ai ker le zhuvliansa sar le deiansa , ai le sheia bariansa ker sar te avilino chi pheia , ando vuzhimos .

text: Honour widows that are widows indeed .
text2: Le sama ai respektisar le phivlian kai si chaches phivlia .

text: But if any widow have children or nephews , let them learn first to shew piety at home , and to requite their parents : for that is good and acceptable before God .
text2: Numa te si kai zhuvli e phivli shave vai nepotsi ; trobul won te sichon mai anglal te aven lashe ande penge familia , ai te den palpale penge niamon , ai penga mamia , ai penge papos so mangen lenge , ke kadia plachal le Devles .

text: Now she that is a widow indeed , and desolate , trusteth in God , and continueth in supplications and prayers night and day .
text2: E zhuvli kai si chaches phivli , kai nai la khonik te lel sama latar , woi thodia pesko pachamos ando Del , ai sagda rhugilpe , ai mangel lestar te zhutil la vi e diese ai vi e riate .

text: But she that liveth in pleasure is dead while she liveth .
text2: Numa e zhuvli e phivli kai traiil la lumiake , vunzhe muli la , marka ke traiil .

text: And these things give in charge , that they may be blameless .
text2: So trobul te man mothos lenge , saxke te na arakhel lenge khonik dosha .

text: But if any provide not for his own , and specially for those of his own house , he hath denied the faith , and is worse than an infidel .
text2: O manush kai chi lel sama katar peske niamuria , ai mai but katar peske familia , kado manush meklia pesko pachamos , ai mai nasul lo katar iek manush kai chi pachalpe ando Del .

text: Let not a widow be taken into the number under threescore years old , having been the wife of one man ,
text2: Iek zhuvli kai si phivli ai kai mangel o zhutimos andal khangeri trobul te avel sar godi shovardesh bershengi , ai kai sas ansurime ferdi iek data .

text: Well reported of for good works ; if she have brought up children , if she have lodged strangers , if she have washed the saints ' feet , if she have relieved the afflicted , if she have diligently followed every good work .
text2: Ai te zhangliolpe ke kerel mishtimos , ai ke bariardia peske glaten , ai ke premilas mishto le manushen kai avenas late , ai ke xalavelas le punrhe le Devleske narodoske , ai ke zhutisardia pel chorhe , ai ke kerdia but lashimos .

text: But the younger widows refuse : for when they have begun to wax wanton against Christ , they will marry ;
text2: Numa le ternia zhuvlia kai si phivlia chi trobul te keren ka saviatar buchi , ke kana ande lengo gindo si te mai ansurinpe , won meken le Kristos .

text: Having damnation , because they have cast off their first faith .
text2: Ai anda kodia doshardia le ke mekle so shinade sas angla Kristo .

text: And withal they learn to be idle , wandering about from house to house ; and not only idle , but tattlers also and busybodies , speaking things which they ought not .
text2: Ai mai but sichon te xasaren pengi vriama kai zhan kher kherestar , numa so si mai nasul , ke kerdion pupuitarki , ai den duma angla savorhende , ai den duma pal dieli kai chi trobulas te den duma .

text: I will therefore that the younger women marry , bear children , guide the house , give none occasion to the adversary to speak reproachfully .
text2: Anda kodia mangav le ternia zhuvlia kai si phivlia te ansurinpe , ai te avel le glate , ai te len sama katar pengo kher , saxke te na den duma nasul pa amende amare duzhmaia .

text: For some are already turned aside after Satan .
text2: Ke uni zhuvlia phivlia vunzhe linepe pa drom o lasho te lenpe pala beng .

text: If any man or woman that believeth have widows , let them relieve them , and let not the church be charged ; that it may relieve them that are widows indeed .
text2: Numa te si iek mursh vai zhuvli kai pachalpe ando Del , ai si phivlia zhuvlia ande lenge familia trobul te zhutil len , ai te na mekel te lel sama e khangeri lendar , saxke e khangeri te sai zhutil le phivlian kai nai le khonik .

text: Let the elders that rule well be counted worthy of double honour , especially they who labour in the word and doctrine .
text2: Le manush kai den duma pa Del , ai inkeren e khangeri mishto trobul te aven mishto pochinde , ai mai but kodola kai keren buchi mito te den duma pa Del ai te sicharen .

text: For the scripture saith , Thou shalt not muzzle the ox that treadeth out the corn . And , The labourer is worthy of his reward .
text2: Ke E Vorba le Devleski mothol , " Shoxar na phande o mui la gurumliako kana licharel o jiv , " ai " o buchara trobul te avel pochindo . "

text: Against an elder receive not an accusation , but before two or three witnesses .
text2: Na premisar e shipka kai si phendi pe iek manush kai del duma pa Del , de ferdi te avela dui vai trin marturia kai mothon ke shubisailo .

text: Them that sin rebuke before all , that others also may fear .
text2: Phen le dosha kodolenge kai keren bezexa , saxke te avel e dar le kolavren ando ilo .

text: I charge thee before God , and the Lord Jesus Christ , and the elect angels , that thou observe these things without preferring one before another , doing nothing by partiality .
text2: Mangav tutar angla Del , ai angla Jesus Kristo , ai anglal le Swunto angeluria , te keres kadala dieli ai te na avel tuke drago uni mai but , vai te keres averfielo unensa ande so keres .

text: Lay hands suddenly on no man , neither be partaker of other men ' s sins : keep thyself pure .
text2: Ai na grebisavo te tho le vas pe vari kaste te rhugis leske te kerel buchi ande khangeri , na tho tu vi tu andel bezexa le kolavrenge ; numa besh vuzho .

text: Drink no longer water , but use a little wine for thy stomach ' s sake and thine often infirmities .
text2: Na pi ferdi pai , numa pi xantsi mol anda cho ( stomako ) ji ke butivar naswalo san .

text: Some men ' s sins are open beforehand , going before to judgment ; and some men they follow after .
text2: Le bezexa uni manushenge dichon mishto , mai anglal sar te aven dine pe kris , numa le bezexa avrenge dichon ferdi kana sas dine pe kris .

text: Likewise also the good works of some are manifest beforehand ; and they that are otherwise cannot be hid .
text2: Vi le lashe dieli uni manushenge dichon mishto , ai vi kodola kai chi dichon strazo nashtin te beshen garade .

text: Let as many servants as are under the yoke count their own masters worthy of all honour , that the name of God and his doctrine be not blasphemed .
text2: Sa kodola kai si slugi trobul te avel le penge gazdange baro respektimos , saxke khonik te na mothol nasulimos pa anav le Devlesko ai pa so sicharas .

text: And they that have believing masters , let them not despise them , because they are brethren ; but rather do them service , because they are faithful and beloved , partakers of the benefit . These things teach and exhort .
text2: Le slugi kai lenge gazda pachanpe ando Del , trobul te avel le respektimos lenge , ke lenge phral si ; ai trobul te podain le mai mishto , ke kodola kai si podaime lendar pachan pe ando Del ai drago sas le . So trobul te sichares ai te mothos .

text: If any man teach otherwise , and consent not to wholesome words , even the words of our Lord Jesus Christ , and to the doctrine which is according to godliness ;
text2: Te sicharela vari kon aver diela , ke so sicharen tume , ai te na pachalpe andel chache vorbi le Jesus Kristoske , ai ando sicharimos amare pachamasko ;

text: He is proud , knowing nothing , but doting about questions and strifes of words , whereof cometh envy , strife , railings , evil surmisings ,
text2: Kodo manush si baro barimatango , ai chi zhanel kanchi , ai ande leste si o naswalimos te tsipil , ai te xalpe andal vorbi , ai kotsar avel le zhaluzi , le chingara , kai maren mui , kai si ginduria chorhe pe iek kavreste ,

text: Perverse disputings of men of corrupt minds , and destitute of the truth , supposing that gain is godliness : from such withdraw thyself .
text2: ai kerdiol divanuria kai chi mai getonpe mashkar le manush kai ma nai le e goji vorta , ai chi mai zhanen o chachimos . Ai gindin ke le pachamasa sa barvalos .

text: But godliness with contentment is great gain .
text2: Ke chaches ke o pachamos baro barvalimos si le manusheske , kai mishto leske so sa si les .

text: For we brought nothing into this world , and it is certain we can carry nothing out .
text2: Ke chaches chi andiam kanchi ande kadia lumia , ai nashti angeras kanchi .

text: And having food and raiment let us be therewith content .
text2: Numa te si ame o xaben ai le tsalia , kodia si dosta amenge .

text: But they that will be rich fall into temptation and a snare , and into many foolish and hurtful lusts , which drown men in destruction and perdition .
text2: Numa kodola kai mangen te barvalon , peren ande zumaimos ai line le ande atsaimos katar but dieli bi malade , ai chorhe kai ingeren le manushen te xasavon .

text: For the love of money is the root of all evil : which while some coveted after , they have erred from the faith , and pierced themselves through with many sorrows .
text2: Ke e dragostia le lovenge si kai ingerel ka but nasulimos , ke uni manush kadia de zurales mangen te avel le love kai durile katar o pachamos , ai thode ande penge ile but nekazo .

text: But thou , O man of God , flee these things ; and follow after righteousness , godliness , faith , love , patience , meekness .
text2: Numa tu , manusha , kai pachas tu ando Del , duriol katar kadala dieli ; ai rode o chachimos , besh pasha Del , rode o pachamos , e dragostia , e rhavda , ai o lashimos .

text: Fight the good fight of faith , lay hold on eternal life , whereunto thou art also called , and hast professed a good profession before many witnesses .
text2: Mar tu o lasho marimos le pachamasko , ai le o traio kai chi mai getolpe ; ke O Del akhardia tu te zhanes kado traio kana phendian o shukar divano po cho pachamos angla but marturia .

text: I give thee charge in the sight of God , who quickeneth all things , and before Christ Jesus , who before Pontius Pilate witnessed a good confession ;
text2: Mangav ma tutar angla Del kai del o traio ka sa le dieli , ai angla Jesus Kristo , kai dia peske shukare divanosa pa pesko pachamos angla Pontius Pilate ; garav E Vorba le Devleski ,

text: That thou keep this commandment without spot , unrebukeable , until the appearing of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: ai garav la vuzhi , ai bi doshako zhi ka dies kai amaro Devles O Jesus Kristo avela .

text: Which in his times he shall shew , who is the blessed and only Potentate , the King of kings , and Lord of lords ;
text2: Kana avela e vriama O Del kerela kodia diela , wo kai ferdi poronchil , ai kai si swuntsome , o amperato le amperatongo , ai o gazda le gazdengo .

text: Who only hath immortality , dwelling in the light which no man can approach unto ; whom no man hath seen , nor can see : to whom be honour and power everlasting . Amen .
text2: Ke ferdi wo si kai chi merel ; ai traiil andek vediara kai khonik nashtil te pashol . Khonik shoxar chi dikhlia les , ai khonik nashti te dikhel les , ai leske te avel o luvudimos ai e putiera ande swako vriama . Amen .

text: Charge them that are rich in this world , that they be not highminded , nor trust in uncertain riches , but in the living God , who giveth us richly all things to enjoy ;
text2: Phen kodolenge kai si le le barvalimata kadala lumiake , te na aven barimatange , ai phen lenge te na thon pengo pachamos andel barvalimata kai nai gor so avela , numa te thon pengo pachamos ando Del , wo kai del ame swako fielo ai but saxke te avas raduime .

text: That they do good , that they be rich in good works , ready to distribute , willing to communicate ;
text2: Phen lenge te keren o mishtimos , ai te aven barvale ando mishtimos , ai te zhutin but , ai te hulaven le kolavrensa .

text: Laying up in store for themselves a good foundation against the time to come , that they may lay hold on eternal life .
text2: Kadia won chidena penge iek lasho ai zuralo barvalimos pe mai angle , ai antunchi avela le o traio o chacho .

text: O Timothy , keep that which is committed to thy trust , avoiding profane and vain babblings , and oppositions of science falsely so called :
text2: O Timote , garav mishto so sas tu dino , ai durios katar le divanuria le bi malade , kodolenge kai keren barimata ande so zhanen , ke kodia sikavel ke chi zhanen .

text: Which some professing have erred concerning the faith . Grace be with thee . Amen .
text2: Uni phende ke zhanenas kadala dieli , ai duri le katar o pachamos . O lashimos le Devlesko te avel tumensa .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , according to the promise of life which is in Christ Jesus ,
text2: Katar o Pavlo , ek apostle le Jesus Kristosko katar e voia le Devleski , thodino te mothol pa traio o shinado kai si ame le Jesus Kristosa .

text: To Timothy , my dearly beloved son : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord .
text2: Ka Timote , murho kuchi shavo O Del O Dat ai O Jesus Kristo amaro Devles te del tu o lashimos , e mila , ai e pacha .

text: I thank God , whom I serve from my forefathers with pure conscience , that without ceasing I have remembrance of thee in my prayers night and day ;
text2: Naisiv le Devleske , kai podaiv les vuzhe gindosa , sar murhe dada kerde . Naisiv leske sagda e diese ai e riate , dama goji tute ande murho rhugimos .

text: Greatly desiring to see thee , being mindful of thy tears , that I may be filled with joy ;
text2: Dama goji ka che asua , ai sa murhe ilesa mangav te dikhav tu , saxke te avav defial raduime .

text: When I call to remembrance the unfeigned faith that is in thee , which dwelt first in thy grandmother Lois , and thy mother Eunice ; and I am persuaded that in thee also .
text2: Serav ma mishto o pachamos o chacho kai si tu , kodo pachamos kai chi mami e Lois , ai chi dei e Eunice sas le tusa ; ai zhanav ke vi tu te si .

text: Wherefore I put thee in remembrance that thou stir up the gift of God , which is in thee by the putting on of my hands .
text2: Anda kodia mai mothav tuke , inker zhuvindi e podarka kai O Del dia tu kana thodem le vas pe tute , ai rhugisardem tuke .

text: For God hath not given us the spirit of fear ; but of power , and of love , and of a sound mind .
text2: Ke O Del chi dia ame o duxo la darako ; numa lesko Swunto Duxo dia ame leski putiera , leski dragostia , ai leski goji .

text: Be not thou therefore ashamed of the testimony of our Lord , nor of me his prisoner : but be thou partaker of the afflictions of the gospel according to the power of God ;
text2: Te na avel tuke lazhav pala le vorbi le Kristoske , ai te na avel tuke chi lazhav anda mande kai sim lesko rhobara . Numa te avel tuke mishto andel vutuimata palai lashi viasta , ai e zor kai O Del del tu .

text: Who hath saved us , and called us with an holy calling , not according to our works , but according to his own purpose and grace , which was given us in Christ Jesus before the world began ,
text2: Ke Wo si kai skepisardia ame , ai akhardia ame te keras leski buchi , na ke pala so kerdiam , numa pala pesko gindo ai pesko lashimos wo dia ame kado lashimos ando Jesus Kristo mai anglal sar te avel e lumia .

text: But is now made manifest by the appearing of our Saviour Jesus Christ , who hath abolished death , and hath brought life and immortality to light through the gospel :
text2: Numa akana sikadia amenge kai andia amare skepitores O Jesus Kristo . Ke O Jesus Kristo aterdiardia e putiera kai sas la martia , ai la lashia viastasa sikadia o traio kai chi merel .

text: Whereunto I am appointed a preacher , and an apostle , and a teacher of the Gentiles .
text2: O Del alosardia ma te mothav kadia lashi viasta ( pasturi sim ) , sar ek sluga ( apostle sim ) , ai manush kai sicharel e lashi viasta .

text: For the which cause I also suffer these things : nevertheless I am not ashamed : for I know whom I have believed , and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day .
text2: Ai anda kodia sim vutuime , numa ando pachamos beshav , ke zhanav ande kaste thodem murho pachamos , ai zhanav ke si les e putiera te garavel zhi ka kodo dies so dia ma .

text: Hold fast the form of sound words , which thou hast heard of me , in faith and love which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Le sama pel vorbi le chache kai phendem tuke , ai inkerdiol ando pachamos , ai ande dragostia kai si ame andek than le Jesus Kristosa .

text: That good thing which was committed unto thee keep by the Holy Ghost which dwelleth in us .
text2: Garav le lashe dieli kai sas tu dine katar o zhutimos kai avilo katar O Swunto Duxo kai traiil ande amende .

text: This thou knowest , that all they which are in Asia be turned away from me ; of whom are Phygellus and Hermogenes .
text2: Sar zhanes , sa kodola kai si avrial ande Asia mekle ma , ai vi o Phigelus ai o Hermogenes .

text: The Lord give mercy unto the house of Onesiphorus ; for he oft refreshed me , and was not ashamed of my chain :
text2: O Jesus Kristo te sikavel pesko lashimos le Onesiphoroski familiake , ke butivar kado manush raduisardia ma , leske nas lazhav anda mande kai sim ande temnitsa ;

text: But , when he was in Rome , he sought me out very diligently , and found me .
text2: numa kana areslo ande Rome , rodia ma sa peske ilesa zhi kai arakhlia ma .

text: The Lord grant unto him that he may find mercy of the Lord in that day : and in how many things he ministered unto me at Ephesus , thou knowest very well .
text2: O Kristo te del les te lel zhutimos katar o Kristo ande kado dies ! Ai tu zhanes mishto sa o mishtimos kai kerdia mange ando Ephesus .

text: Thou therefore , my son , be strong in the grace that is in Christ Jesus .
text2: No tu , murho shav , le zor katar o lashimos kai si ame le Jesus Kristosa .

text: And the things that thou hast heard of me among many witnesses , the same commit thou to faithful men , who shall be able to teach others also .
text2: So ashundian mande ke phendem angla but marturia , de kal manush kai si tu pachamos ande lende , ai kai won zhanena te sicharen vi le kolavren .

text: Thou therefore endure hardness , as a good soldier of Jesus Christ .
text2: Te avel tuke mishto andel vutuimata sar ek ketana le Jesus Kristosko kai chi mekel peski buchi .

text: No man that warreth entangleth himself with the affairs of this life ; that he may please him who hath chosen him to be a soldier .
text2: Nai ketana kai marelpe ando marimos sai kerel buchi te traiil . Trobul te plachal kodoles kai thodia les ketana .

text: And if a man also strive for masteries , yet is he not crowned , except he strive lawfully .
text2: Iek manush kai nashel , ai te nashela nashtil te niril de ferdi te lelape pala zakono .

text: The husbandman that laboureth must be first partaker of the fruits .
text2: Ai koko kai bariarel kai kerdia e buchi e phari trobul te avel o pervo te lel so si lesko kana avel e vriama te chidel .

text: Consider what I say ; and the Lord give thee understanding in all things .
text2: De tu mishto goji so phenav , ke O Kristo dela tu e goji te haliares swako fielo .

text: Remember that Jesus Christ of the seed of David was raised from the dead according to my gospel :
text2: De tu goji ka Jesus Kristo kai sas andino katar e martia kai traio , ai kai sas andai vitsa le Davidoski , sar mothol e lashi viasta ai ke me phenav le kolavrenge .

text: Wherein I suffer trouble , as an evil doer , even unto bonds ; but the word of God is not bound .
text2: Ai ke phenav pa kadia lashi viasta chinuime sim , ai vi phanglo sim le lantsonsa sar iek manush kai kerel nasulimos . Numa E Vorba le Devleski nai phangli andel lantsuria ,

text: Therefore I endure all things for the elect ' s sakes , that they may also obtain the salvation which is in Christ Jesus with eternal glory .
text2: anda kodia rhevdiv swako fielo po mishtimos kodolenge kai O Del alosardia , saxke vi won te sai avel le o skepimos kai si ando Jesus Kristo ai vi o luvudimos ande swako vriama .

text: It is a faithful saying : For if we be dead with him , we shall also live with him :
text2: Kadala vorbi kai si te mothav chache le : " Te mulian le Kristosa , vi traiisaras lesa .

text: If we suffer , we shall also reign with him : if we deny him , he also will deny us :
text2: Ai te inkerasa lesa zhando gor , iame poronchisarasa lesa .

text: If we believe not , yet he abideth faithful : he cannot deny himself .
text2: Numa te shudasa les , vi wo shudela amen . Ame te na pachasa so mothol O Kristo kerel so mothol , ke wo nashtil te xoxavel pe pes . "

text: Of these things put them in remembrance , charging them before the Lord that they strive not about words to no profit , but to the subverting of the hearers .
text2: Phen kado divano savorhenge , ai mang lendar sakonestar angla Del te na xanpe andal vorbi , ke kodia chi mol kanchi , de ferdi xasarela kodolen kai ashunen .

text: Study to shew thyself approved unto God , a workman that needeth not to be ashamed , rightly dividing the word of truth .
text2: Ker mishto buchi saxke te mothol tuke O Del " Ke mishto kerdia , " sar iek manush kai chi trobul te avel leske lazhav anda peski buchi , kai mothol vorta e Vorba le chachimaski .

text: But shun profane and vain babblings : for they will increase unto more ungodliness .
text2: Durion katar le divanuria le intaino ai bi malade , ke kodola kai keren kadala dieli duriona mai but ai mai but katar O Del .

text: And their word will eat as doth a canker : of whom is Hymenaeus and Philetus ;
text2: Ke so won sicharen avela sar iek dukh kai si infeksion / pugnia ai kai xal e morchi , ai mashkar kodo narodo si o Himenaeus ai o Philetus .

text: Who concerning the truth have erred , saying that the resurrection is past already ; and overthrow the faith of some .
text2: Won durile katar o chachimos , ai rimon bute manushen katar o pachamos , ke mothona ke O Kristo vunzhe avilo .

text: Nevertheless the foundation of God standeth sure , having this seal , The Lord knoweth them that are his . And , Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity .
text2: Numa le zurale fundani kai thodia O Del inkeren , ai eta le vorbi kai si ramome , " O Kristo zhanel peske manushen . " ai " So godi manush kai mothol ke wo si le Kristosko trobul te duriol katar o nasulimos . "

text: But in a great house there are not only vessels of gold and of silver , but also of wood and of earth ; and some to honour , and some to dishonour .
text2: Andek baro kher nai ferdi vasuria sumnakune ai rupune , si vi kashtune ai chikake ; le pervo vasuria garade le le bare pachivenge , ai le kolaver pel prosto dies .

text: If a man therefore purge himself from these , he shall be a vessel unto honour , sanctified , and meet for the master ' s use , and prepared unto every good work .
text2: Te vuzharelape vari kon anda sa o nasulimos kai ma phenav , kodo manush avela sar ek tiari kerdia anda sumnakai . Wo avela respektime , ai o gazda le kheresko thol les te kerel lashe dieli .

text: Flee also youthful lusts : but follow righteousness , faith , charity , peace , with them that call on the Lord out of a pure heart .
text2: Durios katar le dieli le nasul kai si andel ginduria le ternenge , ai rode o chachimos , o pachamos , e dragostia , ai e pacha , kodolensa kai ieke vuzhe ilesa mangenpe katar O Kristo .

text: But foolish and unlearned questions avoid , knowing that they do gender strifes .
text2: Numa shude le divanuria le dzile ai le bi malade ; ke zhanes ke kodia angerel kai chingar .

text: And the servant of the Lord must not strive ; but be gentle unto all men , apt to teach , patient ,
text2: Ai e sluga le Devleske kai del duma pa Del chi trobul te xalpe . Numa trobul te avel lasho savorhensa , ai eta zhanel te sicharel , ai te avel manush kai si les rhavda ,

text: In meekness instructing those that oppose themselves ; if God peradventure will give them repentance to the acknowledging of the truth ;
text2: trobul te sicharel lashimasa kodolen kai nai vorta lesa ; ke O Del dela le ambroim te sai parhudion ande pengo traio ai te aresen te zhanen o chachimos .

text: And that they may recover themselves out of the snare of the devil , who are taken captive by him at his will .
text2: Ai antunchi avena pe pengo gindo o lasho , ai anklena avri andal atsaimos le bengeske , kai astardia le ai kai kerelas le te keren leski voia .

text: This know also , that in the last days perilous times shall come .
text2: Zhanes tu mishto , ke mai anglal sar te avel O Kristo avela trutno vriama .

text: For men shall be lovers of their own selves , covetous , boasters , proud , blasphemers , disobedient to parents , unthankful , unholy ,
text2: Ke le manush rodena swako pengo mishtimos , avela lenge drago lenge , ai avela lenge drago le love , bariarenape , ai barimatange avena , ai dena duma nasul pa Del , ai chi mai pachana o mui penge niamongo , ai chi naisina anda kancheste , ai chi respektina le dieli kai si swunto ,

text: Without natural affection , trucebreakers , false accusers , incontinent , fierce , despisers of those that are good ,
text2: nas le drago iek kavreske , ai bi milako , ai xoxavena sagda , ai kerena chingara , ai chi avela lenge drago o lashimos ,

text: Traitors , heady , highminded , lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God ;
text2: ai avena defial nasul ai mangen te maren ai dukhaven kodola manushen kai si lashe , ai avena nasul penge vortachensa , ai xoliavona sigo , ai avena bare barimatange , ai avela lenge drago mai but e lumia ke sar O Del .

text: Having a form of godliness , but denying the power thereof : from such turn away .
text2: Zhana ande khangeri numa chi pachanape so ashunena . Ashun , durion katar kasavendar manush .

text: For of this sort are they which creep into houses , and lead captive silly women laden with sins , led away with divers lusts ,
text2: Ai uni anda lende den andel khera , ai thon zor pel zhuvlia le kovlia le bezexalia kai si le andel ginduria dieli bi malade ,

text: Ever learning , and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth .
text2: zhuvlia kai roden sagda te sichon , numa kai shoxar chi aresle te zhanen o chachimos .

text: Now as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses , so do these also resist the truth : men of corrupt minds , reprobate concerning the faith .
text2: Sa sar o Jannes ai o Jambres kai chi lenaspe pala Moses . Sakadia kadala manush chi lenpe pala chachimos : won si manush kai lenge goji nai lashi , ai lengo pachamos chi mol kanchi .

text: But they shall proceed no further : for their folly shall be manifest unto all men , as theirs also was .
text2: Numa chi zhana dur : ke sa e lumia dela po gor ke dzile le , sar kerdilia le Janneske ai le Jambreske .

text: But thou hast fully known my doctrine , manner of life , purpose , faith , longsuffering , charity , patience ,
text2: Numa tu lian tu pala murho sicharimos , ai sar traiivas , ai so sas murhe ginduria , murho pachamos , ai murhi rhavda , murhi dragostia , ai sar inkeravas le Devlesa , ai zhanes murhe vutuimata , ai murhe chinuria .

text: Persecutions , afflictions , which came unto me at Antioch , at Iconium , at Lystra ; what persecutions I endured : but out of them all the Lord delivered me .
text2: Tu zhanes so godi kerdilia pe mansa ando Antioch , ando Iconium , ai ando Listra ; ai savendar vutuimata sas ma ! Numa O Kristo skepisardia ma anda swako fielo .

text: Yea , and all that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution .
text2: Ke kon godi mangel te traiil iek traio vorta le Devlesa ando Jesus Kristo avena chinuime .

text: But evil men and seducers shall wax worse and worse , deceiving , and being deceived .
text2: Numa le manush kai si nasul ai xoxamle zhana sagda mai dur ando nasulimos , ai rimona le kolavren , ai vi won rimonape .

text: But continue thou in the things which thou hast learned and hast been assured of , knowing of whom thou hast learned them ;
text2: Numa tu inker so sichilian ai so sas tu dino sa che ilesa . Tu zhanes katar savo gazda sichilian .

text: And that from a child thou hast known the holy scriptures , which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Ke de sar sanas glata tu zhanes e Swunto Vorba le Devleski , kai sai del tu e goji kai ingerel ka skepimos katar o pachamos ando Jesus Kristo .

text: All scripture is given by inspiration of God , and is profitable for doctrine , for reproof , for correction , for instruction in righteousness :
text2: Sa e Swunto Vorba le Devleski avel katar O Del ai traiil pala leste ai trobul te sicharel o chachimos , te sikavel so nai vorta , ai te lasharel le dosha , ai e Vorba sikavel leske sar te traiil vorta ,

text: That the man of God may be perfect , throughly furnished unto all good works .
text2: saxke o manush le Devlesko te avel vorta gata , ai te avel les swako fielo te kerel so godi si mishtimos .

text: I charge thee therefore before God , and the Lord Jesus Christ , who shall judge the quick and the dead at his appearing and his kingdom ;
text2: Kadala vorbi si katar murho ilo tumenge , phenav le vorbi angla Del ai angla Jesus Kristo . Wo kai dela pe kris le zhuvindin ai vi le mulen , phenela kon si doshalo , vai nai doshalo kana O Jesus Kristo avela te anel leska swunto amperetsiako .

text: Preach the word ; be instant in season , out of season ; reprove , rebuke , exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine .
text2: De duma pai Vorba le Devleski , phen pa late sagda kana maladiol ai vi kana chi maladiol ; parhu le ginduria le manushenge , ai phen kodolenge kai chi keren vorta , ai sichar te bariol o pachamos le manushengo ai te avel tu bari rhavda .

text: For the time will come when they will not endure sound doctrine ; but after their own lusts shall they heap to themselves teachers , having itching ears ;
text2: Ke avela e vriama kai le manush chi mai mangena te ashunen e chachi Vorba le Devleski , numa lenape pala penge ginduria , ai chidena pasha pende bute manushen kai sicharen , ai kai mothona lenge so mangen won te ashunen .

text: And they shall turn away their ears from the truth , and shall be turned unto fables .
text2: Chi mai ashunena ka chachimos , duriona te ashunen paramicha kai nai chache .

text: But watch thou in all things , endure afflictions , do the work of an evangelist , make full proof of thy ministry .
text2: Numa tu les sama tutar ande soste godi ; rhevdisar le vutuimata , ai ker chi buchi sar iek manush kai ingerel e lashi viasta , ai ker mishto sa chi buchi sar iek sluga le Devleski .

text: For I am now ready to be offered , and the time of my departure is at hand .
text2: Numa me , o chaso avilo kai si te avav dino sar iek sakrifis ; e vriama avili mange te merav .

text: I have fought a good fight , I have finished my course , I have kept the faith :
text2: Me marde ma o lasho marimos , me gelem zhando gor , ai garadem o pachamos .

text: Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness , which the Lord , the righteous judge , shall give me at that day : and not to me only , but unto all them also that love his appearing .
text2: Ai akana e podarka kai nirisardem azhukerel ma , kodia si e konona le chachimaski , kai O Kristo , kai kerel e kris vorta , dela ma kodo dies : numa chi dela ferdi man kodia konona , numa sa kodolen kai azhukeren le dragostimasa e vriama kana avela O Kristo .

text: Do thy diligence to come shortly unto me :
text2: Zumav ta aidi mande sar mai sigo .

text: For Demas hath forsaken me , having loved this present world , and is departed unto Thessalonica ; Crescens to Galatia , Titus unto Dalmatia .
text2: Ke o Demas meklia ma , ke pra drago leske kadia lumia , wo gelotar ande Thesalonika ; ai o Crescenes gelotar ande Galatia , ai o Titus ande Dalmatia .

text: Only Luke is with me . Take Mark , and bring him with thee : for he is profitable to me for the ministry .
text2: Ferdi o Luk mansalo . Le le Markos , ai an les tusa ; ke sai zhutila ma ande murhi buchi .

text: And Tychicus have I sent to Ephesus .
text2: Tradem o Tichicus ando Ephesus .

text: The cloke that I left at Troas with Carpus , when thou comest , bring with thee , and the books , but especially the parchments .
text2: Kana avesa , an mange e raxami kai meklem ando Troas ka Carpur ; ai an mange vi le klishki , ai mai but an o ramomos pe morchi le bakrengo kai si phangle .

text: Alexander the coppersmith did me much evil : the Lord reward him according to his works :
text2: O Alexander o kakaviari kerdia mange but nasulimos ; numa O Kristo pochinela leske anda so kerdia .

text: Of whom be thou ware also ; for he hath greatly withstood our words .
text2: Arakh tu lestar vi tu , ke phendia ke mangel te aterdiarel so godi mangas te keras .

text: At my first answer no man stood with me , but all men forsook me : I pray God that it may not be laid to their charge .
text2: Khonik chi thodia mange partia e pervo data kana phendem ke chi sim doshalo ; savorhe mekle ma . Numa te na lel sama lenge O Del !

text: Notwithstanding the Lord stood with me , and strengthened me ; that by me the preaching might be fully known , and that all the Gentiles might hear : and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion .
text2: Numa O Kristo pasha mande sas , ai delas ma zor , ai sai davas duma vorta pai Vorba le Devleski , ai te ashunen sa kodola kai Nai Zhiduvuria ; ai simas lino avri anda mui le lionosko .

text: And the Lord shall deliver me from every evil work , and will preserve me unto his heavenly kingdom : to whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: O Kristo ankalavela ma anda swako nasulimos , ai arakhela ma ai garavela ma vuzho te zhav ande lesko rhaio le cheresko . Leske te avel o luvudimos sa data , ande swako vriama . Amen .

text: Salute Prisca and Aquila , and the household of Onesiphorus .
text2: Trade but bax , zor ai sastimos ka Priscilla , ai ka Aquila , ai vi ka familia le Onesiphoroski .

text: Erastus abode at Corinth : but Trophimus have I left at Miletum sick .
text2: O Erastus beshlo ande Corinth , ai meklem le Trophimus ande Miletus ke naswalo sas .

text: Do thy diligence to come before winter . Eubulus greeteth thee , and Pudens , and Linus , and Claudia , and all the brethren .
text2: Zumav ta aidi mai anglal sar o ivend . O Eubulus , o Pudens , o Linus , e Claudia ai sa le kolaver phral traden tuke but bax , zor ai sastimos .

text: The Lord Jesus Christ be with thy spirit . Grace be with you . Amen .
text2: O Jesus Kristo te avel tusa ai o lashimos le Devlesko te avel tumensa . Amen .

text: Paul , a servant of God , and an apostle of Jesus Christ , according to the faith of God ' s elect , and the acknowledging of the truth which is after godliness ;
text2: Katar o Pavlo , ek sluga le Devlesko , ai ek apostle le Jesus Kristosko . Simas thodino te ingerav o pachamos kodolen kai O Del alosardia , ai te sikavav lenge o chachimos kai si ando pachamos ;

text: In hope of eternal life , which God , that cannot lie , promised before the world began ;
text2: saxke te zhanen ke si le o traio kai chi mai getolpe , ke O Del chi xoxavel , wo shinadia amenge kado traio mai anglal sar te avel e lumia ;

text: But hath in due times manifested his word through preaching , which is committed unto me according to the commandment of God our Saviour ;
text2: Wo kerdia te zhanen e chachi vriama pala leske Vorba . O Del , kodo kai ankalavel ame andal bezexa , phendia mange te phenav kado divano .

text: To Titus , mine own son after the common faith : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ our Saviour .
text2: Tradav tuke kado lil , Titus , murho chacho shav ando pachamos kai si ame andek than : O Del O Dat ai le Devles Jesus Kristo amaro skepitori , te del tu o lashimos ai e pacha .

text: For this cause left I thee in Crete , that thou shouldest set in order the things that are wanting , and ordain elders in every city , as I had appointed thee :
text2: Me meklem tu ande Crete , saxke e lashares so mai trobul te avel lashardo , ai te thos manushen kai den duma pa Del ande swako foro , ai de tu goji kal dieli kai sichardem tu .

text: If any be blameless , the husband of one wife , having faithful children not accused of riot or unruly .
text2: Ek manush kai del duma pa Del trobul te avel ek manush kai nai dosh pe leste ; ai trobul te avel o rhom ieka rhomniako , ai leske shave trobul te pachanpe ando Del , ai na te mothon le manush ke bi malades traiin vai ke chi pachan o mui .

text: For a bishop must be blameless , as the steward of God ; not selfwilled , not soon angry , not given to wine , no striker , not given to filthy lucre ;
text2: Ke o manush kai inkerel e khangeri trobul te kopaiilpe andal dieli le Devleski , no anda kodia trobul te na avel dosha pe leste . Ai chi trobul te avel barimatango , ai chi te xoliavol , ai chi te machol , ai chi te marelpe , ai chi trobul te niril love le chorimasa .

text: But a lover of hospitality , a lover of good men , sober , just , holy , temperate ;
text2: Numa trobul te premil mishto kodolen kai aven leste , ai te avel leske drago o mishtimos . Ai trobul te avel lasho , chacho , ai vuzho , ai te arakhelpe .

text: Holding fast the faithful word as he hath been taught , that he may be able by sound doctrine both to exhort and to convince the gainsayers .
text2: Ai trobul te inkerel mishto e chachi Vorba le Devleski sar sas sichardi , ai kadia sai zhutil la kolavren le chache sicharimos , ai vi sai te sikavela lenge shipki ai so chi haliaren .

text: For there are many unruly and vain talkers and deceivers , specially they of the circumcision :
text2: Ke si but ai mai but mashkar le Zhiduvuria kai dinepe le Devleske , won chi lenpe palai Vorba le Devleski , ai rimon le narodos penge bi malade divanonsa .

text: Whose mouths must be stopped , who subvert whole houses , teaching things which they ought not , for filthy lucre ' s sake .
text2: Trobul te phanaven lenge muia , ke won rimon bute familian , ai sicharen so chi trobul , te nirin love le chorimasa .

text: One of themselves , even a prophet of their own , said , The Cretians are alway liars , evil beasts , slow bellies .
text2: Iek andal Cretan , iek anda lenge profeturia phendia , " Ke le Cretan de sar godi sas , xoxamle sas , ai vi nasul , ai vi dzile , ai khandine kai ferdi te xan , den pe goji . "

text: This witness is true . Wherefore rebuke them sharply , that they may be sound in the faith ;
text2: Ai so phendia kado profeto o cchachimos sas . Anda kodia na dara , phen lenge lenge dosha , saxke te aven le iek lasho pachamos ,

text: Not giving heed to Jewish fables , and commandments of men , that turn from the truth .
text2: ai te na mai lenpe palal paramicha le Zhidovisko , ai palal zakonuria kai kerde le manush kai durile katar o chachimos .

text: Unto the pure all things are pure : but unto them that are defiled and unbelieving is nothing pure ; but even their mind and conscience is defiled .
text2: Swako fielo vuzho le manushenge kai si vuzhe ; numa kanchi nai vuzho kodolenge kai nai vuzhe ai kai chi pachanpe , ke lenge goji ai lenge ginduria nai vuzhe .

text: They profess that they know God ; but in works they deny him , being abominable , and disobedient , and unto every good work reprobate .
text2: Won mothon ke zhanen le Devles ; numa lengo traio sikavel ke chi zhanen les . Won nai lashe ( bezexale le ) , ai chi pachan o mui , ai nashti keren chi iek mishtimos .

text: But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine :
text2: Numa tu sichar o chachimos kai si ande Vorba le Devleski .

text: That the aged men be sober , grave , temperate , sound in faith , in charity , in patience .
text2: Phen le phure murshenge te arakhenpe , ai te aven respektime , ai lashe , ai te beshen ando pachamos , ande dragostia , ai te avel les rhavda .

text: The aged women likewise , that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness , not false accusers , not given to much wine , teachers of good things ;
text2: Ai phen vi le phuria zhuvliange te traiin malades , ai te na pupuin , ai te na machon , numa trobul te sicharen so si lasho ;

text: That they may teach the young women to be sober , to love their husbands , to love their children ,
text2: saxke te sicharen le boriorhan te aven lenge drago , lenge rhom , ai lenge glati ,

text: To be discreet , chaste , keepers at home , good , obedient to their own husbands , that the word of God be not blasphemed .
text2: ai te aven lashia , ai vuzhia , ai te len sama mishto katar penge khera , ai te lenpe pala penge rhom , saxke te na mothol khonik nasul pai Vorba le Devleski .

text: Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded .
text2: Ai vi mang katar le terne mursh te aven lashe .

text: In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works : in doctrine shewing uncorruptness , gravity , sincerity ,
text2: Ai vi tu trobul te sikaves ande soste godi o mishtimos , ai vi trobul te aves chachimasa , ai te na keres phirasa kana divines pa Del .

text: Sound speech , that cannot be condemned ; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed , having no evil thing to say of you .
text2: Ai phen vorbi chache , saxke te na mothon ke nai mishto , ai kadia che duzhmaia avela lenge lazhav , ke nashti mothona chi iek nasulimos pa amende .

text: Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters , and to please them well in all things ; not answering again ;
