text2: Ai trobul le slugi te pachan o mui penge gazdango , ai te aven lensa lashe ande soste godi ; ai chi trobul te den le atweto palpale zhungales .

text: Not purloining , but shewing all good fidelity ; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things .
text2: Ai chi trobul te choren lendar kanchi , numa trobul te sikaven sagda ke lashe le ai ke pachan o mui , saxke te avel o luvudimos ande soste godi ande Vorba le Devleski amaro skepitori .

text: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men ,
text2: Ke O Del sikadia pesko lashimos te skepil pe swako manush .

text: Teaching us that , denying ungodliness and worldly lusts , we should live soberly , righteously , and godly , in this present world ;
text2: Ke o lashimos le Devlesko sicharel ame te mekas o traio o chorho , ai le dieli kadala phuviake te traiisaras pe kadia phuv iek traio lasho , vorta , ai te beshas pasha Del .

text: Looking for that blessed hope , and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ ;
text2: O lashimos le Devlesko sicharel ame te traiisaras vorta zhi kai avel o dies kai azhukeras . O dies kai sikadiola o luvudimos amare bare Devlesko ai amare skepitoresko o Jesus Kristo .

text: Who gave himself for us , that he might redeem us from all iniquity , and purify unto himself a peculiar people , zealous of good works .
text2: Wo diape pala amende , saxke te ankalavel ame andal bezexa , ai te kerel anda amende iek narodo vuzho kai si ferdi lesko , ai manush kai mangen te keren o mishtimos .

text: These things speak , and exhort , and rebuke with all authority . Let no man despise thee .
text2: Sichar sa kodola vorbi bi darako te zhutis le manushen kai ashunen tute , vai te mothos lenge lenge dosha , ai na mek kanikas te rimol tu .

text: Put them in mind to be subject to principalities and powers , to obey magistrates , to be ready to every good work ,
text2: Ai phen savorhenge ke trobul te lenpe palal bare , ai palai zhandari ke trobul te pachan lengo mui ai te keren so godi si mishto .

text: To speak evil of no man , to be no brawlers , but gentle , shewing all meekness unto all men .
text2: Ai te na mothon nasulimos pa kanikaste , numa te roden o mishtimos savorhengo , ai te aven lashe ai pachivale sa le manushensa .

text: For we ourselves also were sometimes foolish , disobedient , deceived , serving divers lusts and pleasures , living in malice and envy , hateful , and hating one another .
text2: Ke iame mai anglal samas dzile , chi pachasas o mui , ai chi zhanasas o chachimos , ai samas phangle katar but dieli kadala lumiake , ai traiisarasas ando nasulimos , ai sas ame ginduria chorhe , ai nas amenge drago khonik , ai iame samas gratsia le kolavrenge .

text: But after that the kindness and love of God our Saviour toward man appeared ,
text2: Numa kana O Del amaro skepitori sikadia pesko lashimos ai peski dragostia le maushenge ,

text: Not by works of righteousness which we have done , but according to his mercy he saved us , by the washing of regeneration , and renewing of the Holy Ghost ;
text2: skepisardia ame . Na ke ame kerdiam buchi te avas vorta le Devlesa , numa ke sas leski mila anda amende ai skepisardia ame , wo dia ame o nevo traio kana O Swunto Duxo avilo te traiil ande amende .

text: Which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour ;
text2: Ke O Del shordia but anda pesko Swunto Duxo pe amende katar O Jesus Kristo amaro skepitori ;

text: That being justified by his grace , we should be made heirs according to the hope of eternal life .
text2: saxke pala lesko lashimos , ame sai avel ame o traio kai chi mai getolpe .

text: This is a faithful saying , and these things I will that thou affirm constantly , that they which have believed in God might be careful to maintain good works . These things are good and profitable unto men .
text2: Ai phenav tuke iek vorba chachi . Mangav tutar te sichares butivar kadala dieli kai phendem tuke , saxke kodola kai pachanpe ando Del te sichon mishto te keren o mishtimos .

text: But avoid foolish questions , and genealogies , and contentions , and strivings about the law ; for they are unprofitable and vain .
text2: Numa arakh tu te na ker tuke divano pal but vitsi kai sas mai anglal , ai na xa tu , na mar tu pa zakono . Ke intaino kodola dieli . Chi mon kanchi .

text: A man that is an heretick after the first and second admonition reject ;
text2: Ai te si iek manush kai rimol unen anda tumende , phen leske te arakhelpe , ai te na pachala o mui , mai phen leske iek data . Porme duriol lestar .

text: Knowing that he that is such is subverted , and sinneth , being condemned of himself .
text2: Ke kasavestar manush durilo pa drom o vorta , ai leske bezexa sikaven ke durilo .

text: When I shall send Artemas unto thee , or Tychicus , be diligent to come unto me to Nicopolis : for I have determined there to winter .
text2: Kana tradava tuke o Artemas , vai o Tychicus , tu grebisavo te aidi mande ande Nicopolis ; ke me mangav te beshav kotse sa o ivend .

text: Bring Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey diligently , that nothing be wanting unto them .
text2: Ai ker so godi dashtis ta zhutisar o Zenas o ablakato , ai le Apollos kana zhanatar ; ai le sama te avel le so godi trobul le .

text: And let ours also learn to maintain good works for necessary uses , that they be not unfruitful .
text2: Ke vi amaro narodo trobul te sichol te kerel o mishtimos , saxke te zhutil andel dieli kai trobul ; ke chi trobul te na keren kanchi ande pengo traio .

text: All that are with me salute thee . Greet them that love us in the faith . Grace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Ai sa kodola kai si mansa tradem tuke but bax , zor ai sastimos . Ai iame tradas but bax , zor ai sastimos amare vortakonge kai pachan pe ando Del , o lashimos le Devlesko te avel tumensa savorhensa .

text: Paul , a prisoner of Jesus Christ , and Timothy our brother , unto Philemon our dearly beloved , and fellowlabourer ,
text2: Katar o Pavlo , kai si phanglo le Jesus Kristoske , ai katar amaro phral o Timote . Tuke Philemon , amaro kuchi vortako , ai kai keres buchi amensa , ai kai khangeri kai chidelpe ande cho kher ,

text: And to our beloved Apphia , and Archippus our fellowsoldier , and to the church in thy house :
text2: ai amare pheiake e Apphia , ai ka Archippus kai marelpe amensa ando pachamos :

text: Grace to you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: O Del amaro Dat ai le Devles Jesus Kristo te del tume o lashimos ai e pacha .

text: I thank my God , making mention of thee always in my prayers ,
text2: Swako data kai rhugiv ma , murho kuchi Philemon , da ma goji tute , ai naisiv murhe Devleske .

text: Hearing of thy love and faith , which thou hast toward the Lord Jesus , and toward all saints ;
text2: Ke ashunav e dragostia kai si tu sa le Devleske narodoske , ai o pachamos kai si tu ando Jesus Kristo .

text: That the communication of thy faith may become effectual by the acknowledging of every good thing which is in you in Christ Jesus .
text2: Ai mangav katar O Del o traio kai inkerel tu amensa katar o pachamos te kerel te zhanas mai mishto sa le mishtimata kai si ame ande amaro traio le Kristosa .

text: For we have great joy and consolation in thy love , because the bowels of the saints are refreshed by thee , brother .
text2: Chiri dragostia , murho phral , dia man but raduimos ai zor ! Ke raduisardian o ilo le Devlesko narodoske .

text: Wherefore , though I might be much bold in Christ to enjoin thee that which is convenient ,
text2: Anda kodia , marka , pala Kristo me sim ivia te mothav tuke so trobul te keres .

text: Yet for love ' s sake I rather beseech thee , being such an one as Paul the aged , and now also a prisoner of Jesus Christ .
text2: Numa ke mange drago tuke , mangav vari so tutar . Sar sim me o Pavlo , iek manush phuro , ai katse ande temnitsa , ai akana ek manush phanglo le Jesus Kristoske .

text: I beseech thee for my son Onesimus , whom I have begotten in my bonds :
text2: Me mangav tutar vari so le Onesimeske , ke wo si murho shav ando Jesus Kristo ; ke me kerdilem lesko dat ando Del katse ande temnitsa .

text: Which in time past was to thee unprofitable , but now profitable to thee and to me :
text2: Mai anglal wo chi trobulas tu , numa akana trobul ame , vi tut ai vi man .

text: Whom I have sent again : thou therefore receive him , that is , mine own bowels :
text2: Ai tradav les tute akana , premin les , sar te avilino iek kotor anda mande .

text: Whom I would have retained with me , that in thy stead he might have ministered unto me in the bonds of the gospel :
text2: Me manglemas te inkerav les pasha mande , zhi kai sim ande temnitsa ai te zhutil ma ande cho than .

text: But without thy mind would I do nothing ; that thy benefit should not be as it were of necessity , but willingly .
text2: Numa chi manglem te kerav kanchi bi te phushav tutar , chi mangav te thav tu pe zor te keres mange mishtimos , ke mange mai drago te keres tu anda tute .

text: For perhaps he therefore departed for a season , that thou shouldest receive him for ever ;
text2: Amborim o Onesimus sas lino tutar pe xantsi vriama , saxke te avel tusa porme sagda ;

text: Not now as a servant , but above a servant , a brother beloved , specially to me , but how much more unto thee , both in the flesh , and in the Lord ?
text2: ke akana wo ma nai ferdi iek prosto sluga , numa mai but lo de sar iek sluga : wo si akana iek kuchi phral , ai mange defial drago lo , numa tuke trobul te avel mai but vi sar sluga , ai vi sar phral ando Kristo .

text: If thou count me therefore a partner , receive him as myself .
text2: Te jinesa man sar cho vortako , premisar les sar te premisardianas man .

text: If he hath wronged thee , or oweth thee ought , put that on mine account ;
text2: Ai te shubisailo vari so karing tute , vai te kamela tuke vari so , tu jin pa mande .

text: I Paul have written it with mine own hand , I will repay it : albeit I do not say to thee how thou owest unto me even thine own self besides .
text2: Me , murhe vastesa tradav tuke kado divano . Me , o Pavlo , pochinava tuke palpale , ai chi trobul te dav tu goji ke tu kames mange cho traio .

text: Yea , brother , let me have joy of thee in the Lord : refresh my bowels in the Lord .
text2: E , phrala , mangav ma tutar , ker mange kado mishtimos ande dragostia le Kristoski . Raduisar murho ilo , sar iek phral ando Jesus Kristo !

text: Having confidence in thy obedience I wrote unto thee , knowing that thou wilt also do more than I say .
text2: Ke me pachav ma , ke ande kado lil kai ramov tuke , akana te keresa so mangav tutar , ai vi zhanav ke keresa mai but .

text: But withal prepare me also a lodging : for I trust that through your prayers I shall be given unto you .
text2: Ai ande kodia lashar i mange iek soba ke pachav ma ke O Del ashunela tumare rhugimata , ai dela te avav pale tumensa .

text: There salute thee Epaphras , my fellowprisoner in Christ Jesus ;
text2: O Epaphras , kai si mansa ande temnitsa le Jesus Kristoske tradel tuke but bax , zor ai sastimos .

text: Marcus , Aristarchus , Demas , Lucas , my fellowlabourers .
text2: Ai vi o Marko , o Aristarchus , o Demas , ai o Luk , murhe vortacha kai keren mansa buchi .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
text2: O mishtimos amaro Devlesko Jesus Kristo te avel tumensa . Amen .

text: God , who at sundry times and in divers manners spake in time past unto the fathers by the prophets ,
text2: De dumult O Del dia duma amare phure dadenge katar le profeturia butivar ande sune , vizionuria , ai mui moste .

text: Hath in these last days spoken unto us by his Son , whom he hath appointed heir of all things , by whom also he made the worlds ;
text2: Numa ande kadala diesa palune wo dia duma amenge katar lesko Shav . O Del dia lesko Shav swako fiela , ai lesko Shav kerdia e lumia ai swako fielo .

text: Who being the brightness of his glory , and the express image of his person , and upholding all things by the word of his power , when he had by himself purged our sins , sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high ;
text2: O Shav le Devlesko strefial le barimasa le Dadesko . O Shav si sar O Dat ande swako fielo . Si O Shav kai inkerel sa e lumia pala e putiera leski vorbaki . O Shav dia pesko traio te merel po trushul ai te iertil amen katar sa amaro bezexa , ai porme Wo beshlo pe rig e chachi le Devlesko ando rhaio .

text: Being made so much better than the angels , as he hath by inheritance obtained a more excellent name than they .
text2: O Shav le Devlesko sas kerdia mai baro lo sar le angeluria . O Del dia les ek anav mai baro sar le anava le angelonge . Lesko anav si " O Shav le Devlesko " kai lesko Dat dia les .

text: For unto which of the angels said he at any time , Thou art my Son , this day have I begotten thee ? And again , I will be to him a Father , and he shall be to me a Son ?
text2: Ke O Del shoxar chi phendia ka chi iek angelo , " Tu san murho shav . " vai adies me dem tu o luvudimos kai si le anavasa . O Del chi phendia le angelonge , chi iek angelo , " Me sim lesko Dat , ai Wo si murho shav . "

text: And again , when he bringeth in the firstbegotten into the world , he saith , And let all the angels of God worship him .
text2: Ai kana pesko pervo Shav , O Jesus sas kerdilo pe phuv O Del phendia , " Mek sa le angeluria le Devleske te luvudin les . "

text: And of the angels he saith , Who maketh his angels spirits , and his ministers a flame of fire .
text2: O Del phendia pa leske angeluria , " Won si marturia kai zhan sigo sar e barval , ai sar podaitori phabol iagake . "

text: But unto the Son he saith , Thy throne , O God , is for ever and ever : a sceptre of righteousness is the sceptre of thy kingdom .
text2: Numa pa lesko Shav , wo phenel , " Devla , chi amperetsia beshel sa data ai sagda . Ai so godi tu phenes ando chiro than si chacho ai vorta .

text: Thou hast loved righteousness , and hated iniquity ; therefore God , even thy God , hath anointed thee with the oil of gladness above thy fellows .
text2: Drago sas tuke so si chacho , ai vurhitsisardia so nai chacho . O Del , vi cho Del shordia pe tute mai raduimos sar pe vari kon . "

text: And , Thou , Lord , in the beginning hast laid the foundation of the earth ; and the heavens are the works of thine hands :
text2: O Del akhardia les " Devla " kana phendia , " Devla , ande gor tu kerdian e lumia , ai le cheri tu kerdian che vastensa .

text: They shall perish ; but thou remainest ; and they all shall wax old as doth a garment ;
text2: Le cheri ai e lumia avena xasarde ai avena nai kanchi , numa tu Jesus beshes sa data . Le cheri ai e lumia rimome sar le tsalia le phure ,

text: And as a vesture shalt thou fold them up , and they shall be changed : but thou art the same , and thy years shall not fail .
text2: ai iek dies tu O Jesus doblisaresa le ai thos le rigate ai les aver . Numa tu Jesus shoxar chi parhuves tu ai chire bersh shoxar chi getolpe .

text: But to which of the angels said he at any time , Sit on my right hand , until I make thine enemies thy footstool ?
text2: O Del shoxar chi phendia ka chi ek angelo , " Beshes pe murhi rig e chachi ando luvudimos , zhi kai licharav sa che duzhmanon tela che punrhe , " sar Wo phendia ka pesko Shav .

text: Are they not all ministering spirits , sent forth to minister for them who shall be heirs of salvation ?
text2: Ke le angeluria si ferdi duxuria trade te zhutin ai te len sama kodolendar kai premin lesko skepimos .

text: Therefore we ought to give the more earnest heed to the things which we have heard , lest at any time we should let them slip .
text2: Trobul ame te ashunas ka sa le vorbi le chachimaske kai sas phende amenge te na durios lendar .

text: For if the word spoken by angels was stedfast , and every transgression and disobedience received a just recompence of reward ;
text2: Le vorbi kai le angeluria phende sas chache . Ai kana le manush chi kerde so manglia O Del lendar wo doshardia le .

text: How shall we escape , if we neglect so great salvation ; which at the first began to be spoken by the Lord , and was confirmed unto us by them that heard him ;
text2: Defial lasho sas O Del te lasharel o drom amenge te avas skepime katar e kris le bezexeski . Sostar ame gindis ke chi zhas ando iado te na las ame o drom o chacho kai zhal ando rhaio kai wo lashardia amenge ?

text: God also bearing them witness , both with signs and wonders , and with divers miracles , and gifts of the Holy Ghost , according to his own will ?
text2: O Jesus sas o pervo te phenel amenge pa lesko skepimos , porme kodole manush kai ashunde leste phende le vorbi may palal . O Del sikadia amenge kai leski Vorbi si chache pala leske semnuria , mirakluria , ai buchi , ai Wo dia le podarki le Swuntone Duxoske sar wo manglia .

text: For unto the angels hath he not put in subjection the world to come , whereof we speak .
text2: Ai le angeluria chi poronchin pe lumia kai si te avel , pa kadia lumia ame das duma .

text: But one in a certain place testified , saying , What is man , that thou art mindful of him ? or the son of man , that thou visitest him ?
text2: E Vorba le Devleski phenel , " So si o manush kai gindis pa leste ? Ai kon si O Shav le Manushesko kai trobulas te seres les ? "

text: Thou madest him a little lower than the angels ; thou crownedst him with glory and honour , and didst set him over the works of thy hands :
text2: " Tu kerdian les te lel o than mai tele sar le angeluria pala xantsi vriana , akana tu bariardia les le luvudimasa ai barimasa , ai kerdia les te poronchil opral pe sa le dieli .

text: Thou hast put all things in subjection under his feet . For in that he put all in subjection under him , he left nothing that is not put under him . But now we see not yet all things put under him .
text2: Tu thodian swako fielo telal leske punrhe . " Nai khanchi kai chi kerel sar wo mangel , numa chi dikhliam sa le dieli te kerdion inker .

text: But we see Jesus , who was made a little lower than the angels for the suffering of death , crowned with glory and honour ; that he by the grace of God should taste death for every man .
text2: Numa ame dikhas O Jesus . Pala xantsi vriama wo lia o than kai sas mai tele sar le angeluria . Numa O Del sas les lashimos savorhenge . Ke pala o mishtimos le Devlesko O Jesus trobulas te merel sa le manushenge po trushul . Porme , ke le Kristoski martia po trushul O Del bariardia les le luvudimasa ai strefiamasa barimos .

text: For it became him , for whom are all things , and by whom are all things , in bringing many sons unto glory , to make the captain of their salvation perfect through sufferings .
text2: Vorta sas le Devlesko te kerel sa le dieli pala lesko luvudimos , te mekel O Jesus te chinuil pala le bezexa le manushenge . Ke anda kodia , wo anel but shave le Devleske ando rhaio . Ke pala lesko chinuimos , wo si o barolo ai chacholo . Ferdi wo sai skepil le manushen .

text: For both he that sanctifieth and they who are sanctified are all of one : for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brethren ,
text2: O Jesus kerel le manushen Swunto . O Jesus ai le manush kai pachanpe ande Leste si le o saikfielo Dat . Kadia si sostar O Jesus nai lazhal te akharel ame leske phrala .

text: Saying , I will declare thy name unto my brethren , in the midst of the church will I sing praise unto thee .
text2: O Jesus phenel lesko Dat , " Me mothav murhe phral pa chiro anav ai andek than jilabas le jilia le naisimaske . "

text: And again , I will put my trust in him . And again , Behold I and the children which God hath given me .
text2: Ai mai iek data phenel , " Me thava murho pachamos ando Del . " Ai aver data wo phendia , " Dikh , katse si ma , ai le shave kai O Del dia mange . "

text: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood , he also himself likewise took part of the same ; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death , that is , the devil ;
text2: Saikfielo Dat si ame le Jesusosa . Ai si ame saikfielo stato ai rat sar O Jesus , ke O Jesus kerdilo ek manush sar ame . Wo mulo sar ame trobul te meras . Pala leski martia Wo pharhadia e putiera le bengeski kai sas les e putiera le martiaki .

text: And deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage .
text2: Ai O Jesus skepisardia sa kodola kai traiinas sa lengo traio ande dar la martiaki sar slugi .

text: For verily he took not on him the nature of angels ; but he took on him the seed of Abraham .
text2: O Jesus chi avilo te zhutil le angelon , numa avilo te zhutil le manushen le Abrahamoski familia .

text: Wherefore in all things it behoved him to be made like unto his brethren , that he might be a merciful and faithful high priest in things pertaining to God , to make reconciliation for the sins of the people .
text2: No O Jesus trobulas te avel sar ame , leske phral , wo trobulsardia te avel iek anda amende te avel amaro Baro Rasha kai zhal mashkar O Del ai amen . Sas les mila pe amende , kerdia sa so si vorta . Wo dia pes sar ek podarka te merel po trushul amare bezexenge te na dosharel ame O Del , numa te iertil ame .

text: For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted , he is able to succour them that are tempted .
text2: Ke O Jesus sas zumado sar ame sam zumado ai chinuisardia sar ame . Wo haliarel ame ai sai zhutil ame kana sam zumadiam .

text: Wherefore , holy brethren , partakers of the heavenly calling , consider the Apostle and High Priest of our profession , Christ Jesus ;
text2: Murhe phral , O Del alosardia tume , ai tho che ginduria karing O Jesus , kai si o Apostle ai o Baro Rasha amaro pachamasko .

text: Who was faithful to him that appointed him , as also Moses was faithful in all his house .
text2: O Del alosardia O Jesus te avel o Baro Rasha ai O Jesus kerdia sa so manglia O Del lestar , sar o Moses podaisardia ando kher le Devlesko .

text: For this man was counted worthy of more glory than Moses , inasmuch as he who hath builded the house hath more honour than the house .
text2: Numa O Jesus si les mai luvudimos sar o Moses , sar o manush kai kerel o kher shukar premil mai luvudimos sar o kher .

text: For every house is builded by some man ; but he that built all things is God .
text2: Ai but manush sai keren khera , numa ferdi O Del kerdia swako fielo .

text: And Moses verily was faithful in all his house , as a servant , for a testimony of those things which were to be spoken after ;
text2: O Moses kerdia mishto e buchi le Devleski ando kher le Devlesko , numa wo sas ferdi ek podaitori , ai leski buchi sas te sikavel so sas te avel mai palal .

text: But Christ as a son over his own house ; whose house are we , if we hold fast the confidence and the rejoicing of the hope firm unto the end .
text2: Numa O Kristo , O Shav le Devlesko , si O Baro kai poronchil le Devlesko kher . Ai ame sam le Devlesko kher , te inkeras amaro raduimos ai amaro pachamos zhando gor ando Del . Kadia si amaro azhukerimos .

text: Wherefore ( as the Holy Ghost saith , To day if ye will hear his voice ,
text2: O Swunto Duxo phenel , " Te ashunes lesko glaso adies ,

text: Harden not your hearts , as in the provocation , in the day of temptation in the wilderness :
text2: na zuravos cho ilo , na zhas kontra O Del , sar tumaro phure dada kerde kai chi mangle le Devleski dragostia , ai marenas mui ande pusta kana wo zumadia le .

text: When your fathers tempted me , proved me , and saw my works forty years .
text2: Tumare phure dada zumade ma ai zumade murhi rhavda , ai dikhle murhe bucha shtarvardesh bersh .

text: Wherefore I was grieved with that generation , and said , They do alway err in their heart ; and they have not known my ways .
text2: Pala kodia , simas xoliariko lensa , ai phendem , " Won chi gindin pa mande , ai lenge ginduria si nasul . Won chi haliaren so phenav lenge . "

text: So I sware in my wrath , They shall not enter into my rest . )
text2: Simas xoliariko lensa ai me phendem mange , " Won chi avena andre ai hodinin mansa . "

text: Take heed , brethren , lest there be in any of you an evil heart of unbelief , in departing from the living God .
text2: Murhe phral , arakhen tume , te na arakhes o nasulimos ande chi iek manush mashkar tumende , ke o ilo kai chi pachal ingerel les dur katar O Del o zhuvindil .

text: But exhort one another daily , while it is called To day ; lest any of you be hardened through the deceitfulness of sin .
text2: Zhutin iek kavreste . De duma swako dies iek kavresa kana si vriama , ai cho ilo chi avela zuralo , ai chi peres ando atsaimos le bezexesko .

text: For we are made partakers of Christ , if we hold the beginning of our confidence stedfast unto the end ;
text2: Ke ame sam le Kristoske te inkeras amaro pachamos ande leste sa data zhando gor , sar pachaiam ame ande leste mai anglal .

text: While it is said , To day if ye will hear his voice , harden not your hearts , as in the provocation .
text2: E Vorba le Devleski phenel , " Adies , te ashunes lesko glaso , na mek cho ilo te avel zuralo sar tumare phure dada kerde ande pusta , kana won chi kerde so manglia O Del lendar . "

text: For some , when they had heard , did provoke : howbeit not all that came out of Egypt by Moses .
text2: Kon sas kodole manush kai ashunde o glaso le Devlesko ande pusta , ai chi mangle te keren so manglia O Del lendar ? Sa le manush kai avile andai Egypt le Mosesosa .

text: But with whom was he grieved forty years ? was it not with them that had sinned , whose carcases fell in the wilderness ?
text2: Kasa sas O Del xoliariko shtarvardesh bersh ? Sas kodolensa kai kerde bezex ai mule , ai sas gropome ande pusta .

text: And to whom sware he that they should not enter into his rest , but to them that believed not ?
text2: Ai kaske phenelas O Del , kana armandino ek solaxasa , " Nashti zhan ande phuv kai Wo shinadia lenge . " Sas kodolensa kai chi kerde so manglia O Del .

text: So we see that they could not enter in because of unbelief .
text2: Ai sostar chi gele andre te hodinin lesa , ke won chi pachaiepe .

text: Let us therefore fear , lest , a promise being left us of entering into his rest , any of you should seem to come short of it .
text2: Ai so shinadia lenge O Del ? Wo phendia ka sa le manush , " Te mangen te zhan andre ai hodinin mansa , tume sai zhan andre . " Trobul ame te izdras la darasa ke uni chi zhan andre .

text: For unto us was the gospel preached , as well as unto them : but the word preached did not profit them , not being mixed with faith in them that heard it .
text2: Ame ashundiam e lashi viasta kai O Del mangel te skepil ame , sar won ashunde e lashi viasta , numa e Vorba chi zhutisardia le ke nas le pachamos .

text: For we which have believed do enter into rest , as he said , As I have sworn in my wrath , if they shall enter into my rest : although the works were finished from the foundation of the world .
text2: Ame kai pachas sai zhas andre ai hodinis lesa . O Del phendia , " Simas xoliariko ai phendem , ' Won chi avena andre ai hodinin mansa . ' " Makar e buchi le Devleski gata sas palal Wo kerdia e lumia .

text: For he spake in a certain place of the seventh day on this wise , And God did rest the seventh day from all his works .
text2: Ame zhanas kai wo si gata ai azhukerel ame , ke si ramome kai O Del hodinisardia po eftato dies palal wo kerdia e lumia ai sa le dieli pe phuv .

text: And in this place again , If they shall enter into my rest .
text2: Numa wo chi gele andre , ke O Del phendia , " Won chi aven andre ai hodinin mansa . "

text: Seeing therefore it remaineth that some must enter therein , and they to whom it was first preached entered not in because of unbelief :
text2: Uni zhan andre te hodinin le Devlesa , numa kodole kai ashunde e lashi viasta ai chi kerde sar manglia O Del lendar chi avile andre te hodinin le Devlesa .

text: Again , he limiteth a certain day , saying in David , To day , after so long a time ; as it is said , To day if ye will hear his voice , harden not your hearts .
text2: O Del thodia rigate iek dies le manushenge te aven andre , ai kadia vriama si " Adies " . De but bersh palpale kana le manush chi avile andre o David phendia , " Adies te ashunen o glaso le Devlesko , te na zuravon che ile . "

text: For if Jesus had given them rest , then would he not afterward have spoken of another day .
text2: Ke o Joshua nashtisardia te ingerel kodole manushen andre te hodinin le Devlesa , O Del chi trobulas te del duma mai palal pa aver dies .

text: There remaineth therefore a rest to the people of God .
text2: Si ek hodinimos kai azhukerel le shavenge le Devleske .

text: For he that is entered into his rest , he also hath ceased from his own works , as God did from his .
text2: O manush kai avel andre te hodinil le Devlesa , hodinil katar peski buchi sar O Del hodinisardia katar peski buchi .

text: Let us labour therefore to enter into that rest , lest any man fall after the same example of unbelief .
text2: Mek ame te keras vorta angla Del te zhas andre te hodinis le Devlesa , te na keras vorta ame avasa sar le manush kai chi gele andre te hodinin le Devlesa .

text: For the word of God is quick , and powerful , and sharper than any twoedged sword , piercing even to the dividing asunder of soul and spirit , and of the joints and marrow , and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart .
text2: E Vorba le Devleski zhuvindil ai pherdi leski putierasa ; E Vorba skurto sar ek sabia , kai shinel sigo andre kai si amare ginduria , ai amaro duxo , ai hulavel le , shinel le kokola ai kotora , phenel pa so gindil ai so mangel o ilo .

text: Neither is there any creature that is not manifest in his sight : but all things are naked and opened unto the eyes of him with whom we have to do .
text2: O Del zhanel pa swako manush , ai wo nashti garavel kanchi katar O Del . Leske iakha dikhen swako fielo kai ame keras . Musai das ame atweto ka Del pala so kerdiam .

text: Seeing then that we have a great high priest , that is passed into the heavens , Jesus the Son of God , let us hold fast our profession .
text2: Numa O Jesus O Shav le Devlesko si amaro Baro Rasha kai gelo ando rhaio te beshel le Devlesa , ai te zhutil amen te zhas ka Del . Shoxar chi aterdios te pachas ande leste .

text: For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities ; but was in all points tempted like as we are , yet without sin .
text2: Amaro Baro Rasha haliarel kai ame sam kovlo . O Kristo sas zumado sar ame , numa wo chi kerdia bezex .

text: Let us therefore come boldly unto the throne of grace , that we may obtain mercy , and find grace to help in time of need .
text2: Zhas le pachamasa ka o than le Devlesko ai beshas kotse te premis leski mila , ai te arakhas lesko mishtimos te zhutil ame kana trobul ame o zhutimos .

text: For every high priest taken from among men is ordained for men in things pertaining to God , that he may offer both gifts and sacrifices for sins :
text2: O Zhidovisko baro rasha si ferdi o manush kai si alome katar leske manushen , ai wo del le podarki lenge po altari ka Del , ai del o rat katar le zhigeni kai si sakrifisarde pala le bezexa le manushenge te avena iertime le ai pala peske bezexa te avel iertime .

text: Who can have compassion on the ignorant , and on them that are out of the way ; for that he himself also is compassed with infirmity .
text2: O rasha si ek manush ai univar si kovlo . Wo si lasho kodolensa kai chi zhanen ai shubinpe , ke wo zhanel sar te zhutil le kai chi keren vorta .

text: And by reason hereof he ought , as for the people , so also for himself , to offer for sins .
text2: Ai ke o rasha si kovlo , wo musai del le sakrifikaturia pala peske bezexa ai na ferdi le manushenge .

text: And no man taketh this honour unto himself , but he that is called of God , as was Aaron .
text2: Na bustres ke o manush chi alosarel pes te avela o baro rasha ke wo mangel te avela o baro rasha , numa O Del akharel les pala leski buchi sar O Del alosardia o Aaron .

text: So also Christ glorified not himself to be made an high priest ; but he that said unto him , Thou art my Son , to day have I begotten thee .
text2: Ai vi O Kristo chi lia o luvudimos peste te avela o baro rasha , numa O Del alosardia les . O Del phendia leske , " Murho Shav , adies me luvudisardem tut . "

text: As he saith also in another place , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Aver data O Del phendia leske , " Tu sanas alome te aves O Baro Rasha sa data , te avesa sar o Melchizedek . "

text: Who in the days of his flesh , when he had offered up prayers and supplications with strong crying and tears unto him that was able to save him from death , and was heard in that he feared ;
text2: Kana O Jesus inker sas pe phuv , wo rhugisailo le tsipimasa ai le asuensa ka Del te sai skepil pes katar e martia . O Del ashundia leske rhugimata ke O Kristo luvudisardia O Del , ai kerdia so manglia O Del lestar .

text: Though he were a Son , yet learned he obedience by the things which he suffered ;
text2: O Kristo sas O Shav le Devlesko , numa wo sichilo te kerel so manglia O Del lestar pala lesko chinuimos .

text: And being made perfect , he became the author of eternal salvation unto all them that obey him ;
text2: Wo kerdia vorta , Wo sas kerdilo O Skepitori te anel o skeipmos kai chi mai getolpe ka sa kodolen kai pachanpe ande leste , won aven skepime katar e kris le bezexeski .

text: Called of God an high priest after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Seren tume ke O Del alosardia les te avela O Baro Rasha te lasharel o drom le manushenge te zhan ka Del . Wo sas sar o Melcizedek .

text: Of whom we have many things to say , and hard to be uttered , seeing ye are dull of hearing .
text2: Mai si te phenas pa kadia dieli , numa trutno tumenge te haliaren , ke chi mangen te ashunen mishto .

text: For when for the time ye ought to be teachers , ye have need that one teach you again which be the first principles of the oracles of God ; and are become such as have need of milk , and not of strong meat .
text2: Tume pachaiepe ando Del lungo vriana akana , ai trobulas te sicharen le kolaver manush , numa tume durile katar O Del ai tume trobul vari kon te sicharel tume mai iek data E Vorba le Devleski . Tume san sar le tsinorhe kai pen thud ferdi , ai chi xan xaben .

text: For every one that useth milk is unskilful in the word of righteousness : for he is a babe .
text2: Kana o manush pel thud dichol kai chi barilo ando Del , ai wo chi haliarel so si vorta ai so nai vorta .

text: But strong meat belongeth to them that are of full age , even those who by reason of use have their senses exercised to discern both good and evil .
text2: Numa xabe si pala o manush . O manush kai barilo ando Del , wo haliarel so si vorta ai so nai vorta .

text: Therefore leaving the principles of the doctrine of Christ , let us go on unto perfection ; not laying again the foundation of repentance from dead works , and of faith toward God ,
text2: Mekas o pervo sicharimos kai trobul te zhanas pa Kristo , ai zhas angle le Devlesa ande leski Vorba te haliaras mai mishto pa lesko chachimos . Tume vunzhe zhanen kai trobul te aven iertime pala tumare bezexa ai amboldenpe katar tumare bezexa , ai tume zhanen kai trobul te pachanpe ando Del .

text: Of the doctrine of baptisms , and of laying on of hands , and of resurrection of the dead , and of eternal judgment .
text2: Tume chi trobul mai sicharimos pa bolimos , ai pa o manush kai thon le vas pe aver manush , ai o zhuvindimos andal mule , ai e kris kai chi mai getolpe .

text: And this will we do , if God permit .
text2: Zhas angle ! Ai keras kadia te mekel amen O Del .

text: For it is impossible for those who were once enlightened , and have tasted of the heavenly gift , and were made partakers of the Holy Ghost ,
text2: Chi zumavas te anas tu palpale ka Del mai iek data te haliaren e lashi viasta , kai zumadian le lashe dieli le rhaioske , ai premisardian chi partia katar le Swuntone Duxoske ,

text: And have tasted the good word of God , and the powers of the world to come ,
text2: ai zhanen kai E Vorba le Devleski si lashi , ai haliaren pa le putieri la lumiake kai si te avel ,

text: If they shall fall away , to renew them again unto repentance ; seeing they crucify to themselves the Son of God afresh , and put him to an open shame .
text2: ai porme amboldenpe katar O Del . Tu nashtis te anes tut te keis mai iek data ke karfosardian O Shav le Devlesko kal trushul mai iek data , ke chi manglian les , ai keres anda leste lazhal , ai mares mui lestar angla le manushen .

text: For the earth which drinketh in the rain that cometh oft upon it , and bringeth forth herbs meet for them by whom it is dressed , receiveth blessing from God :
text2: Kadia si sar e phuv , dia breshind butivar pe phuv .

text: But that which beareth thorns and briers is rejected , and is nigh unto cursing ; whose end is to be burned .
text2: O Del kerel e phuv te bariol lashe fruti ai lashe legume , numa del chorhi char ferdi , nai kanchi . Avela vurhitsime ai pharhudia le iagasa .

text: But , beloved , we are persuaded better things of you , and things that accompany salvation , though we thus speak .
text2: Murhe vortacha , sar phenas kadala vorbi , zhanas kai si mai lashe dieli tumenge , kai avena tumenge kana tume aven skepime .

text: For God is not unrighteous to forget your work and labour of love , which ye have shewed toward his name , in that ye have ministered to the saints , and do minister .
text2: O Del sa data kerel so si vorta . Wo chi bustrel pa e buchi kai tume kerde te zhutin le shave le Devleske , ai e buchi kai tume keren akana te zhutin len . Chiri buchi sikavel chiri dragostia le Kristoski .

text: And we desire that every one of you do shew the same diligence to the full assurance of hope unto the end :
text2: Ai mangas tume te sikaven e dragostia le kavrenge swako dies kai traiin pe phuv , zhando gor , te avela tume chi podarka .

text: That ye be not slothful , but followers of them who through faith and patience inherit the promises .
text2: Chi aven kandine . Numa keren sar won kai keren buchi la pachamasa ai rhavdasa , won premin so sas shinado lenge .

text: For when God made promise to Abraham , because he could swear by no greater , he sware by himself ,
text2: O Del shinadia le vorbi ka Abrahamos , Wo phendia le vorbi ando pesko anav ke nas aver kai sas mai baro .

text: Saying , Surely blessing I will bless thee , and multiplying I will multiply thee .
text2: Wo phendia leske . " Me swuntsava les butivar , ai dav les ek shav ai lestar avena but shave , le Zhiduvuria .

text: And so , after he had patiently endured , he obtained the promise .
text2: O Abraham azhukerdia ai O Del dia les so sas shinado leste .

text: For men verily swear by the greater : and an oath for confirmation is to them an end of all strife .
text2: Kana o manush shinavel vari so , wo akharel vari kon kai si mai baro lestar te avel , ai wo kerel les te kerel so wo shindia , vai te dosharel les te na kerel so wo shinadia . Ai chi mai phenen kanch .

text: Wherein God , willing more abundantly to shew unto the heirs of promise the immutability of his counsel , confirmed it by an oath :
text2: Ai O Del shinadia vari so ka Abrham . Wo shinadia le vorbi ando pesko anav , O Del manglia te sikavel ka Abraham kai wo shoxar chi parhuvel leski vorba .

text: That by two immutable things , in which it was impossible for God to lie , we might have a strong consolation , who have fled for refuge to lay hold upon the hope set before us :
text2: O Del dia amenge so Wo shinadia , ai Wo sikadia amenge kai Wo chi parhuvel leski vorba . O Del nashti xoxavel . Akana sa le manush kai zhan leste te aven skepime len zor , ke won zhanen kai O Del kerel so wo phendia .

text: Which hope we have as an anchor of the soul , both sure and stedfast , and which entereth into that within the veil ;
text2: Katse si ame ek pachamos pala amare duxuria kai lel ame ka leste ( ka Del ) palal le swuntone zanaveski le rhaioske .

text: Whither the forerunner is for us entered , even Jesus , made an high priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: O Jesus vunzhe gelo kotse . Wo si amaro Baro Rasha sa data , ai lashardia o drom le manushesko te zhal ka Del . Wo si sar Melchizedek .

text: For this Melchisedec , king of Salem , priest of the most high God , who met Abraham returning from the slaughter of the kings , and blessed him ;
text2: O Melchizedek sas o amperato le Salemosko , ai vi ek rasha le Devlesko O Mai Baro Del . Kana o Abraham avilo palpale katar o marimos kai but amperatsi mule , o Melchizedek dikhlia le Abrahamos sar zhalas khere ai swuntsosardia les .

text: To whom also Abraham gave a tenth part of all ; first being by interpretation King of righteousness , and after that also King of Salem , which is , King of peace ;
text2: O Abraham dia kal Melchizedek desh partia ( desh pek shel ) anda sa so nirisardia ande marimos . O anav ' Melchnizedek ' znachil , ' O amperato le chachimasko ' , ai porme ' O Salem ' znachil ' Pacha ' , ai wo si akhardo ' O amperato le pachako ' , ai ' O amperato le Salemosko ' .

text: Without father , without mother , without descent , having neither beginning of days , nor end of life ; but made like unto the Son of God ; abideth a priest continually .
text2: O Melchizedek sas bi dadesa , bi deiasa , bi familiasa , ai nai kanchi kai si ramome pa leski familia . Nas biandilo ai chi mulo , numa lesko traio si sar O Shav le Devlesko , ek rasha sa data .

text: Now consider how great this man was , unto whom even the patriarch Abraham gave the tenth of the spoils .
text2: Ame sai dikhas sar baro o Melchizedek sas . O Abraham dia les desh partia anda sa kai nirisardia ande marimos .

text: And verily they that are of the sons of Levi , who receive the office of the priesthood , have a commandment to take tithes of the people according to the law , that is , of their brethren , though they come out of the loins of Abraham :
text2: O Zhidovisko zakono phendia , le shave le Levionge kai si rashai te len desh pek shel katar lengo narodo , le Zhiduvuria , kai si le shave le Abrahamoske .

text: But he whose descent is not counted from them received tithes of Abraham , and blessed him that had the promises .
text2: Numa o Melchizedek sikadia o respektimos kal Abraham , ai o Abraham premisardia so sas shinadia leske katar O Del .

text: And without all contradiction the less is blessed of the better .
text2: Kodo kai sikavel o respektimos si mai baro sar kodo kai premil o respektimos .

text: And here men that die receive tithes ; but there he receiveth them , of whom it is witnessed that he liveth .
text2: Le Zhidovonge rashai , kai meren , premisarde desh partia . Numa si phendo kai o Melchizedel traiil .

text: And as I may so say , Levi also , who receiveth tithes , payed tithes in Abraham .
text2: Ame sai phenas kai o Levi , o dat le Zhidovonge rashai pochindia desh partia kal Melchizedek pala o Abraham .

text: For he was yet in the loins of his father , when Melchisedec met him .
text2: O Levi nas kerdilo inker , numa wo avilo andai vitsa le Abrahamoski kana o Abraham pochindia desh partia kal Mekchizedek .

text: If therefore perfection were by the Levitical priesthood , ( for under it the people received the law , ) what further need was there that another priest should rise after the order of Melchisedec , and not be called after the order of Aaron ?
text2: Te le Zhidovonge rashai ai lenge zakonuria dashtisardia te skepin ame . Sostar O Del tradia pesko Shav O Kristo sar ek Baro Rasha , sar o Melchizedek , sarte te tradel ame iek sar o Mekchizedek , ai nai iek andai vitsa le Aaronoski ?

text: For the priesthood being changed , there is made of necessity a change also of the law .
text2: Ai kana e vitsa le rashange sas parhudia , o Zhidovisko zakono sas parhudia .

text: For he of whom these things are spoken pertaineth to another tribe , of which no man gave attendance at the altar .
text2: Kadala vorbi phenel amenge pa Kristo kai avilo anda aver vitsa , ai le manush ande kadia vitsa shoxar chi kerde buchi kai altari . Won chi mudarde le zhigeni ai chi dine podarki po altari pala le bezexa le manushenge .

text: For it is evident that our Lord sprang out of Juda ; of which tribe Moses spake nothing concerning priesthood .
text2: O Jesus avilo andai vitsa kai bushol Judah , O Moses chi ramosardia kanchi pa lende ke wo chi dia lenge kadia buchi te keren .

text: And it is yet far more evident : for that after the similitude of Melchisedec there ariseth another priest ,
text2: Ame dikhas kai aver rasha avilo . Wo si sar o Melchizedek .

text: Who is made , not after the law of a carnal commandment , but after the power of an endless life .
text2: O Kristo chi kerdilo o baro rasha ke wo avilo andai vitsa le Leviongi sar o Zhidovisko zakono phendia , O Kristo avilo O Baro Rasha la putierasa katar o traio kai chi mai getolpe .

text: For he testifieth , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: E Vorba le Devleski phenel pa Kristo , " Tu san O Baro Rasha sa data sar o Melchizedek . "

text: For there is verily a disannulling of the commandment going before for the weakness and unprofitableness thereof .
text2: O Del thodia o zakono le Mosesosko rigate , ke le rashai kerde e buchi pala o skepimos , numa akana O Kristo avilo andai aver vitsa sar O Baro Rasha te skepil le manushen .

text: For the law made nothing perfect , but the bringing in of a better hope did ; by the which we draw nigh unto God .
text2: Kovlo sas o zakono ai nashtisardia te skepil le manushen . Ke o zakono le Mosesosko chi kerde le manushen vorta anglaDel . Numa akana ame sai pachas ande leste ai beshas pasha leste , ke O Kristo si amaro Baro Rasha .

text: And inasmuch as not without an oath he was made priest :
text2: O Del shinadia amenge ke O Kristo si te avel O Baro Rasha sa data .

text: ( For those priests were made without an oath ; but this with an oath by him that said unto him , The Lord sware and will not repent , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec : )
text2: Wo chi phendia kadala vorbi pa le kaver rashai . Ferdi ka O Kristo O Del phendia , " O Del phendia le vorbi ai shoxar chi parhuvel le vorbi . Tu san O Baro Rasha sa data , sar o Melchizedek . "

text: By so much was Jesus made a surety of a better testament .
text2: Ke O Del dia amenge leski vorba , ai O Jesus kerdilo o nevo kontrakto kai si mai mishto amenge .

text: And they truly were many priests , because they were not suffered to continue by reason of death :
text2: Mai anglal kana sas le o kontrakto o phuro won trobulsarde but rashai . Kana iek mulo won trobulsarde aver te kerel leski buchi .

text: But this man , because he continueth ever , hath an unchangeable priesthood .
text2: Numa O Jesus traiil sa data ai si amaro Baro Rasha , ai shoxar chi trobul ame aver .

text: Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him , seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them .
text2: O Jesus skepil sa le manushen kai aven leste akana ai sa data . O Jesus skepil le katar e kris le bezexeski , ai wo traiil sa data te rhugilpe ande lende , ai won chi bustren kai wo shordia pesko rat pala lende .

text: For such an high priest became us , who is holy , harmless , undefiled , separate from sinners , and made higher than the heavens ;
text2: Trobul ame ek baro rasha sar O Jesus , ke wo si swunto , ai nai dosh ande leste , Wo chi kerdia bezex , ai nai marime sar le manush kai keren bezex , ai si les o than le luvudimasko ando rhaio .

text: Who needeth not daily , as those high priests , to offer up sacrifice , first for his own sins , and then for the people ' s : for this he did once , when he offered up himself .
text2: O Kristo chi trobul o rat le zhigeni pala o sakrifis swako dies pala peste , sar le kaver rashai trobulsarde te keren te vuzharen penge bezexa , ai porme le bezexa le manushenge . O Kristo chi kerdia so won kerde . Numa Wo dia iek podarka po altari kana Wo dia pesko traio po trushul . Wo sas o sakrifis .

text: For the law maketh men high priests which have infirmity ; but the word of the oath , which was since the law , maketh the Son , who is consecrated for evermore .
text2: O Zhidovisko zakono kerel rashai le manushenge , numa le rashai sas kovle , ai kerde bezex , ai chi kerde vorta angla Del sa data . Numa mai palal O Del alosardia pesko Shav kai kerdia vorta angla leste sa data .

text: Now of the things which we have spoken this is the sum : We have such an high priest , who is set on the right hand of the throne of the Majesty in the heavens ;
text2: Akana e bari diela si kadia : si ame ek Baro Rasha kai lashardia o drom le manushenge te zhan ka Del . O Kristo si amaro Rasha kai si ando rhaio ai Wo beshel pe rik e chachi le Devlesko ( o than le luvudimasko ) .

text: A minister of the sanctuary , and of the true tabernacle , which the Lord pitched , and not man .
text2: Wo si o pasturi ande tamplo ando rhaio . Le manush chi kerde o chacho than ando rhaio le vastensa , numa O Del kerdia o chacho than ando rhaio .

text: For every high priest is ordained to offer gifts and sacrifices : wherefore it is of necessity that this man have somewhat also to offer .
text2: Ai swako baro rasha pe phuv kerelas so mangel o zakono , leski buchi sas te mudarel le zhegani ai te del podarki po altari ka Del . Ai vi O Kristo trobul te del ek sakrifis .

text: For if he were on earth , he should not be a priest , seeing that there are priests that offer gifts according to the law :
text2: O sakrifis kai Wo dia si mai mishto sar le rashai pe phuv dine . Te beshel pe phuv O Kristo , wo nas te avel ek rasha sar lende , ke le rashai pe phuv den podarki sar mangel o Zhidovisko zakono .

text: Who serve unto the example and shadow of heavenly things , as Moses was admonished of God when he was about to make the tabernacle : for , See , saith he , that thou make all things according to the pattern shewed to thee in the mount .
text2: Kadia buchi ferdi sikavel ek patreto pa o chacho than ando Rhaio . Kana o Moses kerelas e tsera , O Del phendia leske te kerel e tsera le luvudimaski sar wo sikadia leske po plai Sinai .

text: But now hath he obtained a more excellent ministry , by how much also he is the mediator of a better covenant , which was established upon better promises .
text2: Numa e buchi le Kristoski vorta si , ai O Kristo si o ablakato kai zhal mashkaral O Del ai o manush . O rasha pe phuv podail tela o zakono ferdi . O nevo kontrakto kai O kristo dia ame si mai mishto ai pherdo mishtimos .

text: For if that first covenant had been faultless , then should no place have been sought for the second .
text2: Te sas vorta o kontrakto phuro , chi trobulas te thol les rigate ai del aver .

text: For finding fault with them , he saith , Behold , the days come , saith the Lord , when I will make a new covenant with the house of Israel and with the house of Judah :
text2: Nas raduilpe O Del le manushensa , sar le manush traiinas ai kerenas , ke kerenas so phendia o zakono o phuro . O Del phendia , " O dies avela kana kerav o nevo drom le Zhidovongo ai kodola andai vitsa le Judahoski luvudina ma .

text: Not according to the covenant that I made with their fathers in the day when I took them by the hand to lead them out of the land of Egypt ; because they continued not in my covenant , and I regarded them not , saith the Lord .
text2: O nevo kontrakto le luvudimasko chi avela sar o phuro zakono le luvudimasko kai dem lenge dada , kana lem le pala o vas ai ingerdem le avri andai o them o Egypt : Won chi kerde so phendia o zakono , ai trobulsardem te dav aver .

text: For this is the covenant that I will make with the house of Israel after those days , saith the Lord ; I will put my laws into their mind , and write them in their hearts : and I will be to them a God , and they shall be to me a people :
text2: Numa kadia si o nevo kontrakto kai kerav le Zhidovonsa , kana o dies avela phenel O Del : Me ramov murhe zakonuria pe lenge goji , ai ramov le ande lenge ile . Ai won zhanen so te keren bi te phenav lenge so te keren . Me avava lengo Del , ai won avena murho narodo .

text: And they shall not teach every man his neighbour , and every man his brother , saying , Know the Lord : for all shall know me , from the least to the greatest .
text2: Khonik chi trobul te sicharel lesko vortako vai lesko phral te zhanel le Devles , ke savorhe anda lende vunzhe zhanen ma , katar le teliardo zhi ka le bariardo .

text: For I will be merciful to their unrighteousness , and their sins and their iniquities will I remember no more .
text2: Ke Me iertiva lenge bezexa , ai chi mai serava lenge bezexa . "

text: In that he saith , A new covenant , he hath made the first old . Now that which decayeth and waxeth old is ready to vanish away .
text2: Kana O Del dia duma pa o nevo kontrakto , Wo phendia lenge kai o phuro kontrakto gata sas , ai chi mai trobul les ke wo thodia les rigate .

text: Then verily the first covenant had also ordinances of divine service , and a worldly sanctuary .
text2: O pervo kontrakto mashkar O Del ai lesko narodo sas le zakonuria le swuntone buchake , ai sas ek swunto tsera pe phuv . Andre sas dui sobi .

text: For there was a tabernacle made ; the first , wherein was the candlestick , and the table , and the shewbread ; which is called the sanctuary .
text2: Andre e pervi soba sas o sumnakai kotor kai inkerel e memeli , ai e skafidi kai sas le swuntone manrhe pe late ; e pervi soba busholas ' O Swunto than . '

text: And after the second veil , the tabernacle which is called the Holiest of all ;
text2: Ai palal e duito zanaveski sas ek soba busholas ' O Swunto le Swuntoske . '

text: Which had the golden censer , and the ark of the covenant overlaid round about with gold , wherein was the golden pot that had manna , and Aaron ' s rod that budded , and the tables of the covenant ;
text2: Andre sas ek altari kai phabolas e duxi , ai ek baro shkapo kerdia katar o khash kai busholas ' O Ark le kontraktosko ' . Le dui sas wusharde le sumnakasa andre ai avri . Andre o Ark sas le skafidia le baxeske le desh zakonensa ramome pe lende , ai e sumnakai piri le manrhensa andre , ai le Aaronosko rhai kai nachinaisardia te bariol .

text: And over it the cherubims of glory shadowing the mercyseat ; of which we cannot now speak particularly .
text2: Opral o sumnakai shkapo sas le staturia le angelonge kai busholas ' Cherubims ' te len sama le Devlesko luvudimos , lenge phaka gele opre ai opral ai avile andek than mashkaral opral o shkapo le Arkosko , busholas ' E mila skamin ' , opral o shkapo ai tela e vushalin lenge phaka sas o than kai le bezexa sas iertime . Nashti mai phenas pa kadala dieli akana .

text: Now when these things were thus ordained , the priests went always into the first tabernacle , accomplishing the service of God .
text2: Kana sa gata sas , le rashai avile andre ai ankliste avri andai pervi soba kana mangle .

text: But into the second went the high priest alone once every year , not without blood , which he offered for himself , and for the errors of the people :
text2: Iek data swako bersh o baro rasha avilo korkorho andre ande duito soba . Wo chi avilo andre bi le ratesa . Wo dia o rat ka Del sar ek podarka pala leske bezexa , ai vi pala sa le bezexa le manushenge .

text: The Holy Ghost this signifying , that the way into the holiest of all was not yet made manifest , while as the first tabernacle was yet standing :
text2: Ai O Swunto Duxo sicharel ame kai o zakono o phuro chi meklia le manush te zhan andre ande ' Swunto le Swuntosko ' sas kotse te keren so manglia o zakono .

text: Which was a figure for the time then present , in which were offered both gifts and sacrifices , that could not make him that did the service perfect , as pertaining to the conscience ;
text2: Tela o phuro zakono , won dine podarki ai sakrifikaturia , numa chi wusharde le ile le manushenge kai andine le .

text: Which stood only in meats and drinks , and divers washings , and carnal ordinances , imposed on them until the time of reformation .
text2: O phuro zakono phendia lenge so te xan ai pen , ai sar te xalavenpe , ai sar te keren aver dieli le statosa . Won trobulsarde te keren kadala dieli zhi kai O Kristo avilo le nevo kontraktosa le Devlesko kai si mai mishto .

text: But Christ being come an high priest of good things to come , by a greater and more perfect tabernacle , not made with hands , that is to say , not of this building ;
text2: Numa O Kristo avilo sar O Baro Rasha pala le lashe dieli kai wo shinadia amenge . Wo lashardia o drom le manushenge te zhan ka Del . Wo gelo andre e mai lashi tsera ando rhaio , nas kerdo le vastensa le manushenge ai nas ek partia kadia lumiaki .

text: Neither by the blood of goats and calves , but by his own blood he entered in once into the holy place , having obtained eternal redemption for us .
text2: O Kristo avilo andre e swunto tsera ande rhaio ferdi iek data sa le manushenge le ratesa ande ' O Swunto le Swuntoske ' , ai thodia o rat po ' E mila skamin ' ; numa nas o rat le buzhneske vai le vetseleske . Nichi , Wo lia pesko rat pesa kana avilo andre , pesko rat skepil ame katar o bezex .

text: For if the blood of bulls and of goats , and the ashes of an heifer sprinkling the unclean , sanctifieth to the purifying of the flesh :
text2: Tela o phuro zakono o rat ai zhego le zhigenange wusharde le manushen kana kerde bezex .

text: How much more shall the blood of Christ , who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without spot to God , purge your conscience from dead works to serve the living God ?
text2: Sode mai but kerel o rat le Kristosko te parhuvel amaro traio ai amare ile . Wo skepil ame katar o nekazo kana zumavas te keras so o phuro zakono phenel , ai Wo mangel ame te podais O Del o zhuvindil .

text: And for this cause he is the mediator of the new testament , that by means of death , for the redemption of the transgressions that were under the first testament , they which are called might receive the promise of eternal inheritance .
text2: O Kristo avilo le nevo kontaktosa , ai le manush sai aven andre te mangen , ai len sa le dieli kai O Del shinadia lenge ai garaven le sa data . Ke O Kristo mulo te skepil len katar e kris le bezexeski kai won kerde kana traiinas tela o phuro zakono .

text: For where a testament is , there must also of necessity be the death of the testator .
text2: Akana , te merel vari kon ai o manush mekel o ramomos , phenel , kon sai len leski dieli , wo nashti len le dieli zhi kana wo merel .

text: For a testament is of force after men are dead : otherwise it is of no strength at all while the testator liveth .
text2: O ramomos nai kanchi zhi kana o manush kai ramosardia o ramomos merel . Kana wo traiil aver manush nashti lel leske dieli kai sas shinadia les , ke wo traiil inker .

text: Whereupon neither the first testament was dedicated without blood .
text2: O phuro kontrakto trobulsardia ek martia te kerel o zakono lasho , o rat le zhigenange .

text: For when Moses had spoken every precept to all the people according to the law , he took the blood of calves and of goats , with water , and scarlet wool , and hyssop , and sprinkled both the book , and all the people ,
text2: Ai kana o Moses dino le manushen o zakono , wo porme lia o rat le zhigenango , le paiesa , lolo poxtan , ai krenga pherdi shut , ai thodia les pe klishka le zakonoski ai pe sa le manushen .

text: Saying , This is the blood of the testament which God hath enjoined unto you .
text2: O Moses phendia , " Kado si o rat le kontraktosko mashkaral tume ai O Del , o kontrakto kai O Del phendia mange te kerav tumensa . "

text: Moreover he sprinkled with blood both the tabernacle , and all the vessels of the ministry .
text2: Ai o Moses vi thodia o rat pe swunto tsera ai pe sa le swuntse dieli .

text: And almost all things are by the law purged with blood ; and without shedding of blood is no remission .
text2: O Zhidovisko zakono phenel kai pashte sa le dieli si wusharde kana thodia rat pe lende , ai bi te thol rat pe lende chi avena iertime katar lenge bezexa .

text: It was therefore necessary that the patterns of things in the heavens should be purified with these ; but the heavenly things themselves with better sacrifices than these .
text2: E swunto tsera ai le swuntse dieli andre si sar le dieli ando rhaio . Won si vuzharde ke thodia o rat pe lende . Numa le dieli ando rhaio sas vuzharde pala e mai lashi podarka .

text: For Christ is not entered into the holy places made with hands , which are the figures of the true ; but into heaven itself , now to appear in the presence of God for us :
text2: Ke O Kristo chi avilo ando swunto than ando rhaio pala so kerde le manush , ke kadia sas te sikavel so sas te avel , wo avilo ando rhaio te sikavel pes angla Del sar amaro vortako .

text: Nor yet that he should offer himself often , as the high priest entereth into the holy place every year with blood of others ;
text2: O Kristo chi dia pesko traio butivar , mai iek data ai mai iek data , sar o baro rasha pe phuv dia o sakrifis , o rat le zhigenange ando ' O Swunto le swuntoske ' swako bersh .

text: For then must he often have suffered since the foundation of the world : but now once in the end of the world hath he appeared to put away sin by the sacrifice of himself .
text2: Te kerel kodia , O Kristo trobulsardia te merel po trushul butivar , zhi de anda gor kana e lumia sas kerdi . Nichi ! Wo avilo ferdi iek data ai gata sas o phuro kontrakto , ai Wo dia pesko traio te pharhavel o bezex .

text: And as it is appointed unto men once to die , but after this the judgment :
text2: Ai sar si phendo kai le manush meren ferdi iek data , ai pala kodia avela e kris .

text: So Christ was once offered to bear the sins of many ; and unto them that look for him shall he appear the second time without sin unto salvation .
text2: Ai vi O Kristo mulo ferdi iek data sar ek sakrifis le bezexesko sa le manushenge ; ai kana Wo avela palpale e duito data , Wo chi dela pesko traio le bezexesko mai iek data , numa te anel o skepimos kal manush kai azhukeren les .

text: For the law having a shadow of good things to come , and not the very image of the things , can never with those sacrifices which they offered year by year continually make the comers thereunto perfect .
text2: O Zhidovisko zakono si sar ek patreto kai sikavel le lashe dieli kai si te aven . Le rasha dine podarki po altari ka Del sa data , bersh pala bersh . Numa le podarki chi kerde le manushen vorta ai chi skepisarde le manushen .

text: For then would they not have ceased to be offered ? because that the worshippers once purged should have had no more conscience of sins .
text2: Te kodola podarki dine ka Del dashtisarde te len lendar le bezexa , won chi mai avena doshale le bezexeske , ai won chi mai den podarki .

text: But in those sacrifices there is a remembrance again made of sins every year .
text2: Kana won dine le podarki swako bersh , serenaspe kai sas le bezex inker ,

text: For it is not possible that the blood of bulls and of goats should take away sins .
text2: ke o rat le zhigenange nashti lel lendar le bezexa .

text: Wherefore when he cometh into the world , he saith , Sacrifice and offering thou wouldest not , but a body hast thou prepared me :
text2: Kana O Kristo avilo ka e lumia , wo phendia : " O Del , Tu chi manges le zhigeni mudarde vai le podarki dine te luvudin tut . Tu kerdian murho stato ai gata te des sar ek podarka po altari .

text: In burnt offerings and sacrifices for sin thou hast had no pleasure .
text2: Tu chi san plachardo le zhigenensa kai sas mudarde vai phabarde ai dine sar podarki po altari te len lendar le bezexa .

text: Then said I , Lo , I come ( in the volume of the book it is written of me , ) to do thy will , O God .
text2: Porme phendem , ' Me avilem te kerav so tu manges , O Del . Si ramome ando Zhidovisko zakono kai kerava so manges . ' "

text: Above when he said , Sacrifice and offering and burnt offerings and offering for sin thou wouldest not , neither hadst pleasure therein ; which are offered by the law ;
text2: Porme O Kristo phendia , " Tu chi manges le zhigeni mudarde vai le podarki dine te luvudin tut pala o bezex . Tu chi san plachardo lensa . " Kadala dieli kerdion ke o zakono phenel te keren kadia .

text: Then said he , Lo , I come to do thy will , O God . He taketh away the first , that he may establish the second .
text2: Porme wo phendia , " Me avilem te kerav so tu manges ma te kerav . " Wo pharhadia o pervo kontrakto ai dia ek nevo kontrakto .

text: By the which will we are sanctified through the offering of the body of Jesus Christ once for all .
text2: Amare bezexa si vuzharde ai ame sam vuzhe ke O Kristo dia pesko stato sar ek podarka ka Del . Wo kerdia les ferdi iek data .

text: And every priest standeth daily ministering and offering oftentimes the same sacrifices , which can never take away sins :
text2: Sa le rashai beshen anda punrhende swako dies , mudaren le zhigeni ai den podarki po altari . Won den le saikfielo podarki sa data . Kadala podarki nashti len lendar lenge bezexa .

text: But this man , after he had offered one sacrifice for sins for ever , sat down on the right hand of God ;
text2: Numa O Kristo dia pesko traio ka Del iek data pala amare bezexa sar ek sakrifis , ai porme beshlo tele kai e rig e chachi le Devlesko ,

text: From henceforth expecting till his enemies be made his footstool .
text2: ai azhukerel leske duzhmanonge te aven thodine tela leske punrhe .

text: For by one offering he hath perfected for ever them that are sanctified .
text2: Ai pala iek sakrifis wo kerdia sa kodolen vorta angla Del sa data , ai won avena kerde swunto .

text: Whereof the Holy Ghost also is a witness to us : for after that he had said before ,
text2: O Swunto Duxo phendia amenge kadia , ke wo phenel ,

text: This is the covenant that I will make with them after those days , saith the Lord , I will put my laws into their hearts , and in their minds will I write them ;
text2: " Kadia si o nevo kontrakto kai kerava lensa . Kana kodia dies avela , phenel le Devles , thava murhe zakonuria ande lenge ile , ai ramov le pe lengi goji . "

text: And their sins and iniquities will I remember no more .
text2: Porme wo phenel , " Chi serav ma lenge bezexa ai lenge shubimata na mai . "

text: Now where remission of these is , there is no more offering for sin .
text2: Chi mai trobul le podarki po altari ke amare bezexa si iertimele .

text: Having therefore , brethren , boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus ,
text2: Murhe phral , akana ame zhanas kai zhas andre ando swunto than ke o rat le Jesusosko sas dino .

text: By a new and living way , which he hath consecrated for us , through the veil , that is to say , his flesh ;
text2: Kadia si o nevo drom kai si freshko ai del traio , ke O Kristo phuterdia e zanavesk kana shindili ande donde de opral zhi tele - lesko stato - te mekel ame te zhas andre ka o swunto than le Devlesko .

text: And having an high priest over the house of God ;
text2: Si ame ek Baro Rasha kai poronchil po kher le Devlesko .

text: Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith , having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience , and our bodies washed with pure water .
text2: Aven , zhas andre pasha Del le ilosa o chacho ai pherdo pachamasko . Ke lesko rat vuzhardia ame ai ke amaro stato sas xalado le paiesa o vuzho .

text: Let us hold fast the profession of our faith without wavering ; ( for he is faithful that promised ; )
text2: Akana ame sai dikhas angle ka o skepimos kai O Del shinadia amenge , inkeras amaro pachamos ai pachas , ai sai phenas le kaver manush kai o skepimos si amaro , ai O Del kerel so Wo phenel .

text: And let us consider one another to provoke unto love and to good works :
text2: Pala so wo kerdia amenge , ame trobul te zhutis iek kavreste te sikavas e dragostia ka le kaver manush ai te keras o lashimos .

text: Not forsaking the assembling of ourselves together , as the manner of some is ; but exhorting one another : and so much the more , as ye see the day approaching .
text2: Zhan kai khangeri kana le manush chidenpe andek than ande khangeri , chi keren sar uni kai chi zhan kai khangeri , pechin iek kavreste sar dikhen o dies pashol kana O Kristo avela palpale .

text: For if we sin wilfully after that we have received the knowledge of the truth , there remaineth no more sacrifice for sins ,
text2: Te mai keras o bezex mai iek data ai mai iek data kana premisardiam ai zhangliam o chachimos , nas chi iek podarka te lel amendar le bezexa .

text: But a certain fearful looking for of judgment and fiery indignation , which shall devour the adversaries .
text2: Numa le manush trobul te beshen anda punrhende angla Del ai po kodo dies O Del phenel lenge , " Tume san doshale " ai le iaga le iadoske phabola len ai sa leske duzhmanon .

text: He that despised Moses ' law died without mercy under two or three witnesses :
text2: Kana o manush chi kerdia o zakono le Mosesosko , wo sas mudardo bi la milasa pala le vorbi katar dui vai trin marturia .

text: Of how much sorer punishment , suppose ye , shall he be thought worthy , who hath trodden under foot the Son of God , and hath counted the blood of the covenant , wherewith he was sanctified , an unholy thing , and hath done despite unto the Spirit of grace ?
text2: Ai suguro tume sai zhanen ke vari kon kai phirel po Shav le Devlesko , kerdia sar nai kanchi o rat le kontraktosko kai vuzhardo les , ai kerdia sar o rat nas swunto , ai asanas pe leste ai marenas mui pa Swunto Duxo . O Swunto Duxo kai anel e mila le Devleski ka le shave le Devleske .

text: For we know him that hath said , Vengeance belongeth unto me , I will recompense , saith the Lord . And again , The Lord shall judge his people .
text2: Ke ame zhanas kai O Del phendia , " Me pochinav palpale so si te avel lenge . " Ai mai iek data phendia , " Le Devles phenela kon si doshalo mashkar lesko narodo . "

text: It is a fearful thing to fall into the hands of the living God .
text2: Si e darai diela te perel ande le vas le Devlesko o zhuvindil !

text: But call to remembrance the former days , in which , after ye were illuminated , ye endured a great fight of afflictions ;
text2: Seren tume sar sas ande kodola dies kana ashundian o chachimos . Chinuisardian but .

text: Partly , whilst ye were made a gazingstock both by reproaches and afflictions ; and partly , whilst ye became companions of them that were so used .
text2: Le manush asanas pe tumende ai marde tume . Kana le kaver chinuisarde , tume chinuisardian lensa .

text: For ye had compassion of me in my bonds , and took joyfully the spoiling of your goods , knowing in yourselves that ye have in heaven a better and an enduring substance .
text2: Sas tume mila anda lende kai sas ande temnitsa . Sas tume o raduimos kana chire dieli sas line tumendar . Ke tume zhanglian kai avela tume vari so mai mishto ando rhaio kai beshel sa data .

text: Cast not away therefore your confidence , which hath great recompence of reward .
text2: Chi meken cho pachamos te merel , chiri pochin avela baro .

text: For ye have need of patience , that , after ye have done the will of God , ye might receive the promise .
text2: Trobul te azhukeren ai te na aterdion . Kana kerdian so manglia O Del tumendar , O Del del tume so shinadia tumen .

text: For yet a little while , and he that shall come will come , and will not tarry .
text2: O Swunto ramomos phenel , " Pe xantsi vriama wo avela palpale .

text: Now the just shall live by faith : but if any man draw back , my soul shall have no pleasure in him .
text2: Numa o manush kai kerel vorta angla mande traiil ando pachamos , ai te zhal dur mandar , me chi plachaia ma lesa . "

text: But we are not of them who draw back unto perdition ; but of them that believe to the saving of the soul .
text2: Ai ame sam nai anda lende kai zhan dur lestar ai si xasarde , numa si ame pachamos te avas skepime katar e kris le bezexeski .

text: Now faith is the substance of things hoped for , the evidence of things not seen .
text2: So si o pachamos ? Si te zhanas kai so godi mangas avela , ai azhukeras pala leste , numa nashti dikhas les inker .

text: For by it the elders obtained a good report .
text2: Le shave le Devleske kai traiisarde de but bersh palpale sas le pachamos .

text: Through faith we understand that the worlds were framed by the word of God , so that things which are seen were not made of things which do appear .
text2: Pala pachamos ame haliaras kai e lumia sas kerde pala E Vorba le Devleski . Le dieli kai dikhas nas kerde anda le dieli kai chi dichile .

text: By faith Abel offered unto God a more excellent sacrifice than Cain , by which he obtained witness that he was righteous , God testifying of his gifts : and by it he being dead yet speaketh .
text2: Pala pachamos o Abel kerdia vorta angla Del ai andia ek podarka , ek sakrifis ka Del kai sas mai mishto sar le Cainosko . Plachaiales O Del . O Del premisardia o Abel ai premisardia leski podarki . O Abel mulo , numa pala lesko pachamos wo del duma amende vi adies .

text: By faith Enoch was translated that he should not see death ; and was not found , because God had translated him : for before his translation he had this testimony , that he pleased God .
text2: Pale pachamos o Enoch sas lino ando rhaio bi te merel . Strazo nas kotse ke O Del lino les . Le manush nashtisarde te arakhen les ke sas lino lendar . Mai anglal te kerdiolpe kadia diela O Del phendias , ' Plachaiama le Enochosa . '

text: But without faith it is impossible to please him : for he that cometh to God must believe that he is , and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him .
text2: O manush nashti plachal O Del te nas les pachamos , vari kon kai avel ka Del trobul te pachal kai wo si . Wo musai zhanel kai O Del del so si shinadia kodoleske kai roden leske .

text: By faith Noah , being warned of God of things not seen as yet , moved with fear , prepared an ark to the saving of his house ; by the which he condemned the world , and became heir of the righteousness which is by faith .
text2: Pala pachamos o Noah , kana ashundia so phendia O Del pala terhara wo kerdia ek baro barzha pala leski vitsa darasa . O Del phendia leske so si te kerdiol . Lesko pachamos kerdia les te ashunel ka Del ai kerel so O Del phendia leske . Leski vitsa sas skepime katar e martia ke wo kerdia e barzha . Pala lesko pachamos , o Noah doshardia e lumia ai avilo vorta le Devlesa ke sas les pachamos ando Del .

text: By faith Abraham , when he was called to go out into a place which he should after receive for an inheritance , obeyed ; and he went out , not knowing whither he went .
text2: Pala pachamos o Abraham kerdia sar manglia O Del kana O Del akhardia les te mekel lesko kher ai zhal dur ando aver them kai O Del shinadia to del les . Wo Meklia lesko kher bi te zhanel kay zhal .

text: By faith he sojourned in the land of promise , as in a strange country , dwelling in tabernacles with Isaac and Jacob , the heirs with him of the same promise :
text2: Lesko pachamos ando Del zhutisardia les kana traiilas sar ek streino ando aver them kai O Del shinadia les . O Isak ai o Iakov premisarde so sas shinado ka Abraham . Savorhe traiinas ande le tseri andek than .

text: For he looked for a city which hath foundations , whose builder and maker is God .
text2: Numa o Abraham azhukerelas pala o foro kai si les zurale fundania , kai O Del phenel sar te kerel les , ai wo kerel les .

text: Through faith also Sara herself received strength to conceive seed , and was delivered of a child when she was past age , because she judged him faithful who had promised .
text2: Pala pachamos e Sarah sas la ek glata kana sas pra phuri te avela la ek glata . Sas la pachamos te pachal kai O Del kerela so wo shinadia .

text: Therefore sprang there even of one , and him as good as dead , so many as the stars of the sky in multitude , and as the sand which is by the sea shore innumerable .
text2: O Abraham sas pra phuro te avela iek glata leste , numa katar o Abraham avili ek vitsa antrego , kai sas but miliwoia zhene sar le chererhaia ando cheri ai sar e chishai pe berego , nashti te jinas len ke kadia but si .

text: These all died in faith , not having received the promises , but having seen them afar off , and were persuaded of them , and embraced them , and confessed that they were strangers and pilgrims on the earth .
text2: Sa kadala zhene mule ai sas le pachamos ando Del . Numa chi premisarde so O Del shinadia lenge . Won dikhle angle karing ka le dieli O Del shinadia lenge ai raduime sas . Won zhanenas ke sas streinuria katse . Kadia phuv sas lengo kher .

text: For they that say such things declare plainly that they seek a country .
text2: Le manush kai phenen kadala vorbi sikaven kai azhukeren pala aver them kai si pengo .

text: And truly , if they had been mindful of that country from whence they came out , they might have had opportunity to have returned .
text2: Won chi gindin pa o them kai mekle , te gindinas pa o them , amborim mangenas te zhan palpale .

text: But now they desire a better country , that is , an heavenly : wherefore God is not ashamed to be called their God : for he hath prepared for them a city .
text2: Numa won mangenas o them kai si mai mishto . Ai O Del nai lazhal te avel akhardo lengo Del . Wo lashardia ek foro lenge .

text: By faith Abraham , when he was tried , offered up Isaac : and he that had received the promises offered up his only begotten son ,
text2: Pala pachamos o Abraham kana sas zumado , dia pesko shav o Isak sar ek podarka po altari ka Del . O Del shinadia ke wo sas te del o Abraham ek shav , ai inker o Abraham mangelas te kerel so manglia O Del lestar , ai del lesko shav ka Del .

text: Of whom it was said , That in Isaac shall thy seed be called :
text2: O Del phendia ka Abraham , " Chi vitsa avela katar o Isak . "

text: Accounting that God was able to raise him up , even from the dead ; from whence also he received him in a figure .
text2: O Abraham pachaiape kai O Del sai vazdelpe lesko shav palpale ka traio , ai sai phenas kai o Abraham premisardia les palpale katar e martia .

text: By faith Isaac blessed Jacob and Esau concerning things to come .
text2: Pala pachamos O Isak swuntosardia o Iakov ai o Esau anda so avela mai angle .

text: By faith Jacob , when he was a dying , blessed both the sons of Joseph ; and worshipped , leaning upon the top of his staff .
text2: Pala pachamos o Iakov kana merelas , phendia kai o lashimos avela po swako shav le Josefoske kana wo merelas . Kana rhugilaspe ka Del wo lia o rhai te inkerel les .

text: By faith Joseph , when he died , made mention of the departing of the children of Israel ; and gave commandment concerning his bones .
text2: Pala pachamos o Josef kana merelas , dia duma pa le Zhiduvuria ai kana sas te zhantar anda o them Egypt , ai phendia lenge te gropon lesko stato kai zhan .

text: By faith Moses , when he was born , was hid three months of his parents , because they saw he was a proper child ; and they were not afraid of the king ' s commandment .
text2: Pala pachamos , o Moses kana sas biandilo , lesko dat ai leski dei garade les trin shon , ke won dikhle ke wo sas ek shukar glata ; ai nas daran katar o amperato kana wo phendia te mudaren sa le tsinorhe shave .
