text: By faith Moses , when he was come to years , refused to be called the son of Pharaoh ' s daughter ;
text2: Pala pachamos o Moses chi mangela te avel akhardo o shav le Pharoahoski shei kana barilo .

text: Choosing rather to suffer affliction with the people of God , than to enjoy the pleasures of sin for a season ;
text2: Wo alosardia te chinuil le narodosa le Devleske , de sar te plachal le dieli le bezexenge .

text: Esteeming the reproach of Christ greater riches than the treasures in Egypt : for he had respect unto the recompence of the reward .
text2: Wo gindisardia ke sas mai mishto te chinuil pala so shinadia O Kristo sar te lel sa o barimos le themesko , Egypt . Wo dikhelas po Del ai wo lela leski pochin katar O Del .

text: By faith he forsook Egypt , not fearing the wrath of the king : for he endured , as seeing him who is invisible .
text2: Pala pachamos o Moses gelotar andai Egypt . Wo nas daral katar o amperato kai sas xoliariko . O Moses kerdia vorta angla Del , ai dikhelas O Del angle leste .

text: Through faith he kept the passover , and the sprinkling of blood , lest he that destroyed the firstborn should touch them .
text2: Pala pachamos o Moses garadia o Baro Dies le Zhidovongo ai te mudaren ek bakro sar O Del phendia lenge , ai te thon o rat opral le vudara lenge khera , antunchi o angelo le martiako nashtisardia te mudarel o pervo shav kai sas biandilo ando swako kher .

text: By faith they passed through the Red sea as by dry land : which the Egyptians assaying to do were drowned .
text2: Pala pachamos le Zhiduvuria nakhle inchal e Maria Loli sar sas e phuv shuki . Kana le manush le Egyptanoske zumade te nakhen inchal , mudarde sas le paiesa .

text: By faith the walls of Jericho fell down , after they were compassed about seven days .
text2: Pala pachamos le ziduria le forosko Jericho pele tele palal le Zhiduvuria phirade kruglom o foro pala efta diesa .

text: By faith the harlot Rahab perished not with them that believed not , when she had received the spies with peace .
text2: Pala pachamos e Rahab ek kurvia nas mudardia lensa kai chi kerde sar mangel O Del . Woi zhutisardia le manush kai avile chordanes te dikhen o them .

text: And what shall I more say ? for the time would fail me to tell of Gedeon , and of Barak , and of Samson , and of Jephthae ; of David also , and Samuel , and of the prophets :
text2: So mai phenav ? Nas dosta vriama te phenav pa Gideon , ai o Barak , ai o Samson , ai o Jephthah , ai o David , ai o Samuel , ai sa le profeturia .

text: Who through faith subdued kingdoms , wrought righteousness , obtained promises , stopped the mouths of lions ,
text2: Sas pala lengo pachamos kai nirisarde le marimata andel aver thema . Won poronchinas mishto , premisarde so O Del shinadia lenge , won phandade le muia le lioneske ,

text: Quenched the violence of fire , escaped the edge of the sword , out of weakness were made strong , waxed valiant in fight , turned to flight the armies of the aliens .
text2: ai aterdile e iag kai phabolas , won nashle andal sabia ai nas mudarde , kana won sas naswale vai kovle won pele sas kerde zurale . Zurale sas ando marimos . Won kerde le manush kai marenas andal aver thema te nashen khere .

text: Women received their dead raised to life again : and others were tortured , not accepting deliverance ; that they might obtain a better resurrection :
text2: Pala pachamos uni zhuvlia premisarde lenge mule palpale ka traio . Uni alosarde te aven marde de sar te zhan ivia , ke chi mangle te zhan dur katar O Del . Anda kodia , won avena vazdine ka o traio kai si mai mishto .

text: And others had trial of cruel mockings and scourgings , yea , moreover of bonds and imprisonment :
text2: Le manus marenas mui lendar , ai marde uni anda lende , uni sas thodine ande temnitsa ai uni sas phandade le lantsonsa .

text: They were stoned , they were sawn asunder , were tempted , were slain with the sword : they wandered about in sheepskins and goatskins ; being destitute , afflicted , tormented ;
text2: Uni sas mudarde le baxensa . Uni sas shinde ande kotora . Won sas zumade . Uni sas mudarde le sabiensa . Won line pe lende le morchi katar le bakre ai buzhne ai nai le kanchi , won sas bokhale ai naswale , nas dosta lenge , won phiravenaspe ande pusta ai pel plaia , garade andel gropuria . Won sas pra lashe pala kadia lumia .

text: And these all , having obtained a good report through faith , received not the promise :
text2: Sas pala lengo pachamos ke O Del sas plachaiales lensa . Numa chi premisarde so Del shinadia lenge .

text: God having provided some better thing for us , that they without us should not be made perfect .
text2: O Del si les vari so mai mishto amenge . Kodola manush nashti kerdile vorta bi amensa .

text: Wherefore seeing we also are compassed about with so great a cloud of witnesses , let us lay aside every weight , and the sin which doth so easily beset us , and let us run with patience the race that is set before us ,
text2: Sa kadala manush kai sas le pachamos ando Del akana si chidine kruglom amendar , ai dikhen pe amende . Shudas amendar vari so kai ingerel ame dur katar O Del , ai le bezexa kai atsaven ame , ai mek ame te nashas le rhavdasa ando nirimos kai O Del thodia angla amende .

text: Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith ; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross , despising the shame , and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God .
text2: Sa data dikhas po Jesus , amaro pasturi ai sicharatori la pachamosko . Wo chi aterdilo kana trobulas te chinuil lazhav ai merel po trushul . Wo zhanglia le raduimasko kai sas te avel les mai palal . Akana wo beshel tele pe rik e chachi le Devleski , o than le luvudimasko .

text: For consider him that endured such contradiction of sinners against himself , lest ye be wearied and faint in your minds .
text2: Le bezexale manush dine duma zhungale pa Kristo . Wo sas kerdo lazhav katar le bezexale manush . Te na aves kovlo vai chino gindis pa leski rhavda kana le bezexale manush chinuisaren tu .

text: Ye have not yet resisted unto blood , striving against sin .
text2: Tu chi mardian o bezex , ai o zumaimos zhi kai le paia kai zhanas pa tute kerdionas sar bambi rateske kai perenas pe phuv .

text: And ye have forgotten the exhortation which speaketh unto you as unto children , My son , despise not thou the chastening of the Lord , nor faint when thou art rebuked of him :
text2: Seren tume so Del phendia tumenge kana akhardia tume leske shave ? " Murho shav , na xoliavos kana O Del sicharel tu vorta . Na nekezhis kana O Del trobul te sikavel tut kai chi keres vorta .

text: For whom the Lord loveth he chasteneth , and scourgeth every son whom he receiveth .
text2: Ke O Del sicharel kodola kai drago leske , ai del sa kodolen palma ke si leske shave .

text: If ye endure chastening , God dealeth with you as with sons ; for what son is he whom the father chasteneth not ?
text2: Mek O Del te sicharel tume , ke wo kerel sar o dat kerel pala leske shaven ke si les e dragostia lenge . Kon ashundia ke o dat chi sicharel lesko shav vai chi del lesko shav palma ?

text: But if ye be without chastisement , whereof all are partakers , then are ye bastards , and not sons .
text2: Te na del tu palma O Del , kana tu trobulas sar le kaver dada keren lenge shavensa , antunchi kadia znachil ke tu chi san o shav le Devlesko , ai tu chi san ande leski familia .

text: Furthermore we have had fathers of our flesh which corrected us , and we gave them reverence : shall we not much rather be in subjection unto the Father of spirits , and live ?
text2: Amare dada pe phuv dine ame palma , ai sas ame respektimos lenge . Sode mai but trobul te keras vorta angla amaro Del kai si ando rhaio ai traiis ?

text: For they verily for a few days chastened us after their own pleasure ; but he for our profit , that we might be partakers of his holiness .
text2: Pala xantsi vriama amare dada pe phuv dine ame palma kana won gindisarde kai trobul ame palma . Numa O Del del ame palma pala amaro lashimos , te avas swunto sar Wo si Swunto .

text: Now no chastening for the present seemeth to be joyous , but grievous : nevertheless afterward it yieldeth the peaceable fruit of righteousness unto them which are exercised thereby .
text2: Nai raduimos kana del ame palma . Trutno si , numa mai palal sai dikhas o lashimos kai avilo katar les , ai del ame e pacha ke ame sam vorta le Devlesa .

text: Wherefore lift up the hands which hang down , and the feeble knees ;
text2: Vazden le vas kai sas kovle . Beshen anda punrhende .

text: And make straight paths for your feet , lest that which is lame be turned out of the way ; but let it rather be healed .
text2: Ai phiren sade vorta po lasho drom pala che punrhe , ai kodola kai lenpe pale tute , le kovle ai le bange punrhensa , chi peren ai chi dukhaven len , numa aven zurale .

text: Follow peace with all men , and holiness , without which no man shall see the Lord :
text2: Chi marenas mui iek kavresa ai zumaven te traiin ek lasho ai swunto traio . Traiin ande pacha . Khonik chi dikhel le Devles te na avela swunto .

text: Looking diligently lest any man fail of the grace of God ; lest any root of bitterness springing up trouble you , and thereby many be defiled ;
text2: Len sama iek kavreske te na avela chi iek anda tumende te faltil te arakhel o mishtimos le Devlesko . Le sama te na avela chorhe ginduria mashkar tumende , ke kerena but baiuria , ai dukhaven but manush kai pachanpe ando Del ai uni durion katar O Del pala kodia .

text: Lest there be any fornicator , or profane person , as Esau , who for one morsel of meat sold his birthright .
text2: Le sama te na avela iek anda tumende kai kerel zhungalimos le statosa vai te bustrel le Devles sar kerdia o Esau . Wo dia lesko mishtimos ka lesko phral pala iek tiari xabeneski .

text: For ye know how that afterward , when he would have inherited the blessing , he was rejected : for he found no place of repentance , though he sought it carefully with tears .
text2: O Esau sas o mai phuro phral ai sas les o mishtimos , numa xasardia les . Ai mai palal kana wo manglia lesko mishtimos palpale , sas pra pozno , vi te roven le asuensa le keinimaske . Seren tume , ai arakhen tume .

text: For ye are not come unto the mount that might be touched , and that burned with fire , nor unto blackness , and darkness , and tempest ,
text2: Tume chi avilian sar le Zhiduvuria avile mui moste le darasa vai izdraimasa , kai phabolas e iag , kai si tuniariko , ai ek bari barval , sar sas po plai Sinai kana O Del dia lenge leske zakonuria .

text: And the sound of a trumpet , and the voice of words ; which voice they that heard intreated that the word should not be spoken to them any more :
text2: Ai ashunde o bashamos katar ek tutaraza , ai o glaso le Devlesko dia duma . Le manush tsipisarde ka o Moses te phenel O Del te na mai del duma lensa .

text: ( For they could not endure that which was commanded , And if so much as a beast touch the mountain , it shall be stoned , or thrust through with a dart :
text2: Ke won nashtisarde te ashunen ka leske zurale vorbi , " Vi te avel ek zhigeni po plai , musai avel mudardo . "

text: And so terrible was the sight , that Moses said , I exceedingly fear and quake : )
text2: Ai so o Moses dikhlia sas kadia trutno kai phendia , " Me sim pherdo darasa ai izdraimasa . "

text: But ye are come unto mount Sion , and unto the city of the living God , the heavenly Jerusalem , and to an innumerable company of angels ,
text2: Numa tume , avilian ka o Plai Zion , ka o foro le Devlesko o zhuvindil , o Jerusalem le rhaiosko , ai ka le miliwoia angelonge ;

text: To the general assembly and church of the firstborn , which are written in heaven , and to God the Judge of all , and to the spirits of just men made perfect ,
text2: ai ka e khangeri , kai si le shave le Devleske , ai lenge anava si ramome ando rhaio ;

text: And to Jesus the mediator of the new covenant , and to the blood of sprinkling , that speaketh better things than that of Abel .
text2: ai ka Jesus o ablakato savorhenge , ai ka le duxuria le shave le Devleske kai si ando rhaio , vunzhe kerde vorta ; ai Jesus , Wo si katse , kai andia lesko lasho nevo kontrakto , ai ka o rat kai iertil le bezexa kai si ma mishto sar kodia le Abelosko .

text: See that ye refuse not him that speaketh . For if they escaped not who refused him that spake on earth , much more shall not we escape , if we turn away from him that speaketh from heaven :
text2: Aves suguro te ashunes ka kodo kai del duma tute . Ke le Zhiduvuria chi kerde so manglia O Del kana o zakono le Devlesko sas dino lenge pe phuv , won chi gele ivia , sas dosharde ke chi mangen te ashunen ka Moses , le Devlesko podaitori .

text: Whose voice then shook the earth : but now he hath promised , saying , Yet once more I shake not the earth only , but also heaven .
text2: Avela mai nasul amenge te na ashunas ka Del kana wo del duma andai rhaio . Po plai le Sinaesko , o glaso le Devlesko mishkisardia e phuv , numa akana , wo shinadia , phenelas , " Mai iek data mishkiva e lumia ai le cheri . "

text: And this word , Yet once more , signifieth the removing of those things that are shaken , as of things that are made , that those things which cannot be shaken may remain .
text2: Kana O Del phenelas , " Mai iek data " Wo znachil kai le dieli kai si mishkisarde si le dieli la lumiake kai si kerde , won avena parhude . Ai le dieli kai chi mishkirin avena mekle .

text: Wherefore we receiving a kingdom which cannot be moved , let us have grace , whereby we may serve God acceptably with reverence and godly fear :
text2: Si ame ek amperetsia kai nai kanch sai pharhavel , mek ame te podais le Devles le ilosa pherdo naisimos , ai rhugimos le luvudimasa ai darasa .

text: For our God is a consuming fire .
text2: Ke amaro Del si ek iag kai pharhavel swako fielo .

text: Let brotherly love continue .
text2: Drago tumenge iek kavreske sa data .

text: Be not forgetful to entertain strangers : for thereby some have entertained angels unawares .
text2: Na bustren te aven lashe le streinonge ai meken le te beshen ando cho kher . Uni manush sas le le angelon ando lenge khera bi te zhanen les .

text: Remember them that are in bonds , as bound with them ; and them which suffer adversity , as being yourselves also in the body .
text2: Seren tume kodola ande temnitsa , gindin pa lende sar te sanas tu ande temnitsa lensa . Den tume goji ka kodola kai chinuin ke kolaver manush kerde nasul pe lende . Tu sai chinuis sakadia .

text: Marriage is honourable in all , and the bed undefiled : but whoremongers and adulterers God will judge .
text2: Savorhe trobul te respektin o meritimos . O Del dosharela kodola kai keren zhungale le statosa ai kurvisia , ai kodola kai chi keren vorta ando meritimos .

text: Let your conversation be without covetousness ; and be content with such things as ye have : for he hath said , I will never leave thee , nor forsake thee .
text2: Beshen dur katar e dragostia le lovenge , ai aven raduime pala so si tume . Ke O Del phendia , " Shoxar chi faltiv tut , vai chi mekav tu korkorho . "

text: So that we may boldly say , The Lord is my helper , and I will not fear what man shall do unto me .
text2: Anda kodia , sai phenes , " Le Devles si murho zhutitori . Chi darav katar vari so kai o manush sai kerel pe mande . "

text: Remember them which have the rule over you , who have spoken unto you the word of God : whose faith follow , considering the end of their conversation .
text2: Seren tume kodola kai sicharde tume E Vorba le Devleski . Gindin pa lende ai sar won traiisarde angla Del ai pachaiepe ando Del , zumaven te pachas ando Del sar lende .

text: Jesus Christ the same yesterday , and to day , and for ever .
text2: O Jesus Kristo si saikfielo arachi , adies , ai sa data .

text: Be not carried about with divers and strange doctrines . For it is a good thing that the heart be established with grace ; not with meats , which have not profited them that have been occupied therein .
text2: Na mek le xoxamle sicharimata te ingeren tume po drom kai nai vorta angla Del . Amare ile aven zurale katar o mishtimos le Devlesko , ai nai katar le zakonuria pa xabe , so te xas , o zakono kai chi zhutisardia kodola kai zumade kodia .

text: We have an altar , whereof they have no right to eat which serve the tabernacle .
text2: Si ame ek altari , o trushul kai O Kristo sas karfome , kai kodola mai roden o skepimos te keren so phenel o Zhidovisko zakono , won chi aven zhutisarde .

text: For the bodies of those beasts , whose blood is brought into the sanctuary by the high priest for sin , are burned without the camp .
text2: Tela le zakonuria le Zhidovonge o baro rasha andino o rat katar le mudarde zhigani ando swunto than sar ek sakrifis pala le bezexa , numa le staturia le zhigenange si phabarde avri anda o foro .

text: Wherefore Jesus also , that he might sanctify the people with his own blood , suffered without the gate .
text2: Ai vi O Jesus chinuisardia ai mulo avrial o foro kai lesko rat vuzhardo ame katar amare bezexa .

text: Let us go forth therefore unto him without the camp , bearing his reproach .
text2: Aven , zhas ka leste avrial o foro ( avrial o raduimos la lumiako ) ai te avas lazhav lesa ai te chinuis lesa .

text: For here have we no continuing city , but we seek one to come .
text2: Ke kadia lumia nai amaro kher . Ame dikhas karing amaro kher ando rhaio kai beshel sa data .

text: By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually , that is , the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name .
text2: Das naisimos ka Del sa data pala O Jesus Kristo . Amari podarki ka leste si te das o naisimos , ai te das o luvudimos ka lesko anav .

text: But to do good and to communicate forget not : for with such sacrifices God is well pleased .
text2: Sa data keren o lashimos ai chi bustren te zhutin kodola kai trobul o zhutimos . Ke kodola sakrifikaturia plachal le Devles .

text: Obey them that have the rule over you , and submit yourselves : for they watch for your souls , as they that must give account , that they may do it with joy , and not with grief : for that is unprofitable for you .
text2: Keren sar tumare bare pasturia phenen tumenge , ke won musai den atweto ka Del sar won len sama tumare duxuria . Won trobun te phenen ka Del so kerde . Keren anda kodia ek raduimos lenge , ai na nekazo , te nekezhin , kodia chi zhutil tume .

text: Pray for us : for we trust we have a good conscience , in all things willing to live honestly .
text2: Rhuginpe ande amende . Amaro ilo phenel amenge ke sam vorta . Ame mangas te keras vorta sa data .

text: But I beseech you the rather to do this , that I may be restored to you the sooner .
text2: Rhugin tume ande mande mai but te avava palpale tumende mai sigo .

text: Now the God of peace , that brought again from the dead our Lord Jesus , that great shepherd of the sheep , through the blood of the everlasting covenant ,
text2: O Del si O Del la pachako , wo vazdino amaro Devles O Jesus anda le mule . O Jesus si o lasho pastuxo le bakrange , lesko rat kerdia o nevo kontrakto kai beshel sa data .

text: Make you perfect in every good work to do his will , working in you that which is wellpleasing in his sight , through Jesus Christ ; to whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: O Del la pachako del tume swako lasho diela kai trobul tu te keres leski voia , ai wo kerel ande amende so plachal les pala O Jesus Kristo . Ai ka Kristo avel o luvudimos . Sa data ai sagda ! Amen .

text: And I beseech you , brethren , suffer the word of exhortation : for I have written a letter unto you in few words .
text2: Murhe phral , mangav tumendar te ashunen kadala vorbi kai zhutin tume . Kadia si o skurto lil .

text: Know ye that our brother Timothy is set at liberty ; with whom , if he come shortly , I will see you .
text2: Mangav tume te zhanen kai o Timote anklisto avri andai temnitsa . Te avela mai sigo , anava les mansa kana avava te dikhav tume .

text: Salute all them that have the rule over you , and all the saints . They of Italy salute you .
text2: Tradav tumare bare pasturia ai sa kodolen kai si shave le Kristoske but bax , zor ai sastimos . Le shave le Devleske andai Italia kai si katse mansa traden tume but bax , zor ai sastimos .

text: Grace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Te avel tume savorhen o mishtimos le Devlesko .

text: James , a servant of God and of the Lord Jesus Christ , to the twelve tribes which are scattered abroad , greeting .
text2: Katar o Iakov , e sluga le Devlesko ai le Devles Jesus Kristosko : kal desh u dui vitsa kai si hulade pe sa e lumia .

text: My brethren , count it all joy when ye fall into divers temptations ;
text2: Murhe phral ! Jinen tumen sar raduime kana san zumade katar but dieli ,

text: Knowing this , that the trying of your faith worketh patience .
text2: ke zhanen , ke te inkerela tumaro pachamos kal zumaimata , antunchi avela e rhavda .

text: But let patience have her perfect work , that ye may be perfect and entire , wanting nothing .
text2: Numa meken te kerel e rhavda peski buchi mishto , saxke porme te aven vorta ande soste godi , ai te na trobul tume kanchi .

text: If any of you lack wisdom , let him ask of God , that giveth to all men liberally , and upbraideth not ; and it shall be given him .
text2: Numa te si iek anda tumende kai chi haliarel , trobul te mangel katar O Del , te del les te haliarel , ai O Del dela les ; ke O Del del savorhen but ai lashimasa .

text: But let him ask in faith , nothing wavering . For he that wavereth is like a wave of the sea driven with the wind and tossed .
text2: Numa o manush trobul te mangel le pachamasa , bi te mothol dela ma vai nichi . Ke o manush kai chi pachal ke lel so mangel kodo manush si sar iek talazo la mariako kai e barval vazdel ai spidel pe swako rik .

text: For let not that man think that he shall receive any thing of the Lord .
text2: Ai kasavestar manush te na gindil ke lela vari so katar O Kristo ;

text: A double minded man is unstable in all his ways .
text2: ke dui ginduria si les , ai chi zhanel so mangel .

text: Let the brother of low degree rejoice in that he is exalted :
text2: O phral o chorho trobul te luvudilpe ke O Del vazdel les .

text: But the rich , in that he is made low : because as the flower of the grass he shall pass away .
text2: Ai o phral o barvalo , te luvudilpe ke mekel les O Del tele , ke o barvalo nakhela sar iek luluji .

text: For the sun is no sooner risen with a burning heat , but it withereth the grass , and the flower thereof falleth , and the grace of the fashion of it perisheth : so also shall the rich man fade away in his ways .
text2: O kham wushtel peske bare tachimasa , ai shucharel e char , ai e luluji perel , ai lake shuk zhaltar ; no sakadia o barvalo zhalatar mashkar peske bucha .

text: Blessed is the man that endureth temptation : for when he is tried , he shall receive the crown of life , which the Lord hath promised to them that love him .
text2: Raduime te avel o manush kai inkerel kana si zumado , ke porme pala kodia kana avela zumado avela les dini e konona le traioski , kai O Kristo shinadia kodolenge kai si leske drago .

text: Let no man say when he is tempted , I am tempted of God : for God cannot be tempted with evil , neither tempteth he any man :
text2: Kana si vari kon zumado , chi trobul te mothol , " O Del zumavel ma . " Ke O Del nashtil te avel zumado katar o nasulimos , ai chi zumavel chi wo kanikas .

text: But every man is tempted , when he is drawn away of his own lust , and enticed .
text2: Numa swako manush si zumado , kana si tsirdino ai lino ande atsaimos katar pesko chorho gindo .

text: Then when lust hath conceived , it bringeth forth sin : and sin , when it is finished , bringeth forth death .
text2: Ai antunchi o chorho gindo anel o bezex ; ai kana o bezex kerdilo , antunchi avel e martia .

text: Do not err , my beloved brethren .
text2: Na shubin tume , murhe kuchi phral !

text: Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above , and cometh down from the Father of lights , with whom is no variableness , neither shadow of turning .
text2: So godi lashimos kai si dino ai so godi podarki lashe anda cheri aven katar O Del , O Del kai kerel le vediari kai si ando cheri , O Del shoxar chi parhudiol , ai chi kerel chi iek tuniariko la vushalinasa .

text: Of his own will begat he us with the word of truth , that we should be a kind of firstfruits of his creatures .
text2: Peska voiatar wo dia ame o traio katar e Vorba e chachi , saxke te avas le pervi mashkar sa le dieli kai kerdia .

text: Wherefore , my beloved brethren , let every man be swift to hear , slow to speak , slow to wrath :
text2: Den tume mishto goji kacha diela , murhe kuchi phral ! Ke swako manush trobul te ashunel but , numa te na grebilpe te del duma , ai te na xoliavol sigo .

text: For the wrath of man worketh not the righteousness of God .
text2: Ke kana iek manush si xoliariko chi kerel so si vorta angla Del .

text: Wherefore lay apart all filthiness and superfluity of naughtiness , and receive with meekness the engrafted word , which is able to save your souls .
text2: Anda kodia shuden so godi meliarel , ai so godi anel le chingara , ai premin pachival les e Vorba kai O Del thol ande tumare ile , ai kai sai skepil tume .

text: But be ye doers of the word , and not hearers only , deceiving your own selves .
text2: Na dziliaren tume , tume korkorho ferdi ke ashunen E Vorba le Devleski , numa keren so mothol .

text: For if any be a hearer of the word , and not a doer , he is like unto a man beholding his natural face in a glass :
text2: Ke o manush kai ashunel E Vorba le Devleski , ai chi kerel so mothol , wo si sar iek manush kai dikhelpe ande glinda ai dikhel sar lo .

text: For he beholdeth himself , and goeth his way , and straightway forgetteth what manner of man he was .
text2: Ai porme kana dikhliape zhaltar , ai strazo bustrel sar sas .

text: But whoso looketh into the perfect law of liberty , and continueth therein , he being not a forgetful hearer , but a doer of the work , this man shall be blessed in his deed .
text2: Numa koko kai lel sama mishto ka zakono o chacho kai skepil ame , ai kai chi mai mekel les , ai kai chi ferdi raduilpe te ashunel , ai porme te bustrel , numa kai kerel so mothol , kodo manush avela swuntsome katar O Del ande so godi kerela .

text: If any man among you seem to be religious , and bridleth not his tongue , but deceiveth his own heart , this man ' s religion is vain .
text2: Te mothola vari kon ke pachalpe ando Del , ai te nashtila te inkerel peski ship , wo dziliarel pe pes , ai ande soste mothol ke pachalpe , chi mol kanchi .

text: Pure religion and undefiled before God and the Father is this , To visit the fatherless and widows in their affliction , and to keep himself unspotted from the world .
text2: Le devlekane kai si vuzhi ai chachi angla Del amaro Dat si te le sama katar le sirotki ai katar le phivlia ande pengo chino , ai arakh tu katar le dieli la lumiake kai sai rimon tu .

text: My brethren , have not the faith of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Lord of glory , with respect of persons .
text2: Murhe phral ! Tume kai traiin ando pachamos , ande amaro luvudime Devles O Jesus Kristo , trobul te keren swakone manushesa iek fielo ,

text: For if there come unto your assembly a man with a gold ring , in goodly apparel , and there come in also a poor man in vile raiment ;
text2: ke te dela iek manush barvalo ande tumari khangeri kai si les angrusti sumnakuni , ai kai si mishto vuriardo , ai te dela vi iek manush ande khangeri kai si chorho kai si les tsalia phurane ;

text: And ye have respect to him that weareth the gay clothing , and say unto him , Sit thou here in a good place ; and say to the poor , Stand thou there , or sit here under my footstool :
text2: Ai te respektina le manushes kai si mishto vuriardo , ai te mothona leske , " Besh kata po than o lasho " , ai te mothona kodoleske kai si chorho , " Tu besh ande punrhende , vai besh tele pasha murhe punrhe . "

text: Are ye not then partial in yourselves , and are become judges of evil thoughts ?
text2: Tume ande tumende sikaven kon si tumenge mai drago , ai dosharen ande tumaro gindo .

text: Hearken , my beloved brethren , Hath not God chosen the poor of this world rich in faith , and heirs of the kingdom which he hath promised to them that love him ?
text2: Ashunen , murhe kuchi phral ! O Del alosardia le chorhen ande kodia lumia saxke te aven barvale ando pachamos , ai te avel le o rhaio kai O Del shinadia kodolenge kai si lenge drago O Del .

text: But ye have despised the poor . Do not rich men oppress you , and draw you before the judgment seats ?
text2: Numa tumenge nai drago o manush o chorho !

text: Do not they blaspheme that worthy name by the which ye are called ?
text2: Numa nai le barvale kai nekezhil tume ai kai angerel tume kai zhandari ? Ai won si kai mothon nasulimos pa shukar anav kai O Del dia tume .

text: If ye fulfil the royal law according to the scripture , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself , ye do well :
text2: E mishto keren , te kerena o zakono le rhaiosko sar mothol E Vorba le Devleski , te avel tuke drago cho vortako " Sar san tu tuke drago . "

text: But if ye have respect to persons , ye commit sin , and are convinced of the law as transgressors .
text2: Numa te avena tumenge drago uni manush mai but ke sar aver , antunchi bezex keren , ai o zakono dosharel tume , ke chi keren so mothol .

text: For whosoever shall keep the whole law , and yet offend in one point , he is guilty of all .
text2: Ke kon godi kerel sa o zakono , numa te shubilape karing iek , antunchi doshalo lo karing sa o zakono .

text: For he that said , Do not commit adultery , said also , Do not kill . Now if thou commit no adultery , yet if thou kill , thou art become a transgressor of the law .
text2: Ke kodo kai phendia , " Na phir pa kolavreski rhomni ( Na ker kurvia ) , " phendia vi " Na mudar . " Akana te na phiresa pala kolavreski rhomni ( te na ker kurvia ) , numa te mudaresa , antunchi doshalo san ke phaglian o zakono .

text: So speak ye , and so do , as they that shall be judged by the law of liberty .
text2: Den duma , ai keren sar manush kai trobun te aven dine pe kris katar o zakono kai skepil ame .

text: For he shall have judgment without mercy , that hath shewed no mercy ; and mercy rejoiceth against judgment .
text2: Ke O Del dela pe kris bi milako , kodoles kai nas leske mila andal kolaver ; numa e mila niril pe kris .

text: What doth it profit , my brethren , though a man say he hath faith , and have not works ? can faith save him ?
text2: Murhe phral , so lel o manush kai mothol , " Si ma o pachamos ai te na sikavela ke kerel o lashimos ? Sar sai kodo pachamos skepil les ? "

text: If a brother or sister be naked , and destitute of daily food ,
text2: Te si iek phral vai iek phei kai trobul le tsalia , ai nai le dosta xaben te xan ,

text: And one of you say unto them , Depart in peace , be ye warmed and filled ; notwithstanding ye give them not those things which are needful to the body ; what doth it profit ?
text2: so mol te mothona lenge , " Ashun Devlesa ai te avel tumenge mishto , zhan ai tachon , ai pravaren tume mishto , ai te na dena le so trobul le te traiin ?

text: Even so faith , if it hath not works , is dead , being alone .
text2: No sakadia si le pachamos , o pachamos korkorho bi le lashimasko , chi mol kanchi .

text: Yea , a man may say , Thou hast faith , and I have works : shew me thy faith without thy works , and I will shew thee my faith by my works .
text2: Numa te mothola vari kon , " Tute si o pachamos , ai mande si o lashimos , me mothava leske , sikav mange sar sai avel tu o pachamos bi le lashimasko , ai porme me sikavava tuke murho pachamos le lashimasa kai kerav . "

text: Thou believest that there is one God ; thou doest well : the devils also believe , and tremble .
text2: Tu pachas tu ke si ferdi iek Del . Mishto ! Numa vi le beng pachanpe , ai izdran daratar .

text: But wilt thou know , O vain man , that faith without works is dead ?
text2: Tu manusha kai chi haliares kanchi ! Manges te dikhes ke o pachamos bi le lashimasko , chi mol kanchi ?

text: Was not Abraham our father justified by works , when he had offered Isaac his son upon the altar ?
text2: Nas o Abraham amaro dat sas jindo vorta angla Del pala so kerdia , kana dia peske shaves o Isaac te merel ?

text: Seest thou how faith wrought with his works , and by works was faith made perfect ?
text2: Dikhes ke lesko pachamos ai lesko lashimos kerenas buchi andek than ; ai lesko pachamos sas vorta pala lashimos kai kerelas .

text: And the scripture was fulfilled which saith , Abraham believed God , and it was imputed unto him for righteousness : and he was called the Friend of God .
text2: Ai kadia kerdiol so mothol E Vorba le Devleski , " O Abraham pachaiape ando Del , ai O Del jinelas les sar vorta pala pachamos kai sas les . " ai O Del motholas leske " Murho vortako . "

text: Ye see then how that by works a man is justified , and not by faith only .
text2: Tume dikhen , ke o manush si jindo vorta katar O Del pala lashimos kai kerel , ai na ferdi ke pachalpe .

text: Likewise also was not Rahab the harlot justified by works , when she had received the messengers , and had sent them out another way ?
text2: Sakadia sas la Rahabaki e kurva . Sas jindi vorta katar O Del pala lashimos kai kerelas , woi kai premisardiasas le Devleske manushen le Zhidovon , ai zhutisardiasas le te zhantar pa aver drom .

text: For as the body without the spirit is dead , so faith without works is dead also .
text2: Ke sar o stato kai nashti traiil bi le traiosko , sakadia o pachamos bi le lashimasko mulo lo .

text: My brethren , be not many masters , knowing that we shall receive the greater condemnation .
text2: Murhe phral , chi trobul te avel but narodo mashkar tumende kai sicharel , ke zhanen ke ame kai sicharas avasa dine pe kris mai zurales ke sar le kolaver .

text: For in many things we offend all . If any man offend not in word , the same is a perfect man , and able also to bridle the whole body .
text2: Ame savorhe shubisavas ande but dieli , numa te si iek manush kai chi shubilpe ande so mothol , kodo manush vorta lo ai sai inkerel sa pesko stato po drom o lasho .

text: Behold , we put bits in the horses ' mouths , that they may obey us ; and we turn about their whole body .
text2: Ashun , ame thas o sastri ando mui grastengo , saxke te keren so mangas lendar ; ai kadia sai angeras sa lengo stato kai ame mangas .

text: Behold also the ships , which though they be so great , and are driven of fierce winds , yet are they turned about with a very small helm , whithersoever the governor listeth .
text2: Vai den tume goji kal pharaxoduria , marka ke si bare , ai ke le bare barvalia spiden le , sa won ingerde le katar iek tsinorho guvernai , ai zhan kotse kai o manush kai si po pharaxodo mangel .

text: Even so the tongue is a little member , and boasteth great things . Behold , how great a matter a little fire kindleth !
text2: Kadia vi e shib , woi si iek tsinorho kotor kai si ando stato , numa sai luvudilpe anda bare dieli . Ashun , ai den tume goji ka baro versh ke iek tsinorhi iag dosta si te lel sa iag !

text: And the tongue is a fire , a world of iniquity : so is the tongue among our members , that it defileth the whole body , and setteth on fire the course of nature ; and it is set on fire of hell .
text2: E shib si sar iek iag , woi si o bezex la lumiako ; ai si la lako than ande amaro stato , ai marel sa amaro stato , ai del iag sa amaro traio la iagasa kai avel katar o iado .

text: For every kind of beasts , and of birds , and of serpents , and of things in the sea , is tamed , and hath been tamed of mankind :
text2: O manush sai kerel anda swako fielo zhigania kai si nasul , so wo mangel , andal chiriklia , sapa , ai mashe , ai vunzhe kerdia kodia .

text: But the tongue can no man tame ; it is an unruly evil , full of deadly poison .
text2: Numa inker chi iek manush nashti kerdia la shibasa so wo manglia . Ke shib si iek nasulimos kai nashtisaras te aterdiaras , ande late si iek vilino kai mudarel .

text: Therewith bless we God , even the Father ; and therewith curse we men , which are made after the similitude of God .
text2: La shibasa ame naisisaras le Dadeske ando rhaio , ai la shibasa ame vi das armaia le manushen kai kerdia O Del te miazon pe leste .

text: Out of the same mouth proceedeth blessing and cursing . My brethren , these things ought not so to be .
text2: Vorbi naisimaske ai armaiange anklen anda iek mui . Murhe phral , chi trobul te avel kadia !

text: Doth a fountain send forth at the same place sweet water and bitter ?
text2: Sai ek xaiin del po iek than o pai o lasho ai vi o chorho ?

text: Can the fig tree , my brethren , bear olive berries ? either a vine , figs ? so can no fountain both yield salt water and fresh .
text2: Sai ek khash kai barion le figi pe leste , murhe phral , bariol masleni pe leste ? Ai po khash kai bariol o struguro , bariol figi pe leste ? Ai o pai o londo nashtil te del pai kai nai londo .

text: Who is a wise man and endued with knowledge among you ? let him shew out of a good conversation his works with meekness of wisdom .
text2: Te si mashkar tumende vari kon kai si pachivalo ai gojaver ? Trobul te sikavel peske traiosa , o lashimos kai kerel ando prostomo ai ande goji .

text: But if ye have bitter envying and strife in your hearts , glory not , and lie not against the truth .
text2: Numa te si ande tumare ile iek zhaluzia nasulimaski , ai gindo te keren nasulimos tumare vortakoske , na luvudin tume , ai na xoxaven ke chi mangen te mothon o chachimos .

text: This wisdom descendeth not from above , but is earthly , sensual , devilish .
text2: Ke kasaviatar goji chi avel katar O Del , kadala lumiaki la , le manushenge , ai katar o beng avel .

text: For where envying and strife is , there is confusion and every evil work .
text2: Ke kotse kai si e zhaluzia ai o gindo te keres nasulimos , che vortakoske , kotse si vi o traio o bi malado ai vi o but nasulimos .

text: But the wisdom that is from above is first pure , then peaceable , gentle , and easy to be intreated , full of mercy and good fruits , without partiality , and without hypocrisy .
text2: Numa e goji kai avel anda rhaio vuzhi la , ai porme del pacha , rodel o mishtimos savorhengo , lashi la , ai mangel te kerel so mangel O Del , ai pherdo lashimos la . Ai kerel o lashimos , ai chi rodel te xoxavel numa chachi la .

text: And the fruit of righteousness is sown in peace of them that make peace .
text2: Kodola kai keren e pacha kruglom pendar bariaren ande pacha ai e fruta kai len si iek chacho traio .

text: From whence come wars and fightings among you ? come they not hence , even of your lusts that war in your members ?
text2: Katar avel le marimata ai le chingara mashkar tumende ? Katar tumare ginduria le chorhe aven , kai marenpe sagda ande tumaro stato .

text: Ye lust , and have not : ye kill , and desire to have , and cannot obtain : ye fight and war , yet ye have not , because ye ask not .
text2: Tume mangen vari so , numa nashtin te len kodia diela . Tume mudaren , ai manglianas te avel tume vari so , numa nashtin te avel tume kodia diela . Antunchi tume maren ai keren nasulimata . Nai tume so mangen ke chi mangen katar O Del .

text: Ye ask , and receive not , because ye ask amiss , that ye may consume it upon your lusts .
text2: Ai kana mangen , chi len , ke tumare ginduria nai lashe , ke so mangen , mangen te avel tume kodia diela tumare mishtimaske .

text: Ye adulterers and adulteresses , know ye not that the friendship of the world is enmity with God ? whosoever therefore will be a friend of the world is the enemy of God .
text2: Xoxamle kai san ! Tume kai keren zhungalimos , pate chi zhanen ke tu san o vortako la lumiako antunchi san o duzhmano le Devlesko ? Kodo kai mangel te avel o vortako la lumiako kerdiol o duzhmano le Devlesko .

text: Do ye think that the scripture saith in vain , The spirit that dwelleth in us lusteth to envy ?
text2: Na gindin ke intaino mothol E Vorba le Devleski , " Ke le Devleske drago O Swunto Duxo kai thodia ande amende . "

text: But he giveth more grace . Wherefore he saith , God resisteth the proud , but giveth grace unto the humble .
text2: Numa O Del del ame iek mai baro lashimos , ke E Vorba le Devleski mothol , " Ke le Devleske nai drago le manush kai si barimatange , numa drago leske le manush kai nai barimatange . "

text: Submit yourselves therefore to God . Resist the devil , and he will flee from you .
text2: No keren so mangel tumendar O Del . Ai na keren so mangel o beng , ai duriola dur tumendar .

text: Draw nigh to God , and he will draw nigh to you . Cleanse your hands , ye sinners ; and purify your hearts , ye double minded .
text2: Pashon pasha Del , ai O Del pashola pasha tumende . Vuzharen tumare vas tume kai san bezexale , ai vuzharen tumare ile , tume kai chi zhanen so mangen .

text: Be afflicted , and mourn , and weep : let your laughter be turned to mourning , and your joy to heaviness .
text2: Trobul te aven ando nekazo , te roven , ai te suspinin ; ai trobul te na asan numa te roven , ai te na aven raduime numa nekezhime .

text: Humble yourselves in the sight of the Lord , and he shall lift you up .
text2: Meken tume tele angla Kristo , ai wo vazdela tume opre .

text: Speak not evil one of another , brethren . He that speaketh evil of his brother , and judgeth his brother , speaketh evil of the law , and judgeth the law : but if thou judge the law , thou art not a doer of the law , but a judge .
text2: Murhe phral , na phenen nasulimos pa iek kavreste . Ke kodo kai mothol nasulimos pa pesko phral vai kai dosharel les , kodo mothol nasulimos pa zakono ai dosharel le zakonos : numa te dosharesa le zakonos , chi mai san kodo kai kerel so mothol o zakono , numa kodo kai dosharel le zakonos .

text: There is one lawgiver , who is able to save and to destroy : who art thou that judgest another ?
text2: Ke ferdi O Del si , kai del o zakono ai kai dosharel , wo ferdi sai vi skepil ai vi sai xasarel , kon san tu , tu kai doshares che phrales ?

text: Go to now , ye that say , To day or to morrow we will go into such a city , and continue there a year , and buy and sell , and get gain :
text2: Ashunen mande akana ! Tume kai mothon , " Adies vai terhara zhasa ande kutari foro , ai beshasa kotse iek bersh . ai kerasa buchi te nirisaras love . "

text: Whereas ye know not what shall be on the morrow . For what is your life ? It is even a vapour , that appeareth for a little time , and then vanisheth away .
text2: Tume chi zhanen so avela terhara . So si cho traio ? Tume san chaches sar iek tsinorhi magla , kai sikadiol xantsi vriama ai porme ma nai .

text: For that ye ought to say , If the Lord will , we shall live , and do this , or that .
text2: Ke trobul te mothon , " Te mangela O Del , traiisarasa , ai kerasa kadia , vai kerasa kodia .

text: But now ye rejoice in your boastings : all such rejoicing is evil .
text2: Numa akana tume raduin tume ande tumare barimata ; ai kasavestar raduimos si bezex ,

text: Therefore to him that knoweth to do good , and doeth it not , to him it is sin .
text2: ai kado kai zhanel te kerel o lashimos , ai chi kerel les , bezex kerel .

text: Go to now , ye rich men , weep and howl for your miseries that shall come upon you .
text2: Ai akana , ashunen mande , tume le barvale ! Roven ai vachin tume palal baiuria kai si te aven pe tumende !

text: Your riches are corrupted , and your garments are motheaten .
text2: Tumare barvalimata cherne le , ai tumare tsalia cherniarde le katar le rhimi .

text: Your gold and silver is cankered ; and the rust of them shall be a witness against you , and shall eat your flesh as it were fire . Ye have heaped treasure together for the last days .
text2: Tumaro sumnakai ai tumaro rup rhuzhinime le ; ai kodia rhuzhina sikavela ke doshale san , ai cherniarel la tumaro stato sar e iag . Tume chidian barvalimata ande kadala dies le palune .

text: Behold , the hire of the labourers who have reaped down your fields , which is of you kept back by fraud , crieth : and the cries of them which have reaped are entered into the ears of the Lord of sabaoth .
text2: Ashun , tume chi pochindian e pochin le manushengi kai keren buchi pe tumare kimpuria . Ashunen sar vachinpe ! Le tsipimata le manushenge kai keren tumenge buchi aresle zhi kal khan le Devleske le Sabatosko .

text: Ye have lived in pleasure on the earth , and been wanton ; ye have nourished your hearts , as in a day of slaughter .
text2: Tume traiisardian pe phuv ando mishtimos ai sas tume so mangenas . Tume raduime sanas kana le kolaver sas nekezhime . Tume kerdian tumaro ilo tsulo ai gata te avela mudardo sar ek zhigania si mudardo .

text: Ye have condemned and killed the just ; and he doth not resist you .
text2: Tume doshardian , ai mudardian le manush kai pachalaspe ando Del , numa wo chi phendia kanchi .

text: Be patient therefore , brethren , unto the coming of the Lord . Behold , the husbandman waiteth for the precious fruit of the earth , and hath long patience for it , until he receive the early and latter rain .
text2: Murhe phral , rhevdin zhi kai avel O Kristo , dikhen sar o manush kai shudel e sumuntsa si le rhavda te azhukerel te del e phuv o lasho xaben . Wo rhevdil zhi kai aven le breshinda .

text: Be ye also patient ; stablish your hearts : for the coming of the Lord draweth nigh .
text2: Trobul te rhevdin vi tume ; ai te len zor ; ke O Kristo sigo vriama si te avel .

text: Grudge not one against another , brethren , lest ye be condemned : behold , the judge standeth before the door .
text2: Na vachin tume pa iek kavreste , murhe phral , saxke te na aven dine pe kris katar O Del . Ashun , o Kristinitori sigo vriama si te avel .

text: Take , my brethren , the prophets , who have spoken in the name of the Lord , for an example of suffering affliction , and of patience .
text2: Murhe phral , den tume goji kal profeturia , kai denas duma ando anav le Kristosko . Keren sar lende rhevdin ando vutuimos ai rhavdasa .

text: Behold , we count them happy which endure . Ye have heard of the patience of Job , and have seen the end of the Lord ; that the Lord is very pitiful , and of tender mercy .
text2: Ashun , ame phenas ke raduime sas ke rhevdisarde ando vutuimos . Tume ashundian pai rhavda kai sas les o Job , ai dikhlian so kerdia les O Del ando gor , ke O Del miloso lo ai lasho .

text: But above all things , my brethren , swear not , neither by heaven , neither by the earth , neither by any other oath : but let your yea be yea ; and your nay , nay ; lest ye fall into condemnation .
text2: Ai murhe phral , na den armaia , chi le rhaiosa , ai chi la phuviasa , ai chi iek fielo : numa ferdi phenen " E " kana si E , ai " Nichi " kana si Nichi , saxke te na aven dine pe kris katar O Del .

text: Is any among you afflicted ? let him pray . Is any merry ? let him sing psalms .
text2: Si vari kon mashkar tumende kai si ando chinuimos ? Trobul te rhuginpe . Si vari kon kai si raduime ? Te jilaben le jilia le naisimaske ka Del .

text: Is any sick among you ? let him call for the elders of the church ; and let them pray over him , anointing him with oil in the name of the Lord :
text2: Si vari kon mashkar tumende kai si naswalo ? Trobul te akharel le mai phuren kai si ande khangeri ai won rhugina leske , ai thona vuloi pe leste ando anav le Kristosko .

text: And the prayer of faith shall save the sick , and the Lord shall raise him up ; and if he have committed sins , they shall be forgiven him .
text2: Ai kodo rhugimos kai avela kerdo le pachamasa skepila le naswales ; ai O Kristo sastiarela les , ai le bezexa kai kerdia avena leske iertime .

text: Confess your faults one to another , and pray one for another , that ye may be healed . The effectual fervent prayer of a righteous man availeth much .
text2: Purhin tumare bezexa iek kavreste , ai rhugin iek kavreske , saxke te sastion . O rhugimos kai avel anda ilo le manushesko kai pachalpe ando Del baro lo .

text: Elias was a man subject to like passions as we are , and he prayed earnestly that it might not rain : and it rained not on the earth by the space of three years and six months .
text2: O Elijah sas iek manush sar amende . Wo rhugisailo bi aterdiarimasko te na del breshind , ai chi dia breshind pe phuv trin bersh ai shov shon .

text: And he prayed again , and the heaven gave rain , and the earth brought forth her fruit .
text2: Porme pale rhugisailo ai dia breshind , ai barilia xaben pe phuv .

text: Brethren , if any of you do err from the truth , and one convert him ;
text2: Murhe phral ! Te si vari kon anda tumende kai durilo katar O Del , ai te si vari kon kai anel les palpale ,

text: Let him know , that he which converteth the sinner from the error of his way shall save a soul from death , and shall hide a multitude of sins .
text2: te zhanel ke kodo kai anela palpale ieke bezexa les pa drom o chorho , skepila kodole manushes katar e martia ai but bezexa avena iertime .

text: Peter , an apostle of Jesus Christ , to the strangers scattered throughout Pontus , Galatia , Cappadocia , Asia , and Bithynia ,
text2: Katar o Petri , ek apostle le Jesus Kristoski , kodolenge kai O Del alosardia ai kai traiin sar streinuria ande kolaver thema , ai hulade pel riga kai si ando Pontuis , ande Galatia , ai ande Cappadocia , ande Asia , ai ande Bithynia .

text: Elect according to the foreknowledge of God the Father , through sanctification of the Spirit , unto obedience and sprinkling of the blood of Jesus Christ : Grace unto you , and peace , be multiplied .
text2: Tume sanas alome mai anglal katar o Del O Dat , ai tume san leske pala lesko Swunto Duxo te keren so mangel O Jesus Kristo , ai te aven vuzharde katar lesko rat . O mishtimos ai a pacha te aven shorde ande tumare ile .

text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , which according to his abundant mercy hath begotten us again unto a lively hope by the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead ,
text2: Luvudisaras le Devles O Dat amare Devleske O Jesus Kristo ! Kai ande pesko baro lashimos dia ame iek nevo traio kana andia le Jesus Kristos katar e martia ka traio .

text: To an inheritance incorruptible , and undefiled , and that fadeth not away , reserved in heaven for you ,
text2: No kadia si ame iek pachamos zhuvindo , ai sai raduisavas anda mishtimos kai O Del garavel peske manushenge . Ai kodo mishtimos nashtil chi te cherniol , chi te meliavol , ai chi te xasarel pesko strefaimos , ke O Del garavel les ando cheri tumenge .

text: Who are kept by the power of God through faith unto salvation ready to be revealed in the last time .
text2: Tumenge kai san garade katar iek Del kai si les e putiera ai kai pachan tume ande leste , o skepimos sikadiola kana avela e vriama paluno .

text: Wherein ye greatly rejoice , though now for a season , if need be , ye are in heaviness through manifold temptations :
text2: Numa tume raduime san , marka ke akana trobul te aven nekezhime pe xantsi vriama pala le but zumaimata kai aven pe tumende .

text: That the trial of your faith , being much more precious than of gold that perisheth , though it be tried with fire , might be found unto praise and honour and glory at the appearing of Jesus Christ :
text2: Ke le zumaimata si te sikaven sode si de baro tumaro pachamos . O sumnakai andek dies chi mai avela , numa e iag zumavel les te dikhel leski zor . Sakadia , tumaro pachamos si mai baro sar o sumnakai ai vi trobul te avel zumado , saxke te dichol leski zor . Antunchi tumaro pachamos anel o barimos , luvudimos , ai naisimos ka O Jesus Kristo kana avela palpale .

text: Whom having not seen , ye love ; in whom , though now ye see him not , yet believing , ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory :
text2: Tumenge drago O Kristo ai thodian tumaro pachamos ande leste , marka ke chi dikhlian les . Ai pala leste tumaro raduimos baro lo , iek raduimos kai nashtin te mothon , ai kai ande kodo raduimos si e vediara kai avel katar o shukarimos le Devlesko .

text: Receiving the end of your faith , even the salvation of your souls .
text2: Ke zhanen ke avela tume o skepimos pala tumaro pachamos .

text: Of which salvation the prophets have inquired and searched diligently , who prophesied of the grace that should come unto you :
text2: Ai kado skeipmos sas rodino ande Vorba le Devleski katar le profeturia , ai kai phende tumenge mai anglal o lashimos kai sas tumenge shinado .

text: Searching what , or what manner of time the Spirit of Christ which was in them did signify , when it testified beforehand the sufferings of Christ , and the glory that should follow .
text2: Ai won rodenas te zhanen kana , ai so kerdiola kana o dies le skepimasko avela , ke O Swunto Duxho kai sas ande lende motholas lenge pa skepimos , ke O Swunto Duxo motholas lenge mai anglal o chino kai avela le Kristos , ai o luvudimos pala kodia .

text: Unto whom it was revealed , that not unto themselves , but unto us they did minister the things , which are now reported unto you by them that have preached the gospel unto you with the Holy Ghost sent down from heaven ; which things the angels desire to look into .
text2: Ke O Del sikadia le profetonge ke o lashimos kai delas le te mothon nas lenge , numa tumenge , ai kodo lashimos tume premisardian les akana , le manush kai aven e lashi viasta , kai dine duma la putierasa kai si ande Swunto Duxo kai sas tradino anda rhaio phende tumenge pa kodo lashimos . Ai le angeluria vi won mangline te zhanen kodo lashimos .

text: Wherefore gird up the loins of your mind , be sober , and hope to the end for the grace that is to be brought unto you at the revelation of Jesus Christ ;
text2: Anda kodia thon tumare ginduria andek than ai tumari zor , geton tume te zhan angle ai te keren buchi , na soven , numa azhukeren pala o mishtimos kai avela dino kana O Jesus Kristo avela .

text: As obedient children , not fashioning yourselves according to the former lusts in your ignorance :
text2: Keren so mangel tumendar O Del , ai na mai keren le dieli le bi lashe kai kerenas mai anglal kana chi zhanenas le Devles .

text: But as he which hath called you is holy , so be ye holy in all manner of conversation ;
text2: Numa trobul te avel tume iek Swunto traio sar O Del , ke wo kai akhardia tume swunto lo .

text: Because it is written , Be ye holy ; for I am holy .
text2: Ke E Vorba le Devleski mothol , " Trobul te aven swuntsi , ke me Swunto sim . "

text: And if ye call on the Father , who without respect of persons judgeth according to every man ' s work , pass the time of your sojourning here in fear :
text2: Kana rhugin tume , mothon amaro Dat , kodoleske kai del pe kris le manushen bi te alol le manushen , numa kerel le manushensa pala so kerde ; anda kodia , e vriama kai mai si tume te traiin pe kadia phuv na keren o nasulimos numa keren so mangel tumendar O Del .

text: Forasmuch as ye know that ye were not redeemed with corruptible things , as silver and gold , from your vain conversation received by tradition from your fathers ;
text2: Ke zhanen o pretso kai sas pochindo te aven skepime anda traio o bi malado kai mekle sas tumenge tumare dada . Ai den tume goji ke chi sanas chinde le rupesa vai le sumnakasa ; ai chi ieka dielasa kai xasarel pesko pretso ;

text: But with the precious blood of Christ , as of a lamb without blemish and without spot :
text2: Nichi , numa trobulsardia O Kristos sar iek bakriorhi bi doshako te shorel pesko rat o kuchi pala tumende .

text: Who verily was foreordained before the foundation of the world , but was manifest in these last times for you ,
text2: Mai anglal sar te avel e lumia O Del alosardiasas le Kristos te kerel kodia buchi , numa akana sikadilo ande kodala vriama le paluno pe tumaro mishtimos .

text: Who by him do believe in God , that raised him up from the dead , and gave him glory ; that your faith and hope might be in God .
text2: Ke pala leste arakhlian o pachamos ando Del , ai porme O Del zhuvindisardia les mashkar le mule , ai porme dia les o barimos ; no kadia tumaro pachamos ai o mishtimos kai azhukeren ando Del le .

text: Seeing ye have purified your souls in obeying the truth through the Spirit unto unfeigned love of the brethren , see that ye love one another with a pure heart fervently :
text2: Tume vuzhilian ke lian tume pala chachimos ai sas tume dini iek podarka iek dragostia kai avel katar O Swunto Duxo . Trobul te aven drazhi iek kavreske sa tumare ilesa sagda .

text: Being born again , not of corruptible seed , but of incorruptible , by the word of God , which liveth and abideth for ever .
text2: Ai samas parhude na katar iek sumuntsa kai cherniol , numa katar iek sumuntsa kai chi cherniol , kodia si E Vorba le Devleski kai zhuvindil ai beshel sagda .

text: For all flesh is as grass , and all the glory of man as the flower of grass . The grass withereth , and the flower thereof falleth away :
text2: Ke E Vorba le Devleski mothol , " Sa le manush sar e char le , e char shuchol , ai sa o luvudimos le manushenge sar e luluji la chariaki le , ai e luluji perel , numa E Vorba le Devleski sagda beshel . "

text: But the word of the Lord endureth for ever . And this is the word which by the gospel is preached unto you .
text2: Ai kodia Vorba si e lashi viasta kai ashundian .

text: Wherefore laying aside all malice , and all guile , and hypocrisies , and envies , and all evil speakings ,
text2: Shuden sa o vurhichimos , xoxaimos , dziliarimos , o pupuimos , ai e zhaluzia , na ker barimata , na mangen so si kolavres , na kerdion so chi san .

text: As newborn babes , desire the sincere milk of the word , that ye may grow thereby :
text2: Sar le tsinorhe glate mangen o thud kai avel katar E Vorba le Devleski , saxke te barion ando traio kai avel katar O Del .

text: If so be ye have tasted that the Lord is gracious .
text2: Ke E Vorba le Devleski mothol , " Ke zumadian anda lashimos le Kristosko . "

text: To whom coming , as unto a living stone , disallowed indeed of men , but chosen of God , and precious ,
text2: Pashon pasha Kristo , ke wo si O Bax o zhuvindo kai le manush chi mangle te premin , numa O Del alosardia kodo bax , ai kuchi sas leske .

text: Ye also , as lively stones , are built up a spiritual house , an holy priesthood , to offer up spiritual sacrifices , acceptable to God by Jesus Christ .
text2: Te avena ka Kristo vi tume avena bax zhuvinde , ai O Kristo kerela anda tumende te aven leske khangeri , ai kadia avena sakrifikatoria kai aven thodine te anen angla Del sakrifisuria kai si leske drago katar O Jesus Kristo .

text: Wherefore also it is contained in the scripture , Behold , I lay in Sion a chief corner stone , elect , precious : and he that believeth on him shall not be confounded .
text2: Ke eta , so mothol E Vorba le Devleski , " Me alosardem iek bax kai si les baro pretso , ai kai thav akana sar iek bax kai si koltso ando Zion , ai o manush kai thola pesko pachamos ande kodo bax alome kai si O Kristo ai kai kerela pesko traio pe leste , chi atsadiola .

text: Unto you therefore which believe he is precious : but unto them which be disobedient , the stone which the builders disallowed , the same is made the head of the corner ,
text2: Ai kodo bax si les baro pretso tumenge kai pachan tume , numa kodola kai chi pachanpe : E Vorba le Devleski mothol , " O bax kai le manush kai keren o kher shudesas , kerdilo o shero la fundaniako "

text: And a stone of stumbling , and a rock of offence , even to them which stumble at the word , being disobedient : whereunto also they were appointed .
text2: Ai E Vorba le Devleski mai mothol , " Kodo bax si Kristo kai peravel le manushen , ai o baro bax kai anel o lazhav . " Ke chi mangle te pachan pe ande Vorba le Devleski , ke kadia sas lenge shinado .

text: But ye are a chosen generation , a royal priesthood , an holy nation , a peculiar people ; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light :
text2: Numa tume san ek vitsa alome , tume san le rasha swuntso le amperatosko , o narodo o swunto , ai o narodo le Devlesko ; tume sanas alome te mothon pa mishtimos le Devlesko , ai kai akhardia tume anda tuniariko te aven ande vediara .

text: Which in time past were not a people , but are now the people of God : which had not obtained mercy , but now have obtained mercy .
text2: Tume mai anglal chi sanas ek vitsa , numa akana san o narodo le Devlesko ; tume mai anglal chi zhanenas e mila le Devleski , numa akana si tume leski mila .

text: Dearly beloved , I beseech you as strangers and pilgrims , abstain from fleshly lusts , which war against the soul ;
text2: Murhe kuchi vortacha , tume san pe phuv streinuria ai manush kai ferdi nakhen pai phuv , mangav tumendar te arakhen tume katar le ginduria le chorhe kai si le statos , ai kai maren pe tumare traiosa .

text: Having your conversation honest among the Gentiles : that , whereas they speak against you as evildoers , they may by your good works , which they shall behold , glorify God in the day of visitation .
text2: Ai trobul te avel tumaro traio vorta mashkar le manush kai chi pachanpe ando Del ; ai kadia , marka te mothona chordanes ke nasul san , musai avela lenge te preznain o mishtimos kai keren ai te luvudin le Devles o dies kai avela .

text: Submit yourselves to every ordinance of man for the Lord ' s sake : whether it be to the king , as supreme ;
text2: Len tume ando anav le Kristosko pala zakono kai sas thodino katar le manush le themeske , keren so mothol o baro le themesko ,

text: Or unto governors , as unto them that are sent by him for the punishment of evildoers , and for the praise of them that do well .
text2: ai len tume pala kodola kai si tela lesko vas ke won thodine le te phandaven le manushen kai keren o nasulimos , numa te luvudin le manushen kai keren o mishtimos .

text: For so is the will of God , that with well doing ye may put to silence the ignorance of foolish men :
text2: Ke e voia le Devleski si , te aterdiaren tume le mishtimasa , o nasulimos kai mothon le manush kai chi zhanen ai kai nai pachivale ,

text: As free , and not using your liberty for a cloke of maliciousness , but as the servants of God .
text2: ai traiin sar manush kai si ivia , numa na garaven tela tumari liberte o nasulimos , keren sar slugi le Devleske .

text: Honour all men . Love the brotherhood . Fear God . Honour the king .
text2: Respektin sa le manushen , te aven tumenge drago tumare phral kai pachanpe ando Del , luvudin O Del la dragostiasa ai darasa . Respektin le bares kai si ando them .

text: Servants , be subject to your masters with all fear ; not only to the good and gentle , but also to the froward .
text2: Tume le slugi , keren so mangen tumendar tumare bare ai respektin le , numa na ferdi kodolensa kai si lashe tumensa , numa vi kodolensa kai nai lashe tumensa .

text: For this is thankworthy , if a man for conscience toward God endure grief , suffering wrongfully .
text2: O Del raduila tume te rhevdina e dukh le vutuimaski ke tume keren e voia le Devleski , ai jinen pe leste .

text: For what glory is it , if , when ye be buffeted for your faults , ye shall take it patiently ? but if , when ye do well , and suffer for it , ye take it patiently , this is acceptable with God .
text2: Ke che luvudimos sai avel tume te avena vutuime palai shipka kai kerdian ? Numa te rhevdina o vutuimos pala mishtimos kai kerdian , kodia si vorta angla Del .

text: For even hereunto were ye called : because Christ also suffered for us , leaving us an example , that ye should follow his steps :
text2: Ke pala kodia akhardia tume O Del , ke O Kristo chinuisardia pala tumende ai meklia te len sama pe leste , ai te len tume pala leske vurmi .

text: Who did no sin , neither was guile found in his mouth :
text2: Wo chi kerdia chi iek bezex , ai shoxar chi ashundilia ke xoxavel .

text: Who , when he was reviled , reviled not again ; when he suffered , he threatened not ; but committed himself to him that judgeth righteously :
text2: Kana marde lestar mui , chi mardia lendar mui palpale ; kana chinuisarde les , chi phendia ke chinuila le vi wo ; numa mekliape andel vas le Devleske , kai ferdi wo kerel e kris vorta .

text: Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree , that we , being dead to sins , should live unto righteousness : by whose stripes ye were healed .
text2: Ai O Kristo lia ande pesko stato amare bezexa po trushul , saxke te meras le bezexeske , ai te traiisaras iek traio vorta ; ai ande leske rhini sastilian .

text: For ye were as sheep going astray ; but are now returned unto the Shepherd and Bishop of your souls .
text2: Ke tume sanas sar bakriorha kai xasaile sas , numa akana sanas andine palpale karing kodo kai si o pastuxo , kodo kai garavel tumaro traio .

text: Likewise , ye wives , be in subjection to your own husbands ; that , if any obey not the word , they also may without the word be won by the conversation of the wives ;
text2: Ai tume le rhomnia , keren so mothon tumenge tumare rhom , saxke te si ka iek anda lende kai chi pachalpe ande Vorba le Devleski parhudiola ai avela ka Del pala traio o vorta kai traiin bi te mothon chi iek vorba ,

text: While they behold your chaste conversation coupled with fear .
text2: ke dikhena sode tumaro traio vuzho lo ai ke respektin le Devles .

text: Whose adorning let it not be that outward adorning of plaiting the hair , and of wearing of gold , or of putting on of apparel ;
text2: Ai na roden te shukaren tume le sumnakasa , ai le tsaliensa , ai na hulaven tumare bal sar le zhuvlia kadala lumiake te prinzhardion , ke e shuk la zhuvliaki nai andel tsalia le shukar kai si pe late ,

text: But let it be the hidden man of the heart , in that which is not corruptible , even the ornament of a meek and quiet spirit , which is in the sight of God of great price .
text2: numa lako ilo trobul te avel lasho ai pachivalo , ke kodia si defial dragao le Devleske .

text: For after this manner in the old time the holy women also , who trusted in God , adorned themselves , being in subjection unto their own husbands :
text2: Ke kadia kerenas le zhuvlia kai pachanaspe ando Del mai anglal , ai kai azhukerenas katar O Del , shukarenas pe ke won kerenas so mothonas lenge rhom .

text: Even as Sara obeyed Abraham , calling him lord : whose daughters ye are , as long as ye do well , and are not afraid with any amazement .
text2: Ai vi e Sarah kerelas so motholas lake o Abraham , woi respektisardia les sar o shero le kheresko , ai motholas leske " Gazda " . Ai tume san akana lake sheia te kerena so si vorta , ai te na darana kanchestar .

text: Likewise , ye husbands , dwell with them according to knowledge , giving honour unto the wife , as unto the weaker vessel , and as being heirs together of the grace of life ; that your prayers be not hindered .
text2: Ai tume le rhom , traiin tumare rhomniansa malades , ke zhanen ke won mai kovlia le tumendar , ai respektin le ke won trobul tumensa andek than te len e podarka le traioski kai avel katar O Del . Keren kadia saxke te ashunel O Del tumaro rhugimos .

text: Finally , be ye all of one mind , having compassion one of another , love as brethren , be pitiful , be courteous :
text2: Ai te avel tumen swakones iek gindo ai iek dragostia , trobul te aven drazhi iek kavreske sar phral , ai trobul te aven lashe ai pachivale iek kavresa .

text: Not rendering evil for evil , or railing for railing : but contrariwise blessing ; knowing that ye are thereunto called , that ye should inherit a blessing .
text2: Ai te kerdia tumenge vari kon nasulimos na keren vi tume leske , vai te straminsardia tume vari kon na stramin vi tume les ; numa mangen katar O Del te raduil le , ke raduimos shinadia O Del te del tumen kana akhardia tume peste .

text: For he that will love life , and see good days , let him refrain his tongue from evil , and his lips that they speak no guile :
text2: Ke E Vorba le Devleski mothol , " O manush kai mangel te avel les traio lasho , ai diesa , raduime , trobul te aterdiol e shib ai te na mai mothol o nasulimos , ai te na mai xoxavel .

text: Let him eschew evil , and do good ; let him seek peace , and ensue it .
text2: Trobul te na mai kerel o nasulimos , numa o mishtimos ; trobul te rodel e pacha , ai te lelpe pala late .

text: For the eyes of the Lord are over the righteous , and his ears are open unto their prayers : but the face of the Lord is against them that do evil .
text2: Ke O Kristo dikhel pel manush kai keren vorta , ai ashunel lengo rhugimos ; numa duriol katar le manush kai keren o nasulimos . "

text: And who is he that will harm you , if ye be followers of that which is good ?
text2: Ai kon si kado kai dukhavel tumen te keren o lashimos ?

text: But and if ye suffer for righteousness ' sake , happy are ye : and be not afraid of their terror , neither be troubled ;
text2: Ke vi te trobula te chinuin pala so si vorta kai keren , raduime avena ! Na daran katar lengo chinuimos , ai na meken te rimon tume .

text: But sanctify the Lord God in your hearts : and be ready always to give an answer to every man that asketh you a reason of the hope that is in you with meekness and fear :
text2: Numa luvudin o anav le Kristosko ande tumaro ile . Ai trobul te aven sagda gata te den atweto sa kodolen kai phushen tume pa pachamos kai si ande tumende .

text: Having a good conscience ; that , whereas they speak evil of you , as of evildoers , they may be ashamed that falsely accuse your good conversation in Christ .
text2: Den duma le lashimasa ai le respektimasa . Numa trobul te den le atweto lashimasa ai pachivales . Ai trobul te avel tume ginduria vuzhe , saxke le manush kai mothon nasulimos pa lasho traio kai si tume le Kristosa ,

text: For it is better , if the will of God be so , that ye suffer for well doing , than for evil doing .
text2: te avel lenge lazhav anda so mothon . Ke mai mishto te chinuis kana keres o lashimos , te si e voia le Devleski , ke sar te chinuis kana keres o nasulimos .

text: For Christ also hath once suffered for sins , the just for the unjust , that he might bring us to God , being put to death in the flesh , but quickened by the Spirit :
text2: Ke O Kristo mulo pala tumende , Wo mulo ferdi iek data pala le bezexa le manushenge , Wo kai sas lasho mulo pala le manush kai sas nasul , saxke te anel tume ka Del , ai mudarde les andek stato manushesko kai sas les , numa O Swunto Duxo zhuvindisardia les .

text: By which also he went and preached unto the spirits in prison ;
text2: Ai O Kristo gelo te mothol pa e lashi viasta ka le duxuria kai sas phangle .

text: Which sometime were disobedient , when once the longsuffering of God waited in the days of Noah , while the ark was a preparing , wherein few , that is , eight souls were saved by water .
text2: Kodia si duxuria le manushenge kai mai anglal chi pachaie o mui le Devlesko ande le diesa le Noahoske . O Del azhukerelas rhavdasa te aven leste ande vriama kana o Noah kerelas e barzha . Xantsi narodo , oxto zhene ferdi dine ande barzha ai skepisaile katar o pai .

text: The like figure whereunto even baptism doth also now save us ( not the putting away of the filth of the flesh , but the answer of a good conscience toward God , ) by the resurrection of Jesus Christ :
text2: Kadia si sar o bolimos si amenge . Kodo pai nai te vuzharel amaro stato andal bi vuzhimata , numa sikavel kai ame sam skepime katar e kris le bezexengi ai ame mangas sa amaro ilesa te phiras le Devlesa . Kadia si , ke O Kristo zhuvindisailo anda le mule .

text: Who is gone into heaven , and is on the right hand of God ; angels and authorities and powers being made subject unto him .
text2: Wo kai gelo ando rhaio ai kai si akana pe chachi rig le Devleski ai poronchil pel angeluria ai pel aver putiari kai si ando rhaio .

text: Forasmuch then as Christ hath suffered for us in the flesh , arm yourselves likewise with the same mind : for he that hath suffered in the flesh hath ceased from sin ;
text2: No akana kai O Kristo chinuisardia ando stato , vi tume trobul te avel tume iek sa kodo gindo , ke o manush kai chinuisardia ando stato o bezex ma nai les chi iek putiera pe leste .

text: That he no longer should live the rest of his time in the flesh to the lusts of men , but to the will of God .
text2: Ai akana trobul te traiin sa tumaro traio pe kadia phuv ande voia le Devleski ai na ande voia le manushenge .

text: For the time past of our life may suffice us to have wrought the will of the Gentiles , when we walked in lasciviousness , lusts , excess of wine , revellings , banquetings , and abominable idolatries :
text2: Ke dosta mai anglal xasardiam e vriama te keren sar le manush kai chi pachanpe ando Del . Tume traiinas bi malades , drago sas tumenge so sas le kolavren , machonas , kerenas pachiva bi malade , ai rhuginas tume kal ikoni .

text: Wherein they think it strange that ye run not with them to the same excess of riot , speaking evil of you :
text2: Numa akana le manush kai chi pachanpe ando Del chudinpe ke tume chi mai traiin lensa kodo chorho traio , ai maren mui tumendar .

text: Who shall give account to him that is ready to judge the quick and the dead .
text2: Numa kodola manush trobula te pochinen le Devleske so kerde , O Del kai del pe kris le zhuvinden ai vi le mulen .

text: For for this cause was the gospel preached also to them that are dead , that they might be judged according to men in the flesh , but live according to God in the spirit .
text2: Anda kodia e lashi viasta sas phendi vi le mulenge , kodola kai sas dine pe kris kana traiinas sar sa le manush , kodia lashi viasta sas phendi lenge saxke katar O Swunto Duxo te sar traiil O Del .

text: But the end of all things is at hand : be ye therefore sober , and watch unto prayer .
text2: Numa sigo vriama swako diela si te getolpe . Traiin malades ai te aven tumare ginduria vuzhe , saxke te sai rhugin tume .

text: And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves : for charity shall cover the multitude of sins .
text2: Numa mai anglal sar sa trobul te aven drazhi zurales iek kavreske , ke e dragostia vusharela but bezexa .

text: Use hospitality one to another without grudging .
text2: Premin iek kavres ande tumare khera raduimasa .

text: As every man hath received the gift , even so minister the same one to another , as good stewards of the manifold grace of God .
text2: Swako anda tumende sas les dini katar O Del iek podarka , te kerel mishtimos le kolavrenge lasa , ai te avel iek zhutimos le kolavrenge sar le lashe slugi trobul te keren anda baro lashimos le Devlesko kai sas le dino .

text: If any man speak , let him speak as the oracles of God ; if any man minister , let him do it as of the ability which God giveth : that God in all things may be glorified through Jesus Christ , to whom be praise and dominion for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Kodo kai del duma pa Del trobul te mothol le Vorbi le Devleske ; ai kodo kai zhutil trobul te kerel kodia la zorasa kai dia les O Del , saxke ande soste godi o luvudimos te avel le Devleske katar O Jesus Kristo , kai lesko si o barimos ai e putiera ande swako vriama . Amen .

text: Beloved , think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you , as though some strange thing happened unto you :
text2: Murhe vortacha , na chudin tume ke san kadia zurales zumade , sar te kerdilino tumenge vari so kai chi haliaren .

text: But rejoice , inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ ' s sufferings ; that , when his glory shall be revealed , ye may be glad also with exceeding joy .
text2: Numa mai bini raduin tume ke chinuin vi tume sar O Kristo , saxke te aven vi tume ando baro raduimos kana avela O Kristo ande pesko barimos .

text: If ye be reproached for the name of Christ , happy are ye ; for the spirit of glory and of God resteth upon you : on their part he is evil spoken of , but on your part he is glorified .
text2: Raduime avena te marena mui tumendar ke san le slugi le Kristoske ; ke O Swunto Duxo le luvudimasko ai le Devlesko pe tumende lo .

text: But let none of you suffer as a murderer , or as a thief , or as an evildoer , or as a busybody in other men ' s matters .
text2: Chi iek anda tumende chi trobul te chinuil sar te mudardino , vai sar te chordino , vai sar te kerdino nasulimos , vai sar te amisailino kal kolavrenge dieli .

text: Yet if any man suffer as a Christian , let him not be ashamed ; but let him glorify God on this behalf .
text2: Numa te chinuila vari kon ke si ek shav Devlesko te na avel leske lazhav , numa mai bini te naisil le Devleske ke si ek shav Devleske .

text: For the time is come that judgment must begin at the house of God : and if it first begin at us , what shall the end be of them that obey not the gospel of God ?
text2: E vriama avili kai e kris si te nachinail , ai o narodo le Devlesko avela dino pe kris mai anglal . Te avasa ame dine pe kris mai anglal , so avela kodolensa kai chi pachaiepe ande lashi viasta le Devleski ?

text: And if the righteous scarcely be saved , where shall the ungodly and the sinner appear ?
text2: Ai te si trutno le manushenge kai pachanpe ando Del te aven skepime , so avela andal manush le bi lashe ai le bezexale ?

text: Wherefore let them that suffer according to the will of God commit the keeping of their souls to him in well doing , as unto a faithful Creator .
text2: No kodola kai chinuin ande voia le Devleski trobul te zhan angle ai te keren o mishtimos ai te meken sa pengo traio andel vas le Devleske kai kerdia le , kai wo shoxar chi bustrel so shinadia .

text: The elders which are among you I exhort , who am also an elder , and a witness of the sufferings of Christ , and also a partaker of the glory that shall be revealed :
text2: Mangav te phenav kodolenge kai si mashkar tumende ai kai zhanen le Devles de dumult , ke i me sar lende , zhanav le Devles de dumult . Ai dikhlem o chino le Kristosko , ai vi me avava ando luvudimos kai si te avel .

text: Feed the flock of God which is among you , taking the oversight thereof , not by constraint , but willingly ; not for filthy lucre , but of a ready mind ;
text2: Eta so mangav lendar ; len sama sar le pastuxuria katar le bakriorha kai meklia tumenge O Del , len sama lendar tumare ilesa , sar O Del mangel , ai na bi ilesko . Keren tumari buchi , na te nirin love , numa ke mangen te keren buchi le Devleske .

text: Neither as being lords over God ' s heritage , but being ensamples to the flock .
text2: Ai na roden te poronchin pe kodola kai sas tume dine te arakhen le , numa trobul te sikaven tume lenge o drom .

text: And when the chief Shepherd shall appear , ye shall receive a crown of glory that fadeth not away .
text2: Ai kana o gazda le pastuxonge avela , avela tumen dini e konona kai si luvudime kai shoxar chi xasarela pesko strefaimos .

text: Likewise , ye younger , submit yourselves unto the elder . Yea , all of you be subject one to another , and be clothed with humility : for God resisteth the proud , and giveth grace to the humble .
text2: Ai tume le mai terne , keren so mothon tumenge le mai phure . Ai akana phenav savorhenge te aven milosa te zhutin iek kavres , ke E Vorba le Devleski mothol , " Ke O Del chi zhutil le manushen kai si barimatange , numa zhutil kodolen kai nai barimatange . "

text: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God , that he may exalt you in due time :
text2: No meken tume tele tela vas o baro le Devlesko , saxke te vazdel tume kana avela e vriama .
